40001001	Mahi behangbuk hi Abraham Shapa, David Shapa Jesu Christa thoinakeina kha inih:
40001002	Abraham kha Isaac apa runih. Isaac kha Jacob apa runih. Khan Jacob kha Judah le ama shokpui hai apa runih.
40001003	Judah kha Perez le Zerah apa runih. Khan unu u kha Tamar runih. Perez kha Hezron apa runih. Khan Hezron kha Aram apa runih.
40001004	Aram kha Aminadab apa runih. Aminadab kha Nahshon apa runih. Khan Nahshon kha Salmon apa runih.
40001005	Salmon kha Boaz apa runih. Rahab kha unu runih. Boaz kha Obed apa runih. Ruth kha unu runih. Khan Obed kha Jesse apa runih.
40001006	Jesse kha reng David apa runih. Reng David kha Solomon apa runih. Solomon unu kha Uriah nungak kha runih.
40001007	Solomon kha Rehoboam apa runih. Rehoboam kha Abijah apa runih. Khan Abijah kha Asa apa runih.
40001008	Asa kha Jehoshaphat apa runih. Jehoshaphat kha Joram apa runih. Khan Joram kha Uzziah apa runih.
40001009	Uzziah kha Jotham apa runih. Jotham kha Ahaz apa runih. Khan Ahaz kha Hezekiah apa runih.
40001010	Hezekiah kha Manasseh apa runih. Manasseh kha Amon apa runih. Khan Amon kha Josiah apa runih.
40001011	Israel nai hai kha Babylon ah ruchawi u lai khan, Josiah kha Jeconiah le ama shokpui hai apa u runih.
40001012	Amani kha Babylon ah ruchawi u shole: Jeconiah kha Shalathiel apa runih. Khan Shalathiel kha Zerubbabel apa runih.
40001013	Zerubbabel kha Abiud apa runih. Abiud kha Eliakim apa runih. Eliakim kha Azor apa runih.
40001014	Azor kha Zadok apa runih. Zadok kha Akhim apa runih. Khan Akhim kha Eliud apa runih.
40001015	Eliud kha Eleazar apa runih. Eleazar kha Matthan apa runih. Matthan kha Jacob apa runih.
40001016	Jacob kha Joseph apa runih. Joseph kha, Christa iruti u Jesu rumoshok Mariam inkopa kha runih.
40001017	Khajarkhan Abraham ah put ah Davidshe thoinakeina hai kha rong shawmlieimili inih. David ah put ah Babylon ah iruchawina u kha rong shawmlieimili inih. Khan Babylon ah iruchawina uah put ah Christa shoknashe kha rong shawmlieimili inih.
40001018	Jesu Christa shokna kha hitihin ruawm: Unu Mariam kha Joseph rang rushot pe u joi, inia rawtawng mala khan Ratha Riethieng ah put ah nairuvawng joi.
40001019	Inia imiringpa Joseph kha midik `khat runih, khan vanoi dieng chawng moshok a jak pek rang rudit boi jarkhan, ama na muruk a rumathan jawt joi.
40001020	Inia hihaihi rumining laitak hin, enro, Pumi ravantir `khat na ama dieng ramang a jong lar a ruti, “David shapa Joseph, nang inkonu Mariam nangiloi rang a kha chit pui naw roh. Ajarla ivawng nai kha Ratha Riethieng ah put ah inih.
40001021	Ama na shapa `khat moshok rangnih, khan ama riming kha JESU nangti pe rangnih. Ajarla imiring hai kha amani munu ah put ah shan rangnih.”
40001022	Hihai kholok hi Pumi na thiempulien dieng a bai`irushona kha hawng rupumna rang a inih.
40001023	Hitihin ruriei: “Enro, shimnu `khat na naivawng a shapa `khat moshok rangnih, khan ama riming kha Imanuel ti pe u rangnih.” Makha “Pathien na kieini le awm,” tina inih.
40001024	Joseph na aja ah put ah hawng thoi phakhan, Pumi ravantir na chawngirupek dungjuia ama kha ruloh joi.
40001025	Inia asharapa shapa kha runiei masheng, Joseph na rurishih pui mak. Khan ama riming kha JESU, tia rupho pe joi.
40002001	Herod na reng ruchanglai, Judea ah awm Bethlehem khan Jesu rushok shole, enro, shim tieng ah arshi behangthiei hai kha Jerusalem hawng shok u joi.
40002002	Amani na ruti uh, “Ashok Jihudi hai Reng kha khoshekawt ah maw awm? Shim tieng hin ama arshi kha kumuk u jarkhan, ama chubaibawk hawng kanih uh.”
40002003	Reng Herod na makha rujet phakhan, umulung ruraha pe joi. Ama le awm Jerusalem miring kholokawm mulung ruraha pe u joi.
40002004	Ama na miring hai thiempu ulien hai le danoja hai kha ruruchun a Christa kha khoshekawt ah shok rang a maw nih, tia amani dieng rurawdawn joi.
40002005	Ama dieng rumashang uh, “Judea ah awm Bethlehem ah inih, ajarla hitihin thiempulien dieng irumiejiekna inih:
40002006	‘Judah ram ah awm Bethlehem, nang tu Judah rampo hai kar a noishieving kha nimakche. Ajarla nang ah put ah kimiring Israel hai aroi rang, Rampo `khat jong rangnih.’ ”
40002007	Khashole Herod na muruk a arshi behangthiei hai kha rukoi a amani dieng arshi larna phatak kha jetna rang riringtak a rurawdawn joi.
40002008	Amani kha Bethlehem ah rutir a ruti, “She u tana Naitepa kha vak tawk u roh. Ama kha nangmuk u phakhan, chawng kha kiei dieng vak mikir u roh. Kiei na`awm ama kha chubai vak bawk rawng.”
40002009	Rengpa chawng kha rujet u shole, rushe u joi. Khan enro, shim tieng ah irumuk u arshi kha na Naitepa ruawmna riding khan ding masheng, amani maton ah rulawn.
40002010	Amani na arshi kha muk u phakhan, ajeng a ningrungai pe uh.
40002011	Khan in khan amani na rulut u phakhan, Naitepa kha unu Mariam le ruawm kha vak muk uh. Amani na bawklap a ama kha chubairubawk uh. Amani na nieibawm hai kha rumawlawng ua, khutchawi hai kha ama dieng rupek uh. Khahaikha la: rangkachak, libanos, khan myrrh inih.
40002012	Khania Pathien na amani dieng ramang a, Herod dieng kirna boi rang, chawngruriei pe u joi. Khajarkhan lam shik arawh ua amani ram tieng rukir u joi.
40002013	Khan amani na rumathan u shole, Pumi ravantir na Joseph dieng ramang a jong lar a ruti, “Thoi rang roh, Naitepa le unu kha chawi tana Egypt ah tan rang roh. Kienieriei masheng kha mun khan awm roh. Ajarla Herod na Naitepa kha mathangna rang, atawkdeng joi.”
40002014	Khajarkhan Joseph na ruthoi a Naitepa le unu kha Egypt tieng jan a rushe pui joi.
40002015	Ajarla Pumi na thiempulien dieng irurieina, “Egypt ah put ah kashapa kha kokoi joi,” iti kha hawng rupumna rang a inih. Khan Herod na thit masheng, kha mun khan ruawm joi.
40002016	Khan arshi behangthiei hai kha na nomohon joi, iti kha Herod na rujet `le, ajeng a mulung ruhang pe joi. Khan arshi behangthiei hai ah put ah kungler irujetsha dungjuia, ama na mi rutir a Bethlehem le khakawt ah awm kum `di le kum `di thoi a shapa kholok ruthat joi.
40002017	Makha thiempulien Jeremiah dieng a irurieina kha hawng rupumna rang a inih. Ama na ruti,
40002018	“Rama khan hesho `khat rujet. Awina, chaprie`iek, khan lungkurna hesho kha inih. Rachel na anai hai rang rie`ieklam a chap a awm. Tute na imaw`awi rang a kha rudit mak, ajarla amani kha awm u lai mak.”
40002019	Khania Herod kha ruthi phakhan, enro, Egypt khan Pumi ravantir `khat na Joseph dieng ramang a jong lar joi.
40002020	Ama na ruti, “Thoi tana unu le Naitepa kha Israel ram tieng she pui rang roh. Ajarla Naitepa ringkho atawk miring hai kha thisho joi.”
40002021	Joseph na ruthoi a unu le Naitepa kha Israel ram tieng vat pui joi.
40002022	Inia Archelaus na apa Herod ruhut a Judea ipok kha rujet `le, makha mun ah ashe rang kha, ruchih. Ramang a chawngiruben le roroia, ama na Galilee ram tieng rushe joi.
40002023	Khan ama na ava a Nazareth iti kho khan vak awm joi. Makha thiempulien hai dieng “Ama kha Nazareth miring, tia koi rangnih,” tia irurieina kha hawng rupumna rang a inih.
40003001	Khalaikhan baptisma apeh John na Judea ramthim khan rular a chawng rushem:
40003002	“Nang mulung lek u roh, ajarla ravan rengchangna kha jong nai joi!”
40003003	Ajarla mahi miringpa chungchang hin thiempulien Isaiah dieng a irurieina inih. Ama na ruti, “Ramthim ah hesho `khat na ra`ai, ‘PUMI lam kha kon pe roh. Ama lam hai kha moton pe roh.’ ”
40003004	Makha Johntak na sharingshiei sham kha rurieshiei, mevun kawngkhit kha rukhit. Ama nekleshak kha khaishawr hai le ram khoining runih.
40003005	Khashole Jerusalem, Judea le Jordan na iroko ram ah awm miring kholok na ama dieng rushe uh.
40003006	Khan amani munu hai kha ruruphong ua Jordan khan ama na baptisma rupek uh.
40003007	Inia Pharisee hai le Sadducee hai na ama baptisma loina mun ah ava kha rumuk phakhan, amani dieng ruti, “Aw moro chicha hai! Jongshok rang a lunghangna ah put ah atan rang, tu na maw nangni kha nierieimasha u joi?
40003008	Khajarkhan mulung lekna rutuk ara hai kha mupung u roh.
40003009	‘Abraham kha kapa u `khat a kieniei uh,’ tia mining u naw roh. Ajarla hihai lung ah put ah Abraham rang Pathien na nai hai kha mothoi ngam, tia nangni dieng kinieriei u inih.
40003010	Tunawm thing hai rujung khan riei kha rutung a awm joi. Khajarkhan atha ara moshok boi thing rikip kha tuk a miei ah apai rangnih.
40003011	“Nang mulung nangilek u le roroia, kiei na nangni kha tui a baptisma kenepek uh, inia kanuk a ava rang a pa kha kieinek a ranak nieidet. Ama kethawp hai arak rang khan kiei rutuk mi`ing. Ama na nangni kha Ratha Riethieng le miei a baptisma nepek u rangnih.
40003012	Jamja kha ukhut le arak joi. Ama na pher kha machai rangnih joi. Khan ama gehu kha achu khan rawkhawm rangnih joi, inia irishi hai kha chiemtiknieiboi miei le ha rangnih joi.”
40003013	Khashole John na baptisma moloina rang, Jesu na Galilee ah put ah Jordan khan rushe joi.
40003014	Inia John na rumakha a ruti, “Nang na kiei hi baptisma ninomoloi rang a hi kirangai inih. Inia iloia kiei dieng ava maw nangnih?”
40003015	Inia Jesu na mashang a ama dieng ruti, “Tun a hin tu hi nih rosho, ajarla dikna kholok hitihin a rupummashak rang a hi kieini rang rutukthep inih.” Makhan John na rujawt pe joi.
40003016	Khan baptisma rupek shole, Jesu kha relentak a tui ah put ah hawng thoi a enro, ravan kha rumawlawng pe joi. Khan Pathien Ratha na vashu ang a jong chum a ama dieng jong chuh kha rumuk.
40003017	Khan enro, ravan ah put ah he `khat na ruti, “Mahi kashapa numpoktak kha inih, ama chung a ningnitna kha kieniei joi.”
40004001	Khashole Jesu kha diabol na lemna rang, Ratha na ramthim ah ruchawi joi.
40004002	Khan ama na ni shawm mili jan shawm mili chamrarudoi shole, vawnrucham pe joi.
40004003	Makhan milempa kha na ava a ama dieng ruti, “Pathien Shapa kha nangnih a tu, hihai lung hi tan rachangna rang, chawng peh roh.”
40004004	Inia mashang a ama na ruti, “Hitihin miejiek, ‘Miring na nekleshak ranga kha le ring naw nih, inia Pathien bai ah put ah vak shok chawng rikip kha le aring rang a inih.’ ”
40004005	Khashole diabol na khopui riethieng khan ruchawi a riethiengmun moidawn khan rumiding.
40004006	Khan ama dieng ruti, “Pathien Shapa kha nangnih a tu, nang nining a chawm roh, ajarla hitihin miejiek, ‘Pathien na ama ravantir hai kha nang chungchanga chawng pek rangnih,’ khan ‘Nangke kha lung le rawtawna boi rang, amani khut le nurudawm u rangnih.’ ”
40004007	Jesu na ama dieng ruti, “Hitihin miejiek a awmret, ‘Nang PUMI nang Pathien kha nangilem boi rang a inih.’ ”
40004008	Takthar a diabol na ama kha lawn rashangtak ah ruchawiret a manmieshie rengchangna kholok le amani lurna hai kha rumumuk.
40004009	Khan Jesu dieng ruti, “Kiei hi chubainangnabawk a tu, hihai kholok hi nepek rang kanih.”
40004010	Khashole Jesu na ama dieng ruti, “Kiei ah put ah rechen roh, Aw Satan! Ajarla hitihin miejiek a awm, ‘Nang PUMI nang Pathien kha chubainangibawk rang a inih, khan ama ranga kha chon nangithaw pe rang a inih.’ ”
40004011	Khashole diabol na ama kha rumathan joi. Enro, ravantir hai na jong ua ama chon kha jong thaw pe u joi.
40004012	Khan John kha lungroko shung a rutet joi, iti kha Jesu na rujet `le, Galilee tieng rushe joi.
40004013	Khan Nazareth kha rumathan shole, ava a Capernaum ah ruawm joi. Makha Zebulun le Naphtali ram ah thampui kawriei ah awm inih.
40004014	Makha thiempulien Isaiah dieng irurieina kha hawng rupumna rang a inih:
40004015	“Zebulun le Naphtali ram, thampui kawriei ah le Jordan vara ah awm, Phungshik hai awmna Galilee.
40004016	Ajing a awm miring kha na mieivar lientak `khat muk joi. Khan kha ram le thitna rilip a awm miring amani dieng khan mieivar kha na hawng eh joi.”
40004017	Khan ah put khan Jesu na chawngshem ruput a ruriei, “Nang mulung lek u roh, ajarla ravan rengchangna kha jong nai joi.”
40004018	Khan Galilee Thampui pang kha rujotlai khan, poro `di, Peter iti Simon le anaipangpa Andrew, na thampui chung ah len iruvawr u kha vak muk, ajarla amani kha ngashur miring runih uh.
40004019	Khan adin u dieng ruti, “Kanu nujui u roh, kiei na nangni kha mishur miring niminit u rang kanih.”
40004020	Khan relentak a len hai kha mak ua Jesu anu kha rujui u joi.
40004021	Khan ah put ah rushe a ulienpa le naipangpa shik idi, Zebedee shapa James le anaipangpa John kha rokong shung ah vak muk uh. Amani kha apa u Zebedee le rokong shung ah len hai kha iphawt a ruawm u inih, khan amani kha rukoi uh.
40004022	Khan relentak a rokong le apa u kha mak ua Jesu anu kha rujui u joi.
40004023	Jesu na Galilee kholok khan rushe a amani synagogue hai khan mi ruruchuk. Khan rengchangna athachawng kha rurophong. Ama na rai rikip le miring hai kar a taksha natna kholok kha rumadam pe joi.
40004024	Khan Syria kholok shung khan iriming rushe joi. Khan ana hai kholok kha ama dieng ruchawi uh. Amani kha rai shikshik natna na imawshaw, raikho na ichutna, pingbawprai tawng miring hai le takthi miring hai kha runih uh. Jesu na amani kha rumadam uh.
40004025	Khan Galilee, Decapolis, Jerusalem, Judea, khan Jordan vara ah put ah mipui na ama anu kha rujui u joi.
40005001	Khashole mirawp kha rumuk phakhan, ama na lawn ah ruhawng joi. Khan shutna ruloi phakhan, akhaichawi hai na ama dieng va uh.
40005002	Khan amani kha ruchuk put a ruriei:
40005003	“Ratha a sharachang hai kha rahvanmuh miring kha inih, ajarla ravan rengchangna kha amani tah inih.
40005004	Mulung thangta hai kha rahvanmuh miring kha inih, ajarla amani mulung kha menem pe rangnih.
40005005	Mulung renem hai kha rahvanmuh miring kha inih, ajarla amani na rieliei kha tum u rangnih.
40005006	Dikna rang a vawncham le tuira hai kha rahvanmuh miring kha inih, ajarla miship pe u rangnih.
40005007	Roihoi miring hai kha rahvanmuh miring kha inih, ajarla roihoina kha muk u rangnih.
40005008	Mulung a riethieng hai kha rahvanmuh miring kha inih, ajarla amani na Pathien kha muk u rangnih.
40005009	Riengieina athaw miring hai kha rahvanmuh miring kha inih, ajarla amani kha Pathien shapa hai, tia koi rangnih.
40005010	Dikna jar a mi na epshawna ipek hai kha rahvanmuh miring kha inih, ajarla ravan rengchangna kha amani tah inih.
40005011	“Kajar a mi na jakna le epshawna kha nepek uh, khan chawng shie kholok le nangni kha niebiek u phakhan, rahvanmuh miring kha nangnih uh.
40005012	Ningai u roh, khan rawshaw u roh, ajarla ravan a nang lawh u kha ielien. Ajarla khatak kha ang a nang maton uah thiempulien hai kha amani na epshawna kha irupek u inih.
40005013	“Nangni rieliei michi kha nangnih uh. Inia michi kha a`ah boi chang joiala, itia maw ma`aret rawng? Ajarla ih rangbak khan nemnalai naw nih, inia makha pai a miring hai na eke le ichongna rangte keng joi.
40005014	“Nangni manmieshie mieivar kha nangnih uh. Lawn ah imothoi khopui kha mi na the ngam naw nih.
40005015	Tute na thaomiei kha muchuk a tiengkum thoi ah tetngai mak, inia thaomieishut khan atet a in shung ah awm kholok dieng aeh.
40005016	Kha ang khan nang mieivar u kha na miring hai maikung a var rosho. Makha nang chonthaw u atha kha amani na muk a ravan a awm nangpa u kha mapakna rang a inih.
40005017	“Dan ninawkle Thiempulien hai na imiejiek kha mathang ajong kanih keng, tia mining u naw roh. Amani kha mathang rang, kiei ajong nimi`ing, inia rupummashak ajong kanih.
40005018	Diktak a nangni dieng kiriei inih, ravan le rieliei hi hek masheng, khan kholok hi rupum masheng, Dan ah put ah chawng shundet ninawkle hailak `khatshe thang naw nih.
40005019	Khajarkhan tunita`awm hihai chawngpek kar hin ashinving `khat ikhoi a mi ruchuh miring kha ravan rengchangna khan ashinving, tia koi rangnih. Inia tunita`awm chawngpek hai kha ithaw a mi hai kha iruchuk ama kha ravan rengchangna khan alien, tia koi rangnih.
40005020	Ajarla nang dikna kha na danoja hai le Pharisee hai dikna kha khe joi nawkatu, ravan rengchangna khan shuklut a lut u naw tinih, tia nangni dieng kiriei hi inih.
40005021	“Tolai khan dan na mi hai dieng, ‘Mi nangithat boi rang a inih, tunita`awm mithat miring kha na chawngshatna kha rawtawng pui rangnih,’ iti kha nangjet uh.
40005022	Inia kiei na nangni dieng kiti makhala tunita`awm jar boi a uliennai chung a mulung hang mi rikip na chawngshatna kha rawtawng pui rangnih. Khan uliennai dieng, ‘Nemna boi miring!’ atipa kha na Sanhedrin maikung a ding rangnih. Khan ‘Mivet!’ atipa ama kha na Gehenna ah lut rangnih.
40005023	“Khajarkhan maicham ah khutchawi nangchawi phakhan, nang uliennai na nang chung a mulunghoina boi kha nanghawngmining a tu,
40005024	maicham khan nang khutchawi kha mah tana, rapapek a, nang uliennai kha le riengieina vak thaw roh, khan va tana nang khutchawi kha vak peh roh.
40005025	“Nangire`er pui miring kha le danin ah nangshelam khan relentak a riengiei pui roh. Khanawkatu nangire`erpui miring kha na chawngshatpa dieng nepek rangnih, khan chawngshatpa kha na alienpa dieng nepeh ning, tia lungroko shung ah nothong rangnih.
40005026	Diktak a nang dieng kiriei inih, itikte nita`awm dawngkhit quadron kha nangpek masheng, makha mun ah put ah vak shok naw tinih.
40005027	“Tolai khan dan na mi hai dieng, ‘Uire nangithaw boi rang a inih,’ iti kha nangrujet u joi.
40005028	Inia kiei na nangni dieng kiti hi inih, makhala tunita`awm nupang `khat dieng takjatlam a aen miring kha na umulung shung a ama kha le uire ithawsha nih joi.
40005029	Khan nang chang tieng ah mik kha na inamabak rang a nitjoiatu, kaw tana pai roh. Ajarla nang pumplang kha Gehenna a ithong rangnek a tu, nang pasha `khat athang rang a kha thadet.
40005030	Khan nang khut chang kha na inamabak rang a nitjoiatu, tuh tana pai roh. Ajarla nang pumplang kha Gehenna a ithong rangnek a tu, nang pasha `khat athang rang a kha thadet.
40005031	“Hitihinawm ruriei, ‘I`inkonu le reshen mi kha na ama dieng imelena jawtnapek kha peh rosho.’
40005032	Inia kiei na nangni dieng kiriei hi inih makhala muruk a ponpha niboia, tunita`awm i`inkonu ireshen pui kha na ama kha uire imawthaw inih. Khan mi na imelenu anieipa kha na uire ithaw inih.
40005033	“Takthar a, tolai a iruriei: ‘Adik boi a chawngnangrakham boi rang a inih. Inia Pumi dieng a nang chawngrakham hai kha rung roh,’ iti kha nangrujet uh.
40005034	Inia chawngrakham thalak mak, iti hi kiei na kinieriei u inih. Ravanawm ban a chawngrakham u naw roh, ajarla mahi Pathien rengmun kha inih.
40005035	Rielieiawm ban a chawngrakham u naw roh, ajarla mahi Pathien kekhawng kha inih. Jerusalemawm ban a chawngrakham u naw roh, ajarla mahi alientak Reng khopui `khat inih.
40005036	Nang luawm ban a chawngrakham u naw roh, ajarla sham pum `khat kha mongoi ninawkle mahang ngam u makche.
40005037	Nang ‘Awh’ chawng u kha ‘Awh’ nih rosho, nang ‘Nang’ chawng u kha ‘Nang’ nih rosho, inia makha akhe kha ashie ah put ah inih.
40005038	“ ‘Mik `khat ruhut a mik `khat, khan ha `khat ruhut a ha `khat,’ iti kha nangrujet u joi.
40005039	Inia kiei na nangni dieng kieriei, mi shie kha rodoi pui u naw roh, inia tukhat na nang ngem chang tieng naben phakhan, shir `khat kha`awm daw pe roh.
40005040	Tukhat na nang kotai kha loina rang nemeher joiatu, nang pon inoloi pe rang a kha`awm jawt roh.
40005041	Tukhat na nang kha majin `khat shena rang ne`ep joiatu, majin `di she pui roh.
40005042	Nang dieng nanih ama dieng khan peh roh. Nang dieng naphuk jawt miring ah put ah nang mai miehiei naw roh.
40005043	“ ‘Nang ringchangpui kha numnangipok rang a inih, khan nang rahapui kha nangimukmak rang a inih,’ iti kha nangrujet uh.
40005044	Inia nangni dieng kieriei, nang rahapui hai kha numpoh u roh. Pumnaboh hai kha rahvan peh u roh. Namumah hai dieng atha thaw u roh. Mawchawlaw a norotokna le epshawna napeh amani rang nik pe u roh.
40005045	Hihaihi nangthaw uatu, ravan a awm nangpa u shapa hai kha nangchang u rangnih. Ajarla atha ashie hai rang ama ni imoshok pe inih. Midik midik boi hai rang ro imushur pe inih.
40005046	Ajarla numnapoh hai kha numnangpok a la, ih lawh kha maw niei rawng? Khaichana rawkhawm hai na`awm makha ithaw u nimak maw?
40005047	Khan nang uliennai ranga kha chubai nangthaw pui a la, shik hainek a imaw nangithawdet awm? Phungshik hai na`awm ithaw u nimak maw?
40005048	Khajarkhan ravan a awm nangpa u urupum kha ang a, nangniawm rupum u roh.
40006001	“Miring hai maikung a amani muk rang numpokpek chon hai kha nangthawna boi u rang, riring u roh. Khanawkatu ravan a awm nangpa uah put ah lawh kha muh u naw tinih.
40006002	“Khajarkhan numpokpek chon nangthaw phakhan, thanunchan thaw hai na, miring hai na mapakna rang, synagogue ah le lamlien ah ithaw u kha ang a, tekawlawi kha nang maton ah tum naw roh. Diktak a nangni dieng kiriei inih, amani na lawh kha iman u nih joi.
40006003	Inia numpokpek nangpek phakhan nang khut chang na ithaw kha nang khut viei kha mejet naw roh.
40006004	Khatikhan nang numpokpek kha rethe minit roh, khan rethe a amuh nangpa ama na nang dieng amalang a nemele rangnih.
40006005	“Khan nangnik phakhan, thanunchan thaw hai kha nangang boi rang a inih. Ajarla amani na synagogue ah le lamlien kona hai khan ding ua miring hai na mukna rang, anih kha adit uh. Diktak a nangni dieng kiriei inih, amani na lawh kha iman u nih joi.
40006006	Inia nangnik phakhan nang indan shung ah lut roh, khan khar tana rethe a awm nangpa dieng nih roh. Khan rethe a awm nangpa kha na nang dieng amalang a nemele rangnih.
40006007	Khan nangnik u phakhan, Phungshik hai kha ang a, nemna boi a mikirreret u naw roh, ajarla amani chawngriei rawp khan amani kha rangai pe rangnih, tia mining uh.
40006008	“Khajarkhan amani kha ang u naw roh, ajarla ama dieng nangnik u mala khan nangpa u kha na nangirangai u nieinak hai kha ejet.
40006009	Khajarkhan hitihin nih u roh: Ravan a awm kapa u, nang riming kha riethieng nih rosho.
40006010	Nang rengchangna kha ajong nih rosho. Ravan a nang mulungmining nangithaw kha ang a, rieliei hinawm nih rosho.
40006011	Von a nekkhawp nekleshak kha nikip nepeh u roh.
40006012	Kielieishie ton hai kirangaidam u hi ang a, lieishie kiton u hai hi narangaidam pe u roh.
40006013	Lemna a nomocho u naw roh. Inia ashie ah put ah nakhek u roh. Ajarla rengchangna, ranak, khan lurna kha kumshawt a nang tah inih. Amen.
40006014	“Ajarla miring hai dieng amani shietna kha le nangrangaidam u joiatu, ravan a awm nangpa u na`awm nangni kha narangaidam u rangnih.
40006015	Inia miring hai kha amani shietna kha le nangrangaidam u joi nawkatu, nang shietna u kha nangpa u na rangaidam naw nih.
40006016	“Khan chamranangdoi u phakhan, thanunchan thaw hai kha ang a, rungui miring kha chang u naw roh. Amani chamradoi kha mi hai dieng malarna rang, amai u kha memieshiet uh. Diktak a nangni dieng kiriei inih, amani na lawh kha iman u nih joi.
40006017	Inia chamranangdoi u phakhan, nang lu ah thao nawt u roh, khan nang mai kha phie u roh.
40006018	Makha mi hai dieng nang chamradoina u kha larna boi rang a inih. Inia muruk a awm nangpa u, khan muruk a amuh nangpa u na amalang a nemele u rangnih.
40006019	“Nangni rangbak khan rieliei chung a niei bawm u naw roh. Makha mun kha lieida le ek na imathangnathiei mun inih, khan murushah hai na ikhoi a imuruknathiei mun inih.
40006020	Inia nangni rangbak khan ravan a niei bawm u roh. Makha mun kha lieida le ek na imathangnathiei boi le murushah hai na ikhoi a imuruknathiei boi mun inih.
40006021	Ajarla nang niei bawmna mun khan nang mulungawm awm rangnih.
40006022	“Mik hi pum mieivar kha inih. Khajarkhan nang mik kha tha joiatu, nang pumplang kha mieivar kha na ship rangnih.
40006023	Inia nang mik kha shie joiatu, nang pumplang kha ajing na ship rangnih. Khajarkhan nang dieng a awm mieivar kha ajing nitjoiala, ajing kha idawr a lien maw nih!
40006024	“Tute na pumi `di chon thaw ngam naw nih, ajarla akhat kha mukmak a shik `khat kha numpok rangnih. Ninawkle, akhat kha pawm a shik `khat kha aheng rangnih. Pathien le nieilelung dire chon thaw ngam u naw tinih.
40006025	“Hijarhin a nangni dieng kiriei inih, imaw nangishak u rang ninawkle imaw nanginek u rang, tia nang ringkho u rang, imaw nangirieshiei u rang, tia nang pum u rang mulung mawshaw u naw roh. Nekleshaknek a ringkho, khan ponlediernek a nang pum u kha manludet nimak maw?
40006026	Ravan a va hai khi en u roh, vawrawm vawr u mak, at`awm at u mak, khan achu a`awm bawm u mak; inia ravan a awm nangpa u na amani kha ivai inih. Amaninek a manlu nih u makche maw?
40006027	Khan nang kar ua, tu na maw lungkhamna niei a atak chung ah rajang `khat abo ngam?
40006028	“Khan ponledier rang ijar a lungkhamna nanginiei u maw nih? Ram ah tuirieipar hai ringdan khaw tinta u roh. Chonawm thaw u mak, khan patawm kher u mak.
40006029	Inia nangni dieng kiriei inih, makhala Solomonshe na ama lurna kholok le hihaihi kar a akhat ang a rielien ngam mak.
40006030	Von mawng a jing tieng ratapkung ah ipai, ram ah champi hai khaw, Pathien na khatikhan rielien joiala, Aw ashin a takashawn miring hai, Pathien na nangni kha thadet a inierielien boi u rang a maw nih?
40006031	Khajarkhan, ‘Imaw kenek rang’? ninawkle, ‘Imaw kashak rang’? ninawkle, ‘Imaw kierieshiei rang’? tia lungkhamna niei u naw roh.
40006032	Ajarla Phungshik hai na hihai rangbak hin rieirit a atawk uh. Ravan a nangpa u na hihaihi nangrangai u, iti kha ejet.
40006033	Inia Pathien rengchangna le ama dikna kha masha a tawk u roh, khan hihai kholok hi nangni dieng nobo pe u rangnih.
40006034	Khajarkhan jing a rang khan lungkhamna niei u naw roh. Ajarla jing kha na nining a lungkhamna kha niei rangnih. Nikho rikip na shawna kha rutukthep a iniei inih.
40007001	“Nang chung ua chawngshatna boi rang, mi chung a chawngshat u naw roh.
40007002	Ajarla mi chung a chawngnangishattak u kha na nang chung ua chawngshat rangnih. Nangni na dannangilak u kha na nangni dieng dannalak rangnih.
40007003	“Ijar a nang mik ah awm thinglong kha tinta boi a, nang uliennai mik ah thinglek kha nangi`en maw nih?
40007004	Ninawkle, enro, thinglong kha nang mik ah awm a la, itia maw nang uliennai dieng ‘Nang mik ah awm thinglek kha napai pe rawng jawt roh,’ tia riei rawng?
40007005	Aw thanunchan thaw miring! Nang mik ah awm thinglong kha paibak roh, khashole nang uliennai mik ah put ah thinglek kha paina rang, malangsheng a nangmuk rangnih.
40007006	“Riethieng nieinak kha ui hai dieng peh u naw roh, khan rangkachak hai kha vawk hai maton ah vawr pe u naw roh. Khanitatu amani chung khan eke le achongna rangnih, khan vak hiei ning, tia leklek a nether u rangnih.
40007007	“Nih u roh, nangni dieng nepek rangnih. Tawk u roh, nangmuk u rangnih. Tawh u roh, nangni rang nawmawlawng pe rangnih.
40007008	Ajarla anih miring rikip na umuk, atawk ama kha na aman, khan atawh ama rang khan mawlawng pe.
40007009	“Ninawkle, nang kar ua tukhat na ashapa na tan nik phakhan, ama dieng lung peh nih maw?
40007010	Ama na nga nik `le ama dieng moro peh nih maw?
40007011	Mi shie nangnih ua`awm, nang nai hai dieng khutchawi atha hai kha pekna rang, nangjet uala, ravan a awm nangpa u na, ama dieng a anih hai dieng khan khutchawi atha hai kha idawrshe maw arawp a peh nih?
40007012	Khajarkhan irikip a nangni dieng nangimawthaw jawt u kha thawna rang, amani dieng thaw u roh. Ajarla mahi Dan le Thiempulien hai na imiejiek kha inih.
40007013	“Pakawt rebe khan lut u roh, ajarla rajai pakawt le lamlien kha na thangna kha akhin, khan makhan a alut miring hai kha awrawp.
40007014	Ajarla ringna akhin pakawt kha rebe, lam kha matat, khan makha amuh hai kha awtawm.
40007015	“Thiempulien jok hai ah put ah riring u roh. Amani na kengam rielien thaw a va uh, inia amani shung a tu melang arang hai kha nih uh.
40007016	Amani ara hai khan nangjet u rangnih. Miring hai na riling kung ah put ah drakha, ninawkle thieimu kung ah put ah thieichang rawkhawm u maw?
40007017	Kha ang khan thingkung atha rikip na ara atha moshok, inia thingkung ashie na ara ashie moshok.
40007018	Thingkung atha na ara ashie moshok mak, khan thingkung ashie na ara atha moshok mak.
40007019	Ara atha moshok boi thingkung rikip kha tuk a miei ah apai.
40007020	Khatikhan amani ara khan nangjet u rangnih.
40007021	“Kiei dieng ‘Pumi, Pumi,’ ati mi rikip na ravan rengchangna khan alut rang a nimak. Khania ravan a awm kapa mulungmining athaw ama kha na alut rang a inih.
40007022	Makha Nikho khan mi tampui na ‘Pumi, Pumi, nang riming a chawng kirophong boi u, nang riming a raikho hai kinawt boi u, khan nang riming a ranakniei chon tampui kithaw boi u maw nih,’ ti u rangnih.
40007023	Khan amani dieng ‘Danishawnboi a chon thaw miring hai! Kiei na nangni kha shukjet a nejet u mi`ing, kiei ah put ah she u rang roh,’ tia korophong pe u rangnih.
40007024	“Khajarkhan tunita`awm kawchawng hai hi irangai a athaw miring hai kha lungpum chung ah inthaw miring ashing kha le ra`angmashak rang kanih.
40007025	Khan ro jong shur, tui hawng lien, khan rithi na ajap, khan amani na in kha ejem, inia pur mak, ajarla in kha lungpum chung ah iphun inih.
40007026	Tunita`awm kawchawng hai hi rangai a athaw boi rikip kha nge chung ah inthaw mimawng kha le ra`angmashak rang kanih.
40007027	Ro jong shur, tui hawng lien, rithi na ajap, khan hihaihi na in kha ejem, khan shietak a upur.”
40007028	Khan hitihin ruawm, Jesu na hihai chawng hi ruriei shole, ama miruchukna khan mipui kha shinrudawng pe uh.
40007029	Ajarla danoja hai kha ang boi a, chamnieitak `khat a amani kha iruruchuk inih.
40008001	Jesu na lawn `khat ah put ah jong chum phakhan, mirawp na ama kha rujui uh.
40008002	Khan enro, raithawnaw tawng miring `khat na ama dieng rushe, khan chubairubawk a ruti, “Aw Pumi, nangjawt a tu, kiei hi nangnieriethieng ngam.”
40008003	Jesu na ukhut kha rushawn a ama kha irushit le roroi a ruti, “Kajawt, riethieng kha nih rang roh.” Khan relentak a ama raithawnaw kha ruriethieng pe joi.
40008004	Khan Jesu na ama dieng ruriei, “Enro, tute dieng vak riei naw roh. Inia she tana thiempu dieng vak mumuk roh, khan Moses na chawngirupek khutchawi hai kha vak peh roh. Makha na amani dieng kungchangna kha nih rangnih.”
40008005	Jesu na Capernaum rulut le roroia, rarajakhat lamkai `khat na ama dieng ava a runik.
40008006	Ama na ruti, “Pumi, in ah koshokpa khaw takthi na ajeng a mawshaw a ana joi.”
40008007	Jesu na ama dieng rumashang, “Kiei na va a ama kha vak madam rang kanih.”
40008008	Inia rarajakhat lamkai kha na ruti, “Pumi, ki`in ah nangva rang a hi kiei rutuk mi`ing. Chawng ranga nangiriei khan koshokpa khaw dam rang keng.
40008009	Ajarla kieiawm cham thoi a awm, kothoi a ramiring hai aniei `khat kanih. Kiei na akhat dieng ‘She roh,’ kiti `le, eshe, khan shik `khat dieng ‘Va roh,’ kiti `le ava. Khan koshokpa dieng ‘Hi thaw roh,’ kiti `le awthaw.”
40008010	Makha Jesu na rujet `le, shinrudawng pe a anujui miring hai dieng khan ruti, “Diktak a nangni dieng kiriei inih, Israelshe hin takashawn hi ang a lien hi kiei na muh mi`inglai!
40008011	Nangni dieng kieriei makhala shim le mar ah put ah mi tampui hawng a ravan rengchangna mun khan Abraham, Isaac, khan Jacob le shushom u rangnih.
40008012	Inia rengchangna nai hai kha vai tieng ah jingna mun khan pai ning, tia kha mun khan chapna le hareshena kha awm rangnih.”
40008013	Khan Jesu na rarajakhat lamkai dieng khan ruti, “She rang roh, nang takashawn dungjuia ithaw nih rang rosho.” Kha phatak khan oshokpa kha rudam joi.
40008014	Khan Jesu na Peter in kha rulut phakhan, Peter tarpi kha raitun na itun a ruja kha vak muk.
40008015	Ama khut kha rushit pe a raitun kha na rumathan joi. Khan ruthoi a amani chon kha ruthaw pe joi.
40008016	Khan ni hawng tah phakhan, raikho na ichutna mi tampui ama dieng vak chawi uh. Ratha hai kha chawng `khat le runawt a ana kholok kha rumadam.
40008017	Makha thiempulien Isaiah dieng irurieina kha hawng rupumna rang a inih. Ama na hitihin ruriei, “Ama na nawdawkshamna u kha ruloi joi, khan nanatna u kha ruphung joi.”
40008018	Khan ama kha hieichip a ruchun mipui kha Jesu na rumuk phakhan, thampui vara `khat tieng shena u rang, chawng rupek joi.
40008019	Khan danoja `khat na ama dieng va a ruti, “Oja, nang shena mun rikip a nujui rang kanih.”
40008020	Jesu na ama dieng ruriei, “Ramui hai na khur niei uh, ravan a va hai na rubu niei uh, inia Miring Shapa na tu lu tetna rang mun niei mak.”
40008021	Akhaichawi hai kar a shik `khat na ama dieng ruti, “Aw Pumi, rapapek a kashe a kapa khaw kivak khum rang a hi nawjawt pe roh.”
40008022	Inia Jesu na ama dieng ruti, “Nujui roh, athi hai kha na amanitak athi hai kha khum u rosho.”
40008023	Khan rokong ah rulut phakhan, akhaichawi hai na ama kha rujui uh.
40008024	Khan enro, thampui chung khan rithikhopui lientak `khat ruthoi a tuirawnawng kha na rokong kha ihawnghup rang dan a awm joi, inia ama tu ruja a ruawm.
40008025	Akhaichawi hai na ama dieng ava ua rumothoi uh, khan ruti uh, “Pumi nashan u rang roh! Kathi u rang keng joi!”
40008026	Amani dieng ruti, “Aw ashin a takashawn aniei miring hai, ijar a chih maw nangnih uh?” Khashole hawng thoi a rithikhopui le thampui kha hawng rawkawk phakhan, rinimchien joi.
40008027	Miring hai kha na shindawngna runiei a ruti uh, “Rithi le thampuishe na ama chawng irangai pe hi, ih miring maw nih?”
40008028	Thampui vara ah awm Gergesenes ram ah vat phakhan, raikho na ichutna miring `di rurawtawng pui. Amani kha ajeng a rang, than ah put ah hawng shok miring runih uh. Khajarkhan tute na makha lam kha rurakan ngam mak.
40008029	Amani na rura`ai uh, “Enro, Pathien Shapa Jesu, kieini hi ih nawlawt u rang a nangiti maw nih? Pha shok mala a kieini hi shawna pek rang a ava maw nangnih joi?”
40008030	Khan ralaviei a vawk hawi lientak `khat shak shak a ruawm uh.
40008031	Khan raikho hai kha na ama dieng rudawi a ruti uh, “Nangnawnawt u joiatu, vawk hawi khawn lutna rang nawjawt pe u roh.”
40008032	Amani dieng ruti, “She u rang roh.” Khan miring pasha `di ah put ah vak shok ua, vawk hawi `khat shung khan rulut u joi. Khan enro, vawk hawi kholok kha na rawkham tieng shorshor a jong tan ua, thampui khan rulut u joi, khan tui shung khan ruthi u joi.
40008033	Inia amani aroi hai kha na khopui khan rutan ua, raikho na ichutna miring hai chungchanga irikip vak riei u joi.
40008034	Khan enro, khopui ah miring kholok na Jesu rumuk pui rang rushe u joi. Khan Jesu kha rumuk u phakhan, amani ram ah put ah shokna rang rudawi uh.
40009001	Khan Jesu na rokong ah rulut a makha thampui kha rurakan joi. Khan ama khopuitak kha rushok joi.
40009002	Khan enro, amani na takthi miring `khat jana chung ah jalam a ama dieng vak chawi uh. Khan amani takashawn kha Jesu na rumuk phakhan, takthi miringpa dieng ruti, “Naitepa, ranak thaw roh, nang munu hai kha anarangaidam joi.”
40009003	Khan enro, danoja hai kar a eshen na manilemani shung a ruti uh, “Hi miring hi na Pathien kha mieshiet!”
40009004	Jesu na amani mulungmining kha rujet pe a ruti, “Ijar a nang mulung shung a ashie nangimining u naw nih?
40009005	‘Nang munu hai kha arangaidam joi,’ ninawkle, ‘Thoi tana lawn rang roh,’ iti hin ih kha maw baidet?
40009006	Inia makha Miring Shapa kha na rieliei chung a munu hai rangaidamna ranak kha ieniei, iti nangjetna u rang a inih.” Khashole takthi miringpa dieng ruti, “Thoi rang roh, nang jana kha loi tana nang in ah she rang roh.”
40009007	Khan ama na ruthoi a i`in ah rushe joi.
40009008	Khania mirawp kha na rumuk phakhan, shindawngna runiei uh. Khan miring hai dieng kha ang cham apeh Pathien kha rumapak uh.
40009009	Jesu na khan ah put ah rupang `le, lam a khaichana tena in ah rushuh Matthew iti miring `khat rumuk. Ama na ruti, “Nujui roh.” Khan Matthew na thoi a ama kha rujui joi.
40009010	Khan hitihin rushok, makhala Jesu na in khan rushuh le roroia, enro, khaichana rawkhawm hai le munu miring tampui va uh. Amani na Jesu le akhaichawi hai kha rushut puishom uh.
40009011	Khan Pharisee hai na rumuk u phakhan, Jesu khaichawi hai dieng ruti uh, “Ijar a nang Ojapa u na khaichana rawkhawm hai le khan munu miring hai le inekishakshom maw nih?”
40009012	Inia Jesu na rujet phakhan, amani dieng ruriei, “Adam miring hai na loipu rangai mak, inia ana hai na irangai inih.
40009013	Inia she u tana mahi ih itina maw nih, iti kha vak ruchuh u roh, ‘Kiei na roihoina kha kadit, rawthawina kha dit mi`ing.’ Ajartu midik miring hai kha akoi jong nimi`ing, inia mulung lekna rang, munu miring hai kha akoi jong kanih.”
40009014	Khashole John khaichawi hai na ama kha vak dep ua ruti uh, “Ijar a nang khaichawi hai na chamra`idoi boi a, kieini le Pharisee hai na rawnaw a chamrakidoi u maw nih?”
40009015	Makhan Jesu na amani dieng ruriei, “Moilawm hai kha na moipa le awmlai khan mulungkur ngam u nih maw? Inia moipa kha amani ah put ah ichawina pe nikho hai kha hawng rangnih. Makha phakhan amani na chamradoi u rangnih.
40009016	“Tu na`awm irikin boilai ponlek kha alui ah chingai mak. Ajarla ibo kha na hawng rikin ning, tia shiedet a chiet rangnih.
40009017	Khan tu na`awm alui mevun jukawk khan ju athar thangai mak. Atha joiatu, ju athar kha na mevun jukawk kha mokoi rangnih. Khan ju kha bo ning, tia mevun jukawk kha thang rangnih. Inia amani na mevun jukawk athar khan ju athar kha atha a dire kha tin inih.”
40009018	Amani dieng hihaihi rurieilai khan, enro, rampo miring `khat ava, khan ama dieng hawng bu a ruti, “Tuntak khan kashanu kha thi joi, inia navat pe tana nang khut le navakshit pe roh, khan ama na ringna muk rangnih.”
40009019	Jesu na thoi a akhaichawi hai le ama kha rujui uh.
40009020	Khan enro, kum shawmlieidi thijanrai tawng nupang `khat na Jesu anuk ah ava a opon mawr kha rushit pe.
40009021	Ajarla ama na mulung a ruti, “Opon mawrtaka kha kishit pe joiatu, kadam rangnih.”
40009022	Jesu na ruhiei a ama kha rumuk phakhan, ruti, “Shanu, ranak thaw roh, nang takashawn kha na nang kha namadam joi.” Kha phatak khan nupangnu kha rudam joi.
40009023	Khan Jesu na rampopa in ah avat phakhan, thieikhang tum hai le mirawp na helehoi irumoshok u kha vak muk.
40009024	Amani dieng ruti, “She u rang roh, ajartu naitenu hi athi nimak, inia amiei keng.” Makhan amani na ama kha rumunui uh.
40009025	Khan ama na mipui kha vai rumoshok shole, rulut joi, khan ama khut kha rumukui pe a naitenu kha hawng thoi joi.
40009026	Makha chawngshok kha ram kholok a rurajar joi.
40009027	Jesu na khan ah put ah rushe le roroia, mikchaw pasha `di na anu rujui ua ra`ailam a ruti uh, “David Shapa, kieini dieng hin nang roihoina kha natetna u roh!”
40009028	Khan in kha rulut phakhan, mikchaw miring pasha `di kha na ama dieng va uh. Jesu na amani dieng ruti, “Kiei na mahi kawthaw ngam, iti hi takanangshawn u maw?” Amani na rumashang uh, “Awh, Pumi.”
40009029	Khashole Jesu na amani mik hai kha shit pe a ruti, “Nang takashawn u dungjuia mahi nangni dieng ashok nih rang rosho.”
40009030	Khan amani mik hai kha mavar pe joi. Jesu na amani kha chawng bierep a ruti, “Enro, kha chungchang khan tute na jet naw rosho.”
40009031	Inia amani na rushe phakhan, ama chungchanga ram kholok dieng chawng kha rutheh u joi.
40009032	Khan amani na rushe le roroia, enro, raikho na ichutna a chawngthieiboi, miring `khat, ama dieng vak chawi uh.
40009033	Raikho kha runawt shole, chawngthieiboi miring kha na, ruchawng joi. Khan mipui kha na shindawng a ruti uh, “Israel shung hin mahi mulak u makmelai!”
40009034	Inia Pharisee hai na ruti uh, “Raikho reng jar a raikho hai hi inawt keng.”
40009035	Khan Jesu na khopui le kho rikip ah rushe joi. Ama na amani synagogue hai khan ruruchuk a rengchangna athachawng hai kha rurophong a miring hai rai rikip le natna rikip kha rumadam joi.
40009036	Khan mipui kha rumuk phakhan, amani rang khan lairunat pui. Ajarla amani kha mi na tenireh boi, mulungraha miring, khan kengamroi awm boi kengam hai kha ruang uh.
40009037	Khashole akhaichawi hai dieng ruti, “Par rawkhawm rang a hi diktak a rawp, inia chon thaw miring hai hi awtawm.
40009038	Khajarkhan par Pumi dieng ama loimun ah chon thaw rang miring jong tirna rang, nikna niei u roh.”
40010001	Jesu na akhaichawi shawmlieidi kha rukoi a raikho rono hai kha nawtna rang, khan rai rikip le natna rikip madamna rang, amani dieng cham rupek joi.
40010002	Tirtawn shawmlieidi riming kha hihaihi inih: Akhat changna a, Peter iti Simon le anaipangpa Andrew, Zebedee shapa James le anaipangpa John,
40010003	Philip le Bartholomew, Thomas le khaichana rawkhawmpa Matthew, Alphaeus shapa James, Thaddaeus iti Lebbaeus,
40010004	Canaan miring Simon le Jesu ajorpa Judas Iscariot.
40010005	Jesu na shawmlieidi kha hihai chawngpek hi le rutir joi: “Phungshik hai kar a she u naw roh, khan Samaria miring hai khopui khan lut u naw roh.
40010006	Kha ruhut a Israel inshung a athang kengam hai dieng she u roh.
40010007	Nangshe u le roroia, ‘Ravan rengchangna kha jong nai joi,’ tia chawng vak shem u roh.
40010008	Ana hai kha madam u roh, raithawnaw tawng hai kha riethiengmashak u roh, athi hai kha miring u roh, khan raikho hai kha nawt u roh. Manboi a nangirumuk u kha manboi a peh u roh.
40010009	Rangkachak, dangka ninawkle shumeng kha shierkawk ah poh u naw roh.
40010010	Khomijin pai, kotai rawbaw ninawkle kekok hai, ninawkle shunshawraw poh u naw roh. Ajarla chon thaw miring kha na nekleshak ishak rang kha rutuk inih.
40010011	“Khopui nit a khote nita`awm nanglutna u makha shung khan rutuk kha tumaw nih, iti kha tawk u roh, khan nangmathan u masheng, kha mun khan awm u roh.
40010012	Khan nanglut u phakhan, chubai thaw pui u roh.
40010013	In kha rutuk joiatu, kha chung khan nang mulung damna u kha awm rosho, inia rutuk joi nawkatu, nang mulung damna u kha nangni dieng hawng kir rosho.
40010014	Mi hai kha na lamjawng nuruthaw u joi nawk a, khan nangiriei u kha narangai pe u joi nawkatu, makha in ninawkle khopui kha mathan a nangshe dieng u khan, nang kepha uah vaiphin kha khawng u roh.
40010015	Diktak a nangni dieng kiriei inih, chawngshatna Nikho khan makha khopui rangnek khan, Sodom le Gomorrah ram rang a kha doithieidet chang rangnih!
40010016	Enro, melang hai kar a kengam hai kha ang a kinitir u inih. Khajarkhan moro hai ang a ashing miring kha nih u roh, khan vashu hai ang a metek boi miring kha chang u roh.
40010017	“Miring hai maikung a riringtak a awm u roh; ajarla amani na Sanhedrin hai dieng nepek u rangnih, khan amani synagogue hai khan nejem u rangnih.
40010018	Nangni kha rampo hai le reng hai maikung a, kajar a amani dieng le phungshik hai dieng kungchang rang, nawchawi u rangnih.
40010019	Inia amani na nepek u phakhan, itia ninawkle imaw nangiriei u rang, iti chungchanga nang mulung mawshaw u naw roh. Ajarla nangiriei u rang a kha makha phatak khan nangni dieng nepek u rangnih.
40010020	Ajarla chawng ariei kha nangni nih u makche, inia nangpa u Ratha na nangni kha chawng inierieina u inih.
40010021	“Shokpui `khat na shokpui `khat thitna rang, khan apa na anai thitna rang, mohon rangnih. Nai hai na nulepa hai kha rodoi pui ning, tia amani kha mi hai mathat u rangnih.
40010022	Khan kiriming jar a mi kholok na naraha pui u rangnih, inia dawngshe a adoi ama kha shan rangnih.
40010023	Inia khopui `khat ah amani na nangni kha epshawna nepek u phakhan, shik `khat a tan u roh. Ajarla nangni dieng diktak a kiriei inih, Miring Shapa kha jong mala khan Israel khopui hai kha itikte nita`awm rawtawngsho u naw tinilai.
40010024	“Khaichawi `khat na ama oja chung a awm mak, shok `khat na upumi chung a awm mak.
40010025	Khaichawi `khat na ama oja kha hawng ang, khan shok `khat na upumi kha hawng ang kha rutuk inih. Inpumi kha Beelzebul, tia koi u joiala, idawrshe khawk a ama inshungkhur hai dieng khan koi u nih!
40010026	“Khajarkhan amani kha chih u naw roh. Ajarla imukhu nieinak kholok phawngthiei boi, iti awm mak, khan jetthiei boi rethe, iti awm mak.
40010027	Ajing a kiei na nangni dieng kiriei hi, nangni na avar a riei u roh. Nokor ah nangirangai u kha, in chung ah rophong u roh.
40010028	Pum athat hai kha chih u naw roh, amani na ringphuk kha that ngam u mak. Inia Gehenna a ringphuk le pum dire mathang ngam ama kha chih u roh.
40010029	Varawchawngpi idi hi asharion `khat a jor nimak maw? Inia amani kar a `khatshe nangpa u jet boi a rieliei a cho mak.
40010030	Nanglu uah sham kholokshe kha jat iteviek inih.
40010031	Khajarkhan chih u naw roh; varawchawngpi tampuinek a manlu nangnih uh.
40010032	“Tunita`awm miring hai maikung a kiei hi norophong ama kha kiei na`awm ravan a awm kapa maikung a rophong rang kanih.
40010033	Inia tunita`awm miring hai maikung a kiei najawt boi ama kha kiei na`awm ravan a awm kapa maikung a jawt naw ning.
40010034	“Kiei hi rieliei chung a lungdamna chawi ajong, tia mining u naw roh. Lungdamna apeh jong nimi`ing, inia chemjam apeh jong kanih.
40010035	“Ajarla ‘miring `khat na apa chung a, shanu `khat na unu chung a, khan moinu `khat na atarpi chung a re`ermashak’ ajong kanih,
40010036	khan, ‘tukhat rahapui kha ama inshungkhurtak nih rangnih.’
40010037	“Kieinek a unu ninawkle apa numapoh ama kha kiei rang rutuk mak. Kieinek a ashapa ninawkle ashanu numapoh ama kha kiei rang rutuk mak.
40010038	Ama cross kha loi a kanu ajui boi miring kha kiei rang rutuk mak.
40010039	Iringkho ashan ama kha na makha mathang rangnih, khan kajar a iringkho mathang ama kha na makha muk rangnih.
40010040	“Nangni naphawm miring kha na kiei hi inawphawm inih. Kiei hi naphawm miring kha na nojongtirpa kha iphawm inih.
40010041	Miring `khat na thiempulien kha thiempulien nit jar a phawm a tu, thiempulien lawh kha muk rangnih. Khan miring `khat na midik miring kha midik miring nit jar a phawm a tu, midik miring lawh kha muk rangnih.
40010042	Diktak a nangni dieng kiriei inih, khaichawi riming a ashin miring hai kar a akhat dieng tuirachak hai `khattak a nita`awm rumenek ama kha na itikte nita`awm ama lawh kha mathang naw nih.”
40011001	Khan hitihin ruawm, akhaichawi shawmlieidi kha chawng rupek shole, kha mun ah put ah amani khopui hai khan miruchuh rang le chawngshem rang, Jesu na rushe joi.
40011002	Khan Christa chonthaw hai kha John na lungroko shung ah rujet le, akhaichawi hai idi rutir.
40011003	Khan amani na Jesu dieng ruti uh, “Ajong rang a kha nang maw nangnih, ninawkle shik `khat kingak u rang a maw nih?”
40011004	Jesu na mashang a amani dieng ruti, “She u tana nangijet u le nangimuk u hai hi John dieng vak riei u roh:
40011005	mikchaw hai na imuk, kekhawr hai na alawn, raithawnaw tawng hai na riethieng, nokorshet hai na ijet, athi hai kha imothoi, khan shara hai dieng athachawng iriei pe.
40011006	Kajar a keruthui boi miring kha rahvanmuh miring kha inih.”
40011007	Amani na rushe u le roroia, Jesu na John chungchanga mipui dieng ariei ruput, “Ramthim khan ih en rushe maw nangnih uh? Rithi na inawk shingnang kha maw?
40011008	Inia ih en rushe maw nangnih uh? Miring `khat na ponrenem irieshiei kha maw nih? Enro, ponrenem rieshiei miring hai kha reng hai in khawn awm uh.
40011009	Inia ih en rushe maw nangnih uh? Thiempulien `khat kha maw nih? Awh, thiempulien `khatnek a alien inih, iti kha kiriei inih.
40011010	Ajarla mahi ama chungchanga irumiejiek inih: ‘Enro, nang maton a kapalai `khat kitir, ama na nang maton a lam nokon pe rangnih.’
40011011	“Diktak a nangni dieng kiriei inih, nupang hai na imoshok kar a baptisma apeh Johnnek a aliendet awm maklai, khania ravan rengchangna mun a ashinving ama kha amanek a liendet.
40011012	Inia baptisma apeh John pha ah put ah tunshe hin, ravan rengchangna kha na ranaknieitak a hawng, khan rangrat miring hai na makha ranak a ruloi u joi.
40011013	Ajarla John jong malalim Thiempulien hai le Dan na chawngrurophong joi.
40011014	Nangni na mahi nangloi jawt uatu, ajong rang a miring kha mahi Elijah hi keng.
40011015	Nokor aniei ama kha na rangai rosho.
40011016	“Inia ih le maw mahi rong hi ra`angmashak ning? Mahi naite hai na rievieithawna mun ah shuh a amani lawm hai le rashai nana kha le ra`ang inih.
40011017	“Amani na ruti uh, ‘Nangni rang thieikhang kurutum uh, inia rulam u makche. Mulungkurna kuruniei uh, inia mulung thangtana runiei u makche.’
40011018	Ajarla John na jonglai khan, neawm runeh mak sha`awm rushah mak, khan amani na ruti uh, ‘Ama na raikho ieniei.’
40011019	Miring Shapa kha jong a runek, khan rushak. Khan amani na ruti uh, ‘Enro, shak a rapham le ju a vanhat thaw miring, khaichana rawkhawm hai le munu miring hai lawm `khat khaw!’ Khania varna hi ama chonthaw hai kha na idikna kha imumuk inih.”
40011020	Khashole ama na ranakniei chon arawplam iruthawna khopui hai kha rurawkawk joi, ajarla amani na mulung lekna kha runiei u mak.
40011021	“Aw Chorazin, nang dieng mieriemna awm! Aw Bethsaida, nang dieng mieriemna awm! Ajarla nangni dieng ranakniei chon iruthaw hai kha Tyre le Sidon dieng runih joiatu, bawra rieshiei a, khan ruvut robo ning, tia amani mulung lekna kha shawt rangnih joi.
40011022	Inia nangni dieng kiriei hi inih, chawngshatna Nikho khan nangni rangnek hin Tyre le Sidon rang a kha doithieidet chang rangnih.
40011023	Khan ravan a irulawm, Aw Capernaum, nang hi Thikho a nawvawr rangnih. Ajarla nang dieng a ranakniei chon iruthaw hai kha Sodom dieng runih joiatu, vonshe hin awm rangnilai.
40011024	Inia kiei na nang dieng kiriei inih, chawngshatna Nikho khan nangni rangnek hin Sodom ram rang a kha doithieidet chang rangnih.”
40011025	Kha phakhan Jesu na mashang a ruti, “Ravan le rieliei Pumi, Aw kapa, nang kha kanamapak, ajarla nang na hihaihi mishing le mithiei kanih ati miring hai kar a nangruthe a naite hai dieng nangrumalar joi.
40011026	Inih, Aw kapa, makha keng nang dieng a awm enlar kha.
40011027	“Kapa na nieinak kholok kha kiei dieng nurupek joi. Kapa na niboia, tute na shapa kha jet mak. Khan ashapa na niboia, tute na apa kha jet mak. Ashapa na ama kha rophongna rang a idit imadan tukhat kha na niboia, tute na apa kha jet mak.
40011028	“Nangni shawrieviei le doila phung miring kholok, kiei dieng hawng u roh, kiei na nangni dieng shawmuchumna kha nepek rang kanih.
40011029	Kiringkaw hi rupu u roh, khan kiei ah put ah ruchuh u roh. Ajarla kiei hi mulung a renem le rede kha kanih, khan nang ringphuk u rang khan shawmuchumna kha nangmuk u rangnih.
40011030	Ajarla kiringkaw hi abai, khan kodoila hi ajang inih.”
40012001	Sabbath nikho `khat hin Jesu na shangbiei hai kha rakan a rupang. Akhaichawi hai kha vawnrucham pe uh, khan shangvui hai kha ruchin ua rushak uh.
40012002	Inia Pharisee hai na rumuk ua Jesu dieng ruti uh, “Enro, nang khaichawi hai na Sabbath nikho a Dan nih boi thaw uh.”
40012003	Inia amani dieng ruti, “David na vawnrucham pe phakhan, ama le rawtawp hai kha le iruthaw kha te u makche maw?
40012004	Makhala ama na Pathien in khan rulut a rawthawina tan kha rushak. Makha ama le khan irawtawp pui hai na ishak u rang a kha Dan nih boi inih. Makha thiempu hai ranga na ishakthiei inih.
40012005	Ninawkle, Sabbath nikho hin riethiengmun ah thiempu hai na Sabbath kha pawrmechet ua amani dieng metekna awm mak, tia Dan a imiejiek kha te u makche maw?
40012006	Inia kiei na nangni dieng kiriei inih, riethiengmunnek a aliendet miring kha hin awm.
40012007	Inia ‘Rawthawina kha kidit nimak a roihoina kha kidit inih,’ itina hi nangrujet u joiatu, shietniei boi miring hai kha ruheng u naw tinih.
40012008	Ajarla Miring Shapa kha Sabbath Pumi kha`awm inih.”
40012009	Khan ah put ah rushe a amani synagogue khan rulut joi.
40012010	Khan enro, kha mun khan khutchar miring `khat ruawm. Ama dieng rawdawn a ruti uh, “Sabbath nikho hin mimadam hi Dan na maw jawt?” Makha amani na Jesu kha jar peknathiei rang a inih.
40012011	Inia amani dieng ruti, “Nang kar ua miring `khat na kengam `khat ieniei a khur `khat ah cho pe joi. Mahi Sabbath nikho hai hin shok joiala, nang khut shawn a roshoh u naw rawng maw?
40012012	Kengamnek khan miring hi khadawr khan manludet nimak maw? Khajarkhan Sabbath nikho hai hin atha thaw rang khan Dan inih.”
40012013	Khashole ama na miringpa dieng khan ruti, “Nang khut kha vak shawn roh.” Khan ama na rushawn, khan shik `khat kha ang a rudam pe joi.
40012014	Inia Pharisee hai na rushe ua ama kha itia maw that rang, tia chawng rureshe u joi.
40012015	Inia Jesu na makha rujet `le, khan ah put ah rurakai joi. Khan mirawp lien `khat na anu rujui a amani kholok kha rumadam.
40012016	Ama kha memejetna boi rang, amani kha chawngruben uh.
40012017	Makha thiempulien Isaiah dieng a irurieina kha hawng rupumna rang a inih. Hitihin ruriei,
40012018	“Enro, koshokpa hi kiei na kimadan kha inih. Ama hi kiringphuk na ningnitna inieitak kunumpok kha inih. Ama chung a karatha thong pe rang kanih. Ama na Phungshik hai dieng dikna kha rophong pe rangnih.
40012019	Ama na chawngrieshiet thaw naw nih ninawkle ra`ai naw nih. Lamlien hai khan tute na ama hesho kha jet naw nih.
40012020	Mi na irawnawisha shingnang kha khoi naw nih. Chawngshatna kha ramawtawrna tieng chawi masheng, ama na akang patro kha shem a that naw nih.
40012021	Ama riming khan Phungshik hai na ngakmining niei u rangnih.”
40012022	Khashole raikho na ichutna miring `khat hi Jesu dieng vak chawi uh. Ama kha mikchaw le chawngthieiboi runih. Jesu na rumadam a mikchaw le chawngthieiboipa kha na hawng chawngthiei le roroia, hawng muk joi.
40012023	Khan mirawp kha shinrudawng pe ua ruti uh, “Mahi David Shapa kha nih ngam nih maw?”
40012024	Inia Pharisee hai na rujet u phakhan, ruti uh, “Raikho hai reng Beelzebul ranak a niboia, hi miring hi na raikho hai hi nawt mak.”
40012025	Inia Jesu na amani mulungmining kha rujet pe a amani dieng ruti, “Nining a reshen rengchangna rikip thangbieng rangnih, khan nining a reshen khopui ninawkle in rikip na ding naw nih.
40012026	Satan na Satan kha nawt joiatu, nining a reshen inih. Itia maw ama rengchangna kha ding nih?
40012027	Kiei na Beelzebul ranak a raikho hai hi kawnawt joiala, nang nai hai na tu ranak le inawt u maw nih? Hijarhin amani na chawngnashat pe u rangnih.
40012028	Inia kiei na Pathien Ratha ranak a raikho hai kha kawnawt joiatu, Pathien rengchangna kha nangni dieng ajong nih joi.
40012029	“Ninawkle, tukhat na miratpa in ah lut a, miratpa kha khopbak nawkatu, itia maw ienieinak hai kha ranak a ro pe ngam nih? Makha shole ama in kha ranak a aro pe rangnih.
40012030	“Kiei le rachang boi ama kha kiei le re`er inih, khan kiei na kiroshong pui boi ama kha na chaiachai a atet.
40012031	Hijarhin a kiei na nangni dieng kiriei inih, munu le mimieshietna rikip miring hai dieng arangaidam rangnih, inia Ratha chung a mieshiet kha tu miring hai dieng rangaidam naw nih.
40012032	Tunita`awm Miring Shapa chung a chawng arieipa kha arangaidam rangnih. Inia tunita`awm Ratha Riethieng chung a chawng arieipa kha tu, hi rong hin ninawkle ajong rang a rong hin, rangaidam naw nih.
40012033	“Thingkung kha mathat roh, khan ara kha tha rangnih. Ninawkle, thingkung kha mieshie roh, khan ara kha shie rangnih. Ajarla ama ara khan thingkung kha nijet inih.
40012034	Nangni moro chicha hai! Nang mulungpok shielam khan itia maw atha riei ngam u rawng? Ajarla mulung ah put ah hawng put a ner na chawngiriei inih.
40012035	Mitha kha na umulung atha niei`in ah put ah atha hai kha hawng moshok. Mi shie kha na umulung ashie niei`in ah put ah ashie hai kha hawng moshok.
40012036	Inia chawngshatna Nikho khan riring boi a iriei rikip kha amani na jar pek u rangnih, tia kiriei inih.
40012037	Ajarla nang chawngriei hai kha na nangni kha nimidik u rangnih, khan nang chawng hai kha na nangni kha naheng u rangnih.”
40012038	Khashole danoja hai le Pharisee hai eshen na mashang a ruti uh, “Oja, nang ah put ah jetna kumuk jawt uh.”
40012039	Inia Jesu na mashang a amani dieng ruriei, “Ashie le uire rong na jetna atawk uh. Thiempulien Jonah jetna niboia jetna peh naw nih.
40012040	Ajarla Jonah na ngalien vawn shung ah ni `thum jan `thum a`awm kha le ra`ang a, Miring Shapa kha`awm rieliei mulung shung ah ni `thum jan `thum awm rangnih.
40012041	Chawngshatna khan Nineveh miring hai kha na hi rong miring le ding u rangnih, khan amani na mahi rong hi aheng u rangnih. Ajarla Jonah na Pathien chawng riei phakhan, amani na mulung lekna kha runiei uh. Khan enro, Jonahnek a aliendet miring `khat kha hin awm joi.
40012042	Chawngshatna khan thang tieng ah rengnu kha na hi rong miring hi le dingchen rangnih, khan mahi aheng rangnih. Ajarla rieliei dawngkhit ah put ah Solomon varna kha rangai ahawng inih. Khan enro, Solomonnek a aliendet miring kha hin awm joi.
40012043	“Raikho rono kha na miring `khat ah put ah rushok phakhan, ama na shawmuchumna rang, ram hona mun hai kha rakan a rushe, inia rumuh mak.
40012044	Khashole ama na ruti, ‘Kavakshokna ki`in khan kiei kir rang kanih.’ Khan ama na rukir phakhan, makha iruphietviek, khan rietienir a irutet kha vak muk.
40012045	Khashole ama na rushe a amanek a shiedet ratha shiri shik ruchawi. Khan amani na rulut ua kha mun khan ruawm uh. Khan dawngkhit a miringpa awmchan kha matiengnek khan rushiedet joi. Mahi rong ashie chung hinawm hitihin awm rangnih.”
40012046	Ama na mirawp dieng khan chawng riei a ruawmlai khan, enro, unu le ama shokpui hai na ama dieng chawng ruriei jawt ua vai tieng ruding uh.
40012047	Mi `khat na ama dieng ruti, “Enro, nangnu le nang naipang hai na nang le chawng riei rang, vai tieng ding a natawk uh.”
40012048	Inia ama dieng a chawng arieipa dieng khan Jesu na rumashang, “Tu kha maw kunu, khan tu hai kha maw kanaipang hai?”
40012049	Khan akhaichawi hai dieng ukhut le akhin a ruti, “Enro, kunu le kanaipang hai kha hin awm!
40012050	Ajarla tunitjoiawm ravan a awm kapa mulungmining athaw ama kha kanaipangpa, kanaipangnu, khan kunu kha inih.”
40013001	Khanitak khan Jesu na in ah put ah rushe a thampui kawmchang ah rushuh.
40013002	Ama dieng vak ruchun mirawp kha lienhai jarkhan, rokong ah rulut a rushuh joi. Khan mirawp kha na kawmchang ah ruding uh.
40013003	Khan ama na chawng tampui rangshim a ruriei pe uh. Ama na ruriei, “Enro, muchi vawrpa kha na muchi vawr rushe.
40013004	Ama na iruvawr le roroia, eshen kha lamkaw ah ruchu. Khan va hai na jong a amani kha rushak.
40013005	Eshen kha pieipak rawpna boi lungbiei chung ah ruchu. Pieipak kha thuk boi jarkhan, makha na relentak a hawng kei.
40013006	Ni hawng sha phakhan, hawng re`em, khan rujung loi boi jarkhan, makha rovoi.
40013007	Khan eshen kha riling hai kar ah ruchu. Riling hai kha hawng thoi a amani kha liep uh.
40013008	Inia eshen kha pieipak thatna mun ah rucho a ara rumoshok. Eshen kha arajah a, eshen kha shawm `ruk a, khan eshen kha shawm `thum a rupung.
40013009	Rangaina rang nokor aniei ama kha na rangai rosho!”
40013010	Khan akhaichawi hai na ama dieng va ua rurawdawn uh, “Ijar a amani dieng rangshim a chawng nangiriei maw nih?”
40013011	Amani dieng mashang a ruriei, “Ajarla nangni dieng ravan rengchangna chungchanga murukchawng hai kha jetna rang, nurupek uh, inia amani dieng tu rupeh mak.
40013012	Ajarla aniei ama dieng khan arawpdet kha pek rangnih, khan ruphu a niei rangnih. Khan aniei boi ama dieng khan inieidakshe kha`awm, ama ah put ah loi pe rangnih.
40013013	Hijarhin a amani dieng rangshim a kiriei pe inih, ajarla umuk tu muk uh, inia muhet u mak, rangai tu rangai uh, inia rangaihet u mak, rieirit a`awm jet u mak.
40013014	Isaiah rophongchawng kha amani dieng jong rupum inih: ‘Nangni na nangrangai tu nangrangai u rangnih, inia shukjet a jet u naw tinih. Nangni na nangen tu nangen u rangnih, inia shukmuh a muh u naw tinih.
40013015	Ajarla mahi miring hai mulung hi moh pesho u joi. Khan amani nokor hai rang khan rangaina matat pe u joi. Imik u kha mawchawt pe u joi. Khanawkatu imik u kha le muh u ning, tia onokor u kha le rangai u rangnih. Khan amani mulung kha le jet u ning, tia kiei dieng hawng hiei ua kamadam u rangnih.’
40013016	“Inia nang mik u kha rahvanmuh inih, ajarla amani na muk u joi, khan nang nokor u kha rahvanmuh inih, ajarla amani na rangai u joi.
40013017	Diktak a nangni dieng kiriei inih, thiempulien le midik hai tampui na nangimuk u hai hi rumuk jawt uh, inia amani na rumuh u mak. Nangirangai u hai hi rurangai jawt uh, inia rurangai u mak.
40013018	“Khajarkhan muchi vawrpa rangshim jar hi rangai u roh.
40013019	Tukhat na rengchangna chawng kha rangai phakhan, jet mak. Mi shie `khat na ava a ama mulung shung a ivawr kha loi pe. Mahi inih lamkaw ah ivawr muchi kha.
40013020	Lungbiei ah ivawr muchi kha hi le ra`ang inih, tukhat na chawng kha ningai le roroia relentak a loi.
40013021	Inia bing a ama na rujung niei boi jarkhan, pha bawngte ring. Khan chawng jarkhan shawrana, ninawkle epshawna hawng shok phakhan, ama na keruthuina nieirelen.
40013022	Riling hai kar ah ivawr muchi kha hi le ra`ang inih, ama na chawng kha rangai, inia mahi ringkho lungkhamna le rawchawngna mohonna kha na chawng kha liep jarkhan, ama kha arathiei boi achang.
40013023	Inia pieipak thatna a ivawr muchi kha hi le ra`ang inih, ama na chawng kha rangai a ejet, khan ara kha moshokhet. Eshen arajah a, eshen shawm `ruk a, khan eshen shawm `thum a mupung.”
40013024	Amani maikung a rangshim shik `khat ama na ruriei pe, “Ravan rengchangna hi miring `khat na ama loipuk ah muchi atha ivawr kha le ra`ang inih.
40013025	Inia ajariethiei hin irahapui kha na gehu kar khan loihar athe pe a rushe joi.
40013026	Muchi kha hawng kei a ara hawng moshok phakhan, loihar kha`awm hawng malang joi.
40013027	“Inpumi shok hai kha na ama dieng ruti, ‘Pumi, nang loipuk khan muchi atha nangivawr nimak maw? Hihai loihar hi ih ah put ah maw nih?’
40013028	“Amani dieng rumashang, ‘Mahi inarahapui miring `khat na ithaw inih.’ Khan shok hai kha na ama dieng ruti, ‘Kieini na she a kivakphawi u rang hi nangjawt maw?’
40013029	“Inia ama na ruti, ‘Thaw u naw roh. Ajarla loihar nang phawina khan gehu kha nangphawichen u rang keng.
40013030	Parrawkhawm phashe khan dire kha mawng rosho. Parrawkhawm phakhan, rawkhawm miring hai dieng ti rang kanih, “Loihar kha masha a rawkhawm u roh. Khan lawp a khop u tana amani kha miei ah ha u roh. Inia gehu kha kachu shung khan mulut u roh.” ’ ”
40013031	Amani maikung a rangshim shik `khat ruriei pe, “Ravan rengchangna hi anchamru kha mi `khat na iruchawi a ama loipuk ah ivakvawr kha le ra`ang inih.
40013032	Mahi muchi kholok kar a ashinving inih. Inia hawng mawng phakhan, anshawbo hainek a aliendet thingkung `khat hawng chang. Khan ravan a va hai na jong a abak hai khan rubu jong thawna uh.”
40013033	Amani dieng rangshim shik `khat ruriei pe, “Ravan rengchangna hi nupang `khat na chawh ichawi a jam haikhup `thum le ireche a chawh rachangviek masheng a iruthe kha le ra`ang inih.”
40013034	Hihai kholok hi Jesu na mipui dieng rangshim a iruriei pe inih. Rangshim a niboia amani dieng ruriei pe mak.
40013035	Mahi thiempulien dieng irurieina kha hawng rupumna rang a inih. Hitihin ruriei, “Rangshim a kiei na chawng riei rang kanih; manmieshie kungput ah put ah rethe nieinak hai kha kiei na rophong rang kanih.”
40013036	Khashole Jesu na mipui kha rumeshe a in ah rushe joi. Khan akhaichawi hai na ama dieng va ua ruti uh, “Loipuk ah loihar rangshim kha kieini dieng nemeler pe u roh.”
40013037	Amani dieng mashang a ruriei, “Muchi atha avawrpa kha Miring Shapa kha inih.
40013038	Loipuk kha rieliei hi inih. Muchi atha hai kha rengchangna nai hai kha inih, inia loihar kha mi shie nai hai kha inih.
40013039	Khan loihar athepa mirahapui kha diabol kha inih. Parrawkhawm kha rong mawtawrna kha inih. Parrawkhawm hai kha ravantir hai kha inih.
40013040	“Loihar hai kha rawkhawm a miei ah iha ang a, mahi rong mawtawrna kha nih rangnih.
40013041	Miring Shapa kha na ama ravantir hai kha jongtir rangnih. Ama rengchangna ah put ah keruthuimashak hai le danishawnboi hai kholok kha rawkhawm u rangnih.
40013042	Khan amani kha Ratapkung Miei shung ah apai u rangnih. Kha mun khan chapna le hareshena kha awm rangnih.
40013043	Khashole midik hai kha na apa u rengchangna khan ni ang a var u rangnih. Nokor aniei ama kha na rangai rosho!
40013044	“Takthar a, ravan rengchangna hi loipuk ah rethe bawmniei, tukhat na imuk a irumukhu, khan ama na ningailam a rushe a ieniei kholok kha ivakjor a loipuk kha irawchawk, kha le ra`ang inih.
40013045	“Takthar a, ravan rengchangna hi rievieithaw miring `khat na lunglu hai kha itawk a
40013046	manlu lung `khat muk phakhan, she a iniei kholok kha ivakjor a makha irawchawk kha le ra`ang inih.
40013047	“Takthar a, ravan rengchangna hi thampui shung ah len ivawr a nga tintin irawkhawm,
40013048	khan iship phakhan, kawmchang tieng irupawt, khan amani na rushuh ua atha hai kha be hai shung ah ithong a ashie hai kha ipai u kha le ra`ang inih.
40013049	Rong dawng ni khan hitihin awm rangnih. Ravantir hai na jong u ning, tia mi shie hai kha midik hai ah put ah reshenmashak rangnih.
40013050	Khan mi shie hai kha ravantir hai na ratapkung miei shung ah apai u rangnih. Kha mun khan chapna le hareshena kha awm rangnih.”
40013051	Jesu na amani dieng rurawdawn, “Hihai kholok hi nangjet u joi maw?” Amani na rumashang uh, “Awh, Pumi.”
40013052	Khan amani dieng ruti, “Khajarkhan ravan rengchangna chungchanga chawngirurachak danoja rikip, ienieibawmna ah put ah, athar alui bawmniei hai kha ivakmoshokpa inpumi kha le ra`ang inih.”
40013053	Jesu na hihai rangshim hi ruriei shole, makha mun kha rumathan joi.
40013054	Ama khotak khan vat phakhan, amani synagogue khan miruchuh ruput. Makhan amani na shindawnglam a ruti uh, “Hi miring hi na mahi varna le ranakniei chon hai hi khoshekawt a imuk maw nih?
40013055	Ama hi thingthiempa shapa kha nimak maw? Unu riming kha Mariam nimak maw? Anaipang hai, James le Joses, khan Simon le Judas iti nimak maw?
40013056	Anaipangnu hai kholokawm kieini le awm nimak maw? Khoshekawt ah hi miring hi na hihaihi imuk maw nih?”
40013057	Khajarkhan ama ah put ah mairumiehiei uh. Inia Jesu na amani dieng ruriei, “Thiempulien `khat na ama khotak le ama inshungkhurtak dieng niboia, richit kha imuk boi nimak.”
40013058	Khan amani takashawn boi u jarkhan, ama na ranakniei chon tampui kha ruthawlai mak.
40014001	Khalaikhan tetrarch Herod na Jesu chungchanga rujet joi.
40014002	Ama na shok hai dieng ruti, “Hipa hi baptisma apeh John kha keng. Ama hi athi ah put ah hawng thoi inih. Hijarhin a chonrekhek thawna ranak kha na ama shung a chonithaw inih.”
40014003	Ajarla Herod na John kha shur a rukhop, khan lungroko shung ah rutet joi. Makha anaipangpa Philip nungak Herodia jar a inih.
40014004	Ajarla John na ama dieng ruti, “Ama nanginiei rang a hi Dan nimak.”
40014005	Herod na ama kha ruthat jawt joiawm, ama na mirawp kha ruchih, ajarla amani na John kha thiempulien `khat a ruloi uh.
40014006	Inia Herod shokna nikho hawng shok phakhan, Herodia shanu na amani kar a vak lam a Herod kha ajeng a ningruminit pe.
40014007	Iniklim kha pek rang, tia ama dieng chawngrurakham joi.
40014008	Khan, unu na chawngirurachak le roroia, “Hi rangmai chung hin baptisma apeh John lu kha nepeh roh,” tia runik.
40014009	Makhan rengpa kha mulung rushaw pe, inia ama chawngrakham le koilawm hai jarkhan, makha pekna rang, chawng rupek joi.
40014010	Khan ama na rutir a lungroko shung khan John lu kha vak tuk pe joi.
40014011	Rangmai chung khan ulu kha vak chawi a nungaknu dieng rupek joi. Khan ama na unu dieng ruchawi joi.
40014012	Khan akhaichawi hai kha na va ua ama rok kha ruloi u joi, khan vak khum u joi. Khashole rushe ua amani na Jesu dieng vak riei u joi.
40014013	Jesu na rujet `le, khan ah put ah ramthim ah thien a rokong a rushe joi. Makha mirawp na rujet phakhan, khopui ah put ah eke a anu rujui uh.
40014014	Jesu na kawmchang kha vak shok phakhan, mirawp lientak `khat vak muk. Amani chung a lainatna runiei a amani natna kha rumadam pe.
40014015	Ni hawng tah phakhan, akhaichawi hai na ama dieng va a ruti uh, “Mahi ramthim inih, khan pha`awm shemeng joi. Kho hai khawn she a nekleshak vak rawchawkna u rang, mipui hi meshe rang roh.”
40014016	Jesu na amani dieng rumashang, “Amani ashe rang a kha rangai mak, amani dieng shak rang peh u roh.”
40014017	Inia ama dieng ruti uh, “Tanpek rahnga le nga `di niboia niei u mi`ing.”
40014018	Ama na ruti, “Khahaikha hin kiei dieng vak chawi u roh.”
40014019	Khashole mipui kha champi chung ah shutna rang, chawng rupek. Khan tanpek rahnga le nga `di kha ruloi a, ama na ravan tieng khongalam a, rahvan rupek a rukhoi joi. Khan tanpek hai kha khaichawi hai dieng rupek, khan akhaichawi hai kha na mipui dieng rushem pe.
40014020	Amani kholok na rushak ua vawn ruship pe uh. Khan amani na lekvai mienieng hai kha tiengkum shawmlieidi shipmer rurawkhawm uh.
40014021	Khan aneh-ashah hai kha, nupang le naite te boi a, apa bawp rahnga runih uh.
40014022	Khan relentak a Jesu na akhaichawi hai kha rokong ah lutna rang, rurawnawt mashak a vara `khat tieng matieng rumeshe joi. Khariethiei khan mipui kha rureshen pui joi.
40014023	Mipui kha rumeshe shole, bing a anih rang. lawn ah ruhawng joi. Ni hawng tah phakhan, ama tu thien a ruawm joi.
40014024	Inia rokong kha thampui laitak khan tuirawnawng na shehawng a runawng a ruawm. Ajarla rithi kha amani le rodoi a rujap.
40014025	Khashole imili changna vengpa pha khan, Jesu na thampui chung ah vak lawn a amani dieng rushe joi.
40014026	Ama na thampui ah vak lawn kha akhaichawi hai na rumuk u phakhan, ajeng a ruchih uh. Amani na ruti uh, “Mahi rathameshie keng joi!” Khan chitlam a rura`ai uh.
40014027	Inia relentak a Jesu na amani dieng ruti, “Nang mulung mangar u roh. Chih u naw roh, kiei kanih keng.”
40014028	Peter na mashang a ruti, “Pumi, nang nangnih joiatu, nang dieng tui chung ah vatna rang, chawng nepeh roh.”
40014029	Ama na ruti, “Va roh.” Khan Peter na rokong ah put ah vak shok, khan tui chung ah lawn a Jesu dieng rushe joi.
40014030	Inia ama na rithi enchak a arang kha rumuk phakhan, ruchih. Khan rawnawm ruput a rura`ai, “Nashan roh, Pumi.”
40014031	Jesu na relentak a ukhut rushawn a ama kha rumukui. Khan ama dieng ruti, “Aw nang takashawn kha dawkhaidak a! Ijar a nangirurakhana maw nih?”
40014032	Amani na rokong shung khan rulut phakhan, rithi kha rubang joi.
40014033	Rokong shung ah awm miring hai kha na ama kha chubairubawk ua ruti uh, “Diktak a nang hi Pathien Shapa kha nangnih.”
40014034	Amani na thampui kha rurakan ua Gennesaret ram kha rushok u joi.
40014035	Kha mun ah miring hai kha na Jesu kha rujet u phakhan, kha ram kawkaw ah awm kholok dieng chawng rumeshe ua, amani na ana hai kha ama dieng vak chawi uh.
40014036	Ama pon mawrtak a kha nita`awm shit jawtna rang, amani na rudawi uh. Ama pon ashih miring kholok na damna rumuk uh.
40015001	Khashole Jerusalem ah put ah Pharisee hai le danoja hai na Jesu dieng va ua ruti uh,
40015002	“Ijar a nang khaichawi hai na pipu hai shena kha ikhoi u maw nih? Ajarla amani na tan shak mala ua khut hai kha rushuk u mak.”
40015003	Jesu na mashang a amani dieng ruti, “Nang shena u jarkhan ijar a Pathien chawngpek kha nangikhoi u maw nih?
40015004	Ajarla Pathien na chawng rupek a ruti, ‘Nangnu le nangpa kha richit peh roh,’ khan ‘Unu le apa pumabot ama kha thitna niei rosho.’
40015005	Inia nangni na nangti uh ‘Tunita`awm unu ninawkle apa dieng “Ih nita`awm kiei dieng a nanginemna kha khutchawi inih,” ati ama kha na
40015006	unu ninawkle apa kha richit pek rang a kha irangaimashak boi inih.’ Hitihin nang shena u jarkhan, Pathien chawngpek kha nemna boi nangmachang uh.
40015007	Aw thanunchan thaw miring hai! Isaiah na nang chungchang ua thatak a rurophong a ruti,
40015008	‘Hihai miring hi na amani bai a naranai pui uh, khan amani ner a richit nepek uh. Inia amani mulung tu kiei ah put ah rala pe uh.
40015009	Inia rohong a kiei hi chubainabawk uh. Amani na miring hai chawngpek kha danpui `khat a ruchuk uh.’ ”
40015010	Khan Jesu na mipui kha okoi a amani dieng ruti, “Rangai u roh, khan jet u roh.
40015011	Makhala, miring bai ah alut kha na miring kha pawrmechet mak, inia bai ah put ah hawng shok kha na miring kha pawrimechet inih.”
40015012	Khashole akhaichawi hai na va ua ama dieng ruti uh, “Pharisee hai na nangiriei kha jet u `le, amani mulung rukoi pe uh, iti hi nangjet maw?”
40015013	Ama na mashang a ruriei, “Ravan a awm kapa na iruling boi thingkung rikip kha phawi rangnih.
40015014	Amani kha bieh u naw roh. Amani kha mikchaw miring hai rang a mikchaw lamkai hai kha inih. Mikchaw `khat na mikchaw miring kha lamkai pe joiatu, dire kha khur ah cho rangnih.”
40015015	Peter na mashang a ama dieng ruti, “Hi rangshim hi kieini dieng nemeler pe u roh.”
40015016	Inia Jesu na ruti, “Nangniawm nangijet boi u maw nih?
40015017	Ih kha nita`awm bai ah alut kha vawn ah lut a vai`imoshok inih, iti hi jet u makche maw?
40015018	Inia bai ah put ah hawng shok nieinak kha mulung ah put ah hawng shok inih, khan hihaihi na miring kha pawrimechet inih.
40015019	Ajarla mulung a mining shie, mithat, uire, rejai, murushah, adik boi a kungachang, khan mimieshiet, hihaihi hawng shok inih.
40015020	Hihaihi na miring kha pawrimechet inih. Inia khut rushuk boi a shakshah kha na miring kha pawrimechet nimak.”
40015021	Jesu na kha mun kha rumathan a Tyre le Sidon ram tieng rushe joi.
40015022	Khan enro, kha ram ah awm Canaan nupang `khat na vak shok a ama dieng rura`ai, “Aw David Shapa Pumi! Nang roihoina kha kuchung a natetna roh. Kashanu khaw raikho na shietak a chutna joi.”
40015023	Inia Jesu na ama kha i`awm rumashang mak. Khan akhaichawi hai na ama dieng va uh, khan mawshawklam a ruti uh, “Meshe rang roh, ajarla ama na nanuk uah mawkra`ai a ra`ai joi.”
40015024	Inia mashang a ama na ruti, “Kiei hi Israel inshung ah athang kengam ranga dieng a inojongtir inih.”
40015025	Inia ama na ava a ama dieng butlam a ruti, “Pumi, nashan roh.”
40015026	Inia mashang a ruti, “Naite hai tan kha loi a ui hai dieng vawr rang a hi atha nimak.”
40015027	Inia ama na ruti, “Awh, Pumi, inia ui hai na amani pumi hai tebol ah put ah acho burama hai kha enek.”
40015028	Khashole mashang a ama dieng ruti, “Aw nupang, nang takashawn kha ielien! Nangidit dungjuia nih rang rosho.” Kha pha ah put khan ashanu kha rudam pe joi.
40015029	Khan Jesu na kha mun kha rumathan shole, Galilee Thampui tieng rushe joi. Khan lawn ah ruhawng a kha mun khan rushuh.
40015030	Khan mipui lientak `khat na ama dieng va uh. Amani na kekhawr, mikchaw, chawngthieiboi, takkhawr, khan shik tampui vak chawi uh, khan Jesu keshun khan vak tet ua ama na rumadam uh.
40015031	Makha na mipui kha shindawngna rupek. Chawngthieiboi na achawng, takkhawr na adam, kekhawr na alawn, khan mikchaw na imuk kha amani na rumuk u phakhan, Israel Pathien kha rumapak uh.
40015032	Khashole Jesu na akhaichawi hai kha ama dieng rukoi a ruti, “Kiei na mipui dieng hin lainatna kieniei joi. Ajarla amani na kiei le rawtawpna u hi ni `thum nih joi, inia iawm shah u lai mak. Amani na lam ah shawramana boi rang, kiei na amani hi ih mashak boi a meshe jawt mi`ing.”
40015033	Akhaichawi hai na ama dieng ruti uh, “Hidawr a lien mipui hi vaina rang, hi ramthim hin khoshekawt ah nekleshak kimuk u rang a maw nih?”
40015034	Jesu na amani dieng rurawdawn, “Tanpek ijat maw nangniei uh?” Amani na ruti uh, “Shiri le nga shin lekte.”
40015035	Khashole ama na mipui kha pieipak chung ah shutna rang, chawng rupek.
40015036	Ama na tan shiri le nga kha ruloi a mapakna runiei. Khan ama na rukhoi a mipui dieng pekna rang, akhaichawi hai dieng rupek.
40015037	Khan aneh-ashah kholok kha vawn ruship pe uh. Lekvai mienieng kha lawngkai shiri shipmer a rurawkhawm uh.
40015038	Khan ah runeh-rushah miring hai kha, nupang le naite te boi a, pasha bawp mili runih.
40015039	Mipui kha rumeshe shole, ama na rokong shung khan rulut a Magdala ram tieng rushe joi.
40016001	Khan Pharisee le Sadducee hai na Jesu kha enretena rang le ravan ah put ah jetna mumukna u rang, ama dieng ru`awt uh.
40016002	Inia mashang a amani dieng ruti, “Nitak tieng ravan kha eshen `le, ‘Kho tha rangnih,’ nangti uh.
40016003	Jingkar a ravan kha eshen a khomelek `le, ‘Von hin rithikhopui rang rangnih,’ nangti uh. Aw thanunchan thaw hai! Nangni na ravan maisho kha melerna nangjet uh, inia apha jetna hai kha tu meler ngam u makche.
40016004	Ashie le miropoboi rong kha na jetna atawk uh, inia thiempulien Jonah jetna niboia, jetna kha pelai naw nih.” Khashole amani kha mathan a rushe joi.
40016005	Khan thampui shir `khat khan vak shok u phakhan, akhaichawi hai na tan rumieniei uh.
40016006	Jesu na amani dieng ruti, “Pharisee hai le Sadducee hai chawh kha riring pui u roh.”
40016007	Amani kar a rawdawnna ua ruti uh, “Irieina hi kieini na tan vak chawi u lai makme a khana keng joi.”
40016008	Jesu na makha rujet a amani dieng ruti, “Aw nangni takashawn ashin aniei miring hai, tan nangniei boi u jarkhan, imaw nangiriei uh?
40016009	Nangni na makha mininghep u makchelai maw? Miring bawp rahnga rang a tanpek rahnga khan, tiengkum ijat maw nangrawkhawm uh?
40016010	Miring bawp mili rang a tanpek shiri khan, lawngkai ijat maw nangrawkhawm uh?
40016011	Kiei na tan chungchanga kiriei nimak, iti kha ijar a nangijet boi u maw nih? Inia Pharisee le Sadducee hai chawh kha riring pui u roh, kiti inih.”
40016012	Khashole akhaichawi hai kha na tan chawh kha riring pui roh, iti nimak a Pharisee le Sadducee hai danpui kha riring pui roh, itina keng, iti kha rujet u joi.
40016013	Khan Jesu na Caesarea Philippi ram ah vat phakhan, akhaichawi hai kha rawdawn a ruti, “Miring hai na Miring Shapa hi tu kha maw nih ti uh?”
40016014	Amani na rumashang uh, “Eshen na baptisma apeh John, shik `khat na Elijah, khan shik `khat na Jeremiah ninawkle thiempulien hai kar a akhat keng ruti uh.”
40016015	Amani dieng ruti, “Nangni na la kiei hi tu kha maw nih nangniti uh?”
40016016	Simon Peter na mashang a ruti, “Nang hi Christa, aring Pathien Shapa kha nangnih.”
40016017	Khan mashang a ama dieng ruti, “Barjona Simon, nang hi rahvanmuh miring kha nangnih. Ajarla mahi nang dieng miring na inorophong pe nimak, inia ravan a awm kapa na inih.
40016018	Kiei na nang dieng kieriei makhala nang hi Peter kha nangnih, hi lungpum chung hin kiebiekrup kha mothoi rang kanih. Thikho mawkawt kha na mahi mawtawr naw nih.
40016019	Kiei na nang dieng ravan rengchangna chabi hai kha nepek rang kanih. Ih nita`awm rieliei a nangikhop kha ravan a`awm khop rangnih. Ih nita`awm rieliei a nangithut kha ravan a`awm athut rangnih.”
40016020	Khashole ama kha Jesu Christa kha keng, iti kha tute dieng rieina boi u rang, akhaichawi hai kha chawngruben joi.
40016021	Khani ah put ah ama na Jerusalem ah ashe rang a, shierulien hai, thiempu ulien hai le danoja hai khut ah put ah shawna tampui idoingir rang a, amani na ama kha ithat u rang a, khan ni `thum changna a imothoi rang a kha Jesu na akhaichawi hai dieng mejet ruput joi.
40016022	Khan Peter na ama kha mun `khat ah ruchawi a rawkawk ruput. Ama na ruti, “Nithiei naw nih, Pumi; mahi nang dieng shukshok a shokthiei naw nih!”
40016023	Inia Jesu na hiei a Peter dieng ruti, “Kiei ah put ah rechen roh, Aw Satan! Nang na kalam kha nangnakhar pe. Ajarla nangimining kha miring mulungmining inih, Pathien mulungmining nimak.”
40016024	Khashole Jesu na akhaichawi hai dieng ruti, “Tukhat na kanu nujui jawt a tu, amarilik chung a rapha rosho, khan ama cross kha rupu rieshie nujui rosho.
40016025	Ajarla iringkho ashan jawt kha na makha mathang rangnih. Inia kajar a ama ringkho mathang kha na makha man rangnih.
40016026	Ajarla tukhat na manmieshie hi atah machang a, ama ringphuktak kha mathang joiala, imaw nemna nih? Ninawkle, miring `khat na ama ringphuk kha le rotho rang, imaw peh nih?
40016027	Ajarla Miring Shapa na Apa lurna khan, ama ravantir hai le, jong rangnih. Khashole mi rikip dieng amama chonthaw dungjuia, lawh kha pek rangnih.
40016028	Nangni dieng diktak a kiriei inih, hin ah ading miring eshen hi na Miring Shapa na ama rengchangna a ajong muk u masheng, thitna tuidan kha en u naw nih.”
40017001	Ni `ruk shole, Jesu na Peter, James le anaipangpa John, amani kha lawp a lawn rashang `khat a ruhawng pui.
40017002	Khan amani maikung a Jesu kha merurelek. Amai kha ni ang a rueng pe, khan ama ponledier kha mieivar ang a ruvar pe.
40017003	Khan enro, Moses le Elijah na amani dieng rular a Jesu le ruriebieh uh.
40017004	Peter na mashang a Jesu dieng ruti, “Pumi, kieini na hin na`awm u hi atha. Nangjawt a tu, thamber `thum kon u rawi: nang rang akhat, Moses rang akhat, khan Elijah rang akhat.”
40017005	Ama na chawngrurieilai khan, enro, romiei avarpeng na amani kha ruhup u joi. Khan enro, romiei ah put ah he `khat na ruti, “Mahi numkipoktak kashapa kha inih, ama chung a ningnitna kha kieniei joi, ama chawng kha rangai u roh!”
40017006	Khan khaichawi hai kha na he kha rujet u phakhan, chihai ua khup tieng rubawk uh.
40017007	Jesu na amani dieng va a amani kha rushit a ruti, “Thoi u roh, chih u naw roh.”
40017008	Amani na khonghawngnga u phakhan, Jesu ranga kha niboia, tute hawng muh u lai mak.
40017009	Amani na lawn ah put ah jong chum u le roroia, Jesu na amani dieng ruti, “Miring Shapa kha na athi ah put ah hawng thoi masheng, mahi mulungmik hi tute dieng riei u naw roh.”
40017010	Khan akhaichawi hai kha na ama dieng rurawdawn uh, “Khanitala ijar a Elijah kha matieng jong rangnih, tia danoja hai na iruti u maw nih?”
