40017011	Jesu na mashang a amani dieng ruriei, “Diktak a Elijah na matieng jong a nieinak kholok hawng mikir rangnih.
40017012	Inia kiei na nangni dieng kieriei, Elijah kha ajongsha keng joi, inia amani na rujet u mak. Ama dieng ithaw jawt kha ruthaw uh. Khatak kha ang a, Miring Shapa na amani khut chung a shawna mukdeng joi.”
40017013	Khashole baptisma apeh John chungchanga amani dieng iriei keng, iti kha akhaichawi hai kha na rujet uh.
40017014	Khan amani na mipui dieng va u phakhan, miring `khat na ama dieng ava, khan amaton ah vak bu a ruti,
40017015	“Pumi, nang roihoina kha kashapa chung a natetna pe roh. Ajarla ama hi pingbawprai iniei a dawnga shaw joi. Ama na miei ah le tui ah cho jawnjai.
40017016	Nang khaichawi hai dieng kuruchawi, inia amani na rumadam ngam u mak.”
40017017	Jesu na mashang a ruti, “Aw takashawn boi le shuklet rong hai, idawrshe a nangni le a`awm rang a maw kanih? Khan idawrshe a nangni le kidoi rang a maw nih? Ama kha hin kiei dieng vak chawi u roh.”
40017018	Khan Jesu na raikho kha rurawkawk a ama ah put ah rushok joi. Kha phatak khan naitepa kha hawng dam joi.
40017019	Khashole khaichawi hai na muruk a Jesu dieng rushe a ruti uh, “Ijar a kieini na kinawt ngam boi u maw nih?”
40017020	Jesu na amani dieng rumashang, “Nangni na takanangshawn boi u jar a inih. Diktak a nangni dieng kiriei inih, nangni na anchamru ang a takashawn kha nangniei u joiatu, mahi lawn dieng hin ‘Hin ah put ah rawthawt tana khawn she roh,’ nangti ua`awm she rangnih. Nangni rang anithiei boi `khatshe awm naw nih.
40017021	Inia hi ang raikho hi nikna le chamradoilam a niboia, nawtthiei nimak.”
40017022	Khan amani na Galilee ah ruruchun u lai khan, Jesu na amani dieng ruriei, “Miring Shapa kha miring hai khut a pek rang a nih joi.
40017023	Amani na ama kha that u rangnih. Khan ni `thum changna khan ama kha mothoi rangnih.” Makhan amani mulung ajeng a rushaw pe uh.
40017024	Khan amani na Capernaum kha rushok u phakhan, riethiengmun khaichana rawkhawm hai kha na Peter dieng va a ruti uh, “Nang Ojapa na riethiengmun khaichana peh mak maw?”
40017025	Peter na rumashang, “Awh.” Khan ama na in rulut phakhan, masha a Jesu na ama dieng ruti, “Simon, imaw nangmining? Rieliei reng hai na tu hai dieng maw shan ruloi? Ashapa hai dieng, ninawkle milak hai dieng?”
40017026	Peter na ama dieng rumashang, “Milak hai dieng.” Jesu na ruriei, “Khanitatu amani shapa hai na ipek rang a kha rangai mak.
40017027	Inia amani kha mulung hoi boi a tetna boi rang, thampui ah she tana koi vak makhai roh, khan rapapek a hawng nga abai kha kham pe tana dangka nangmuk rangnih. Makha chawi tana nang le kiei rang vak peh roh.”
40018001	Kha phakhan khaichawi hai na Jesu dieng va a ruti uh, “Ravan rengchangna khan tu kha maw alienving chang nih?”
40018002	Jesu na naite `khat hi okoi a amani kar a rutet.
40018003	Khan ama na ruti, “Diktak a nangni dieng kiriei inih, nang mulung nanglek u nawk a, khan naite hai hi ang a nangawm u nawkatu, ravan rengchangna khan lut ngamlak u naw tinih.
40018004	Khajarkhan tunita`awm hi naite hi ang a nining a rede miring kha ravan rengchangna khan alienving inih.
40018005	“Khan tunita`awm kiriming a kha ang naite aloi miring kha kiei analoi miring kha inih.
40018006	Tukhat na kiei takanashawn naite hai kar a akhat hi keruthuimashak joiatu, shumhiei kha ama rek ah makhai pe a tuikhanglien thukna ah imulut kha ama rang tha pedet rangnih.
40018007	“Keruthuimashak miringpa jar a manmieshie chung a mieriemna awm! Keruthuimashakna kha ajongngir rang a inih. Inia keruthuimashak jongna miring dieng khan mieriemna awm!
40018008	Nang khut ninawkle nang ke kha na munu nawmawthaw joiatu, makha tanbang tana nang ah put ah pai roh. Khut `di ninawkle ke `di niei a kumshawt a Miei shung khan rothongnek a tu, kekhawr ninawkle takkhawrlam a ringna mun a lut kha athadet inih.
40018009	Khan nang mik kha na munu nawmawthaw joiatu, makha kawbang tana nang ah put ah pai roh. Mik `di niei a Gehenna Miei khan rothongnek a tu, mik `khat le ringna mun ah lut kha nang rang athadet inih.
40018010	“Hihai ashin naite hai hi kar a akhat eshena boi rang, riring u roh. Kirieina ajartu, ravan a awm kapa mai kha amani ravantir hai na chatboia i`en u inih.
40018011	“Ajarla Miring Shapa kha athang miring hai ashan jong inih.
40018012	“Imaw nangmining uh? Miring `khat na kengam rajakhat ieniei a amani kar khan akhat na lamrehe a chai joiala, ama na shawmkolieiko kha mo khan mak a lamirehe a achai kha atawk she naw nih maw?
40018013	Diktak a nangni dieng kiriei inih, ama na makha muk phakhan, lamrehe boi shawmkolieikonek khan ama chung a ningaina kha ieniei.
40018014	Khatak kha ang a, hihai ashin hai hi kar a akhat athang rang kha ravan a awm nangpa u mulungmining nimak.
40018015	“Nang uliennai `khat na nang chung a munu thaw phakhan, she tana nangdin u kar a irehena kha vak khin pe roh. Ama na anarangai pe joiatu, nang uliennai kha nangimukthep nih joi.
40018016	Inia ama na narangai pe nawkatu, nang le shik dikhat she pui roh. Makha ‘miring dithum kungchangna kha na nang chawngriei rikip kha menetna rang a inih.’
40018017	Inia ama na amani kha rangai nawkatu, biekrup dieng riei roh. Ama na biekrup kha`awm rangai nawkatu, nang na Phungshik hai le khaichana rawkhawm hai nangitawn dan khan tawn roh.
40018018	“Diktak a nangni dieng kiriei inih, ih nita`awm rieliei a nangikhop u kha ravan a khop rangnih. Ih nita`awm rieliei a nangithut u kha ravan a athut rangnih.
40018019	“Takthar a, kiei na nangni dieng kiriei, rieliei a pasha `di na rawjawt a ih `khat nanginik u kha ravan a awm kapa na nangni rang thaw rangnih.
40018020	Ajarla kiriming a idi ninawkle uthum ruchun amani kar khan kiei ka`awm.”
40018021	Khashole Peter na ama dieng va a ruti, “Pumi, uliennai `khat na kiei dieng munu thaw joiala, ama kha voijat rangaidam kipek rang a maw nih? Voishirishe maw?”
40018022	Jesu na ama dieng ruriei, “Kiei na nang dieng voishiri niti mi`ing, inia voishawm shiri kha voishirishe rangaidam roh.
40018023	“Hijarhin ravan rengchangna hi reng `khat na oshok hai shierton imushung pe kha le ra`ang inih.
40018024	Ama na shierton hai kha imushung pe le roroia, talent bawp shawm atonpa kha ama dieng vak chawi uh.
40018025	Inia ama na rupek ngam boi jarkhan, upumpa kha na ama kha unungak nai hai le khan iniei kholok le jor a ieshierton kha thungna rang, chawng rupek joi.
40018026	“Khajarkhan shokpa kha na bawklap a ama dieng chubairubawk a ruti, ‘Pumpa, kiei hi nurungakbawt roh, nang dieng kholok a vak mikir rang kanih.’
40018027	Shok pumpa kha na ama chung a lainatna runiei a rumoshok joi, khan ieshierton kha rurangaidam pe joi.
40018028	“Inia makha shok kha na rushe a, ama dieng dinari rajakhat aton, oshok chang pui `khat vak muk. Ama na ama kha rushur a erek a shawmlam a ruti, ‘Kiei dieng a nangiton kha nepeh rang roh.’
40018029	Oshok chang pui kha na ekeshun ah rubu a dawilam a ruti, ‘Nurungakbawt roh, kholok a vak mikir rang kanih.’
40018030	“Inia ama na rujawt pe mak. Ama na rushe a, iton kholok kha peksho masheng, tia ama kha lungroko shung ah vak thong joi.
40018031	Oshok chang pui hai kha na ashok chon rikip kha rumuk u phakhan, ajeng a ningrushie pui uh. Amani na rushe ua upumpa u dieng ashok chon kholok kha vak riei uh.
40018032	“Khashole upumpa kha na shok kha rukoi a ama dieng ruti, ‘Shok tha boi nang! Nangninik jarkhan, nangiton kholok kha kunururangaidam pe.
40018033	Kiei na nang chung a koroiruhoi kha ang a, nang shokchang pui chung a roihoina tet naw rawng maw?’
40018034	Upumpa kha mulung ruhang pe a, ama dieng a iton kholok kha thungsho masheng, tia micheppa dieng khan rupek joi.
40018035	“Khajarkhan nang mulung uah put ah, nang uliennai hai shietna nangrangaidam u nawkatu, ravan a awm kapa na`awm khatikhan nangni dieng thaw rangnih.”
40019001	Khan hitihin rushok, Jesu na hihai chawng hi ruriei shole, Galilee ah put ah rushe a, Jordan vara ah awm Judea ram kha rushok joi.
40019002	Mipui kha na anu rujui ua kha mun khan amani kha rumadam uh.
40019003	Ama kha enretena rang, Pharisee hai eshen va ua ama dieng ruti uh, “Mi `khat na jar `khat a unungak imele hi Dan maw nih?”
40019004	Inia mashang a amani dieng ruti, “Amani akonpa kha na putna khan ‘nupang le apa kha rukon,’
40019005	khan ruti, ‘Hijarhin apa na unulepa kha mak a ama inkonu le ruchun rangnih. Idi kha taksha `khat chang rangnih,’ iti kha te u makche maw?
40019006	Khajarkhan amani kha idi nih u lai mak, inia taksha `khat kha nih u joi. Khajarkhan Pathien na shamishuisha kha miring na shenlai naw rosho.”
40019007	Ama dieng ruti uh, “Khanitala ijar a Moses na melena jawtnapek a ama kha mathanna rang chawngirupek maw nih?”
40019008	Amani dieng ruti, “Nang mulung u kha michim jar a, nang inkonu u hai mele rang kha, Moses na irujawt inih, inia putna ah put khan tu, kha runimak.
40019009	Kiei na nangni dieng kiriei, muruk a ponpha niboia, tunita`awm ama inkonu kha mele a shik `khat niei a tu, uire ithaw inih. Khan mi na imele aniei ama kha na uire ithaw inih.”
40019010	Akhaichawi hai na ama dieng ruti uh, “Miringpa le inkonu chungchanga khatikhan a awm nitatu, inniei boi kha atha inih.”
40019011	Inia amani dieng ruti, “Ipek hai amani dieng niboia, mi rikip na kha chawng kha loi ngam mak.
40019012	Ajarla unu naikawk shung ah put ah khatikhan a rushok Eunuch hai awm, miring hai na irumachang Eunuch hai awm, khan eshen na ravan rengchangna rangbak khan a nining a Eunuch ruchang hai awm. Tunita`awm makha aloi ngam kha na loi rosho.”
40019013	Khashole naite hai kha amani chung a khut tet a nikna pe rang, amani na vak chawi uh. Inia akhaichawi hai kha na rurawkawk uh.
40019014	Inia Jesu na ruti, “Naite hai na kiei dieng ava rang a kha jawt pe u roh. Amani kha makha u naw roh, ajarla kha ang hai dieng khan ravan rengchangna kha awm.”
40019015	Khan amani chung khan khut rutet pe shole, khan ah put ah rushe joi.
40019016	Khan enro, mi `khat na ava a ama dieng ruti, “Aw Oja Atha, chon atha ih kawthaw `le maw kiei na kumshawt ringna kha muthiei ning?”
40019017	Ama dieng rumashang, “Kiei hi ijar a atha nanginiti maw nih? Pathien niboia tute atha awm mak. Hektiknieiboi ringna khan nanglut jawt a tu, chawngpek hai hi jui roh.”
40019018	Ama dieng ruti, “Ih hai kha maw?” Jesu na ruriei, “ ‘Mi nangithat boi rang a inih,’ ‘Uire nangithaw boi rang a inih,’ ‘Nangimuruk boi rang a inih,’ ‘Adik boi a kungachang boi rang nangnih,’
40019019	‘Nangnu le nangpa kha richit peh roh,’ khan ‘Nang ringchangpui kha nang pumtak ang a numnangipok rang a inih.’ ”
40019020	Shanaipa kha na ama dieng rumashang, “Hihai kholok hi korothar chang ah put ah kihawngrung nih joi. Karavatna imaw awmlai?”
40019021	Jesu na ama dieng ruti, “Rupumping kha nangnih jawt joiatu, she tana nang niei hai kha vak jor tana shara hai dieng vak peh roh. Khan ravan a bawmniei kha nangniei rangnih, khan va tana nujui roh.”
40019022	Inia shanaipa kha na chawng kha rujet `le, mulungshawlam a rushe joi, ajarla ama na niei tampui runiei.
40019023	Jesu na akhaichawi hai dieng ruti, “Diktak a nangni dieng kiriei inih, rawchawng miring `khat na ravan rengchangna alut rang a hi matat.
40019024	Takthar a nangni dieng kieriei, rawchawng miring `khat na Pathien rengchangna alut rangnek a tu, sharingshiei `khat na shim nokor ah apang rang a kha baidet.”
40019025	Akhaichawi hai na makha rujet u phakhan, ajeng a shindawngna niei a ruti uh, “Khanitala tu na maw shanna muh ngam nih?”
40019026	Inia Jesu na amani dieng en a ruti, “Miring hai rang tu mahi anithiei boi inih, inia Pathien rang tu kholok nithieiviek.”
40019027	Khashole Peter na mashang a ruti, “Enro, ih kholok kurumak ua kinurujui u inih. Khajarkhan kieini na imaw muh u ning?”
40019028	Jesu na amani dieng ruti, “Diktak a nangni dieng kieriei, Pathien na nieinak kholok mathar phakhan, Miring Shapa kha na lurna rengmun khan shuh rangnih. Kiei nurujui hai nangniawm rengmun shawmlieidi chung a shuh a Israel phung shawmlieidi kha chawngnangshat pe u rangnih.
40019029	Khan kiriming rangbak a in le loi ninawkle uliennai nupang apa ninawkle nu le pa hai rumathan miring rikip na rajarajah a muk rangnih, khan kumshawt ringna kha tum rangnih.
40019030	Inia masha mi tampui kha nukna rangnih, khan nukna hai kha masha rangnih.
40020001	“Ajarla ravan rengchangna hi ama drakha rohon ah mi moroi rang atawk, jingkarra rushe loipumi kha le ra`ang inih.
40020002	Moroimi hai kha nikho `khat a dinari `khat pek rang rurawjawt pui a, ama drakha rohon ah amani kha rutir joi.
40020003	“Khan ama na nidan `ko dawr a rushe a miring eshen rievieithawna khan ih thaw boi a ading hai kha vak muk.
40020004	Amani dieng ruti, ‘Nangniawm drakha rohon khawn she u roh. Ih nita`awm rutuk kha nepek rang kanih.’ Khan amani kha rushe u joi.
40020005	Takthar a nidan shawmlieidi le nidan `thum dawr a rushe phakhan, khatikhan ruthaw.
40020006	Khan nidan rahnga dawr hin rushe phakhan, miring eshen chon thaw boi a ading vak muk a amani dieng ruti, ‘Ijar a shunshawt ih thaw boi a hin ading maw nangnih uh?’
40020007	Ama dieng rumashang uh, ‘Ajarla tute na kieini hi nomoroi u mak.’ Amani dieng ruti, ‘Nangniawm drakha rohon khawn she u roh. Ih nita`awm rutuk kha nangmuk u rangnih.’
40020008	“Khan nitak tieng hin drakha rohon pumpa kha na chonpopa dieng ruti, ‘Moroimi hai kha mutumna ah put ah akhat changnashe kha koi tana amani nilawh kha peh roh.’
40020009	“Nidan rahnga dawr a chon thaw hai kha na ava ua dinari `khatkhat hi tumrim uh.
40020010	Akhat changna ah put ah chon thaw hai kha na va ua arawpdet mukna rang rumining uh. Inia amaniawm dinari `khatkhat tumrim uh.
40020011	Amani na rutum u phakhan, loipumi kha rumieshiet uh.
40020012	Amani na ruti uh, ‘Nukkhit a ava hai na nidan `khat chon thaw uh. Khan shunshawt pokrik phung a nisha rophoi kieini hi amani le nangnara`angmashak uh.’
40020013	“Inia mashang a amani kar a akhat dieng ruti, ‘Kawlawmpa, kiei na nang dieng rehe mi`ing. Dinari `khat rang a kiei le rurawjawt nimakche maw?
40020014	Nang tum kha loi tana she rang roh. Nang dieng kipek kha le ra`angre a nukkhit miringpa dieng kepek jawt.
40020015	Ninawkle, kiei dieng a awm kha kidit dan a kithaw hi Dan nih boi maw nih? Ninawkle, katha jarkhan, nang mik`en shie maw nih?’
40020016	“Khajarkhan nuknakhit miring kha na mashakhit kha nih rangnih, khan mashakhit kha na nuknakhit kha nih rangnih. Ajarla miring tampui kha okoi, khania lekte kha amadan.”
40020017	Khan Jesu na Jerusalem ah ruhawnglai khan, khaichawi shawmlieidi kha lawp a ruchawi a, lam ah amani dieng ruriei,
40020018	“Enro, Jerusalem ah nahawng uh, Miring Shapa kha thiempu ulien hai le danoja hai dieng pek rangnih, khan thitnashe rang khan ama kha aheng u rangnih.
40020019	Khashole ama kha engshiet a thawna rang, jemna rang, khan cross ah thatna rang, Phungshik hai dieng pek u rangnih. Khan ni `thum changna khan thoiret rangnih.”
40020020	Khashole Zebedee shapa hai unu na ashapa hai le Jesu dieng rushe a, chubaibawklam a ih `khat runik.
40020021	Ama dieng ruti, “Imaw nangidit?” Ama dieng rumashang, “Kashapa idi hai hi, nang rengchangna mun khan, akhat chang tieng, akhat viei tieng shutna rang, nepek pe roh.”
40020022	Jesu na mashang a ruti, “Nanginik kha jet u makche. Kiei na kinek rang a hai aneh, kiloi rang a baptisma le baptisma loi, mahi mawtawr u rawng maw?” Amani na rumashang uh, “Mawtawr u rang kanih.”
40020023	Amani dieng ruti, “Kahai kha nangnek u rangnih, khan kabaptisma loina kha nangloi u rangnih. Inia kieviei le kachang a shutna apeh rang a kha kiei nimi`ing, inia kapa na irasham pe hai rang a inih.”
40020024	Khan shawm hai kha na makha rujet u phakhan, poro `di hai chung khan mulung rumohoina u lai mak.
40020025	Inia Jesu na amani kha ama dieng rukoi a ruti, “Phungshik hai rampo hai na amani miring hai kha adek a pumi achang inih, khan amani alien-arang hai na amani chung a cham ieniei uh, iti hi nangjet uh.
40020026	Khania nang kar uatu khatikhan nih naw nih. Inia tunita`awm nang kar ua alien anih jawt miring kha na nang shepding u kha chang rosho.
40020027	Khan tunita`awm nang kar ua akhat changna anih jawt miring kha na nang shok u chang rosho.
40020028	Khatak kha ang a, Miring Shapa kha ama chon mawthaw rang a ajong nimak, inia mi chon thaw rang le mi tampui khekman rang khan, iringkho apeh jong inih.”
40020029	Khan amani na Jericho ah put ah rushe u le roroia, mipui hawi `khat na anu rujui uh.
40020030	Enro, mikchaw pasha `di na lam kawriei ah rushuh uh. Jesu na ivakrakan kha rujet u `le, ra`ai a ruti uh, “Aw David Shapa Pumi, nang roihoina kha kieini dieng hin natetna u roh.”
40020031	Inia mipui kha na awmchienna rang, adin u kha rurawkawk uh. Inia adin u na ra`ai shishit a ruti uh, “Aw David Shapa Pumi, nang roihoina kha kieini dieng hin natetna u roh.”
40020032	Jesu na ruding a adin u kha koi a ruti, “Kiei na nangdin u rang ih kithaw rang maw nangdit uh?”
40020033	Ama dieng rumashang uh, “Pumi, kimik u hi nangimavar rang kadit uh.”
40020034	Jesu na lainatna kha runiei a imik u hai kha rushit pe, khan relentak a imik u hai kha hawng var pe ua anu rujui u joi.
40021001	Khan Jerusalem kha vak ranai pui ua Olive Lawn ah awm Bethphage kha vak shok u joi. Khashole Jesu na akhaichawi pasha `di rutir.
40021002	Khan adin u dieng ruti, “Nang maton uah awm kho khawn she u roh. Khan nangni na ranngam `khat hi acha remet `khat le ruthung nangmukrelen u rangnih. Thut u tana kiei dieng vak chawi u roh.
40021003	Tukhat na nangni dieng chawng riei a tu, ‘Hihaihi Pumi na rangai,’ tia ama dieng riei u roh, khan relentak a amani kha vak tir rangnih.”
40021004	Mahi thiempulien dieng irurieina kha hawng rupumna rang a inih. Hitihin ieriei,
40021005	“Zion shanu dieng ti roh, ‘Enro, nang rengpa kha nang dieng jong joi. Mulung renemtak a ranngam chung ah, khan ranngam acha remet, nititu ranngam ete chung ah jong shuh.’ ”
40021006	Khaichawi idi kha na rushe ua Jesu na chawngirupek dungjuia, ruthaw uh.
40021007	Amani na ranngam le ranngam acha remet kha vak chawi ua amani chung khan amani pon hai kha rumukhu uh. Jesu kha amani chung ah rumushut u joi.
40021008	Khan mipui lientak `khat na opon u hai kha lamlien khan rupha uh. Eshen na thingkung ah put ah thingbak hai kha rutuk ua lamlien khan rupha uh.
40021009	Amaton ah alawn le anuk ah rujui mipui kha na ra`ai a ruti uh, “David Shapa dieng khan Hosanna! ‘PUMI riming a ajong ama kha rahvantha inih!’ Rashangving a Hosanna!”
40021010	Ama na Jerusalem kha rulut phakhan, khopui kholok kha rumuchun joi. Khan amani na ruti uh, “Ama hi tumaw nih?”
40021011	Mipui kha na ruti, “Ama hi Galilee ah awm Nazareth ah put ah thiempulien Jesu kha keng.”
40021012	Jesu na Pathien riethiengmun khan rulut a riethiengmun ah put ah ajor hai le rawchawh hai kholok kha runawt. Khan shierleshier rotho hai tebol hai le pharphali jor miring hai shutna hai kha shukthala a rutet pe.
40021013	Khan amani dieng ruti, “Hitihin rumiejiek, ‘Ki`in hi nikna in ti rangnih,’ inia nangni na mahi ‘minieisho hai koh’ nangmachang u joi.”
40021014	Khan riethiengmun khan mikchaw le kekhawr hai na ama dieng va ua amani kha rumadam.
40021015	Inia thiempu ulien hai le danoja hai na ama na erekhek chon iruthaw, khan naite hai na “David Shapa dieng Hosanna,” tia rura`ai u kha rumuk u phakhan, mulung ruhang pe uh.
40021016	Ama dieng ruti uh, “Hihaihi na iti hi nangjet maw?” Jesu na amani dieng rumashang, “Awh, ‘Naite hai le khan rununeh hai bai ah put ah nang rangbak mapakna kha nangrurasham joi,’ iti kha te u makche maw?”
40021017	Amani kha rumathan a khopui ah put ah Bethany khan rushe a, kha mun khan ruriek joi.
40021018	Jingkar tieng hin ama na khopui ah rukir phakhan, vawnrucham pe.
40021019	Lam dieng khan thieichangkung `khat rumuk a makha ama na rujawng. Inia bo hai ranga niboia, ih vak muh mak. Khan ama dieng ruti, “Kumshawt a nang dieng ara shoklai naw rosho.” Khan relentak a thieichangkung kha ruchar joi.
40021020	Khaichawi hai na makha rumuk u phakhan, shindawngna niei a ruti uh, “Itia thieichangkung hi achar maw nih?”
40021021	Jesu na mashang a amani dieng ruti, “Diktak a nangni dieng kiriei inih, rakhana nieiboia takanangshawn uatu, thieichangkung ah ithaw hi ang a, nangithaw u ranga niboia, mahi lawn hi ‘Rechen tana tuikhanglien ah vak rothong roh,’ nangti u joiawm, makha shok rangnih.
40021022	Nikna a takashawn le nanginik u kholok kha nangmuk u rangnih.”
40021023	Riethiengmun kha lut a Jesu na ruruchuk phakhan, thiempu ulien hai le Jihudi hai shierpui lamkai hai kha ama dieng va a ruti uh, “Ih cham nanginiei a hihaihi nangithaw maw nih? Khan tu na mahi cham hi nang dieng inurupek maw nih?”
40021024	Jesu na mashang a amani dieng ruti, “Kiei na`awm nangni dieng chawng `khat nawrawdawn u rang kanih, nangnamashang u joiatu, kiei na`awm hihaihi ih cham le kithaw maw nih, iti kha nieriei u rang kanih.
40021025	John baptisma pekna kha ih ah put ah maw nih? Ravan ah put ah maw nih, ninawkle miring hai ah put ah maw nih?” Amani na reshe a ruti uh, “ ‘Ravan ah put ah inih’ niti u le la, ‘Ijar a ama kha takanangishawn boi u maw nih?’ niti u rangnih.
40021026	‘Miring hai ah put ah inih’ niti u le la, mipui hi kieini na nichih uh. Ajarla mi kholok na John hi thiempulien `khat a iloi u inih.”
40021027	Mashang a Jesu dieng ruti uh, “Jet u mi`ing.” Khan amani dieng ruti, “Kiei na`awm hihaihi ih cham le kithaw maw nih, iti kha nangni dieng nieriei u naw ning.
40021028	“Imaw nangmining uh? Miring `khat na shapa `di runiei. Akhat changnapa dieng ava a, ‘Kashapa, von tu drakha rohon ah chon thaw she roh,’ ruti.
40021029	“Mashang a ama na ruti, ‘She jawt mi`ing.’ Inia unuk a mulung lek a rushe joi.
40021030	“Khan adi changnapa dieng ava a khatikhan ruti. Mashang a ama na ruti, ‘She rang kanih, Aw pumi.’ Inia rushe pelai mak.
40021031	“Idi kar khan tu na maw apa mulungmining kha ruthaw pe?” Amani na rumashang uh, “Akhat changnapa.” Jesu na amani dieng ruriei, “Nangni dieng diktak a kiriei inih, khaichana rawkhawm hai le nawchijor hai na Pathien rengchangna khan, nang matieng rushe u joi.
40021032	Ajarla John na dikna lam khan jong a ama kha takarushawn u makche, inia khaichana rawkhawm hai le nawchijor miring hai na takarushawn uh. Mahi nangmuk u she hin, mulung lek a ama kha takarushawn u makche.
40021033	“Rangshim shik `khat rangai u roh. Loipumipa `khat na drakha rohon `khat runiei a ama na rurokorep. Juepna rang khur `khat ruchoi a khan vendai `khat ruthaw. Khan loithaw hai dieng rumashan a khomojin rushe joi.
40021034	Khan parrawkhawm rang hawng nai phakhan, oshok hai kha ara rawkhawm rang, loithaw hai dieng rutir joi.
40021035	“Inia loithaw hai kha na shok hai kha rushur pe ua akhat kha rujem uh, akhat kha ruthat uh, khan akhat kha lung le rudeng uh.
40021036	Matiengnek a arawpdet a, ama shok shik hai kha rutirret. Kha ang khan amani dieng ruthaw uh.
40021037	Dawngkhit a amani dieng ashapa kha rutir. Imining a ruti, ‘Amani na kashapa hi tu richit nepek pe u rangnih.’
40021038	“Inia loithaw hai kha na ashapa kha rumuk u phakhan, manilemani kar a ruti uh, ‘Mahi koklo kha nih joi. Khai! That u taia ama inkoklo kha loi pe u rang rawi.’
40021039	Ama kha rupawttap ua drakha rohon ah put ah rupai ua ama kha ruthat u joi.
40021040	“Khajarkhan drakha rohon pumi kha jong phakhan, loithaw hai dieng khan imaw thaw nih?”
40021041	Ama dieng ruti uh, “Mi shie hai kha khawktak a ama na mathang rangnih, khan drakha rohon kha parrawkhawm pha rikip a ama dieng ara apeh rang a loithaw hai shik dieng pek rangnih.”
40021042	Jesu na amani dieng ruti, “ ‘Inthaw hai na i`enda u lung kha kik ah runiei lung kha ruchang. Mahi PUMI na ithaw inih, khan nimik ua mahi shindawngroi `khat inih,’ tia irumiejiek kha rute u makche maw?
40021043	“Mahi kirieina ajartu Pathien rengchangna kha nangni ah put ah loi rangnih joi, khan ara moshok rang a Phungshik hai dieng pek rangnih joi.
40021044	Khan mahi lung chung a acho ama kha leklek a koi rangnih. Tunita`awm ichona miring kha rawnawi ning, tia vaiphin rachangmashak rangnih.”
40021045	Thiempu ulien hai le Pharisee hai na ama rangshim kha rujet u phakhan, amani chung a iriei keng, iti kha rujet uh.
40021046	Amani na ama kha rushur tu jawt uh, inia mipui kha ruchih uh. Ajarla amani na ama kha thiempulien `khat a iruloi u inih.
40022001	Jesu na amani dieng rangshim a chawngruriei peret:
40022002	Ama na ruriei, “Ravan rengchangna hi reng `khat na ashapa rang moiloi bumichinna irasham pe kha le ra`ang inih.
40022003	Makha moiloi bumichinna rang, koirawkhawmsha hai kha akoi rang, ama shok hai kha rutir, inia amani kha va jawt u mak.
40022004	“Shok shik hai kha tirret a ama na hitihin ruti, ‘Koirawkhawmsha hai dieng khan ti roh, “Enro, kieshiecha hai le imawnaw shieite hai kha that a bunekna `khat karasham a irikip karashamsho joi. Thaw, moiloi bumichinna hin va u rang roh.” ’
40022005	“Inia amani na irushawn pe u mak. Akhat na loi ah, khan akhat na rievieithawna ah rushe u joi.
40022006	Khan aliemlim kha na ama shok hai kha rushur pe uh, khan engshiettak a rutawn ua ruthat uh.
40022007	Rengpa kha na rujet phakhan, mulung ruhang pe joi. Ama na ama ramiring hai kha rutir a mithat hai kha vak mathang joi, khan amani khopui kha miei le ruha pe u joi.
40022008	“Khashole ama na oshok hai dieng ruti, ‘Moiloina rang rashamsho nih joi, inia koimiring hai hi tu rutuk maklai.
40022009	Nangni na khopui jawngna lamlien khawn she u tana nangimuklim kha moiloi bumichinna hin vak rawkhawm u roh.’
40022010	Shok hai kha na rushe ua lamlien ah imuktuk, atha ashie lawp `khat a vak chawi ua, moiloina in kha rumiship u joi.
40022011	“Inia rengpa kha na koimiring hai kha aen vat phakhan, moiloina ponledier thaw boi miring `khat vak muk.
40022012	Khan ama dieng ruti, ‘Kama, itia moiloi bumichinna ponledier thaw boipet a hin ah nangvaklut maw nih?’ Inia ama kha chawngrieithiei boi a ruawm.
40022013	“Khashole rengpa kha na oshok hai dieng ruti, ‘Ukhutleke kha khop pe u roh, khan chawi u tana vai tieng ah jingnakhap khawn vak pai u roh. Makha mun khan chapna le hareshena kha awm rangnih.’
40022014	“Ajarla mi tampui kha okoi rangnih, inia mi lekte kha madan rangnih.”
40022015	Khashole Pharisee hai na rushe ua ama chawngriei khan lim rudaw pe uh
40022016	Amani na amani khaichawi hai kha Herod miring hai kha le Jesu dieng rutir uh. Amani na ruti uh, “Oja, nang na adik kha nangriei, khan miring hai kha maila boi a le enshietenlar thaw boi a adik a Pathien lam kha nangruchuk, iti kejet uh.
40022017	Khajarkhan imaw nangmining? Kieini dieng nieriei u roh. Caesar dieng khaichana pek hi Dan maw nih ninawkle dan nih boi maw nih?”
40022018	Inia Jesu na amani thatna boi u kha jet pe a ruti, “Aw thanunchan thaw hai, ithaw kiei hi ennanginerete u maw nih?
40022019	Khaichana chandi kha kiei dieng numumuk u roh.” Khan amani na dinari `khat kha ama dieng vak chawi uh.
40022020	Khan amani dieng ruti, “Mahi rilim le khetmiejiek hi, tu tah maw nih?”
40022021	Amani na rumashang uh, “Caesar.” Khashole amani dieng ruti, “Khanitatu Caesar tah hai kha Caesar dieng peh u roh, khan Pathien tah hai kha Pathien dieng peh u roh.”
40022022	Amani na makha rujet u `le, shindawngna runiei ua ama kha mathan a rushe u joi.
40022023	Khanikhan thoiretna awm mak, ati Sadducee hai na ama dieng va ua rurawdawn uh.
40022024	Amani na ruti uh, “Oja, Moses na ruti makhala tukhat na nainiei boi a thi joiatu, ulienpa chi mothoina rang, anaipangpa na unungak kha loh rangnih.
40022025	Poro shiri hi kieini le ruawm. Akhat changna kha na inniei a ruthi joi. Khan chi mak boi a unungak kha anaipangpa dieng rumak joi.
40022026	Khatikhan adi changnapa, athum changna, khan ishiri changnashe kha ruthi joi.
40022027	Dawngkhit a nupangnu kha`awm ruthi joi.
40022028	Thoiretna khan ama kha, shiri hai kar a, tu nungak maw chang nih? Ajarla lawpsheng u na ama kha iruniei u inih.”
40022029	Jesu na mashang a amani dieng ruti, “Nangrehe uh, ajarla nangni na Miejiek hai kha`awm, khan Pathien ranak kha`awm rujet u makche.
40022030	Ajarla thoiretna khan innieina awm naw nih, khan inawm mieniei u naw nih. Inia ravan a Pathien ravantir hai kha ang u rangnih.
40022031	Khan athi hai thoiretna chungchang khan tu, Pathien na iruti chawng kha te u makche maw?
40022032	Ama na ruti, ‘Kiei hi Abraham Pathien, Isaac Pathien, khan Jacob Pathien kha kanih.’ Pathien hi athi hai Pathien kha nimak, inia aring hai Pathien kha inih.”
40022033	Ama miruchukna khan mipui kha shindawngna runiei uh.
40022034	Inia ama na Sadducee hai kha rumaw`awmchien joi, iti kha Pharisee hai kha na rujet u phakhan, amani na lawp `khat a ruruchun u joi.
40022035	Khan amani kar a danthiei `khat na ama kha enretena rang, chawng rawdawn a ruti,
40022036	“Oja, Dan shung ah ih chawngpek kha maw aliendet?”
40022037	Jesu na ama dieng ruti, “ ‘Nang PUMI nang Pathien kha nang mulung kholok le, nang ringphuk kholok le khan nang mulungmining kholok le numnangipok rang a inih.’
40022038	Mahi akhat changna le aliendet chawngpek kha inih.
40022039	Khan adi changna kha hitihin awm: ‘Nang ringchangpui kha nang pumtak ang a numnangipok rang a inih.’
40022040	Mahi chawngpek idi chung hin Dan le Thiempulien hai kholok kha rushui a awm inih.”
40022041	Inia Pharisee hai na ruruchun u lai khan, Jesu na amani dieng rurawdawn.
40022042	Ama na ruti, “Christa chungchang hin imaw nangmining uh? Ama hi tu shapa kha maw nih?” Ama dieng rumashang uh, “David Shapa.”
40022043	Amani dieng ruti, “Khanitala itia Ratha jar a David na ‘Pumi,’ tia irukoi a
40022044	‘PUMI na kupumi dieng ruriei, “Nang rahapui hai kha nang kekhawng kamachang malalim, kukhut chang tieng hin shuh roh,” ’ tia iti maw nih?
40022045	David na ama kha ‘Pumi,’ ti joiala, iti dan a ama kha ashapa achang maw nih?”
40022046	Tute na ama dieng rumashang ngam u mak, khan khani ah put ah tute na ama dieng chawngawm rurawdawn ngam u lai mak.
40023001	Khashole Jesu na mipui dieng le akhaichawi hai dieng chawngruriei.
40023002	Ama na ruti, “Danoja hai le Pharisee hai na Moses shutna khan shuh uh.
40023003	Khajarkhan nangni dieng iriei rikip kha jui u tana thaw u roh, inia amani ithaw ang a tu, thaw u naw roh, ajarla iriei u kha thaw u mak.
40023004	Ruput ngam boi pokrik hai kha amani na khop ua miring hai dar a atet pe uh, inia amani kha amani khutlawihai kar a akhatshe le meper jawt u mak.
40023005	“Khan ithaw u kholok kha miring hai muk rang thaw uh. Ajarla amani uitangmili hai kha mielien uh, khan amani ponmawr hai kha mieshiei uh.
40023006	Bumichinna hai khan mi matonkhit ah shutna rang, adit uh, khan synagogue hai khan shutna runieiving hai kha loh jawt uh.
40023007	Khan mi na ‘Rabbi, Rabbi,’ iti le khan rievieithawna mun ah richit ipek rang, adit uh.
40023008	“Inia mi na ‘Rabbi,’ tia nokoi u naw roshoh. Ajarla nang Oja u `khat awm. Ama kha Christa kha inih, khan nang kholok hi uliennai kha nangnih uh.
40023009	Rieliei a awm tute dieng kapa, tia koi u naw roh, ajarla nangpa u `khat awm, ama kha ravan a awm.
40023010	Mi na lamkai hai, tia`awm nokoi u naw rosho, ajarla nang Lamkai `khat awm. Makha Christa kha inih.
40023011	Inia nang kar ua alienving kha nang shok u achang rang a inih.
40023012	Khan nining a rawlawm miring kha redemashak rangnih. Khan nining a rede miring kha rawlawmmashak rangnih.
40023013	“Inia nangni rang idawr a khawk shawna maw nih naw, Aw danoja hai, Pharisee hai, thanunchan thaw hai! Ajarla ravan rengchangna kha mi hai rang nangkhar uh. Ajarla nangnirilikawm lut u makche, khan alut rang a miring hai kha`awm mulut jawt u makche.
40023014	Nangni rang idawr a khawk shawna maw nih naw, Aw danoja hai, Pharisee hai, thanunchan thaw hai! Ajarla mieirawng hai in kha ranak a nangsho uh. Khan rohong a nikna kha nangmieshiei uh. Hijarhin hengna kha liendet a nangmuk u rangnih.
40023015	“Nangni rang idawr khawk maw nih naw, Aw danoja hai, Pharisee hai, thanunchan thaw hai! Ajarla miring `khat Jihudi mijirna rang, tuikhanglien le maw nangrakan ua nangshe uh. Makha miring kha na ijir phakhan, nangni kha ang a, rothom a Gehenna shapa kha nangmachang uh.
40023016	“Nangni rang idawr a khawk maw nih naw, Aw lamkai mikchaw hai! Nangni na nangti uh, ‘Tunita`awm riethiengmun ban a chawngrakham ama chung khan iawm shok naw nih. Inia tunita`awm riethiengmun ah awm rangkachak ban a chawngrakham ama kha chawngrakham kha na ikhit inih.’
40023017	Aw amawng le mikchaw hai, ih kha maw liendet, rangkachak kha maw, ninawkle rangkachak riethiengmashak riethiengmun kha maw?
40023018	Nangni na nangti uh, ‘Tunita`awm maicham ban a chawngrakham ama chung khan ih shok naw nih, inia tunita`awm kha chung ah awm khutchawi ban a chawngrakham ama kha chawngrakham kha na ikhit inih.’
40023019	Aw amawng le mikchaw hai, ih kha maw liendet, khutchawi kha maw ninawkle khutchawi riethiengmashak maicham kha maw?
40023020	Khajarkhan tunita`awm maicham ban a chawngrakham miring kha na makha iban a, khan kha chung ah awm kholok kha iban a chawngrakham inih.
40023021	Tunita`awm riethiengmun ban a chawngrakham miring kha na makha le kha shung ah awm ama kha iban a chawngirakham inih.
40023022	Tunita`awm ravan le chawngrakham miring kha na Pathien rengmun le khan kha chung ah ashupa ama kha le chawngirakham inih.
40023023	“Nangni rang idawr a khawk maw nih naw, Aw danoja hai, Pharisee hai, thanunchan thaw hai! Ajarla pudina le patikhawm, khan jira hai kha shemshawm a nangpek uh. Inia Dan a aludet kha ishawn u makche. Khahaikha la, dikna, roihoina, khan takashawn inih. Shik hai kha enda boi a hihaihi nangithaw u rang a shok.
40023024	Aw lamkai mikchaw hai, thoiphurlangshan kha nangshawr uh, inia sharingshiei tu nangva uh!
40023025	“Nangni rang idawr a khawk maw nih naw, Aw danoja hai, Pharisee hai, thanunchan thaw hai! Ajarla nangni na hai le kheng kha vai tieng nanglap ua, shung ah tu phamrai le takshurna ngam boi kha ship a awm.
40023026	Aw Pharisee mikchaw hai, hai le kheng shung kha masha a machai u roh. Khanitatu amani vai tieng a kha`awm chai rangnih.
40023027	“Danoja hai, Pharisee hai, thanunchan thaw hai, nangni rang mieriemna awm! Ajarla mi na vai tieng metha a imuk, inia ushung ah tu athi hai ru hai le orono kholok aship thankhur hai lieina ithaw kha le nangra`ang uh.
40023028	Khatikhan mi hai dieng khan vai tieng tu richichawi `khat a nangmalang uh, inia shung ah tu nang thanunchan thawna le dannangishawnna boi u kha na shipmer a awm.
40023029	“Nangni rang idawr a khawk maw nih naw, Aw danoja hai, Pharisee hai, thanunchan thaw hai! Ajarla nangni na thiempulien hai than kha nangkon uh, khan miriethieng hai than hai kha nangrielien uh.
40023030	Khan nangni na nangti uh, ‘Kieini na kapa hai rong khan kuruawm uatu, amani na thiempulien hai thishen moshokna khan rujaw u naw ning.’
40023031	Khatikhan thiempulien hai kha ruthat nai hai kha kanih, tia nang nining ua kungnangchang uh.
40023032	Nang pilepu hai munu danlakna kha miship u roh.
40023033	“Aw moro hai! Rawshawk chicha hai! Nangni na itia maw Gehenna chawngshatna ah put ah rekhe u rawng?
40023034	Hijarhin, en u ro, thiempulien hai, mishing hai le danoja hai kha nangni dieng kijongtir inih. Eshen kha cross ling ah nangthat u rangnih. Khan eshen hai kha nang synagogue u hai khan rawmaw le nangjem ua khopui `khat ah put ah khopui `khat ah shawna nangpek u rangnih.
40023035	Makha rieliei chung a thijan miriethieng thishen kholok shietna kha nangni dieng chuna rang a inih. Makha miriethieng Abel thishen shok ah put ah Barachiah shapa Zechariah thishen shokshe kha nangni dieng shokna rang a inih. Zechariah kha riethiengmun le lungkheng kar ah nangiruthat u inih.
40023036	Diktak a nangni dieng kiriei inih, hihai kholok hi mahi rong chung hin chuh rangnih.
40023037	“Aw Jerusalem, Aw Jerusalem, thiempulien hai athat le ama dieng a ijongtir hai kha lung le adeng! Arpui `khat na ete hai kha amatha noi ah irawkhawm kha ang a, idawrshe maw nang nai hai kha lawp `khat a kururawkhawm jawt, inia rujawt u makche!
40023038	Enro, nang in u kha rokpet a rangah joi.
40023039	Ajarla kiei na nangni dieng kiriei inih, ‘PUMI riming a ava ama kha rahvantha inih,’ nangti u masheng, numuh u lai naw tinih.”
40024001	Khashole Jesu na riethiengmun kha mathan a rushe joi. Khan akhaichawi hai na ama dieng rushe ua riethiengmun inrashak dan hai kha rumumuk uh.
40024002	Makhan Jesu na amani dieng ruti, “Hihai kholok hi nangimuk boi u maw nih? Diktak a nangni dieng kiriei inih. Akhat chung ah akhat rotho hi achim boi a hin ah imak lung `khatshe awm naw nih.”
40024003	Khan Ama na Olive Lawn ah rushuh le roroia, akhaichawi hai na bing a ama dieng va uh. Amani na ruti uh, “Khahaikha itik a ashok rang a maw nih, iti kha kieini dieng nieriei u roh. Khan nang jongna rang le khan rong mawtawrna rang a jetna kha imaw ninih?”
40024004	Jesu na mashang a amani dieng ruriei, “Mi na nomohonna boi u rang, riring u roh.
40024005	Ajarla ‘Christa kha kanih,’ tia mi tampui kiriming a va u rangnih, khan mi tampui mohon u rangnih.
40024006	Khan ra le muruk a ra chawng nangjet u rangnih. Makhan nang rawthawkna boi u rang, riring u roh. Ajarla hihai kholok hi ashokngir rang a inih, inia dawng kha tu nih naw nilai.
40024007	Ajarla phung `khat na phung `khat chung a ra thaw rangnih, khan rengram `khat na rengram `khat chung a ra thaw rangnih. Nekleshak hawng tang rangnih, rikrai hawng rawjawh rangnih, khan nieinu munmun ah hawng rawnawk rangnih.
40024008	Hihai kholok hi shawna putna kha nih rangnih.
40024009	“Khashole shawrana khan nepeh u ning, tia nathat u rangnih. Khan kiriming jarkhan phung kholok na nangni kha numukmak u rangnih.
40024010	Khashole mi tampui na keruthui u rangnih, khatlekhat rojor nana rangnih, khan khatlekhat raha rangnih.
40024011	Khan thiempulien jok tampui thoi ning, tia mi tampui kha mohon rangnih.
40024012	Khan danishawnboi kha hawng pung ning, tia mi tampui numropokna kha hawng thang rangnih.
40024013	Inia dawngshe a adoi ngam ama kha shan rangnih.
40024014	Khan rengchangna athachawng hi manmieshie kholok dieng shem rangnih. Makha phung kholok dieng kungchangna `khat kha chang rangnih. Khashole tu dawng kha hawng rangnih joi.
40024015	“Khajarkhan thiempulien Daniel dieng irurieina, ‘Mitiroi thitnathangna miring,’ kha na mun riethieng ah ading kha nangmuk u phakhan (ate miring kha na jet rosho),
40024016	Judea ah awm miring hai kha na lawn hai khan tan u rosho.
40024017	In ah awm nieinak hai kha aloi rang, inphu chung ah awm ama kha na, jong chumlai naw rosho.
40024018	Loi ah awm ama kha na, oponledier loina rang hawng kirretlai naw rosho.
40024019	Khalai a naivawng nupang hai le nai runupeh hai rang khan idawr a shawna maw ninih naw!
40024020	Nang tanna u rang a pha kha phabi le Sabbath nikho nitna boi rang, nikna niei u roh.
40024021	Ajarla makhan shawrana lientak `khat shok rangnih. Kha`ang kha manmieshie putna ah put ah vonshe hin ashok boipet nih rangnih, khan takthar a shokret, iti awmlai naw nih.
40024022	Khan kha pha hai kha imushum boi nitjoiatu, taksha `khatshe hawi naw nih. Inia madansha hai rangbak khan kha pha hai kha, mushum pe rangnih.
40024023	Khashole tukhat na ‘Enro, Christa kha hin awm joi’ ninawkle ‘Khawn awm joi’! ti joiawm takashawn u naw roh.
40024024	Ajarla christa jok hai le thiempulien jok hai kha thoi rangnih. Nitthieiatu madansha haishe kha mohonna rang, jetna le rekhekchon alienalien numumuk u rangnih.
40024025	Enro, pha mala a kinierieisha u nih joi.
40024026	“Khajarkhan, ‘Enro, ama kha ramthim ah awm joi!’ niti u joiawm, she u naw roh. Khan ‘Enro, ama kha indan shung ah awm joi!’ niti u joiawm, takashawn u naw roh.
40024027	Ajarla shim tieng ah put ah khomelek a mar tiengshe i`eh kha Miring Shapa ajong kha le ra`ang rangnih.
40024028	Ajarla thicho awmna mun khan, langke hai na lawp `khat a ruchun u rangnih.
40024029	“Khahai shawrana nikho hai kha thengphit `le, ni kha mijing rangnih, tha na mieivar pelai naw nih; arshi hai na ravan ah put ah jong cho u rangnih, khan ravan ranak hai kholok kha rawnawk rangnih.
40024030	“Kha pha khan ravan a Miring Shapa jetna kha malang rangnih, khan rieliei a phung kholok na mulung jumna niei rangnih. Ranak, khan lurna lien le ravan a romiei hai chung ah Miring Shapa ajong kha amani na muk u rangnih.
40024031	Khan tekawlawi lientak `khat miri le ama ravantir hai kha jong tir rangnih. Khan imadansha hai kha kiei mili ah put ah, ravan dawng `khat ah put ah dawng `khatshe, rawkhawm u rangnih.
40024032	“Khan thieichangkung ah put ah rangshim hi jet u roh: abak hai kha dawnglai khan, obo hawng moshok. Makhan kholum kha hawng nai joi, iti kha nangjet uh.
40024033	Khatikhan khahaikha nangmuk u phakhan, ama kha vak ranai a kawtkungtak ah ding a awm joi, iti kha jet u roh!
40024034	Diktak a nangni dieng kiriei inih, hihaihi hawng rupum masheng, hi rong hi shukhek a hek naw nih.
40024035	Ravan le rieliei hi hek rangnih, inia kawchawng hai hi tu shukthang a thang naw nih.
40024036	“Inia makha Nikho le nidan chungchanga tute na ajet awm mak, ravan a ravantir haishe na`awm jet u mak. Inia kapa ranga kha na ijet inih.
40024037	Inia Miring Shapa jongna rang a dan kha Noah nikho hai kha le ra`ang rangnih.
40024038	Ajarla tuilien mala nikho hai khan, miring hai kha na runek rushak uh, inruniei uh, khan inniei rang rupek uh. Makha Noah na rokonglien khan rulut masheng miring hai kha na ruthaw uh.
40024039	Tuihawnglien a amani kholok kha ruchawiviek masheng, amani na iawm rujet u mak. Miring Shapa ajong rang a kha`awm, khatak kha ang rangnih.
40024040	Kha pha khan miring pasha `di loipuk ah awm rangnih, akhat kha loi rangnih, khan shik `khat kha mak rangnih.
40024041	Nupang pasha `di na shum ah shanghakshuk u rangnih, akhat kha loi rangnih, khan shik `khat kha mak rangnih.
40024042	“Khajarkhan riring u roh, ajarla nangni na nang Pumi u jongna rang a pha kha jet u makche.
40024043	Inia mahi jet u roh, inpumipa kha na murushapa vatna rang a pha kha rujet joiala, ruche ning, tia i`in kha mokhoi naw nih.
40024044	Khajarkhan nangniawm rasham u roh, ajarla nangrumining boi u phakhan, Miring Shapa kha jong rangnih.
40024045	“Rangam puithiei le ashing shok kha tumaw nih? Ama kha upumpa kha na ama inshungkhur apana rang le amani kha rutukthep pha a nekleshak apeh rang a roiruputna ipek miring kha inih.
40024046	Upumpa kha jong phakhan, khatikhan a chon iruthaw ijongmuk shok kha rahvanmuh miring kha inih.
40024047	Diktak a nangni dieng kiriei inih, ama na ienieinak kholok apoh kha iminit rangnih.
40024048	Inia shok shie kha na mulung shung a, ‘Kupumpa ajong hi shum joi,’ iruti a
40024049	oshok chang pui hai kha rujem, khan jukhawp hai le runek-rushak.
40024050	Makha shok pumpa kha irumining boi pha le irujet boi nidantak khan jong phakhan,
40024051	ama na khawktak a achep rangnih, khan thanunchan thaw hai kha le atet rangnih. Kha mun khan chapna le hareshena kha awm rangnih.
40025001	“Ravan rengchangna kha nungak shawm kha le ra`ang rangnih. Amani thaomiei hai kha ruchawi ua moipa kha rumuk pui rushe uh.
40025002	Amani kar a rahnga kha ashing runih uh, khan rahnga kha amawng runih uh.
40025003	Amawng hai kha na amani thaomiei hai kha ruchawi uh, inia thao ruchawi u mak.
40025004	Inia ashing hai kha na thao kha amani thaokawk hai khan amani thaomiei hai kha le ruchawi uh.
40025005	Moipa kha jong shum jarkhan, amani kholok kha inrungui a rumiei u joi.
40025006	“Inia janchim khan he ra`ai `khat na ruti, ‘Enro, moipa kha jong joi. She u tana vak rumuk pui u rang roh!’
40025007	Khashole nungak hai kholok kha na ruthoi ua amani thaomiei hai kha rumuchuk u joi.
40025008	Amawng hai kha na ashing hai dieng ruti uh, ‘Kawthaomiei u hai hi ithi rang keng joi, nang thao u kha eshen nepeh u rang roh.’
40025009	“Inia ashing hai kha na rumashang uh, ‘Nithiei naw nih, kieini rangawm, khan nangni rangawm hun naw nih. Kha ruhut a nangni rangbak khan ajor hai dieng khawn vak rawchawh u rang roh.’
40025010	“Amani na thao rawchawh rusheriethiei khan, moipa kha jong joi. Khan rurasham miring hai kha na moiloina khan moipa kha le rushe u joi. Khan in kha rukhar joi.
40025011	“Kha anuk `le, nungak shik `khat hai kha`awm va ua ‘Pumi, Pumi, mawkawt nawmawlawng pe u roh!’ vak ti uh.
40025012	Inia ama na rumashang, ‘Diktak a nangni dieng kiriei inih, tumaw nangnih u kiei na nejet u mi`ing.’
40025013	Khajarkhan riring u roh, ajarla Miring Shapa jongna rang a Nikho le nidan kha nangni na jet u makche.
40025014	“Ajarla ravan rengchangna hi miring `khat na ama shoktak hai kha irukoi, khan ienieinak hai kha amani dieng khut irurothona a ramlatak `khat a khomijin rushe kha le ra`ang inih.
40025015	Akhat dieng talent rahnga rupek, shik `khat dieng idi, khan shik `khat dieng akhat, ingamtuk kha rupekrim a khomijin rushe joi.
40025016	Khashole talent rahnga atumpa kha na rushe a makha le rievieiruthaw a talent shik rahnga rumoshok.
40025017	Khatikhan idi atumpa kha na`awm idi rumoshok.
40025018	Inia akhat atumpa kha na rushe, khan pieipak ah rukhum a upumi shier kha ruthe.
40025019	“Pha shawtlawk shole, khahai shok pumi kha hawng kir a amani le talent hai kha rumushung u joi.
40025020	Khan talent rahnga atumpa kha na ava a talent shik rahnga kha vak chawi a ruti, ‘Pumi, kiei dieng talent rahnga nangnurupek. Enro, kiei na amani ah put ah talent rahnga kurumupung joi.’
40025021	“Upumi kha na ama dieng ruti, ‘Nangrat joi, atha le takashawn rang a rutuk shok. Nieinak lekte chung a takashawn rang rutuk kha nangnih. Kiei na nieinak tampui chung a apoh kha niminit rang kanih. Nang pumi ningaina khan lut rang roh.’
40025022	“Talent idi atumpa kha na`awm ava a ruti, ‘Pumi, kiei dieng talent idi nangnurupek. Enro, amani ah put ah talent idi kurumupung joi.’
40025023	“Upumi kha na ama dieng ruti, ‘Nangrat joi, atha le takashawn rang a rutuk shok. Nieinak lekte chung a takashawn rang a rutuk kha nangnih. Kiei na nieinak tampui chung a apoh kha niminit rang kanih. Nang pumi ningaina khan lut rang roh.’
40025024	“Khashole talent `khat atumpa kha na ava a ruti, ‘Pumi, nang hi mikher, nangivawrna boi a parrawkhawm, khan nangithehna boi a rawkhawm kha nangnih, iti kha kiei na kejet.
40025025	Khajarkhan kiei kuruchih, khan kurushe a nang talent kha pieipak ah kiruthe inih. Enro, nang tah kha loi rang roh.’
40025026	“Upumi kha na ama dieng ruti, ‘Nang ashie le rathashie shok, kivawrna boi khan kiei na parkirawkhawm, khan kithehna boi khan kirawkhawm, iti kha nangjet!
40025027	Kieshier kha niei`in ah nangrutet a la, kawhawngkir phakhan athoi lele kumuk rangnih.
40025028	‘Khajarkhan talent kha ama ah put ah loi tana talent shawm anieipa dieng peh rang roh.
40025029	Ajarla aniei ama dieng khan pek rangnih, khan ama na ruphu a niei rangnih, khan aniei boi ama dieng khan, inieidak kha`awm ama ah put ah loi pe rangnih.
40025030	Khan rutuk boi shokpa kha vai tieng ah jingnakhap khan vak pai u roh. Kha mun khan chapna le hareshena kha awm rangnih.’
40025031	“Miring Shapa kha na ama lurna le ravantir riethieng kholok le jong phakhan, ama lurna rengmun khan jong shuh rangnih.
40025032	Khan phung kholok kha amaikung a ruchun rangnih. Kengamroi kha na ekengam hai kha keh hai ah put ah ishen kha ang a, amani kha shikshik a shen rangnih.
40025033	Khan kengam hai kha ama khut chang tieng atet rangnih, inia keh hai kha ukhut viei tieng atet rangnih.
40025034	“Khashole ukhut chang tieng ah hai dieng khan Rengpa kha na iti rangnih, ‘Khai, kapa na rahvan ipek hai, rieliei phun ah put ah nangni rang a irurasham rengchangna kha tum u rang roh.
40025035	Ajarla vawncham a kuruawm, nekleshak nangnurupek uh. Tuira a kuruawm, tui nangnurupek uh. Milak `khat a kuruawm, nangnurupawm uh.
40025036	Ponledier boi a kuruawm, pon nangnururieshieimashak uh. Natlam a kuruawm, nangnawhawngphak uh. Lungroko shung ah kuruawm, kiei dieng nanghawng uh.’
40025037	“Khashole midik hai kha na mashang a ruti u rangnih, ‘Pumi, itiklai maw vawncham a nang kha kunurumuk ua nekleshak kunurupek uh, ninawkle tuira a kunurumuk ua tui kunurumenek uh?
40025038	Itiklai maw kieini na nang kha milak `khat a kunurumuk ua kunurupawm uh, ninawkle ponledier boi a kunurumuk ua pon kunururieshieimashak uh?
40025039	Ninawkle natlam a, ninawkle lungroko ah kawnawhawngphak uh?’
40025040	“Makhan Rengpa kha na amani dieng mashang rangnih, ‘Diktak a nangni dieng kiriei inih, ih nita`awm ashin ku`uliennai hihaihi kar a akhat dieng nangiruthaw u kha, kiei dieng nangiruthaw u inih.’
40025041	“Khashole ukhut viei tieng ah hai dieng khanawm iti rangnih, ‘Nangni pumbotna amuh miring hai, diabol le ama ravantir hai rang a irurasham Kumshawt Miei khan, kiei ah put ah she u rang roh.
40025042	Ajarla vawncham a kuruawm, nekleshak nurupeh u makche, tuira a kuruawm, tui nurupek u makche.
40025043	Milak `khat a kuruawm, in nurumulut u makche. Ponledier boi a kuruawm, pon nururieshieimashak u makche. Natlam a le lungroko ah kuruawm, inia nawhawngphak u makche.’
40025044	“Khashole amani na`awm rumashang a ruti u rangnih, ‘Pumi, itiklai maw nang kha vawncham a, ninawkle tuira a ninawkle milak a, ninawkle ponledier boi a, ninawkle dam boi a, ninawkle lungroko ah nang kha kunurumuk ua nang dieng chon kinuruthawna pe boi u awm?’
40025045	“Khashole ama na amani dieng rumashang, ‘Diktak a nangni dieng kiriei inih, ih nita`awm hihai ashin hai kar a akhat dieng nangiruthaw boi u kha kiei dieng nangiruthaw boi u inih.’
40025046	“Khan hihaihi na kumshawt a chepna khan she u rangnih, inia midik hai kha na kumshawt ringna shung khan lut u rangnih.”
40026001	Khan hitihin ruawm, Jesu na chawng hai hi ariei rumawtawr phakhan, akhaichawi hai dieng ruti,
40026002	“Ni `di shole, Rakanna kha hawng rangnih joi, iti hi nangjet uh, khan Miring Shapa kha cross ah thatna rang pek u rangnih joi.”
40026003	Khashole Caiaphas iti thiempu rashang tolawng khan thiempu ulien hai, danoja hai le miring hai shierulien hai kha ruruchun uh.
40026004	Khan Jesu kha mohonchien a shur a thatna rang, muruk a chawng rurashak uh.
40026005	Inia “Rohoi khan tu mi muput rang keng, ama kha shur u naw roh,” tia amani na ruti uh.
40026006	Khan Jesu kha Bethany ah raithawnaw rutawngpa Simon in ah ruawm.
40026007	Kha pha khan nupang `khat na manrawp rieipartui hi lungngoi kawk `khat le Jesu dieng ava a, Jesu na tebol ah rushulai khan, makha ama lu ah ruliei pe.
40026008	Inia makha akhaichawi hai na rumuk u phakhan, mulungrahalam a ruti uh, “Ijar a mahi imathang maw nih?
40026009	Ajarla mahi rieipartui hi manrawptak a jor a shara hai dieng pekthiei inih.”
40026010	Makha Jesu na rujet a amani dieng ruti, “Ijar a nupangnu kha nangirahamashak u maw nih? Ajarla ama na kiei dieng chon atha `khat ithaw inih.
40026011	Ajarla shara hai kha ningthingkip nangawm pui uh, inia kiei hi tu ningthingkip nawawm pui u makche.
40026012	Ajarla katak a mahi rieipartui iliei hi kurukhumna rashamna rang a iruthaw inih.
40026013	Nangni dieng diktak a kiriei inih, ih mun khan nita`awm, rieliei pumpui ah athachawng shem phakhan, mahi nupangnu na iruthaw hi, ama miningna `khat a, riei rangnih.”
40026014	Khashole Judas Iscariot iti shawmlieidi kar a akhat na thiempu ulien hai dieng rushe joi.
40026015	Ama na ruti, “Nangni dieng ama hi kojor a la, kiei dieng imaw nepeh u rawng?” Amani na dangka shawm `thum le ama kha rurawjawt pui u joi.
40026016	Khan ah put ah Jesu jorna rang a chanthatna kha tawk a ruawm joi.
40026017	Khan akhat changna Chawjawboi Tan Rohoi Nikho khan khaichawi hai na Jesu dieng rushe a ruti uh, “Khoshekawt ah maw Rakanna shakna rang, nangnarashammashak jawt uh?”
40026018	Ama na ruti, “Khopui khawn she u tana mi `khat nangmuk u rangnih. Ama dieng ti u roh, ‘Ojapa na iti, “Kapha kha nai joi, kakhaichawi hai le nang in ah Rakanna kha rasham u rang kanih.” ’ ”
40026019	Khajarkhan Jesu na chawngirachak dungjuia, khaichawi hai na ruthaw ua Rakanna kha rurasham u joi.
40026020	Khan ni hawng tah phakhan, ama na khaichawi shawmlieidi le maicham ah rushuh u joi.
40026021	Amani na runek u lai khan, ama na ruti, “Diktak a nangni dieng kiriei inih, nang kar ua akhat na kiei hi nojor rangnih joi.”
40026022	Khan amani kha dawnga mulungrushaw pe uh. Amani `khatkhat na ama dieng ruti uh, “Kiei maw kanih, Pumi?”
40026023	Khan ama na rumashang, “Mahi khengkam hin kiei le khut apur miring kha na kiei hi nojor rangnih.
40026024	Miring Shapa kha ama chungchanga irumiejiek dungjuia ashok pe inih. Inia Miring Shapa ajor miring chung khan idawrshe rahvanshie maw nih! Ama kha jong shoklam nawkala ama rang tha pe rangnih.”
40026025	Khashole ama ajorpa Judas na mashang a ruti, “Kiei maw kanih, Rabbi?” Ama na rumashang, “Nangti joi.”
40026026	Khan amani na irunek u le roroia, Jesu na tan kha ruloi, khan rahvan rupek a rukhoi. Khan akhaichawi hai dieng rupek a ruti, “Loi u tana shah u roh, mahi kupum kha inih.”
40026027	Khan hai kha ruloi a mapakna runiei, khan amani dieng pek a ruti, “Nang lawpsheng u na hin ah put ah neh u roh.
40026028	Ajarla mahi rawjawtna `thar kithishen kha inih. Mahi mi tampui munu rangaidamna rang a along kha inih.
40026029	Inia kiei na nangni dieng kieriei, von ah put ah kapa rengchangna khan nangni le athar a kinekna rang a makha Nikho kha hawng shok masheng, mahi drakha tui hi kiei na nelai naw ning.”
40026030	Khan amani na lah `khat ruthaw ua Olive Lawn ah ruhawng u joi.
40026031	Khashole Jesu na amani dieng ruriei, “Von jan hin, kajar a nang kholok na keruthuina nangniei u rangnih, ajarla hitihin rumiejiek: ‘Kiei na Kengamroi kha that rang kanih, khan kengam hawi kha chaiachai a awm rangnih.’
40026032	Inia kiei hi nomothoi shole, nang matieng u Galilee ah rushe rang kanih.”
40026033	Mashang a Peter na ama dieng ruti, “Nang jar a mi kholok kha keruthuimashak joiawm, kiei tu kenuruthuimashak naw nih.”
40026034	Jesu na ama dieng ruti, “Diktak a nang dieng kiriei inih, von jantak hin, arkhawng na khong mala, kuchung a voithum nangrapha rangnih.”
40026035	Peter na ama dieng ruti, “Kiei nang le athi rang kinitjoiawm, nang chung a raphatna niei naw ning!” Khatikhan akhaichawi hai kholok na ruti uh.
40026036	Khashole Jesu na amani le Gethsemane iti mun khan rushe a, akhaichawi hai dieng ruti, “Khawn anih kesheriethiei, hin rushuh u roh.”
40026037	Ama na Peter le Zebedee shapa idi kha rushe pui, khan mulungshaw a raha ruput joi.
40026038	Khashole amani dieng ruti, “Kiringphuk hi thitna dawr a ajeng a shaw joi. Hin rurangah u roh, khan cheveng a nawawm puishom u roh.”
40026039	Khan ama na rushebawt le butlam a nikna niei a ruti, “Aw kapa, nitthiei a tu, hai hi na kiei hi nalim rosho. Khanikengta kidit ang a niboia, nangidit kha ang a nih rosho.”
40026040	Khan khaichawi hai dieng ava a rumiei u kha vak tawng a Peter dieng ruti, “Nidan `khatshe neche pui ngam u makche maw?
40026041	Chelam a nikna niei u roh. Khanitatu lemna khan lut u naw tinih; ratha na tu adithet, inia taksha hi na dawkshamna ieniei.”
40026042	Voidi changna khan rusheret, khan nik a ruti, “Aw kapa, hai hi kinek boi a inalim boi rang nitjoiatu, nang mulungmining kha nih rang rosho.”
40026043	Khan ama na ava a amani kha mieilam a vak mukret, ajarla amani mik kha rumasha pe uh.
40026044	Khan amani kha mak a voithum changna khan rusheret a, ra`angre a chawng hai kha vak riei.
40026045	Khashole akhaichawi hai dieng ruti, “Tunshe hin amiei a shawmuchum maw nangnih u lai? Enro, apha kha nai joi, khan Miring Shapa kha munu miring hai khut a jor joi.
40026046	Thoi u tana she u rang rawi. Enro, kiei najorpa kha na navakdep joi.”
40026047	Khan ama na roirurieilai khan, shawmlieidi kar a akhat, Judas kha vak shok joi. Mirawp lientak `khat chemjam le mawbawng raklam a vat pui joi. Amani kha thiempu ulien hai le miring hai shierulien hai na ivaktir u inih.
40026048	Khan ajorpa kha na amani dieng jetna pek a ruti, “Kiei na bieng kitumpa kha, ama kha inih, shur u roh.”
40026049	Khan ama na Jesu kha vak jawngtir a “Rabbi, chubai!” tia iebieng ah vak tum joi.
40026050	Jesu na ama dieng ruti, “Kama, ithaw va maw nangnih?” Khashole amani na rujawng uh, khan Jesu chung a khut rujawn ua ama kha rushur u joi.
40026051	Khan enro, Jesu le rawtawp hai kar a akhat na ukhut rushawn a echemjam kha rupawttap a, thiempu rashang shok `khat rutuk a, onokor kha rutan pe joi.
40026052	Khashole Jesu na ama dieng ruti, “Nang chemjam kha awkawk khan thong roh, ajarla chemjam rotokna miring kholok na chemjam a thi rangnih.
40026053	Tun kiei na kapa dieng nik a kamaton a ravantir legion shawmlieidi kiei dieng nepeh ngam naw nih, tia nangimining maw nih?
40026054	Khanitala hitihin a ashokngir rang a inih, iti Miejiek kha itia maw hawng rupum ngam nih?”
40026055	Kha phatak khan Jesu na mipui dieng ruti, “Minieisho `khat chung a ang a, kiei ashur rang chemjam le mawbawng le ava maw nangnih uh? Ningthingkip kiei na riethiengmun ah mi kururuchuk, khan nangni le kuruawm a nurushur u makche.
40026056	Khania hihai kholok hi thiempulien hai na irumiejiek hai kha hawng rupumna rang a ithaw inih.” Khashole khaichawi hai kholok na ama kha mathan a rutan u joi.
40026057	Khan Jesu rushur hai kha na ama kha thiempu rashang Caiaphas dieng ruchawi u joi. Kha mun khan danoja hai le shierulien hai kha ruruchun uh.
40026058	Inia Peter na ama kha thiempu rashang tolawngshe kha ralaviei a anu rujui. Khan ama na rulut, khan riethiengmun shipai hai kha le rushuh a imaw shok nih, tia ruen.
40026059	Thiempu ulien hai, khan shierulien hai le Sanhedrin miring kholok na Jesu kha thatna rang, adik boi a kungchangna kha rutawk uh.
40026060	Inia adik boi a kungruchang hai tampui kha va u joiawm, `khatshe rumuk pe u mak. Dawngkhit a adik boi a kungachang hai idi hawng lut uh.
40026061	Amani na ruti uh, “Hipa hi na ‘Pathien riethiengmun hi shiet a ni `thum shung a komothoi ngam,’ ruti.”
40026062	Khan thiempu rashang kha na thoi a Jesu dieng ruti, “Mashanglai naw rawng maw? Nang chung a mi hai na kungchangna ipek u hi imaw nih?”
40026063	Inia Jesu kha ruawmchien. Khan thiempu rashang kha na mashang a ruti, “Pathien Shapa Christa kha nangnih a tu, Aring Pathien riming kha ban tana chawngrakham roh.”
40026064	Jesu na ama dieng rumashang, “Nangti joi. Khanikengta kiei na nang dieng kieriei, tun ah put ah Miring Shapa kha na Ranaknieipa khut chang tieng shuh ning, tia ravan romiei kar a ajong kha nangmuk u rangnih.”
40026065	Khashole thiempu rashang kha na opon hai kha ther a ruti, “Ama na Pathien mieshietna chawng kha iriei! Dawn a kungchangna rang, imaw nirangai u lai? Enro, tun ama Pathien mieshietna kha nangjet u joi!
40026066	Imaw nangmining uh?” Amani na rumashang uh, “Ama hi athi rang rutuk joi.”
40026067	Khashole amani na amai ah rumiechiei uh, khuttum le rushuk uh, khan eshen na khutmaja hai le ruben uh.
40026068	Amani na ruti uh, “Kieini dieng rophong roh, Aw Christa! Tu na inaben maw nih?”
40026069	Tun Peter na tolawng vai tieng rushuh. Khan nungak shok `khat na ama dieng va a ruti, “Nangawm Galilee Jesu kha le rurawtawp akhat nangnih.”
40026070	Inia amani kholok maikung khan rapha a ruti, “Imaw nangiriei kiei jet mi`ing.”
40026071	Khan ama na tolawng lam ah rushok phakhan, nupang shik `khat na rumuk a, khan ah awm hai dieng ruti, “Hi miring hiawm Nazareth Jesu le rurawtawp inih.”
40026072	Khan ama na raphatlam a chawngrurakham, “Miring hi kiei jet mi`ing.”
40026073	Khan awmbawt le ama dieng ah ading hai kha na ava ua Peter dieng ruti uh, “Diktak a nangawm amani kar a akhat nangnih, ajarla nang chawngriei na jawt mak.”
40026074	Khashole pumrobot a chawngrakhamlam a ruti, “Hi miring hi kiei jet mi`ing!” Khan relentak a arkhawng hawng khong joi.
40026075	Jesu na ama dieng iruriei chawng hai kha Peter na rumininghep joi, “Arkhawng na khong mala, kuchung a voithum nangrapha rangnih.” Khan ama na vai rushok a rie`ieklam a ruchap joi.
40027001	Jingkara thiempu ulien hai le miring hai shierulien kholok na Jesu kha thatna rang, rurashak u joi.
40027002	Khashole ama kha khop a ruchawi u joi, khan rampo Pontius Pilate dieng vak pek u joi.
40027003	Khashole ama kha iheng ua engshiet a iruthaw u kha ama rujor Judas na rumuk `le, mulung a shirna hawng niei, khan thiempu ulien hai le shierulien hai dieng dangka shawm `thum kha emele rushe joi.
40027004	Ama na ruti, “Kiei na jar boi thishen kinepekna u khan kiei munu kawthaw joi.” Inia amani na rumashang uh, “Makha kieini le ruirakaina imaw awm? Makha nang roiruputna keng joi!”
40027005	Riethiengmun khan dangka hai kha apai a rushe joi, khan nining a rui le vak rikhit joi.
40027006	Khan thiempu ulien hai kha na dangka hai kha rushar ua ruti uh, “Hihaihi nieibawmna ah tet rang a hi Dan nih naw nih, ajarla mahi thishen man inih.”
40027007	Khajarkhan shier hai kha le milak hai khumna rang, bekonpa loipuk `khat rawchawkna rang, rurawjawt u joi.
40027008	Khajarkhan makha loipuk kha Thishen Loimun, tia vonshe hin ti u lai.
40027009	Makha thiempulien Jeremiah dieng a irurieina kha hawng rupum inih. Hitihin ruriei, “Amani na dangka shawm `thum ruloi uh, makha Israel nai hai na ama rang a irumachat u aman kha inih.
40027010	Khatikhan PUMI na chawnginurupek kha ang a amani na bekonpa loipuk rang khan rupek u joi.”
40027011	Khan Jesu na rampopa maikung a ruding joi. Khan rampopa kha na ama dieng rawdawn a ruti, “Nang Jihudi hai Reng kha maw nangnih?” Khan Jesu na ama dieng rumashang, “Nangiti kha inih.”
40027012	Khan thiempu ulien hai le shierulien hai na ajar rupek u phakhan, ama na rumashang mak.
40027013	Khashole Pilate na ama dieng ruti, “Amani na nang chung a hidawr a kungachang u hi jet makche maw?”
40027014	Inia Jesu na chawng `khatshe rumashang mak. Makhan rampopa kha ajeng a shinrudawng pe joi.
40027015	Khan rampopa shena dungjuia, rohoi shung a mipui na imadan shurkhop miring `khat amani rang rumoshokngai.
40027016	Kha pha khan amani na Barabbas iti shurkhop miropoboi `khat runiei uh.
40027017	Khajarkhan amani na ruruchun u phakhan, Pilate na amani dieng rurawdawn, “Nangni rang tumaw nomoshok pe u ning? Barabbas maw, ninawkle Christa iti Jesu hi maw?”
40027018	Ajarla Jesu kha mukmakna jar a irupek u keng, iti kha ama na rujet.
40027019	Pilate na chawngshatna shutna khan rushuh phakhan, inkonu na hitihin chawng vak mawchawi a ruti, “Miring adik chung khan nang khut raw naw roh. Ajarla jangin ama jar a karamang a ajeng a kashaw.”
40027020	Inia Barabbas kha nik a Jesu kha thatna rang, thiempu ulien hai le shierulien hai na mipui kha rumawshawk uh.
40027021	Rampopa kha na amani dieng rurawdawn, “Idi kar hin tumaw nangni rang nomoshok pe u ning?” “Barabbas!” tia amani na rumashang uh.
40027022	Pilate na amani dieng ruti, “Khanitala Christa iti Jesu chung hin kiei na imaw thaw ning?” Kholok na “Cross ling ah that rosho!” tia rumashang uh.
40027023	Khan rampopa kha na ruti, “Ithaw maw, ashie imaw thaw joi?” Inia lieklawr a “Cross ling ah that rosho!” tia rura`ai uh.
40027024	Pilate na ih ruman ngamlai mak, inia kha ruhut a mi hai kha mohok ruput u joi. Ama na makha rumuk phakhan, tui ruloi a mipui maikung a ukhut rurushuk a ruti, “Mahi midikpa thishen jar hin kiei kajar awm mak. Mahi nang roiruputna u keng joi.”
40027025	Khashole mi kholok na ruti uh, “Ama thishen kha kuchung ua le kanai hai chung a cho rosho.”
40027026	Khashole Barabbas kha amani rang rumoshok pe joi. Khan Jesu kha rumejem shole, cross ling ah that rang rupek joi.
40027027	Khashole rampopa ramiring hai na Jesu kha Praetorium khan ruchawi ua ama kha rarup kholok na rurokochip joi.
40027028	Khan amani na ama pon kha rulik pe ua ponshen kha rurieshieimashak u joi.
40027029	Khashole riling renglukhum kha ruphan ua ulu ah rurukhumashak uh, khan rengshunshawraw kha ukhut chang tieng rumarak uh. Khan amani na amaikung a rukhuk rushun ua erawh a ruti uh, “Lawm roh, Jihudi hai Reng!”
40027030	Khan ama kha rumiechiei uh, khan rengshunshawraw kha ruloi pe ua ulu ah rujem uh.
40027031	Khan engshiet a ruthaw u shole, ama ah put ah ponshen kha ruthut pe ua ama ponlediertak kha rurieshieimashak u joi. Khan cross ah that rang, ruchawi u joi.
40027032	Khan amani na vak shok u le roroia, Simon iti Cyrene miring `khat vak muk ua ama kha ranak a ama cross kha ruruputmashak uh.
40027033	Khan Golgotha iti mun kha hawng shok u joi. Makha Luru Mun tina inih.
40027034	Hiei le reche ju kha nek rang rupek uh, khan ama na makha tuidan ruen phakhan, runeh jawt mak.
40027035	Khashole ama kha cross ling ah rumakhai u joi. Amani na vanmuk ruen ua ama ponledier hai kha rureshem uh. Makha thiempulien na iruriei kha hawng rupum inih: “Amani na koponledier hai kha amani kar a rushem uh, khan kopon rieshiei chung a vanmuk ruen uh.”
40027036	Makhan amani na rushuh ua ama kha rurung uh.
40027037	Ama lu chung khan jar ipekna u kha rumiejiek uh: MAHI JESU HI JIHUDI HAI RENG KHA INIH.
40027038	Minieisho miring pasha `di, akhat chang tieng, khan shik `khat, viei tieng, ama le cross ah rumakhai uh.
40027039	Iedieng ah shehawng hai na, amani lu nawklam a, ama kha rumieshiet uh.
40027040	Amani na ruti uh, “Riethiengmun shiet a ni `thum shung a mothoi rang a nang, nang nining a rashan roh! Nang Pathien Shapa kha nangnih a tu, cross ah put ah jong chum roh.”
40027041	Kha le ra`ang a, thiempu ulien hai na, danoja hai le khan shierulien hai le, engshiet a ruti uh,
40027042	“Ama na shik miring hai kha rushan, inia nining a tu rashan ngam mak. Ama hi Israel hai Reng kha nitjoiatu, cross ah put ah jong chumrieshie kieini na takashawn u rang kanih.
40027043	Ama na Pathien kha takarushawn. Pathien na adit joiatu, ama hi tun shan rosho, ajarla ama na ruti, ‘Kiei Pathien Shapa kha kanih.’ ”
40027044	Kha le ra`ang a, ama le cross ah irumakhai minieisho hai kha na`awm erawh a rubiek uh.
40027045	Khan nidan shawmlieidi ah put ah nidan `thumshe khan ram kholok rujing joi.
40027046	Khan nidan `thum dawr khan Jesu na he rashangtak a ra`ai a ruti, “Eli, Eli lama sabachthani?” Makhala “Kapathien, kapathien ijar a kiei hi ninamathan maw nih joi?” itina inih.
40027047	Khan ah ading eshen na makha rujet u phakhan, ruti uh, “Hi miring hi na Elijah kha ahai joi!”
40027048	Khan amani kar a akhat na pangrek a spongos vak loi a ju athur khan runawm pe, khan rawmaw mawr ah rukhop pe a nek rang rupek.
40027049	Eshen na ruti, “Bieh u naw roh, ama ashan rang, Elijah kha jong pe maw en u rawi.”
40027050	Jesu na takthar a he rashangtak a rura`ai a aratha kha rupek joi.
40027051	Khan enro, riethiengmun maikharpon kha chung ah put ah thoishe kha her `di a rether, khan nieinu hawng rawnawk a lungbiei hai kha rukek.
40027052	Khan thanmun hai kha rurawlawng a ruja miriethieng tampui pum hai kha rumothoi joi.
40027053	Amani na than ah put ah vak shok ua, ama thoiretna shole, khopui riethieng ah rushe ua mi tampui dieng rular u joi.
40027054	Khan Jesu arung ruawm rarajakhat lamkai, khan ama le ruawm hai kha na nieinu rawnawk le ashok chon hai kha rumuk u phakhan, ajeng a ruchih ua ruti uh, “Diktak a ama hi Pathien Shapa kha inih!”
40027055	Khan nupang tampui kha na ralaviei a enlam a ruawm uh. Amani kha Galilee ah put ah Jesu rujui a chon ruthaw pe hai kha runih uh.
40027056	Amani kar khan Mary Magdalene, James le Joses unu Mary, khan Zebedee shapa hai unu rujaw uh.
40027057	Ni hawng tah phakhan, Joseph iti Arimathea ah put ah rawchawng miring `khat na kha mun khan rushe. Ama kha`awm Jesu khaichawi `khat runih.
40027058	Ama na Pilate dieng rushe a Jesu rok kha vak nik. Khashole rok kha ama dieng pekna rang, Pilate na chawng rupek joi.
40027059	Khan Joseph na rok kha ruloi phakhan, thanpon achaining `khat le rujo joi.
40027060	Lung ah iver ama thanmun athar khan rumaja joi. Khan mawkawt khan lung alientak `khat le rukhar a rushe joi.
40027061	Khan Mary Magdalene le Mary shik `khat kha than mai kha le re`en mun khan rushuh uh.
40027062	Khan Rashamna Nikho shole, jing tieng hin, thiempu ulien hai le Pharisee hai na lawp `khat a Pilate dieng rushe uh.
40027063	Amani na ruti uh, “Mimohonpa kha na iringlai khan, ‘Ni `thum shole hawng thoi rang kanih,’ tia iruriei kha kimininghep uh.
40027064	Khajarkhan than kha ni `thumshe hin rephetna boi rang chawng peh roh. Khanawkatu akhaichawi hai na jan a va u ning, tia ama kha vak muruk u rangnih, khan amani na ‘Ama kha athi ah put ah thoi joi,’ tia miring hai dieng riei u rangnih. Khajarkhan dawngkhit a mimohonna kha arapanek a shiedet rangnih.”
40027065	Pilate na amani dieng ruti, “Ramiring nangniei uh, she u tana nangijet u dungjuia vak menet u roh.”
40027066	Khajarkhan amani na rushe ua lung kha jetnam vak nam uh, khan arung miding ua rumenet u joi.
40028001	Sabbath nikho theng shole, hapta shung a akhat changna nikho hawng shok le roroia, Mary Magdalene le Mary shik `khat na thanmun kha aen rushe uh.
40028002	Khan enro, nieinu lientak `khat rurawnawk, ajarla Pumi ravantir na ravan ah put ah jong chum, khan rushe a mawkawt ah put ah lung kha vak moloi, khan makha chung khan rushuh.
40028003	Ama alar kha khomelek ruang, khan ama ponledier kha vur ang a ruchek pe.
40028004	Khan mirung hai kha na ama kha ruchih ua rurawnawk uh, khan athi miring ruang uh.
40028005	Khan ravantir kha na nupang hai dieng mashang a ruti, “Chih u naw roh, ajarla cross ah iruthat u Jesu kha nangitawk u keng, iti kha kejet.
40028006	Ama kha hin awmlai mak. Ajarla, iruriei dungjuia, ama kha thoi joi. Va u roh, Pumi jana hi vak en u roh.
40028007	Khan relentak a she u tana, ama kha athi ah put ah thoi joi, tia akhaichawi hai dieng vak riei u roh. Khan enro, ama na Galilee ah nang matieng rushe joi; kha mun khan ama kha nangmuk u rangnih. Enro, kiei na nangni dieng kienieriei u joi.”
40028008	Khajarkhan amani na thanmun ah put ah, chih u joiawm, ningaitak a rurelen u joi. Khan akhaichawi hai dieng chawng kha vak rieina rang, rutan u joi.
40028009	Akhaichawi hai dieng ariei rushe u le roroia, enro, Jesu na amani kha rurumuk pui ua ruti, “Ningai u roh.” Khan amani na rushe uh, khan eke rumukui pe ua chubairubawk uh.
40028010	Khashole Jesu na amani dieng ruti, “Chih u naw roh, she u tana ku`uliennai hai kha Galilee ah shena rang le, kha mun khan rumuk puina rang, vak riei u rang roh. Makhan amani na kiei hi numuk u rangnih.”
40028011	Khan amani na rushe u lai khan, enro, mirung hai eshen na khopui ah rushe ua thiempu ulien hai dieng ashok chon kholok kha vak mejet u joi.
40028012	Khan amani na shierulien hai le vak ruchun ua chon rurashak uh. Amani na ramiring hai dieng shier tampui rupek ua
40028013	ruti uh, “ ‘Akhaichawi hai na jan a va ua, kaja riethiei u, vak muruk u joi,’ tia amani dieng riei u roh.
40028014	Mahi rampopa nokor shok joiawm, ama kha kieini na dawi a nerekhemashak u rang kanih.”
40028015	Khajarkhan amani na shier kha ruloi ua amani na iti u kha ruthaw uh. Khan mahi rishim hi vonshe hin Jihudi hai kar a rajar`er a rushem uh.
40028016	Khashole khaichawi shawmlieikhat kha na, Jesu na amani dieng a irukhin lawn khan shena rang, Galilee tieng rushe u joi.
40028017	Khan amani na ama kha rumuk u phakhan, chubairubawk uh. Inia eshen na tu rurakhana uh.
40028018	Khan Jesu na ava a amani dieng ruriei, “Ravan le rieliei shung ah cham kholok kha kiei dieng nepek joi.
40028019	Khajarkhan nangni she u tana phung rikip kha khaichawi vak minit u roh. Amani kha Apa, Shapa, khan Ratha Riethieng riming a baptisma vak moloi u roh.
40028020	Nangni dieng chawng kinepek u kholok kha juina rang, vak ruchuh u roh. Khan enro, kiei na nangni le ka`awmchak. Khan manmieshie mawtawrshe khan kiei na nangni kha nawawm pui u rang kanih.” Amen.
41001001	Mahi Pathien Shapa Jesu Christa athachawng putna kha inih.
41001002	Hitihin Thiempulien hai behangbuk ah rumiejiek: “Enro, chawngchawipa kha nang matieng kojongtir joi. Ama na nang maton ah lam nokon pe rangnih.”
41001003	“Ramthim ah hesho `khat na ra`ai, ‘PUMI lam kha kon pe roh. Ama lam hai kha moton pe roh.’ ”
41001004	John na ramthim a rular a mulung lek mumukna rang le Pathien dieng hiei a munu hai rangaidamna kha mukna rang, baptisma iloi u rang a inih, tia chawng rushem.
41001005	Khan Judea ram ah awm le Jerusalem ah awm mi kholok na ama dieng rushe uh. Makhan amani munu hai kha rurophong ua, Jordan tuidung khan amani kholok kha ama na baptisma rupek uh.
41001006	Khan John na sharingshiei sham kha rurieshiei, mevun kawngkhit kha rukhit, khan ama na khaishawr le ram khoining rushak.
41001007	Khan ama na ruriei, “Kanuk ah ajong rang a ama hi kieinek a ranak nieidet, kiei na bu a ama kethawp rui thut rang khan rutuk mi`ing.
41001008	Kiei na nangni kha tui ah baptisma kunurupek uh, inia ama na tu Ratha Riethieng le baptisma nepek u rangnih.”
41001009	Khalaikhan Jesu na Galilee ah awm Nazareth ah put ah rushe a, Jordan khan John na baptisma rumoloi joi.
41001010	Tui shung ah put ah hawng shokphit `le, ama na ravan rawlawng a Ratha na vashu ang a ama riding a jong chum kha rumuk.
41001011	Ravan ah put ah he `khat hi jong shok, “Numkipoktak kashapa kha nangnih, nang chung a ningnitna kha kieniei joi.”
41001012	Khan Ratha na ama kha ramthim ah ruchawirelen joi.
41001013	Makha ramthim khan ni shawm mili Satan na rulem a ramsha hai le ruawm. Khashole ravantir hai na ama chon kha jong thaw pe uh.
41001014	Khan John kha lungroko shung a rutet shole, Jesu na Galilee ah rushe a Pathien rengchangna athachawng kha rushem.
41001015	Ama na ruriei, “Apha kha hawng shun joi, Pathien rengchangna kha nai joi. Nang mulung lek u roh, khan athachawng kha takashawn u roh.”
41001016	Khan ama na Galilee Thampui pang kha rujotlai khan, Simon le anaipangpa Andrew na thampui ah len iruvawr u kha vak muk; ajarla amani kha ngashur miring runih uh.
41001017	Khan Jesu na amani dieng ruriei, “Kanu nujui u roh, kiei na nangni kha mishur miring namachang u rang kanih.”
41001018	Khajarkhan relentak a len hai kha mak ua anu rujui u joi.
41001019	Khan ama na rushebawt `le, Zebedee shapa James le anaipangpa John kha rokong shung ah len hai kha iruphawt ua ruawm u kha vak muk.
41001020	Relentak a amani kha rukoi. Khan apa u Zebedee kha shok moroi hai le rokong ah mak ua, anu rujui u joi.
41001021	Khan amani na Capernaum ah rushe a, relentak a Sabbath nikho hin ama na synagogue ah rulut a ruruchuk.
41001022	Ama miruchuh hai khan, shinrudawng pe uh, ajarla danoja hai kha ang boi a, chamnieitak a amani kha iruruchuk inih.
41001023	Ratha rono na ichutna miring `khat synagogue khan ruawm.
41001024	Ama na ra`ai a ruti, “Kieini hi ih lawt rang a nangiti maw nih, Aw Nazareth Jesu? Kieini hi mathang rang a va maw nangnih? Nang tu Pathien Miriethieng ama kha nangnih, iti hi kejet uh!”
41001025	Makhan Jesu na ama kha rawkawk a ruti, “Awmchien roh, ama shung ah put ah vak shok roh!”
41001026	Khan ratha rono kha na enchak a runawk a helehoi le ama shung ah put ah vak shok joi.
41001027	Makhan mi kholok na shindawngna runiei uh. Khajarkhan rawdawn nana ua ruti uh, “Mahi imaw nih? Ih miruchukna athar maw nih? Raikho rono haishe chamnieitak a chawngpek a amani na ama chawng kha jui pe uh.”
41001028	Khajarkhan Galilee ram ah awm miring kholok dieng ama riming kha rular perelen joi.
41001029	Khan synagogue ah put ah vak shokphit `le, James na John le roroia Simon le Andrew in ah rushe uh.
41001030	Simon tarpi kha raitun na tun a ruja a ruawm. Khajarkhan amani na relentak a Jesu dieng rumejet uh.
41001031	Khan ama kha rujawng a ama khut ah mukui a rumothoi. Khan raitun kha na relentak a rumathan a amani chon kha ruthaw pe joi.
41001032	Khan nitak a nilut pha khan, ana miring le raikho hai na ichutna miring hai kha ama dieng vak chawi uh.
41001033	Kha khopui shung ah awm mi hai kha na mawkawt kha lochip a ruruchun uh.
41001034	Khan rai shikshik le ana hai kha rumadam, khan raikho haiawm runawt. Raikho hai na achawng rang a kha rujawt pe mak, ajarla amani na ama kha rujet uh.
41001035	Khan jingkara varmuk hin ama na ruthoi a ramthim ah rushe, khan makha mun khan nikna runiei.
41001036	Khania Simon, khan ama le rawtawp hai na ama anu kha ruthir uh.
41001037	Khan rumuk u phakhan, ama dieng ruriei uh, “Mi kholok na nang kha natawk uh.”
41001038	Inia amani dieng ruriei, “Chawng keshemnathiei rang, aranai kho `khat ah she u rang rawi, ajarla hijarhin a ajong kanih.”
41001039	Khan Galilee shung kholok ah awm amani synagogue hai khan ama na chawng rushem, khan raikho hai kha runawt.
41001040	Makhan raithawnaw tawngpa kha na ama dieng rushe, rukhuk rushun, khan nik a ruti, “Nangjawt a tu, kiei hi nangnieriethieng ngam.”
41001041	Ama chung a lainatna runiei, khan Jesu na ukhut rushawn a rushit, khan ama dieng ruti, “Kajawt, riethieng kha nih rang roh.”
41001042	Ama na rurieisho le relentak a raithawnaw kha na ama kha rumathan joi.
41001043	Khan Jesu na khawktak a chawngruben a ama kha rumesherelen joi.
41001044	Khan ama dieng ruriei, “Riring roh, tute dieng riei naw roh. Inia thiempu dieng nang pumtak kha vak mumuk rang roh. Nang riethiengna jar a Moses na chawngirupek hai kha le vak rawthawi roh. Makha na amani dieng kungchangna kha nih rangnih.”
41001045	Khanikengta ama na rushe phakhan, ranaktak a chawng kha rophong vak put joi. Khajarkhan Jesu na malangsheng a khopui ah rulut ngamlai mak. Inia thimnabieng mun ah ruawm joi, khan shie rikip ah mi hai na ama dieng va uh.
41002001	Nikhothang shawtbawt `le Capernaum vak lutret phakhan, ama kha in `khat ah awm, iti kha rujet uh.
41002002	Relentak a mi tampui vak ruchun ua mawkawtshe khan mun rutawnglai mak. Makhan ama na amani dieng chawngruriei pe.
41002003	Makhan takthi miring `khat pasha mili na dawm a ama dieng vak chawi uh.
41002004	Inia mi rawphai jarkhan, ama kung ah vat pui ngam u lai mak. Khajarkhan inphu kha ama riding ah lik ua rurevengmashak uh, khan takthipa kha ajana kha le jong muchum uh.
41002005	Khan amani takashawn kha rumuk phakhan, Jesu na takthipa dieng ruti, “Shapa, nang munu hai kha arangaidam joi.”
41002006	Inia khakawt ah rushuh danoja hai kha na amani ningmuruk a rurawdawn nana uh,
41002007	“Ijar a hi miring hi na Pathien mieshietna chawngiriei maw nih? Pathien niboia tu na maw munu hi arangaidam ngam awm?”
41002008	Jesu na amani ningmuruk a khatikhan rawdawn nana u kha aratha a rujetrelen a, amani dieng ruti, “Ijar a hihaihi mulung a nangimining u maw nih?
41002009	Atakthipa dieng hin, ‘Nang munu hai kha arangaidam joi,’ iti ninawkle, ‘Thoi roh, khan nang jana kha chawi tana lawn rang roh,’ iti hi kar hin ih kha maw baidet?
41002010	Miring Shapa na rieliei chung a munu rangaidamna cham kha ieniei,” iti hi nangjetna u rang a inih, khan takthipa dieng ruti,
41002011	“Nang dieng kienieriei, thoi rang roh, khan nang jana kha loi tana nang in ah she rang roh.”
41002012	Khan relentak a ruthoi a ama jana kha lik a vanoi maikung a rushe joi. Mahin mi kholok kha shinrudawng pe uh, khan Pathien kha mulurlam a ruti uh, “Hi ang hi mulak u makmelai!”
41002013	Khashole thampui kawmchang tieng rusheret a mipui na ama dieng va uh, khan ama na amani kha ruruchuk.
41002014	Khan ashe le roroia, Alphaeus shapa Levi na khaichana pekna in ah rushuh kha vak muk. Jesu na ama dieng ruti, “Nujui roh.” Khan ama na ruthoi a anu kha rujui joi.
41002015	Khan hitihin ruawm, ama na Levi in ah rushulai khan, khaichana roshong hai le munu miring hai na`awm Jesu le khan akhaichawi hai le maicham ah rushuh ua bu runek uh. Ajarla anujui hai kha rurawp uh, khan amani na anu kha rujui uh.
41002016	Ama na munu miring hai le khaichana roshong hai le bu irunekshom kha Pharisee hai le danoja hai na vak muk u phakhan, akhaichawi hai dieng ruti uh, “Ijar a khaichana roshong hai le munu miring hai le nekleshak ishakshom maw nih?”
41002017	Khan Jesu na rujet a amani dieng ruti, “Adam miring hai na loipu rangai mak, inia ana hai na irangai inih. Midik hai kha akoi jong nih mi`ing, inia mulung lekna rang, munu miring hai kha akoi jong kanih.”
41002018	Khan John khaichawi hai le Pharisee hai na chamrarudoi uh. Khan amani na ama dieng va ua vak rawdawn uh, “John le Pharisee hai shok hai na chamradoi uh, inia ijar a nang khaichawi hai na idoi boi u maw nih?”
41002019	Makhan Jesu na amani dieng rumashang, “Moilawm hai kha na moipa kha le awm shung khan chamradoi u nih maw? Moipa kha le awmlailim tu chamradoi u naw nih.
41002020	Inia moipa kha amani ah put ah ichawina pe nikho hai kha hawng shok rangnih. Kha nikho hai khan amani na chamradoi u rangnih.
41002021	“Tu na`awm irikin boi pon `thar lek kha pon lui a chingai mak, khanitatu ibo `thar kha na hawng rikin ning, tia shiedet a chiet rangnih.
41002022	Khan tu na`awm alui mevun jukawk ah ju `thar thangai mak, tha joiatu, ju `thar kha na mevun jukawk lui kha khoi rangnih. Inia ju `thar kha mevun jukawk `thar ah thong rang a inih.”
41002023	Khan hitihin rushok, Sabbath nikho `khat hin Jesu na shangbiei hai kha rakan a rupang. Amani na rupang le roroia, akhaichawi hai na shangvui hai kha achin ruput uh.
41002024	Khan Pharisee hai na ama dieng ruti uh, “Enro, Sabbath nikho a ijar a amani na Dan nih boi ithaw u maw nih?”
41002025	Inia amani dieng ruriei, “David na irawtawp pui hai le ravat a vawnrucham pe pha a iruthaw:
