41002026	Abiathar na thiempu rashang ruthawlai khan, David na Pathien in ah rulut a, thiempu hai nih boi na shak rang Dan nih boi rawthawina tan kha irawtawp pui hai diengawm irupek a irushak kha nangni na rutelak u makche maw?”
41002027	Khan amani dieng ruti, “Sabbath nikho hi miring hai rang a ikon inih, inia miring hai hi Sabbath rang a ikon nimak.
41002028	Khajarkhan Miring Shapa kha Sabbath Pumi kha`awm inih.”
41003001	Khan ama na synagogue ah rulutret a makhan khutchar miring `khat ruawm.
41003002	Khan amani na ama jar pekna rang, Sabbath nikho khan madam maw, tia ruva uh.
41003003	Inia khutcharpa dieng ruti, “Akar hin vak ding roh.”
41003004	Khan amani dieng ruti, “Sabbath nikho hin atha thaw, ninawkle ashie thaw, ringkho shan, ninawkle ringkho mathang, ih kha maw Dan nidet?” Inia ruawmchien uh.
41003005	Makhan mulung hang le roroia, amani kha enroko ruthaw phakhan, amani mulung michimna u khan mulung jumna runiei. Khan anapa dieng ruti, “Nang khut kha vak shawn roh.” Khan ama na rushawn, khan ama khut kha shik `khat kha ang a rudam pe joi.
41003006	Khan Pharisee hai na nawtshun a rushok ua ama kha itia maw that rang, tia Herod miring hai kha le chawng vak rashak u joi.
41003007	Inia Jesu na akhaichawi hai le roroia thampui tieng rukir joi. Khan Galilee le Judea ah put ah mipui na rujui uh.
41003008	Jerusalem, Idumea, khan Jordan vara ah put ah, Tyre le Sidon ramroko ah awm mipui `khat na ama na iruthaw chon hai kha jet ua ama dieng rushe uh.
41003009	Khan mipui kha na ru`umna boi rang, ama rang rokong ashin `khat rashamna pe rang, akhaichawi hai dieng ruriei.
41003010	Ajarla khadawr a arawp hai kha irumadam inih. Khajarkhan raitawng hai kholok na shih rawng, tia ama dieng rurawshawn uh.
41003011	Khan raikho rono hai kha na ama kha rumuk u `le, bawklap a ra`ailam a ruti uh, “Nang hi Pathien Shapa kha nangnih.”
41003012	Khan amani na ama kha malarna boi rang, khawktak a chawngruben uh.
41003013	Tun Jesu na lawn ah ruhawng a ama na idit miring hai kha rukoi a ama dieng rushe uh.
41003014	Khashole ama le rawtawp rang le chawngshem tir rang,
41003015	khan chamniei a ana hai kha madamna rang le raikho hai kha nawtna rang, shawmlieidi kha rumadan joi.
41003016	Amani khala, ama na Peter iti rimingrothom irupekna Simon,
41003017	Zebedee shapa James le James anaipangpa John. Amani dieng Boanerges iti rimingrothom ama na rupek. Makha tina tu “Khomelek Shapa hai” tina inih.
41003018	Andrew, Philip, Bartholomew, Matthew, Thomas, Alphaeus shapa James, Thaddaeus, Canaan miring Simon,
41003019	khan ama rujor Judas Iscariot, hihaihi inih. Khan amani na in `khat ah rulut u joi
41003020	Khan mipui kha vak ruchunret ua amani kha tanshe rushah ngam u mak.
41003021	Khania ama inko hai na mahi rujet u `le, ashur rang rushe uh. Ajarla amani na ruti uh, “Ama kha vet joi.”
41003022	Khan Jerusalem ah put ah ajong danoja hai kha na ruti uh, “Ama dieng Beelzebul lut joi,” khan “Raikho hai reng ranak a raikho hai hi inawt inih.”
41003023	Khajarkhan amani kha rukoi a rangshim a ama na ruriei pe, “Iti a maw Satan na Satan kha nawt ngam nih?
41003024	Khan rengchangna `khat hi nining a reshen joiatu, makha rengchangna kha ding ngam naw nih.
41003025	Khan in `khat hi nining a reshen joiatu, makha in kha ding ngam naw nih.
41003026	Khan Satan na bibing a reshen joiatu, ama kha ding ngam naw nih, inia ama rang dawng kha nit pe rangnih.
41003027	Tute na miratpa in ah lut a, miratpa kha khopbak nawkatu, ienieinak hai kha ranak a ro pe ngam nawnih. Makha shole ama in kha ranak a aro pe rangnih.
41003028	Nangni dieng diktak a kinieriei u inih, miring hai munu kholok, khan amani na isho mimieshietna kholok kha arangaidam rangnih.
41003029	Inia Ratha Riethieng chung a mieshiet ama kha na rangaidamna kha niei mak, inia kumshawt chepna kha muk rangnih.”
41003030	Ajarla amani na “Ama shung a raikho rono awm pe,” ruti uh.
41003031	Khashole unu le anaipang hai kha va ua vai tieng dinglam a rungak uh, khan ama akoi mi rutir uh.
41003032	Mipui na ama kha ru`um uh. Khan ama dieng ruti uh, “Enro, nangnu le nang naipang hai na vai tieng natawk uh.”
41003033	Makhan mashang a amani dieng ruti, “Tu kha maw kunu ninawkle kanaipang hai?”
41003034	Ama na rokochip a rushuh hai kha enroko a ruti, “Enro, kunu le kanaipang hai kha hin awm!
41003035	Tunita`awm Pathien mulungmining athaw ama kha kunu, kanaipangnu, khan kanaipangpa kha inih.”
41004001	Khan ama na thampui kawmchang ah miruchuh ruputret. Makhan ama dieng mipui vak ruchun jarkhan, rokong `khat ah rushuh joi. Khalaikhan mipui kholok kha tu kawmchang ah ruawm uh.
41004002	Khan amani kha rangshim tampui le ruruchuk, khan iruchukna khan amani dieng ruti,
41004003	“Rangai u roh! Enro, muchi vawrpa kha na muchi vawr rushe.
41004004	Ama na iruvawr le roroia hitihin ruawm, eshen kha lamkaw ah ruchu, khan ravan a va hai na jong shar uh.
41004005	Eshen kha piei arawp awmna boi lung kar ah ruchu. Pieipak kha thuk boi jarkhan, makha na relentak a hawng kei.
41004006	Khania ni hawng sha phakhan hawng re`em, khan rujung loi boi jarkhan, makha rovoi.
41004007	Eshen na riling hai kar a ruchu, khan riling hai kha hawng lien dedet a makha hawng liep. Makha na ara rumoshok ngam mak.
41004008	Inia eshen kha pieipak thatna mun ah ruchu a ara rumoshok. Ara kha hawng rawp dedet a shawm `thum, shawm `ruk, khan rajakhat hawng nih.”
41004009	Khan amani dieng ruriei, “Rangaina rang a nokor aniei ama kha na rangai rosho!”
41004010	Khan Jesu kha thiente a ruawmlai khan, iedieng ah awm hai kha le khan akhaichawi shawmlieidi kha na rangshim chungchang khan rurawdawn uh.
41004011	Makhan amani dieng ruti, “Nangni dieng Pathien rengchangna chungchanga murukchawng kha jetna rang nurupek uh, inia vai tieng ah awm hai rang tu, rangshimrok a ipek inih.
41004012	Makhala, ‘Aen miring hai na enthiei, inia muh u mak. Rangai miring hai na rangaithiei, inia jet u mak. Khanitnawkatu, amani na mulung lek a rangaidam rumuk u rangnih joi.’ ”
41004013	Khan amani dieng ruti, “Hi rangshim hi nangijet boi u maw nih? Itia maw rangshim kholok hai hi jet u rawng?”
41004014	Muchi vawrpa kha na chawng kha awvawr.
41004015	Inia hihai miring hi lam kaw ah acho muchi hai kha inih: chawng kha vawr pe, inia rangai u phakhan, Satan na varelen a amani dieng a ivawr chawng kha loi pe.
41004016	Khan lung arawp chung ah ivawrna miring hai kha hihaihi inih: chawng kha rangai u phakhan, ningai le roroia loirelen uh.
41004017	Inia rujung loi u boi jarkhan, ring shawt u mak. Chawng jar a epshawna ninawkle shawrana hawng phakhan, keruthuirelen uh.
41004018	Khan hihai miring hai hi riling kar ah achu muchi hai kha inih. Amani na chawng kha rangai uh,
41004019	inia ringkho mulungdawngna, nieilelung lemna le shikshik chung a ditrekhena kha na chawng kha liep pe u jarkhan, ara boi kha chang uh.
41004020	Khania rieliei thatna ah ivawrna miring hai kha chawng rangai hai kha inih, ajarla irangai u chawng kha loi uh. Khajarkhan shawm `thum a, shawm `ruk a, khan arajah a ara kha moshok uh.”
41004021	Khan amani dieng ruriei, “Thaomiei kha tiengkum thoi ah ninawkle jakhang thoi ah itetngai boi nimak maw? Thaomiei shutna chung ah itetngai nimak maw?
41004022	Ajartu rophong boi rang rethe ih awm mak, khan avar ah avangir rang a rethe boi ih awm mak.
41004023	Tunita`awm rangaina rang a nokor aniei ama kha na rangai rosho.”
41004024	Khan amani dieng ruriei, “Nangni na nangijet u kha riring pui u roh. Nangni na dannangilak u kha nangni dieng danlak rangnih. Rangai hai nangni dieng nobo pe u rangnih.
41004025	Khan aniei ama dieng khan arawpdet kha pek rangnih. Inia aniei boi ama dieng khan inieidakshe kha`awm, ama ah put ah loi pe rangnih.”
41004026	Khan ama na ruriei, “Pathien rengchangna hi loipuk ah muchi ivawr miring kha le ra`ang inih.
41004027	Shun le jan a aja nit a, athoi nita`awm, muchi kha hawng kei a hawng rawshawn; inia itia maw nih, iti kha ama na jet mak.
41004028	Ajarla rieliei na nining a ara imoshok inih: rapapek a awdawn, dawn a uvui, khan dawn a vui shung ah uru hawng ship.
41004029	Khashole ara kha hawng min phakhan, kawite le i`at inih, ajarla rawkhawm pha kha hawng shok nih joi.”
41004030	Khan ama na ruriei, “Pathien rengchangna hi kieini na ih le maw ra`angmashak rang? Ninawkle, ih rangshim kha le maw mahi angriei rang?
41004031	Makha anchamru le ra`ang inih: pieipak chung ah vawr phakhan, rieliei a muchi kholok kar a ashindet inih.
41004032	Khania vawr phakhan, hawng kei, khan anshawbo kung kholok kar a aliendet kha hawng chang, khan abak lien hawng moshok. Khajarkhan ravan a va hai na ama rilip ah rubu konna uh.”
41004033	Khan amani dieng chawng kha rangshim tampui le amani na irangai thieituk a khatikhan ruriei pe.
41004034	Khan rangshim a niboia amani dieng ruriei pe mak. Khan ama khaichawitak hai dieng bing a rangshim kholok kha rumeler pe.
41004035	Khanikhan ni hawng tah phakhan, amani dieng ruti, “Kieini thampui shir `khat tieng khawn she u rang rawi.”
41004036	Khan amani na mirawp kha meshe shole, rokong shung ah ruawm kha ang a, ama kha rushe pui u joi. Khan rokong eshen haiawm iedieng ah ruawm.
41004037	Khan shur hawng thoi a tuilawm kha na rokong kha hawng jem a rokong ah tui hawng lut joi.
41004038	Inia Jesu na rokong kik `khat ah lukham thawir a ruja. Makhan amani na mothoi a ruti uh, “Oja, kathi u rang a hi nare u makche maw?”
41004039	Khan ama na hawng thoi a rithi kha rawkawk a thampui dieng ruti, “Renem roh, awmchien roh.” Makhan rithi rang kha bang a rurinim joi.
41004040	Khan amani dieng ruti, “Ijar a khadawrtak achih maw nangnih uh? Takashawn nanginiei boi u maw nih?”
41004041	Makhan amani kha ajeng a ruchih ua khatlekhat dieng ruriei uh, “Ih miringtak maw nih, rithi le thampuishe na`awm ama chawng irangai pe hi!”
41005001	Khan amani na thampui vara `khat ah awm Gadarenes ram ah va u joi.
41005002	Khan ama na rokong ah put ah vak shokphit `le, raikho rono alut miring `khat hi than ah put ah hawng shok rurawtawng puirelen.
41005003	Ama awmna kha thankung inih. Tute na ama kha thirakarui le khop ngam mak.
41005004	Ajarla shan hai, khan thirakarui hai kha le ama kha khop ua`awm, shan hai kha changhawt a thaw a thirakarui hai kha bawngbawng a irutet inih. Khan tute na`awm ama kha adek ngam ruawm mak.
41005005	Shunlejan a ama na thankung ah le maw chung ah enchak a rura`ai a, thiethien a ataksha kha lung le irit a ruawm jawnjai inih.
41005006	Khan ama na Jesu kha rakhat a rumuk phakhan, vak tan a ama kha chubai vak bawk.
41005007	Khan he rashangtak a ra`ai a ruti, “Rashangving Pathien Shapa, Aw Jesu, kiei hi ih nawlawt rang a nangiti maw nih? Kiei hi nangnawmawshawna boi rang, Pathien ban a kenengen.”
41005008	Ajarla ama dieng ruti, “Aw raikho rono, ama ah put ah vak shok rang roh!”
41005009	Khan Jesu na rurawdawn, “Nang riming imaw ti?” Ama na rumashang a ruti, “Kiriming tu Legion iti, ajarla kieini hi karawp uh.”
41005010	Khan amani kha makha ram shung ah put ah nawtna boi rang, ama kha enchak a irudawi inih.
41005011	Makha mopang hai dieng khan vawk hawi lientak `khat na shak shak a ruawm uh.
41005012	Khan raikho hai kha na runik a ruti uh, “Vawk hai dieng khawn lutnathiei rang, nitir u roh.”
41005013	Nawtshuntak a Jesu na rujawt pe, khan raikho rono hai kha vak shok ua vawk hai shung ah rulut u joi. Khan vawk hai kha rawkham ah shorshor a jong loi ua thampui ah rucho u joi, khan tui arah ua ruthisho u joi. Vawk hai kha bawp `di dawr runih uh.
41005014	Khan vawkroi hai kha na rutansho ua, makha khopui le kho shung khan chawng kha vak riei uh. Khan mi hai na ashok chon hai kha aen va uh.
41005015	Khan amani na Jesu dieng vatna u khan raikho na iruchutnapa, khan legion na irushurpa kha ponledier thaning a iruthaw a mulung ridiktak a rushuh a ruawm kha vak muk u `le, ruchih uh.
41005016	Khan raikho na iruchutna miringpa le vawk chung a ashok dan amuh hai na jirjar kha ava hai dieng ruriei uh.
41005017	Khan ram kha mathan a shokna rang ama dieng adawi ruput u joi.
41005018	Khan ama na rokong ah rulut phakhan, raikho na irushurpa kha na ama le rawlawpna rang, rudawi.
41005019	Inia Jesu na rujawt pe mak. Ama na ruti, “She tana nang inshung miring hai dieng Pumi na inuruthaw pe, khan lainatna inurutetna kha vak rophong rang roh.”
41005020	Khan Decapolis ah rushe a Jesu na ama dieng khadawr a chon iruthaw pe chungchanga rophong vak put joi. Khan mi kholok na shindawngna runiei uh.
41005021	Khan Jesu na vara `khat tieng rokong a rakanthep phakhan, thampui kawmchang ah ruawm joi. Makhan mirawp lientak `khat na ama dieng vak ruchun uh.
41005022	Khan enro, Jairus iti synagogue lamkai hai kar a akhat na ama dieng rushe. Ama na Jesu kha rumuk phakhan, ekekung a rubawklap.
41005023	Khan ama dieng enchak a inik a ruti, “Kashanu ashin kha athi rang rasham joi. Ama damna rang, navat pe tana nang khut hai kha le navakshit pe roh, khan ama kha madam a ringna muk rangnih.”
41005024	Khan Jesu na ama le rawtawp a rushe joi. Khan mirawp kha na anu rujui ua ru`um uh.
41005025	Khan kum shawmlieidi thijanrai tawng nupang `khat ruawm.
41005026	Khan ama hi loipu hai dieng rure`en a shawna rudawi, ajarla inieilim mehekviek a rure`enawm, runemna mak a adam ruhut a rushie shishit inih.
41005027	Jesu jar kha rujet phakhan, mipui kar a vak lut a ama na irieshiei pon kha vak shit pe.
41005028	Ajarla ama na ruti, “Irieshiei pontak a kha`awm kishit pe a tu, kiei kadam rangnih.”
41005029	Kha phatak khan, ama thishen ajan kha ruchat pe joi. Khan ama na natna ah put ah adam kha upumtak a rujet joi.
41005030	Khan Jesu na nining a ama ah put ah ranak she joi, iti rujet jarkhan, mipui kar a hieirelen a ruti, “Kirieshiei pon hi tu na inishit pe maw nih?”
41005031	Makhan akhaichawi hai na ama dieng ruti, “Mirawp hituk hi na inaum kar hin ‘Tu na kiei hi inishit maw nih?’ nangti.”
41005032	Khan ama ashinu kha mukna rang, enruroko joi.
41005033	Inia nupangnu kha na atak chung a ashok hai kha rujet a ichihai a rawnawklam a amaikung a bawklap a adik kha ruriei joi.
41005034	Khan ama dieng ruti, “Shanu, nang takashawn kha na nang kha namadam joi, damveng a she rang roh. Khan nang natna ah put ah dam rang roh.”
41005035	Khatikhan Jesu na roirurieilai khan, synagogue lamkaipa in ah put ah mi eshen va ua ama dieng thang vak koi uh, “Nang shanu kha thi joi, Ojapa kha ashawt a nangimawshaw maw nilai?”
41005036	Inia Jesu na amani riebiekna kha jetphit `le, synagogue lamkaipa dieng khan ruriei, “Chih naw roh, ringte ringrep roh.”
41005037	Khan Peter, James, khan James naipangpa John, hihailim hi niboia, tute na irawtawp pui rang kha rujawtlai mak.
41005038	Khan amani na synagogue lamkaipa in kha rushok u `le, rie`ieklam a le murungmurung a ruchap u kha ama na vak muk.
41005039	Khan ama na in ah rulut a amani dieng ruti, “Ithaw reshereshe a chap maw nangnih uh? Naitenu hi athi nimak, inia amiei keng.”
41005040	Inia amani na ama kha rumunui uh. Makhan ama na amani kha vairumoshokviek a, naitenu nulepa, khan ama le rawtawp hai kha ruchawi a naitenu jana mun khan rulut joi.
41005041	Khan naitenu kha ukhut le rudawm a ama dieng rubiek, “Talitha cumi.” Mahi “Naitenu, kieina kieniebiek, thoi rang roh,” tina inih.
41005042	Kha phatak khan, naitenu kha othoi a hawng lawn joi, ajarla ama kha kum shawmlieidi runih joi. Khajarkhan amani kha shindawngna chung a shinrudawng pe uh.
41005043	Khan tute na hihaihi jetna boi rang, ama na chawngruben joi, khan naitenu kha nekleshak pekna rang, amani dieng ruriei pe joi.
41006001	Khan makha mun kha mak a ama kho tieng rushe joi, khan akhaichawi hai na ama kha rujui uh.
41006002	Khan Sabbath nikho hawng nih phakhan, synagogue ah miruchuh ruput. Rangai mi tampui kha shinrudawng pe ua amani na ruti uh, “Hi miring hi na hihaihi khoshekawt a imuk maw nih? Khan ama dieng a ipek shingna hai le ama khuttak le ranakniei chon hai ithaw hi imaw nih?
41006003	Mahi James le Joses, khan Juda le Simon ulienpa, Mariam shapa, thingthiempa kha nimak maw? Khan ashar hai hi hin kieini le awm nimak maw?” Hitihin ama kha rurakhana uh.
41006004	Khan Jesu na amani dieng ruriei, “Thiempulien `khat hi ama khotak, ama inkoshangramtak le ama inshungkhurtak dieng niboia, richit kha imuk boi nimak.”
41006005	Khan kha mun khan, ana dikhat chung ah ukhut le shit a irumadam kha niboia, ranakniei chon `khatshe ruthawlai mak.
41006006	Khan amani takashawn boi khan shinrudawng pe. Khan khokho ah miruchuh rang rushe joi.
41006007	Khan ama na shawmlieidi kha rukoi a raikho rono hai kha nawtna rang, cham kha rupek a ididi a rawtawpmashak a atir ruput joi.
41006008	Ama na amani dieng chawng rupek, makhala khomijin nangshena u khan shunshawraw `khat niboia, nekleshak, pai, khan kawngkhit a shier chawi u naw roh.
41006009	Khan kethawp thaw u roh, khan kotai idi ko u naw roh.
41006010	Khan amani dieng ruriei, “Nanglutna ih in khan nita`awm, makha mun ah put ah nangrawthawt u malalim, kha mun khan awm u roh.
41006011	Makhan mi hai na nangni kha thaning a nurujawng u nawk a, khan nangiriei u kha narangai pe u nawkatu, makha nangmathan a nangshe dieng u khan, amani chung a kungchangna rang, nang kepha u thoi ah vaiphin kha khawng u roh. Nangni dieng diktak a kinieriei u inih, chawngshatna Nikho khan, makha khopui rangnek hin Sodom le Gomorrah rang a kha doithieidet chang rangnih!”
41006012	Khan mi hai na mulung lekna rang, amani na rushe ua chawng vak shem uh.
41006013	Khan raikho tampui runawt pe uh, khan ana hai tampui kha thaorunawt pe ua rumadam uh.
41006014	Khan Jesu riming kha ajeng a rular jarkhan, Herod reng na rujet a ruti, “Baptisma apeh John hi athi hai kar a hawng thoi joi. Hijarhin a ranakniei chon hai hi ithaw inih.”
41006015	Eshen na ama kha “Elijah keng,” ruti uh, inia eshen na tu ama kha “Thiempulien `khat, ninawkle thiempulien hai le ra`ang akhat inih,” ruti uh.
41006016	Herod na rujet `le, ruti, “Kiei na ring kitan pe John kha hawng ring joi!”
41006017	Ajarla Herod amatak na ama ulienpa Philip nupuinu Herodia kha iruniei inih. Khajarkhan John kha irushur, khan lungroko shung ah khop a irutet inih.
41006018	Ajarla John na Herod dieng ruti, “Nang ulienpa nupuinu nangiloi hi Dan nimak.”
41006019	Mahi jar hin, Herodia na rumukmak a ama kha thatna rang, rumining; inia ama na ruthaw ngam mak.
41006020	Ajarla Herod na John kha midik le miriethieng, iti rujet jarkhan, ruchih a ama kha irurung inih. Khan John na iruthaw tampui kha rujet `le, ningaitak a rurangai.
41006021	Khan chanthatna nikho `khat hawng shok joi, makhala Herod shokna nikho hin chamniei hai, chonpo hai, ramiring tieng a alien hai le Galilee tieng ah alienarang hai rang bumichinna `khat runiei.
41006022	Hipha hin Herodia shanu hawng lut a hawng lam. Herod le ama dieng ah buneh rang a ashuh hai kha ningruminit pe. Rengpa kha na nungaknu dieng ruti, “Nangiditlim kha nieriei roh, makha kiei na nepek rang kanih.”
41006023	Khan ama dieng chawngrurakham, “Ih kha nita`awm nieriei roh, kerengchangna khoi `khat nita`awm, nang dieng nepek rang kanih.”
41006024	Khan ama na rushe a unu dieng vak rawdawn, “Kiei na imaw nih ning?” “Baptisma apeh John lu,” tia unu na rumashang.
41006025	Khan ama na rengpa dieng pangrek a vak nik a ruti, “Tuntak hin baptisma apeh John lu kha rangmai chung hin nanginepek rang a hi kadit.”
41006026	Makhan rengpa kha ajeng a mulungrushaw pe. Inia ama chawngrakham le iedieng ah ishut pui koimiring hai jarkhan, jawt pe boi, iti ruthawlai mak.
41006027	Khan rengpa kha na relentak a mimahangpa kha vak mokoi a ama lu kha vak chawina rang, chawng rupek joi. Khan ama na rushe a lungroko shung ah awm John kha ring vak tuk pe joi.
41006028	Kheng `khat ah John lu kha vak chawi a nungaknu dieng vak pek a nungaknu kha na makha unu dieng rupek joi.
41006029	Khan John khaichawi hai na rujet u phakhan, rushe ua ama rok kha vak loi uh, khan than ah makha vak khum u joi.
41006030	Khan tirtawn hai kha na Jesu dieng vak ruchun ua iruthaw u le iruruchuk u kholok chungchanga thangrukoi uh.
41006031	Khan amani dieng ruti, “Thawh, nangni richinkhat ramthimna mun ah shik a shawvakmuchum u roh.” Ajarla mi tampui shehawng a awm jarkhan, bu nekna rangshe chanthatna runiei u lai mak.
41006032	Khajarkhan lawpte u hin ramthimna mun ah rokong a rushe u joi.
41006033	Khan amani rushe u kha mirawp na rumuk uh. Khan mipui kha na rujet u jarkhan, khopui rikip miring hai kha na vak tan ua matieng rushok uh, khan ama dieng lawp `khat a vak ruchun u joi.
41006034	Makhan Jesu na kawmchang tieng hawng phakhan, mirawp kha vak muk `le, kengamroi awm boi kengam hai kha ruang u jarkhan, amani chung a lainatna runiei. Khajarkhan amani kha chonmun-lamun tampui ruchuh ruput joi.
41006035	Khan nikhothang shawtbawt `le, akhaichawi hai na ama dieng she a ruti uh, “Mahi mun hi ramthim inih, khan apha`awm shemeng joi.
41006036	Amani hi diengvai ah awm khopui le kho hai dieng tan vak rawchawkna u rang, tir rang roh. Ajarla nekleshak `khatshe niei u lai mak.”
41006037	Makhan mashang a amani dieng ruti, “Amani kha shak rang dikhat peh u roh.” Makhan amani na rumashang uh, “Kieini na she a dinari rajadi a tan vak rawchawk a amani dieng kipek u rang maw nih?”
41006038	Makhan amani dieng rumashang, “Nangni na tanpek ijat maw nangniei uh? She u tana vak en u roh.” Khan amani na rujet ua ruti uh, “Tanpek rahnga le nga idi awm.”
41006039	Khan kholok kha lawplawp a champi chung ah mushutna rang, amani dieng chawng rupek joi.
41006040	Khan amani na hawi rajakhat a le hawi shawm rahnga a lawplawp a rushuh u joi.
41006041	Khan ama na tanpek rahnga le nga idi kha loi a ravan tieng en a rahvan runik. Khan tan hai kha okhoi a amani dieng shemna rang, akhaichawi hai dieng rupek. Khan nga idi kha vanoi dieng ama na rushemviek joi.
41006042	Khan amani kholok na rushak ua vawn ruship pe uh.
41006043	Khan lekvai le nga hai kha tiengkum shawmlieidi shipmer a rurawkhawm uh.
41006044	Aneh-ashah apa hai kha bawp rahnga runih uh.
41006045	Khan mipui kha rureshen pui laitak khan, akhaichawi hai kha thampui shir `khat ah awm Bethsaida tieng rokong a rurelenmashak joi.
41006046	Khan amani kha le mathanna chawngruriei shole, anih rang lawn tieng ruhawng joi.
41006047	Khan nitak pha hawng shok `le, rokong kha thampui laitak ah ruawm joi, inia ama tu, mo khan iethien a ruawmlai.
41006048	Khan rithi na maton khar a rang jarkhan, amani shawna kha rumuk pe. Khan voimili changna vengpa pha khan, thampui chung ah vak lawn a amani dieng rushe a amani kha khe rang ruthaw.
41006049	Khan tui chung ah vak lawn kha amani na rumuk u `le, rathamieshie keng ti ua amani na rura`ai uh.
41006050	Ajarla amani kholok na ama kha muk u `le, rurawthawk uh. Relentak a amani le riebieh a ruriei, “Nang mulung mangar u roh! Kiei kanih keng; chih u naw roh.”
41006051	Khan amani awmna rokong khan, hawng ka a rithi kha rubang joi, khan ibibing ua rekhenna awm boi a shinrudawng pe uh.
41006052	Ajarla amani mulung rumichim pe u joi jarkhan, amani na tanpek chungchanga chonshok khan, shingna ruman u mak.
41006053	Khan amani na rurakan ua Gennesaret ram kha vak shok u joi. Khan rokong kha makha kawmchang khan ruthung uh.
41006054	Rokong ah put ah ruchumphit u `le, mi hai na ama me kha rujetrelen uh.
41006055	Khan akieiakiei ah rutan ua amani na ama awm, tina mun khan, ana hai kha jana le dawmlam a vak chawi uh.
41006056	Khan ama lutnalutna: kho ah nit a, khopui ah nit a, inleloi mun ah nita`awm, ana hai kha rievieithawna mun a rutet uh. Ama pon rieshiei mawrtaka kha nita`awm mishitna rang, ama dieng runik uh. Khan ponmawr ashih miring rikip kha irumadam inih.
41007001	Khan Pharisee hai le khan Jerusalem ah put ah ajong danoja hai eshen na va ua ama dieng vak ruchun uh.
41007002	Khan akhaichawi hai eshen na ronolam a, makhala khut rushuk boi a, tan irushak u kha vak muk u `le, Jesu dieng jar rupek uh.
41007003	Ajarla Pharisee le Jihudi hai kholok na pipu shedan hai kha rung ua, khut hai kha khinniei a rushuk u nawkatu, shak shah u mak.
41007004	Khan rievieithawna ah put ah va u `le, riethieng u joi nawkatu, bu neh u mak. Hi nih boi irumuk ua irushena u tampui awmlai, makhala, hai, haikiek, bube, khan jakhang riethiengmashak hai hi inih.
41007005	Khan Pharisee hai le danoja hai na Jesu dieng rurawdawn uh, “Nang khaichawi hai na pipu hai shedan kha jui boi a, ijar a khut hai kha rushuk boi a tan ishak u maw nih?”
41007006	Makhan ama na mashang a ruti, “Thanunchan thaw hai, nang jar ua Isaiah na thatak a rurophong a hitihin rumiejiek, ‘Hihai miring hi na amani ner a richit nepek uh, inia amani mulung tu kiei ah put ah rala pe uh.
41007007	Nemna boi a kiei hi chubainabawk uh. Miring hai chawngpek hai kha danpui a ruchuk uh.’
41007008	Ajarla nangni na Pathien chawngpek kha nangheng ua mi hai shena kha nangjui uh, makhala, haikiek rushuk, hai rushuk, khan hi ang tampui nangruthaw uh.”
41007009	Khan amani dieng ruti, “Nangni na nang shena u kha miringna rang, Pathien chawngpek kha thatak a nangheng uh.
41007010	Ajarla Moses na ruti, ‘Nangnu le nangpa kha richit peh roh,’ khan ‘Tukhat na unu ninawkle apa kha pumabot a tu, ama kha thitna niei rosho.’
41007011	Inia nangni na nangti uh, ‘Mi `khat na apa dieng ninawkle unu dieng “Ih kha nita`awm kiei dieng a nanginemna kha Corban inih” ’ (makhala Pathien dieng a pek khutchawi tina inih).
41007012	Nangni na unu ninawkle apa dieng a thawphawm shok kha dawnshe a thaw rang a kha jawt pe u makche.
41007013	Hitihin rongrong a khut nangirurotho u shedan jar a Pathien chawng kha nemna boi nangmachang uh. Khan kha ang tampui kha nangthaw uh.”
41007014	Khan mipui kha iedieng ah koiret a ama na ruriei, “Mi kholok na narangai u tana jet u roh:
41007015	Miring shung ah alut vai tieng a nieinak kha na miring hai kha ronomashak ngam naw nih, inia miring shung ah hawng shok hai kha na miring kha ironomashak inih.
41007016	Tunita`awm rangaina rang a nokor aniei ama kha na rangai rosho!”
41007017	Khan mipui ah put ah in rulut phakhan, akhaichawi hai kha na rangshim jar kha ama dieng rurawdawn uh.
41007018	Khajarkhan amani dieng ruti, “Nangniawm makha jet u makche maw? Vai tieng ah put ah miring shung ah alut ih kha na ama kha ronomashak ngam mak.
41007019	Ajarla mahi na ama mulung ah lut mak, inia ama bukawk ah lut a, khan ah put ah vai ashok inih. Khatikhan nekleshak kholok kha iriethiengmashak inih, iti hi jet u makche maw?”
41007020	Khania ama na ruriei, “Miring shung ah put ah hawng shok kha na mi kha ironomashak inih.
41007021	Ajarla shung ah put ah, nititu miring mulung ah put ah hihaihi hawng shok inih: mining shie, uire, rejai, mithat,
41007022	murushah, manarshie, chon shie, milem, rejaikawk, mikturniei, mimieshiet, lienrasha le mawngna, hihaihi inih.
41007023	Hihai kholok hi shung rieirit ah hawng shok miring ironomashak chon shie hai kha inih.”
41007024	Khashole makha mun ah put ah Jesu na thoi a Tyre le Sidon ram tieng rushe joi. Ama na in `khat ah rulut kha tute dieng rumejet jawt mak, inia ama kha rurethe ngam mak.
41007025	Ajarla raikho rono aniei shanu `khat unu na Jesu jar kha rujet `le, varelen a ama kekung a vak bu.
41007026	Nupangnu kha Syria ram ah awm Phoenicia kho ah shok, Greek miring `khat runih. Ashanu shung a awm raikho kha nawtna rang, ama dieng nik a ruawm.
41007027	Khania Jesu na ama dieng ruti, “Naite hai hi na matieng vawn mishipbak rosho, ajarla naite hai tan kha loi a ui hai dieng vawr rang a hi atha nimak.”
41007028	Khan Jesu dieng ruti, “Idik`het, Pumi, naite hai burama mocho haishe khala tebol thoi ah awm ui hai na ishak inih.”
41007029	Khan ama dieng ruti, “Hi chawng mashang jar hin she rang roh, raikho rono kha nang shanu ah put ah shok joi.”
41007030	Khan ama na in rushok phakhan, ama kha raikho na irumathan a jakhang ah ruja a ruawm kha vak muk joi.
41007031	Khashole ama na Tyre le Sidon kha rumathan a Decapolis ram kha rakan a Galilee Thampui kha rushok joi.
41007032	Makhan nokorshet le chawngra`ak miring `khat ama dieng vak chawi uh. Khan ama chung a Jesu na khut atetna pe rang, amani na runik uh.
41007033	Khan ama na mi hai kar ah put ah ruchawi a ama nokor dire khan ukhut lawi ruraw pe, khan rumiechiei a iemiechiei kha ama mieliei khan runawt pe.
41007034	Khan ravan tieng en a ruphuher a ama dieng ruti, “Ephphatha.” Mahi “Rawlawng kha nih roh,” tina inih.
41007035	Khan relentak a ama nokor dire kha rawlawng pe joi, khan iemieliei akhop pe arang kha ruthut pe a, thaning a ruchawng ngam joi.
41007036	Khan tute dieng rieina boi rang, chawngruben joi, inia amani dieng chawngibie dawrthep kha khea mi hai dieng rurophong u joi.
41007037	Khan amani na rieingamboi a shindawngna niei a ruti uh, “Ama na irikip thaning a thaw. Ama na nokorshet hai kha irangaimashak, khan chawngthieiboi hai kha imawchawng inih.”
41008001	Khalai a nikho `khat hin mi tampui ruawm a nekleshak runiei boi u phakhan, Jesu na akhaichawi hai kha rukoi a amani dieng ruti,
41008002	“Kiei na mipui dieng hin lainatna kieniei joi, ajarla kiei le rawtawpna u hi ni `thum nih joi, inia iawm shah u lai mak.
41008003	Kiei na vawnchamlam a in ah kemeshe joiatu, lam ah shawramathiei uh, ajarla eshen hai hi alatak ah put ah ava u inih.”
41008004	Inia akhaichawi hai na ama dieng rumashang uh, “Hi ramthim hin tu `khat na iti a tan le ivai ngam rang a maw nih?”
41008005	Khan amani dieng rurawdawn, “Tanpek ijat maw nangniei uh?” Amani na rumashang uh, “Shiri.”
41008006	Khan mi hai kha pieipak chung ah shutna rang, chawng rupek. Khan tan shiri kha ruloi, khan mapakna runiei a rukhoi. Khan mipui dieng machangna rang, akhaichawi hai dieng rupek a akhaichawi hai kha na mipui dieng rumachang uh.
41008007	Khan amani na nga rimi lekteawm runiei uh. Makha Jesu na rahvan rupek shole, khahaikha`awm shemna rang, amani dieng ruti.
41008008	Khatikhan amani na rushak ua vawn ruship pe uh. Khan aliemlim tanpek hai kha lawngkai shiri shipmer rurawkhawm uh.
41008009	Aneh-ashah hai kha bawp mili dawr runih uh. Khashole ama na amani kha rumeshe u joi.
41008010	Khan nawtshuntak a akhaichawi hai le rokong ah rulut a Dalmanutha ram tieng rushe joi.
41008011	Makhan Pharisee hai kha va ua ama le chawngrieshiet vak put uh. Ajarla ama kha enretena rang, ravan ah put ah ama dieng jetna kha rudit uh.
41008012	Khan ama na ratha ruphuher a ruriei, “Ijar a tun a rong hai hi na jetna itawk u maw nih? Diktak a nangni dieng kiriei inih, tun a rong dieng hin jetna shukpeh a pelai naw nih.”
41008013	Khan amani kha rumathan shole, rokong ah rulut a vara `khat tieng rushe joi.
41008014	Khan amani na nekleshak chawi rang rumieniei uh, khajarkhan tan `khatte niboia, rokong shung khan ih runiei u mak.
41008015	Amani dieng chawng pek a ruriei, “Enro, Pharisee hai le Herod chawh kha riring pui u roh.”
41008016	Khan amani na “Tan nieniei boi u jar a maw nih,” tia amani kar a rawdawn nana a ruti.
41008017	Khan Jesu na makha rujet jarkhan, amani dieng ruti, “Tan nangniei boi u jarkhan, ih rang a nangireshe u maw nih? Nangni na nangimuk u ninawkle nangijet boi u maw nilai? Nang mulungmichim u maw nilai?
41008018	Mik la nangniei uh, inia nangimuk boi u maw nih? Nokor la nangniei uh, inia nangirangai boi u maw nih? Khan nangimininghep boi u maw nih?
41008019	Kiei na miring bawp rahnga rang tanpek rahnga kurukhoilai khan, aliemlim lekvai kha tiengkum shipmer ijat maw nangrushar uh?” Amani na rumashang uh, “Shawmlieidi.”
41008020	“Khan miring bawp mili rang tanpek shiri kurukhoilai khan, aliemlim lekvai kha lawngkai shipmer ijat maw nangrushar uh?” Amani na rumashang uh, “Shiri.”
41008021	Khan amani dieng ruriei, “Makha itia anih maw nih, iti kha nangijet boi u maw nilai?”
41008022	Khashole ama na Bethsaida ah rushe, khan amani na mikchaw `khat hi ama dieng vak chawi uh. Khan Jesu na shitna pe rang rudawi uh.
41008023	Khan ama na mikchawpa khut kha rujum pe. Khan ama kha kho ah put ah vai rushok pui. Khan imik kha ama na rumiechiei pe, khan ukhut atet pe a ama dieng ih `khat maw nangmuk, tia rurawdawn.
41008024	Khan ama na khonga a rumashang, “Kiei na miring hai hi thingkung alawn ang a kumuk.”
41008025	Khashole ama khut le miringpa mik hai kha rushit pe a chung tieng rume`en. Ama mik kha hawng kir pe joi, khan ih kholok kha riethienghiei a rumuk joi.
41008026	Khan ama na ama in tieng rumeshe a ruti, “Nang na kho khawnawm lutlai naw roh, khan khoshung a tute diengawm vak rieilai naw roh.”
41008027	Khan Jesu na akhaichawi hai le Caesarea Philippi kho tieng rushe, khan ama na akhaichawi hai dieng rawdawn a ruti, “Miring hai na kiei hi tumaw niti uh?”
41008028	Khan amani na rumashang, “Baptisma apeh John, eshen na Elijah, khan eshen na thiempulien hai kar a akhat keng niti uh.”
41008029	Khan amani dieng rurawdawn, “Nangni na la kiei hi tumaw nangniti uh?” Makhan Peter na mashang a ruti, “Nang hi Christa kha nangnih.”
41008030	Khan ama jar a tute dieng rieina boi rang, amani dieng chawng ruben joi.
41008031	Khan akhaichawi hai kha ruchuk ruput, makhala Miring Shapa na chonmun tampui chung a shawna doingir rangnih. Shierulien hai, thiempu rashang hai, khan danoja hai na aheng u rangnih. Miring hai na that u rangnih, khan ni `thum shole, hawng thoi rangnih.
41008032	Hihai chawng hi rophongleng a ruriei pe uh. Khashole Peter na ama kha mun `khat a ruchawi a rawkawk ruput.
41008033	Inia ama na vak hiei le akhaichawi hai kha ruen a Peter kha rurachai, “Kiei ah put ah rechen roh, Aw Satan! Ajarla nang imining kha miring mulungmining inih, Pathien mulungmining nimak.”
41008034	Khan ama na akhaichawi hai kha le roroia, mipui kha ama dieng okoi a ruriei, “Tunita`awm kanu nujui jawt joiatu, amarilik chungchanga rapha rosho, khan ama cross kha loi rieshie nujui rosho.
41008035	Ajarla tunita`awm iringkho ashan jawt kha na makha mathang rangnih, inia tunita`awm kajar a le athachawng jar a iringkho mathang a tu, iringkho kha shan rangnih.
41008036	Ajarla mi `khat na manmieshie kholok hi utum a, ama ringphuktak kha mathang joiala, imaw nemna nih?
41008037	Ninawkle, miring `khat na ama ringphuk kha le rotho rang imaw peh nih?
41008038	Ajarla tunita`awm, mahi uire munuphung rong shung hin, kajar a le kawchawng hai jar a jakna niei a tu, Miring Shapa kha na`awm, Apa lurna khan ravantir riethieng hai le jong phakhan, jak pui rangnih.”
41009001	Khan amani dieng ruti, “Diktak a nangni dieng kiriei inih, makhala hin ah ading miring eshen hi na Pathien rengchangna kha na ranak le ajong kha muk u masheng, thitna tuidan kha en u naw nih.”
41009002	Khan ni `ruk shole, Jesu na Peter, James, khan John hai kha lawn rashang `khat ah lawp `khat a ruhawng pui a amani maikung a merurelek.
41009003	Ama ponledier hai kha varlang a ruawm pe. Avar dan kha rieliei shung a jitho hai na amani ang a mechek ngam naw nih.
41009004	Makhan Elijah na Moses le amani dieng rular a Jesu le ruriebieh uh.
41009005	Khan Peter na Jesu dieng ruti, “Rabbi, kieini na hin na`awm u hi atha, thamber `thum rashak u rawi: nang rang akhat, Moses rang akhat, khan Elijah rang akhat.”
41009006	Ajarla ama na riei rang rujet mak, ajarla amani kha ajeng a ruchih uh.
41009007	Khan amani kha romiei na jong buk uh, khan romiei ah put ah he `khat jong a ruti, “Mahi numkipoktak kashapa kha inih, ama chawng kha rangai u roh.”
41009008	Khan amani na relentak a enruroko phakhan, tute rumuh u lai mak, inia Jesu rang a kha amani le ruawm joi.
41009009	Lawn ah put ah jong chum u le roroia, amani na irumuk u hai kholok kha, Miring Shapa kha na athi ah put ah hawng thoi masheng, tute dieng rieina boi rang chawng rupek joi.
41009010	Khan amani na chawng shok hai kha ruip ua, athi ah put ah hawng ringret, iti hi ih tina maw nih, tia manilemani dieng rurawdawn uh.
41009011	Khan ama dieng rurawdawn uh, “Khanitala ijar a Elijah kha matieng jong rangnih, tia danoja hai na iruti u maw nih?”
41009012	Khania amani dieng rumashang, “Irikip mun hawng molonaret rang, Elijah na matiengpek jong rangnih, inia ijar a Miring Shapa na shawna lientak doi rangnih, tia irumiejiek maw nih, khan mi hai na ama kha iruheng u rang a maw nih?
41009013	Inia nangni dieng kienieriei uh, makhala Elijah kha matieng jong joi, khan ama jar a irumiejiek ang a amani idit dungjuia ama kha rutawn uh.”
41009014	Khan ama na akhaichawi hai dieng vat phakhan, mipui na amani kha iruhieichip ua danoja hai na chawngirurieshiet pui u kha vak muk.
41009015	Khan relentak a mirawp kha na ama kha rumuk u `le, shindawngna lientak runiei uh. Khan ama dieng vak tan ua chubai vak thaw pui uh.
41009016	Makhan Jesu na danoja hai dieng rurawdawn, “Nangni na amani le ih chawng maw nangirieshiet pui uh?”
41009017	Khan mipui kar a akhat na rumashang, “Oja, ratha rono na imawchawngthiei boi kashapa hi nang dieng kavak chawi.
41009018	Ratha rono na shur pharoia, mupurving, khan chiephon moshok, aha reshemashak, khan atak rikinmashak. Nawtnathiei rang, nang khaichawi hai dieng kieriei, inia amani na mawtawr u mak.”
41009019	Khan Jesu na ama dieng ruti, “Aw takashawn boi rong hai, Idawrshe a nangni le awm rang a maw kanih? Idawrshe a nangni le kidoi rang a maw nih? Ama kha kiei dieng vak chawi u roh.”
41009020	Khan amani na ama dieng ruchawi uh. Ama kha rumukphit `le, ratha rono kha na enchak a runawk a pieipak chung ah tumtum a ruloi a chiephon rumoshok.
41009021	Khan Jesu na apa dieng rurawdawn, “Ama na hitihin a awmna hi ituk maw shawt joi?” Khan ama na rumashang, “Anaite chang ah put ah nih joi.
41009022	Khan mahi na ama hi thatna rang, miei ah le tui ah rawnawrawnaw a ruvawr. Inia nangthaw ngam a tu, nang lainatna kha natetna u tana nashan u roh.”
41009023	Makhan Jesu na ama dieng ruti, “Takanangshawn a tu, takashawn miring ama dieng khan irikip nithieiviek.”
41009024	Relentak a apa kha na he rashangtak a le imikrithi cholam a rura`ai, “Pumi, takakawshawn, takakishawn boi hi maimawk kepekna ngam rang, narachang pui roh.”
41009025	Khan mipui na lawp `khat a vak tan u kha Jesu na rumuk `le, ratha rono kha rurawkawk a ama dieng ruti, “Nang achawngthiei boi, ratha nokorshet, chawng kenepek, nang ama ah put ah vak shok tana ama dieng hin lutretlai naw roh.”
41009026	Khan ratha rono kha na ra`ai a naitepa kha enchak a runawk a ama ah put ah vak shok joi, khan naitepa kha thimekaiving a mi arawplam na “Ithi joi,” ruti uh.
41009027	Inia Jesu na ama khut ah rumukui, khan rumothoi a ama kha hawng thoi joi.
41009028	Khan ama na in ah vat phakhan, akhaichawi hai na bing a rurawdawn uh, “Ijar a kieini na kinawt ngam boi u maw nih?”
41009029	Amani dieng ruriei, “Hi ang hai hi nikna le chamradoilam a niboia, nawtthiei nimak.”
41009030	Khashole khan ah put ah rushe ua Galilee kha rurakan uh, khan tute dieng mejet rang, rudit mak.
41009031	Ajarla akhaichawi hai kha hitihin ruruchuk, “Miring Shapa kha miring hai khut a pek rang a nih joi. Amani na ama kha that u rangnih, khan that u shole, ni `thum changna a hawng ring rangnih.”
41009032	Inia iriei pe u hai kha amani na rujet u mak, khan ama dieng rawdawn rangawm ruchih uh.
41009033	Khan Capernaum kha vak shok a, in `khat a awm phakhan, amani dieng rurawdawn, “Nangni na lam ah ih chawng maw nangivakrieshiet pui uh?”
41009034	Inia amani kha ruawmchien uh, ajarla lam ah khatlekhat na tu kha maw runieiving, tia chawng vak rieshiet u inih.
41009035	Khan ama na shutlam a shawmlieidi kha okoi a amani dieng ruriei, “Tukhat na akhat changnakhit kha adit joiatu, ama kha vanoi kar a dawngkhit kha anih rang a inih, khan vanoi shok kha anih rang a inih.”
41009036	Khan naite `khat hi loi a amani maikung a rumiding pe, khan awpawm a amani dieng ruriei,
41009037	“Tu nitjoiawm hi ang naite hai kar a akhat kha kiriming a loi a tu, kiei hi inoloi inih. Khan kiei analoi ama kha na, kiei hi inoloi nimak a, nojongtirpa ama kha iloi inih.”
41009038	Khan John na ama dieng rumashang, “Oja, mi `khat na nang riming a raikho inawt pe kurumuk uh, inia ama kha nanu u ajui miring nih boi jarkhan, kurumakha uh.”
41009039	Inia Jesu na ruti, “Ama kha makha u naw roh, ajarla kiriming a ranakniei chon athaw ama kha na baitek a nuk a kiei hi niemieshiet ngam naw nih.
41009040	Ajarla kieini nere`erpui boi ama kha narachang pui miring kha inih.
41009041	Ajarla Christa miring nangnit u jar a, nangni dieng tui hai `khattak a nita`awm kiriming a nemenek uatu, kiei na diktak a kiriei inih, ama shawlawh kha itikte nita`awm thang pe naw nih.
41009042	“Khan tukhat na kiei takanashawn ashin naite hai kar a akhat hi keruthuimashak joiatu, ama kha iring ah shumhiei `khat makhai pe a tuikhanglien lai ah vawr rang a kha ama rang tha pedet.
41009043	Khajarkhan nang khut `khat na munu inawmawthaw rang a nitatu, makha tubang roh. Khut `di le chiemtiknieiboi Gehenna le chiemtiknieiboi miei a lutnek a tu, khawrlam a ringna amuh kha nang rang thadet.
41009044	“Makhan ‘Amani rulung kha athi, iti awm mak. Khan miei kha chiemtik, iti niei mak.’
41009045	Khan nang ke `khat na munu inawmawthaw rang a nitatu, makha tubang roh, nangke idi kawp a Chiemtiknieiboi Miei a lutnek a tu, kengawlam a ringna mun a lut kha thadet.
41009046	“Makhan ‘Amani rulung kha athi, iti awm mak. Khan miei kha chiemtik, iti niei mak.’
41009047	Khan nang mik kha na munu inawmawthaw rang a nitatu, makha kawbang roh, nang mik `di kawp a Gehenna Miei a lutnek a tu, nang mik `khat le Pathien rengchangna a lut kha thadet.
41009048	“Makhan ‘Amani rulung kha athi, iti awm mak. Khan miei kha chiemtik, iti niei mak.’
41009049	“Ajarla mi rikip shung a michi thak ang a miei thak rangnih. Khan michi kha rawthawina rikip ah obo rangnih.
41009050	“Michi hi atha, inia michi ama a`ah kha hek pe joiatu, itia maw makha ma`aret rawng? Khania nang shung ua michi tuidan kha awm rosho, khan khatlekhat riengiei u roh.”
41010001	Khan Jesu na makha mun ah put a ruthoi a Jordan vara kha arawh a Judea ram tieng rushe joi. Khan takthar a mipui na vak rawtawp pui uh, khan shena balam a amani kha ruruchuk.
41010002	Khan Pharisee hai na ama kha enretena rang, va ua ama dieng rurawdawn uh, “Mi `khat na unungak imele hi Dan maw nih?
41010003	Jesu na amani dieng rumashang, “Moses na nangni dieng ih chawng maw nurupek uh?”
41010004	Amani na rumashang uh, “Melena jawtnapek kha miejiek a melena rang, Moses na rujawt.”
41010005	Inia Jesu na amani dieng rumashang, “Nang mulung u kha michim jar a, kha ang chawngpek kha irumiejiek inih.
41010006	Inia konputpek a Pathien na ‘apa le nupang hi irukon inih.’
41010007	‘Hijarhin apa na unulepa kha mak a ama inkonu le ruchun rangnih.
41010008	Idi kha taksha `khat chang rangnih. Khajarkhan amani kha idi nih u lai naw nih, inia taksha `khat kha nih u joi.’
41010009	Khajarkhan Pathien na shamishuisha kha miring na shenlai naw rosho.”
41010010	Khashole in `khat ah akhaichawi hai na hi jar hin rurawdawn u ret.
41010011	Khan ama na amani dieng ruriei, “Tukhat na inkonu kha reshen pui a nupang `khat niei joiatu, ama chung a uire ithaw inih.
41010012	Khan nupui `khat na ama inkopa kha reshen pui a shik `khat niei joiatu, uire ithaw inih.”
41010013	Khan ashin naite hai kha shitnathiei rang, amani na Jesu dieng vak chawi uh, inia khaichawi hai na rurawkawk uh.
41010014	Jesu na makha rumuk phakhan, mulung hanglam a ruti, “Naite hai na kiei dieng ava rang a kha jawt pe u roh, amani kha makha u naw roh, ajarla kha ang hai dieng khan Pathien rengchangna kha awm.
41010015	Kiei na nangni dieng diktak a kiriei inih, ashin naite hai ang a, tukhat na Pathien rengchangna kha loi joi nawkatu, makhan shuklut a lut naw nih.”
41010016	Khashole ama na naite hai kha rupawm a amani chung ah khut rutet pe a rahvan rupek.
41010017	Khan Jesu na lam ah rulawnlai khan, miring `khat vak tan a, amaikung a rukhuk shun a rurawdawn, “Aw Oja Atha, kiei na ih kawthaw le maw kumshawt ringna kha tumthiei ning?”
41010018	Jesu na ama dieng rumashang, “Ijar a kiei hi atha, tia nanginokoi maw nih? Pathien niboia tute atha awm mak.
41010019	Chawngpek kha nangjet: ‘Uire thawthiei naw tinih,’ ‘Mi thatthiei naw tinih,’ ‘Muruthiei naw tinih,’ ‘Anih boi a kungchangthiei naw tinih,’ ‘Miniei kha lemthiei naw tinih,’ khan ‘Nangnu le nangpa kha richit peh roh.’ ”
41010020	Mashang a ama dieng ruti, “Oja, hihai kholok hi korothar chang ah put ah kihawngrung nih joi.”
41010021	Inia Jesu na ama dieng en phakhan, numrupok, khan ama dieng ruti, “Nang dieng ravat `khat awm: she tana nanginiei kholok kha vak jor roh, khan shara hai dieng vak peh roh. Khan ravan a bawmniei kha nangniei rangnih. Va roh, khan cross kha loi tana nujui roh.”
41010022	Inia chawng chung khan amai mukhut a mulungshawlam a rushe joi, ajarla ama na shumleshier tampui runiei.
41010023	Khan Jesu na akhaichawi hai dieng enroko a ruti, “Shumleshier aniei hai na Pathien rengchangna a alut rang a hi idawr a matat maw nih!”
41010024	Inia khaichawi hai na ama chawng chung khan shindawngna runiei uh. Khan Jesu na amani dieng mashang a rurieiret, “Aw naite hai, Pathien rengchangna a lut hi idawr a matat maw nih!
41010025	Rawchawng miring `khat na Pathien rengchangna a alut rangnek a tu, sharingshiei `khat na shim nokor ah apang rang a kha baidet.”
41010026	Inia amani kha dawnga shindawng pe ua manilemani dieng ruti uh, “Khatnitala tu na maw shanna muh ngam nih?”
41010027	Jesu na amani dieng enrep a ruriei, “Miring le anithiei boi kha Pathien le tu nimak, ajarla Pathien le tu kholok nithieiviek.”
41010028	Peter na Jesu dieng ariei ruput, “Enro, ih kholok kurumak ua kinurujui u inih.”
41010029	Makhan Jesu na ruti, “Nangni dieng diktak a kiriei inih, kajar a le khan athachawng jar a in ninawkle uliennai nupang apa, ninawkle nu le pa, ninawkle nai hai, ninawkle loimun hai kha rumathan
41010030	khan epshawna kholok rudoi tute na tun a rongtak hin, in hai uliennai nupang apa, nu le nai hai, khan loi hai kha rajarajah a tum boi a awm naw nih, khan ajong rang a rong hinawm kumshawt ringna kha muk u rangnih.
41010031	Khan masha mi tampui kha nukna rangnih, khan nukna hai kha masha rangnih.”
41010032	Khan amani na Jerusalem tieng shena lam kha rurawh u lai khan, Jesu na amani maton ah rulawn. Ajui hai mi kholok na shindawngna le chitna runiei uh. Khan shawmlieidi kha takthar a ruchawiret a ama chung a ashokdet rang a jar a ariei ruput:
41010033	“Enro, Jerusalem ah nahawng uh, khan Miring Shapa kha thiempu ulien hai le danoja hai dieng pek rangnih. Khan ama kha thitnashe rang khan aheng u rangnih, khan Phungshik hai dieng pek u rangnih.
41010034	Khan ama kha erawh a biek u rangnih, khan ama kha miechiei u rangnih. Ama kha jem u rangnih, khan that u rangnih. Khan ni `thum changna khan thoiret rangnih.”
41010035	Khan Zebedee shapa hai, James le John na, ama dieng vak rawshawn ua ruti uh, “Oja, ih nita`awm kidit u kha nepeh u roh, tia kininik uh.”
41010036	Khan Jesu na amani dieng ruti, “Nangni rang imaw nangnawmawthaw jawt uh?”
41010037	Ama dieng ruti uh, “Nang lurna a kushutna u rang, nang chang tieng `khat, khan nang viei tieng `khat mun nepeh u roh.”
41010038	Inia Jesu na amani dieng ruriei, “Nangininik u kha nangni na jet u makche. Kiei na kinek rang a hai aneh, khan kiloi rang a baptisma le baptisma loi, mahi mawtawr u rawng maw?”
41010039	Khan amani na ruti uh, “Mawtawr u rang kanih.” Inia Jesu na amani dieng ruriei, “Kiei na kinek rang a hai hi nangnek u rangnih, khan kiei na kiloi rang a baptisma hi nangloi u rangnih.
41010040	Inia kieviei le kachang a shutna apeh rang a kha kiei nimi`ing, inia irasham pe hai rang a inih.”
41010041	Khan shawm hai kha na James le John jar a rujet u phakhan, mulung rumohoina u lai mak.
41010042	Khan Jesu na amani kha rukoi a amani dieng ruriei, “Nangni na nangjet uh, Phungshik hai rang a madan rampo hai kha na Phungshik hai kha idek a pumi achang inih. Khan amani alien-arang hai kha na amani chung a cham niei uh.
41010043	Inia nang kar uatu khatikhan nih naw nih. Khania tunita`awm nang kar ua alien anih jawt miring kha na nang shepding u kha chang rosho.
41010044	Khan tunita`awm nang kar ua akhat changna anih jawt miring kha na kholok shok kha achang rang a inih.
41010045	Ajarla Miring Shapashe kha`awm ama chon mawthaw rang a ajong nimak a, mi chon thaw rang le mi tampui khekman rang a iringkho apeh jong inih.”
41010046	Khashole amani na Jericho kha vak shok u joi. Khan ama na akhaichawi hai le khan mirawp le Jericho ah put ah rushe phakhan, Timaeus shapa mikchaw Bartimaeus kha lampang a khutdawlam a rushuh a ruawm.
41010047	Nazareth Jesu kha keng, iti ama na rujet phakhan, ra`ailam a ruti, “Aw David Shapa Jesu, kiei dieng hin nang rsoihoina kha natetna roh!”
41010048	Khan awmchienna rang, mi tampui na ama kha enchak a rurawkawk uh, inia “David Shapa nang roihoina kha kiei dieng hin natetna roh!” tia liekshang a rura`ai.
41010049	Jesu na ding a ama kha koina rang chawng rupek. Khan amani na mikchawpa kha rukoi ua ama dieng ruti uh, “Ranak thaw roh. Thoi roh, nang kha nokoi.”
41010050	Khan opon rieshiei kha ama na rulik, khan ruthoi a Jesu dieng rushe joi.
41010051	Jesu na ama dieng rawdawn a ruti, “Nang rang imaw nangnawmawthaw jawt?” Inia mikchawpa kha na Jesu dieng ruti, “Rabboni, kimik hi namavar pe roh.”
41010052	Makhan Jesu na ama dieng ruti, “She rang roh, nang takashawn kha na namadam joi.” Khan relentak a imik kha hawng var pe a lam khan Jesu anu rujui joi.
41011001	Khan amani na Jerusalem kha vak ranai pui ua, Olive Lawn ah awm Bethphage le Bethany kha vak shok u phakhan, akhaichawi idi hi rutir joi.
41011002	Amani dieng ruti, “Nang maton uah kho khawn she u roh. Nanglutphit u `le, miring khatshe na ishutna boilai ranngam acha remet ruthung a awm nangmuk u rangnih, khan makha thut u tana vak chawi u roh.
41011003	Khan tukhat na, ‘Ijar a nangithaw u maw nih?’ niti uatu, ‘Pumi na rangai,’ tia mashang u roh, khan relentak a amani kha hin vak tir rangnih.”
41011004	Khajarkhan amani na rushe ua, ranngam acha remet `khat pakawt vai lamkaw ah ruruthung vak muk uh, khan makha amani na ruthut uh.
41011005	Khakawt ah ading miring hai na amani dieng ruti uh, “Ijar a ranngam acha remet kha nangithut u maw nih?”
41011006	Inia Jesu na iruriei kha ang a, amani dieng ruriei ua amani kha rumathan uh.
41011007	Khan ranngam acha remet kha Jesu dieng vak chawi u joi. Khan ama chung ah pon rumukhu ua ama ling ah ruchong joi.
41011008	Mi tampui na lam ah pon hai kha rupha uh, khan eshen na thing ah put ah boship thingbak hai kha rutuk ua lamlien khan rupha uh.
41011009	Amaton ah alawn hai le anuk ah ajui hai kha na he rashangtak a rura`ai uh, “Hosanna! ‘PUMI riming a ajong ama kha rahvantha inih!’
41011010	Pumi riming a ajong napa u David rengchangna kha rahvantha inih! Rashangving a Hosanna!”
41011011	Khan Jesu na Jerusalem kha rulut a riethiengmun ah rushe. Khan nieinak kholok kha enruroko shole, apha kha hawng shum joi jarkhan, shawmlieidi kha le Bethany tieng rushe joi.
41011012	Khan jing tieng hin amani na Bethany ah put ah vat phakhan, Jesu kha vawnrucham pe joi.
41011013	Khan ralaviei a thieichangkung boniei `khat rumuk phakhan, makhan dikhat kumukthiei a la, tia rushe. Inia iedieng vak shok le obo ranga niboia, `khatshe vak muh mak, ajarla thieichang rat pha kha runimak.
41011014	Khan mashang a thieichangkung dieng Jesu na ruti, “Dawnshe a tute na nang ah put ah ara kumshawt a shalai naw rosho.” Makha akhaichawi hai na rujet uh.
41011015	Khan amani na Jerusalem ah rushe u joi. Khan Jesu na riethiengmun ah rulut a ajor hai le rawchawh hai kha runawt. Khan shierleshier rotho hai tebol hai le pharphali jor hai shutna hai kha shukthala a rutet pe.
41011016	Khan ama na riethiengmun kha rakan a irujor u nieinak hai kha `khatshe rumawchawi mak.
41011017	Khan ama na ruruchuk a amani dieng ruriei, “ ‘Ki`in hi phung kholok nikna in ti rangnih,’ tia imiejieksha nimak maw? Inia nangni na mahi ‘minieisho hai koh’ nangmachang u joi!”
41011018	Khan thiempu ulien hai le danoja hai kha na rujet ua, amani na itia maw mahang rang, tia lam rutawk uh. Inia amani kha ruchih uh, ajarla ama miruchukna khan vanoi shinrudawng pe u inih.
41011019	Khan ni hawng tah phakhan, amani na khopui kha mak a rushe u joi.
41011020	Jingkar a amani vak pang phakhan, thieichangkung kha ama rujung ah put ah ruchar kha vak muk uh.
41011021	Khan Peter na rumininghep phakhan, ama dieng ruti, “Rabbi, enro! Pumnangibot thieichangkung khaw char joi.”
41011022	Khan Jesu na mashang a ama dieng ruriei, “Pathien kha takashawn u roh.
41011023	Nangni dieng diktak a kiriei inih, tukhat na mahi lawn dieng hin ‘Rechen tana tuikhanglien ah vak rothong roh,’ itina khan mulung rakhana iniei boi, inia iriei kha nih rangnih, iti takashawn ama dieng khan, iriei rikip kha minit pe rangnih.
41011024	Khajarkhan nangni dieng kinieriei u inih, nanginik nangiriei u kholok a nangmuk u joi, tia takashawn u roh. Khanitatu nangni dieng shok rangnih.
41011025	Khan anih rang nangding u phakhan, tukhat chung a ir nangniei uatu, rangaidam u roh. Khanitatu ravan a awm nangpa u na`awm nang shietna u kha arangaidam rangnih.
41011026	Inia rangaidam nangpek u nawkatu, ravan a awm nangpa u na nang shietna u kha rangaidam naw nih.
41011027	Khan Jerusalem ah amani rushe u ret. Khan riethiengmun shung ah rulawn phakhan, thiempu ulien hai, danoja hai le shierulien hai kha ama dieng va uh.
41011028	Khan ama dieng ruti uh, “Ih cham nanginiei a hihaihi nangithaw maw nih? Khan hihaihi nangthawnathiei rang, tu na cham inurupek maw nih?”
41011029	Inia Jesu na amani dieng ruriei, “Nangni dieng chawng `khat nawrawdawn u rawng, khan kiei dieng namashang u roh. Makhan kiei na ih cham kiniei a hihaihi kithaw maw nih, iti kha nangni dieng riei rang kanih.
41011030	John baptisma kha ravan ah put ah maw nih ninawkle miring hai ah put ah maw nih? Namashang u roh.”
41011031	Khan lawpte na reshe ua ruti uh, “ ‘Ravan ah put ah keng’ niti uala, ‘Khanitala, ijar a ama kha takanangishawn boi u maw nih?’ ti rangnih.
41011032	Inia ‘Miring hai ah put ah keng’ niti uala,” mipui kha ruchih uh, ajarla mi kholok na John kha thiempulien adiktak `khat inih, tia iruloi u inih.
41011033	Khajarkhan Jesu dieng mashang a ruti uh, “Jet u mi`ing.” Khan mashang a Jesu na amani dieng ruti, “Kiei na`awm hihaihi ih cham le kithaw maw nih, iti kha nangni dieng nieriei u naw ning.”
41012001	Khan amani dieng rangshim a ariei ruput: “Miring `khat na drakha rohon `khat runiei. Ama na makha rurokorep, khan juepna rang khur `khat ruchoi a vendai `khat ruthaw. Makha loithaw hai dieng rumashan a khomijin rushe joi.
41012002	Khashole ara rawkhawm phakhan, drakha rohon ah put ah ara dikhat mukna rang, loithaw hai dieng shok `khat rutir joi.
41012003	Inia ama kha rushur ua rujem uh, khan rokpet a rumikir uh.
41012004	Khan shok `khat rutirret. Ama kha ulu a shebe rupek uh, khan maimawktak a rutawn ua rumikir uh.
41012005	Khan shik `khat rutirret, inia ama kha ruthat uh. Khatikhan shik tampui: eshen kha rujem uh, khan eshen kha ruthat uh.
41012006	“Numipoktak shapa `khat runieilai. ‘Kashapa hi tu richit nurupek pe u rangnih,’ ti jarkhan, dawngkhit a ama kha amani dieng rutir.
41012007	“Inia loithaw hai kha na khatlekhat dieng ruti uh, ‘Koklo kha hi nih joi. Khai! Ama hi that u rang rawi, khanitatu inkoklo hi natah u chang rangnih joi.’
41012008	Khajarkhan ama kha pawttap a ruthat u joi, khan drakha rohon vai tieng rupai u joi.
41012009	“Makhan drakha rohon pumpa kha na imaw lawt nih? Ama na she a loithaw hai kha vak mathang rangnih, khan drakha rohon kha shik hai dieng pek rangnih.
41012010	‘Inthaw hai na i`enda u lung kha kik ah runiei lung kha ruchang.
41012011	Mahi PUMI na iruthaw inih, khan nimik ua mahi shindawngroi `khat inih,’ tia irumiejiek kha rute u makche maw?”
41012012	Khan ama kha shurna rang rurai uh, inia mipui kha ruchit pui uh. Ajarla rangshim kha amani jar a iruriei inih, iti kha rujet uh. Khajarkhan ama kha mak a rushe u joi
41012013	Khan ama chawngriei a rikhitmashakna rang, amani na Pharisee hai le Herod miring hai kha ama dieng rutir uh.
41012014	Ama dieng ava a ruti uh, “Oja, nang hi adik nangnih, khan nang na miring hai hi khatte a nangtawn, ajarla miring hai mai kha en makche, inia Pathien lam kha adik a nangruchuk, iti kha kejet uh. Khajarkhan Caesar dieng khaichana pek hi Dan maw nih? Peh u ning maw ninawkle pek boi a maw thaw u ning?”
41012015	Inia amani jetnawawm kha ijet le roroia, amani dieng ruti, “Ijar a ennanginerete u maw nih? Dinari kha en rawng, kiei dieng vak chawi u roh.”
41012016	Khan amani na makha ruchawi uh. Amani dieng ruti, “Mahi rilim le khetmiejiek hi tu tah maw nih?” Amani na rumashang uh, “Caesar.”
41012017	Jesu na amani dieng ruti, Caesar tah kha Caesar dieng peh u roh, Pathien tah kha Pathien dieng peh u roh.” Khajarkhan ama chung a shindawngna runiei uh.
41012018	Khan thoiretna awm mak ati Sadducee hai na ama dieng rushe ua rurawdawn uh,
41012019	“Oja, Moses na kieini dieng rumiejiek, makhala tukhat ulienpa kha ithi a unungak kha nai mieniei boi a mak joiatu, anaipangpa na ama kha loi a ulienpa rang chi mothoithiei.
41012020	Poro shiri ruawm. Akhat changna kha na inruniei, inia chi mak boi a ruthi joi.
41012021	Khan adi changna kha na nupangnu kha ruloi, inia ama`awm chi mak boi a ruthi joi. Khan athum changna kha`awm khatikhan.
41012022	Khajarkhan poro shiri kholok kha na chi rumak u lai mak. Dawngkhit a nupangnu kha`awm ruthi joi.
41012023	Thoiretna nikho khan nupangnu kha tu nungak maw chang nih? Ajarla shiri kha na ama kha amani nungak rang iruloi u inih.”
41012024	Jesu na amani dieng ruriei, “Miejiek le Pathien ranak kha nangjet boi u jar a, nangirehe u nimak maw?
41012025	Ajarla amani na athi ah put ah hawng thoi u phakhan, inawm niei u naw nih, khan inawm mieniei u naw nih. Inia ravan a ravantir hai kha ang u rangnih.
41012026	Inia athi miring na hawng thoina chungchanga, mieichong rampabuk chungchanga irumiejiek Moses behangbuk kha rute u makche maw? Makhan Pathien na ama dieng ruriei, ‘Kiei hi Abraham Pathien, Isaac Pathien, khan Jacob Pathien kha kanih.’
41012027	“Ama hi athi hai Pathien kha nimak a aring hai Pathien kha inih. Khajarkhan ajeng a nangrehe uh.”
41012028	Khashole chawngrurieshiet ua ama na thatak a irumashang kha rumuk `le, danoja `khat na ama dieng vak rawdawn, “Chawngpek hai kar a ih kha maw runieiving?”
41012029	Jesu na rumashang, “Chawngpek kholok kar a akhat changna chawngpek kha hi inih: ‘Rangai u roh, Aw Israel, PUMI hi napathien u inih. Ama ranga hi PUMI inih.
41012030	Khan PUMI Pathien kha nang mulung kholok le, nang ringphuk kholok le, nang mining kholok le khan nang ranak kholok le numnangipok rang a inih.’
41012031	Adi changna chawngpek kha hi inih: ‘Nang ringchangpui kha nang pumtak ang a numnangipok rang a inih.’ Hihainek a aliendet chawngpek shik awm mak.”
41012032	Khan danoja kha na ama dieng ruti, “Atha joi Oja, adik kha nangriei joi, Pathien khatte awm, ama niboia shik awm mak.
41012033	Khan mulung kholok le, jetna kholok le khan ranak kholok le ama kha numipok, khan iringchangpui kha upumtak ang a numipok hi na pumha a pek le rawthawina kha ikhe inih.”
41012034	Khan shingveng a imashang kha Jesu na rumuk `le, ama dieng ruriei, “Pathien rengchangna le ralalai makche.” Khashole tute na ama dieng chawng rawdawnna ranak kha runiei u lai mak.
41012035	Khan Jesu na riethiengmun ah iruruchuk le roroia ruti, “Iti dan a danoja hai na Christa hi David Shapa keng iruti u maw nih?
41012036	Davidtak na Ratha Riethieng jar a ruti: ‘PUMI na kupumi dieng ruriei, “Nang rahapui hai kha nang kekhawng kamachang malalim, kukhut chang tieng hin shuh roh.” ’
41012037	“Khajarkhan Davidtak na ama kha ‘Pumi,’ iti. Iti dan a ama kha ashapa achang maw nih?” Khan mi hawipui ruchun kha na ningaitak a rurangai uh.
41012038	Khan iruruchukna `khat a ruriei, “Ponrosho rieshiei a alawn jawt, khan rievieithawna mun ah mi hai na richit ipek adit danoja hai kha riring pui u roh.
41012039	Khan synagogue hai khan shutna runieiving hai kha loh jawt uh, khan bumichinna hai khan mi matonkhit ah shutna rang, adit uh,
41012040	mieirawng hai nieilelung asho, khan thanunchan a richichawi rasha a nikna mieshiei, danoja hai kha riring pui u roh. Amani na akhawkdet hengna kha muk u rangnih.”
41012041	Khan nieibawmna le vararashan khan Jesu na rushuh. Mipui na nieibawmna ah shier ivawr u dan kha rumuk. Khan rawchawng hai tampui na arawp a iruvawr u kha rumuk.
41012042	Khan mieirawng `khat na lepton idi hi ruvawr. Mahi quadron `khat runih.
41012043	Khan ama na akhaichawi hai kha rukoi a amani dieng ruti, “Diktak a nangni dieng kiriei inih, nieibawmna ah ivawr hai kholok kar a mieirawng sharanu ivawr khaw rawpdet.
41012044	Ajarla mi kholok na amani ruphu ah put ah ivawr u inih, inia ama tu aravatna kar a iniei kholok le iringna rang a kholok kha ivawr inih.”
41013001	Khan Jesu na riethiengmun ah put ah vak shok phakhan, akhaichawi hai kar a akhat na ama dieng ruti, “Oja, hidawr a shindawngroi lung le hidawr a shindawngroi inrashak hai hi enro!”
41013002	Khan Jesu na ama dieng mashang a ruti, “Hi inrashak alur hai hi nangimuk maw nih? Akhat chung ah akhat rotho hi achim boi a hin ah imak lung `khatshe awm naw nih.”
41013003	Khan ama na riethiengmun le vararashan Olive Lawn ah rushulai khan, Peter, James, John, khan Andrew na ama dieng muruk a vak rawdawn uh,
41013004	“Hihai rikip hi itik a ashok rang a maw nih? Hihai kholok hi hawng shoknaviek rang a jetna kha imaw ninih? Nieriei u roh.”
41013005	Khan Jesu na amani dieng ariei ruput joi, “Tu na`awm nangni kha lam nerehemashakna boi u rang, riring u roh.
41013006	Ajarla ‘Kiei Christa kha kanih,’ tia mi tampui kiriming a va u rangnih, khan mi tampui mohon u rangnih.
41013007	Khan nangni na ra le ra chawng chawngpar a nangjet u rangnih. Makhan nangni puh u naw roh. Ajarla mahi ashok rang a awmsha inih, inia dawng nikho kha tu nimaklai.
41013008	Ajarla phung `khat na phung `khat chung a, khan reng `khat na reng `khat chung a, rahana mothoi rangnih. Munmun ah nieinu hawng rangnih, khan nekleshak awm boi a shawna kha hawng awm rangnih. Hihai kholok hi shawna putna kha nih rangnih.
41013009	“Khania nang bibing a riring u roh. Ajarla nangni kha amani na Sanhedrin hai dieng nepek u rangnih, khan synagogue hai khan nejem u rangnih. Khan nangni kha rampo hai le reng hai maikung a, kajar a amani dieng kungchang rang, nawchawi u rangnih.
41013010	Khan matiengpek athachawng hi phung kholok dieng shemngir rang a inih.
41013011	Khan amani na nangni kha nawchawi ua nepek u phakhan, ih nangiriei u rang a kha matieng mulung mawshaw u naw roh, nitnawkle rashamjer u naw roh. Inia kha phatak khan inemejetinemejet u kha riei u roh. Ajarla ariei miring kha nangni nih u makche, inia Ratha Riethieng kha inih.
41013012	“Khan shokpui `khat na shokpui `khat thitna rang, apa na anai thitna rang, mohon rangnih. Khan nai hai na nulepa hai kha rodoi pui ning, tia amani kha mihai mathat u rangnih.
41013013	Khan kiriming jar a mi kholok na naraha pui u rangnih, inia dawngshe a adoi ama kha shan rangnih.
41013014	“Inia thiempulien Daniel na iruriei kha ang a, ‘Mitiroi thitnathangna miring’ kha na idingna lawm boi mun ah ading kha nangmuk u phakhan (ate miring kha na jet rosho), Judea ah awm amani kha na lawn hai khan tan u rosho.
41013015	In chung ah awm kha na`awm noi ah jong chumlai naw rosho, inshung ah awm nieinak hai kha aloi rang lutlai naw rosho.
41013016	Khan loi ah ruawm ama kha na oponledier aloi rang, hong kirretlai naw rosho.
41013017	Kha pha khan nai ruvawng hai le rununeh nainoi runiei hai kha ituk a lungboiroi u rang a maw nih!
41013018	Nangtanna u rang a pha kha phabi a nitna boi rang, nikna niei u roh.
41013019	Ajarla makha pha kha Pathien na rieliei konpek ah put ah tunshe hin a rushok boilai, nuk a`awm ashok boi rang a, ajeng a shawna kha nih rangnih.
41013020	Khan Pumi na nikho hai kha rumushum nawkatu, taksha `khatshe hawi naw nih. Inia ama na ithang a irumadansha hai jar a nikho hi irumushum inih
41013021	Kha pha khan tukhat na ‘Enro, Christa kha hin awm joi!’ ninawkle ‘Khawn awm joi!’ ti joiawm, takashawn u naw roh.
41013022	Ajarla christa jok hai le thiempulien jok hai kha hawng pung rangnih. Khan nitthiei a tu madansha haishe kha mohonna rang, jetna le rekhekchon hai kha numumuk u rangnih.
41013023	Khania nangni riring u roh. Kiei na nangni dieng hihai kholok hi shok mala a kinieriei u nih joi.
41013024	“Shawrievieina nikho kha thengphit `le, ni kha mijing rangnih. Tha na`awm ama mieivar kha pelai naw nih.
41013025	Ravan a arshi hai kha jong cho rangnih; ravan a ranak kholok rawnawk rangnih.
41013026	“Khashole Miring Shapa kha na ranak alien, khan lurna kha le romiei kar a ajong kha amani na muk u rangnih.
41013027	Khashole ama na ravantir hai kha jong tir ning, tia kiei mili, ravan dawngkhit ah le rieliei dawngkhit, ah put ah awm ama madansha hai kha lawp a ruchun rangnih.
41013028	“Khan thieichangkung ah put ah rangshim hi jet u roh: abak hai kha dawnglai khan, obo hawng moshok. Makhan, kholum kha hawng nai joi, iti kha nangjet uh.
41013029	Khatikhan khahaikha nangmuk u phakhan, ama kha vak ranai a mawkawkungtak ah ding a awm joi, iti kha jet u roh!
41013030	Diktak a nangni dieng kiriei inih, hihaihi hawng rupum masheng, hi rong hi shukhek a hek naw nih.
41013031	Ravan le rieliei hi hek rangnih, inia kawchawng hai hi tu shukthang a thang naw nih.
41013032	“Inia makha Nikho le nidan chungchanga tute na ajet awm mak, ravan a ravantir hai na`awm, khan Shapa kha na`awm, inia Apa ranga kha na ijet inih.
41013033	Riring u roh, cheveng a nikna niei u roh; ajarla nangni na pha kha itik a jong shok rang a maw nih, iti kha jet u makche.
41013034	“Mahi miring `khat na khomijin she dieng hin, ama shok hai dieng cham irotho pui, mi rikip dieng amama ithaw rang a chon irotho pui, khan mawkawt rungpa dieng riringtak a rungna rang a chawngipek a ama in imak kha le ra`ang inih.
41013035	“Khajarkhan cheveng u roh, ajarla in pumi kha nitak a maw, nitnawkle janchim a maw, nitnawkle arkhon a maw, nitnawkle jingkar a maw, avatna rang a pha kha jet u makche.
41013036	In pumi kha na jetboithieiboi a vat phakhan, jalam a nangruawm u kha navaktawng u nih.
41013037	Khan kiei na nangni dieng kinieriei u hi vanoi dieng a kiriei inih: Cheveng u roh!”
41014001	Khan ni `di shole, Rakanna le Chawjawboi Tan Rohoi kha hawng nih joi. Thiempu ulien hai le danoja hai na ama kha itia maw mohon a that rang, iti hi enchak a rutawk u joi.
41014002	Khania “Rohoi hin tu nidiei naw rosho, miring hai kha puh rang keng,” ruti uh.
41014003	Khan Bethany ah raithawnaw tawngpa Simon in ah rushuh a ruawmlai khan, nupang `khat na manamhoi, ajeng a manlu nard riethienghiei rieipartui lungngoi kawk `khat a vak chawi a ava. Ama na thao kawk kha rukhoi a ama lu ah runawt pe.
41014004	Amani kar a eshen na mulung rahana niei a khatlekhat dieng ruti uh, “Iloia mahi thao hi ariem a imathang maw nih?
41014005	Ajarla thao hi dinari rajathum khea jor joiatu, shara hai dieng nepek ngamdet rangnih,” ruti ua ama kha ajeng a rumieshiet uh.
41014006	Khania Jesu na ruti, “Ithaw jawt kha thaw rosho, ijar a ama kha nirahamashak u maw nih? Ama na kiei dieng chon atha kha ithaw keng joi.
41014007	Ajarla shara hai kha ningthingkip nangawm pui uh, khan amani dieng chon atha nangithawna pe jawt u pha khan, nangthaw pe ngam uh, inia kiei tu nawawm pui jawnjai u makche.
41014008	Ama na ingamtuk kha ithaw inih. Kupum hi khumna rang, thao nawt avamasha keng joi.
41014009	Nangni dieng diktak a kiriei inih, ih mun khan nita`awm, rieliei pumpui ah athachawng shem phakhan, mahi nupangnu na iruthaw hi, ama miningna `khat a, riei rangnih.”
41014010	Khan shawmlieidi kar a akhat Judas Iscariot na Jesu kha pekna rang, thiempu ulien hai dieng rushe joi.
41014011	Khan amani na jet u `le ningrungai pe ua ama dieng shier pek rang chawngrurakham u joi. Khan ama na Jesu kha itia maw mohon a amani dieng pek rang, tia chanthatna kha rutawk joi.
41014012	Khan Chawjawboi Rohoi akhat changna nikho a amani na Rakanna kengamte kha ruthat u phakhan, akhaichawi hai na ama dieng rurawdawn uh, “Rakanna nangshakna rang, khoshekawt ah maw she a nangnarashammashak jawt uh?”
41014013	Ama na akhaichawi hai idi tir a amani dieng ruti, “Khopui khawn lut u roh, khan tuibe ruput miring `khat na nurumuk pui u rangnih. Ama anu kha jui u roh.
41014014	Ama lutna in pumi dieng rawdawn u roh, ‘Ojapa na iti, “Kakhaichawi hai le Rakanna kishakna u rang a indan kha khoshekawt ah maw nih?” ’
41014015	Khan ama na rieliensha chungindan lienpui `khat numumuk u rangnih. Makhan kieini rang vak rasham u roh.”
41014016	Akhaichawi hai kha rushe ua khopui ah rulut u phakhan, ama na iruriei ang a, vak rawtawng pui uh, khan amani na Rakanna kha rurasham u joi.
41014017	Khan nitak hin ama na shawmlieidi kha le rushe joi.
41014018	Khan amani na rushuh a rushak u lai khan, Jesu na ruriei, “Kiei na nangni dieng diktak a kiriei inih, nang kar ua kiei le ashashom miring `khat na kiei hi nojor rangnih.”
41014019	Amani kha mulung rushaw pe ua akhat shole akhat na ama dieng “Kiei maw kanih?” ruti. Khan shik `khat na “Kiei maw kanih?” ruti.
41014020	Amani dieng mashang a ruti, “Shawmlieidi, nang kar ua akhat, kiei le khengkam a khut ashunshom ama kha inih.
41014021	Miring Shapa kha ama chungchanga irumiejiek dungjuia ashok pe inih. Inia Miring Shapa ajor miring chung khan idawr a rahvanshie maw nih! Jong shoklam nawkala ama rang tha pe rangnih.”
41014022	Khan amani na rushak u lai khan, Jesu na tan kha ruloi, rahvan runik a rukhoi, khan amani dieng pek a ruti, “Loi u tana shah u roh, mahi kupum kha inih.”
41014023	Khashole ama na hai kha ruloi, khan mapakna niei a amani dieng rupek. Khan amani kholok na makha runek uh.
41014024	Khashole amani dieng ruti, “Mahi rawjawtna `thar kithishen, miring tampui rang a jong long, kha inih.
41014025	Kiei na nangni dieng diktak a kiriei inih, Pathien rengchangna khan athar a kinekna rang a makha Nikho kha hawng shok masheng, kiei na mahi drakha tui hi nelai naw ning.”
41014026	Khan amani na lah `khat ruthaw ua, Olive Lawn ah ruhawng u joi.
41014027	Khashole Jesu na amani dieng ruriei, “Von jan hin, kajar a nang kholok na keruthuina nangniei u rangnih, ajarla hitihin rumiejiek: ‘Kiei na Kengamroi kha that rang kanih, khan kengam hawi kha chaiachai a awm rangnih.’
41014028	“Khanikengta kiei hi nomothoi shole, nang matieng u Galilee ah rushe rang kanih.”
41014029	Inia Peter na ama dieng ruti, “Mi kholok na keruthuimashak joiawm, kiei tu kenuruthuimashak naw nih.”
41014030	Jesu na ama dieng rumashang, “Diktak a kiei na nang dieng kiriei inih, von jantak hin arkhawng na voidi khong mala hin, kuchung a voithum nangrapha rangnih.”
41014031	Inia ama na ranaktak a ruti, “Kiei na nang le roroia thitnashom shokshe khanawm, kiei na nang chung a rapha naw ning!” Amani kholok na hitihin rutiviek uh.
41014032	Khan amani na Gethsemane iti mun khan va ua akhaichawi hai dieng ruti, “Kiei na nikna kienieilai hin, hi mun hin rushuh u roh.”
41014033	Khan Peter, James, khan John, hi ama na rushe pui a, ama na mulungrahana le phairavaina niei ruput joi.
41014034	Khan amani dieng ruti, “Kiringphuk hi thitna dawr a ajeng a shaw joi. Hin rurangah u roh, khan cheveng u roh.”
41014035	Khan ama na amaton tieng rushebawt a rieliei chung ah bawklap a, nitthiei rang a tu makha pha kha na ama kha alimna rang, nikna runiei.
41014036	Khan ama na ruti, “Abba, Kapa, irikip hi nang dieng tu nithieiviek, khajarkhan kahai hi kiei ah put ah noloi pe roh, khanikengta kimining kha nih naw rieshie nangimining kha nih rosho.”
41014037	Khan ama na vak kir phakhan, amani kha amieilam a ruawm u kha vak tawng. Khan Peter dieng ruti, “Simon, nang amiei maw nangnih? Nang na nidan `khatshe cheveng a awm ngam makche maw?
41014038	Nangni na lemna a nangchona boi u rang, cheveng u roh khan nikna niei u roh. Ratha na tu adithet, inia taksha hi na dawkshamna ieniei.”
41014039	Khan ama na rusheret a matieng a inik kha le ra`angre a vak nikret.
41014040	Ama na vak kirret `le, amiei a ruawm u kha vak tawngret, ajarla ajeng a mikrukhu pe uh. Khan amani na ama dieng ih imashang u rang a maw nih, iti rujet u mak.
41014041	Khan ama na voithum changna a vak kirret a amani dieng ruti, “Tunshe hin nangni amiei a shawmuchum maw nangnih u lai? Hun joi! Pha kha jong shok joi. Enro, Miring Shapa kha munu miring hai khut chung a pek joi.
41014042	Thoi u tana she u rang rawi. Enro, kiei najorpa kha na navakdep joi!”
41014043	Ama na chawngruriei laitak khan, shawmlieidi kar a akhat, Judas kha mirawp lientak `khat le chemjam le mawbawng raklam a vat pui joi. Amani kha thiempu ulien hai, danoja hai, khan shierulien hai na ivaktir u inih.
41014044	Ama ajorpa kha na amani dieng jetna pek a ruti, “Kiei na bieng kitumpa kha, ama kha inih. Shur u tana riringtak a chawi u roh.”
41014045	Khan vaphit `le, ama na Jesu kha vak jongtir a “Rabbi, Rabbi!” tia iebieng ah vak tum joi.
41014046	Khashole ama chung a khut rujawn ua amani na rushur u joi.
41014047	Khan iedieng ah ading hai kar a akhat na echemjam kha rupawttap a, thiempu rashang shok `khat rutuk a, onokor kha rutan pe joi.
41014048	Khan Jesu na amani dieng ruti, “Minieisho shur rang ang a, chemjam le rawmaw le kiei nashur rang, vak shok maw nangnih uh?
41014049	Ningthingkip riethiengmun ah mi hai kha kururuchuk, khan nangni le kuruawmshom a nurushur u makche. Inia Miejiek kha hawng shokna rang a inih.”
41014050	Khan akhaichawi kholok na ama kha mathan ua rutan u joi.
41014051	Khan rothar `khat na takmukhu pon ranga rieshiei a ama anu kha rujui joi. Khan amani na rushur u `le,
41014052	ama ponledier kha amak a rekengver a rutan joi.
41014053	Khan amani na Jesu kha thiempu rashang dieng ruchawi u joi. Kha mun khan thiempu ulien kholok, danoja hai le shierulien hai kholok kha vak ruchun u joi.
41014054	Peter na thiempu rashang tolawngshe kha ralaviei a vak jui, ama na riethiengmun shipai hai le rushuh a miei ru`u uh.
41014055	Khan thiempu ulien hai le khan Sanhedrin kha na Jesu thatna rang ajar rutawk pe u joiawm, rumuk pe u mak.
41014056	Ajarla arawplam na ama chung a adik boi kungchangna kha rupek uh. Inia kungchangna hai kha rura`ang pe u mak.
41014057	Khan miring eshen kha thoi ua adik boi kungchangna kha rupek uh.
41014058	Amani na ruti uh, “ ‘Kiei na khut ah kon riethiengmun hi mathang a, ni `thum shung a khut a kon boi riethiengmun mothoi rang kanih,’ tia iruriei kha kieini na kejet uh.”
41014059	Khatikhan ruti ua`awm kungchangna ipek u kha tu rura`ang pe u mak.
41014060	Khan thiempu rashang kha na alaitak ah ding a Jesu dieng rurawdawn, “Mashanglai naw rawng maw? Nang chung a mi hai na kungchangna ipek u hi imaw nih?”
41014061	Inia ama kha ruawmchien a iawm rumashang mak. Khan thiempu rashang kha na rurawdawnret, “Ashapa, kimapak u Christa kha nang maw nangnih?”
41014062	Jesu na rumashang, “Kiei kanih. Miring Shapa kha na Ranaknieipa chang tieng a ashuh, khan ravan a awm romiei le ajong kha nangni na nangmuk u rangnih.”
41014063	Makhan thiempu rashang kha na ama ponledier kha ther a ruti, “Dawn a kungchangna rang, imaw nirangai u lai?
41014064	Pathien imieshiet hi nangni na nangjet u joi! Ih maw nangmining uh?” Khan amanilim kha na ama kha athi rang rutuk ti ua ruheng u joi.
41014065	Khan eshen na ama kha miechiei ruput uh, khan imik kha rushing pe uh. Khan rujem ua, “Rophong roh!” ruti uh. Khan riethiengmun shipai hai kha na khutmaja le ruben uh.
41014066	Peter na thoi tieng ah shumkung khan ruawm le roroia, thiempu rashang shoknu `khat hi ava.
41014067	Peter na miei iruru`u kha vak muk `le, miejierep a ruti, “Nangawm Nazareth Jesu le nangrurawtawp.”
41014068	Inia Peter na rapha a ruti, “Nangiriei miring kha kiei jet mi`ing, khan nangiti kha imaw nih itiawm jet mi`ing.” Khan ama na shumkung ah put ah toh rushokphit `le, arkhawng hawng khong joi.
41014069	Khan shoknu kha na rumukret a iedieng ah ading hai dieng ruti, “Amapa hiawm amani kar a akhat keng”
41014070	Inia makhan`awm rurapharet. Khashole richinkhat awm a iedieng ah ading hai kha na Peter dieng rutiret uh, “Diktak a nang hi amani kar a akhat nangnih, nang chawngriei hi na Galilee miring nangnih, iti madangmashak.”
41014071	Inia ama na nining a pumrobot, khan chawngrurakham, “Nangiriei u miring kha kiei jet mi`ing.”
41014072	Kha phatak khan arkhawng kha voidi changna hawng khong joi. Khan Jesu na ama dieng iruriei, “Arkhawng na voidi khong mala, kuchung a voithum nangrapha rangnih,” iti kha hawng mininghep a Peter na rie`ieklam a ruchap joi.
41015001	Khan jingkar hin relentak a thiempu ulien hai, shierulien hai, danoja hai, khan Sanhedrin kholok na chawng rurashaksho u `le, Jesu kha rukhop ua Pilate dieng ruchawi u joi.
41015002	Makhan Pilate na ama dieng rurawdawn, “Jihudi hai reng kha maw nangnih?” Khan ama na rumashang, “Nangiti kha inih.”
41015003	Khan thiempu ulien hai kha na ajar tampui rupek uh, inia ama na iawm rumashang mak.
41015004	Pilate na ama dieng rurawdawnret, “Nang na iawm mashang naw rawng maw? Enro, amani na nangchung a hidawr a jar inepek u hi!”
41015005	Inia Jesu na ih rumashang mak, khajarkhan Pilate kha shinrudawng pe.
41015006	Khan hi ang rohoi hin, amani na tukhat nita`awm nomoshok pe u roh, iti shurkhop `khat imoshok rang a hi ama shenangai inih.
41015007	Barabbas iti miring `khat ruawm. Ama kha ramuruk iruthaw pui hai kha le lawp a lungroko shung ah irukhopchen inih, ajarla ramuruk thawna a mi iruthat u inih.
41015008	Khan mipui kha na he rashang a ra`ai a ruti uh, “Matieng a ithawngai kha ang a, nawthaw pe u roh,” tia ama dieng anih ruput u joi.
41015009	Inia Pilate na amani dieng mashang a rurawdawn, “Nangni rang Jihudi hai Reng kimoshok rang a hi nangdit u maw?”
41015010	Ajarla thiempu ulien hai na Jesu kha mukmakna jar a irupek u keng, iti kha ama na rujet.
41015011	Inia thiempu ulien hai na Barabbas kha moshokmashakna rang, mipui kha enchak a rumawshawk uh.
41015012	Pilate na mashang a rurieiret, “Khanitatu Jihudi hai Reng nangitipa u hi kiei na imaw lawt ning?”
41015013	Ra`ai a amani na ruti uh, “Ama kha cross ah that roh!”
41015014	Khan Pilate na amani dieng ruti, “Ijar a maw? Ama na ashie imaw ruthaw joi?” Inia amani na rashangdet a ra`ai a ruti uh, “Ama kha cross ah that roh!”
41015015	Khan Pilate na mipui kha ningruminit pe jawt jarkhan, Barabbas kha amani rang rumoshok pe joi. Khan Pilate na Jesu kha enchak a rumejem a cross ah thatna rang, amani dieng rupek joi.
41015016	Khan ramiring hai na Jesu kha Praetorium iti tomai khan ruchawi ua amani na rarup kholok ruruchun u joi.
41015017	Khan amani na Jesu kha rengpon rurieshieimashak uh, khan riling le renglukhum `khat ruphan ua, ama lu ah rukhumashak u joi.
41015018	Khan amani na ama kha “Lawm roh, Jihudi hai Reng!” tia chubai rupek uh.
41015019	Khashole amani na shingnang pum le ulu ah rujem ua rumiechiei uh, khan rukhuk shun a ama kha chubairubawk uh.
41015020	Khan ama kha engshiet a ruthaw u lai khan, rengpon irieshiei kha ruthut pe ua ama ponlediertak kha rurieshieimashak u joi. Khan amani na cross ah that rang, ruchawi u joi.
41015021	Khan Alexander le Rufus apa u Simon iti Cyrene miring `khat kha, kho ah put ah hawng kirna hin, ama cross kha rangrat a rumuphung uh.
41015022	Amani na Jesu kha Golgotha iti mun ah ruchawi u joi. Mahi nemele le Luru Mun tina inih.
41015023	Khan ju le myrrh reche tui kha rupek uh, inia Jesu na runek pe mak.
41015024	Amani na cross ah rumakhai u lai khan, ama ponledier hai kha rushen ua miring rikip na ih kha maw tu dieng chang nih, tia vanmuk ruen uh.
41015025	Ama kha cross ah rumakhai u phakhan, nidan `ko cho joi.
41015026	Khan ama kha ithatna u ajar kha JIHUDI HAI RENG, tia luchung tieng rumiejiek pe uh.
41015027	Khan ama le rawtawp minieisho, akhat kha ama viei tieng, khan akhat kha ama chang tieng ah shir ah, cross hai khan idi kha rumakhai uh.
41015028	Khatikhan Miejiek na iruriei kha hawng rupum inih, hitihin ieriei, “Ama kha danishawnboi hai kha le rutechen uh.”
41015029	Iedieng ah shehawng hai na, amani lu nawklam a mieshiet a ruti uh. “Hawhawiaw! Riethiengmun kha mathang a ni `thum shung a mothoi rang a pa.
41015030	Nang nining a rekhek tana cross ah put ah jong chum roh.”
41015031	Khatikhan thiempu ulien hai le danoja hai na`awm engshiet a ruthaw ua manilemani dieng ruti uh, “Ama na shik miring hai kha rushan, inia nining a tu rashan ngam mak.
41015032	Kimik u na kumuk u `le takakawshawnna u rang, Israel hai Reng Christa kha na cross ah put ah tun jong chum rosho.” Cross ah irukhai pui hai kha na`awm khatikhan erawh a rubiek uh.
41015033	Khan nidan shawmlieidi ah put ah nidan `thumshe hin ram rikip kha rujing joi.
41015034	Khan nidan `thumtak khan Jesu na he rashangtak a ra`ai a ruti, “Eloi, Eloi, lama sabachthani?” Mahi nemele le “Kapathien, kapathien, ijar a nanginamathan maw nih joi”? tina inih.
41015035	Khan makhan ah ading eshen na makha rujet u phakhan, ruti uh, “Enro, ama na Elijah kha ahai joi.”
