41015036	Khan mi `khat na rutan a spongos kha ju athur khan runawm a, rawmaw mawr ah rukhop pe, khan nek rang rupek. Ama na ruti, “Bieh u naw roh. Elijah na jong a ama kha jongmuchum maw en u rawi.”
41015037	Khan Jesu na he rashangtak a rura`ai a arang ruchat joi.
41015038	Khan riethiengmun maikharpon kha chung ah put ah thoishe her `di a rether joi.
41015039	Khan Jesu le mai re`enchak a ading rarajakhat lamkaipa kha na Jesu na khatikhan a athi kha muk a ruti, “Diktak a mahi miring hi Pathien Shapa kha keng!”
41015040	Khan nupang hai kha na rakhat ah vak en uh. Amani kar a Magdala nupang Mary, Joses le mutumapa, James unu Mary le Salome ruawm uh.
41015041	Amani hai hi Galilee ah ruawm u lai a ama anu jui a ochon iruthaw pe, khan ama le rawtawp a Jerusalem tieng ah ahawng nupang hai kha`awm ruawm uh.
41015042	Khan ni hawng tah a Sabbath nikho mala a Rashamna Nikho kha hawng shok `le,
41015043	rampo hai kar a mi na ila, khan Pathien rengchangna kha upumtak na irungak Arimathea Joseph kha ava. Khan ngar`er a Pilate dieng rushe a Jesu rok kha vak nik.
41015044	Khan Pilate na Jesu kha thi joi, iti jet `le, shinrudawng pe. Khan rarajakhat lamkai kha rukoi a Jesu thitna kha shawt joi maw, tia rurawdawn.
41015045	Khan rarajakhat lamkai dieng Pilate na rujet`het shole, Jesu rok kha Joseph dieng rupek joi.
41015046	Khan Joseph na ponramasha `khat rurawchawk, khan ama kha cross ling ah jongmuchum a ponramasha kha le rujo joi. Khan lung iver khan rumaja a than mawkawt kha lung `khat le rukhar joi.
41015047	Khan Mary Magdalene le Joses unu Mary na Jesu irumajana u mun kha tinruta uh.
41016001	Khan Sabbath nikho theng shole, Mary Magdalene, James unu Mary, khan Solome, amani na she a ama chung ah nawt rang, rieipartui rurawchawk uh.
41016002	Khan hapta shung a akhat changna nikho jingkara, ni hong shokphit `le, amani na thankung ah rushe uh.
41016003	Khan tu na maw than mawkawt kharna lung kha nemelet pe u nih, tia ruriebieh uh.
41016004	Khan amani na en u phakhan, mawkawt kha ajeng a rulien joiawm, rureletsha a rumuk u joi.
41016005	Khan amani na than shung khan rulut ua, rothar `khat ponrosho achek rieshiei a chang tieng ah shir ah rushuh kha muk u phakhan, rurawthawk uh.
41016006	Khan amani dieng ruti, “Nangni rawthawk u naw roh, Cross ah iruthat u Nazareth Jesu kha nangitawk u inih. Ama kha hawng ring joi! Ama kha hin awmlai mak. Enro, ama irumajana u mun hi.
41016007	Nangni na she u tana akhaichawi hai dieng le Peter dieng vak mejet u roh. Ajarla ama na nang matieng u Galilee ah rushe rangnih, tia nangni dieng inururiei u dungjuia, ama kha makhan nangmuk u rangnih.”
41016008	Makhan amani na relentak a than ah put ah vak shok ua rutan u joi. Ajarla amani kha shindawng a rurawnawk uh, khan ruchih u jarkhan, tute dieng ruriei u mak.
41016009	Khan hapta shung a akhat changna jingkara hin Jesu na hawng thoi shole, raikho shiri irunawt pe Mary Magdalene dieng matieng Christa na rular joi.
41016010	Khan ama na rushe a mulungjum a rie`ieklam a chap, ama le rurawtawp, hai dieng khan vak riei.
41016011	Jesu na hawng ring kha kiei na kumuk joi, tia ivakriei kha rujet u phakhan, ruring u mak.
41016012	Khashole pasha `di dieng, ram `khat ah rushena ua, eme shik a rularret.
41016013	Khan amani na rushe ua shik hai dieng vak riei uh, inia amani na`awm ruring u mak.
41016014	Khashole tebol ah rushuh khaichawi shawmlieikhat hai dieng Christa na rular. Khan amani na iringna boi u le amani mulung michimna khan rurawkawk. Ajarla ama kha hawng ring shole, amuh hai iriei kha ruring u mak.
41016015	Amani dieng ruti, “Nangni manmieshie kholok hin she u tana athachawng hi khutkon rikip dieng vak rophong u roh.
41016016	Khan takashawn a baptisma ruloi ama kha shan rangnih, inia takarushawn boi ama kha aheng rangnih.
41016017	Hihai jetna hai hi na takashawn hai kha jui rangnih: Kiriming a raikho hai kha nawt u rangnih, khan chawng `thar a chawng u rangnih.
41016018	Amani na khut le moro ashar a arak u rangnih, khan tur kha neksheawm ih ti u naw nih. Khan amani na ana hai chung ah khut tet pe u ning, tia amani kha dam u rangnih.”
41016019	Khan Pumi na hihai chawng hi ruriei pe shole, ama kha ravan tieng ruloi joi. Khan Pathien khut chang tieng rushuh joi.
41016020	Khan amani na rushe ua mun rikip ah chawng kha rushem u joi. Khan Pumi na amani le chon ruthaw joi. Khan amani chawngriei hai kha chonrekhek jetna hai kha le irumenet pe inih. Amen.
42001001	Kieini kar a hawng rupum chawngshok hai chungchanga rishim miejiekna rang, mi tampui na rurashak uh.
42001002	Putna a mik a muk a kungruchang hai le athachawng shepding ruchang hai kha na kieini dieng khut inururotho pui u tak kha le ra`ang,
42001003	richit`awm Aw Theophilus, kiei na kung ah put ah riringtak a kihawngjui rikip kha nang dieng dawdawn a kimiejiek rang a hi, kiei na`awm atha, tia koloi.
42001004	Makha mi na nang dieng a inururuchuk chawng hai chungchanga adik kha rupumping a nangjetna rang a inih.
42001005	Judea reng, Herod rong khan, Zacharias iti thiempu `khat ruawm. Ama kha Abijah rui a rushok inih. Unungak kha Elizabeth iti Aaron tunu hai kar a akhat runih.
42001006	Adinre kha Pathien maikung a midik runih uh. Amani na Pumi chawngpek hai le ridikna hai kholok kha jui jarkhan, metekna awm boipet a ruring uh.
42001007	Khania Elizabeth kha nairong runih jarkhan, amani na nai runiei u mak. Adinre kha kumletha na rulim u joi.
42001008	Nikhat hin Zacharias na Pathien maikung a ama thiempu thoi thawna rang, ama lawmdawn
42001009	Thiempumun shena dungjuia, ama na Pumi riethiengmun rulut a berawh ha rang vanmuk en a ama chung a rucho pe.
42001010	Berawh kha ruhalai khan, mipui ruchun kha na vai tieng nikna niei a ruawm uh.
42001011	Berawh hana maicham chang tieng khan Pumi ravantir `khat na ama dieng rular.
42001012	Khan Zacharias na ama kha rumuk phakhan, rurawnawk, khan chitna kha na ama kha rumukhu.
42001013	Khan ravantir na ama dieng ruti, “Chih naw roh Zacharias, ajarla nanginik kha Pathien na rangai joi. Nang inkonu Elizabeth na nang rang shapa `khat niei rangnih. Ama riming kha John nangti pe rangnih.
42001014	Ama kha nang rang rawshawna le mapakna chang rangnih. Khan ama shok phakhan, mi tampui ningai rangnih.
42001015	Ajarla Pumi maikung a ama kha lur rangnih. Khan itikte nita`awm ama na ju ninawkle khawpnathiei ju neh naw nih. Unu vawn shungshe khan Ratha Riethieng le ship rangnih.
42001016	Ama na Israel miring tampui hi amani Pumi Pathien dieng hawng mikir rangnih.
42001017	Elijah ratha le ranak khan Pumi maikung a lawn rangnih. Makha ‘apa hai mulung kha nai hai dieng hieina rang,’ chawngjui boi kha midik lungvar dieng hieina rang, khan Pumi rang a rasham miring konna rang a inih.”
42001018	Khan Zacharias na ravantir dieng ruti, “Mahi kiei na itia maw jet ning? Ajarla kiei hi atar `khat kanih joi, khan ki`inkonu`awm kumletha na alim joi.”
42001019	Ravantir na mashang a ruti, “Kiei hi Pathien maikung a ading Gabriel kha kanih. Kiei hi nang dieng chawngriei rang le mahi ningaina chawng rophong rang a inojongtir inih.
42001020	Khania enro, pha dungjuia hawng rupum rang a kawchawng hai khan takanangshawn boi jarkhan, nang heshok boi a awm rang nangnih, khan hihai kholok hi shok masheng, nang chawng ngamlai naw tinih.”
42001021	Khan mi hai na Zacharias kha rungak a ruawm uh. Riethiengmun ah put ah vak shumhai jarkhan, shindawngna runiei uh.
42001022	Ama na vak shok phakhan, amani dieng herusho thieilai mak. Riethiengmun ah mulungmik imuk keng joi, iti kha amani na rujet uh. Ajarla ama na jetna hai kha ruthaw, khan hesho thiei boi a ruawm joi.
42001023	Khan hitihin rushok, ama richichon thawna nikho hai kha ruhek phakhan, i`in ah rushe joi.
42001024	Khan khahai nikho shole, i`inkonu Elizabeth na nairuvawng joi, khan tha rahnga dawr hi bitlam a ruawm.
42001025	Ama na ruti, “Pumi na kiei hi ne`en phakhan, hihaihi ithaw inih. Makha mi hai kar a maimawkna kha kiei ah put ah noloina pe rang a inih.”
42001026	Tha `ruk changna khan Nazareth iti Galilee ah awm kho `khat ah, Pathien na ravantir Gabriel kha
42001027	David inshung a awm Joseph iti rothar `khat na ishot shimnu `khat dieng rutir. Khan shimnu riming kha Mariam ruti.
42001028	Ama dieng she a ruti, “Pathien na imiritnu, chubai. Pumi na nang kha nawrawtawp pui joi. Nang hi nupang hai kar a rahvantha nangnih!”
42001029	Khania ama chawng hai khan rurawnawk a mahi ih chat chubai maw nih, tia rumining.
42001030	Ravantir na ama dieng ruti, “Chih naw roh Mariam, ajarla nang na Pathien miritna kha nangmuk joi.
42001031	Enro, nang na nai nangvawng a shapa `khat nangniei rangnih. Ama riming kha Jesu nangti pe rangnih.
42001032	Ama kha lur rangnih, khan ama kha Rashang chungchon Shapa ti rangnih. Pumi Pathien na ama dieng apa David rengshutna kha pek rangnih.
42001033	Khan hektiknieiboi a Jacob inshung a ama na reng chang rangnih. Ama rengchangna kha kumshawt a awm rangnih.”
42001034	Mariam na ravantir dieng ruti, “Kiei apa le rishih boipet a mahi itia maw nithiei nih?”
42001035	Ravantir na mashang a ama dieng ruti, “Ratha Riethieng na nang dieng jong rangnih, khan Rashang chungchon ranak kha na nang kha nirilip rangnih. Khajarkhan Nai Riethieng nanginiei rang a kha Pathien Shapa ti rangnih.
42001036	Enro, nang shokpuinu Elizabeth ama na`awm atar tieng shapa `khat vawng joi. Nairong itinu u kha tun tha `ruk nih joi.
42001037	Ajarla Pathien le anithiei boi iti awm mak.”
42001038	Khashole Mariam na ruti, “Enro, kiei hi Pumi shoknu kha kanih! Nangiriei dungjuia, kiei dieng ashok nih rosho.” Khan ravantir kha ama ah put ah rushe joi.
42001039	Khalaikhan Mariam na ruthoi a mo ram, Judea khopui khan nawtshun a ruhawng joi.
42001040	Kha mun khan ama na Zacharias in ah rulut a Elizabeth kha chubai rupek.
42001041	Khan hitihin rushok, Elizabeth na Mariam chubai kha rujet phakhan, anaikawk ah nai kha ruchawm pe. Khan Elizabeth kha Ratha Riethieng na jong ship joi.
42001042	Elizabeth na he rashangtak a rura`ai a ruti, “Nupang hai kar a nang rahvantha nangnih, nang naikawk ara kha rahvantha inih!
42001043	Khan kupumi unu nang na kiei dieng nangva hi itia shok maw nih?
42001044	Ajarla nang chubai pek hesho kha kejetphit `le, kanaikawk ah nai hi na rawshaw a ruchawm.
42001045	Khan Pumi na ama dieng a iruriei kha rupum rangnih, tia takashawn ama kha rahvanmuh miring kha inih.”
42001046	Khan Mariam na ruti, “Kiringphuk na Pumi kha mielien,
42001047	khan karatha na kashandampa Pathien jar a ningai.
42001048	Hijarhin ama shoknu adawk awmchan kha jet joi. Ajarla enro, tun ah put ah rong kholok na kiei hi rahvanmuh, tia nokoi rangnih joi.
42001049	Hijarhin Ranaknieipa kha na kiei dieng chon lientak thaw joi. Ama riming kha riethieng inih.
42001050	Ama achih miring hai dieng rongrong a ama roihoina kha awm.
42001051	Ama banbo kha le aranak kha rumumuk; amani mulungmining a lienrasha hai kha rangrang a rutet.
42001052	Ranakniei hai kha rengmun ah put ah rumocho, khan rede hai kha ama na alawm.
42001053	Vawncham hai kha nekleshak atha hai kha le rumiship, khan rawchawng miring hai kha rok a rumikir.
42001054	Ama roihoina miningna khan ama shok Israel kha rushan joi.
42001055	Makha napa u hai dieng, Abraham dieng le ama chicha hai dieng kumshawt a chawng iruriei dungjuia ashok inih.”
42001056	Khan Mariam na Elizabeth le tha `thum dawr ruawm a i`in ah rukir joi.
42001057	Khan Elizabeth na nai inieina rang a pha kha hawng rupum pe a ama na shapa `khat runiei joi.
42001058	Pumi na ama chung a roihoina lientak irutetna kha ringchangpui le inkoshangram hai kha na rujet ua, ama le ningrungaishom uh.
42001059	Khan hitihin rushok, ni `riet changna khan amani na naitepa vunepna rang le apa riming moloh a Zacharias, tia riming phona rang rushe uh.
42001060	Inia unu na rumashang, “Nimak, ama riming John, tia pho pe rang a inih.”
42001061	Amani na ama dieng ruti uh, “Nang shokpui hai kar a tute na mahi riming hi pho maklai.”
42001062	Amani na apa dieng itia maw koi jawt, iti jetna rang, ama dieng jetna rupek uh.
42001063	Ama na miejiekna rang lungpek `khat runik, khan rumiejiek a ruti, “Ama riming hi John inih.” Makhan amani lawpsheng a shindawngna runiei uh.
42001064	Khan relentak a Pathien na abai kha rumawlawng pe a iemieliei kha ruthut pe joi. Khan ama na achawng ruput a Pathien kha rumapak joi.
42001065	Ringchangpui kholok dieng chitna kha jong shok, khan Judea lawn ah awm mi kholok na chonshok jar a ruriei uh.
42001066	Ajet hai mi rikip na amani mulungmining a ruti uh, “Mahi naitepa hi imaw hawng rachang nih?” Khatikhan Pumi khut kha ama le rurawtawp.
42001067	Khan apa Zacharias kha Ratha Riethieng na jongship, khan chawng rurophong a ruti,
42001068	“Israel Pumi Pathien kha rahvantha inih, hijarhin ama na nojong phak a ama miring hai rang, khekna chon kha jong thaw joi.
42001069	Khan ama shok David inshung a shandamna riki kha kieini rang mothoi joi.
42001070	Makha, rong put ah put ah, ama thiempulien riethieng hai bai a chawng irurieitak kha dungjuia ashok inih.
42001071	Ama na naraha pui hai ah put ah le namumah hai khut ah put ah nashan rangnih.
42001072	Khatikhan ama na napa hai dieng a chawngirurakham roihoina kha numumuk joi. Ama rawjawtna riethieng kha mininghep joi.
42001073	Napa u Abraham dieng chawngirurakham kha:
42001074	Narahapui hai khut ah put ah nurukhek jarkhan, kieini na chih boipet a ama chon nawthawna pe rang a inih.
42001075	Makha amaikung a riethieng a le dikna khan niringlailim chon thawna rang a inih.
42001076	Khan naitepa nang hi Rashang chungchon thiempulien, tia koi rangnih. Ajarla Pumi maton ah, ama Lam hai kha arasham rang, she rang nangnih.
42001077	Munu hai rangaidamna jar a shandamna varna kha imiring hai pekna rang a inih.
42001078	Pathien roihoina renem jar a rashang ah put ah nuchung ua Ni shok joi.
42001079	Makha ajing le thitna rilip a awm amani dieng mieivar pekna rang a inih. Lungdamna lam a neke u hai kha lamnakaina pe rang a inih.”
42001080	Naitepa kha hawng rawshawn a ratha a hawng rat joi. Khan Israel miring hai dieng ama vanoichon kha ruput masheng, ama na ramthim ah ruawm.
42002001	Khalaikhan hitihin ruawm, makhala rieliei mi rikip na riming mulut rang a inih, tia Caesar Augustus na chawng rumocho joi.
42002002	Mahi riming mulutna hi Quirinius na Syria rupoklai a akhat changna a ashok inih.
42002003	Mi rikip na amama khopui ah riming mulut rang rushe joi.
42002004	Joseph`awm Galilee ah awm Nazareth ah put ah Judea ah awm Bethlehem iti David khopui khan rushe joi. Ajarla ama kha David inshungrui ah put ah rushok inih.
42002005	Ama na inkonu rang a ishot tawngta boi Mariam le riming mulut rang a rushe inih.
42002006	Amani na makhan ruawm u lai khan, ama na nai nieina rang a nikho hai kha hawng shun pe joi.
42002007	Khan Mary na sharapa shapa `khat runiei a naipon le rutum joi. In khan amani rang mun ruawm boi jarkhan, shiei shakshakna rokong `khat ah ama kha rumaja.
42002008	Makha ramtak khan kengamroi hai na phaijaw ah kengam roi a ruawm uh. Jan a amani kengam hai kha rurung uh.
42002009	Khan enro, Pumi ravantir `khat na amani maton ah jong ding a Pumi lurna kha na amani kha hieichip a jong eh. Makhan amani ajeng a ruchih uh.
42002010	Khania ravantir na amani dieng ruti, “Chih u naw roh, ajarla enro, ningaina lientak apeh ningaina chawng kha nangni rang kojongchoi. Mahi mi kholok rang a inih.
42002011	Ajarla von nikho hin David khopui ah nangni rang Shandampa `khat shok joi. Ama kha Pumi Christa kha inih.
42002012	Nangni na naitepa kha shiei shakshakna rokong ah naipon le rojo a aja kha nangmuk u rangnih. Mahi nangni rang a jetna `khat inih.”
42002013	Khan jetboithieboi a ravanmi hawi `khat na ravantir kha le ruawm ua Pathien kha mapaklam a ruti uh,
42002014	“Rashangtak a awm Pathien dieng lurna kha awm rosho, khan rieliei a awm Pathien na imirit miring hai kar a lungdamna kha awm rosho!”
42002015	Khan hitihin ruawm, ravantir kha na amani kha rumak a ravan a ruhawng phakhan, kengamroi hai na khatlekhat dieng ruti uh, “Kieini na Bethlehemshe she u taia, Pumi na kieini dieng a inemejetsha ashok chon hai kha vak en u rang rawi.”
42002016	Amani na nawtshun a va ua Mariam le Joseph kha vak muk uh. Khan naitepa kha shiei shakshakna rokong ah aja a ruawm kha vak muk uh
42002017	Khan amani na rumuk u phakhan, naitepa chungchanga amani dieng iruriei kha mipui dieng vak mejet u joi.
42002018	Khan mi kholok na kengamroi hai na amani dieng iriei chungchang khan, shindawngna runiei uh.
42002019	Khania Mariam na hihai chawng hai hi arerep a umulung shung a mining a ruawm.
42002020	Khan kengamroi hai na irujet u le irumuk u jarkhan, Pathien kha mulur le mapaklam a rukir u joi. Makha ravantir na amani dieng a irurieitak kha ashok inih.
42002021	Ashin naitepa kha vunepna rang a ni `riet kha hawng rupum phakhan, ama kha Jesu tia riming rupho pe u joi. Makha riming kha Mary na naikawk ah vawng mala a ravantir na irupek riming inih.
42002022	Moses Dan dungjuia riethiengmashakna nikho kha hawng rupum phakhan, Pumi dieng pekna rang, Jerusalem ah vak chawi uh.
42002023	Hitihin Pumi Dan khan rumiejiek, “Naikawk mawlawng apa rikip kha PUMI rang a madansha inih, tia koi rang a inih.
42002024	Khan Pumi Dan ah iriei dungjuia pharphali rawbaw `khat ninawkle pharphali tete idi le thawi rang a inih.”
42002025	Khan enro, Jerusalem ah Simeon iti miring `khat ruawm. Ama kha midik le richichawi miring `khat runih. Israel kha Maw`awina rang a pha kha ama na ingak a ruawm inih. Khan Ratha Riethieng kha ama chung a ruawm.
42002026	Ama na Pumi Christa kha muk masheng thi naw nih, iti kha Ratha Riethieng na ama dieng irumumuk inih.
42002027	Ratha Riethieng na lamrukai pe a ama na riethiengmun khan rushe. Khan Naitepa Jesu kha unulepa na, ama rang Dan dungjuia thoithawna rang, vak chawi uh.
42002028	Simeon na Naitepa kha rupawm a Pathien mapaklam a ruti:
42002029	“Aw Pumi, tun nang chawngriei dungjuia, nang shokpa kiei hi lungdam a noloi rang roh.
42002030	Ajarla nang na mi kholok maikung a nangirurasham,
42002031	Nang shandamna kha, kimik hai hi na muk joi.
42002032	Ama hi Phungshik hai dieng chawngrophong rang a mieivar `khat inih, khan nang miring Israel dieng lurna rang a inih.”
42002033	Khan Joseph le unu na ama chungchanga irieina khan shindawngna runiei uh.
42002034	Khashole Simeon na amani kha rahvan rupek a unu Mariam dieng ruti, “Enro, Israel shung a mi tampui chona rang le thoina rang, nai hi imadan nih joi; khan amani na ire`erna pui u jetna kha chang rangnih.
42002035	(Inia nang mulungtak kha nokhoi pe rangnih). Khatikhan makha na mi tampui mulungmining kha rophong pe rangnih.”
42002036	Khan Asher phung Phanuel shanu Anna iti thiempilien `khat ruawm. Ama kha atarber, inruniei ah put ah inkopa le kum shiribak ruawm inih.
42002037	Khashole kum shawmrietlieimili dawr hi mieirawng ruchang. Ama na shunlejan a chamradoi a le anih a chubai irubawk a riethiengmun kha mathan boi a ruawm inih.
42002038	Kha phatak khan ama`awm ava a Pumi kha vak mapak. Ama na Jerusalem rekhekna rang a rungak mi kholok dieng ama chungchanga chawngruriei.
42002039	Pumi Dan dungjuia kholok kha rupummashaksho u le, amani na Galilee ah awm amani khopui Nazareth khan rukir u joi.
42002040	Naitepa kha hawng rawshawn, khan Ratha a hawng rat joi. Varna kha na ruship a Pathien numpokmirit kha ama chung a ruawm joi.
42002041	Khan unulepa kha na kumkip Rakanna rohoi rang, Jerusalem ah rushe uh.
42002042	Khan ama na kum shawmlieidi hawng nih phakhan, amani na rohoi shena dungjuia, Jerusalem ah rushe uh.
42002043	Khan nikho hai kha rumeheksho ua amani rukir u le roroia, Pashanai Jesu kha Jerusalem ah rurangah joi. Makha Joseph le unu na rujet u mak.
42002044	Hawi khan ajaw rawrawi keng, tia rumining ua amani na nikho `khat rulawn u joi. Khashole amani shokpui hai le lawm hai kar a atawk ruput u joi.
42002045	Amani na muk boi phakhan, ama atawk rang Jerusalem tieng vak kir uh.
42002046	Ni `thum shole, riethiengmun ah ama na oja hai kar a rushuh, amani chawng kha irurangai, khan chawngrurawdawn a ruawm kha vak muk uh.
42002047	Ama ijetna le awchawng mashang hai rangai mi rikip kha na shindawngna runiei uh.
42002048	Unulepa kha na ama kha rumuk phakhan, shindawngna runiei ua unu na ama dieng ruti, “Naitepa, ijar a hitihin a kieini dieng nangithaw maw nih? Enro, nangpa le kiei na mulungshawlam a kinatawk u keng.”
42002049	Ama na amani dieng rumashang, “Ijar a kiei hi ninatawk u maw nih? Kiei hi kapa in ah awmngir rang kanih, iti hi jet u makche maw?”
42002050	Khania amani dieng a iruriei kha rujet u mak.
42002051	Khashole amani le rushe a Nazareth tieng va joi, khan amani chawng kha rurangai. Unu na hihai kholok hi umulung shung a arerep a rutet.
42002052	Khan Jesu kha varna le taksha a rurawshawn, khan Pathien le miring hai numpokmirit kha rumuk.
42003001	Tiberius Caesar kum shawmlieirahnga changna rengchangna khan, Pontius Pilate na Judea rampo ruchang, Herod na Galilee tetrarch ruchang, anaipangpa Philip na Iturea le Trachonitis tetrarch ruchang, khan Lysanias na Abilene tetrarch ruchang.
42003002	Annas le Caiaphas na thiempu rashang runih u lai khan, Pathien chawng kha Zacharias shapa John dieng ramthim ah ajong inih.
42003003	Ama na Jordan shie `di ah awm ram kholok khan rushe a mulung lek mumukna rang le Pathien dieng hiei a munu hai rangaidamna kha mukna rang, baptisma iloi u rang a inih, tia chawng rushem.
42003004	Hitihin thiempulien Isaiah chawngriei hai behangbuk ah rumiejiek, ama na ruti, “Ramthim ah hesho `khat na ra`ai, ‘PUMI lam kha kon pe roh, ama lam hai kha moton pe roh.
42003005	Phaijaw rikip kha miship rangnih, khan lawn rikip kha redemashak rangnih. Khan lamkawi hai kha moton, khan aphor lam hai kha ranamashak rangnih.
42003006	Khan miring kholok na Pathien shandamna kha muk rangnih.’ ”
42003007	Ama dieng baptisma loi ava mipui hai dieng ruriei, “Nangni moro chicha hai! Jong shok rang a lunghangna ah put ah atan rang, tu na maw nangni kha nierieimasha u joi?
42003008	Khajarkhan mulung lekna rutuk ara hai kha moshok u roh. ‘Abraham kha kapa u `khat a kieniei uh,’ ti nenek u naw roh. Ajarla hihai lung ah put ah Abraham rang Pathien na nai hai kha mothoi ngam, iti hi nangni dieng kinieriei u inih.
42003009	Tunawm thing hai rujung khan riei kha rutung a awm joi. Khajarkhan ara atha moshok boi thingkung rikip kha tuk a miei a apai.”
42003010	Khan mipui na ama dieng ti uh, “Khanitala kieini na imaw thaw u ning?”
42003011	John na mashang a amani dieng ruti, “Kotai idi aniei ama kha na aniei boi ama dieng peh rosho, khan nekleshak aniei ama kha na khatikhan thaw rosho.”
42003012	Khan khaichana rawkhawm haiawm ama dieng baptisma aloi rang ava ua, ama dieng ruti uh, “Oja, kieini na imaw thaw u ning?”
42003013	Amani dieng rumashang, “Nangni dieng inepek dan kha khea rawkhawm u naw roh.”
42003014	Khan ramiring hai na`awm ama dieng rurawdawn uh, “Kieini na imaw thaw u ning?” Amani dieng ruti, “Tute na ranak a shier rawkhawm u naw roh, ninawkle anih boi a mi bieh u naw roh, khan nang lawh u kha le hun u roh.”
42003015	Mi na ngakrala le roroia, John hi Christa kha nithiei, tia mulung shung a rurawdawn uh.
42003016	John na mi kholok dieng ruriei, “Kiei na nangni kha tui a baptisma kenepek uh, inia ajong rang a ama hi kieinek a ranak nieidet. Kiei hi ama kekawkrui thut rang khan rutuk mi`ing. Ama na nangni kha Ratha Riethieng le miei a baptisma nepek u rangnih.
42003017	Ama pher kha khoreng a riethiengmashakna rang le gehu kha achu ah mulutna rang, rieliei kha ama khut chung a awm joi. Khania irishi hai kha chiemtiknieiboi miei a ha rangnih.”
42003018	Khajarkhan mawshawkna tampui le athachawng kha mi hai dieng rurophong.
42003019	Inia anaipangpa Philip inkonu Herodia jar a le ochonthaw ashie kholok jar a, tetrarch Herod kha John na rurawkawk.
42003020	Hihai kholok chung a, ama na John kha lungroko shung ah irukhum inih.
42003021	Khan hitihin rushok, mi kholok kha baptisma rumoloi phakhan, Jesu kha`awm baptisma rumoloi joi. Khan ama na runik phakhan, ravan kha rurawlawng joi.
42003022	Khan Ratha Riethieng na vashu ang a taksha me a ama chung ah jong chum, khan ravan ah put ah he `khat jong a iti, “Numkipoktak kashapa kha nangnih, nang chung a ningnitna kha kieniei joi.”
42003023	Khan Jesu na chon ruput phakhan, kum shawm `thum dawr runih joi. Mi na imining dungjuia, ama kha Joseph shapa inih. Joseph kha Heli shapa inih. Heli kha Matthat shapa inih.
42003024	Matthat kha Levi shapa inih. Levi kha Melki shapa inih. Melki kha Jannai shapa inih. Jannai kha Joseph shapa inih.
42003025	Joseph kha Mattathiah shapa inih. Mattathiah kha Amos shapa inih. Amos kha Nahum shapa inih. Nahum kha Esli shapa inih. Esli kha Naggai shapa inih.
42003026	Naggai kha Maath shapa inih. Maath kha Mattathiah shapa inih. Mattathiah kha Semei shapa inih. Semei kha Joseph shapa inih. Joseph kha Judah shapa inih.
42003027	Judah kha Joanna shapa inih. Joanna kha Rhesa shapa inih. Rhesa kha Zerubbabel shapa inih. Zerubbabel kha Shalathiel shapa inih. Shalathiel kha Neri shapa inih.
42003028	Neri kha Melki shapa inih. Melki kha Addi shapa inih. Addi kha Cosam shapa inih. Cosam kha Elmodam shapa inih. Elmodam kha Er shapa inih.
42003029	Er kha Joses shapa inih, Joses kha Eliezer shapa inih. Eliezer kha Jorim shapa inih. Jorim kha Matthat shapa inih. Matthat kha Levi shapa inih.
42003030	Levi kha Simeon shapa inih. Simeon kha Judah shapa inih. Judah kha Joseph shapa inih. Joseph kha Jonan shapa inih. Jonan kha Eliakim shapa inih.
42003031	Eliakim kha Melea shapa inih. Melea kha Menan shapa inih. Menan kha Mattatha shapa inih. Mattatha kha Nathan shapa inih. Nathan kha David shapa inih.
42003032	David kha Jesse shapa inih. Jesse kha Obed shapa inih. Obed kha Boaz shapa inih. Boaz kha Salmon shapa inih. Salmon kha Nahshon shapa inih.
42003033	Nahshon kha Aminadab shapa inih. Aminadab kha Aram shapa inih. Aram kha Hezron shapa inih. Hezron kha Perez shapa inih. Perez kha Judah shapa inih.
42003034	Judah kha Jacob shapa inih. Jacob kha Isaac shapa inih. Isaac kha Abraham shapa inih. Abraham kha Terah shapa inih. Terah kha Nahor shapa inih.
42003035	Nahor kha Serug shapa inih. Serug kha Reu shapa inih. Reu kha Peleg shapa inih. Peleg kha Eber shapa inih. Eber kha Shelah shapa inih.
42003036	Shelah kha Cainan shapa inih. Cainan kha Arphaxad shapa inih. Arphaxad kha Shem shapa inih. Shem kha Noah shapa inih. Noah kha Lamech shapa inih.
42003037	Lamech kha Methusala shapa inih. Methusala kha Enoch shapa inih. Enoch kha Jared shapa inih. Jared kha Mahalalel shapa inih. Mahalalel kha Cainan shapa inih.
42003038	Cainan kha Enos shapa inih. Enos kha Seth shapa inih. Seth kha Adam shapa inih. Khan Adam kha Pathien shapa inih.
42004001	Khan Jesu na, Ratha Riethieng shiplam a, Jordan ah put ah vak kir a Ratha na ramthim ah ruchawi joi.
42004002	Kha mun khan diabol na ni shawm mili rulem. Khahai nikho khan ih shak boi a ruawm, khan nikho hawng shun phakhan, vawnrucham pe joi.
42004003	Diabol na ama dieng ruti, “Pathien Shapa kha nangnih a tu, hi lung dieng hin tan rachangna rang, chawng peh roh.”
42004004	Makhan Jesu na mashang a ama dieng ruti, “Hitihin miejiek, ‘Miring na nekleshak ranga kha le ring naw nih, inia Pathien chawng rikip kha le aring rang a inih.’ ”
42004005	Khashole diabol na lawn rashang a ruchawi a richinkhatte hin manmieshie rengchangna hai kha rumumuk.
42004006	Khan diabol na ama dieng ruti, “Hihai kholok cham le amani lurna hai hi nang dieng nepek rang kanih, ajarla mahi kiei dieng nepek joi, khan kidit miring tukhat dieng nita`awm kiei na kipek inih.
42004007	Khajarkhan kiei hi chubainangnabawk a tu, kholok hi nang tah chang rangnih.”
42004008	Jesu na mashang a ama dieng ruti, “Kiei ah put ah rechen roh, Satan! Ajarla hitihin miejiek, ‘Nang PUMI nang Pathien kha chubainangibawk rang a inih, khan ama ranga kha chon nangithaw pe rang a inih.’ ”
42004009	Khan ama kha Jerusalem ah ruchawi a riethiengmun moidawn khan rumiding, khan ama dieng ruti, “Pathien Shapa kha nangnih a tu, nang nining a chawm roh.
42004010	Ajarla hitihin miejiek, ‘Nang nurudon rang, ama ravantir hai dieng chawng pek rangnih,’
42004011	khan ‘Nang ke kha lung le rawtawna boi rang, amani khut le nurudawm u rangnih.’ ”
42004012	Makhan Jesu na mashang a ama dieng ruti, “Hitihin ruriei, “Nang PUMI nang Pathien kha nangilem boi rang a inih.”
42004013	Khan diabol na lemna rikip kha le rulem shole, chanthatna pha `khatshe rang khan ama ah put ah rushe joi.
42004014	Khashole Jesu na Ratha ranak a Galilee tieng vak kir joi. Khan ama chungchanga khakawt ah awm ram kholok dieng chawngrucherak joi.
42004015	Amani synagogue hai khan mi ruruchuk a mi kholok na ama kha rumapak uh.
42004016	Ama hawng lienna Nazareth ah vat phakhan, eshena dungjuia, Sabbath nikho hai khan synagogue ah rulut a ate rang ruding.
42004017	Khan thiempulien Isaiah behangbuk kha ama khut chung ah rupek uh. Ama na behangbuk kha rumawlawng a hitihin a irumiejiek mun kha rumuk:
42004018	“PUMI Ratha kha kuchung a awm, ajarla shara hai dieng athachawng rophong rang, ama na kiei hi thaonanawt joi. Mulungkoi miring hai kha madam rang, shurkhop hai dieng ningchamna, khan mikchaw hai dieng mikmuknaret rophong rang, epshie a iruthaw miring hai kha ningchamna apeh rang,
42004019	khan PUMI enlar kum kha rophong rang, inojongtir nih joi.”
42004020	Khan behangbuk kha rujo a shepding dieng khan rupek a rushuh joi. Khan synagogue ah awm mi kholok na ama kha ruen uh.
42004021	Khashole amani dieng ariei ruput, “Von nikho hin mahi Miejiek hi nangirangai u shung hin rupum nih joi.”
42004022	Khan mi kholok na kungruchang uh, khan ama bai ah vak shok numpokmirit chawng hai khan shindawngna runiei uh. Amani na ruti uh, “Hi miring hi Joseph shapa kha nimak maw?”
42004023	Khan amani dieng ruriei, “Mahi chawngrichi hi ban a kiei dieng nangti u rangnih, ‘Mimadampa, nang nining a madan nana roh! Capernaum ah ashok chon kijet u hai kha nang kho hinawm thaw roh.’ ”
42004024	Khan ama na ruti, “Diktak a nangni dieng kiriei inih, thiempulien tuteawm amatak kho khan pawm naw nih.
42004025	Khania adik a nangni dieng kieriei, Elijah pha khan Israel ram ah mieirawng tampui ruawm. Kum `thum le tha `ruk ravan kha rakhar phakhan, ram kholok ah nekleshak ajeng a rukhawk.
42004026	Inia Sidon ah awm Zarephath ah mieirawng `khat dieng niboia, tute dieng Elijah kha rutir mak.
42004027	“Thiempulien Elisha pha khan Israel ah raithawnaw tawng miring tampui ruawm, inia Syria miring Naaman niboia, tute ruriethiengmashak mak.”
42004028	Hihaihi rujet u phakhan, synagogue ah awm kholok mulung ruhang pe uh.
42004029	Amani na ruthoi ua ama kha kho vai tieng runawt uh. Khan lawntiktibir khan ama kha jong vawrna u rang, amani kho imothoina u lawnmawr kha rumawjawn uh.
42004030	Inia amani kar khan rurilik a rupang joi.
42004031	Khan Galilee khopui `khat, Capernaum khan rushe a ama na Sabbath nikho hai khan mi ruruchuk.
42004032	Ama na chamnieitak a chawngruriei jarkhan, ama miruchukna khan shindawngna runiei uh.
42004033	Synagogue khan raikho rono ratha aniei akhat ruawm a he rashangtak a rura`ai a
42004034	ruti, “Namathan u roh! Kieini hi ih lawt rang a nangiti maw nih, Aw Nazareth Jesu? Kieini hi namathang rang a ava maw nangnih? Tumaw nangni iti kenejet. Nang hi Pathien Miring Riethieng kha nangnih!”
42004035	Khan Jesu na rawkawk a ruti, “Awmchien roh, ama shung ah put ah vak shok roh!” Raikho rono kha na ama kha amani kar a vawrving a shiekho mawtawng boi a ama ah put ah vak shok joi.
42004036	Khan mi kholok chung a shindawngna ruawm. Khan akhat na akhat dieng ruti uh, “Mahi ih chawng maw nih! Ajarla cham le ranak a raikho rono hai dieng chawng pek a amani na vak shok u hi.”
42004037	Khan khakawt ah awm ram kholok khan ama chungchanga chawngrucherak joi.
42004038	Ama na synagogue ah put ah ruthoi a Simon in khan rulut joi. Khan Simon tarpi kha raitun na enchak a rutun a ruawm, khan ama kha madamna rang, rudawi uh.
42004039	Khan Jesu na ama dieng ruding a raitun kha rurawkawk phakhan, raitun kha na ama kha rumathan joi. Ama na relentak a ruthoi a amani chon kha ruthaw pe joi.
42004040	Khan ni hawng tah le roroia, Jesu dieng natna shikshik aniei hai kha vak chawi uh. Ama na amani rikip dieng khut rutetna a rumadam.
42004041	Mi tampui ah put ah raikho haiawm vak shok ua rura`ai uh, “Nang hi Pathien Shapa Christa kha nangnih!” Inia amani na ama kha Christa keng iti jet u jarkhan, Jesu na amani kha rurawkawk a rumawchawng u lai mak.
42004042	Khan ni hawng shok `le, ama na ramthim mun ah rushe joi. Khan mipui kha na ama kha rutawk ua ama dieng rushe uh. Khan amani ah put ah ashe rang kha rumakha uh.
42004043	Khania amani dieng ruti, “Kho shik hai dieng hinawm Pathien rengchangna jar a athachawng kha kirophongir rang a inih, ajarla hi rang hin a kiei hi inojongtir inih.”
42004044	Khan ama na Galilee ah awm synagogue hai khan chawng shem a ruawm joi.
42005001	Khan hitihin ruawm, Jesu na Gennesaret Thampui kawriei ah rudinglai khan, Pathien chawng mierieina rang, mipui na ama kha ruep uh.
42005002	Thampui kawmchang ah rokong `di ruawm kha ama na rumuk; inia ngashur miring hai kha na amani kha rumak ua amani len hai kha rushuk a ruawm uh.
42005003	Ama na rokong hai kar a Simon rokong khan rulut a pieipak ho ah put ah meshenadet rang ruriei. Khan rokong khan rushuh a mipui dieng ruruchuk.
42005004	Ama na ariei rubang phakhan, Simon dieng ruti, “Medena rang, nang len u kha tuithukna khawn vak vawr u roh.”
42005005	Simon na mashang a ruti, “Aw Pumpa, janshawt kieini na enchak a kiruthaw ua iawm ruman u mi`ing, khania nang chawngriei dungjuia len hi muchum rang kanih.”
42005006	Makha ruthaw u phakhan, amani na nga hawi `khat kha rumede uh. Khan amani len kha achiet ruput pe uh.
42005007	Khan rokong shik `khat ah ochonthaw pui hai kha she a vak shanna u rang, jetna rupek uh. Amani na va ua rokong dire kha ship`hai a amani kha rurawnawm dedeng uh.
42005008	Makha Simon Peter na rumuk phakhan, Jesu keshun ah rukhuk shun a ruti, “Aw Pumi, kiei ah put ah she rang roh, ajarla kiei hi munu miring kha kanih!”
42005009	Ajarla amani nga shur khan, ama le khan ama le awm kholok shinrudawng pe uh.
42005010	Khan Simon le chonthawshom Zebedee shapa hai, James le John`awm, ruawm uh. Khan Jesu na Simon dieng ruti, “Chih naw roh, tun ah put ah miring hai ashur kha nangchang rangnih joi.”
42005011	Khajarkhan rokong hai kha kawmchang vak shok puiphit u `le, nieinak kholok kha rumak ua ama anu rujui u joi.
42005012	Khan hitihin ruawm, Jesu na khopui `khat ah ruawmlai khan, enro, raithawnaw na ibuk miring `khat ruawm. Ama na Jesu kha rumuk phakhan, bawklap a nik a ruti, “Aw Pumi, nangjawt a tu, kiei hi nangnieriethieng ngam.”
42005013	Khan Jesu na ukhut kha rushawn a ama kha irushit le roroia ruti, “Kajawt, nang riethieng kha nih rang roh.” Relentak a raithawnaw kha na ama kha rumathan joi.
42005014	Khan tute dieng rieina boi rang, ama dieng chawng rupek, “Khania shetana thiempu dieng vak mumuk roh, khan Moses na chawngirupek kha ang a riethiengna chungchanga vak rawthawi roh. Makha na amani dieng kungchangna kha nih rangnih.”
42005015	Inia liekliek a ama chungchanga chawng roshok joi. Khan amani natna hai ah put ah damna rang le chawng rangai rang, mipui lientak `khat vak ruchun uh.
42005016	Inia ama na ramthim khan rurakai a nikna runiei.
42005017	Hitihin ruawm, ni `khat hin Jesu na mi ruchuk a ruawmlai khan, Pharisee hai le Dan oja haiawm rushuh uh. Amani kha Galilee, Judea, khan Jerusalem rikip ah put ah ajong runih uh. Khan amani madamna rang, Pumi ranak kha ama dieng ruawm pe.
42005018	Khashole enro, mi hai na atakthi miring `khat jana chung ah jalam a vak chawi uh. Amani na lut pui a Jesu maton ah tetna rang, rurashak uh.
42005019	Inia mi rawphai jarkhan, amani na inshung khan rulut pui ngam u mak. Amani na inphu chung ah ruka pui ua rurevengmashak uh, khan ama jana kha le Jesu matontak ah mipui kar a jong muchum uh.
42005020	Amani takashawn kha rumuk a ama dieng ruti, “Aw miringpa, nang munu hai kha anarangaidam pe joi.”
42005021	Khan danoja hai le Pharisee hai na amani mulung a rumining uh, “Mieshietna chawng ariei ama hi tumaw nih? Pathien niboia tu na maw munu hi arangaidam ngam?”
42005022	Jesu na amani mulungmining kha rushur pe a amani dieng rumashang, “Iloia nang mulung shung a nangimining u maw nih?
42005023	‘Nang munu hai kha arangaidam joi,’ iti le ‘Thoi tana lawn rang roh,’ iti idi kar hin ih kha maw baidet?
42005024	Inia Miring Shapa kha na rieliei chung hin munu rangaidamna cham iniei kha nangjetna u rang a inih.” Khan takthipa dieng ruti, “Nang dieng kiriei inih, thoi rang roh, khan nang pher kha loi tana nang in ah she rang roh”
42005025	Khan ama na relentak a amani maikung a ruthoi joi, khan ajana nieinak hai kha ruloi a Pathien mapaklam a in tieng rushe joi.
42005026	Khan shindawngna kha na mi kholok dieng jong ship a Pathien kha rumapak uh. Khan chitna kha na ship a ruti uh, “Von nikho hin rekhek chon nimuk u keng joi!”
42005027	Khan hihaihi theng shole, Levi iti khaichana rawkhawm miring `khat khaichana in ah rushuh a awm kha vak muk. Khan Jesu na ama dieng ruti, “Nujui roh.”
42005028	Khan nieinak kholok kha rumak a ama anu rujui joi.
42005029	Khan Levi na ama in ah Jesu rang bumichinna lientak `khat ruthaw. Kha mun khan khaichana rawkhawm hawi tampui le eshen hai kha rushuh, khan amani le nekleshak rushak uh.
42005030	Khan amani danoja hai le Pharisee hai kha na akhaichawi hai dieng ruti uh, “Ijar a nangni na khaichana rawkhawm hai le khan munu miring hai le nineknishak u maw nih?”
42005031	Khan Jesu na mashang a ruriei, “Adam miring hai na loipu rangai mak, inia ana hai na irangai inih.
42005032	Midik miring hai akoi jong nimi`ing, inia mulung lekna rang, munu miring hai akoi jong kanih.”
42005033	Khan Pharisee hai na ama dieng ruti uh, “Ijar a John khaichawi hai na rawnaw a chamradoi a nikna iruniei ua, kha le ra`ang a, Pharisee khaichawi hai na`awm ruthaw uh, inia nang khaichawi hai tu aneh-ashah ranga iruthaw u maw nih?”
42005034	Jesu na amani dieng rumashang, “Moipa kha awmlai khan moilawm hai kha chamra modoi u rawng maw?
42005035	Moipa kha amani ah put ah iloi pe pha kha hawng rangnih, makha nikho hai khan amani na chamradoi u rangnih.”
42005036	Ama na`awm rangshim `khat ruriei pe uh: “Tute na ponlek athar kha ther a alui pon ah chingai mak. Khanitatu ama na athar kha ther rangnih, khan ponlek athar kha alui kha le rohoi naw nih.
42005037	Khan tute na mevun jukawk alui hai khan ju athar thongai mak. Khanitatu ju athar kha na mevun jukawk hai kha khoi ning, tia obo rangnih. Khan mevun jukawk hai kha mathang rangnih.
42005038	Inia ju athar kha mevun jukawk athar hai khan thong a dire kha reh rang a inih.
42005039	Khan tute na, ju alui kha nek shole, relentak a athar kha neh jawt mak. Ajarla ama na iti, ‘Alui kha atha inih.’ ”
42006001	Khan hitihin rushok, Sabbath nikho `khat hin Jesu na shangbiei hai kha rurakanlai khan, akhaichawi hai na shangvui hai kha ruchin uh, khan khut hai kha le rumawnawi ua rushak uh.
42006002	Khan Pharisee hai eshen na ruti uh, “Iloia Sabbath nikho a Dan nih boi nangithaw u maw nih?”
42006003	Jesu na mashang a amani dieng ruti, “David amatak na vawncham pe phakhan, irawtawp pui hai le iruthaw kha nangni na te u makche maw?
42006004	Ama na Pathienin kha rulut a Pathien dieng a rawthawina tan kha ruloi a rushak. Khan ama le rawtawp hai diengawm rupek. Makha thiempu hai ranga na ishak niboia, Dan nih boi runih.”
42006005	Khan amani dieng ruti, “Miring Shapa kha Sabbath Pumi kha`awm inih.”
42006006	Sabbath nikho `khatret hin synagogue ah rulut a mi ruruchuk. Kha mun khan ukhutchang achar miring `khat ruawm.
42006007	Danoja hai le Pharisee hai na Sabbath nikho a madam pe maw, tia ruva uh. Makha amani na jar pekna rang a inih.
42006008	Inia amani mulungmining kha rujet pe a khutchar miringpa dieng ruti, “Thoi tana amani kar a ding roh.” Khan thoi a ruding joi.
42006009	Jesu na amani dieng ruti, “Kiei na nangni dieng ih `khat nawrawdawn u rang kanih, Sabbath nikho hin atha thaw, ninawkle ashie thaw, ringkho shan, ninawkle ringkho mathang, ih kha maw Dan nidet?”
42006010	Khan amani kholok kha enruroko a ama dieng ruti, “Nang khut kha vak shawn roh.” Khan ama na khatikhan ruthaw, khan ama khut kha shik `khat kha ang a rudam pe joi.
42006011	Makhan amani kha ajeng a mulung ruhang pe ua Jesu kha imaw lawt rang, tia khatlekhat na rureshe u joi.
42006012	Khalaikhan Jesu na anih rang lawn ah ruhawng. Khan janshawt hin ama na Pathien dieng nikna runiei.
42006013	Khan kho hawng var phakhan, ama na akhaichawi hai kha rukoi. Amani kar khan ama na shawmlieidi rumadan a amani kha tirtawn, tia`awm riming rupho joi:
42006014	Peter iti Simon, anaipangpa Andrew, James le John, Phillip le Bartholomew,
42006015	Matthew le Thomas, Alphaeus shapa James, Zealot iti u Simon,
42006016	James shapa Judas, khan Jesu ajorpa Judas Iscariot, hihaihi inih.
42006017	Ama na amani le jong chum a phaijaw mun `khat ah ruding joi. Akhaichawi hawi `khat le miring hawi `khat ruawm uh. Amani kha Judea kholok, Jerusalem, khan Tyre le Sidon tuikaw ah awm runih uh. Amani kha chawng rangai rang le amani natna hai kha damna mukna rang a ahawng u inih.
42006018	Khan raikho rono hai na imawshaw hai kha ama na rumadam.
42006019	Mipui kholok na ama kha shitna rang, rurasham uh, ajarla ranak kha ama ah put ah vak shok a mi kholok kha irumadam inih.
42006020	Khashole ama na iringrakang a akhaichawi hai dieng ruriei: “Shara hai kha rahvanmuh miring kha inih, ajarla Pathien rengchangna kha nang tah u inih.
42006021	Tun a vawncham miring hai kha rahvanmuh miring kha inih, ajarla nimiship pe u rangnih. Tun a achap hai kha rahvanmuh miring kha inih, ajarla nang munui u rangnih
42006022	Miring Shapa jarbak a mi hai na numukmak u phakhan, nawnawt u phakhan, jak nepek u phakhan, khan ashie keng, tia nang riming hai kha pek u phakhan, rahvanmuh miring hai kha nangnih uh.
42006023	Khanikhan ningai u roh, ningai a chawm u roh, ajarla enro, ravan a nangni rang a lawh kha awrawp. Ajarla hitak hi ang a apa u hai kha na thiempulien hai dieng iruthaw u inih.
42006024	“Inia rawchawng miring hai nangni dieng mieriemna kha awm, ajarla maw`awina kha nangtum u joi.
42006025	Vawnship miring hai nangni dieng mieriemna kha awm, ajarla nang vawncham u rangnih. Tun a munui miring hai nangni dieng mieriemna kha awm, ajarla mulungkur a nangchap u rangnih.
42006026	Mi kholok na nangtha iti miring hai dieng mieriemna kha awm, ajarla hitak hi ang a apa u hai kha na thiempulien jok hai dieng iruthaw u inih.
42006027	“Inia rangai nangni dieng kieriei: Nang rahapui hai kha numpoh u roh, namumah hai dieng atha thaw u roh.
42006028	Pumnaboh miring hai kha rahvan peh u roh, maimawk napeh miring hai rang nik pe u roh.
42006029	Nang riengiei ah anaben ama dieng khan shir `khat kha`awm daw pe roh. Nang ponledier naloi pe miring ama dieng khan, nang kotai kha`awm mitik peh naw roh.
42006030	Nanih miring rikip dieng peh roh. Khan nang nieinak hai aloi ama dieng khan vak mikirna rang, riei naw roh.
42006031	Khan nangni dieng mi hai nangimawthaw jawttak kha ang a, amani diengawm thaw pe u roh.
42006032	“Khania numnapoh hai kha numnangpok u joiala, nang thawlawh u kha imaw awm nih? Ajarla munu miring haishe na`awm numapoh miring hai kha numipok u inih.
42006033	Khan nangni dieng atha thaw hai dieng atha nangthaw u joiala, nang thawlawh u kha imaw awm? Ajarla munu miring haishe na`awm khakha ithaw u inih.
42006034	Khan nangmuk u rangnih, tia nangimining u ama dieng phuk a nangpek uala, nang thawlawh u kha imaw awm? Ajarla munu miring haishe na`awm munu miring hai dieng koi boipet a mukna rang, phuk a ipek u inih.
42006035	Inia nangirahapui hai kha numpoh u roh, khan atha kha thaw u roh. Vak kir rangnih, tia mining boi a phuk a peh u roh, khan nang thawlawh kha lien rangnih. Khan Rashang Chungchon shapa hai kha nangchang u rangnih. Ajarla ningaithiei boi le mi shie hai dieng khan Pathien tu roihoi inih.
42006036	Nangpa u kha roihoi anih hi ang a, nangniawm roihoi miring kha chang u roh.
42006037	“Nang chung ua chawngshatna boi rang, mi chung a chawngshat u naw roh. Mi na nahengna boi u rang, mi kha heng u naw roh. Mi na rangaidam nepek na u rang, mi kha rangaidam peh u roh.
42006038	Peh u roh, khan nangni dieng nepek u rangnih. Makha inamtit, lawp `khat a inawk, khan imubungpim danlak atha kha nang maton ah nubun pe u rangnih. Ajarla nangni na dannangilaktak u kha nangni dieng danlak rangnih.”
42006039	Khan amani dieng rangshim `khat ruriei pe: “Mikchaw `khat na mikchaw miring `khat rang lamkai pe ngam nih maw? Adinre kha khur ah cho u naw nih maw?
42006040	Khaichawi `khat na ama oja chung a awm mak, khania rupumping a iruchuk mi rikip na ama oja kha hawng ang rangnih.
42006041	“Ijar a nang miktak shung ah thinglong kha tinta boi a nang uliennai mik ah thinglek kha nangi`en pe maw nih?
42006042	Nang miktak ah thinglong kha muk boi a, nang uliennai dieng ‘Uliennai, nang mik ah thinglek kha nawmawkaw roh,’ itia maw ti ngam rawng? Aw thanunchan thaw miring! Nang mik ah thinglong kha kawbak roh, khashole nang uliennai mik ah put ah thinglek kha kawna rang, malangsheng a nangmuk rangnih.
42006043	“Ajarla thingkung atha na ara ashie moshok mak, khan thingkung ashie na ara atha moshok mak.
42006044	Ajarla thingkung rikip kha ama aratak kha na mejet, ajarla riling hai ah put ah thieichang ara rawkhawm mak, khan rilingbuk ah drakha ara shar mak.
42006045	Mitha kha na umulung atha niei`in ah put ah atha kha hawng moshok, khan mi shie kha na umulung ashie niei`in ah put ah ashie kha hawng moshok. Ajarla mulung ruphu ah put ah abai kha na chawngiriei inih.
42006046	“Kiriei kha thaw boipet a ijar a ‘Pumi, Pumi,’ nanginiti u maw nih?
42006047	Tunita`awm kawchawng hai kha irangai a athaw le kiei dieng ava ama kha, tu kha maw ang, iti kiei na numumuk u rang kanih.
42006048	Ama kha thukmet a ichoi a lung chung ah keshun mocho a in rashak ama kha a ang inih. Tui hawng lien phakhan, tuirawnawng na hawng jem a in kha rawnawkmashak ngam mak, ajarla in kha lungpum chung ah iphun inih.
42006049	Inia kawchawng hai kha irangai a athaw boi ama kha pieipak ah keshun mocho boi a in rashak ama kha le ra`ang inih. Tuirawnawng na hawng jem phakhan, relentak a upur, khan in athang dan kha ajeng a lien.”
42007001	Miring hai ijet a ama chawngriei hai kha rumawtawr shole, Jesu na Capernaum ah rushe joi.
42007002	Khan rarajakhat lamkai kha na shok imanartak `khat runiei. Ama kha runa pe a athi rang rurasham joi.
42007003	Ama na Jesu chungchanga rujet phakhan, ama na rushe a oshokpa kha vak madamnathiei rang, ama adawi Jihudi hai kar a lamkai hai kha rutir.
42007004	Khan amani na Jesu dieng rushe ua ama na ithaw pe rang a ama hi rutuk inih, tia richit`awmtak a rudawi uh,
42007005	“ajarla kuphung u hi ama na numpok, khan ama na synagogue `khat nurumothoi pe uh.”
42007006	Khan Jesu na amani le rushe joi. Ama na in kha vak shokdeng `le, rarajakhat lamkai kha na awlawm hai kha Jesu dieng vak mieriei, “Pumi, nawshaw puilai naw roh, ajarla ki`in ah nangva rang a hi kiei rutuk mi`ing.
42007007	Khajarkhan kiei nang dieng ava rangshe hi rutuk mi`ing. Inia chawng ranga nangiriei khan koshokpa khaw dam rang keng.
42007008	Ajarla kieiawm kothoi a ramiring kieniei a cham thoi a awm kanih. Akhat dieng, ‘She roh,’ kiti `le eshe, shik `khat dieng, ‘Va roh,’ kiti `le ava. Khan koshokpa dieng, ‘Hi thaw roh,’ kiti `le awthaw.”
42007009	Khan Jesu na khahai chawng kha rujet phakhan, shinrudawng pe, khan anujui mipui dieng hiei a ruti, “Kiei na nangni dieng kiriei inih, Israelshe hin takashawn hi ang a lien hi kiei na muh mi`inglai!”
42007010	Khan irutir hai kha na in khan vak kir ua shokpa kha adam a vak muk u joi.
42007011	Khan hitihin rushok, jing tieng hin ama na Nain iti khopui `khat ah rushe. Akhaichawi hai le mipui lientak `khat na ama le rushe uh.
42007012	Kho pakawt kha vak ranai pui phakhan, enro, athi miring `khat hi ruruput uh. Ama kha unu shapa khatte runih, khan ama kha mieirawng runih. Khan makha khopui miring tampui na ama kha rurawtawp pui uh.
42007013	Pumi na ama kha rumuk phakhan, lairunat pui a ama dieng ruti, “Chap naw roh.”
42007014	Ama na vak dep a rokong kha vak phak phakhan, urupu miring hai kha na ruding uh. Khan ama na ruti, “Rothar, nang dieng kienieriei, thoi rang roh.”
42007015	Khan athipa kha na hawng thoi a achawng hawng put joi. Khan ama kha unu dieng rupek joi.
42007016	Khan mi kholok na chitna runiei uh, khan Pathien kha mapak a ruti uh, “Thiempulien alientak `khat nakar u a shok joi,” khan “Pathien na ama miring kha apha jong joi.”
42007017	Khan Judea le khakawt ah ram kholok khan Jesu chungchanga chawng rucherak joi.
42007018	Hihai kholok chungchang hin John khaichawi hai na ama dieng chawng rumejet uh.
42007019	Khajarkhan John na akhaichawi hai kar a pasha `di hi rukoi a, “Ajong rang a kha nang maw nangnih, ninawkle shik `khat kingak u rang a maw nih?” tia Jesu dieng rawdawn rang, rutir joi.
42007020	Jesu dieng ava hai kha na ruti uh, “Baptisma apeh John na nang dieng inavaktir u inih. Hitihin iti, ‘Ajong rang a kha nang maw nangnih, ninawkle shik `khat kingak u rang a maw nih?’ ”
42007021	Makha pha khan, ama na rai, shawrieviei, ratha thaboi hai ah put ah mi tampui rumadam, khan mikchaw tampui kha rumavar pe.
42007022	Jesu na amani dieng mashang a ruti, “She u tana nangimuk u le nangirangai u hai hi John dieng vak riei u roh: mikchaw hai na imuk, kekhawr hai na alawn, raithawnaw tawng hai na riethieng, nokorshet hai na ijet, athi hai kha imothoi, khan shara hai dieng athachawng iriei pe.
42007023	Kajar a keruthui boi miring kha rahvanmuh miring kha inih.”
42007024	John palai hai kha na rushe u phakhan, Jesu na John chungchanga mipui dieng ariei ruput, “Ramthim khan ih en rushe maw nangnih uh? Rithi na inawk shingnang kha maw?
42007025	Inia ih en rushe maw nangnih uh? Miring `khat kha ponrenem irieshiei kha maw nih? Enro, ponledier lurtak le rielien a hoiriethiei miring hai kha rengin hai khawn awm uh.
42007026	Inia ih en rushe maw nangnih uh? Thiempulien `khat kha maw? Awh, thiempulien `khatnek a alien inih, iti kha kiriei inih.
42007027	Mahi ama chungchanga irumiejiek inih: ‘Enro, nang maton a kapalai `khat kitir, ama na nang maton a lam nokon pe rangnih.’
42007028	“Ajarla kiei na nangni dieng kiriei inih, nupang hai na imoshok kar a baptisma apeh Johnnek a aliendet thiempulien awm maklai, khania Pathien rengchangna mun a ashinving ama kha amanek a liendet.”
42007029	Khan mi kholok le khaichana rawkhawm hai kha na ama chawngriei kha rurangai u phakhan, Pathien chawngshat kha idik ruti uh. Ajarla amani na John baptisma pek khan a baptisma iruloi u inih.
42007030	Khania Pharisee hai le danthiei hai na tu John baptisma pek kha ruloi boi u jarkhan, Pathien rentukna kha ruheng uh.
42007031	Pumi na ruti, “Hi rong a miring hai hi ih le maw rekhenna ning, amani hi ih le maw ra`ang uh?
42007032	Amani hi naite hai na rievieithawna ah shuh a khatlekhat rashai nana kha le ra`ang inih. Amani na ti uh, ‘Nangni rang thieikhang kurutum uh, inia rulam u makche, mulungkurna kuruniei uh, inia ruchap u makche.’
42007033	“Ajarla baptisma apeh John kha tan shah rang le ju neh rang a ajong nimak, khan ‘Ama na raikho ieniei,’ nangti uh.
42007034	Miring Shapa kha na rushak, khan runek, inia nangni na nangti uh, ‘Enro, shak a rapham le ju a vanhat thaw miring, khaichana rawkhawm hai le munu miring hai lawm `khat khaw!’
42007035	Inia varna hi ama chonthaw hai kholok kha na idikna kha imumuk inih.”
42007036	Pharisee hai kar a akhat na Jesu kha ama le bu nekna rang ruriei. Khan ama na Pharisee in kha rulut a bu runek.
42007037	Khan enro, kha khopui khan ah awm munu miring nupang `khat na Jesu kha Pharisee in ah bunek a awm iti kha rujet. Ama na lungngoi kawk ah manamhoi rieipartui kha vak chawi.
42007038	Ama na Jesu anuk ah chap a ruawm. Ama mikrithi kha le Jesu ke hai kha rumiechier pe a asham kha le hona rang runo pe. Khan ama ke hai kha rutum pe a rieipartui kha runawt pe.
42007039	Khania ama akoipa Pharisee kha na umulung shung a ruti, “Mahi miringpa hi thiempulien nitjoiatu, ama ashinu hi tumaw nih, khan ih ang nupang maw nih, iti jet rangnih, ajarla ama kha munu miring runih.”
42007040	Jesu na mashang a ama dieng ruti, “Simon, kiei na nang dieng riei rang dikhat kieniei.” Ama na ruti, “Oja, riei roh.”
42007041	“Shierphukshem akhat hi na lieishieton miring idi runiei, akhat kha na dinari rajarahnga, khan shik `khat kha na dinari shawm rahnga ruphuk uh.
42007042	Amani na ruthung ngam boi u phakhan, ama na adinre lieishieton kha rupai pe joi. Tu na maw ama kha numpokdet nih, nieriei roh?”
42007043	Makhan Simon na rumashang, “Lieishie arawpdet ipai pe ama kha na numpokdet rangnih, tia kimining.” Khan ama dieng ruti, “Thaning a chawngnangshat.”
42007044	Ama na nupangnu tieng khan hiei a Simon dieng ruti, “Mahi nupangnu hi nangmuk maw? Kiei na nang in ah kavaklut a keke rang tuishe nepeh makche. Khania hi nupang hi na ama mikrithi le keke hai hi nururushuk pe a asham le nuruno pe.
42007045	Nang na nurutum makche, inia hinu hi na tu kawhawnglut ah put ah keke atum hi chat maklai.
42007046	Kulu kha thao nurunawt pe makche, khania hinu hi na keke kha rieipartui nurunawt pe.
42007047	Khajarkhan nang dieng kiriei inih, ama munu hai arawp kha arangaidam pe joi. Khajarkhan a ama na numinurupokdet inih. Inia rangaidam lekte ipekna kha na lekte le numipok inih.”
42007048	Khashole nupangnu dieng ruti, “Nang munu hai kha arangaidam joi.”
42007049	Inia ama le tebol ah ashuh miring hai kha na khatlekhat dieng ati ruput uh, “Munushe rangaidam apeh ngam ama hi tumaw nih?”
42007050	Inia ama na nupangnu dieng ruti, “Nang takashawn kha na nang kha nashan joi. Damveng a she rang roh.”
42008001	Khan Jesu na khopui ah put ah khopui, khan khote ah put ah khote dawna rushe a, Pathien rengchangna athachawng kha rushem a rurophong joi. Khaichawi shawmlieidi kha ama le rurawtawp uh.
42008002	Khan ratha thaboi hai le natna hai ah put ah irumadam nupang hai, Mary Magdalene iti, ama ah put ah raikho shiri rushok pe,
42008003	khan Herod inshung apoh Chuza inkonu Joanna, Susanna, khan amani shumleshiertak le amani cholam ruthaw shik nupang tampui ruawm uh.
42008004	Ama dieng mipui hawng ruchun a khopui rikip ah put ah mi hawng phakhan, ama na rangshim a ruriei pe uh:
42008005	“Muchi vawrpa kha na ama muchi vawr rushe. Ama na iruvawr le roroia, eshen kha lamkaw ah rucho, khan mi na ruchongna, khan ravan a va hai na jong shar uh.
42008006	Eshen kha lungbiei chung ah rucho, khan hawng mawngphit `le, ruchar ajarla tuiruhu ruawm mak.
42008007	Eshen kha rilingbuk ah rucho, khan riling hai kha le hawng thoichen a makha ruliep.
42008008	Khan eshen kha pieipak thatna mun ah rucho a hawng mawng, khan makha na arajah a ara rumoshok.” Hihaihi iruriei le roroia, ama na rura`ai, “Rangaina rang nokor aniei ama kha na rangai rosho!”
42008009	Khan akhaichawi hai na ama dieng rawdawn a ruti uh, “Mahi rangshim hi ih itina maw nih?
42008010	Khan ama na ruriei, “Nangni dieng Pathien rengchangna chungchanga murukchawng hai kha jetna rang, nurupek uh. Inia shik hai rang tu rangshim hai khan a irupek inih, makha ‘Amani na muk tu muk ua mukna boi rang, khan rangai tu rangai ua jetna boi rang a inih.’
42008011	“Rangshim kha hi inih: Muchi kha Pathien chawng kha inih.
42008012	Lamkaw ah acho hai kha chawng kha irangai a amani mulung ah put ah diabol na ichawi pe kha inih. Makha amani na takashawn boi rang le shandamna mukna boi rang a inih.
42008013	Lungbiei ah acho hai kha chawng rangai a ningai le roroia aloi hai kha inih. Inia hihaihi na rujung loi u mak; khan pha bawngte takashawn uh, inia enretena hawng phakhan, rurakai uh.
42008014	Rilingbuk ah acho hai kha chawng rangai hai kha inih. Khania ringkho lungkhamna, rawchawngna le hoina hai hi na ruliep, khan amani ara hai kha hawng chang ngam mak.
42008015	Pieipak thatna ah acho hai amani kha mulung atha le mulung riethieng a chawng rangai hai kha inih. Amani na chawng kha rangai phakhan, chawng kha arakrep uh. Khan amani doiratna khan ara kha mupung uh.
42008016	“Tute na thaomiei kha muchuk shole, tiengkum thoi ah the ninawkle jakhang thoi ah tet mak. Inia makha hawng lut miring hai na mieivar kha mukna rang, shutna `khat ah itet inih.
42008017	Ajarla imalar boi rang a rethe `khatshe awm mak, khan mejet a vai moshok boi rang a rukhum `khatshe awm mak.
42008018	Khajarkhan nang irangai dan u kha riring pui u roh, ajarla aniei ama dieng khan arawpdet pek rangnih. Khan aniei boi ama dieng khan kieniei, tia iminingshe kha ama ah put ah loi pe rangnih.”
42008019	Khashole unu le anaipang hai na ama dieng va uh. Amani na mirawp jarkhan, ama dieng rulut ngam u mak.
42008020	Khan mi eshen na ama dieng ruriei, “Nangnu le nang naipang hai na vai tieng ding a nang kha nurumuk pui jawt uh.”
42008021	Inia mashang a amani dieng ruti, “Pathien chawng arangai le athaw hihaihi kunu le kuliennai hai kha inih.”
42008022	Nikhat hin ama na akhaichawi hai le rokong shung ah rulut a amani dieng ruti, “Thampui shir `khat tieng khawn she u rawi.” Khan amani kha rokong a rushe u joi.
42008023	Amani na rushe u lai khan, ama kha ruja joi. Khan thampui chung ah rithikhopui hawng rang, khan rokong ah tui hawng ship a thangna le ruranai u joi.
42008024	Ama kha rujawng ua rumothoi uh, khan amani na ruti uh, “Oja, Oja, kieini hi kathi u rang keng joi!” Inia ama na hawng thoi a rithi le tuirawnawng kha hawng rawkawk. Khan amani kha rubang a rurenem joi.
42008025	Khashole amani dieng ruti, “Nang takashawn u kha ih ah awm maw nih joi?” Amani na achih le shindawnglam a khatlekhat dieng ruti uh, “Ih miringtak maw nih? Ajarla ama na chawng pek phakhan, rithi le tuishe na`awm irangai pe u hi!”
42008026	Khan amani na Galilee le re`en Gadarenes kha rushok u joi.
42008027	Ama na lieiho khan jong chumphit `le, kha khopui ah awm, raikho hai na ichutna miring `khat na rurumuk pui. Khan ama kha phashawttak ponledier thaw boi a ruawm inih. Khan ama na in ah niboia, than hai khan ruawm inih.
42008028	Ama na Jesu kha rumuk le amaikung a rubawklap, khan ra`ai a ruti, “Rashangving Pathien Shapa Jesu, kiei hi ih nawlawt rang a nangiti maw nih? Nang na kiei hi shawna nangnepekna boi rang, kawnawdawi!”
42008029	Raikho rono kha miringpa ah put ah vak shokna rang, ama na chawng rupek. Ajarla mahi na voitampui ama kha irushur inih. Khan ama kha thirakarui, khan thir banriei le irukhop ua irurung u inih. Khopna hai kha changhawt a iruthaw a raikho kha na ramthim ah irunawt inih.
42008030	Jesu na ama dieng rurawdawn, “Nang riming imaw ti?” Ama na ruti, “Legion,” ajarla raikho hai tampui na ama shung a rulut nih joi.
42008031	Khan amani kha dawngawmboi athuk a thongna rang chawng pekna boi rang, ama dieng runik uh.
42008032	Khan mopang `khat ah vawk hawi lientak `khat na shak shak a ruawm uh. Khan raikho hai kha na amani dieng lut jawtna rang, ama dieng rudawi uh. Makhan amani kha ama na rujawt pe.
42008033	Amani na miringpa ah put ah vak shok ua vawk hai shung khan vak lut u joi. Khan vawk hai kha na thampui khan rucho ua tui arah a ruthi u joi.
42008034	Vawkroi hai kha na ashok chon hai kha rumuk u phakhan, rutan ua khopui le khote hai khan ruriei u joi.
42008035	Khashole miring hai na ashok chon kha aen va uh, khan amani na Jesu dieng vat u phakhan, raikho hai vak shokna miringpa kha ponledier rurieshiei a pashalak a Jesu keshun ah rushuh kha vak muk ua, amani kha ruchih uh.
42008036	Makha amuh hai kha na raikho na ichutna miringpa imadamna dan kha amani dieng ruriei uh.
42008037	Khan Gadarenes ram diengvai ah awm mipui na amani ram ah put ah shena rang, rubiek uh; ajarla amani kha ajeng a ruchih u joi. Khajarkhan ama na rokong shung ah rulut a rukir joi.
42008038	Khan raikho hai vak shoknapa kha na ama le rawtawpna rang, runik, khania Jesu na tir a ruti,
42008039	“Nang in ah kir rang roh, khan idawrthep a Pathien na inawthawna pe kha vak riei roh.” Khan ama na khopui kholok ah rushe a Jesu na ama chung a ithawna chon hai kha vak rophong joi.
42008040	Khan Jesu na vak kir phakhan, mipui na ama kha lamjawng ruthaw uh, ajarla amani kholok na ama kha irungakrala u inih.
42008041	Khan enro, Jairus iti miring `khat na ama dieng ava. Ama kha synagogue lamkai miring `khat runih. Ama na Jesu keshun ah rubawklap a ama in ah vatna rang runik.
42008042	Ajarla kum shawmlieidi dawr anih ashanu khatte iruniei kha athi rang rurasham pe joi. Khan Jesu ashe le roroia, mipui kha na ama kha ru`umchip uh.
42008043	Khan kum shawmlieidi thijanrai tawng, iringna rang a iniei kholok kha le loipu hai dieng rure`en joiawm, tute na irumadam ngam boi, nupang `khat ruawm.
42008044	Ama anuk khan rujawng a opon mawr kha rushit pe a ama thijan kha ruchat perelen joi.
42008045	Khan Jesu na ruti, “Tu na kiei hi inishit maw nih?” Mi kholok na jawt boi phakhan, Peter na ruti, “Oja, mipui na inaum a ine`ep inih, inia ‘Tu na kiei hi inishit maw nih?’ nangti.”
42008046	Inia Jesu na ruti, “Miring `khat na kiei hi inishit, ajarla kiei ah put ah ranak ashe kha kejet.”
42008047	Nupangnu kha na rethe a awm ngam boi phakhan, rawnawklam a ava a amaikung a rubawklap joi. Khan ama na mipui maikung a ishitna jar le relentak a damna jar kha rurophong.
42008048	Khan ama dieng ruti, “Shanu, ranak thaw roh, nang takashawn kha na nang kha namadam joi, damveng a she rang roh.”
42008049	Ama na chawngrurieilai khan synagogue lamkai in ah put ah mi `khat ava a ruti, “Nang shanu kha thi joi, Ojapa kha mawshawlai naw roh.”
42008050	Inia Jesu na rujet a Jairus dieng ruti, “Chih naw roh, takateshawn roh, ama kha ashan rang keng.”
42008051	Ama na in khan ava a Peter, James, John, khan naitenu nulepa ranga niboia, tute rumulut mak.
42008052	Mi kholok rie`ieklam a ruchap ua ama chung a mulungkurna runiei uh. Inia ama na ruti, “Chap u naw roh, ama hi athi nimak, amiei keng.”
42008053	Amani na ama kha rumunui uh, ajarla amani na athi kha rujet uh.
42008054	Ama na lawpsheng a vai rumoshok shole, ukhut kha rumukui pe, khan okoi a ruti, “Naitenu, thoi rang roh.”
42008055	Khan aratha kha hawng kir pe a, ama kha hawng thoirelen joi. Khan ama dieng shakthiei pekna rang, ama na chawng rupek joi.
42008056	Khan unulepa kha na shindawngna runiei uh. Inia ashok chon kha tute dieng rieina boi rang, ama na chawngruben joi.
42009001	Jesu na akhaichawi shawmlieidi kha lawp a rukoi a raikho kholok anawt rang le rai kholok madam rang, ranak le cham kha rupek joi.
42009002	Khan Pathien rengchangna chungchanga chawngshem rang le ana hai kha madam rang, rutir joi.
42009003	Ama na ruti, “Nang khomijin shena u khan iawm chawi u naw roh: shunshawraw, pai, tan, shier, khan kotai idi ko u naw roh.
42009004	Nanglutna u ih in khan nita`awm, makhan awm u roh, khan kha mun ah put ah rawthawt u roh.
42009005	Ih mun ah nita`awm nangni nuruphawm boi hai dieng khan nangni na makha khopui kha nangmathan u phakhan, nang kepha uah put ah vaiphin kha khawng u roh. Makha amani le re`erna kungchangna kha inih.”
42009006	Amani na karuchawi ua khote hai khan athachawng kha rushem uh, khan mun rikip ah rumadam uh.
42009007	Khan tetrarch Herod na ashok chon hai kholok kha rujet phakhan, mulung rurakak pe joi, ajarla mi eshen na John kha athi ah put ah thoi joi,
42009008	eshen na Elijah kha jong lar joi, khan eshen na matienglai a thiempulien hai kar a akhat hawng thoi joi ruti uh.
42009009	Khania Herod na ruti, “Kiei na John kha ring kurutuk pe joi, inia kiei na tu jar a hihai hi kijet maw nih?” Khajarkhan ama kha mukna rang rutawk joi.
42009010	Khan tirtawn hai kha hawng kir ua, ithaw u hai kholok jar a Jesu dieng thanghawngkoi u joi. Khan amani kha shikjek a Bethsaida iti khopui khan ama na rushe pui joi.
42009011	Inia mipui na rujet ua anu rujui uh. Khan amani kha ruphawm a amani dieng Pathien rengchangna jar a chawngruriei pe, khan adam rang a rangai miring hai kha ama na rumadam.
42009012	Khan ni hawng tadeng `le, khaichawi shawmlieidi kha na vak jawng a ruti uh, “Mipui kha meshe rang roh. Amani na diengvai kho hai khawn she u rieshie, jana rang le nekleshak vak muh u rosho, ajarla kieini hi ramthim hin ah awm nanih uh.”
42009013	Khania amani dieng ruti, “Amani kha shak rang dikhat peh u roh.” Amani na ruti uh, “Kieini na hihai miring kholok rang hin rawchawh kashe u joi nawkatu, tan rahnga le nga idibak kieniei u joi.”
42009014	Ajarla kha mun khan apa bawp rahnga dawr ruawm uh. Khan ama na akhaichawi hai dieng ruti, “Amani kha shawm rahnga dawr a lawplawp a mushut u roh.”
42009015	Khatikhan amani kholok kha rumushut u joi.
42009016	Khan ama na tan rahnga le nga idi kha ruloi, ravan tieng khongrunga, khan rahvan irupek le roroia rukhoi. Khan mipui dieng shemna rang, amani dieng rupek.
42009017	Amani kholok na rushak ua vawn ruship pe uh. Khan lekvai mienieng kha tiengkum shawmlieidi rurawkhawm uh.
42009018	Nikhat hin ama na thien a nikna runiei, khan akhaichawi hai kha ama na ruawm pui a amani dieng ruti, “Mipui kha na kiei hi tumaw nih niti uh?”
42009019	Amani na mashang a ruti uh, “Baptisma apeh John, khania eshen na Elijah, khan eshen na matienglai a thiempulien hai kar a akhat, hawng thoi.”
42009020	Amani dieng ruti, “Khania nangni na la kiei hi tumaw nih nangniti uh?” Peter na mashang a ruti, “Nang hi Pathien ah put ah ijongtir Christa kha nangnih.”
42009021	Khania tute dieng rieina boi rang, amani dieng chawng anatak rupek joi.
42009022	Ama na ruti, “Miring Shapa hi na shawna lientak idoingir rang a inih. Ama kha shierulien hai, thiempu ulien hai, khan danoja hai na heng ning, tia ama kha that u rangnih. Khan ni `thum changna khan ama kha mothoi rangnih.”
42009023	Khan mi kholok dieng ruti, “Tukhat na kanu nujui jawt joiatu, amarilik chung a rapha rosho, khan ama cross kha ningthingkip rupu rieshie nujui rosho.
42009024	Ajarla iringkho ashan jawt kha na makha mathang rangnih, khania kajar a iringkho mathang miring kha na makha ashan rangnih.
42009025	Ajarla ama na manmieshie pumpui kha ama tah machang a iringkhotak kha mathang a, ninawkle pawrmechet joiala, inemna imaw awm pe nih?
42009026	Ajarla tunita`awm kajar a le kawchawng hai jar a jakna niei a tu, Miring Shapa kha na, ama lurna, Apa lurna, khan ravantir riethieng hai lurna khan jong phakhan, jak pui rangnih.
42009027	Khania diktak a nangni dieng kiriei inih, hin ah ading miring eshen hi na Pathien rengchangna kha muk u masheng, amani na thitna tuidan kha en u naw nih.”
42009028	Khan hitihin ruawm, hihaihi irieina ni `riet dawr shole, Jesu na Peter, John, khan James kha ruchawi a lawn ah anih rang ruhawng pui.
42009029	Ama na nikna runieilai khan, ama maisho kha rurelek pe. Khan ama ponledier hai kha retelang a ruawm pe.
42009030	Khan enro, miring pasha `di, Moses le Elijah, na ama le ruriebieh uh.
42009031	Amani kha ajeng a rulur. Khan ama kachawina rang a jar a ruriei uh. Makha Jerusalem ah ashok rang a inih.
42009032	Khania Peter le irawtawp pui hai kha rumiei uh. Amani na hawng chehep u `le, ama lurna kha hawng muk uh. Khan ama le pasha `di ading kha hawng muk uh.
42009033	Khan hitihin ruawm, ama ah put ah rushe u le roroia, Peter na Jesu dieng ruti, “Pumpa, kieini na hin na`awm u hi atha, thamber `thum rashak u rawi: nang rang akhat, Moses rang akhat, khan Elijah rang akhat.” Ama na imaw iriei, iti kha rujet mak.
42009034	Ama na makha rurieilai khan, romiei na ava a amani kha vak rilip joi. Amani na romiei shung ah rulut u le roroia, akhaichawi hai kha ajeng a ruchih uh.
42009035	Khan romiei ah put ah he `khat jong a ruti, “Mahi numkipoktak kashapa kha inih, ama chawng kha rangai u roh.”
42009036	He kha jong phakhan, Jesu kha iethien a ruawm joi. Amani kha ruawmchien uh, khan amani na khalai a irumuk u jar kha tute dieng ruriei u mak.
42009037	Khan jing tieng hin amani na lawn ah put ah jongchum u phakhan, mipui hawi `khat na ama kha rurumuk pui uh.
42009038	Mipui kar a mi `khat na he rashang a ruti, “Oja, kashapa khaw nangne`en pena rang kininik. Ajarla ama hi kashapa khatte inih.
42009039	Enro, raikho na shur phakhan, jetboithieiboi a ama na ra`ai, khan chiephon moshoklam a ruvawr. Ama na mawpawp ning, tia dengre a ama kha irumathanthiei inih.
42009040	Nawtnathiei rang, nang khaichawi hai kha kurudawi, inia amani na rumawtawr u mak.”
42009041	Jesu na mashang a ruti, “Aw takashawn boi le shuklet rong hai, idawrshe a nangni le awm a kidoi rang a maw nih? Nang shapa kha hin vak chawi roh.”
42009042	Naitepa kha na vak jawng phakhan, raikho kha na ama kha vakvawklap a thirthir a rawnawkmashak. Inia Jesu na ratha rono kha rurawkawk, khan ama na naitepa kha rumadam a apa dieng rupek joi.
42009043	Khan mi kholok na Pathien lienna khan shindawngna runiei uh. Jesu na iruthaw hai kholok chung a mi rikip na shindawngna runiei u lai khan, ama na akhaichawi hai dieng ruti,
42009044	“Hihai chawng hi nang nokor shung ua tet u roh, ajarla Miring Shapa kha miring hai khut a pek rang a nih joi.”
42009045	Khania amani na hi chawng hi rujet u mak. Amani na tina jetna ngam boi rang, mahi amani ah put ah rethe inih. Khan amani na mahi chawng jar a rawdawn rang khan ruchih uh.
42009046	Amani na amani kar a tu kha maw alienving, tia chawng rurieshiet uh.
42009047	Khan Jesu na amani mulungmining kha rujet pe a naite `khat rukoi, khan ama dieng ah rumiding.
42009048	Khan amani dieng ruriei, “Tunita`awm kiriming a mahi naite hi loi a tu, kiei le khan nojongtirpa kha iloi inih. Ajarla nang kar ua ashinving ama kha alienving kha inih.”
42009049	John na mashang a ruti, “Aw Pumpa, nang riming a raikho hai runawt miring `khat kurumuk uh, kieini le nang ajui miring nit boi jarkhan, kurumakha uh.”
42009050	Jesu na ama dieng rumashang, “Makha u naw roh. Kieini le re`er boi ama kha kieini le rachang inih.”
42009051	Khan hitihin ruawm, ama kha ravan tieng kana rang, nikho kha hawng rupum le roroia, ama na Jerusalem tieng shena rang, mai rumiehiei joi.
42009052	Khan ama na palai hai kha amaton ah rutir joi. Ama tungnajana rashamna rang, amani na rushe ua Samaria miring hai kho `khat ah rulut uh.
42009053	Khania ama na Jerusalem tieng rushe jarkhan, amani na ama kha ruphawm u lai mak.
42009054	Akhaichawi hai, James le John na makha muk u phakhan, ruti uh, “Pumi, Elijah na iruthaw kha ang a, ravan ah put ah miei koi a amani hi mathang u rang rawi maw?”
42009055	Inia Jesu na hiei a amani kha rurawkawk khan ama ruti, “Ih ratha khan a awm maw nangnih u, iti kha jet u mak che?
42009056	Miring Shapa kha na miring ringkho kha mathang ajong nimak, inia ringkho ashan jong inih.” Khan amani na kho shik `khat ah rushe u joi.
42009057	Khan hitihin ruawm, amani na lam ah rulawn u lai khan, akhat na ama dieng ruti, “Pumi, kiei na nang shena mun rikip ah nujui rang kanih.”
42009058	Jesu na ama dieng ruriei, “Ramui hai na khur niei uh, khan ravan a va hai na rubu niei uh, inia Miring Shapa na tu, lu tetna rang mun niei mak.”
42009059	Khan shik `khat dieng ama na ruti, “Nujui roh.” Inia ama na rumashang, “Pumi, kapa akhum rang kiei hi nawjawt pemasha roh.”
42009060	Inia ama dieng rumashang, “Athi hai kha na amanitak athi hai kha khum u rosho, inia nang tu Pathien rengchangna chungchanga chawng vak shem roh.”
42009061	Khan shik `khat na`awm ama dieng ruti, “Pumi, nangnu nujui rang kanih, khania ki`in ah awm miring hai dieng reshenna vak thawna pui rang nawjawt pe roh.”
42009062	Jesu na ama dieng rumashang, “Ukhut ah langkon mukui a nukhiei athaw ama kha Pathien rengchangna rang rutuk mak.”
42010001	Hihaihi shole Pumi na shawm shiri shik hai kha rumadan joi. Ama na ashe rang a rashamna khopui le mun rikip ah amaton a amani kha ididi a rutir joi.
42010002	Ama na ruriei, “Parrawkhawm rang a hi awrawp, inia chon thaw miring hai hi awtawm. Khajarkhan par Pumi dieng ama loimun a chon thaw rang miring jong tirna rang, nikna niei u roh.
42010003	She u tana en u ro, kiei na nangni kha melang hai kar a kengamte hai kha ang a kinitir u inih.
42010004	Shierkawk, pai, khan kekawk chawi u naw roh. Lam ah tute le chubai thaw u naw roh.
42010005	“Nanglutna u in kha ih kha nita`awm akhat changna a, ‘Mahi in hin lungdamna kha awm rosho,’ ti u roh.
42010006	In khan lungdamna miring kha awm joiatu, nang mulung damna u kha ama dieng awm rosho. Khanitnawkatu makha nangni dieng vak kir rangnih.
42010007	Nangawmna u intak khan bulean kha shah u roh, ajarla chonthaw miring kha na ama lawh imuk rang a kha rutuk inih. In `khat ah put ah in `khat ah rechen u naw roh.
42010008	“Khan nanglutna u khopui khan lamjawng nuruthaw uatu, ih kha nita`awm nangni rang a inarasham pe u kha shah u roh.
42010009	Makhan ah awm ana hai kha madam u roh. ‘Pathien rengchangna kha na nojongranai pui joi,’ tia riei u roh.
42010010	Nanglutna u ih khopui kha nita`awm, noroloi boi u phakhan, amani lamlien ah she u tana ti u roh,
42010011	‘Kekepha uah kawp nang khopui u vaiphin haishe hi kieini na kakhawng uh. Mahi nangni le kere`erna u jetna kha inih. Khanikengta Pathien rengchangna kha jong nai joi, iti kha jet u roh.’
42010012	Nangni dieng kienieriei uh, makha Nikho khan mahi khopui rangnek hin Sodom rang a kha doithieidet chang rangnih.
42010013	“Aw Chorazin, nang dieng mieriemna awm! Aw Bethsaida, nang dieng mieriemna awm! Ajarla nangni dieng ranakniei chon iruthaw hai kha Tyre le Sidon dieng runih joiatu, bawra rieshiei a, ruvut robolam a shuh ning, tia amani mulung lekna kha shawt rangnih joi.
42010014	Inia nangni rangnek hin Tyre le Sidon chung a chawngshatna rang a kha doithieidet chang rangnih.
42010015	Khan ravan a irulawm, Aw Capernaum, nang hi thikho a nawvawr rangnih.
42010016	“Nang chawng u rangai ama kha na kawchawng kha irangai inih. Nangni anaheng ama kha na kiei hi inaheng inih. Khan kiei anaheng ama kha na nojongtirpa kha iheng inih.”
42010017	Khan khaichawi shawm shiri kha ningailam a vak kir ua ruti uh, “Pumi, raikho haishe na`awm nang riming a kieini dieng rubu uh.”
42010018	Khan amani dieng ruriei, “Kiei na Satan kha ravan ah put ah jong cho khomelek kha ang a kurumuk.
42010019	Enro, kiei na nangni dieng moro hai le aikoshangpa hai chung a ke le chongna rang, rahapui ranak kholok chung a cham kha kenepek u joi. Ih na`awm nangni kha nawmawpawp u lai naw nih.
42010020	Khanikengta nangni dieng ratha hai kha rubu u jarkhan, ningai u naw roh. Kha ruhut a nang riming u hai kha ravan a rumiejiek jarkhan, ningai u roh.”
42010021	Kha pha khan Jesu na Ratha a ningaina runiei a ruti, “Ravan le rieliei Pumi, Aw kapa, nang kha kanamapak, ajarla nang na hihaihi mishing le mithiei kanih ati hai kar a nangruthe a, naite hai dieng nangrumalar joi. Inih, Aw kapa, makha keng nang dieng a awm enlar kha.
42010022	Kapa na nieinak kholok kha kiei dieng nurupek joi, khan kapa na niboia, tute na Shapa kha tumaw nih, iti kha jet mak; khan Shapa na niboia tute na Apa kha tumaw nih, iti kha jet mak. Khan Shapa na Apa imalarna jawt miring ama kha na Apa kha tumaw nih, iti kha ejet.”
42010023	Khan akhaichawi hai dieng hiei a ruti, “Nangimuk u hai hi amuh hai kha rahvanmuh mik hai kha nih uh.
42010024	Ajarla kiei na nangni dieng kiriei inih, thiempulien hai le reng tampui na nang imuk u hai hi rumuk jawt uh, inia rumuh u mak. Khan nangirangai u hai hi rurangai jawt uh, inia rurangai u mak.”
42010025	Enro, danthiei `khat na ruding a ama kha enrurete, khan ama na ruti, “Oja, kumshawt ringna kha kutumnathiei rang, kiei na imaw thaw ning?”
42010026	Ama dieng ruti, “Dan ah imaw miejiek? Nang na itia maw makha nangte?”
42010027	Ama na mashang a ruti, “ ‘Nang PUMI nang Pathien kha nang mulung kholok le, nang ringphuk kholok le, nang ranak kholok le khan nang mulungmining kholok le numnangipok rang a inih,’ khan ‘Nang ringchangpui kha nang pumtak ang a numnangipok rang a inih.’ ”
42010028	Khan ama dieng ruti, “Thaning a nangrumashang. Mahi thaw roh, khan nangring rangnih.”
42010029	Inia ama na nining a rudik jawt jarkhan, Jesu dieng ruti, “Kiringchangpui kha tumaw nih?”
42010030	Jesu na ama dieng ruriei, “Miring `khat hi Jerusalem ah put ah Jericho ah rushe, khan ama kha shiersho miring hai khut ah rucho joi. Ama kotai kha ruthut pe uh, khan rujem ua ama kha athideng a rumak uh.
42010031	Rethenna `khat a makha lam khan thiempu `khat rupang a ama kha rumuk phakhan, ama na shir `khat tieng rulawi.
42010032	Khatak kha ang a Levi miring `khat hi kha mun khan vak pang a rumuk phakhan, shir `khat tieng rulawi.
42010033	Khania Samaria miring `khat na khomijin vatna a ama ruawmna tieng vak pang a ama kha rumuk phakhan, lairunat pui.
42010034	Ama na rujawng a pawpna hai kha thao le ju ruliei pe a rutum pe, khan ama shatak khan rumushut joi. Khan jinin `khat ah ruchawi a ama chon kha ruthaw pe.
42010035	Khan jing tieng hin ama na rushe phakhan, dinari `di rurosho a jinin rungpa dieng rupek. Khan ama dieng ruti, ‘Ama hi ruen roh, kiei na kavakkir phakhan, nangimulut ijat kha nita`awm nathung rang kanih.’
42010036	“Khajarkhan hihai uthum kar hin tu kha maw shiersho miring hai khut ah acho miringpa ringchangpui?”
42010037	Makhan ama na rumashang, “Ama chung a roihoina itetna miringpa kha keng.” Khan Jesu na ama dieng ruti, “She tana kha ang khan vak thaw roh.”
42010038	Khan amani na rushe u le roroia, khote `khat ah rulut uh. Khan Martha iti nupang `khat na ama kha in ah rumutung.
42010039	Ama na Mary iti anaipangnu `khat runiei. Ama na Jesu keshun a rushuh a ama chawng rangai a ruawm.
42010040	Inia Martha kha chonthaw a chonruchin pe. Khan ama dieng ava a ruti, “Pumi, kanaipangnu na kiethien a chon inawmawthaw hi nang na ih nangishawn boi maw nih? Khajarkhan ama na nashanna rang, nieriei pe roh.”
42010041	Jesu na mashang a ama dieng ruti, “Martha, Martha, nang na nieinak tampui chung a nang mulungshaw a narahamashak.
42010042	Khania nieinak khatte hi rangai, ajarla ama ah put ah shothiei boi, tum atha kha Mary na madan joi.”
42011001	Khan hitihin ruawm, Jesu na mun `khat ah nikna runiei. Ama na rubang phakhan, akhaichawi hai kar a akhat na ama dieng ruti, “Pumi, John na akhaichawi hai iruchuk kha ang a, nikna dan nuruchuh u roh.”
42011002	Khan ama na ruti, “Nangni na nangnik u phakhan, hitihin ti u roh: Ravan a awm kapa u, nang riming kha riethieng nih rosho, nang rengchangna kha jong rosho. Ravan a nang mulungmining nangithaw kha ang a, rieliei hinawm nih rosho.
42011003	Von a nekkhawp nekleshak kha nikip nepeh u roh.
42011004	Kielieishie ton miring rikip kha karangaidam u jarkhan, kumunu u hai hi narangaidam pe u roh. Lemna a nomocho u naw roh. Inia ashie ah put ah nakhek u roh.”
42011005	Khan amani dieng ruriei, “Nang kar ua akhat na lawm `khat ieniei, khan ama na janchim a ama dieng she a iti, ‘Kama, tan `thumbak nepeh roh.
42011006	Ajarla kawlawm `khat khomijin ah put ah jong tung a ama shak rang ih nieilai mi`ing.’
42011007	Khan ama na inshung ah put ah rumashang, ‘Kiei hi nachawklai naw roh, tun mawkawt kha rakhar joi, khan kanai hai kha kiei le jakhang ah ja u joi; kiei na thoi a nepeh ngamlai naw ning.’
42011008	Kiei na nangni dieng kieriei, ama kha awlawm nitjoiawm, ruthoi pe mak, inia ringrawrat jarkhan, ama na thoi a irangai rikip kha pek rangnih.
42011009	“Khan kiei na nangni dieng kieriei, nih u roh, nangni dieng nepek rangnih. Tawk u roh, nangmuk u rangnih. Tawh u roh, nangni rang nawmawlawng pe rangnih.
42011010	Ajarla anih miring rikip na umuk, atawk ama kha na aman, khan atawh ama rang khan mawlawng pe.
42011011	“Nang kar ua apa `khat dieng shapa kha na tan nik `le, lung peh nih maw? Nga nik `le, kha ruhut a moro peh nih maw?
42011012	Khan arrutui nik `le, kha ruhut a aikoshangpa peh nih maw?
42011013	Khajarkhan, ashie nangnih u awm, nang nai hai dieng nieinak atha apeh kha nangthiei uala, ravan a awm nangpa u kha na anih miring hai dieng Ratha Riethieng kha idawr maw nepeh u nih!”
42011014	Khan ama na chawngthieiboi raikho `khat runawt. Raikho kha ama ah put ah rushok phakhan, chawngthieiboi miring kha ruchawng joi. Khan mipui kha shinrudawng pe uh.
42011015	Inia eshen na ruti uh, “Raikho hai reng Beelzebul ranak a raikho hai hi inawt inih.”
42011016	Khan eshen na, enretena rang, ravan ah put ah jetna ama dieng runik uh.
42011017	Inia amani mulungmining kha rujet pe a amani dieng ruti, “Nining a reshen rengchangna rikip thangbieng rangnih, khan malema re`er in kha upur.
42011018	Khan Satan kha na nining a reshen joiala, iti a maw ama rengchagna kha ding nih? Ajarla Beelzebul ranak a raikho hai kha kinawt keng nangti uh.
42011019	Inia kiei na Beelzebul ranak a raikho hai kha kawnawt joiala, nang nai hai na tu ranak a maw amani kha nawt uh? Khajarkhan amani kha nang chawngshat hai kha nih u rangnih.
42011020	Inia Pathien khutlawi kha le raikho hai kha kawnawt joiatu, nang chung ua Pathien rengchangna kha jong shok joi.
42011021	Miratpa kha na mieriem le rashamjer a ama in kha rung phakhan, ienieinak hai kha rekhe pe.
