42011022	Khania amanek a aratdet akhat na ava a ama kha vak hum phakhan, ama na irangamna pui mieriem hai kha chawi pe a shoniei hai kha mi dieng vak shem pe.
42011023	Kiei le rachang boi ama kha kiei le re`er inih, khan kiei na kiroshong pui boi ama kha na chaiachai a atet.
42011024	“Raikho rono kha na miring `khat ah put ah rushok phakhan, ama na shawmuchumna rang, ram hona mun hai kha rakan a rushe. Inia rumuk boi phakhan ruti, ‘Kavakshokna ki`in khan kiei kir rang kanih.’
42011025	Ama na rukir phakhan, makha iruphietviek, khan rietienir a irutet kha vak muk.
42011026	Khashole ama na rushe a ashiedet ratha shiri shik vak chawi. Khan amani na rulut ua kha mun khan ruawm uh. Khan dawngkhit a miringpa awmchan kha matiengnek khan rushiedet joi.”
42011027	Jesu na mahi rurieilai khan, mipui kar khan nupang `khat na ra`ai a ruti, “Nang navawng naikawk le nangirumujup runu kha rahvanmuh inih!”
42011028	Inia ama na ruti, “Hinek hin a rahvanmuh miring hai kha, Pathien chawng rangai a ajui miring hai kha nih.”
42011029	Khan mipui kha hawng re`ep shishit phakhan, ama na ariei ruput, “Mahi rong hi ashie rong kha inih. Mahi na jetna atawk. Jonah jetna kha niboia amani dieng peh naw nih.
42011030	Ajarla Jonah kha Nineveh miring hai rang a jetna ruchang kha ang a, Miring Shapa kha mahi rong rang hin jetna kha nih rangnih.
42011031	Chawngshatna khan thang tieng ah rengnu kha na hi rong miring haihi le dingchen ning, tia amani kha aheng rangnih. Ajarla rieliei dawngkhit ah put ah Solomon varna kha rangai ahawng inih. Khan enro, Solomonnek a aliendet miring kha hin awm joi!
42011032	Nineveh miring hai kha na mahi rong miring hai hi le chawngshatna khan dingchen ning, tia aheng rangnih. Ajarla Jonah chawngriei khan amani na mulung lekna runiei uh. Khan enro, Jonahnek a aliendet miring kha hin awm joi!
42011033	“Tute na thaomiei kha muchuk shole, rethe a ninawkle tiengkum thoi ah tet mak. Khania hawng lut miring hai na mieivar kha mukna rang, thaomieishut ah itet inih.
42011034	Mik hi pum mieivar kha inih. Mik kha tha phakhan, nang pumplang kha var rangnih. Mik kha shie phakhan, nang pumplang kha jing rangnih.
42011035	Khajarkhan nang dieng a awm mieivar kha jingna boi rang, riring roh.
42011036	Nang pumplang kha var a ajing `khatshe awm nawkatu, retelang thaomiei `khat na mieivar inepek kha ang a, nang pumplang kha mieivar kha na ship rangnih.”
42011037	Khan Jesu na chawngruriei a awmlai khan, Pharisee `khat na ama kha bunek puina rang, runik. Khajarkhan ama na rulut a bunek rang rushuh joi.
42011038	Jesu na bunek mala a ukhut irushukbak boi kha rumuk phakhan, Phariseepa kha shinrudawng pe.
42011039	Inia Pumi na ama dieng ruti, “Aw Pharisee hai, nangni na hai le kheng kha vai tieng nanglap uh, inia nang shung uatu phamrai le mulungpok ashie kha shipmer a awm.
42011040	Aw amawng miring hai! Vai akonpa kha na shung kha`awm ikon nimak maw?
42011041	Khanikengta shung a awm phamrai thaw nanginiei u hai kha numpokpek a peh u roh. Khan enro, nangni rang irikip riethieng rangnih.
42011042	“Inia Pharisee hai, nangni dieng mieriemna awm! Ajarla nangni na pudina le lengmesher, khan rohon ah anshawbo hai kha shemshawm a nangpek uh. Khan chawngshatna le Pathien numpok kha ishawn boi a nangthaw uh. Shik hai kha enda boi a hihaihi nangithaw u rang a shok.
42011043	“Pharisee hai, nangni rang mieriemna awm! Ajarla nangni na synagogue ah shutna runiei kha nangdit uh, khan rievieithawna mun hai khan mi na chubai inawthaw pui u kha nangdit uh.
42011044	Pharisee hai, danoja hai, khan thanunchan thaw hai, nangni dieng mieriemna awm! Ajarla nangni hi madang boi thankhur hai kha nangnih uh; mi hai na jet boi a makhan lawn a awm uh.”
42011045	Khan danthiei `khat na mashang a ama dieng ruti, “Oja, hihaihi nangriei phakhan, kieini hiawm maimawk nanginepek u inih.”
42011046	Khan ama na ruti, “Danthiei hai nangni diengawm mieriemna awm! Ajarla mi hai dieng iruput ngam boi pokrik kha nangpek uh. Nangni na pokrik hai kha nang khutlawi hai kar a akhatshe le shih u makche.
42011047	“Nangni dieng mieriemna awm! Ajarla nangpa hai na iruthat u thiempulien hai thanmun kha nangkon pe uh.
42011048	Diktak a nangpa hai na iruthaw chon hai kha idik, tia kungnangchang uh. Ajarla amani na thiempulien hai kha iruthat`het u inih, khan nangni na amani thanmun hai kha nangkon pe uh.
42011049	Khajarkhan Pathien na ama varna khanawm ruti, ‘Kiei na amani dieng thiempulien hai le tirtawn hai kha tir rang kanih. Amani eshen kha ruthat u rangnih, khan epshawna rupek u rangnih.’
42011050	Khajarkhan makha rieliei phun ah put ah rulong thiempulien kholok thishen kha mahi rong dieng hin biena rang a inih.
42011051	Makha Abel thishen ah put ah Zachariah thishenshe nih rangnih. Zachariah na lungkheng le riethiengmun kar ah ruthi. Inih, mahi rong dieng hin a bie rang a inih, tia nangni dieng kiriei inih.
42011052	“Danthiei hai, nangni dieng mieriemna awm! Ajarla shingna chabi kha nangni na nangthe uh. Nangnirilikawm lut u makche, khan alut hai kha nangkhar uh.”
42011053	Ama na hihaihi amani dieng irurieisho le roroia, danoja hai le Pharisee hai na ama kha ajeng a hawng raha pui ua, rahamothoina chawng tampui kha ama dieng rawdawn ruput u joi.
42011054	Khan ama kha shurna rang, ama na iriei rang a chawng ih khan nita`awm hengna rang, ruva a ruawm u joi.
42012001	Hilaitak hin, miring bawpbawp na hawng ruchun ua khatlekhat chung ah reter nana u phakhan, akhat changna a Jesu na akhaichawi hai dieng ariei ruput, “Pharisee hai chawh ah put ah nangni riring u roh. Makha amani thanunchan thaw kha inih.
42012002	Ajarla imukhu nieinak kholok phawngthiei boi, iti awm mak, khan jetthiei boi rethe, iti awm mak.
42012003	Khajarkhan ih nita`awm ajing a nangiti u kha avar a jet rangnih. Khan indan hai shung ah nangiriei u kha inphu hai khan rophong rangnih.
42012004	“Kawlawm hai, nangni dieng kiriei inih, pum athat hai kha chih u naw roh, makha shole ithaw ngam rang niei u mak.
42012005	Inia nangni na nangichih u rang a kha kiei na nangni dieng kirieimasha inih. That shole Gehenna a thongna rang a cham anieipa kha nangni na chih u roh, inih, ama kha chih u roh!
42012006	Varawchawngpi rahnga hi asharion idibak a ijor nimak maw? Nikengta amani kar a `khatshe Pathien maikung a mieniei awm mak.
42012007	Nang lu uah sham kholokshe kha jat iteviek inih. Khajarkhan chih u naw roh; varawchawngpi tampuinek a manlu nangnih uh.
42012008	“Inia kiei na nangni dieng kiriei inih, tunita`awm kiei hi miring hai maikung a norophong ama kha Miring Shapa na`awm Pathien ravantir hai maikung a rophong rangnih.
42012009	Inia miring hai maikung a najawt boi ama kha Pathien ravantir hai maikung a jawt naw nih.
42012010	Miring Shapa mieshiet mi rikip kha arangaidam rangnih, inia Ratha Riethieng mieshiet ama kha tu rangaidam naw nih.
42012011	“Nangni kha synagogue hai le lamkai hai, khan chamniei hai maikung a nawchawi u phakhan, itia nangimashang u rang ninawkle imaw nangiriei u rang, tia mulung mawshaw u naw roh.
42012012	Ajarla Ratha Riethieng na, kha phatak khan, nangiriei u rang a kha nuruchuk u rangnih.”
42012013	Khan mipui ah put ah mi `khat na ama dieng ruti, “Oja, inkoklo shemna rang, kulienpa dieng khawn nieriei pe roh.”
42012014	Inia ama dieng ruti, “Aw miring, nang chung ua chawngshat rang le nieinak ashem rang, kiei hi tuna maw namadan?”
42012015	Khan amani dieng ruriei, “Nangni raphamna kholok ah put ah riring u tana rurung u roh, ajarla miring `khat ringkho hi ruphu a iniei khan awm mak.”
42012016	Khan ama na rangshim `khat amani dieng ruriei pe a ruti, “Rawchawng miring `khat loimun khan par tampui rushok pe.
42012017	Ama na nining a rumining, ‘Par hai hi atetna rang kieniei boi jarkhan, kiei na imaw thaw ning?’
42012018	Ama na ruti, ‘Kiei na hi thaw rang kanih, kachu hai hi shiet a aliendet mothoi rang kanih. Khan kiei na par hai le kienieinak kholok hi khawn ruchun rang kanih.
42012019	Khan kiringphuk dieng ti rang kanih, “Aw ringphuk, kum tampui rang nieinak tampui nangbawm joi, hoiriethiei roh, neh roh, khan ningai roh.” ’
42012020	“Inia Pathien na ama dieng ruti, ‘Aw amawng miring! Von jan hin nang ratha kha nang ah put ah koi rang kanih joi, nangirasham nieinak hai kha tu rang a maw nih?’
42012021	Khajarkhan, ama rangbak a niei ibawm a, Pathien rang a sharachang miring hai dieng khan hi ti rangnih.”
42012022	Khan akhaichawi hai dieng ruti, “Khajarkhan nangni dieng kiriei inih, imaw nanginek u rang, tia nang ringkho u rang; ninawkle imaw nangirieshiei u rang, tia nang pum u rang nang mulung mawshaw u naw roh.
42012023	Ajarla ringkho hi nekleshaknek a, khan nang pum u kha ponlediernek a manlu inih.
42012024	Va`ak hai khi tinta u roh, amani na vawrawm vawr u mak, khan parawm rawkhawm u mak. Amani rang nieirutungna le achuawm awm pe u mak. Khania Pathien na amani kha ivai inih. Va hainek a khadawr khan a manlu nangnih uh!
42012025	Khan nang kar uatu na maw lungkhamna niei a atak chung ah rajang `khat maw bo ngam?
42012026	Khajarkhan shilitetak a`awm nangthaw ngam nawk uala, ijar a nangni na shik hai rang khan lungkhamna nanginiei u maw nih?
42012027	“Tuirieipar hai khaw tinta u roh, amani na chonawm thaw u mak, khan patawm kher u mak. Inia nangni dieng kiriei inih, Solomonshe na ama lurna kholok le hihai kar a akhat ang a rielien ngam mak.
42012028	Khan von loipuk ah aring, khan jing a ratapkung ah ivawr champi kha Pathien na khatikhan rielien joiala, Aw ashin a takashawn aniei hai, nangni kha idawrshe maw nierielien u nih?
42012029	Khan imaw nangnek rang imaw nangshak rang, tia tawk u naw roh, khan lungkhamna niei u naw roh.
42012030	Ajarla rieliei shung a phung kholok na hihaihi itawk u inih. Inia nangpa u na hihaihi nangrangai u, iti ejet.
42012031	Khania Pathien rengchangna kha tawk u roh, khan hihai kholok hi nangni dieng nobo pe u rangnih.
42012032	“Chih u naw roh, hawi ashin hai, ajarla nangni dieng rengchangna inepek u hi, nangpa u ningnitna kha inih.
42012033	Nang niei u hai kha jor u tana numpokpek peh u roh. Achiet boi shierkawk kha shawng u tana ahek boi niei kha ravan a bawm u roh. Makha murushah na idepna boi, khan lieida na imathangna boi mun inih.
42012034	Ajarla nang niei u awmna khan nang mulungawm awm rangnih.
42012035	“Rasham u tana nang thaomiei u kha muchuk u rang roh.
42012036	Upumpa kha na moiloi bumichinna ah put ah vak kir phakhan, rungak a awm miring hai kha ang u roh. Makha ama na ava a mawkawt kha vak tawh phakhan, amani na relentak a mawlawngna rang a inih.
42012037	Upumpa kha na vat phakhan, cheveng a ruawm ivakmuk shok hai kha rahvanmuh miring kha nih uh. Diktak a nangni dieng kiriei inih, ama na kawngkhit thaw ning, tia amani kha mushut rangnih, khan va ning, tia amani chon kha thaw pe rangnih.
42012038	Ama na adi le athum changna vengpa ding phakhan, khatikhan a ivakmuk amani kha rahvanmuh miring kha nih uh.
42012039	Inia mahi jet u roh, inpumipa kha na murushapa vatna rang a pha kha rujet joiala, ruche ning, tia i`in kha mokhoi naw nih.
42012040	Khajarkhan nangni`awm rasham u roh, ajarla nangrumining boi u phakhan, Miring Shapa kha jong rangnih.”
42012041	Khan Peter na ruti, “Pumi, mahi rangshim hi kieini rang ninawkle mi kholok rangawm nangiriei maw nih?”
42012042	Pumi na ruti, “Rangam puithiei le ashing shok kha tumaw nih? Ama kha upumpa kha na ama shok hai apana rang le amani kha rutukthep pha khan nekleshak apeh rang a roiruputna ipek miring kha inih.
42012043	Upumpa kha jong phakhan, khatikhan a chon iruthaw ivakmuk shok kha rahvanmuh miring tha inih.
42012044	Nangni dieng diktak a kiriei inih, ama niei kholok chung a apoh rang madan rangnih.
42012045	Inia shokpa kha na umulung shung a, ‘Kupumpa kha vak shumthiei,’ tia apashok hai le nupangshok hai kha ajem iput, inek-ishak a jurukhawp joiatu,
42012046	shok pumpa kha na, ama na irumining boi pha le irujet boi nidantak va rangnih, khan ama kha chepna natak pek ning, tia takashawn boi hai kha le atet rangnih.
42012047	“Khan upumpa mulungmining ijet a rurasham boi, ninawkle imining dungjuia athaw ama kha na rawmaw ajeng a tawng rangnih.
42012048	Inia pumpa mulungmining rujet boi, inia rawmaw tawng rang a rutuk inia chon tu ruthaw, ama kha na jangdet a tawng rangnih. Inia arawp ipekna mi rikip dieng arawpdet loi rangnih, khan arawpdet inganshiena ama dieng arawpdet a rangai rangnih. Lungdamna Nimak
42012049	“Rieliei chung hin miei kijongchawi inih. Khan makha achuksha kha nitjoiala, atha rangnih kiti!
42012050	Kiloi rang a baptisma `khat awm, khan baptisma kha hawng rupum masheng kiei hi ajeng a phainaravaimashak!
42012051	Rieliei chung hin lungdamna achawi ajong, tia maw nangmining uh? Nimak, kinieriei u hi inih, reshenmashakna kha inih.
42012052	Ajarla tun ah put ah in `khat ah rahnga kha reshen u rangnih: uthum le idi kar a, idi le uthum kar a.
42012053	Apa le ashapa kar a, ashapa le apa kar a, unu le ashanu kar a, ashanu le unu kar a, tarpi le moinu kar a, khan moinu le tarpi kar a reshenna awm rangnih.”
42012054	Khan mipui diengawm ruti, “Nangni na romiei na mar tieng hawng rajam phakhan, ‘Roshur rangnih’ nangtirelen uh, khan makha oshok.
42012055	Khan thang tieng ah rithi hawng rang phakhan, ‘Nisha rangnih’ nangti uh, khan makha oshok.
42012056	Aw thanunchan thaw hai! Nangni na rieliei le ravan maisho kha nangmelerthiei uh, inia ijar a tun a pha hi nangimeler ngam boi u maw nih?
42012057	“Iloia adik khan nang nining ua chawngnangishat boi u maw nih?
42012058	Ajarla khatikhan nangni na chamniei miring maikung a nere`erpui kha le nangshe phakhan, lam khan machaina rang, thaw roh. Khanawkatu, ama na chawngshat miring dieng ranak a nepek rangnih, khan chawngshat miring kha na lungrokorung ama dieng, khan lungrokorung miring kha na lungroko shung ah nothong rangnih.
42012059	Nang dieng kiriei inih, nang na dawngkhit lepton kha nangpek masheng, makha mun ah put ah vak shok naw tinih.”
42013001	Khan Galilee miring hai na rurawthawi u lai khan, Pilate na amani kha ruthat, tia kha mun ah awm mi eshen na Jesu dieng ruriei uh.
42013002	Amani dieng mashang a ruti, “Amani chung a hihaihi shok jarkhan, hihai Galilee miring hai hi Galilee miring shik hainek a munu nieidet miring hai keng, tia nangimining u maw nih?
42013003	Nangni dieng kinieriei inih, makha nimak, inia nang mulung nanglek u nawkatu, hitihin nangthi u rangnih.
42013004	Ninawkle, Siloam vendai jong pur a shawmlieiriet ide a ruthi hai kha, Jerusalem ah awm miring kholoknek a munu nieidet miring hai keng, tia nangimining u maw nih?
42013005	Nangni dieng kinieriei u inih, makha nimak, inia nang mulung nanglek u nawkatu, hitihin nangthi u rangnih.”
42013006	Khan ama na mahi rangshim hi ruriei, “Miring `khat na ama drakha rohon shung ah thieichangkung `khat runiei. Ama na ara en vat phakhan, vak muh mak.
42013007	Khan ama na drakha rohon aenpa dieng ruti, ‘Mahi thieichangkung hin ara kivak enna hi kum `thumhet nih joi, inia vak muh mi`ing. Mahi tuh rang roh. Ijar a mahi ramshe hi ilo rang a maw nih?’
42013008	“Ama na mashang a ruti, ‘Pumi, diengvai hin choi a hir katheh malalim, hikum hin tu endi rawi.
42013009	Unuk a ama na ara moshok joiatu atha, khanitnawkatu, mahi nangtukthiei joi.’ ”
42013010	Khan ama na Sabbath nikho a synagogue `khat hin mi ruruchuk a ruawm.
42013011	Khan enro, ratha thaboi na kum shawmlieiriet imawkhawr nupang `khat ruawm, khan awkawng kha rukaier pe a tonpeng a ruding ngam mak.
42013012	Jesu na ama kha rumuk phakhan, ama dieng ruti, “Nupangnu, nang khawr ah put ah inathut pe nih joi.”
42013013	Ama na ukhut hai kha ama chung ah rutet pe a relentak a ama kha rumotonpeng joi, khan ama na Pathien kha mapak a ruawm joi.
42013014	Jesu na Sabbath nikho a irumadam khan synagogue lamkaipa kha na shanglam a rumashang, khan mipui dieng ruti, “Chon thawna rang ni `ruk awm. Kha nikho hai khan va u tana damna vak muh u roh, inia Sabbath nikho a tu nih naw rosho.”
42013015	Inia Pumi na mashang a ruti, “Aw thanunchan thaw miring hai! Nangni `khatkhat na Sabbath nikho khan nang shiecha ninawkle nang ranngam kha shiekon ah put ah nangmoshok a tuineh nangimeshe boi maw nih?
42013016	Enro, Abraham shanu mahi nupang hi kum shawmlieiriet Satan na ikhop a irutet inih, Sabbath nikho hin irukhop ah put ah ama hi moshok boi rang a maw nih?”
42013017	Ama na hihaihi ruriei phakhan, ere`erpui hai kholok kha jak rumumuk. Khan ama na irumoshok alur chon kholok chung khan ningaina runiei uh.
42013018	Khajarkhan ama na ruti, “Pathien rengchangna kha imaw ang? Mahi ih le maw kiei na rekhenna ning?
42013019	Mahi mi `khat na anchamru ichawi a orohon ah ivakthe, khan hawng mawng a thingkung hawng chang, khan abak hai khan va hai na rubu ithawna kha le ra`ang inih.”
42013020	Khan ama na rurieiret, “Pathien rengchangna kha kiei na ih le maw rekhenna ning?
42013021	Mahi nupang `khat na chawh ichawi a jam haikhup `thum le ireche a chawh rachangviek masheng a iruthe kha le ra`ang inih.”
42013022	Khashole ama na Jerusalem ah rushena lam khan mi ruchuklam a ama na khopui hai le khote hai kha rupangna.
42013023	Khan mi `khat na ama dieng ruti, “Pumi, ishan miring hai kha atawm rang a maw nih?” Ama na amani dieng ruriei,
42013024	“Pakawt rebe khan lutna rang, rojo u roh, ajarla mi tampui na lutna rang, atawk u rangnih, inia mawtawr u naw nih, iti hi kinieriei u inih.
42013025	Inpumipa kha na othoi a mawkawt kha khar phakhan, nangni na vai tieng ading nangput u rangnih, khan mawkawt kha tawh u ti ning, tia nangti u rangnih, ‘Pumi, Pumi, nawmawlawng pe u roh.’ Khan ama na nangni dieng niti rangnih, ‘Ih ah put ah va maw nangnih uh, kiei na nejet u mi`ing.’
42013026	“Khashole nangti u rangnih, ‘Nang maton ah nekleshak kenek uh, khan lamlien hai khan nang nuruchuk uh.’
42013027	Khan ama na riei rangnih, ‘Kiei na nangni dieng kieriei, dikna boi chonthaw miring kholok kiei ah put ah shok u rang roh, ih ah put ah va maw nangnih uh, kiei na nejet u mi`ing.’
42013028	“Khan nangni na Abraham, Isaac, Jacob, khan thiempulien kholok na Pathien rengchangna khan awm a, nangni kha vai tieng inapai u kha nangmuk u phakhan, chapna le hareshena kha awm rangnih.
42013029	Khashole miring hai na shim le mar, khan shak le thang ah put ah hawng u ning, tia Pathien rengchangna khan shuh u rangnih.
42013030	Khan enro, nukna hai kha masha rangnih, khan masha hai kha nukna rangnih.”
42013031	Kha phatak khan Pharisee hai eshen na Jesu kha vak jawng ua ama dieng ruti uh, “Hin ah put ah she rang roh, ajarla Herod na nang kha nathatna rang, mining joi.”
42013032	Khan amani dieng ruti, “Makha ramui dieng khan she u tana vak ti u roh, ‘Von le jing hin kiei na raikho hai kha nawt rang kanilai, khan ana hai kha madam rang kanilai, khan ni `thum changna khan kikhinmun kha shok rang kanih joi.’
42013033	Khanikengta kiei na von, jing a le thiem a kakichawingir rang a shok joi, ajarla thiempulien `khat kha Jerusalem vai ah ithat rang a kha nithiei naw nih.
42013034	“Aw Jerusalem, Aw Jerusalem, thiempulien hai athat le ama dieng ijongtir hai kha lung le adeng! Arpui `khat na ete hai kha amatha noi ah irawkhawm kha ang a, idawrshe maw nang nai hai kha kururawkhawm jawt! Inia rujawt u makche.
42013035	Enro, nang in u kha rokpet a rangah joi. Khan nangni dieng kiriei inih, ‘PUMI riming a ava ama kha rahvantha inih,’ nangti u masheng, numuh u lai naw tinih.”
42014001	Khan hitihin ruawm, Sabbath nikho `khat hin Jesu na Pharisee hai lamkai `khat in ah buneh rushe phakhan, amani na ama kha tinruta uh.
42014002	Khan enro, pomrai tawng miring `khat amaton a ruawm.
42014003	Jesu na mashang a danthiei hai le Pharisee hai dieng rurawdawn, “Sabbath nikho a mi madam hi Dan maw nih, ninawkle dan nih boi maw nih?”
42014004	Inia amani ruawmchien uh. Khan Jesu na ama kha apawttap a rumadam a rumeshe joi.
42014005	Khan ama na amani dieng ruti, “Nang kar ua nang shapa `khat ninawkle nang shiecha `khat hi Sabbath nikho khan khur ah cho joiala, relentak a roshoh naw rawng maw?”
42014006	Hihai chung hin amani na rumashang ngam u mak.
42014007	Khan koimiring hai kha na runiei a richit ipek itawk u awmchan kha rumuk `le, amani dieng rangshim `khat ruriei pe:
42014008	“Tukhat na nangni kha moiloi bumichinna khan nokoi u phakhan, shutna hoi hai khan shuh u naw roh. Miringpa kha na nangnek a richit pekdet rang a miring koithiei.
42014009	Nang dinre akoipa kha na ‘Nang mun kha hipa dieng hin peh roh,’ tia nang dieng nitithiei, khan jaklam a, nang na renemving shutna kha nanglothiei.
42014010	Inia mi na nang kha nokoi phakhan, she tana renemving mun khan vak shuh roh. Makha nang anakoi miring kha na nang dieng ‘Kama, hoinadet mun hi hawng loh roh,’ nitina rang a inih. Makhan nang le ashuh miring hai maikung khan nang lurna kha awm rangnih.
42014011	Ajarla nining a rawlawm ama kha redemashak rangnih, khan nining a rede ama kha alawm rangnih.”
42014012	Khan ama akoipa dieng khan ruti, “Jingkarbu ninawkle nitakbu nangrasham phakhan, nang lawm hai, nang uliennai hai, nanginshungkhur hai, khan ringchangpui rawchawng hai kha koi naw roh. Khanitatu amani na`awm nokoi u rangnih; makha inimikirna kha chang rangnih.
42014013	Inia bu nangmichin phakhan, shara miring, khutkekhawr, khan mikchaw miring hai kha koi roh.
42014014	Amani na nemele boi jarkhan, nang rahvantha kha nangnih. Ajarla midik hai thoiretna khan nang dieng nimikir rangnih.”
42014015	Ama le rushuh hai kar a akhat na makha rujet phakhan, ama dieng ruti, “Pathien rengchangna a buneh rang a ama kha rahvanmuh miring kha inih!”
42014016	Khan ama na ama dieng ruriei, “Mi `khat na bumichinna lientak `khat runiei a mi tampui rukoi.
42014017	Nitakbu nek dieng khan koimiring hai kha ‘Va u rang roh, irikip rashamsho keng joi,’ tia akoi rang shokpa kha ama na rutir joi.
42014018	“Inia kholok na mulung khat a methena ruthaw uh. Akhat changna kha na ruti, ‘Kiei na ram mun `khat kawrawchawk, khan makha aen she boi thalai mak, narangaidam roh.’
42014019	“Akhat na ruti, ‘Kiei na shiecha rawkawt rahnga kawrawchawk, kiei amani enrete she rang kanih, narangaidam roh.’
42014020	“Shik `khat na ruti, ‘Kiei nungak kienieilimlai, va ngamlai naw ning.’
42014021	“Khan shokpa kha vak kir a hihai kholok hi upumpa dieng thangvakkoi joi. Inpumipa kha ashang a oshokpa dieng ruti, ‘Relentak a lamlien ah le khopui lamkawt hai khawn she tana shara miring, khutngaw, mikchaw le kekhawr miring hai kha hin vak chawi roh.’
42014022	Khan shokpa kha na ruti, ‘Pumi nang iti kha thawsho keng joi, inia mun tawnglai.’
42014023	“Khan pumi kha na shokpa dieng ruti, ‘Lamton ah le lamkawi khan she tana vak mulut boi tha makche. Makha ki`in hi mishipna rang a inih.
42014024	Ajarla kikoi hai tute na kinitakbu hi tuidan en naw nih, tia nangni dieng kiriei inih.’ ”
42014025	Khan mipui kha ama dieng vak ruchun uh, khan amani dieng hiei a ruti,
42014026	“Kiei dieng ava mi rikip na apa, unu, unungak nai hai, uliennaipangpa hai le uliennaipangnu hai, khan kha kar khan, iringkhotak amumak boi ama kha kakhaichawi kha nih ngam naw nih.
42014027	Ama cross rupu a kanu ajui boi ama kha kakhaichawi kha nih ngam naw nih.
42014028	“Ajarla nang kar ua tukhat na vendai mothoi jawt a tu, makha mawtawrna rang, rapapek a shuh ning, tia alut rang a jat kha mushung naw nih maw?
42014029	Ama na keshun phun a mawtawr ngam nawkatu, ama amuh mi rikip na nuijat a ithaw inih.
42014030	‘Hi miring hi na in rashak tu put, inia mawtawr ngam mak,’ iti u inih.
42014031	“Ninawkle, ih reng kha na maw reng shik `khat chung a ra thaw dieng, rapapek a shuh ning, tia ama na bawp shawmdi vak chawi a ama le rathaw ava rang a hi bawp shawm le mawtawr ngam nih maw, tia mining vak naw nih maw?
42014032	Ama na ra`ithaw pui ngam boi rang a nitjoiatu, ala ah awmlai khan, ama na palai tir a riengieina thaw pui rangnih.
42014033	Khajarkhan hitihin nanginiei kholok kha nangpai u nawkatu, nang kar ua akhatshe na`awm kakhaichawi kha nih ngam u naw tinih.
42014034	“Michi hi atha inih, inia ama tuidan kha thang joiatu, itia maw ma`aret rawng?
42014035	Pieipak rangawm, khan hir rangawm tha naw nih. Ama kha apai rangnih. Tunita`awm rangaina rang a nokor aniei ama kha na rangai rosho.”
42015001	Khan khaichana rawkhawm hai kholok le munu miring hai kholok na ama chawngriei rangai rang, hawng ranai pui uh.
42015002	Khan Pharisee hai le danoja hai na mieshietlam a ruti uh, “Hi miring hi na munu miring hai kha awphawm a amani le ashak.”
42015003	Ama na mahi rangshim hi riei pe a, amani dieng ruti,
42015004	“Nangni kar a tu `khat na kengam rajakhat iniei kar khan akhat thang pe joi. Ama na shawmkolieiko kha ramthim ah mak a athang `khat kha muk masheng, atawk she naw nih maw?
42015005	Ama na muk phakhan, iring ah mushut a ama na ningai pui.
42015006	Khan in ah va a awlawm hai le ringchangpui hai kha okoi a iti, ‘Kekengam athang kha kumuk joi jarkhan, va u tana ningnavakngai pui u roh.’
42015007	Kiei na nangni dieng kiriei inih, hitihin mulung lek rang rangai boi midik shawmkolieiko chungnek khan munu miring `khat na mulung lek phakhan, ravan a aliendet ningaina kha awm rangnih.
42015008	“Ninawkle, nupang `khat na drachma shawm ieniei, ama na drachma `khat mathang joiatu, thaomiei muchuk ning, tia in kha phiet rangnih. Khan ama na muk masheng rieirit a tawk naw nih maw?
42015009	Ama na muk phakhan, awlawm hai le ringchangpui hai kha rawkhawm a ‘Kimathang drachma kha kumuk joi jarkhan, ningnavakngai pui u roh,’ iti.
42015010	Khan nangni dieng kiriei inih, hitihin munu miring `khat na mulungilekna chung khan, Pathien ravantir hai maikung a ningaina kha awm rangnih.”
42015011	Khashole Jesu na ruriei, “Miring `khat na shapa `di runiei.
42015012	Naipanglampa kha na apa dieng ruti, ‘Kapa, kitumphawm nieinak kha nepeh rang roh.’ Apa na nieilelung kha adin u dieng rushem pe joi.
42015013	“Nikhothang shawt boi a shapa naipanglampa kha na kholok kha rurawkhawm a ramlatak a rushe joi. Khan ienieinak hai kha pawrshawnawk a ruringna joi.
42015014	Ama na kholok kha rumeheksho phakhan, makha ram kholok khan nekleshak ajeng a hawng tang joi. Ama kha ravat hawng put joi.
42015015	Khan ama na rushe a makha ram ah awm miring `khat dieng chon vak nik joi. Khan ama kha loipuk ah vawk hai aroi rang, rutir joi.
42015016	Ama na vawkbu hai kha le vawn rumiship jawt, khan tute na iawm rupelai mak.
42015017	“Nining a hawng chehep a ruti, ‘Kapa shok hai na nekleshak ijat kha le ruphu a awm uh, inia kiei la hin vawnchamtuira le athang a ka`awm naw!
42015018	Kiei na thoi a kapa dieng kir a ama dieng ti rang kanih, “Kapa, ravan chung a le nang maikung a munu kawthaw joi.
42015019	Nang shapa `khat, tia koi rang hi kiei rutuklai mi`ing, kiei hi nang imoroi shok `khat namachang rang roh.” ’
42015020	“Khan ama na ruthoi a apa dieng hawng joi. Khan ama na ralaviei a ruawmlai khan, apa kha na ama kha rumuk a lairunat pui. Ama na tan a ruthaw a ama kha rukaw a rutum joi.
42015021	“Khan ashapa kha na ama dieng ruti, ‘Kapa, ravan chung a le nang maikung a munu kawthaw joi. Nang shapa `khat, tia koi rang hi kiei rutuklai mi`ing.’
42015022	“Inia apa kha na oshok hai dieng ruti, ‘Relentak a pon athaving kha vak chawi u tana ama hi vak rieshieimashak u roh, khan ukhut hin shumkieviek vak mietieng u roh; khan eke hai hin kekok vak mawrawn pe u roh.
42015023	Khan shiecha remet amarting kha vak chawi u tana that u roh. Khan shah u taia ningai moshok u rawi.
42015024	Ajarla kashapa hi ruthi a hawng ringret, khan ruthang a kimuk nih joi.’ Khan amani na ningai moshok ruput u joi.
42015025	“Inia ashapa ulienchang kha loipuk ah ruawm. Ama na hawng a in hawng shokdeng `le, larichin le lamna helehoi kha hawng jet.
42015026	Ama na shok `khat hi rukoi a hihaihi imaw nih, tia rurawdawn.
42015027	Ama na ama dieng ruti, ‘Nang naipangpa kha hawng kir joi. Ama na damveng a rumuk jarkhan, nangpa na shiecha remet amarting `khat ithat pe keng.’
42015028	“Inia mulung ruhang pe a hawng lut jawtlai mak. Khajarkhan apa kha na vai vak shok a ama kha rudawi.
42015029	Inia ama na apa dieng mashang a ruti, ‘Enro, kum khadawr shawt khan nang chon kihawngthaw inih, khan itikte nita`awm nang chawngpek kha rakan mi`ing, khan nang na itikte nita`awm kawlawm hai le ningai moshokna rang, kecha remet `khatshe nurupeh makche.
42015030	Inia mahi nang shapa hi na nang nieilelung kholok kha nawchijor hai le shakshoviek shole, hawng kir a nang na shiecha remet amarting `khat nangruthat pe.’
42015031	“Khan apa na ama dieng ruti, ‘Naitepa, nangtu ningthingkip kiei le nangawm, khan kienieinak hai kholok hi nangtah inih.
42015032	Kieini na mapak a ningaingir rang nashok, ajarla nang naipangpa hi ruthi a hawng ringret inih, khan ruthang a kimuk nih joi.’ ”
42016001	Khan Jesu na akhaichawi hai diengawm ruriei pe, “Rawchawng miring `khat ruawm, ama na inchonpo `khat runiei. Ienieinak hai kha pawrshawnawk a thaw, tia ama chung a chawng hawng tung joi.
42016002	Khajarkhan rukoi a ama dieng ruti, ‘Nang chungchanga kijet hi imaw nih? Nang inchonpona mushungna kha kiei dieng nepeh rang roh, ajarla ki`inchonpo kha nang nithieilai naw tinih.’
42016003	“Inchonpo kha na nining a ruti, ‘Kiei na imaw kithawthiei awm? Kupumi na inchonpona kha kiei ah put noloi pe rangnih joi. Pieipak choi la kiei ngam mi`ing; khutdaw lawn rang la kiei kajak.
42016004	Miring hai na amani in ah kiei hi nuruloinathiei rang, kiei na imaw kithaw rang, iti kha kiei kejet joi.’
42016005	“Ama na upumi lieishieton hai kha akhatkhat a rukoi a akhat changna dieng ruti, ‘Nang na kupumi shier ijat maw nangton?’
42016006	Ama na rumashang, ‘Thao batos rajakhat.’ Khan ama dieng ruti, ‘Nang shierche hi loi tana relentak a shawm rahnga miejiek roh.’
42016007	Khashole akhat dieng rurawdawn, ‘Nang la ijat maw nangton?’ Ama na rumashang, ‘Gehu koros rajakhat.’ Ama dieng ruti, ‘Nang shierche hi loi tana shawm riet miejiek roh.’
42016008	“Dikna boi inchonpo kha na shingveng a ruthaw jarkhan, pumi kha na rumapak. Ajarla hi rong miring hai na amani rong hin mieivar miring hainek a shing uh.
42016009	Khan kiei na nangni dieng kiriei inih, dikna boi nieilelung kha le lawm thaw u roh, makha rieshiet phakhan, amani na kumshawt a awmna khan noloi u rangnih.
42016010	“Lekte chung a takashawn rang a rutuk ama kha tampui chung a awm takashawn rang a rutuk inih, khan lekte chung a adik boi miring kha tampui chung a awm adik boi miring kha inih.
42016011	Dikna boi nieilelung khan takashawn rang a rutuk boi nangrunih uala, tu na maw nangni kha adik nieilelung khan nanganshie u nih?
42016012	Khan mi nieinak khan takashawn rang a rutuk nangrunih u nawkala, tu na maw nang tatak u kha nepeh u nih?
42016013	“Shok tute na pumi `di chon thaw ngam naw nih, ajarla ama na akhat kha mukmak a shik `khat kha numpok rangnih. Ninawkle, akhat kha pawm a shik `khat kha aheng rangnih. Pathien le nieilelung dire chon thaw ngam u naw tinih.”
42016014	Khan shierdit Pharisee hai kha na`awm hihai kholok hi rujet ua ama kha eshe a rulai uh.
42016015	Khan amani dieng ruti, “Nangni na miring hai maikung a nang nining a dik nangrasha uh, inia Pathien na nang mulung u kha ejet. Ajarla miring hai maikung a rashang kha Pathien maikung a tu mitiroi `khat inih.
42016016	“John phashe khan Dan le Thiempulien hai kha rurophong uh. Khan ah put khan Pathien rengchangna kha rurophong a makha shung khan mi rikip na rangrat a rulut uh.
42016017	Inia Dan hailak `khat acho rangnek a ravan le rieliei athang rang a kha baidet.
42016018	“I`inkonu kha imele a shik `khat iniei mi rikip uire ithaw inih, khan imele nupang aniei ama kha na uire ithaw inih.
42016019	“Rawchawng miring `khat na ponshenrin le ponramasha thaning rieshiei a ruawm. Ama na ningthingkip lungtawr a nekleshak rushak.
42016020	Khan Lazarus iti shara miring `khat apan a tuisharlam a apakawt khan ruawm.
42016021	Ama na rawchawngpa tebol ah put ah jong cho burama hai kha le vawn rumiship jawt. Khan ui haishe na`awm ava ua, ama apan a tuishar kha rumieliek pe uh.
42016022	Sharapa kha ruthi a Abraham makap ah awmna rang, ravantir hai na ruchawi u joi. Khan rawchawngpa kha`awm ithi a rukhum u joi.
42016023	Khan thikho khan shawrievieilam a ring rakang a, ralaviei a Abraham na amakap ah Lazarus pawmlam a awm kha hawng muk.
42016024	“Khan ama na he rashangtak a ruti, ‘Aw kapa Abraham, nang roihoina kha kiei dieng natetna roh, khan Lazarus kha jong tir tana ukhut par le tui shun rieshie kiemieliei hi nojong rachakmashak pe rosho. Ajarla kiei na mahi mieichon hin shawrievieilam a ka`awm joi.’
42016025	Inia Abraham na ruti, ‘Naitepa, nang na nangringlai khan atha hai kha nangmuk a Lazarus na ashie hai imuk kha mininghep roh, inia tun ama na hoina muk a nang na shawrievieina kha nangmuk joi.
42016026	Khan hihai kholok hi khea nangni le kieini kar a atawngvawng lientak `khat awm joi. Khajarkhan hin ah put ah nangnishe, khan khan ah put ah kieinishe hawng a rakan rawng, tia imining hai kha na mawtawr u lai naw nih.’
42016027	“Khan ama na ruti, ‘Aw kapa, ama kha kapa in ah nangtirnathiei rang, kininik.
42016028	Ajarla kuliennai hai rahnga kieniei, amani dieng kungnojongchang pe rosho, khanawkatu amaniawm mahi shawrievieina mun hin hawng u rang keng.’
42016029	Inia Abraham na ama dieng ruti, ‘Amani na Moses le thiempulien hai kha niei uh, amani chawng kha rangai u rosho.’
42016030	Inia ama na ruti, ‘Nimak, Aw kapa Abraham, athi ah put ah mikhat she joiatu, amani na mulung lek u rangnih.’
42016031	Inia Abraham na ama dieng ruti, ‘Amani na Moses le thiempulien hai chawng kha rangai u nawkatu, athi ah put ah hawng thoi miring kha na`awm mawkawi ngam u naw nih.’ ”
42017001	Khan Jesu na khaichawi hai dieng ruriei, “Keruthuina hai ajong boi rang a hi nithieilai naw nih, inia omojong ama rang khan, idawr a khawk maw nih naw!
42017002	Ashin hihaihi kar a akhat keruthuimashak rangnek a tu, ama rek ah shumhiei makhai pe a tuikhanglien shung ah vawr rang a kha ama rang thadet rangnih.
42017003	Riring u roh. Nang uliennai kha na munu thaw joiatu, rawkawk roh, khan umulung lek joiatu, rangaidam pe roh.
42017004	Khan nikhat a voishiri nang chung a munu thaw joiawm, nang dieng voishiri vak hiei a ‘Kumulung kelek joi,’ ti joiatu, rangaidam nangipek rang a shok.”
42017005	Khan tirtawn hai kha na Pumi dieng ruti uh, “Katakashawn u hi namarat pe shishit u roh.”
42017006	Pumi na ruriei, “Nangni na anchamru tiettak a`awm takashawn kha nangniei uatu, mahi mana thingkung dieng hin ‘Nang rawphawi tana tuikhanglien shung khawn vak mawng roh,’ nangti u sheawm ama na anarangai pe rangnih.
42017007	“Nang kar ua tuna maw shok `khat loipuk ah put ah ninawkle kengam hai aroi ah put ah hawng shoklim nangniei ua, ‘Relentak a va tana bu vak neh rang roh,’ ti u rawng?
42017008	Inia makha tinaw tinih. Kha ruhut a ‘Kenek rang shakthiei rasham roh, khan nang kawng kha khit tana kenek kashaklai hin chon nawthaw pe roh, khan hihai shole, nangnek nangshak rangnih,’ ti u naw rawng maw?
42017009	Chawngpek hai kha thaw jarkhan, ama na mapakna maw niei nih? Mapakna niei naw nih, tia takakawshawn.
42017010	Khatikhan nangniawm, nangni dieng a pek chawngpek kholok kha nangthaw u phakhan, ti u roh, ‘Kieini hi rutuk boi shok hai kha nanih uh, kieini na thawphawm kha nithaw u inih.’ ”
42017011	Khan hitihin ruawm, Jesu na Jerusalem ah rushena khan Samaria le Galilee kha phaw a rupang.
42017012	Khan ama na kho `khat ah rulut phakhan, raithawnaw tawng apa shawm na rurumuk pui uh.
42017013	Amani na ralaviei a ruding ua he rashangtak a ruti uh, “Aw Pumpa Jesu, nang roihoina kha kieini dieng natetna u roh!”
42017014	Khan ama na rumuk phakhan, amani dieng ruti, “Nangni na she u tana thiempu hai dieng khawn vak mumuk u roh.” Khan ashe u le roroia, amani kha ruriethieng u joi.
42017015	Inia amani kar a akhat na adam kha rumuk `le, Pathien mapaklam a vak kir.
42017016	Khan ekeshun a vak bawklap a ama kha rumapak. Ama kha Samaria miring runih.
42017017	Khan Jesu na mashang a ruti, “Iriethieng hai kha shawm anih boi maw nih? Oko hai kha khoshekawt ah maw awm u joi?
42017018	Mejet boi hipa hi niboia vak kir a Pathien lurna kha ipek boi u maw nih?”
42017019	Khan ama dieng ruti, “Thoi tana she rang roh, nang takashawn kha na nang kha namadam joi.”
42017020	Khan Pharisee hai na Pathien rengchangna kha itik a jong shok rang a maw nih, tia rurawdawn u phakhan, Jesu na amani dieng rumashang, “Pathien rengchangna hi mukthiei nieinak kha le ajong rang a nimak,
42017021	ninawkle amani na ‘Enro, hin awm joi!’ ninawkle ‘Enro, khawn awm joi!’ tithiei nimak. Ajartu Pathien rengchangna kha nang shung ua awm inih.”
42017022	Jesu na khaichawi hai dieng ruti, “Nangni na Miring Shapa nikho hai kar a akhat nangimuk jawtna u nikho kha jong rangnih. Makha nangni na muh u naw tinih.
42017023	Amani na niti u rangnih, ‘Enro, hin awm joi!’ ninawkle ‘Enro, khawn awm joi!’ niti u rangnih. Makhan she u naw roh, khan rojo u naw roh.
42017024	Khomelek a ravan shir `khat ah put ah shir `khatshe i`eh kha ang a, Miring Shapa kha ama Nikho khan, kha ang rangnih.
42017025	Inia rapapek a ama na shawna tampui doi rangnih, khan mahi rong hi na nawt rangnih.
42017026	“Khan Noah nikho hai khan a ashok kha ang a, Miring Shapa nikho hai khanawm kha ang rangnih.
42017027	Noah na rokongpui khan rulut masheng, khan tui hawng lien a amani kholok kha rumathangviek masheng, miring hai na rushak runek uh, inruniei uh, khan inniei rang khan rupek uh.
42017028	“Khatikhan Lot nikho hai kha ang a, amani na rushak uh, runek uh, nieinak rurawchawk uh, nieinak rujor uh, choicha ruling uh, khan in rumothoi uh.
42017029	Inia Lot na Sodom imathanna nikho khan miei le mieidi kha ravan ah put ah roshur ang a jong shur a amani kholok kha rumathang uh.
42017030	“Miring Shapa kha jong malarna nikho khan makhatak kha ang rangnih.
42017031	Makha nikho khan inphu ah awm mi kha na jong chum a in ah awm ienieinak hai kha jong loilai naw rosho. Kha ang khan loipuk ah awm mi kha na vak kirlai naw rosho.
42017032	Lot inkonu kha mininghep u roh.
42017033	Iringkho shanna rang a atawk miring kha thang rangnih, khan iringkho mathang ama kha na makha ashan rangnih.
42017034	Kiei na nangni dieng kiriei hi inih, makha jan khan jakhang `khat ah miring `di awm rangnih, akhat kha chawi rangnih, khan shik `khat kha mak rangnih.
42017035	Nupang pasha `di shum ah shanghak shukshom u rangnih, akhat kha loi rangnih, khan shik `khat kha mak rangnih.
42017036	Miring pasha `di loipuk ah awm rangnih, akhat kha loi rangnih, khan shik `khat kha mak rangnih.”
42017037	Amani na mashang a ruti uh, “Khoshekawt a maw, Pumi?” Ama na amani dieng rumashang, “Rok awmna mun khan langke hai na lawp `khat a ruchun u rangnih.”
42018001	Khashole ningthingkip mulungrakai boi a nikna rang, Jesu na amani dieng rangshim ruriei pe.
42018002	Ama na ruriei, “Khopui `khat hin Pathien chih boi le mi ishawn boi athaw chawngshat miring `khat ruawm.
42018003	Khan makha khopui khan mieirawng `khat ruawm; mieirawng kha na ama dieng ava a ruti, ‘Nere`erpui ah put ah kiei hi nimidik roh.’
42018004	“Phabawng `khat hi ama na rujawt pe mak, inia hihaihi shole, nining a ruti, ‘Kiei na Pathien kha kichih joi nawkawm, khan mi ishawn boi a kawthaw joiawm,
42018005	hi mieirawng hi na kiei hi shutnadingna nemejet boi jarkhan, ama hi kiei na midik rang kanih, khanawkatu ama na rawnaw a ava hi na kiei hi nomoboi rang keng joi’ ”
42018006	Khan Pumi na ruti, “Midik boi chawngshatpa iriei kha rangai u roh.
42018007	Ama na amani le shawttak doi pui joiawm, shun le jan a ra`ai imadansha hai kha Pathien na midik boi a maw tet nih?
42018008	Kiei na nangni dieng kiriei inih, ama na amani kha relentak a midik rangnih. Khania Miring Shapa kha na jong phakhan, rieliei chung hin takashawn kha jong muh nih maw?”
42018009	Khan amanirilik dieng rangamna midik kanih ati hai dieng khanawm mahi rangshim hi ruriei pe:
42018010	“Miring pasha `di hi na riethiengmun ah anih rushe uh. Akhat kha Pharisee inih, khan akhat kha khaichana rawkhawm miring inih.
42018011	Pharisee miringpa kha na ding a hitihin runik: ‘Pathien, kanamapak, ajarla kiei hi miring shik hai, murushah miring hai, midik boi hai, uirethaw miring hai, ninawkle khaichana rawkhawm miringpa hi a`ang nimi`ing.
42018012	Kiei na hapta `khat a voidi chamrakodoi, kimuk hai ijat kha kiei na shawm a `khat kepek.’
42018013	“Inia khaichana rawkhawm miring kha na ralaving a ding a ravan tiengsheawm khonga ngam boi a, umulung teilam a, ruti, ‘Pathien, kiei hi munu miring kha kanih, nang roihoina kha natetna roh!’
42018014	Kiei na nangni dieng kiriei inih, mahi miringpa hi na, akhatpanek khan, midik a i`in ah rukir joi. Ajarla nining a mapak mi rikip kha redemashak rangnih, khan nining a rede mi rikip kha alawm rangnih.”
42018015	Khan naite hai kha Jesu na shitna rang, amani na ama dieng vak chawi uh, inia akhaichawi hai na rumuk phakhan, amani kha rurawkawk uh.
42018016	Inia Jesu na amani kha rukoi a ruti, “Naite hai kha kiei dieng ava rang a kha jawt pe u roh, amani kha makha u naw roh, ajarla kha ang hai dieng khan Pathien rengchangna kha awm.
42018017	Diktak a nangni dieng kiriei inih, naite `khat ang a, Pathien rengchangna kha aloi boi ama kha na itikte nita`awm makhan lut naw nih.”
42018018	Khan rampo miring `khat na ama dieng rurawdawn, “Aw Oja atha, kumshawt ringna kutumna rang, kiei na imaw thaw ning?”
42018019	Khan Jesu na ama dieng ruti, “Ijar a kiei hi atha, tia nanginokoi maw nih? Pathien niboia tute atha awm mak.
42018020	Chawngpek hai kha nangjet: ‘Uire thawthiei naw tinih,’ ‘Mi thatthiei naw tinih,’ ‘Muruthiei naw tinih,’ ‘Adik boi a kungchangthiei naw tinih,’ ‘Nangnu le nangpa kha richit peh roh.’ ”
42018021	Khan ama na ruti, “Hihai kholok hi korothar chang ah put ah kihawngrung nih joi.”
42018022	Inia Jesu na rujet phakhan, ama dieng ruti, “Khanikengta thaw rang `khat nangvatlai, nanginiei ijat kha jor tana shara hai dieng vak shem pe roh, khan ravan a bawmniei kha nangniei rangnih. Khan va tana nujui roh.”
42018023	Inia mahi ama na rujet phakhan, ajeng a mulung rushaw pe joi, ajarla ama kha ajeng a rawchawng miring `khat runih.
42018024	Khan makha rumuk phakhan, Jesu na ruti, “Shumleshier aniei hai na Pathien rengchangna a alut rang a hi idawr a matat maw nih!
42018025	Rawchawng miring `khat na Pathien rengchangna alut rangnek a tu, sharingshiei `khat na shim nokor ah apang rang a kha baidet.”
42018026	Khan rangai miring hai kha na ruti uh, “Khanitala tu na maw shanna muh ngam nih?”
42018027	Khan ama na ruti, “Miring hai dieng a anithiei boi chon hai kha Pathien dieng tu anithiei inih.”
42018028	Khan Peter na ruti, “Enro, ih kholok kurumak ua kinurujui u inih.”
42018029	Khan Jesu na amani dieng ruriei, “Diktak a nangni dieng kiriei inih, in le loi ninawkle nungak le nai ninawkle uliennai shokpui ninawkle nu le pa hai kha Pathien rengchangna rangbak khan a rumathan
42018030	tute na tun a pha le ajong rang a rong hin kumshawt ringna kha rothom a muk boi a awm naw nih.”
42018031	Khan khaichawi shawmlieidi kha shemrushai a amani dieng ruti, “Enro, kieini hi Jerusalem ah ahawng rang a nanih u joi. Khan Miring Shapa chungchanga thiempulien hai dieng irumiejiekna kholok kha hawng rupum rangnih joi.
42018032	Ajarla ama kha Phungshik hai dieng rupek u rangnih, ama kha engshiet a ruthaw u rangnih. Ama kha maimawk rupek u rangnih, khan ama kha rumiechiei u rangnih.
42018033	Ama kha rujem u ning, tia ruthat u rangnih, khan ni `thum changna khan thoiret rangnih.”
42018034	Inia hihaihi amani na rujet ngam u mak, khan mahi rieichawng hi amani ah put ah rethe ruchang, khan amani na rieichawng kha rujet u mak. Mikchaw khutdaw
42018035	Khan hitihin ruawm, ama na Jericho ivakranai pui le roroia, mikchaw miring `khat na lamkaw khan khutdawlam a ruawm.
42018036	Ama na mipui vak pang kha rujet `le, mahi ih chonshok maw nih, tia rurawdawn.
42018037	Khan amani na Nazareth Jesu vak pang keng, tia ama dieng thangrukoi uh.”
42018038	Khan ama na ra`ailam a ruti, “David Shapa Jesu, nang roihoina kha kiei dieng hin natetna roh!”
42018039	Khan amaton ah alawn hai kha na awmchienna rang, rurawkawk uh, inia ama na rura`ai shishit, “David Shapa, nang roihoina kha kiei dieng hin natetna roh!”
42018040	Jesu na ding a ama dieng vak chawina rang, chawng rupek. Khan avak ranai pui phakhan, ama dieng rurawdawn,
42018041	Ama na ruti, “Nang rang kiei hi imaw nang nawmawthaw jawt?” Khan ama na ruti, “Aw Pumi, kumukthieina rang, kimik hi namavar pe roh.”
42018042	Khan Jesu na ama dieng ruti, “Muh rang roh, nang takashawn kha na namadam joi.”
42018043	Khan relentak a imik kha hawng var pe joi, khan Pathien kha mapaklam a anu rujui joi. Khan amuh miring kholok na Pathien kha rumapak uh.
42019001	Khan Jesu na Jericho kha rulut a rupang joi.
42019002	Khan enro, Zacchaeus iti miring `khat ruawm. Ama kha khaichana rawkhawm ulienchang le mirawchawng `khat runih.
42019003	Ama na Jesu kha tumaw nih, iti kha rumuk jawt, inia dungtawi miring runit jarkhan, mipui kar khan ama na rumuh ngam mak.
42019004	Khan ama na maton shawn a rutan a Jesu vak pangna rang a lam khan muknathiei rang, ama na thieipong kung `khat ah ruka.
42019005	Jesu na makha mun kha vak shok phakhan, chung tieng khongrunga a ama dieng ruti, “Zacchaeus, relentak a jong chum roh, ajarla von nikho hin kiei na nang in ah tungngir rang kanih.”
42019006	Khan ama na relentak a jong chum a ningailam a ama kha lamjawng ruthaw.
42019007	Khan amuh miring kholok na muruk a mieshiet a ruti uh, “Mununiei miring `khat in ah tungna rang lut joi.”
42019008	Zacchaeus na iding a Pumi dieng ruriei, “Enro, shara miring hai dieng kiei na kiniei khoi `khat pek rang kanih, Aw Pumi, khan lehawn a mi dieng koloi a tu, kiei na shem mili a thung rang kanih.”
42019009	Khan Jesu na ama dieng ruti, “Von nikho hin shandamna kha hi inshung hin jong joi. Ajarla ama hiawm Abraham shapa `khat inih.
42019010	Ajarla Miring Shapa kha miring athang atawk le ashan rang a ajong inih.”
42019011	Khan amani na irangai u le roroia, rangshim shik `khat hi ruriei pe. Ajarla ama na Jerusalem ivakranai pui le roroia, Pathien rengchangna kha malangrelen rangnih joi, tia amani na rumining uh.
42019012	Khajarkhan ama na ruriei, “Rimingniei miring `khat na ramlatak `khat ah ama rang rengchangna kha aloi she a vak kir rang a inih.
42019013	Khan ama na oshok shawm kha rukoi a mina shawm hi amani dieng rupek a ruti, ‘Kiei na kavakkir masheng, nangni na hihaihi le rievieiruthaw u roh.’
42019014	“Khania ram miring hai kha na ama kha rumukmak uh, khan amani na palai rutir ua hitihin chawng rumawchawi uh, ‘Mahi miringpa hi na kieini inopok u rang a hi kieini na dit u mi`ing.’
42019015	“Khan ama na rengchangna kha le vak kir phakhan, ama na shier irupek shok hai kha koina rang, chawng rupek joi. Makha tu nitjoiawm rievieithaw a irumupung kha jetna rang a inih.
42019016	“Khan akhat changna kha na ava a ruti, ‘Pumi, nang mina kha le mina shawm kurumupung joi.’
42019017	“Khan ama dieng ruti, ‘Mapak awm, Aw shok atha; nang hi ashin nieinak khan takashawn rang a rutuk nangnit jarkhan, nang na khopui shawm chung a cham aniei kha nangnih rangnih.’
42019018	“Khan adi changna kha na ava a ruti, ‘Pumi, nang mina kha le mina rahnga kurumupung joi.’
42019019	“Khan hipa dieng hinawm ruti, ‘Nang khopui rahnga chung a cham aniei kha nangnih rangnih.’
42019020	“Khan shik `khatpa kha na ava a ruti, ‘Pumi, nang mina hi enro, kiei na pon le kitumrep inih.
42019021	Ajarla kiei na nang kha kinichih. Ajarla nang hi mikhawk `khat nangnih, nang itetna boi khan nangloi, khan nangivawrna boi khan nangrawkhawm.’
42019022	“Khan ama dieng ruti, ‘Nang ner ah put ah kiei na nang chung a chawngshat rang kanih, Aw shok ashie nang. Kiei hi mikhawk, kitet boi kha kiloi, khan kivawr boi kha kiei na kirawkhawm, iti kha nangijet.
42019023	Khan kavakkir phakhan, makha athoi le kawrawkhawmna rang, ijar a kieshier kha niei`in ah nangitet boi maw nih?’
42019024	“Khan iedieng ah ading hai dieng khan ama na ruti, ‘Mina kha ama ah put ah loi u tana, mina shawm anieipa dieng khan peh u roh.’
42019025	(Khan ama dieng ruti uh, ‘Pumi, ama na mina shawm niei joi.’)
42019026	‘Kiei na nangni dieng kiriei inih, aniei mi rikip dieng arawpdet a pek rangnih, khan aniei boi ama dieng khan, inieidakshe kha, loi pe rangnih.
42019027	Khan kiei hi amani chung a reng iniminit jawt boi narahapui hai kha hin vak chawi u tana kamaikung hin that u roh.’ ”
42019028	Khan Jesu na hihaihi ruriei shole, ama`awm Jerusalem tieng rushe joi.
42019029	Khan hitihin ruawm, ama na Olivet iti Lawn ah awm Bethphage le Bethany vak shokdeng phakhan, akhaichawi hai pasha `di kha tir a ruti,
42019030	“Nangni na vararashan kho khawn she u roh. Makhawn lut u tana tute na ishutna boilai ranngam acha remet `khat ruthung a awm nangmuk u rangnih. Makha thut u tana vak chawi u roh.
42019031	Khan tukhat na ‘Ijar a nangithut u maw nih?’ tia nawrawdawn u joiatu, ‘Pumi na rangai,’ tia mashang u roh.”
42019032	Khan tir miring hai kha na rushe ua, amani dieng iruti dungjuia vak muk uh.
42019033	Khan amani na ruthut u phakhan, upum hai kha na amani dieng ruti uh, “Ijar a ranngam acha remet kha nangithut u maw nih?”
42019034	Amani na rumashang uh, “Ajarla Pumi na mahi rangai.”
42019035	Makha Jesu dieng ruchawi uh, khan ranngam acha remet chung khan pon rumukhu ua, ama chung khan Jesu kha rumushut u joi.
42019036	Khan ashe le roroia, opon u hai kha lamlien khan rupha uh.
42019037	Ama na Olive Lawn ah put ah lam chiengbai kha vak dep phakhan, khaichawi hawipui kha na imuk u chonrekhek kholok jarkhan, amani na he rashangtak a ningailam a Pathien kha rumapak uh.
42019038	Amani na ruti uh, “ ‘PUMI riming a ajong Rengpa kha rahvantha inih!’ Ravan a lungdamna le lurna kha rashangving nih rosho!”
42019039	Mipui kar a awm Pharisee eshen na ama dieng ruti uh, “Oja, nang khaichawi hai khaw rawkawk roh.”
42019040	Ama na mashang a ruti, “Kiei na nangni dieng kiriei inih, amani khaw a`awmchien u rang a nitjoiatu, lung hai khaw na hawng ra`ai u rangnih.”
42019041	Khan ama na khopui kha vak ranai pui a rumuk phakhan, ama chung a rie`ieklam a ruchap.
42019042	Ama na ruti, “Von nikho hin nangni na nang lungdamna u rang a kha nangjet uala, thadet rangnih! Inia nang mik uah put ah rethesho joi.
42019043	Nang narahapui hai na ramun kon a inahieichipna u le khan shie kholok a ine`epna u rang a pha kha jong rangnih joi.
42019044	Khan nangni kha nang nai hai le pieipak chung ah nawrawnawi u rangnih. Khan lung hai kha akhat chung ah akhat rotho `khatshe mah u naw nih, ajarla Pathien na inojongphakna u pha kha nangni na rujet u makche.”
42019045	Khashole ama na riethiengmun ah rulut a kha mun ah ajor le rawchawh hai kha anawt ruput joi.
42019046	Khan ama na ruti, “Hitihin rumiejiek, ‘Ki`in hi nikna in inih,’ inia nangni na mahi ‘minieisho hai koh’ nangmachang u joi.’ ”
42019047	Khan ama na riethiengmun khan ningthingkip mi ruruchuk a ruawm. Thiempu ulien hai, danoja hai, khan lamkai hai kha na ama kha thatna rang, lam rutawk u joi.
42019048	Inia amani na thawnathiei lam kha rumuh u mak, ajarla ama chawng rangai hai kholok na ama chawng kha mulungluttak a rurangai uh.
42020001	Khan hitihin ruawm, nikhat hin Jesu na riethiengmun ah miring hai kha ruruchuk a athachawng rushemlai khan, thiempu ulien hai le danoja hai na, shierulien hai le lawp `khat a, ama kha rurodoi pui uh.
42020002	Amani na riei a, ruti uh, “Ih cham nanginiei a hihaihi nangithaw maw nih? Ninawkle, hihaihi nangthawnathiei rang, tu na cham inurupek maw nih?”
42020003	Amani dieng mashang a ruti, “Kiei na`awm nangni dieng chawng `khat nawrawdawn u rawng, khan kiei dieng namashang u roh:
42020004	John na baptisma imoloi kha ravan ah put ah maw nih, ninawkle miring hai ah put ah ajong maw nih?”
42020005	Amani khatlekhat na rureshe ua ruti uh, “Kieini na ‘Ravan ah put ah keng,’ niti u joiala, ‘Ijar a ama kha takanangishawn boi u maw nih?’ niti rangnih.
42020006	Inia kieini na ‘Miring ah put ah keng,’ niti u joiala, mi kholok na kieini hi lung le nedeng u rangnih. Ajarla amani na John hi thiempulien `khat keng, iti hi takarushawn uh.”
42020007	Khajarkhan ama kha ih ah put ah ajong maw nih, iti kha jet u mi`ing, tia rumashang uh.
42020008	Khan Jesu na amani dieng ruti, “Kiei na`awm hihaihi ih cham le kithaw maw nih, iti kha nangni dieng nieriei u naw ning.”
42020009	Khan ama na amani dieng mahi rangshim hi ariei ruput joi: “Miring `khat na drakha rohon `khat hi rurohon a loithaw miring hai dieng rupek joi. Khan ama na pha shawttak rang khan khomijin rushe joi.
42020010	Khan pha hawng shok phakhan, drakha rohon ah put ah ara kha loina rang, oshok `khat hi loithaw hai dieng rutir joi. Inia loithaw hai kha na jemjem ua, khut rokpet a ama kha rumikir uh.
42020011	Khan ama na shok shik `khat rutirret. Makha`awm maimawk roitak a rujem u shole, khut rokpet a rumikir uh.
42020012	Khan takthar a athum changna kha rutir a makha`awm shebe rupek ua rupai uh.
42020013	“Makhan drakha rohon pumi kha na ruti, ‘Kiei na imaw thaw ning? Kunumpoktak kashapa hi kiei na tir rang kanih joi. Ama hi rumuk u phakhan, richit rupek u awm jawt.’
42020014	“Inia loithaw hai kha na ama kha rumuk u phakhan, khatlekhat na reshe a ruti uh, ‘Ama hi koklo kha inih. Inkoklo hi natah u changna rang, ama hi that u rang rawi.’
42020015	Khan drakha rohon ah put ah rupai ua ama kha ruthat u joi. Khanitala drakha rohon pumpa kha na amani kha imaw lawt nih?
42020016	Ama na she ning, tia loithaw hai kha vak mathang rangnih, khan drakha rohon kha shik miring hai dieng pek rangnih.” Amani na rurangai u phakhan ruti uh, “Makha nihet mak!”
42020017	Khan Jesu na amani kha en a ruti, “ ‘Inthaw hai na iruenda u lung kha kik ah runiei lung kha ruchang,’ tia irumiejiek kha imaw itina?
42020018	Makha lung chung a acho ama kha leklek a koi rangnih. Tunita`awm ichona miring kha rawnawi ning, tia vaiphin rachangmashak rangnih.”
42020019	Khalaitak khan danoja hai le thiempu ulien hai na ama chung a khut rujawn jawt uh. Ajarla rangshim kha amani ikapna a iruriei keng, iti kha amani na rujet uh.
42020020	Khajarkhan ama chawngriei ah put ah shurna rang, ranakniei dieng le chamniei rampo dieng pekna rang, amani na ama kha ruva uh. Khan midik rasha a mitinta hai kha rutir uh.
42020021	Khan amani na rawdawn a ruti uh, “Oja, thaning a nangriei khan nang ruchuk, iti kieini na kejet uh, khan nang na enshietenlar thaw makche, inia Pathien lam kha adik a mi nangruchuk.
42020022	Caesar dieng khaichana pek hi Dan maw nih, ninawkle dan nih boi maw nih?”
42020023	Khan Jesu na amani hongthaw kha rujet pe a amani dieng ruti, “Ijar a kiei hi ennanginerete u maw nih?
42020024	Dinari kha kiei dieng numumuk u roh. Mahi na tu rilim le tu khetmiejiek maw ieniei?” Khan amani na rumashang uh, “Caesar.”
42020025	Khan amani dieng ruti, “Khanitatu Caesar tah hai kha Caesar dieng peh u roh, khan Pathien tah kha Pathien dieng peh u roh.”
42020026	Khan vanoi maikung khan ama chawngriei a rumocho ngam u mak. Kha ruhut a ama chawng mashang khan shindawngna runiei ua ruawmchien u joi.
42020027	Khan thoiretna awm mak ati Sadducee eshen na ama kha vak jawng uh, khan rurawdawn uh.
42020028	Amani na ruti uh, “Oja, Moses na kieini dieng rumiejiek, makhala ulienpa `khat na nai niei boi a thi joiatu, ulienpa chi mothoina rang, ulienpa inkonu kha anaipangpa na iloi rang a shok.
42020029	Poro shiri ruawm uh. Akhat changna kha na inruniei a nainiei boi a ruthi joi.
42020030	Khan adi changna kha na nupangnu kha runiei a nai niei boi a ruthi joi.
42020031	Khashole athum changna kha na ama kha ruloi. Kha le ra`angre a poro shiri hai kha nai niei boi a ruthi u joi.
42020032	Dawngkhit a nupangnu kha`awm ruthi joi.
42020033	Thoiretna khan nupangnu kha tu inkonu maw chang nih? Ajarla ama kha poro shiri kha na iruniei u inih.”
42020034	Jesu na amani dieng ruti, “Inniei iti hi mahi rong hai rang a inih.
42020035	Inia ajong rang a rong hin tu, kha nih naw nih. Ajarla athi ah put ah thoiretna rang a rutuk amani rang tu innieina, iti awmlai naw nih.
42020036	Amani na thit, iti niei u lai naw nih, ajarla amani kha ravantir hai kha le ra`ang u rangnih. Thoiretna nai hai kha chang u jarkhan, Pathien nai hai kha nih u joi.
42020037	Athi ah put ah hawng thoina jar hin Mosesshe na`awm rampabuk chungchanga irumiejiekna khan ruriei joi. Kha pha khan ama na Pumi kha ‘Abraham Pathien, Isaac Pathien khan Jacob Pathien,’ tia rukoi.
42020038	Khan ama hi athi miring hai Pathien nimak a aring miring hai Pathien kha inih. Ajarla mi kholok na ama dieng khan ring a awm inih.”
42020039	Khan danoja eshen na mashang a ruti uh, “Oja, thatak a nangriei joi.”
42020040	Khashole tute na ama dieng chawng rurawdawn ngam u lai mak.
42020041	Khan amani dieng ruti, “Itia Christa hi David Shapa keng iti u maw nih?
42020042	Ajarla Lah khan David amatak na ‘PUMI na kupumi dieng ieriei,
42020043	“Nang rahapui hai kha nang kekhawng kamachang malalim, kukhut chang tieng hin shuh roh.” ’
42020044	Khajarkhan David na ama kha ‘Pumi’ iti. Iti dan a ama kha ashapa achang maw nih?”
42020045	Miring hai kholok ijet a ama na akhaichawi hai dieng ruti,
42020046	“Ponrosho rieshiei alawn jawt, khan rievieithawna mun ah mi na richit ipek adit, khan synagogue hai khan shutna runieiving kha aloh jawt, khan bumichinna hai khan mi matonkhit ah shutna rang, adit danoja hai kha riring pui u roh.
42020047	Amani na mieirawng hai nieilelung kha ikhawreng pe u inih, khan amalang rangbak khan nikna mieshiei uh. Amani na chawngshatna aliendet kha rawtawng pui u rangnih.”
42021001	Khashole Jesu na khongrunga a rawchawng miring hai na nieibawmna khan amani khutchawi hai iruthong u kha rumuk.
42021002	Khan mieirawng shara `khat na lepton `di iruthong kha`awm ama na rumuk.
42021003	Khan ama na ruti, “Kiei na nangni dieng diktak a kiriei inih, mahi mieirawng shara hi na amani kholoknek a arawpdet ithong inih.
42021004	Hihai miring hai hi na amani ruphu ah put ah Pathien dieng ipek u inih, inia mahi nupangnu hi na aravatna kar a iniei kholok le iringna rang a kha ipek inih.”
42021005	Khan riethiengmun kha idawr a metha lung hai kha le khan khutchawi hai kha le irielien maw nih, tia mi eshen na ruriei u phakhan, ama na ruti,
42021006	“Nangimuk u hihai nieinak hai rang hin nikho jong rangnih, makha pha khan akhat chung ah akhat rotho achim boi a imak lung `khatshe awm naw nih.”
42021007	Khan amani na rawdawn a ruti uh, “Oja, khanitala hihaihi itik a maw shok nih? Khan hihaihi shok rangnih, iti jetna kha imaw nih nih?
42021008	Khan ama na ruti, “Nangni kha nomohonna boi u rang, riring u roh. Ajarla ‘Ama kha kiei kanih,’ khan ‘Apha kha jong nai joi,’ tia kiriming a mi tampui va u rangnih.’ Khajarkhan amani anu kha jui u naw roh.
42021009	Khan nangni na ra le ramuruk nangjet u phakhan, rawthawk u naw roh. Ajarla hihaihi akhat changna a ashokngir rang a inih, inia dawng kha tu nirelen naw nih.”
42021010	Khashole amani dieng ruriei, “Phung `khat na phung `khat chung a ra thaw rangnih, rengchangna `khat na rengchangna `khat chung a ra thaw rangnih.
42021011	Munmun ah nieinu arat shok rangnih, nekleshak hawng tang rangnih, khan railawn hawng rawjawh rangnih, ravan ah put ah chichairoi chon hai le jetna hai kha jong shok rangnih.
42021012	Inia hihai kholok shok mala khan nangni kha khut numuchutna u rangnih, khan epshawna nepek u rangnih. Synagogue hai dieng nepek u ning, tia lungroko shung ah nothong u rangnih. Nangni kha kiriming jarbak khan reng hai le rampo hai maikung a nawchawi u rangnih.
42021013	Makha nang kungchangna u `khat chang rangnih.
42021014	Khajarkhan nangimashang u rang a kha rashamjerna boi rang, nang mulung miding u roh.
42021015	Ajarla nere`erpui hai kha na inorodoina pui ngam boi, ninawkle inamakha ngamna boi rang a ner le varna kha nepek u rang kanih.
42021016	Khan nangni kha nang nulepa hai, nang uliennai hai, nang inshungkhur, khan nang lawm haishe na nangni kha nomohon u rangnih. Nangni eshen tu nathat u rangnih.
42021017	Khan kiriming jar a mi kholok na naraha pui u rangnih.
42021018	Khania nang lu uah shampum `khatshe thang naw nih.
42021019	Nang doiratna u khan nang ringphuk u hai kha nangman u rangnih.
42021020	“Inia Jerusalem kha ramiring hai na iroko u kha nangmuk u phakhan, mahi thangna rang a kha jong nai joi, iti kha jet u roh.
42021021	Khashole Judea ah awm miring hai na lawn hai khawn tan u rosho, khan makha khopui shung ah awm hai kha na makha mathan u rosho. Khan khopui vai ah ruawm amani kha na makha khopui shung khan hawng lut u naw rosho.
42021022	Ajarla irumiejiek kholok kha hawng rupumna rang, hihaihi ruhutthungna nikho hai kha inih.
42021023	Makha pha khan naivawng nupang hai le nairunu peh hai rang idawr a khawk rang a maw nih naw! Ajarla rieliei chung a mulung koina alien le lunghangna hai hi miring hai chung a awm rangnih joi.
42021024	Amani kha chemjam mawr khan cho u rangnih, khan phung rikip dieng shurmi chang u rangnih. Khan Phungshik hai pha kha hawng rupum masheng, Phungshik hai na Jerusalem kha terchawp a thaw u rangnih.
42021025	“Ni, tha, khan arshi hai dieng jetna awm rangnih, khan rieliei chung a awm phung hai dieng phairavaina hawng awm rangnih, khan thampui le tuirawnawng miri khan mulung rakakna kha hawng awm rangnih.
42021026	Khan manmieshie chung a chichairoi a rahvan shietna ajong rang a hai jar hin miring tampui hai lungar kha chekrachai rangnih, ajarla ravan ranak hai kha rawnawk rangnih joi.
42021027	Khan Miring Shapa kha ranak le lurna alientak `khat le romiei chung ah ajong kha amani na muk u rangnih.
42021028	Khan hihaihi ashok put phakhan, nang ring rakang u tana en u roh. Ajarla nang rekhekna u rang a kha jong nai joi.”
42021029	Khan amani dieng rangshim `khat ruriei pe uh: “Thieichangkung le thingkung hai kholok kha en u roh.
42021030	Amani na dawn hawng mawchawr u phakhan, kholum kha hawng nai joi, iti kha en u tana nang nining ua jet u roh.
42021031	Khan nangniawm hihai ashok hi nangmuk u phakhan, Pathien rengchangna kha jong nai joi, iti kha jet u roh.
42021032	“Diktak a nangni dieng kiriei inih, hihaihi hawng rupum masheng, hi rong hi shukhek a hek naw nih.
42021033	Ravan le rieliei hi hek rangnih, inia kawchawng hai hi tu shukthang a thang naw nih.
42021034	“Nangni riring u roh. Khanawkatu rekhe a aneh, jukhawp khan ringkho ditrekhena kha le nang mulung u hai kha pokrik chang rangnih. Khan makha Nikho khan ring boipet a nangni dieng jong rangnih.
42021035	Ajarla makha, lim ang a, rieliei chung a awm miring kholok dieng jong rangnih.
42021036	Riring jawnjai u roh. Ashok rang a kholok chon hai ah put ah nang rekhena u rang le Miring Shapa maton a nangdingna u rang, nikna niei u roh.”
42021037	Khan Jesu na nishun a riethiengmun khan miruruchuk a awm, khan jan a Olivet iti Lawn khan janpha meshena rang, ruhawng.
42021038	Khan mi kholok na riethiengmun khan ama chawngriei rangai rang, jingkara ama dieng rushe uh.
42022001	Khan Rakanna iti Chawjawboi Rohoi kha hawng nai joi.
42022002	Thiempu ulien hai le danoja hai na Jesu kha thatna rang, muruk a lam rutawk u joi, ajarla amani na miring hai kha ruchih uh.
42022003	Khashole Iscariot iti Judas shung khan Satan hawng lut joi. Ama kha shawmlieidi kar a akhat runih.
42022004	Ama na rushe a thiempu ulien hai le riethiengmun shipai hai le itia maw amani dieng Jesu kha jornathiei rang, tia chawngruriei pui joi.
42022005	Khan amani kha ningrungai pe uh, khan ama dieng shier pek rang, rujawt u joi.
42022006	Khan ama na rujawt a mipui boriethiei jorna rang, chanthatna rutawk joi.
42022007	Rakanna kengam thatna rang a Chawjawboi Tan Nikho kha hawng shok joi.
42022008	Khan Jesu na Peter le John kha rutir a ruti, “Rakanna kha nashakna u rang, she u tana vak rasham u roh.”
42022009	Khan amani na ruti uh, “Mahi rang hi khoshekawt ah maw nangnarashammashak jawt uh?”
42022010	Khan amani dieng ruti, “Enro, nangni na khopui shung khawn nanglut u phakhan, tuibe ruput miring `khat nangmuk u rangnih. Ama lutna in khan jui u roh.
42022011	Khan in pumpa dieng ti u roh, ‘Ojapa na nang dieng iti, “Kakhaichawi hai le Rakanna kishakna u rang a indan kha khoshekawt ah maw nih?” ’
42022012	Khan rielienjiek chungindan alien `khat numumuk u rangnih, kha mun khan rasham u roh.”
42022013	Khan amani na rushe ua ama na iruriei kha ang a, vak rawtawng pui uh, khan amani na Rakanna kha rurasham u joi.
42022014	Apha kha hawng shok phakhan, ama na tirtawn shawmlieidi kha le tebol khan rushuh joi.
42022015	Khan amani dieng ruti, “Kiei na shawna kodoi mala hin mahi Rakanna hi nangni le kashak jawtngir.
42022016	Nangni dieng kiriei inih, ajarla Pathien rengchangna khan rupum masheng, mahi kiei na shalai naw ning.”
42022017	Khan hai kha ruloi a mapakna runiei, khan ruti, “Nangni na mahi loi u tana shem u roh.
42022018	Ajarla nangni dieng kieriei inih, tun ah put ah kiei na drakha tui hi Pathien rengchangna kha jong masheng, nelai naw ning.”
42022019	Khashole ama na tan kha ruloi a Pathien kha rumapak, khan rukhoi. Khan amani dieng rupek a ruti, “Mahi nangni dieng a peksha kupum kha inih. Kiei hi mininghepna rang, mahi thaw u roh.”
42022020	Kha le ra`ang a, amani na rushak u shole, hai kha ruloi a ruti, “Mahi hai hi nangni rang a along kithishen jar a rawjawtna `thar kha inih.
42022021	Inia enro, kiei najorpa khut kha tebol chung ah kiei le awm joi.
42022022	Ajarla Miring Shapa kha irumuchuksha dungjuia ashe rang a inih, inia ama ajorpa rang khan idawr a khawk maw nih naw!”
42022023	Khan hihai athaw rang a pa hi tumaw nih, tia khatlekhat dieng rurawdawn uh.
42022024	Khan amani kar a alienving, tia imining u kha tumaw nih, iti chungchanga chawngrieshietna `khatawm rumothoi uh.
42022025	Khajarkhan amani dieng ruti, “Phungshik hai reng hai na amani kha adek a pumi chang, khan amani chung a pumi chang hai kha chon atha thaw hai kha iti uh.
42022026	Khania nangni tu kha nih u makche. Kha ruhut a nang kar ua alienving ama kha nang kar ua naipangving `khat a awm rosho, khan lamkai ama kha na shepding kha a ang rang a shok.
42022027	Ajarla tebol ah bunepa le shepding kar khan tumaw aliendet? Tebol ah bunepa kha nimak maw? Inia kiei tu nang kar ua shepding `khat a ka`awm.
42022028	Khania kiei na enretena a ka`awmlai khan kiedieng a rephet boi a nangawm uh.
42022029	Khan kapa na kiei dieng rengchangna `khat kha inurupek kha ang a, kiei na nangni dieng kinepek u inih.
42022030	Makha nangni na kerengchangna a awm tebol khan nangnek nangshakna u rang le nangni na rengmun a shuh a Israel phung shawmlieidi kha chawngnangshatna pe u rang a inih.”
42022031	Khan Pumi na ruti, “Simon, Simon! Satan na nangni kha gehu ang a mashap rang nadit u joi.
42022032	Inia nang takashawn kha rehena boi rang, nikna kieniei joi. Khan kiei dieng nangvakkir phakhan, nang uliennai hai kha ranak peh roh.”
42022033	Khan Simon na ama dieng ruti, “Pumi, lungroko shung ah le thitna rangshe khan kiei rasham kanih.”
42022034	Khania Jesu na rumashang, “Peter, kiei na nang dieng kiriei inih, nanginejet hi voithum nangraphat pui masheng, von nikho hin arkhawng na khong naw nih.”
42022035	Khan amani dieng ruriei, “Kiei na nangni kha shierkawk boi a, pai boi a, khan kekawk boi a kunurutir u lai khan, nangravatna u imaw awm?” Amani na rumashang uh, “Ravatna `khatshe runiei u mi`ing.”
42022036	Ama na amani dieng ruti, “Inia tuntu shierkawk le pai kha rawshawng pui u rang roh. Khan chemjam aniei boi ama kha na ponledier kha jor rieshie akhat rawchawh rosho.
42022037	Ajarla nangni dieng a kiriei hi inih, irumiejiek kha kuchung a rupumngir rang a inih: ‘Ama kha danishawnboi miring hai kha le techen nih joi.’ Ajarla kuchungchanga irumiejiek kha rupum joi.”
42022038	Khan amani na ruti uh, “Pumi, enro, hin chemjam `di awm.” Khan amani dieng ruti, “Makha hun joi.”
42022039	Ama na vak shok a eshena dungjuia Olive Lawn ah ruhawng, khan akhaichawi hai na`awm ama kha rujui uh.
42022040	Ama na kha mun kha rushok phakhan, amani dieng ruti, “Lemna khan nanglutna boi u rang, nikna niei u roh.”
42022041	Khan ama na lung `khat vawrna dawr hi rurakai a rukhuk shun a runik.
42022042	Ama na ruti, “Aw kapa, nang ningmuruk kha nitjoiatu, hai hi kiei ah put ah noloi pe roh, khanikengta kumulungmining kha nimak a nang mulungmining kha nih rosho.”
42022043	Khan ravantir na ama dieng rular a ama kha ranak rupek.
42022044	Khan ama na enchak a nikna runiei. Khan ama shawna kha lienhai a ahu kha thishen na pieipak ah lawmlawm a acho kha ruang pe.
42022045	Ama na inikna ah put ah hawng thoi a akhaichawi hai dieng rushe phakhan, mulungshaw a aja a ruawm u kha vak muk.
42022046	Khan amani dieng ruti, “Iloia ja maw nangnih uh? Lemna khan nangchona boi u rang, thoi u tana nikna niei u roh.”
42022047	Ama na chawng riei a ruawmlai khan, jetboithieiboi a mipui kha va joi. Khan khaichawi shawmlieidi kar a Judas iti ama kha na lamvakkai pe a Jesu kha iebieng a tumna rang, ama kha rujawng joi.
42022048	Inia Jesu na ama dieng ruti, “Judas, Miring Shapa kha bieng tum pe a nangijor rang a maw nih?”
42022049	Khan Jesu dieng ah awm hai kha na, ashok rang a kha muk u phakhan, ruti uh, “Pumi, amani khaw chem le maw tuk u rang ning?”
42022050	Khashole amani hai kar a akhat na thiempu rashang shok `khat rutuk a, achang tieng ah nokor kha rutan pe joi.
42022051	Khan Jesu na mashang a ruti, “Khashe kha nih rang rosho.” Khan onokor kha rushit pe a rumadam pe joi.
42022052	Khashole Jesu na ama dieng ava thiempu ulien hai le riethiengmun shipai hai, khan ama dieng ava lamkai hai dieng ruti, “Kiei hi minieisho miring `khat ang a ashur rang chemjam le mawbawng rak a ava maw nangnih uh?
42022053	Kiei na riethiengmun ah nangni le ningthingkip ka`awm, inia nang khut nurujawnna u makche. Inia mahi nangni rang a pha kha nih joi, khan mahi cham ajing kha inih.”
42022054	Khan ama kha rushur u phakhan, amani na rushe pui ua, thiempu rashang in khan ruchawi u joi. Khan Peter na ralaviei a anu rujui.
42022055	Amani na tolawng khan miei muchuk ua lawp `khat a rushuh u phakhan, Peter na amani kar khan rushuh.
42022056	Khan shok nungak `khat na Peter kha miei iru`u a awm kha rumuk phakhan, ruenrep a ama dieng ruti, “Mahi miringpa hiawm Jesu le rawtawp `khat inih.”
42022057	Inia ama chung a rapha a ruti, “Nupang, kiei na ama hi jet mi`ing.”
42022058	Khan awmbawt `le shik `khat miring na ama kha rumuk a ruti, “Nangawm amani hai kar a akhat nangnih.” Inia Peter na ruti, “Miringpa, kiei nimi`ing.”
42022059	Khan nidan `khat dawr hi rakar le miring `khat hi na eplam a ruti, “Diktak a mahi miringpa hiawm ama le rawtawp miring `khat inih, ajarla ama hi Galilee miring `khat inih.”
42022060	Inia Peter na ruti, “Miringpa, nangiriei kha imaw nih, iti kiei jet mi`ing.” Ama na chawng ruriei a awmlaitak khan, arkhawng na hawng khawng joi.
42022061	Makhan Pumi na vak hiei a Peter dieng ruen. Khan Jesu na ama dieng a iruriei chawng kha Peter na hawng mininghep, makhala “Arkhong na khong mala, kuchung a voithum nangrapha rangnih.”
42022062	Khan Peter na vai rushok a rie`ieklam a ruchap joi.
42022063	Khan Jesu apana miring hai kha na ama kha engshiet a ajem ruput u joi.
42022064	Amani na imik rushing pe uh, khan amai ah ruben ua chawng rurawdawn uh, “Nang anaben hi tumaw nih? Rophong roh!”
42022065	Khan ama chung a mieshietna chawng tampui ruriei uh.
42022066	Khan kho hawng varphit `le, miring lamkai hai, thiempu ulien hai khan danoja hai kha na amani Sanhedrin khan Jesu kha ruchawi u joi. Amani na ruti uh,
42022067	“Nang Christa kha nangnih a tu, nieriei u roh.” Khan amani dieng ruti, “Kiei na kieriei a awm nangni na takashawn u naw tinih.
42022068	Khan kiei na chawng kawnawrawdawn u joiatu, nangni na namashang u naw tinih, khan nomoshok u naw tinih.
42022069	Inia von ah put ah Miring Shapa na ranakniei Pathien chang tieng shuh rangnih joi.”
42022070	Khan kholok na rurawdawn uh, “Khanitala nang Pathien Shapa kha maw nangnih?” Khan ama na ruti, “Kiei kanih, iti kha nangnitak na nangti u joi.”
42022071	Khan amani na ruti uh, “Kungchangna dawnshe tawkna rang irangai maw nilai? Ajarla kieinitak na ama ner a narangai u joi.”
42023001	Mipui kha na ruthoi ua Jesu kha Pilate dieng ruchawi u joi.
42023002	Khan amani na ama kha mieshiet ruput ua ruti uh, “Mahi miringpa hi na nuphung u hi pawrmechet joi. Nining a Christa le Reng kha kanih, tia Caesar dieng a pek rang a khaichana kha irumakha inih.”
42023003	Khan Pilate na ama kha rawdawn a ruti, “Nang Jihudi hai Reng kha maw nangnih?” Khan ama na rumashang, “Nangiti kha inih.”
42023004	Khan Pilate na thiempu ulien hai le mipui dieng ruti, “Mahi miring dieng hin kiei na shietna muk pe mi`ing.”
42023005	Inia amani na eplam a ruti uh, “Ama na Judea kholok, khan Galilee ah put ah hi munshe hin miruchuh a mimuchun joi.”
42023006	Galilee iban u kha Pilate na rujet phakhan, miring kha Galilee miring maw nih, tia rurawdawn.
42023007	Khan ama na Herod ramroko shung a awm keng, iti kha rujet phakhan, Herod dieng rutir joi. Khalaikhan Herod kha Jerusalem ah ruawm.
42023008	Herod na Jesu kha rumuk phakhan, ajeng a ningrungai pe. Ajarla ama na Jesu kha phashawttak khan irumuk jawt inih. Ajarla ama na Jesu chungchanga chawng tampui rujet. Khan ama na jetna dikhat ithaw rang a kha rumuk jawt.
42023009	Khan ama na Jesu kha chawng tampui rurawdawn, inia `khatshe rumashang mak.
42023010	Ading thiempu ulien hai le danoja hai kha na ranaktak a rumieshiet uh.
42023011	Khan Herod na ama ramiring hai kha le jak rupek, khan engshiet a ruthaw. Khan pon cheklak rurieshieimashak a Pilate dieng rumikir joi.
42023012	Kha nikhotak khan Herod le Pilate kha lawmpa chang u joi, ajarla matienglai tu khatlekhat raha miring runih uh.
42023013	Khan Pilate na thiempu ulien hai, lamkai hai, khan miring hai kha rukoi a,
42023014	amani dieng ruti, “Hi miring hi, miring lamrehemashak `khat a nangni na kiei dieng nangivakchawi u inih. Khan enro, nang maikung ua kiei na ama hi enkereteviek a, mahi miring chung a nangimieshiet u khan rehena `khatshe muk pe mi`ing.
42023015	Herod na`awm rumuk pe mak. Khan enro, ama na thitna rang a rutuk shietna kha ih ruthaw mak.
42023016	Khajarkhan kiei na ama hi shawna pek a moshok rang kanih joi”
42023017	(Ajarla ama na rohoi hin miring `khat irumoshokngai inih).
42023018	Inia mipui kholok na lawp a ra`ai a ruti uh, “Mahi miring hi that tana kieini rang Barabbas kha moshok roh.”
42023019	Amapa kha khopui shung ah ramothoi a mithat jar a lungroko shung ah irukhum inih.
42023020	Inia Pilate na Jesu kha moshok jawt jarkhan, amani dieng chawng rurieiret.
42023021	Inia amani na ra`ai a ruti uh, “Ama kha cross ah that roh, ama kha cross ah that roh!”
42023022	Inia voithum changna khan amani dieng ruti, “Ijar a maw, mahi miring hi na ashie ih maw thaw joi? Kiei na ama chung a thitnathiei rang a jar muk pe mi`ing, khajarkhan kiei na ama hi shawna pek a moshok rang kanih joi.”
42023023	Inia amani na he rashangtak a ama kha cross ah thatna rang, shairuep uh. Khan amani le thiempu ulien hai he kha na derumukhu joi.
42023024	Khajarkhan Pilate na amani nikna kha chon a meshena rang, mulung rumiding joi.
42023025	Khan ama na ra mothoi jar a le mithat jar a lungroko shung ah thong ama kha rumoshok a Jesu kha amani idit dungjuia rupek joi.
42023026	Khan amani na iruchawi u le roroia, Simon iti Cyrene miring `khat, khote ah put ah hawng kirna hin, cross kha rangrat a rumuphung ua, Jesu anuk a rumawlawn uh.
42023027	Khan mipui hawi `khat na ama anuk a rujui uh, khan amani kar a nupang hai na mulungkur a ama kha ruchap pui uh.
42023028	Inia Jesu na amani dieng hiei a ruti, “Jerusalem shanu hai, kuchung a chap u naw roh, nang chung ua le nang nai hai chung a chap u roh.
42023029	Ajarla en u roh, ‘Nairong miring hai, naimoshon boi naikawk hai, khan nairunu peh boi runu hai kha rahvanmuh hai kha inih!’ itina u rang a nikho hai kha jong rangnih.
42023030	Khashole ‘mo hai dieng “Kuchung uah jongcho roh!” khan lawn hai dieng “Kieini hi nojong mukhu u roh!” ’ ti u rangnih.
42023031	Ajarla thingkung kha ringlai khan hihaihi amani na thaw u joiala, makha char phakhan imaw shok nih?”
42023032	Khan mithat miring pasha `diawm, ama le that rang, ruchawi uh.
42023033	Khan amani na Calvary iti mun kha rushok u phakhan, ama kha cross ah rumakhai u joi. Khan mithat miring hai kha`awm akhat kha chang tieng, khan shik `khat kha viei tieng rumakhai u joi.
42023034	Khan Jesu na ruti, “Kapa, amani dieng hin rangaidam peh roh, ajarla amani na ithaw u hi ijet boi u inih.” Khan ama ponledier hai kha shemna rang, vanmuk ruen uh.
42023035	Khan miring hai kha na ding a ruen uh. Khan rampo hai kha na engchawng a ruti uh, “Ama na shik miring hai kha rushan, miringpa hi Pathien na imadan Christa kha nitjoiatu, nining a rashan rosho.”
42023036	Khan ramiring hai kha na`awm vak jawng ua engshiet a rubiek uh, khan ama kha ju athur kha rumenek uh.
42023037	Khan amani na ruti uh, “Nang Jihudi hai Reng kha nangnih a tu, nang nining a rashan roh.”
42023038	Khan ama chung khan Greek, Latin khan Hebrew chawng a khetmiejiek `khatawm rumiejiek: MAHI JIHUDI HAI RENG KHA INIH.
42023039	Makhan ah akhai mithat hai kar a akhat na ama kha mieshiet a ruti, “Nang Christa kha nangnih a tu, nang nining a rashan roh, khan kieini hiawm nashan u roh.”
42023040	Shik `khat kha na mashang a rawkawklam a ruti, “Chawngshatna khatte a nangawm hin Pathien kha chih makche maw?
42023041	Ajarla kieini na niruthaw u kha le rutukthep a chawngshatna kha nimuk u inih, inia mahi miring hi na rehena ih ruthaw mak.”
42023042	Khan ama na Jesu dieng ruti, “Aw Pumi, nang rengchangna a nanghawng phakhan, kiei hi nimininghep roh.”
42023043	Khan Jesu na ama dieng ruti, “Diktak a nang dieng kiriei inih, von nikho hin paradise khan kiei le nangawm rangnih.”
42023044	Khan nidan shawmlieidi ah put ah nidan `thum dawrshe hin ajing kha na rieliei kholok jong mukhu joi.
42023045	Khan ni kha na jing phakhan, riethiengmun maikharpon kha alaitak a jong rether joi.
42023046	Khashole Jesu na he rashangtak a ra`ai a ruti, “Kapa, ‘nang khut chung a karatha hi kenepek joi.’ ” Khan mahi ruti shole, arang ruchat joi.
42023047	Khan rarajakhat lamkai kha na ashok chon hai kha rumuk `le, Pathien kha mapak a ruti, “Diktak a mahi miring hi midik `khat inih.”
42023048	Khan aen rang a vak ruchun mipui kha na ashok chon hai kha rumuk u phakhan, mulung teilam a rukir uh.
42023049	Khan ama le rejet hai, khan Galilee ah put ah ivakrawtawp pui nupang hai kha na ralaviei a ding a hihaihi ruen uh.
42023050	Khan Joseph iti lamkai miring `khat ruawm. Ama kha mitha le midik `khat runih.
42023051	Ama na amani chonrashak le chonmeshe khan rujawt mak. Ama kha Jihudi hai kho Arimathea ah put ah inih. Ama na Pathien rengchangna kha ngak a ruawm inih.
42023052	Mahi miringpa hi na Pilate dieng rushe a, Jesu rok kha vak nik.
42023053	Khan ama na cross ah put ah jong muchum a ponramasha le rujo joi. Khan tute na ijana boilai lung chung ah iver than khan vak maja joi.
42023054	Makha nikho kha Rashamna Nikho kha runih, khan Sabbath nikho kha putdeng nih joi.
42023055	Khan Galilee ah put ah ivat puishom a ama anu ivakjui nupang hai kha na thanmun ah ama rok itet dan kha vak muk uh.
42023056	Khan amani na vak kir ua, rieipartui manamhoi kha vak rasham uh. Khan chawngpek dungjuia amani na Sabbath nikho khan shawrumuchum u joi.
42024001	Khan hapta shung a akhat changna nikho jingkara hin, amani na irasham u rieipartui hai kha ruchawi ua, thanmun khan rushe uh.
42024002	Amani na lung kha than ah put ah rurechen kha vak muk uh.
42024003	Amani na rulut u phakhan, Pumi Jesu rok kha vak muh u lai mak.
42024004	Amani na hi chungchang hin shindawngna runiei u lai khan, enro, miring pasha `di na poncheklak rieshiei a amani dieng khan ruding uh.
42024005	Nupang hai kha rurawthawk ua, pieipak tieng rubu uh, khan ravantir `di kha na amani dieng ruti, “Ijar a nangni na aring miring kha athi miring hai kar a nangitawk u maw nih?
42024006	Ama kha hin awmlai mak, inia ruthoi joi! Ama na Galilee ah awmlai a nangni dieng iruriei kha mininghep u roh.
42024007	Jesu na ruti, ‘Miring Shapa kha munu miring hai dieng pekngir a cross ah that rang a inih. Khan ni `thum changna khan hawng thoiret rangnih.’ ”
42024008	Khan amani na ama iruriei hai kha rumininghep uh.
42024009	Khan amani na than ah put ah rukir ua, khaichawi shawmlieikhat dieng le lawpsheng u dieng thang vak koi u joi.
42024010	Tirtawn hai dieng chawng vak riei hai kha Mary Magdalene le Joanna, James unu Mary, khan amani le rawtawp hai kholok kha runih uh.
42024011	Inia tirtawn hai maikung khan hihai chawng hi chawngtawt ruang pe uh, khan amani kha takarushawn u mak.
42024012	Inia Peter na ruthoi a thanmun tieng khan rutan. Khan butlam a ruen a ponramasha ranga kha shikjek a vak muk. Khashole ashok chon chungchang khan ishindawng le roroia rukir joi.
42024013	Khan enro, kha nikhotak khan miring pasha `di na Emmaus iti kho `khat ah khomijin rushe uh. Makha Jerusalem ah put ah majin shiri dawr runih.
42024014	Amani na ashok chon hihai kholok chungchanga rieilam a rulawn uh.
