42024015	Amani na roiruriei u lai khan, Jesu amatak na amani kha vak ranai pui a amani le rusheshom joi.
42024016	Inia ama kha tumaw nih, iti kha amani dieng rumejet maklai.
42024017	Khan amani dieng ruti, “Nanglawnlam ua ih chawng maw nangiriei uh?” Amani na mulungshaw maisho kha le ruding uh.
42024018	Khan Cleopas iti akhat na mashang a ama dieng ruti, “Hirachang a Jerusalem ah ashok chon hai hi ajet boi milak hi nang ranga maw nangnih?”
42024019	Khan ama na ruti, “Ih chon maw ashok?” Khan amani na ruti uh, “Pathien maikung a le miring kholok maikung a chon a le chawng a ranak aniei Thiempulien `khat, Nazareth Jesu,
42024020	thiempu ulien hai le karampo hai na ama kha iruheng ua thitna rang, irupekna u le cross ah ama kha iruthatna u awmchan jar a inih.
42024021	Inia kieini rang la ama kha Israel akhek rang a kangakmining u `khat kha runih. Inia hihai kholok hi khea ashok chon hi von a hi le ni `thum changna nih joi.
42024022	Khatekha niboia, nupang eshen na`awm kieini hi shindawngna nurupek uh. Amani na jingkara hin thanmun khan rushe uh.
42024023	Khan amani na ama rok kha muk boi u phakhan, ama kha ring joi, tia amani dieng a ariei ravantir hai kha mulungmik a kumuk u, tia vak riei uh.
42024024	Kieini le awm eshen na`awm thanmun ah rushe u phakhan, nupang hai iriei kha ang a vak muk uh, inia ama kha vak muh u mak.”
42024025	Khan ama na amani dieng ruti, “Aw mimawng hai, thiempulien hai na iruriei hai kha takashawn rang khan ajeng a nangmatatmashak uh!
42024026	Christa na hihai kholok shawna hi idoi a lurna shung khan alut rang a kha irangai boi maw nih?”
42024027	Khan Moses ah put ah Thiempulien hai kholokshe khan, amatak chungchang khan Miejiek rikip ah irumeler inih.
42024028	Amani na tungna u rang a kho kha vak ranai pui u phakhan, ama na ala shok rang a rasha a amani kha rukhe joi.
42024029	Makhan amani na ama kha khap a ruti uh, “Kieini le awm rang roh, ajarla khohawngromo joi, khan nikho hi mawtawrdeng joi.” Khajarkhan ama na kho khan rulut a amani le rurangah joi.
42024030	Khan ama na tebol ah rushuh phakhan, tan kha ruloi a rahvan rupek. Khan ama na rukhoi shole, amani dieng rupek.
42024031	Makhan amani mik hai kha mavar pe a amani na ama kha merujet u joi, khan amani mik`en ah put ah ruthangkhap joi.
42024032	Amani na khatlekhat dieng ruti uh, “Ama na lam ah chawngrurieilai, khan Miejiek rumelerlai khan, numulung u athoi boi maw nih?”
42024033	Amani na kha phatak khan thoi ua, Jerusalem tieng vak kir u joi. Khan khaichawi shawmlieikhat, khan amani le awm hai kha mun `khat ah ruruchun u kha amani na vak muk uh.
42024034	Amani na ruti uh, “Diktak a Pumi kha thoi joi, khan Simon dieng rular joi!”
42024035	Khan amani na lam a ashok chon le ama na tan irukhoi a ihawngjetna u awmchan kha amani dieng ruriei uh.
42024036	Amani na hihaihi ruriei u lai khan, Jesu na amani kar a ruding a amani dieng ruti, “Lungdamna kha nangni dieng a`awm nih rosho.”
42024037	Amani kha chihai a rurawnawk uh, khan amani na ratha imuk u `khat a rumining uh.
42024038	Khan amani dieng ruti, “Iloia nang mulung u kha raha maw nih? Iloia nang mulung ua rakhana athoi maw nih?
42024039	Kukhut le keke hai hi vak en u roh, kieitak kanih keng. Nishih u tana en u roh, ajarla kiei na kiniei nangimuk u hi ang a, ratha na taksha le ru niei mak.”
42024040	Khan ama na mahi ruriei shole, ama khut le ke hai kha amani dieng rumumuk.
42024041	Amani ningai kha na takashawn boi a le shindawnglam a rutetlai khan, Jesu na amani dieng ruti, “Mahin nekleshak maw nangniei uh?”
42024042	Amani na ngalek roisha le khoining kha ama dieng rupek uh.
42024043	Khan amani maikung a loi a makha rushak joi.
42024044	Khan amani dieng ruti, “Kiei na nangni le kaw`awmlai khan, hihai chawng hi nangni dieng kiriei inih, Moses Dan, Thiempulien hai le Lah hai khan kajar a irumiejiek hai kholok kha hawng rupumngir rang a inih.”
42024045	Khashole amani na Miejiek hai kha jetna rang, amani mulungmining kha ama na rumawlawng pe uh.
42024046	Khan ama na amani dieng ruti, “Hitihin rumiejiek, Christa na shawna kha idoingir rang a inih, khan ni `thum changna khan athi ah put ah hawng thoiret rang a inih.
42024047	Khan Jerusalem ah put ah phung kholok dieng ama riming a mulung lekna le munu rangaidamna kha rophong rang a inih.
42024048	Hihai chung a kungachang miring kha nangnih uh.
42024049	Khan enro, kapa na kiei dieng a chawngirakham kha kiei na nangni dieng jong tir rang kanih. Khania chung ah put ah ranak kha le nangni kha najo u masheng, nangni na mahi Jerusalem hin rungak u roh.”
42024050	Khashole ama na amani kha Bethanyshe kha rushe pui, khan ukhut hai kha alawm a amani kha rahvan rupek.
42024051	Amani kha rahvan rupeklai khan, Jesu na rurakai a amani ah put ah ravan a ruchawi joi.
42024052	Khan amani na ama kha chubairubawk ua, ningai le roroia Jerusalem ah rukir u joi.
42024053	Khan amani na riethiengmun khan ningthingkip Pathien mapak a ruawm uh. Amen.
43001001	Putna khan Chawng kha ruawm, Chawng kha Pathien le ruawm, khan Chawng kha Pathien runih.
43001002	Putna khan ama kha Pathien le ruawm.
43001003	Ama na irikip kha rumijir. Khan ama jaw boi a konsha `khatshe ruchangthiei mak.
43001004	Ama dieng ringna kha ruawm. Makha ringna kha miring hai rang a mieivar kha runih.
43001005	Mieivar kha na jingna mun a avar. Khan ajing kha na makha rumawtawr mak.
43001006	Pathien ah put ah tir miring `khat ruawm. Ama riming kha John ruti.
43001007	Ama jar a mi kholok na takashawnna rang le Mieivar chungchanga kungchangna rang, kungchangna `khat a ajong runih.
43001008	Ama kha Mieivar kha runimak, inia Mieivar chungchanga kungchangna rang a ajong runih.
43001009	Ama kha manmieshie shung a ajong mi rikip mavar, adik Mieivar kha runih.
43001010	Ama kha manmieshie hin ruawm. Khan ama jar a manmieshie hi irukon inih. Inia manmieshie na ama kha rujet mak.
43001011	Ama miringtak hai dieng a ajong runih, khan ama miringtak hai kha na ama kha ruloi u mak.
43001012	Khania ama kha iruloi a ama riming a takashawn hai kholok dieng khan, Pathien nai hai changna cham kha rupek.
43001013	Amani kha thishen, taksha mulungmining, khan miring mulungmining ah put ah rushok nih u mak, inia Pathien ah put ah shok runih uh.
43001014	Khan Chawng kha taksha ruchang a nakar ua ruawm. Apa ah put ah shapa `khatte lurna ang a numpokmirit le adik shipmer, ama lurna kha kieini na numuk u joi.
43001015	Ama chungchanga John na kungruchang, khan ama na ra`ai a ruti, “Mahipa chungchanga keng ‘Kanuk a avapa hi kieinek a rashangdet,’ tia kiruriei kha. Ajarla ama kha kamatieng ruawm joi.”
43001016	Ama shipna ah put ah nokholok na numpokmirit kha lawmlawm a nurumuk u joi.
43001017	Ajarla Dan kha Moses jar a nurupek uh, khan numpokmirit le adik kha Jesu Christa jar a jong inih.
43001018	Tute na`awm Pathien kha rumuh maklai. Apa mulungshom a awm Shapa khatte kha na ama kha rumalar joi.
43001019	Khan “Tumaw nangnih?” tia rawdawn rang, Jerusalem ah put ah Jihudi hai na thiempu hai le Levi miring hai kha rutir phakhan, John kungchangna kha hi inih:
43001020	Ama na ruruphong, khan jawt boi ruthaw mak, inia rurophong, “Kiei hi Christa kha nimi`ing.”
43001021	Khania ama dieng rurawdawn uh, “Khanitala nang tumaw nangnih? Elijah kha maw nangni?” Khan ama na ruti, “Nimi`ing.” “Thiempulien kha maw nangnih?” Khan ama na rumashang, “Nimi`ing.”
43001022	Khashole ama dieng rurawdawn uh, “Nojongtir hai dieng kamashangna u rang, nang tumaw nangnih? Nang nining a tumaw kanih nangti?”
43001023	Ama na ruti, “Thiempulien Isaiah na iruriei kha ang a, kiei hi ‘Ramthim ah ra`ai hesho `khat kha kanih: “PUMI lam kha moton pe roh.” ’
43001024	Ijongtir miring hai kha Pharisee hai ah put ah runih uh.
43001025	Ama dieng rawdawn a ruti uh, “Christa kha nangnih nawk a, Elijah kha nangnih nawk a, khan Thiempulien kha nangnih nawkala, ijar a baptisma nangipek maw nih?”
43001026	John na mashang a amani dieng ruti, “Kiei na tui a baptisma kenepek uh, inia nang kar ua miring `khat ading kha jet u makche.
43001027	Ama hi keng kanuk a ava rang a kieinek a rashangdet kha, ama kekawkrui thut rangshe kiei rutuk mi`ing.”
43001028	Hihaihi John na baptisma irupek a ruawmna Jordan vara ah awm Bethabara ah ashok chon runih.
43001029	Jing tieng hin John na ama awmna tieng Jesu ava kha muk a ruti, “Enro! Manmieshie munu achawi Pathien Kengamte khaw!
43001030	Ama chungchanga keng kiei na kiruti, ‘Kanuk ah ava miring khaw kieinek a rashangdet, ajarla ama kha kamatieng ruawm joi.’
43001031	Kieitak na ama kha rujet mi`ing, inia Israel dieng ama kha larnathiei rang, tui a baptisma apeh jong kanih.”
43001032	Khan John na kungchang a ruti, “Ratha na vashu ang a ravan ah put ah jong chum a ama chung ah awm kha kurumuk.
43001033	Kiei na ama kha rujet mi`ing, inia tui a baptisma mawthaw rang a nojongtirpa kha na kiei dieng nururiei, ‘Ratha na jong chum a ama chung ah awm nangimukpa kha na keng Ratha Riethieng le baptisma ipek rang a kha.’
43001034	Kieitak na kurumuk joi, khan kungkuruchang joi, makhala ama hi Pathien Shapa kha inih.”
43001035	Jing tieng hin John na akhaichawi hai idi le ruding a ruawm.
43001036	Khan Jesu apang kha muk phakhan, ruti, “Enro, Pathien Kengamte khaw!”
43001037	Khaichawi idi na mahi iriei kha rujet u `le, Jesu anu kha rujui u joi.
43001038	Jesu na vak hiei a amani na ivakjui u kha rumuk phakhan, amani dieng ruti, “Imaw nangitawk uh?” Ama dieng rumashang uh, “Rabbi” (nemele a niti `le, Oja tina inih), “khoshekawt ah maw nangawm?”
43001039	Amani dieng ruti, “Va u tana vak en u roh.” Khan ava ua ama awmna kha vak muk uh, khan khanikhan ama le ruawm u joi. Apha kha nidan shawm dawr runih.
43001040	John iriei kha rujet a ama anu rujui hai idi kar a akhat kha Simon Peter naipangpa, Andrew kha runih.
43001041	Ama ulienpatak, Simon kha akhat changna a vak muk a ama dieng ruti, “Messiah kha kumuk u joi” (nemele le Christa tina inih).
43001042	Ama kha Jesu dieng vat pui phakhan, Jesu na en a ama dieng ruti, “Nang Jonah shapa Simon kha nangnih. Nang hi Cephas tia koi rang a nangnih joi” (nemele le Peter tina inih).
43001043	Jing tieng hin Jesu na Galilee ah shena rang, rumawdawn. Khan Philip kha rumuk a ama dieng ruti, “Kanu nujui roh.”
43001044	Philip kha Andrew le Peter awmna Bethsaida ah put ah runih.
43001045	Philip na Nathanael kha muk a ama dieng ruti, “Moses na Dan shung ah le khan thiempulien hai na`awm ama jar a irumiejiek, Joseph shapa Nazareth Jesu kha kumuk u joi.”
43001046	Nathanael na ama dieng ruti, “Nazareth ah put ah atha maw shok nih?” Philip na ruti, “Va tana vak en roh.”
43001047	Nathanael na ama dieng ava kha Jesu na rumuk phakhan, ama chungchanga ruti, “Enro, ama dieng milem-midawina awm boi Israel miring diktak `khat khaw!”
43001048	Nathanael na ama dieng rurawdawn, “Itia nanginejet maw nih?” Jesu na mashang a ruti, “Nang kha Philip na nurukoi mala a, thieichangkung thoi ah nangruawmlai khan, kunurumuk joi.”
43001049	Nathanael na mashang a ama dieng ruti, “Rabbi, nang hi Pathien Shapa kha nangnih! Nang hi Israel Reng kha nangnih!”
43001050	Jesu na mashang a ruti, “Thieichangkung thoi ah kunurumuk kiti jar a takaninawshawn maw nih? Hinek hin a alien chon hai kha nangmuk rangnih.”
43001051	Khan amani dieng ruriei, “Diktak a nangni dieng kiriei inih, tun ah put ah ravan rawlawng le Pathien ravantir hai na Miring Shapa chung ah aka le achum kha nangmuk u rangnih joi.”
43002001	Nithum changna khan Galilee ah awm Cana ah moiloina `khat ruawm. Makhan Jesu nuawm ruawm.
43002002	Jesu le akhaichawi haiawm moiloina khan rukoi uh.
43002003	Ju hawng ravat phakhan, Jesu unu na ama dieng ruti, “Ju niei u lai mak.”
43002004	Jesu na ama dieng ruti, “Nupang, kiei le nang na nithaw rang imaw awm? Kapha kha jong shok maklai.”
43002005	Unu kha na shepding hai dieng ruti, “Ama na nangni dieng iti`iti kha thaw u roh.”
43002006	Jihudi hai riethiengna dungjuia litre shawm shirilieirahnga ninawkle rajakhat shawmlieirahnga akeng lung baibe `ruk rumiding uh.
43002007	Jesu na amani dieng ruti, “Baibe hai kha tui miship u roh.” Khan amani na khahaikha rumishipmer uh.
43002008	Khan ama na amani dieng ruti, “Tun vak lok u tana shepulien dieng chawi u roh.” Khan amani na ruchawi uh.
43002009	Shepulien na ju rachangsha tui kha tuidan ruen phakhan, khoshekawt ah maw nih, iti rujet mak (inia tuilok shepding hai kha na tu rujet uh). Khan shepulien kha na moipa kha rukoi.
43002010	Khan ama dieng ruti, “Mi rikip na mashapek a ju athadet eshem, khan khawp phakhan, acham shemngai. Inia ju athadet kha tunshe nangtetlai.”
43002011	Jesu na akhat changna ama jetna kha Galilee ah awm Cana ah ruthaw. Khan ama lurna kha rumalar a akhaichawi hai kha na ama kha takarushawn uh.
43002012	Khashole unu, anaipang hai, khan akhaichawi hai le Capernaum ah rushe uh. Makhan nikho ashawt ruawm u mak.
43002013	Jihudi hai Rakanna kha hawng nai le roroia, Jesu na Jerusalem ah ruhawng joi.
43002014	Riethiengmun roko shung khan shiecha hai, kengam hai, pharphali ajor miring hai, khan shierleshier rotho miring hai rushuh u kha vak muk.
43002015	Ruiro le jemna rang rukon a riethiengmun roko ah put ah amani kholok kha runawt. Kengam hai le shiecha hai dire, khan shierleshier rotho hai shiernawi hai kha rubun pe a amani tebol hai kha shukthala a rutet pe.
43002016	Pharphali ajor miring hai dieng ruti, “Hihaihi hin ah put ah shok pui u roh, kapa in hi rievieithawna in machang u naw roh.”
43002017	Irumiejiek kha akhaichawi hai na rumininghep uh, “Nang in rang a ditrangai kha na kiei hi nakang joi.”
43002018	Khashole Jihudi hai na mashang a ama dieng ruti uh, “Hihaihi nangthaw jar a kieini dieng jetna imaw numumuk ngam u rawng?”
43002019	Jesu na amani dieng ruti, “Mahi riethiengmun hi shiet u roh, khan ni `thum shung a kiei na mothoi rang kanih.”
43002020	Khashole Jihudi hai na ruti uh, “Mahi in mothoina hin kum shawmmililieiruk rulut, nang na mahi ni `thum shung a mothoi rang maw?”
43002021	Inia makha ama pum riethiengmun jar a irurieina inih.
43002022	Ama na athi ah put ah hawng thoi shole, iruriei kha akhaichawi hai na rumininghep uh. Khan Miejiek le Jesu na iruriei chawng hai kha takarushawn uh.
43002023	Rakanna rohoi shung a ama na Jerusalem ah ruawmlai khan, ama na jetna iruthaw hai kha rumuk u jarkhan, mi tampui na ama riming kha takarushawn uh.
43002024	Inia Jesu na tu amani dieng rurepeh mak, ajarla ama na mi kholok kha rujetviek.
43002025	Khan ama rang tu tukhat na miring chungchanga kungachang rang a kha rangai pe mak. Ajarla miring mulung shung a awm kha imaw nih, iti kha ama na ijet inih.
43003001	Nicodemus iti Pharisee miring `khat ruawm. Ama kha Jihudi hai lamkai `khat runih.
43003002	Jan a Jesu dieng ava a ruti, “Rabbi, Pathien ah put ah ajong Oja `khat nangnih, iti kejet uh. Ajarla jetna nangithaw hai hi Pathien na ama dieng awm pui nawkatu tute na thaw ngam naw nih.”
43003003	Jesu na mashang a ama dieng ruti, “Diktak a nang dieng kiriei inih, tute na athar a shok joi nawkatu, Pathien rengchangna kha muh ngam naw nih.”
43003004	Nicodemus na ama dieng ruti, “Miring `khat na atar phakhan, itia maw shok ngam nih? Unu vawn shung ah lutthep a shok ngam nih maw?”
43003005	Jesu na rumashang, “Diktak a nang dieng kiriei inih, tukhat na tui le Ratha ah put ah shok joi nawkatu, Pathien rengchangna khan lut ngam naw nih.
43003006	Taksha ah put ah ashok kha taksha inih, khan Ratha ah put ah ashok kha ratha inih.
43003007	Nang dieng ‘Athar a ashokngirret rang nangnih,’ kiti hin shindawngna niei naw roh.
43003008	Rithi na iditna mun tieng ajap, khan imiri kha nangjet. Inia khoshekawt ah put ah ahawng a khoshekawt tieng ah ashe maw nih, iti kha jet makche. Hitihin Ratha ah put ah ashok mi rikip kha hi le ra`ang inih.”
43003009	Nicodemus na mashang a ama dieng ruti, “Hihaihi itia maw nithiei nih?”
43003010	Jesu na mashang a ama dieng ruti, “Nang Israel oja `khat nangnih, inia hihaihi nangijet boi maw nih?
43003011	Diktak a nang dieng kiriei inih, makhala kijet u kha kiriei u inih, khan kimuk u khan kungkachang u inih. Khan nangni na kukungchangna u hi loi u makche.
43003012	Rieliei nieinak chungchanga kienieriei u phakhan, nangni na takashawn u makche, itia maw ravan nieinak chungchanga kiriei hin takashawn u rawng?
43003013	Ravan ah put ah jong chum ama niboia, ravan a aka tute awm maklai. Makha ravan a awm Miring Shapa kha inih.
43003014	Ramthim ah Moses na moro irulawm kha ang a, Miring Shapa kha`awm ilawmngir rang a inih.
43003015	Khajarkhan tunita`awm ama takashawn kha na thangna niei naw nih, inia kumshawt ringna kha muk rangnih.
43003016	“Pathien na manmieshie hi hitihin numrupok jarkhan, ashapa khatte kha irupek inih. Makha tunita`awm ama takashawn kha na thangna niei boi a kumshawt ringna kha mukna rang a inih.
43003017	Ajarla Pathien na ashapa kha manmieshie chung a chawngshat rang a ijongtir nimak, inia ama jar a manmieshie na ringna kha muknathiei rang a inih.
43003018	Ama takashawn miring kha chawngshat pe mak, inia takashawn boi kha tu chawngishat pesho nih joi. Ajarla Pathien Shapa khatte riming kha takarushawn u mak.
43003019	Chawngshatna kha hi inih, makhala manmieshie a mieivar kha jong joi. Inia miring hai na ajing kha mieivarnek khan numrupok uh. Ajarla amani chonthaw u kha rutha pe u mak.
43003020	Ajarla ashie thaw mi rikip na mieivar kha raha pui. Khan amani chonthaw hai kha malangna boi rang, mieivar khan va u mak.
43003021	Inia amani chonthaw hai kha Pathien jar a ithaw inih, iti kha larna pe rang, adik thaw miring kha na mieivar khan ava inih.”
43003022	Hihaihi shole, Jesu na akhaichawi hai le Judea ram tieng rushe joi. Khan kha mun khan amani le ruawm, khan amani kha baptisma rupek a ruawm.
43003023	Johnawm Salim dieng ah awm Aenon khan baptisma pek a ruawm. Ajarla kha mun khan tui tampui ruawm. Mi hai kha na va ua baptisma ruloi uh.
43003024	Ajarla John kha lungroko shung ah thong u maklai.
43003025	Khan riethiengmashakna chungchanga Jihudi hai le John khaichawi hai na chawngrieshietna rumothoi uh.
43003026	Amani na John dieng va ua ruti uh, “Rabbi, Jordan vara ah nang le ruawm a kungnichangnapa kha na, enro, baptisma rupek a mi kholok na ama dieng rushe u joi.”
43003027	John na mashang a ruti, “Ravan ah put ah ama dieng ipek niboia, tute na iawm muh ngam mak.
43003028	‘Kiei hi Christa kha nimi`ing,’ inia ‘Kiei hi amaton ah inurutir inih,’ kiruti chungchanga kungnangruchang uh.
43003029	Moinu anieipa kha moipa kha inih, moilawm kha na iding a chawng rangai phakhan, moipa hesho a iningaina kha lien pe. Khajarkhan kiningaina kha rupum joi.
43003030	Ama kha rashang shishitngir rangnih, inia kiei tu kerede shishitngir rangnih.
43003031	“Chung ah put ah ajong miring kha na kholok chung a awm. Rieliei ah put ah awm kha rieliei tah inih, khan rieliei chungchanga ieriei. Ravan ah put ah ajong miring kha na kholok chung a awm.
43003032	Imuksha le irangaisha khan kungruchang, inia tute na ama kungchangna kha ruloi pe mak.
43003033	Ama kungchangna aloi miring kha na Pathien hi adik inih, tia jetnam kha nam joi.
43003034	Ajarla Pathien na ijongtir miring kha na Pathien chawng hai kha ieriei, ajarla Pathien na Ratha kha ama dieng danlak boi a ipek inih.
43003035	Apa na ashapa kha numpok a irikip kha ama khut ah rupek joi.
43003036	Ashapa takashawn mi kha na kumshawt ringna kha ieniei, khan ashapa chawng ajui boi mi kha na ringna kha muh naw nih, inia ama chung a Pathien lunghangna kha awm.”
43004001	Khashole Jesu na Johnnek a arawpdet khaichawi kon a baptisma pek joi, tia Pharisee hai na nokor a irujet u kha Pumi na rujet phakhan
43004002	(Jesu amatak na baptisma rupeh mak, inia akhaichawi hai na irupek inih),
43004003	ama na Judea kha mathan a Galilee ah rusheret joi.
43004004	Khan Samaria kha phaw a ama ashe rang a inih.
43004005	Khajarkhan Jacob na ashapa Joseph dieng a irupek ram dieng ah awm, Sychar iti Samaria kho khan rushe joi.
43004006	Makhan Jacob tuikhur ruawm. Jesu na ama khomijinna khan rushaw jarkhan, tuikhur dieng khan shawmuchum a ruawm. Apha kha nidan `ruk dawr runih.
43004007	Samaria ah put ah nupang `khat hi tuilah ava. Jesu na ama dieng ruti, “Nek rang tui nepeh roh.”
43004008	Ajarla akhaichawi hai kha khopui ah nekleshak rawchawh rushe uh.
43004009	Khashole Samaria nupangnu kha na ama dieng ruti, “Itia Jihudi miring nang na Samaria nupang kiei dieng hin nek rang tui nangininik maw nih?” Ajarla Jihudi miring hai na Samaria miring hai le rawlawpngai mak.
43004010	Jesu na mashang a ama dieng ruti, “Nang na Pathien khutchawi le nang dieng ‘Nek rang tui nepeh roh,’ tia ananipa kha tumaw nih, iti kha nangrujet joiatu, ama dieng nangrunik a tuiring kha nurupekawm jawt joi.”
43004011	Nupangnu kha na ama dieng ruti, “Oja, tuilok niei makche, khan tuikhur hi uthuk. Khoshekawt ah makha tuiring kha nangimuk maw nih?
43004012	Kieini dieng a mahi tuikhur nurupeh, amatak na anai hai le ama uilear hai le hin ah put ah runeh, kapa u Jacobnek a lien maw nangnih?”
43004013	Jesu na mashang a ama dieng ruti, “Tunita`awm mahi tui aneh miring kha na tuirana nieiret rangnih.
43004014	Inia kiei na kipek rang a tui aneh ama kha na tu, tuirana shukniei a nieilai naw nih. Khania kipek rang a tui hi na ama dieng kumshawt ringna rang a aput jawnjai tuinar kha chang pe rangnih.”
43004015	Nupangnu kha na ama dieng ruti, “Oja, tuira`awm kienieina boi rang, khan hi mun hinawm tuilah kavatna boi rang, makha tui kha kiei dieng nepeh roh.”
43004016	Jesu na ama dieng ruti, “She tana nang inkopa kha vak koi roh, khan hi mun hin va roh.”
43004017	Nupangnu kha na mashang a ruti, “Inkopa niei mi`ing.” Jesu na ama dieng ruti, “ ‘Inkopa niei mi`ing,’ nangiti kha adik inih.
43004018	Inkopa rahnga nangruniei joi, khania nanginiei khaw tu nang inkopa nimak, makha nangiti kha adik inih.”
43004019	Nupangnu kha na ama dieng ruti, “Oja, thiempulien `khat nangnih, iti kejet joi.
43004020	Kipilepu hai na hi lawn hin biekna runiei uh, inia Jihudi hai nangni na tu Jerusalem hi mi hai na Pathien ibieknangir rang a mun inih, nangti uh.”
43004021	Jesu na ama dieng ruti, “Aw nupang, takanawshawn roh, ajarla Apa kha hi lawn hinawm, khan Jerusalem a`awm biekna boi rang a pha kha jong nai joi.
43004022	Nangijet boi u kha nangbiek uh, khan kijet u kha kiebiek uh. Ajarla shandamna kha Jihudi hai ah put ah inih.
43004023	Inia pha kha jong shok joi, khan tun a pha hi nih joi. Makha pha khan Pathien abiehet miring hai kha na Apa kha ratha le adik a biekna niei rangnih. Hi ang hai hi keng Apa na abieh hai dieng a itawk kha.
43004024	Pathien hi Ratha inih, khan ama abieh miring rikip na ratha a le adik a ibiekngir rang a inih.”
43004025	Nupangnu kha na ama dieng ruti, “Messiah kha jong rangnih, iti kha kejet” (ama kha Christa tia ikoi inih). “Ama na jong phakhan, irikip kha kieini dieng rophong rangnih.”
43004026	Jesu na ama dieng ruti, “Ama kha nang dieng a chawng ariei, kiei hi kanih.”
43004027	Khalaitak khan akhaichawi hai vak shok u joi. Nupangnu le ruriebieh a ruawm khan shinrudawng pe uh. Inia tute na “Imaw nangitawk?” ninawkle “Ijar a ama le riebieh maw nangnih?” tia ruti u mak.
43004028	Khashole nupangnu kha na ama tuibe kha rumak a kho khan rushe joi. Khan miring hai dieng vak riei,
43004029	“Miring `khat na kiruthawsha chon kholok kiei dieng nieriei pe joi. Haro, vak en u rang roh, ama hi Christa kha ninih maw?”
43004030	Makhan kho ah put ah vak shok ua ama dieng rushe u joi.
43004031	Khakarkhan khaichawi hai na runik uh, “Rabbi, neh rang roh.”
43004032	Inia amani dieng ruti, “Nangijet boi u nekleshak nek rang, kiei na kieniei.”
43004033	Khajarkhan khaichawi hai kha na khatlekhat dieng ruti uh, “Tute na shak rang ivakchawi pe boi nimak maw?”
43004034	Jesu na amani dieng ruti, “Kiniei nekleshak hi tu nojongtirpa mulungmining athaw le ama chon rupummashak hi inih.
43004035	‘Parrawkhawmna rang tha mili vatlai,’ nangiti u nimak maw? Enro, nangni dieng kiriei inih, nang ringrakanglam a en u roh, ajarla amani khaw rawkhawm rang, minsho joi!
43004036	Rawkhawm miringpa kha na lawh kha tum joi, khan ara kha kumshawt ringna rang, rawkhawm a awm joi. Makha avawrpa le rawkhawmpa kha na lawp `khat a ningaina rang a inih.
43004037	Ajarla mahin rieichawng kha adik inih: ‘Akhat na awvawr, khan shik `khat na rawkhawm.’
43004038	Nangishin boi u ara kha rawkhawm rang, kunurutir uh. Shik miring hai na rushin uh, khan nangni na amani ishinna u kha nangnemna uh.”
43004039	“Ama na kiruthawsha chon kholok kiei dieng nururiei,” tia nupangnu kungchangna jar a makha kho ah awm Samaria miring tampui na ama kha takarushawn uh.
43004040	Samaria miring hai na ama dieng va u phakhan, amani dieng awmna rang, runik uh, khan kha mun khan ni `di ruawm.
43004041	Ama chawng jar a mi tampui na takarushawn uh.
43004042	Nupangnu dieng amani na ruti uh, “Nang chawngriei jar a takakishawn u nilai mak, ajarla diktak a ama hi rieliei Shandampa Christa kha inih, iti hi kieinitak na kejet u joi, khan kumuk u joi.”
43004043	Ni `di shole kha mun kha mathan a Galilee rulut joi.
43004044	Ajarla Jesu amatak na thiempulien `khat awmnatak khan richitna rumuh mak, tia kungruchang inih.
43004045	Ama na Galilee ah vat phakhan, Jerusalem rohoi `khat a iruthaw chon hai kha rumuk u jarkhan, Galilee miring hai na ama kha rupawm uh. Ajarla amaniawm rachang khan rushe u inih.
43004046	Khashole Jesu na tui kha ju imachangna mun, Galilee ah awm Cana kho khan varet. Capernaum khan, ashapa dam pe boi, rengmun ah chonpo miring `khat ruawm.
43004047	Jesu na Judea ah put ah Galilee ah va joi, iti rujet phakhan, ashapa kha madamnathiei rang, nojong pe roh, tia runik. Ajarla ama kha thimekai a ruawm nih joi.
43004048	Khajarkhan Jesu na ama dieng ruti, “Jetna le rekhekchon nangmuk joi nawkatu itikte nita`awm takanawshawn u naw tinih.”
43004049	Rengmun ah chonpo kha na ama dieng ruti, “Aw Pumi, naitepa thitmala hin nojong pe roh!”
43004050	Jesu na ama dieng ruti, “She rang roh, nang shapa kha dam joi.” Miringpa kha na Jesu na iruti kha takashawn a rushe joi.
43004051	Ojong chum le roroia, oshok hai kha na rurawtawng pui ua thangrukoi uh, “Nang nai kha dam joi.”
43004052	Khajarkhan hawng damna pha kha amani dieng rurekeche a ama dieng ruti uh, “Majan nidan shiri khan raitun kha na irumathan inih.”
43004053	Khajarkhan apa kha na Jesu na ama dieng “Nang shapa kha dam joi,” irutina pha kha inih, iti kha rujet. Khan ama na ama inshung kholok le takarushawn joi.
43004054	Mahi Jesu na Judea ah put ah Galilee ah vatlai a adi changna a iruthaw jetna kha inih.
43005001	Hishole Jihudi hai rohoi `khat ruawm, khan Jesu na Jerusalem ah ruhawng joi.
43005002	Jerusalem khan, Kengam Pakawt dieng ah awm, Hebrew chawng a Bethesda iti tomai`in rahnga a`awm, tuikhur `khat ruawm.
43005003	Khahai mun khan takshon, mikchaw, kekhawr, khan takthi miring hai na rurutung ua tui hawng rawnawk kha ngaklam a ruawm uh.
43005004	Ajarla phapha a ravantir `khat na tuikhur khan jong chum a tui kha jong rawnawkmashak. Tunita`awm tui hawng rawnawk shole, rapapek a achum kha na ih natna kha niei joiawm damna imuk inih.
43005005	Kha mun khan kum shawm `thumlieiriet natna niei miring `khat ruawm.
43005006	Jesu na aja a awm kha rumuk, khan khatikhan a awm kha ashawt nih joi, iti rujet `le, ama dieng ruti, “Nangdam jawt maw?”
43005007	Anapa kha na ama dieng rumashang, “Oja, tui hawng rawnawk phakhan, tuikhur hin numuchum rang, mi niei mi`ing. Khanikengta kashe phakhan, miring shik na kamatieng ruchummashathiei.”
43005008	Jesu na ama dieng ruti, “Thoi roh, nang jana kha loitana lawn rang roh.”
43005009	Relentak a ama kha rudam joi, khan ajana kha loi a rulawn joi. Makha nikho kha Sabbath nikho runih.
43005010	Khajarkhan imadampa dieng khan Jihudi hai kha na ruti uh, “Mahi Sabbath nikho inih, hi nikho hin nang jana nangichawi hi Dan nimak.”
43005011	Amani dieng rumashang, “Anamadampa kha na kiei dieng nuruti, ‘Nang jana kha chawitana lawn rang roh.’ ”
43005012	Khashole ama dieng rurawdawn uh, “ ‘Nang jana kha loi tana lawn rang roh,’ nati miring kha tumaw nih?”
43005013	Inia adam miringpa kha na tumaw nih, iti kha rujet mak, ajarla kha mun khan mirawp hawng ruchun jarkhan, khan ah put ah Jesu kha rushok joi.
43005014	Khashole Jesu na ama kha riethiengmun ah rumuk a ruti, “Enro, nangdam joi, nang dieng ashiedet shokna boi rang, munu thawlai naw roh.”
43005015	Miringpa kha na rushe a Jihudi hai dieng namadampa kha Jesu inih, tia ruriei joi.
43005016	Khan Jihudi hai na Jesu anu kha ruthir ua ama kha thatna rang, tawk a ruawm uh. Ajarla hihaihi Sabbath nikho a iruthaw inih.
43005017	Inia Jesu na amani dieng rumashang, “Kapa na tunshe hin chon thaw a awm, khan kieiawm chon kha kithaw inih.”
43005018	Hijarhin Jihudi hai na liekliek a ama kha thatna rang tawk a ruawm uh. Sabbath nikho kha irukhoi ranga niboia, Pathien kha`awm apatak iruti a nining a Pathien le rietiet inih.
43005019	Jesu na mashang a amani dieng ruti, “Diktak a nangni dieng kiriei inih, Apa ithaw imuk kha niboia, Shapa kha na nining a ithaw ngam awm mak. Ajarla Apa ithaw hai kha le ra`ang a Shapa na`awm ithaw inih.
43005020	Ajarla Apa na Shapa kha numpok, khan ama dieng ithaw chon kholok kha imumuk inih. Khan nang shindawngna u rang, ama dieng hinek hin a aliendet mumuk rangnih.
43005021	Ajarla Apa na athi hai kha imothoi a imiring kha ang a, Shapa na`awm idit miring hai dieng ringna kha ipek inih.
43005022	Ajarla Apa na tute chung a chawngshat mak, inia chawngshatna kholok kha Shapa dieng pek joi.
43005023	Makha Apa dieng richit ipek u kha ang a, mi kholok na Shapa dieng richit pekna rang a inih. Shapa richit apeh boi kha na ojongtir Apa kha`awm, richit ipek boi inih.
43005024	“Diktak a nangni dieng kiriei inih, tunitjoiawm kawchawng irangai a nojongtirpa kha takashawn ama kha na kumshawt ringna kha ieniei, khan chawngshatna shung khan va naw nih, inia athi ah put ah ringna khan rawthawt nih joi.
43005025	Diktak a nangni dieng kiriei inih, athi hai na Pathien Shapa hesho kha rangai a, rangai miring kholok ringna rang a pha kha jong joi, khan tun a pha hi nih joi.
43005026	Ajarla Apa na nining a ringna iniei kha ang a, Shapa diengawm nining a ringna nieina rang pek joi.
43005027	Khan ama dieng chawngshatna cham kha pek joi, ajarla ama kha Miring Shapa kha inih.
43005028	“Mahin shindawngna niei u naw roh, than shung ah awm kholok na ama hesho irangai ua vak shokna u rang a pha kha jong rangnih joi.
43005029	Atha chon thaw hai na ringna rang a thoiretna tieng, khan ashie thaw hai na chawngshatna rang a thoiretna tieng she u rangnih.
43005030	Kiningcham a kiei na iawm thaw mi`ing. Kirangai kha dungjuia chawngkishat inih, khan kawchawngshatna kha adik inih. Ajarla kumulungmining kha kiei tawk mi`ing, inia nojongtir, kapa mulungmining kha kitawk inih.
43005031	“Kiei rangbak khan kieriei joiatu, kiriei kha adik nimak.
43005032	Shik miring na kuchungchanga kungachang awm, khan kuchungchanga kungachang kha adik inih, iti kha kejet.
43005033	“Nangnitak na John dieng mi nangrutir uh, khan ama na adik khan kungruchangsha nih joi.
43005034	Kimuk kungchangna hi miring ah put ah nimak, inia hi kiti hi nangni kha nashanna u rang a inih.
43005035	John hi achong le avar thaomiei kha runih. Nangni na ama mieivar khan pha bawngte rawshawna rang, nangrumining uh.
43005036	“Kiei na John kungchangnanek a alien kungchangna kha kieniei, ajarla kapa na kiei dieng inepek chon hai kha rupummashakna rang, nurupek joi. Hihai chontak kithaw hi na kapa na kiei hi inojongtirsha inih, iti chungchanga kungachang inih.
43005037	Kiei hi nojongtir, kapa amatak na kuchungchanga kungruchangsha inih. Ama hesho kha voikhatshe rujet u makche, khan ama me kha`awm rumuh u makche.
43005038	Ama chawng kha nangni dieng chatboia awm mak. Ajarla ijongtir ama kha takashawn u makche.
43005039	Nangni na Miejiek hai kha nangtawk uh, ajarla amani dieng kumshawt ringna kha awm, tia nangmining uh; khahaitak kha na inih kuchungchanga kungachang u kha.
43005040	Inia ringna nangnieina u rang, kiei dieng va jawt u makche.
43005041	“Miring hai ah put ah mapak kha kiei na loi mi`ing.
43005042	Inia Pathien numpok kha nangni dieng awm mak, iti kha kejet.
43005043	Kapa riming a kajong joi, inia nuruloi u makche. Shik miring `khat na irimingrilik a jong joiatu, ama kha nangruloi u rangnih.
43005044	Pathien ranga na ipek ngam mapakna kha tawk boi a, khatlekhat ah put ah mapakna kha nangmuk u jarkhan, itia maw takanawshawn u rawng?
43005045	“Kapa maikung a kanaheng u rangnih, tia mining u naw roh. Ngakmining nangirutetna u Moses na keng inuruheng u kha.
43005046	Ajarla Moses kha takanangrushawn u joiatu, kiei hiawm takananginawshawn u rang a shok, ajarla kuchungchanga irumiejiek inih.
43005047	Inia imiejiek hai khan takanangrushawn u nawkala, itia maw kiriei hai hi takashawn u rawng?”
43006001	Khashole Jesu na Galilee Thampui vara ah awm Tiberias Thampui tieng ruhawng joi.
43006002	Ama na ana hai dieng a iruthaw jetna hai kha rumuk u jarkhan, mirawp tampui na anu rujui u joi.
43006003	Jesu na lawn ah ruhawng a akhaichawi hai le kha mun khan rushuh.
43006004	Jihudi hai rohoi, Rakanna kha hawng nai joi.
43006005	Jesu na iringrakang a en phakhan, mirawp tampui na ama tieng ava kha rumuk a Philip dieng ruti, “Amani shak rang khoshekawt a tan vak rawchawk rang a maw nih?”
43006006	Mahi ama kha enretena rang a iruti inih. Ajarla amatak na ithaw rang a rasham kha rujet.
43006007	Philip na ama dieng rumashang, “Dinari rajadi man tan hi na amani dieng mum `khatshe a`awm chang u naw nih.”
43006008	Akhaichawi hai kar a akhat, Simon Peter anaipangpa, Andrew na ama dieng ruti,
43006009	“Mahin nim tan rahnga le nga `di aniei pashanai `khat awm, inia mi hijat rang hin imaw ang nih?”
43006010	Inia Jesu na ruti, “Miring hai kha mushut u roh.” Kha mun khan champi tampui ruawm. Irumushut u miring hai kha bawp rahnga dawr runih.
43006011	Khajarkhan Jesu na tan hai kha ruloi, khan mapakna runiei a khaichawi hai dieng rupek. Khan khaichawi hai na ashuh miring hai dieng rushem pe. Khatikhan nga kha`awm amani idittukshe a rushem pe uh.
43006012	Amani kha vawn miship pe u phakhan, akhaichawi hai dieng ruti, “Lekvai mienieng hai kha `khatshe thangna boi rang, rawkhawm u roh.”
43006013	Khashole rawkhawm ua, aneh-ashah hai kha na imak u nim tan rahnga lekvai hai kha tiengkum shawmlieidi rumiship uh.
43006014	Jesu na iruthaw jetna kha miring hai na rumuk u phakhan, ruti uh, “Diktak a ama hi rieliei shung a ajong rang a Thiempulien kha inih.”
43006015	Khashole amani na rangrat a shur a Jesu kha reng machangna rang, rashamjer a ava u kha rujet phakhan, iethien a lawn tieng rurakai joi.
43006016	Kho hawng romo phakhan, akhaichawi hai na thampui tieng jong chum u joi.
43006017	Khan amani na rokong shung ah rulut ua thampui kha rurakan uh, khan Capernaum tieng ashe ruput u joi. Khan ni hawng tah joi, inia Jesu tu amani tieng rushe maklai.
43006018	Rithi ranaktak a hawng rang jarkhan, thampui kha rurawnawk.
43006019	Amani na majin `thum ninawkle mili dawr rujap u `le, Jesu na thampui chung ah vak lawn kha rumuk uh. Rokong kha vak ranai pui phakhan, amani kha ruchih uh.
43006020	Inia amani dieng ruti, “Kiei kanih keng, chih u naw roh.”
43006021	Khashole ama kha rokong shung ah rumulut u joi. Khan rokong kha eshena u rang a ram kha rushokrelen joi.
43006022	Jing tieng hin thampui vara `khat a arangah mipui kha na akhaichawi hai rulutna kha niboia, rokongte shik rumuh u mak. Khan Jesu na akhaichawi hai le rokongte khan rulutshom u mak, inia akhaichawi hai ranga kha rushe uh.
43006023	Khan Tiberias ah put ah rokongte ava hai kha na, Pumi na mapakna runiei shole, tan irushakna u mun kha, vak shok uh.
43006024	Makhan mipui na Jesuawm, khan akhaichawi haiawm rumuk boi u phakhan, rokongte hai khan rulut ua Capernaum ah Jesu atawk va u joi.
43006025	Amani na thampui vara `khat tieng ama kha rumuk u phakhan, ama dieng ruti uh, “Rabbi, hi mun hin itik a ava maw nangnih?”
43006026	Jesu na mashang a amani dieng ruti, “Diktak a nangni dieng kiriei inih, jetna kha nangrumuk u jar a ninatawk u nimak, inia tan kha nangshak ua vawn nangmiship u jar a inih.
43006027	Athangthiei nekleshak rang khan chon thaw u naw roh, inia kumshawt ringnashe a a`awm rang a, Miring Shapa na nangni dieng inepek rang a, nekleshak rang khan chon thaw u roh. Ajarla Apa Pathien na ama chung a ama jetnam kha nam pe joi.”
43006028	Khajarkhan ama dieng ruti uh, “Pathien chon hai kha thawna rang, imaw kithawthiei u awm?”
43006029	Jesu na mashang a amani dieng ruriei, “Ijongtir ama kha takanangishawn u kha Pathien chon inih.”
43006030	Khajarkhan ama dieng ruti uh, “Kumuk ua takakawnawshawnna u rang, ih jetna maw thaw rawng? Ih chon maw thaw rawng?
43006031	‘Ravan ah put ah amani dieng nekleshak shak rang rupek uh,’ tia irumiejiek kha ang a, nipilepu hai na ramthim ah manna rushak uh.”
43006032	Khashole Jesu na amani dieng ruti, “Diktak a nangni dieng kiriei inih, Moses na ravan ah put ah tan kha nangni dieng nurupek u mak, inia kapa na ravan ah put ah tan adik kha nangni dieng nepek uh.
43006033	Ajarla Pathien tan kha tu ravan ah put ah jong chum a manmieshie dieng a ringna ipek ama kha inih.”
43006034	Khajarkhan ama dieng ruti uh, “Pumi, makha tan kha pha rikip a nepeh u roh.”
43006035	Jesu na amani dieng ruriei, “Kiei hi ringna tan kha kanih. Tunitjoiawm kiei dieng a ava ama kha na itikte nita`awm vawncham pe naw nih, khan tunitjoiawm kiei takanashawn ama kha na itikte nita`awm tuira pe naw nih.
43006036	Inia nangni dieng kieriei, makhala nangnurumuk u joi, khania takanawshawn u makche.
43006037	Kapa na inepek kholok na kiei dieng va rangnih, khan kiei dieng a ava ama kha kiei na shuknawt a nawt naw ning.
43006038	Ajarla kumulungmining athaw rang a jong niboia, nojongtirpa mulungmining kha thawna rang, ravan ah put ah ajong kanih.
43006039	Kiei dieng a inepeksha miring kholok kha, ama ah put ah mathang boi a, Nikho dawng khan mothoi rang a hi, nojongtir kapa mulungmining kha inih.
43006040	Nojongtirpa mulungmining kha hi inih, makhala Shapa kha imuk a ama kha takashawn mi rikip na kumshawt ringna kha niei rangnih, khan ama kha Nikho dawng khan mothoi rang kanih.”
43006041	Khashole Jihudi hai na ama kha mieshiet ruput uh. Ajarla ama na ruriei, “Kiei hi ravan ah put ah ajong tan kha kanih.”
43006042	Amani na ruti uh, “Mahi Jesu hi Joseph shapa, unulepa kijet u kha nimak maw? ‘Kiei hi ravan ah put ah jong chum kha kanih,’ iti hi iti dan a iti maw nih?”
43006043	Khashole Jesu na mashang a amani dieng ruti, “Khatlekhat dieng muruk a chawng riei u naw roh.
43006044	Nojongtir kapa na ama kha ahawr nawkatu, tute na kiei dieng va ngam naw nih, khan Nikho dawng khan mothoi rang kanih.
43006045	Thiempulien hai behangbuk ah miejiek a awm, ‘Amani kholok kha Pathien na ruchuk rangnih.’ Khajarkhan kapa ah put ah irangai a ajet mi rikip na kiei dieng ava inih.
43006046	Pathien ah put ah ajong ama kha na niboia, tu kha na nita`awm, kapa kha irumuk nimak. Ama ranga kha na kapa kha rumuk joi.
43006047	Diktak a nangni dieng kiriei inih, kiei hi takanashawn miring kha na kumshawt ringna kha ieniei.
43006048	Kiei hi ringna tan kha kanih.
43006049	Nang pilepu hai na ramthim khan manna rushak uh, khan ruthi uh.
43006050	Mahi mi rikip na ashak a thitna boi rang, ravan ah put ah jong chum tan kha inih.
43006051	Kiei ravan ah put ah jong chum tan aring kha kanih. Tukhat na mahi tan hi shak joiatu, kumshawt a ring rangnih. Khan kiei na kipek rang a tan kha tu kataksha hi inih. Makha manmieshie ringna rang a kipek rang a inih.”
43006052	Khashole Jihudi hai na chawngrieshiet a ruti uh, “Itia maw hi miring hi na ataksha hi shak rang kieini dieng nepeh ngam nih?”
43006053	Khajarkhan Jesu na amani dieng ruti, “Diktak a nangni dieng kiriei inih, Miring Shapa taksha kha nangshak u nawk a, khan ama thishen kha nangnek u nawkatu, nangni na ringna kha niei u makche.
43006054	Kataksha kha ashah, khan kithishen kha aneh mi kha na kumshawt ringna kha ieniei, khan Nikho dawng khan mothoi rang kanih.
43006055	Ajarla kataksha hi nekleshak adik kha inih, khan kithishen hi shakletui adik kha inih.
43006056	Kataksha kha ashah, khan kithishen kha aneh mi kha na kiei dieng awm, khan kiei na ama dieng ka`awm.
43006057	Aring kapa na inojongtir inih, khan kapa jar a aring kanih. Kha le ra`ang a, kiei anashah kha na kajar a ring rangnih.
43006058	Mahi ravan ah put ah jong chum tan kha inih. Nang pilepu hai kha na manna irushak a ruthi u kha ang a niboia, mahi tan ashah kha na kumshawt a ring rangnih.”
43006059	Hihaihi Capernaum ah awm synagogue `khat ah ruruchuklai khan a iruriei inih.
43006060	Akhaichawi hai tampui na rurangai u phakhan, ruti uh, “Mahi chawng matat inih. Tu na maw jet ngam nih?”
43006061	Hijarhin akhaichawi hai na mieshiet joi, iti rujet phakhan, Jesu na amani dieng ruti, “Hi na inakhar u maw nih?
43006062	Miring Shapa kha na matieng a ruawmna mun ah aka kha nangmuk uala, imaw ti u rawng?”
43006063	Ringna apeh kha Ratha inih. Miring chonthaw kha tu nemna awm mak. Nangni dieng kiriei chawng hi tu ratha le ringna kha inih.
43006064	Inia nang kar ua takashawn boi miring eshen awm. Ajarla putna ah put ah Jesu na takashawn boi miring hai le ama ajor rang a miring kha rujet.”
43006065	Khan ama na ruti, “Hijarhin nangni dieng kiriei inih, kapa na ama dieng irupeksha nitnawkatu, tute na kiei dieng va ngam naw nih.”
43006066	Hijarhin akhaichawi hai tampui na ama ah put ah rurakai ua ama anu rujui u lai mak.
43006067	Khajarkhan Jesu na shawmlieidi dieng ruti, “Nangniawm nangshe jawt u joi maw?”
43006068	Simon Peter na rumashang, “Pumi, kieini na tu dieng maw she u ning? Nang na tu kumshawt ringna chawng hai kha nangniei.
43006069	Nang hi Christa, aring Pathien Shapa kha nangnih, iti hi takakawshawn u joi, khan kejet u joi.”
43006070	Jesu na amani dieng rumashang, “Shawmlieidi nangni hi kiei na kinurumadan u nimak maw, inia nang kar ua akhat tu diabol kha anih boi maw nih?”
43006071	Makha Simon shapa Judas Iscariot irurieina inih. Ama kha Jesu ajor rang a, shawmlieidi kar a akhat, kha runih.
43007001	Hishole Jihudi hai na Jesu kha that rang rutawk u jarkhan, Judea khan ruleng jawtlai mak. Khajarkhan ama na Galilee shung khan riephiei a ruawm joi.
43007002	Khan Jihudi hai Thamber hai rohoi kha hawng nai joi.
43007003	Khajarkhan anaipang hai na ama dieng ruti uh, “Nang khaichawi hai na nangithaw hai kha muknathiei rang, hi mathan tana Judea tieng she rang roh.
43007004	Ajarla vanoi na ijet atawk miring tute na rethe a chon thawngai mak. Hihaihi nangthaw joiatu, nang nining a manmieshie dieng mumuk roh.”
43007005	Ajarla anaipang haishe na ama kha takarushawn u mak.
43007006	Jesu na amani dieng ruti, “Kapha kha jong shok maklai, inia nang pha u kha tu rasham jawnjai a awm.
43007007	Manmieshie na nangni inumukmak u rang a kha anithiei boi inih, inia kiei tu numukmak uh. Ajarla amani chonthaw hai kha ashie inih, iti chungchanga kungkachang inih.
43007008	Rohoi khawn nangni she u roh. Makhaw rohoi khawn kiei tu she naw ninglai, ajarla kapha kha hawng rupum maklai.”
43007009	Amani dieng hihaihi ruriei shole, Galilee ah rurangah joi
43007010	Inia anaipang hai kha rushe shole, malangsheng a niboia, muruk a ama`awm rohoi khan rushe joi.
43007011	Rohoi mun khan Jihudi hai na rutawk ua ruti uh, “Ama kha ih ah maw awm?”
43007012	Ama chungchanga mipui kar a chawngrieshietna tampui ruawm. Eshen na ruti uh, “Ama hi mitha inih,” khan shik `khat na ruti uh, “Nimak, ama na mipui kha irulem inih.”
43007013	Nikengta Jihudi hai kha ruchih u jarkhan, tute na ama chungchanga rophongleng a chawngruriei ngam u mak.
43007014	Inia rohoi laitak khan Jesu na riethiengmun khan ruhawng a mi ruruchuk.
43007015	Jihudi hai na shindawnglam a ruti uh, “Hi miring hi na behang ruchuh boipet a, itia miejiek hai hi ijet maw nih?”
43007016	Jesu na mashang a amani dieng ruti, “Kiei na kiruchuk hi katah nimak, inia nojongtirpa tah inih.
43007017	Tukhat na Pathien mulungmining kha thaw jawt joiatu, Pathien ah put ah maw nih, ninawkle katatak ah put ah ruchukna maw nih, iti kha jet rangnih.
43007018	Ama imining dungjuia chawngriei kha na amarilik rang a lurna kha itawk inih. Inia tunita`awm nojongtirpa ama lurna atawk ama kha adik miring kha inih. Khan dikna boi kha ama dieng awm pe mak.
43007019	Moses na nangni dieng Dan kha inurupek boi u maw nih? Khania tute na Dan kha rung u makche. Ijar a kiei hi thatna rang ninatawk u maw nih?”
43007020	Mipui kha na mashang a ruti uh, “Raikho nangniei, tu na maw nang kha that rang natawk?”
43007021	Jesu na mashang a amani dieng ruti, “Chon `khat kuruthaw, khan nang lawpsheng u na shindawngna nangruniei uh.
43007022	Khajarkhan Moses na vunepna nurupek uh (Moses ah put ah tu nimak, inia pilepu hai ah put inih), khan miring kha Sabbath nikho a vunnangep pe uh.
43007023	Moses Dan kha koina boi rang, miring `khat na Sabbath nikho a vunepna muk a la, sabbath nikho a miring `khat pumplang a kamadam jar a, kuchung a lunghangna nanginiei u maw nih?
43007024	Maila a chawngshat u naw roh, inia dikna dungjuia chawngshatna kha le chawngshat u roh.”
43007025	Khan Jerusalem miring eshen na ruti uh, “Ama hi nimak maw amani na that rang a irutawk u kha?
43007026	Khania, enro! Malangsheng a ama na chawngriei, inia ama dieng iawm ti u mak. Diktak a chamniei hai na ama hi Christa kha inihet, iti irujet boi u maw nih?
43007027	Khanikengta miringpa hi khoshekawt ah put ah maw nih, iti nejet uh. Inia Christa kha jong phakhan, tute na khoshekawt ah put ah maw nih, iti jet naw nih.”
43007028	Khashole Jesu na riethiengmun ah put ah miruchuklam a ra`ai a ruti, “Kiei hi nangnejet uh, khan khoshekawt ah put ah maw kanih, iti nangjet uh. Kinining a ajong nimi`ing, inia nojongtirpa kha adik inih, ama kha jet u makchelai.
43007029	Kiei na ama kha kejet, ajarla kiei hi ama ah put ah ajong kanih, khan ama na inojongtir inih.”
43007030	Khashole ama kha shurna rang, rutawk uh, inia ama pha kha jong pe boilai jarkhan, tute na ama chung a khut rubanna ngam u mak.
43007031	Nikengta mipui kar a tampui na ama kha takarushawn ua ruti uh, “Christa na jong phakhan, hi miring hi na iruthaw jetnanek hin arawpdet jetna kha jong thaw nih maw?”
43007032	Hihaihi mipui na ama chungchanga murukmuruk a chawng iruriei u kha Pharisee hai na rujet uh. Khan thiempu ulien hai le Pharisee hai na riethiengmun shipai hai kha ama ashur rang rutir uh.
43007033	Makhan Jesu na ruti, “Nangni le pha bawngkhat awm rang kanilai, khashole nojongtirpa dieng ahawng rang kanih joi.
43007034	Nangnatawk u rangnih, inia numuh u naw tinih. Kaw`awmna khan va ngam u naw tinih.”
43007035	Khashole Jihudi hai na khatlekhat dieng ruti uh, “Nimukna boi u rang a mun khoshekawt ah she rang a iti maw nih? Greek hai kar a awm Retherak hai dieng she a, Greek hai kha vak ruchuk rang, tia imining maw nih?
43007036	‘Nangnatawk u rangnih, inia numuh u naw tinih, khan kaw`awmna mun khan hawng ngam u naw tinih,’ iruti kha ih itina maw nih?”
43007037	Rohoi nikho dawng alientak khan Jesu na ruding a ra`ailam a ruti, “Tunitjoiawm tuira miring kha na kiei dieng va rieshie tui kha neh rosho.
43007038	Kiei takanashawn miring kha na, Miejiek ah iruriei kha ang a, mulung ah put ah tuiring vadung hai kha long pe rangnih.”
43007039	Mahi takashawn miring hai na imuk rang a rasham Ratha chungchanga iruriei inih. Ajarla Jesu kha rumulur boilai jarkhan, Ratha Riethieng kha rupeh maklai.
43007040	Mipui kar a tampui na chawng kha rurangai u phakhan, ruti uh, “Diktak a ama hi Thiempulien `khat inih.”
43007041	Shik miring hai na ruti uh, “Ama hi Christa kha inih.” Shik miring hai na ruti uh, “Galilee ah put ah Christa shok nih maw?
43007042	David chicha ah put ah le David ruawmna Bethlehem ah put ah Christa kha jong rangnih, tia Miejiekna iruriei boi maw nih?”
43007043	Khajarkhan ama chungchanga mipui kar khan reshenna ruawm.
43007044	Eshen na ama kha shurna rang, rumining uh, inia tute na ama chung a khut rubang ngam u mak.
43007045	Khashole riethiengmun shipai hai na thiempu ulien hai le Pharisee hai dieng rushe uh. Khan amani dieng rurawdawn uh, “Ijar a nangishur boi u maw nih?”
43007046	Riethiengmun shipai hai na rumashang uh, “Miring tute na`awm hi miring hi ang a chawngruriei maklai!”
43007047	Pharisee hai na amani dieng rumashang uh, “Nangni tu inomohon boi u nimak maw?
43007048	Rampo hai kar a akhat, ninawkle Pharisee hai kar a akhat na`awm ama kha taka`irushawn u maw nih joi?
43007049	Inia Dan jet boi mipui kha pumbotna kha ruchang uh.”
43007050	Amani kar a akhat a ruawm, Jesu dieng jan a rushe, Nicodemus na amani dieng ruti,
43007051	“Nadan u na chawng rangai mala le ithaw kha imaw nih, iti jet mala, chawng maw shat?”
43007052	Ama dieng mashang a ruti uh, “Nangawm Galilee ah put ah maw nangnih? Tawk tana enro, Galilee ah put ah thiempulien thoi maklai.”
43007053	Khan mi rikip na i`inin ah rushesho u joi.
43008001	Khania Jesu tu Olive Lawn ah ruhawng joi.
43008002	Jingkara hin ama na riethiengmun ah rusheret, khan mi kholok na ama dieng rushe uh; khan ama na rushuh a amani kha ruruchuk.
43008003	Khan danoja hai le Pharisee hai na uirethaw nupang `khat hi shur ua ama dieng vak chawi uh. Khan ama kha mi kar a rumiding uh.
43008004	Ama dieng ruti uh, “Oja, mahi nupang hi uire ruthawlaitak a kirushur u inih.
43008005	Hi ang nupang hi lung le dengna rang, Dan a Moses na chawng nurupek uh. Hijarhin nang na imaw nangti?”
43008006	Ama chung a jar pekna rang, mahi enretena `khat a iruti u inih. Inia Jesu na rubu a pieipak ah khutlawi le rumiejiek.
43008007	Ama kha rawnaw a chawng rurawdawn u jarkhan, Jesu na hawng thoi a ruti, “Nang kar ua munu niei boi akhat na masha a lung le dieng rosho.”
43008008	Khan takthar a rubu a pieipak ah rumiejiekret.
43008009	Amani na rujet u phakhan, lungthim rushit pe ua, ulienchang ah put ah dawngshe, miring hai kha `khatkhat a rushe u joi. Jesu kha thiente a rumak u joi, khania nupangnu kha tu alai ah ding a awmlai.
43008010	Jesu na hawng thoi a nupangnu ranga niboia, tute hawng muk boi phakhan, ama dieng ruti, “Aw nupang, nanawng miring hai kha la? Tute na inaheng boi maw nih joi?”
43008011	Ama dieng rumashang, “Awh Pumi, tute na kiei hi naheng mak.” Jesu na ama dieng ruti, “Kiei na`awm nang kha naheng mi`ing. She tana tun ah put ah munu vak thawlai naw roh.”
43008012	Takthar a Jesu na amani dieng ruriei a ruti, “Kiei hi manmieshie mieivar kha kanih. Kiei najui ama kha na jingna khan shuklawn a lawn naw nih, inia ringna mieivar kha niei rangnih.”
43008013	Khashole Pharisee hai na ama dieng ruti, “Nangrilik rang a nangiriei inih, nangiriei kha adik nimak.”
43008014	Jesu na mashang a amani dieng ruti, “Kieirilik rang a kiriei nitjoiawm, kiriei hi adik inih. Ajarla khoshekawt ah put ah ajong maw kanih, khan khoshekawt tieng ah she maw kanih, iti kha kejet, inia khoshekawt ah put ah ajong maw kanih, khan khoshekawt tieng ah she maw kanih, iti kha nangni na jet u makche.
43008015	Nangni na miring ichatna dungjuia chawngnangshat uh. Kiei tu tute chung a chawngshat mi`ing.
43008016	Chawngkishatshe kha nitjoiawm, kawchawngshatna kha adik inih. Ajarla kiethien a nimi`ing, inia nojongtir, kapa kha le kanih.
43008017	Nang Dan u khanawm hitihin miejiek, makhala pasha `di kungchangna kha adik inih.
43008018	Kieirilik chung a kungachang kanih, khan nojongtir kapa na`awm kuchungchanga kungachang inih.”
43008019	Khajarkhan ama dieng ruti uh, “Nangpa kha ih ah maw awm?” Jesu na rumashang, “Kiei hiawm, kapa kha`awm jet u makche. Kiei hi nangnurujet uatu, kapa kha`awm nangrujet u rangnih.”
43008020	Hihai chawng hi Jesu na riethiengmun ah ruruchuklai a niei`in khan iruriei inih. Khan tute na ama kha rushur ngam u mak. Ajarla ama pha kha jong shok pe maklai.
43008021	Jesu na takthar a ruriei, “Kiei she rang kanih joi, khan nangnatawk u rangnih, khan nang munu u hai khan nangthi u rangnih. Keshena rang a mun khan hawng ngam u naw tinih.”
43008022	Khajarkhan Jihudi hai na ruti uh, “Nining a rathat rang a maw nih, ajarla iti, ‘Keshena rang a mun khan hawng ngam u naw tinih’?”
43008023	Amani dieng ruti, “Nangni noi ah put ah nangnih uh, kiei hi chung ah put ah kanih. Nangni hi manmieshie ah put ah nangnih uh, kiei hi mahi manmieshie ah put ah nimi`ing.
43008024	Khajarkhan nang munu u hai khan nangthi u rangnih, tia nangni dieng a kiruriei inih. Ajarla kiei hi ama kha kanih, iti kha takanangshawn u nawkatu, nang munu u hai khan nangthi u rangnih.”
43008025	Khajarkhan ama dieng ruti uh, “Tumaw nangnih?” Jesu na amani dieng ruti, “Nangni dieng kung ah put ah kiriei kha inih.
43008026	Nang chungchang ua riei rang le chawngshat rang, tampui kieniei, inia nojongtirpa kha adik inih. Khan ama ah put ah kijet hai kholok kha manmieshie dieng hin kiriei inih.”
43008027	Apa chungchanga amani dieng iruriei inih, iti kha rujet u mak.
43008028	Khajarkhan Jesu na amani dieng ruriei, “Nangni na Miring Shapa kha nanglawm u phakhan, kiei hi amatak kha kanih, khan kinining a kithaw nimak a kapa na inuruchuk dungjuia hihaihi kiriei inih, iti kha nangjet u rangnih.
43008029	Khan nojongtirpa kha kiei le awm. Kapa na kiethiente a namah mak, ajarla ama rang a ningnitnarok kha kithaw jawnjai inih.”
43008030	Ama na hihaihi iriei le roroia, mi tampui na ama kha takarushawn uh.
43008031	Khashole ama takarushawnsha Jihudi hai dieng Jesu na ruriei, “Nangni na kawchawng hi nangjui uatu, diktak a kakhaichawi hai kha nangnih u joi.
43008032	Khan nangni na adik kha nangjet u rangnih, khan adik kha na nangni kha nomoshok u rangnih.”
43008033	Khan ama dieng rumashang uh, “Kieini hi Abraham chicha hai kha kanih uh, khan tute diengawm shok a ruawm u mi`inglai. Itia ‘Moshok kha nangnih u rangnih,’ nangiti maw nih?”
43008034	Jesu na amani dieng rumashang, “Nangni dieng diktak a kiriei inih, munu athaw mi rikip kha munu shok kha inih.
43008035	Shok na in khan kumshawt a awm mak. Shapa kha na kumshawt a awm.
43008036	Shapa kha na nomoshok u joiatu, diktak a nangni hi moshok kha nangnih u joi.
43008037	Abraham chicha hai nangnih u kha kejet, inia that rang kiei hi nangnatawk uh, ajarla kawchawng kha na nangni dieng mun niei mak.
43008038	Kiei na kapa dieng a kirumuksha kha kiriei inih, khashole nangniawm nangpa ah put ah nangirangaisha u kha nangithaw u inih.”
43008039	Khan mashang a ama dieng ruti uh, “Abraham kha kapa u inih.” Jesu na amani dieng ruti, “Nangni hi Abraham nai hai kha nangni u joiatu, Abraham na iruthaw kha nangruthaw u rangnih.
43008040	Inia Pathien ah put ah kirujet adik nangni dieng ariei miring, kiei hi tun that rang nangnatawk uh. Abraham na iruthaw kha hi nimak.
43008041	Nangpa u na iruthaw kha nangithaw u inih.” Khajarkhan ama dieng ruti uh, “Kieini hi rejai nai nih u mi`ing. Kapa u `khat kieniei uh. Ama kha Pathien inih.”
43008042	Khajarkhan Jesu na amani dieng ruti, “Pathien kha nangpa u runih joiala, numnangnurupok u rangnih, ajarla kiei hi Pathien ah put ah ajong a hin ka`awm; kinining a ajong nimi`ing, inia ama na inojongtir inih.
43008043	Ijar a kiriei hi nangijet boi u maw nih? Ajarla kawchawng kha loi ngam u makche.
43008044	Nangni hi nangpa u diabol ah put ah nangnih uh, khan nangpa u ditrekhe kha nangthaw jawt uh. Ama kha kung ah put ah mithat miring runih, khan adik khan ruding mak, ajarla ama dieng adik kha awm pe mak. Mielieshiei thaw phakhan, ama awmchantak ah put ah iriei inih, ajarla ama kha mielieishiei miring le mielieishiei apa kha inih.
43008045	Kiei na adik kieriei jarkhan, takanawshawn u makche.
43008046	Nang kar ua tu na maw munu niei, tia anakhin rang awm? Adik kha kieriei joiala, ijar a takaninawshawn boi u maw nih?
43008047	Pathien ah put ah miring kha na Pathien chawng hai kha rangai. Nangirangaina boi u ajartu, nangni hi Pathien ah put ah nih u makche.”
43008048	Jihudi hai na mashang a ruti uh, “Nang hi Samaria miring nangnih, khan raikho nangniei kiti u hin dik u mi`ing maw?”
43008049	Jesu na rumashang, “Raikho niei mi`ing, inia kapa kha richit kepek, khan nangni na kiei hi richit nepeh u makche.
43008050	Khanikengta kulurna kha tawk mi`ing. Atawkpa le chawngshat miring `khat awm.
43008051	Nangni dieng diktak a kiriei inih, tukhat na kawchawng kha rung joiatu, kumshawt a thitna kha muhet naw nih.”
43008052	Khajarkhan Jihudi hai na ama dieng ruti uh, “Raikho nangniei, iti hi tun kejet u joi! Abraham kha ruthi joi, khan thiempulien haiawm ruthi u joi. Khanikengta nangti, ‘Kawchawng arung mi kha na thitna tuidan kha shuken a en naw nih.’
43008053	Ruthi kapa u Abrahamnek a aliendet maw nangnih? Thiempulien hai kha`awm ruthi joi. Nang nining a ih kanih nangiti maw nih?”
43008054	Jesu na rumashang, “Kibibing a kumulurna joiatu, kulurna kha iawm nimak. Kapathien nangiti u kapatak kha na inumulur inih.
43008055	Ama kha jet u makche, inia kiei na ama kha kejet. ‘Kiei na ama kha jet mi`ing’ kiti joiatu, nangni ang a mielieishiei thawpa kha kanih rangnih. Inia ama kha kejet a ama chawng kha kirung inih.
43008056	Nangpa u Abraham na kinikho muknathiei rang, ningrungai pe. Ama na rumuk a ningrungai pe.”
43008057	Jihudi hai na ama dieng ruti uh, “Nang kum shawm rahngshe shok makchelai, Abraham kha nangrumuk maw khan?”
43008058	Jesu na amani dieng ruti, “Nangni dieng diktak a kiriei inih, Abraham ruawm mala khan Kiei Kanih.”
43008059	Khajarkhan ama kha dengna rang, lung rushar u joi. Inia rurethe a Jesu na riethiengmun ah put ah rushe joi, khan mi hai kar a rulut a khatikhan rupang joi.
43009001	Jesu na rupang le roroi a, shok ah put ah mikchaw miring `khat rumuk.
43009002	Akhaichawi hai na ama dieng rurawdawn uh, “Rabbi, mikchawlam a jong shok ama hi, tu na munu iruthaw maw nih, ama na maw ninawkle unulepa hai na munu iruthaw maw nih?”
43009003	Jesu na rumashang, “Ama na`awm, khan unulepa hai na`awm munu ruthaw u mak, inia ama dieng Pathien chon hai kha larnathiei rang a inih.
43009004	Nishun a nojongtirpa chon hai kha kithawngir rang a inih, jan hawng phakhan, tute na chon thaw ngam naw nih.
43009005	Manmieshie shung a kaw`awmlai hin, manmieshie mieivar kha kanih.”
43009006	Khatikhan ruriei shole, pieipak kha rumiechiei a, khan iemiechiei kha le piei kha rupawr, khan mikchawpa mik khan chir kha runawt pe.
43009007	Khan ama dieng ruti, “She tana Siloam tuikhur khawn vak rushuk roh” (Mahi nemele le Rutir, tina inih). Khajarkhan rushe a vak rushuk joi, khan ama na muklam a vak kir joi.
43009008	Khajarkhan ringchangpui, khan matieng a mikchawlai a rumuh hai kha na ruti uh, “Hipa hi shutlam a khutdawpa kha nimak maw?”
43009009	Shik miring hai na ruti uh, “Ama kha keng.” Inia shik miring hai na ruti uh, “Ama le ra`ang keng.” Ama na ruti, “Kieitak kanih.”
43009010	Khajarkhan ama dieng ruti uh, “Itia nang mik hai kha na imuk maw nih joi?”
43009011	Ama na mashang a ruti, “Jesu iti miring `khat na piei miechier a kimik hai hin nanawt pe, khan kiei dieng nuruti, ‘Siloam tuikhur khawn she roh, khan vak rushuk roh.’ Khan kurushe a kavak rushuk shole, kimuk nih joi.”
43009012	Ama dieng rurawdawn uh, “Ama kha ih ah maw awm joi?” Ama na ruti, “Jet mi`ing.”
43009013	Matienglai a mikchawpa kha Pharisee hai dieng ruchawi u joi.
43009014	Jesu na chir rukon a imik hai irumumuk kha Sabbath nikho runih.
43009015	Khajarkhan mik irumukna dan kha Pharisee hai na ama dieng rurawdawn u ret. Amani dieng ruti, “Kimik hai hin chir nanawt pe, khan kurushuk a kimuk inih.”
43009016	Pharisee eshen na ruti uh, “Hi miring hi Pathien ah put ah nimak, ajarla Sabbath nikho kha rung mak.” Shik miring hai na ruti uh, “Itia maw munu miring `khat na hihai jetna hi thaw ngam nih?” Khajarkhan amani dieng reshenna ruawm.
43009017	Khashole mikchawpa dieng rutiret uh, “Nang mik nurumumuk jarkhan, ama chung a imaw nangti?” Makhan ama na ruti, “Ama hi thiempulien `khat inih.”
43009018	Khashole Jihudi hai na imik ruchaw pe a irumukpa nulepa kha rukoi pe u masheng, ama kha mik ruchaw pe a irumuk inih, iti kha takarushawn u mak.
43009019	Khan amani kha rurawdawn uh, “Mikchawlam a shok nangiti u ama hi nang shapa u maw nih? Itia tun imuk maw nih?”
43009020	Unulepa kha na amani dieng rumashang uh, “Ama hi kashapa u inih, khan mikchawlam a shok inih, iti kejet uh.
43009021	Inia itia tun imuk maw nih, ninawkle tu na imik hai hi imumuk maw nih, iti hi jet u mi`ing. Achang keng joi, ama kha rawdawn u roh. Ama chungchanga nining a riei rangnih.”
43009022	Unulepa kha na hitihin a iruti kha Jihudi hai kha ichih u jar a inih. Ajarla tukhat na ama kha Christa inih, tia rophong joiatu, synagogue ah put ah nawt rang a inih, iti hi Jihudi hai rawjawtna inih.
43009023	Khajarkhan a inih unulepa na “Achang keng joi, ama kha rawdawn u roh” irutina u kha.
43009024	Khajarkhan voidi changna a mikchaw miringpa kha rukoi ua ama dieng ruti uh, “Pathien kha mapak roh; hi miring hi munu miring inih, iti kejet u joi.”
43009025	Khan ama na mashang a ruti, “Munu miring anih anih boi kiei jet mi`ing, kijet khatte tu awm, makhala kimikruchaw joiawm, tuntu kiei kumuk joi.”
43009026	Inia ama dieng rutir u ret, “Nang dieng imaw nuruthaw pe? Nang mik hai kha itia inurumumuk maw nih?”
43009027	Amani dieng rumashang, “Nangni dieng kururieisho joi, narangai pe u makche. Ijar a nangirangai jawtthep u maw nih? Ama khawchawi hai achang jawt maw nangnih uh?”
43009028	Khashole erawh a ama dieng ruti uh, “Nang keng ama khaichawi anih, inia kieini tu Moses khaichawi hai kha kanih u keng.
43009029	Moses dieng Pathien na ruriei, iti kha kejet uh, inia hipa hi tu khoshekawt ah put ah ajong maw nih, iti jet u mi`ing.”
43009030	Miringpa kha na mashang a amani dieng ruti, “Khoshekawt ah put ah ajong maw nih, iti nangijet boi u hi shindawngroi `khat inih, khanikengta kimik hai hi namadam pe joi!
43009031	Khan Pathien na munu miring hai inik kha rangai pe mak, inia Pathien achih miring le khan ama mulungmining athaw miring na inik kha irangai pe inih.
43009032	Shok ah put ah mikchaw mik hai hi tukhat na imawlawng pe, iti hi rong put ah put ah jet boi inih.
43009033	Hi miring hi Pathien ah put ah runih joi nawkatu, iawm ruthaw ngam naw nih.”
43009034	Amani na mashang a ama dieng ruti uh, “Nang hi munu kholok le ashok miring nangnih, kieini hi ninuruchuk u maw nih?” Khan ama kha runawt u joi.
43009035	Ama kha nawt joi, iti kha Jesu na rujet. Ama kha rumuk phakhan, ama dieng ruti, “Pathien Shapa kha takamawnangshawn?”
43009036	Ama na mashang a ruti, “Oja, takakawshawnnathiei rang, ama kha tumaw nih?”
43009037	Jesu na ama dieng ruti, “Ama kha nangmuk joi. Ama kha nang le chawng arieipa hi inih.”
43009038	Ama na ruti, “Takakawshawn joi, Aw Pumi!” Khan chubairubawk joi.
43009039	Jesu na ama dieng ruti, “Amuh boi hai na mukna rang, khan amuh hai na mikchaw changna rang, kiei hi manmieshie hin chawngshat ajong kanih.”
43009040	Ama le ruawm Pharisee eshen na hihaihi rujet u phakhan, ama dieng ruti uh, “Kieini hiawm mikchaw maw kanih uh?”
43009041	Jesu na amani dieng ruti, “Nang mik u kha ruchaw a tu, munu runiei u naw tinih, inia tun ‘Kumuk’ nangti uh. Khajarkhan nang munu u kha awm lai.
43010001	“Diktak a nangni dieng kiriei inih, tunita`awm kengam roko mawkawt ah hawng lut boi, inia shik `khat tieng ah hawng ka, ama kha murushah le minieisho miring kha inih.
43010002	Khania mawkawt ah hawng lut miring kha kengamroi kha inih.
43010003	Mawkawt rungpa kha na ama rang mawlawng pe, khan kengam hai kha na ama hesho kha rangai pe uh. Khan ama kengamtak hai kha iriming a koi a lamkai pe.
43010004	Ekengamtak hai kha hoi phakhan, ama na amani maton ah lawn, khan kengam hai kha na ama anu kha jui uh, ajarla amani na ehesho kha jet pe uh.
43010005	Milak kha shukjui a jui u naw nih, inia ama ah put ah tan u rangnih, ajarla milak hai hesho kha jet pe u mak.”
43010006	Mahi chawngmeloi hi Jesu na ruriei, inia amani dieng imaw iriei, iti kha rujet u mak.
43010007	Khajarkhan Jesu na amani dieng rurieiret, “Diktak a nangni dieng kiriei inih, kiei hi kengam hai rang a mawkawt kha kanih.
43010008	Kamatieng a ava kholok kha murushah le minieisho hai kha nih uh, inia kengam hai kha na amani chawng hai kha rurangai pe u mak.
43010009	Kiei hi mawkawt kha kanih. Tunita`awm kajar a vak lut joiatu, kiei na shan rang kanih, khan eshena mun rikip a shakhoina kha muk rangnih.
43010010	Murushah kha na murukna rang le thatna rang, khan mathangna rang niboia, va mak. Khania amani na ringna kha rutukthep a mukna rang a ajong kanih.
43010011	“Kiei Kengamroi atha kha kanih. Kengamroi atha kha na kengam hai rang iringkho ipek inih.
43010012	Inia kengamroi nih boi, moroi miring kha na kengam hai kha atatak nit boi jarkhan, melang vat phakhan, kengam hai kha mathan a atan. Khan melang kha na amani kha ushur, khan kengam hai kha chaiachai a atet.
43010013	Moroi miring kha na atan, ajarla ama kha moroi miring inih. Khan kengam hai rang khan tenreh mak.
43010014	“Kiei Kengamroi atha kha kanih. Kekengam hai kha kejet, khan kiei hi amani na nejet uh.
43010015	Kapa na inejettak hi ang a, kapa kha kejet, khan kengam hai rang khan kiringkho kepek.
43010016	Hi roko shung a awm boi kengam hai shik kienieilai. Amani kha`awm kivakchawingir rang a inih. Khan amani na kehesho kha rangai u rangnih. Khajarkhan kengam hawi `khat le kengamroi `khat awm rangnih.
43010017	Koloinathep rang, kiringkho hi kipek inih, hijarhin kapa na numinopok inih.
43010018	Kiei ah put ah tute na loi mak, inia kinining a kipek inih. Pekna rang cham kieniei, khan loinaret rangawm cham kieniei. Mahi chawngpek hi kapa ah put ah kiruman inih.”
43010019	Hihai chawng jar hin Jihudi hai rureshenthep uh.
43010020	Amani kar a tampui na ruti uh, “Raikho ieniei a vet joi. Ijar a ama chawng kha nangirangai u maw nih?”
43010021	Shik `khat na ruti uh, “Hihaihi raikho na ichutna miring chawngriei nimak. Itia maw raikho na mikchaw miring mik hai kha mumuk ngam nih?”
43010022	Khan Jerusalem ah Inlona Rachang hawng shok joi. Makha pha kha phabi runih.
43010023	Jesu na riethiengmun ah Solomon tomai`in khan rulawn a ruawm.
43010024	Khajarkhan Jihudi hai na ama kha ruroko ua ama dieng ruti uh, “Idawrshe a kieini hi awkchak a ninatet u maw nih? Christa kha nangnih a tu, madanghet a nieriei u roh.”
43010025	Jesu na amani dieng rumashang, “Nangni dieng kururiei joi, inia takanawshawn u makche. Kapa riming a kithaw hai kha na kuchungchanga kungachang inih.
43010026	Inia takashawn u makche, ajarla nangni dieng a kiruriei kha ang a, kekengam hai kar khan jaw u makche.
43010027	Kekengam hai kha na kehesho kha rangai uh. Amani kha kejet, khan amani na nujui uh.
43010028	Amani dieng kumshawt ringna kha kepek, khan amani kha shukthang a thang u lai naw nih. Khan tute na kukhut ah put ah nasho ngam naw nih.
43010029	Kiei dieng a anapeh kapa kha ih kholoknek a liendet. Khan tute na kapa khut ah put ah sho ngam naw nih.
43010030	Kapa le kiei hi khatte kanih uh.”
43010031	Khajarkhan Jihudi hai na ama kha lung le dengna rang, lung rushar u ret joi.
43010032	Jesu na amani dieng rumashang, “Kapa ah put ah chon atha tampui kunumumuk u joi. Khahai chon kar hin ih ang kha jar a maw lung le ninedengna u rang a?”
43010033	Jihudi hai na mashang a ama dieng ruti uh, “Chon atha jar a kinedeng u rang a nimak, inia mieshietna jar a inih. Ajarla miring `khat nangnih, inia nang nining a Pathien nangrasha.”
43010034	Jesu na amani dieng rumashang, “Nang Dan ua irumiejiek boi maw nih? ‘Kiei na kuruti, “Pathien hai kha nangnih uh.” ’
43010035	Pathien chawng jongna miring hai dieng pathien hai, tia la (Miejiek kha koi ngam naw nih),
43010036	Apa na iruriethiengsha le manmieshie shung a inojongtir, kiei na ‘Pathien Shapa kanih,’ kiti jar a, ‘Pathien nangmieshiet,’ niniti u maw nih?
43010037	Kapa chon hai hi kawthaw joi nawkatu, takanawshawn u naw roh.
43010038	Inia kawthaw joiatu, takanangnawshawn u joi nawk awm, chon hai kha takashawn u roh. Khanitatu kapa na kiei dieng awm, khan kiei na ama dieng ka`awm, iti kha nangjet ua takanangnawshawn u rangnih.”
43010039	Khashole ama kha shurna rang, rutawk u ret, inia amani khut ah put ah rurekhe joi.
43010040	John na akhat changna a baptisma pek a ruawmna mun, Jordan vara tieng takthar a rushe a makhan ruawm joi.
43010041	Mi tampui na ama dieng va ua ruti uh, “John na jetna iawm ruthaw mak, inia John na mahi miring jar a iruriei rikip kha adik inih.”
43010042	Makha mun khan mi tampui na ama kha takarushawn uh.
43011001	Khan Mary le uliennu Martha awmna kho Bethany khan Lazarus iti miring `khat ana a ruawm.
43011002	Pumi kha rieipartui irunawt a eke hai kha asham le iruno pe ama kha mahi Mary hi inih. Anaipangpa Lazarus kha runa pe.
43011003	Khajarkhan uliennu hai kha na Jesu dieng chawng mawchawi a ruti uh, “Pumi, enro, numnangipok ama kha ana a awm joi.”
43011004	Rujet phakhan, Jesu na ruti, “Mahi natna hi thitnathiei nimak, inia Pathien lurna rang a inih, khan mahi jar hin Pathien Shapa kha mulurna rang a inih.”
43011005	Jesu na Martha, anaipangnu, khan Lazarus kha numrupok.
43011006	Khajarkhan, ana kha rujet joiawm, ruawmna mun khan ni `di ruawmlai.
43011007	Makha shole khaichawi hai dieng ruti, “Judea ah she u ret rawi.”
43011008	Akhaichawi hai na ama dieng ruti uh, “Rabbi, Jihudi hai na tuntun hin nang kha lung le deng rang, natawk uh. Khawn sheret rang a nangiti maw nih?”
43011009	Jesu na rumashang, “Nikho `khat a nidan shawmlieidi awm nimak maw? Tukhat na nishun a lawn a tu bakna niei naw nih, ajarla mahi manmieshie mieivar hi imuk inih.
43011010	Inia tukhat na jan a lawn a tu bakna niei rangnih, ajarla ama dieng mieivar kha awm pe mak.”
43011011	Ama na hihaihi ruriei shole, amani dieng ruti, “Nawlawm u Lazarus kha miei joi, inia meche rang, kiei she rang kanih.”
43011012	Akhaichawi hai na ruti uh, “Pumi, amiei nitatu atha rang keng.”
43011013	Khanikengta, Jesu na ama thitna chungchanga iruti inih, inia amani na tu aja a shawimuchum `khat a rumining uh.
43011014	Khashole Jesu na amani dieng madanghet a ruriei pe joi, “Lazarus kha thi joi.
43011015	Kiei na khawn kuruawm boi kha nangni rangbak kiningai, makha nangni na takanangshawnna u rang a inih. Nitjoiawm ama dieng she u rawi.”
43011016	Didymus iruti u Thomas na akhaichawi chang pui hai dieng ruti, “Kieiniawm ama le thitna rang, she u rawi.”
43011017	Jesu na vat phakhan, Lazarus na than shung ah ni mili ruawm kha vak jet joi.
43011018	Bethany kha Jerusalem ah put ah majin `di dawr inih.
43011019	Anaipangpa u chungchanga Mary le Martha maw`awi rang, Jihudi hai tampui vak ruchun uh.
43011020	Khan Martha na Jesu ava kha rujet `le, ama dieng rushe a vak rumuk pui, inia Mary tu in ah rushuh a ruawm.
43011021	Martha na Jesu dieng ruti, “Pumi, hin nangruawm a la, kanaipangpa khaw ruthi naw nih.
43011022	Khania tunawm Pathien dieng nanginik kha Pathien na nang dieng nepek rangnih, iti hi kejet.”
43011023	Jesu na ama dieng ruti, “Nang naipangpa khaw thoiret rang keng.”
43011024	Martha na ama dieng ruti, “Nikho dawng thoiretna khan, ama na thoiret rangnih, iti kejet.”
43011025	Jesu na ama dieng ruriei, “Kiei hi thoiretna le ringna kha kanih. Kiei hi takanashawn miring hai kha na thit joiawm ring rangnih.
43011026	Khan tunitjoiawm kiei dieng a aring a takanashawn mi rikip na kumshawt a thitna kha niei naw nih. Mahi takanangshawn maw?”
43011027	Ama dieng ruti, “Awh, kupumi, kiei na nang hi manmieshie a ajong Christa, Pathien Shapa kha nangnih, iti hi takakawshawn joi.”
43011028	Hihaihi ruriei shole, anaipangnu Mary kha murukte a akoi rushe a ruti, “Ojapa kha hin awm joi, khan nang kha nokoi.”
43011029	Ama na rujetphit `le, relentak a thoi a ama dieng rushe joi.
43011030	Jesu na kho khan rulut maklai, inia Martha na irumukna pui mun khan ruawmlai.
43011031	Mary na thoi a rawnawttak a rushe kha, in ah awm ama maw`awi Jihudi hai kha na rumuk u phakhan, “Thanmun ah achap she keng,” tia ama kha rujui uh.
43011032	Jesu ruawmna mun khan Mary na rushe a ama kha vak muk phakhan, ekekung a rubawklap a ama dieng ruti, “Pumi, hin nangruawm a la, kanaipangpa khaw ruthi naw nih.”
43011033	Khajarkhan Jesu na ama achap le ivatpui Jihudi hai achap kha rumuk phakhan, ajeng a mulung rushit pe a rushaw pui.
43011034	Ama na ruti, “Ama kha khoshekawt ah maw nangreh uh?” Ama dieng ruti uh, “Pumi, va tana vak en roh.”
43011035	Jesu na ruchap.
43011036	Jihudi hai na ruti uh, “Enro, idawr a ama khaw numipok maw nih!”
43011037	Amani kar a eshen na ruti uh, “Mikchawpa mik hai mumuk mahi miring hi na Lazarus thitna boi rang chon ithaw ngam boi rang a maw nih?”
43011038	Khashole Jesu na mulung runat puiret jarkhan, than khan rushe joi. Makha koh runih, khan makha lung le rumangai uh.
43011039	Jesu na ruti, “Lung hi melet u roh.” Athipa uliennu Martha na ama dieng ruti, “Pumi, manam shie rang keng joi, ajarla ni mili nih joi.”
43011040	Jesu na ama dieng ruti, “Takanangshawn joiatu, Pathien lurna kha nangmuk rangnih, tia kinururiei boi maw nih?”
43011041	Khajarkhan athipa rehna lung mawkawt kha rumelet uh. Khan Jesu na chung tieng ruen a ruti, “Kapa nangnururangai pe jarkhan kanamapak.
43011042	Nangnarangai pe jawnjai, iti hi kejet. Khan kiei hi ninojongtir inih, iti hi inoroko mipui hi na takashawnna rangbak a kiruriei inih.”
43011043	Hihaihi ruriei shole, he rashangtak a rura`ai, “Lazarus, vai vak shok roh.”
43011044	Ukhut le ke hai kha ponramasha le rokhop, khan amai kha ponte le rejemlam a athipa kha vai vak shok joi. Jesu na amani dieng ruti, “Ama kha thut u tana mawlawn u roh.”
43011045	Khajarkhan Mary dieng ava Jihudi hai kar a mi tampui na Jesu na ithaw hai kha rumuk u`le, ama kha takarushawn uh.
43011046	Inia eshen na Pharisee hai dieng rushe ua Jesu na iruthaw hai kha vak riei uh.
43011047	Khajarkhan thiempu ulien hai le Pharisee hai na Sanhedrin ruchunna runiei uh. Amani na ruti uh, “Imaw nithaw u rang? Hi miring hi na jetna tampui thaw joi.
43011048	Hitihin ama hi nemeshe u joiatu, mi kholok na ama kha takashawn u rangnih joi. Khan Rome miring hai na va u ning, tia nawawmna u mun le nuphung u hi nasho u rangnih joi.”
43011049	Amani hai kar a akhat, kha kum a thiempu rashang, Caiaphas na amani dieng ruti, “Nangni iawm jet u makche.
43011050	Miningawm mining u makche, makhala phung kholok athang rangnek a miring `khat vanoi ruhut a athi kha athadet inih.”
43011051	Mahi nining a iriei nimak, inia kha kum a thiempu rashang `khat chang a, phung ruhut a Jesu kha athingir rang a rasham inih, iti kha irurieimasha inih.
43011052	Khan phung ranga nimak a achairak a awm Pathien naite hai kha `khat a vak chawina rang a inih.
43011053	Khajarkhan khani ah put ah ama kha itia maw that rang, tia chawng rurashak u joi.
43011054	Khajarkhan Jesu na Jihudi hai kar a malangsheng a rulawnlai mak. Inia ramthim dieng ah awm ram `khat, Ephraim iti kho khan rushe joi. Khan kha mun khan akhaichawi hai le ruawm joi.
43011055	Khan Jihudi hai Rakanna kha hawng nai joi, khan mi tampui na kha ram ah put ah Rakanna mala a nining ua riethiengna rang, Jerusalem ah ruhawng uh.
43011056	Amani na riethiengmun ah ruding u le roroia, Jesu kha rutawk ua khatlekhat dieng ruti uh, “Imaw nangmining uh, rohoi hin ajonghet boi rang a maw nih?”
43011057	Khan thiempu ulien hai le Pharisee hai na chawng rupek u joi, makhala tukhat na ama awmna jet joiatu, ama kha shurnathiei rang, mejet rang a inih.
43012001	Rakanna rang ni `ruk mala khan, Jesu na Bethany ah rushe. Makha ama na athi ah put ah irumothoi, Lazarus ruawmna kha inih.
43012002	Kha mun khan amani na bunekna `khat runiei pui uh. Khan Lazarus kha ama le tebol ah buneh hai kar a akhat runih. Khan Martha na chon ruthaw pe uh.
43012003	Khashole Mary na nard riethienghiei manrawp rieipartui litre khoidawr hi ruloi a, Jesu ke khan runawt pe. Khan ama ke kha asham le runo pe. Rieipartui manamhoi kha na in kha rujeibieng.
43012004	Inia akhaichawi hai kar a akhat, ama ajor rang a, Simon shapa Judas Iscariot na ruti,
43012005	“Shara hai dieng pekna rang, ijar a mahi rieipartui hi dinari rajathum a jorthiei boi maw nih?”
43012006	Mahi shara hai kha ire a iruti nimak, inia ama kha murushah runih. Khan shierkawk ah iruthong hai kha ama rang ruloi jawnjai a ruawm inih.
43012007	Jesu na ruti, “Ama kha bieh u naw roh, kurukhumna nikho rang a itet nih joi.
43012008	Ajarla shara hai kha nangawm pui jawnjai uh, inia kiei tu nawawm pui jawnjai u makche.”
43012009	Jihudi mipui hawi `khat na ama kha makhan awm, iti rujet u phakhan, Jesu ranga kha niboia, ama na athi ah put ah irumothoi Lazarus kha`awm aen rushe uh.
43012010	Khan thiempu ulien hai na Lazarus kha`awm thatna rang, chawng rurashak u joi.
43012011	Ajarla ama jar a Jihudi tampui na ruhiei ua Jesu kha taka`irushawn u inih.
43012012	Jing tieng hin rohoi ah ajong mipui alientak `khat na Jesu kha Jerusalem ah va joi, iti kha rujet.
43012013	Naw bak hai kha rurak ua ama rumukna pui rang, rushe uh; khan amani na rura`ai uh, “Hosanna! ‘PUMI riming a ajong ama kha rahvantha inih!’ Ama hi Israel hai Reng kha inih!”
43012014	Jesu na ranngam acha remet `khat rumuk a, ama chung ah rushuh. Ajarla hitihin rumiejiek,
43012015	“Chih naw roh, Aw Zion shanu. Enro, nang Rengpa kha ranngam acha remet chung ah shuh a jong joi.”
43012016	Arapa khan akhaichawi hai na rujet u mak, inia Jesu kha rumulur phakhan, irumiejiek hai kha ama chungchanga inih, khan ama dieng iruthaw inih, iti kha rumininghep uh.
43012017	Khajarkhan Lazarus kha than ah put ah irukoi a athi ah put ah irumothoilai a irurawtawp pui mipui kha na kungruchang uh.
43012018	Khan mahi jetna iruthaw kha irujet u hi na`awm inih, mipui na ama rumuk pui rushena u kha.
43012019	Khajarkhan Pharisee hai na nining ua ama dieng ruti uh, “Iawm man u lai makme, enro manmieshie na ama anu kha juisho joi.”
43012020	Khan rohoi a chubaibawk ruhawng hai kar khan Greek haiawm ruawm uh.
43012021	Galilee ah awm Bethsaida miring Philip dieng va ua ruti uh, “Oja, Jesu kha kumuk jawt uh.”
43012022	Philip na Andrew dieng she a ruriei, khan takthar a Andrew le Philip na Jesu dieng ruriei uh.
43012023	Jesu na mashang a amani dieng ruti, “Miring Shapa lurna rang a pha kha jong joi.
43012024	Diktak a nangni dieng kiriei inih, gehu `khat na pieipak ah cho a thi nawkatu, ama kha khatte a awm, inia ithi a tu, ara tampui moshok.
43012025	Iringkho numapoh ama kha na makha mathang rangnih, khan mahi manmieshie hin iringkho amumak ama kha na mahi kumshawt ringna rang atet rangnih.
43012026	Kochon athaw miring kha na nujui rosho, khan kaw`awmna khan keshepding kha`awm awm rangnih. Khan tukhat na kochon kha thaw joiatu, kapa na richit pek rangnih.
43012027	“Tun karatha hi shaw joi, khan imaw kiti rang? ‘Kapa, mahi pha ah put ah nashan roh.’ Inia mahi rentuk rang hin a hi pha hin a kiei ajong kanih.
43012028	Kapa, nang riming kha mulur rang roh.” Khashole ravan ah put ah he `khat jong a ruti, “Kumulur joi, khan mulurret rang kanih.”
43012029	Khakawt ah ading mipui kha na rujet ua mahi khomelek keng, ruti uh.” Shik `khat na ruti uh, “Ravantir na ama dieng chawngiriei keng joi.”
43012030	Jesu na mashang a amani dieng ruti, “Hesho hi kiei rang a jong nimak, inia nangni rangbak a ajong inih.
43012031	Manmieshie chawngshatna kha tun a pha hi nih joi. Tun manmieshie rampopa kha nawt rangnih joi.
43012032	Khan kiei hi rieliei ah put ah nalawm phakhan, mi kholok kha kiei dieng pawt rang kanih.”
43012033	Hi irutina hi itia athi rang a maw nih iti mejetna rang a inih.
43012034	Mipui na ama dieng rumashang uh, “Christa na kumshawt a awm rangnih, tia Dan ah put ah kurujet uh. Itia ‘Miring Shapa hi ilawmngir rang a inih’ nangiti maw nih? Mahi Miring Shapa hi tumaw nih?”
43012035	Jesu na amani dieng ruti, “Mieivar hi nangni le shawtbawt awm rangnih. Ajing na nubukna boi rang, mieivar kha nangniei u lai hin lawn u roh. Khan ajing a lawn miring kha na ih ah lawn maw nih, iti jet mak.
43012036	Mieivar kha nangniei u lai hin mieivar naite hai kha nangchangna u rang, mieivar kha takashawn u roh.” Hihaihi ruriei shole, Jesu na rushe a amani ah put ah rubi joi.
43012037	Amani maikung a jetna tampui ruthaw a`awm ama kha takarushawn u mak.
43012038	Mahi Isaiah thiempulien chawng kha hawng rupumna rang a inih. Ama na iruriei khala: “Pumi, nawchawngriei u khan, tu na maw takarushawn joi? Khan tu dieng maw PUMI banbo kha rophong joi?”
43012039	Khajarkhan amani na takarushawn ngam u mak, ajarla Isaiah na rurieiret:
43012040	“Amani mik hai kha na mukna boi rang le amani mulung a jetna boi rang, amani mik hai kha imijing pe joi. Khan amani mulung kha michimmashak pe joi. Khanawkatu vak kir ua kamadam u rangnih.”
43012041	Ama lurna kha rumuk a ama chungchanga ruriei phakhan, Isaiah na hihaihi iruti inih.
43012042	Khanikengta rampo hai tampuishe na`awm ama kha takarushawn uh. Inia Pharisee hai jar a amani na rurophong u mak. Khanawkatu synagogue ah put ah irunawt u rang a inih.
43012043	Ajarla miring hai ah put ah mapakna kha Pathien ah put ah mapaknanek a numrupok uh.
43012044	Jesu na ra`ai a ruti, “Kiei hi takanashawn miring kha kiei hi taka`inawshawn nimak, inia nojongtirpa kha taka`ishawn inih.
43012045	Khan kiei namuh miring kha na nojongtirpa kha imuk inih.
