43012046	Kiei hi takanashawn mi rikip na ajing a awmna boi rang, manmieshie mieivar `khat a ajong kanih.
43012047	“Tukhat na kawchawng hai kha rung joi nawkawm, ama chung a kiei na chawngshat mi`ing. Ajarla kiei na manmieshie chung a chawngshat ajong nimi`ing, inia manmieshie hi ashan rang a ajong kanih.
43012048	Kiei hi anada le kawchawng aloi boi miring chung a chawngshat rang akhat awm: kirurieisha chawngtak kha na Nikho dawng khan chawngshat pe rangnih.
43012049	Ajarla kinining ah put ah kiruriei nimak, inia nojongtir kapa ama na kiriei rang a chung a chawnginurupek inih.
43012050	Khan ama chawngpek kha kumshawt ringna inih, iti kha kejet. Khajarkhan kapa na kiei dieng irurieitak kha ang a, kiei na`awm kiriei inih.”
43013001	Rakanna rohoi malatak khan Jesu na manmieshie hi mathan a apa dieng hawngna rang a pha kha jong joi, iti kha rujet. Manmieshie ah awm ama tatak hai kha rupumping a numrupok joi.
43013002	Tun janbu runek u lai khan diabol na Simon shapa Judas Iscariot mulung shung a ama kha jorna rang, mulungmining rupekmasha joi.
43013003	Apa na ama khut chung a ih kholok irupek, Pathien ah put ah ajong, khan Pathien dieng ahawng rang a kha Jesu na rujet.
43013004	Janbu nekna ah put ah ama na ruthoi a opon rieshiei kha atet a pontete kha loi a kawng ah ruverep joi.
43013005	Khan thingkheng ah tui kha rushung a akhaichawi hai ke rushuk ruput joi. Khan awkawng a iruverep pontete kha le runo pe joi.
43013006	Simon Peter dieng vat phakhan, Peter na Jesu dieng ruti, “Pumi, keke nanginurushuk pe rang a maw nih?”
43013007	Jesu na mashang a ama dieng ruti, “Nang dieng kithawtak hi tun hin jet naw tinih, inia nuk a nangjet rangnih.”
43013008	Peter na ama dieng ruti, “Keke hi shukrushuk a nurushuk pethiei naw tinih.” Jesu na ama dieng rumashang, “Nang ke kunurushuk pe nawkatu, nang hi kiei le tak `khat changna kha niei makche.”
43013009	Simon Peter na ama dieng ruti, “Pumi, keke ranga hi niboia, kukhut hai le kulu hiawm nurushuk pe roh.”
43013010	Jesu na ama dieng ruti, “Tui robosha miring kha, eke hai ranga niboia, rushuk rang rangai mak, ajarla lawpsheng a riethiengsho joi. Nangni nangriethieng u joi, inia nang lawpsheng u riethieng tu nimaklai.”
43013011	Ajarla ama ajor rang a miring kha rujet jarkhan, “Nang lawpsheng u riethieng tu nimaklai” iruti inih.
43013012	Amani ke hai kha rurushuk pe shole, opon rieshiei kha loi a tebol khan vak shuret a amani dieng ruti, “Nangni dieng a kithawsha hai kha nangjet u maw?
43013013	Oja le Pumi, tia nangnokoi uh, makha adik inih, ajarla makha kiei kanih.
43013014	Nang Pumi u le nang Oja u kiei na nang ke u hai kha kunurushuk pe u joiatu, nangniawm khatlekhat ke hai kha nangirushuk u rang a kha nangiton u inih.
43013015	Ajarla nangni dieng kithaw hi ang a nangithaw u rang a endar `khat nangni dieng kipekmasha inih.
43013016	Diktak a nangni dieng kiriei inih, shok kha upuminek a liendet mak, khan itir ama kha atirpanek a liendet mak.
43013017	Hihaihi nangjet ua nangthaw u joiatu, rahvanmuh miring kha nangnih u joi.
43013018	“Nang lawpsheng u chungchanga kiriei nimak. Kimadansha amani kha kejet, inia Miejiek kha hawng rupumna rang a inih, makhala ‘Kiei le tan ashah miring hi na kiei hi miknamangana joi.’
43013019	“Mahi shok phakhan, kiei kanih, iti kha takanangshawnna u rang, tun kiei na shok mala a nangni dieng kiriei inih.
43013020	Diktak a nangni dieng kiriei inih, kiei na kitir miring aloi mi kha na kiei hi inoloi inih. Kiei analoi miring kha na nojongtirpa kha iloi inih.”
43013021	Hihaihi ruriei shole, Jesu na ratha a shawna runiei a rurophong, “Diktak a nangni dieng kiriei inih, nang kar ua akhat na kiei hi nojor rangnih joi.”
43013022	Khajarkhan tu chungchanga iti maw nih, iti mulung rakhana le roroia akhaichawi hai kha na khatlekhat dieng rure`en uh.
43013023	Jesu na numipok akhaichawi hai kar a akhat na ama kha rungai`ir a ruawm.
43013024	Khajarkhan Simon Peter na, tu chungchanga iriei maw nih, iti kha rawdawnna rang, ama dieng imik rumakhapna.
43013025	Khan Jesu kha angairet a ama dieng ruti, “Pumi, tumaw nih?”
43013026	Jesu na rumashang, “Khengkam ah kinawm tanlek kipek rang a pa hi inih.” Khajarkhan tan kha khengkam khan runawm a Simon shapa Judas Iscariot dieng rupek joi.
43013027	Tanlek kha ruloi shole, Satan na ama dieng rulut joi. Khajarkhan Jesu na ama dieng ruti, “Nangithaw rang a chon kha relentak a thaw rang roh.”
43013028	Inia khatikhan ama dieng iruti kha tebol ah ashuh miring tute na rujet mak.
43013029	Ajarla eshen na Judas kha shierkawk rak miring nit jarkhan, Jesu na “Rohoi a rangai nieinak kha vak rawchawh roh,” ninawkle shara hai dieng peknathiei rang a iriei dan a rumining uh.
43013030	Khajarkhan tanlek kha ruloi shole, nawtshun a rushe joi. Makha jan runih.
43013031	Ama na rushe shole, Jesu na ruriei, “Tun Miring Shapa kha mulur joi, khan ama dieng Pathien na lurna niei joi.
43013032	Pathien na ama dieng lurna niei joiatu, Pathien na`awm amatak dieng ama kha mulur rangnih, khan ama kha mulurrelen rangnih joi.
43013033	“Naite hai, pha bawngte nangni le awm rang kanilai, khan kiei hi nangnatawk u rangnih. Khana Jihudi hai dieng kiruti kha ang a, ‘Keshena rang a mun khan nangni va ngam u naw tinih.’ Khajarkhan tun nangni dieng kiriei hi inih.
43013034	“Nangni dieng chawngpek `thar kenepek uh, makhala nangni khatlekhat numropoh u roh. Khan kiei na nangni numkinopok u hi ang a, nangni khatlekhat numropoh u roh.
43013035	Nangni na khatlekhat numnangropoh u joiatu, mi kholok na kakhaichawi hai kha nangnih uh, iti kha jet u rangnih.”
43013036	Simon Peter na ama dieng ruti, “Pumi, khoshekawt ah she rang a maw nangnih?” Jesu na ama dieng rumashang, “Keshena rang a mun khan, tun nujui ngam naw tinih. Inia nuk a nangnujui ngam rangnih.”
43013037	Peter na ama dieng ruti, “Pumi, ithaw tun kinujui ngam boi rang a maw nih? Nang rangbak kiringkho pek rang kanih.”
43013038	Jesu na ama dieng rumashang, “Kiei rang nang ringkho peh rawng maw? Diktak a nang dieng kiriei inih, voithum nangrapha masheng arkhawng na khong naw nih.
43014001	“Nang mulung mawshaw u naw roh. Pathien kha takashawn u roh, khan kiei hiawm takanawshawn u roh.
43014002	Kapa in ah awmna tampui awm. Khanitnawkatu nangni rang mun `khat rasham ahawng rang kanih, tia kunururiei u rangnih.
43014003	Khan nangni rang mun rasham kahawng joiatu, nangni kha katatak `khat a loina rang, kiei ajongret rang kanih. Makha kaw`awmna khan nangniawm nangawmna u rang a inih.
43014004	Khan kawhawngna rang a mun le lam kha nangjet uh.”
43014005	Thomas na ama dieng ruti, “Pumi, nanghawngna rang a mun kha jet u mi`ing. Itia maw lam kha jet u ning?”
43014006	Jesu na ama dieng ruriei, “Kiei hi lam, adik, khan ringna kha kanih. Tute na kajar a niboia kapa dieng hawng ngam mak.
43014007	Kiei hi nangnurujet u joiatu, kapa kha`awm nangrujet u rangnih. Tun ah put ah ama kha nangjet u joi, khan nangmuk u joi.”
43014008	Philip na ama dieng ruti, “Pumi, nangpa kha numumuk u roh, makhan kiningnih u rangnih.”
43014009	Jesu na ama dieng ruti, “Aw Philip, pha hidawr shawt a kiei le nangawm joi, inia nejet makchelai. Kiei namuh kha na kapa kha imuk inih, itia ‘Nangpa kha numumuk roh’ nangiti maw nih?
43014010	Kiei na kapa dieng ka`awm, khan kapa na kiei dieng awm, iti hi takashawn makche maw? Nang dieng kiriei chawng hai hi kinining a kiriei nimak. Inia kiei dieng a awm kapa na ama chon hai hi ithaw inih.
43014011	Kiei na kapa dieng ka`awm, khan kapa na kiei dieng awm, kiti hi takashawn u roh. Khanitnawkawm chon hai hi jar a takashawn u roh.
43014012	Diktak a nangni dieng kiriei inih, kiei takanashawn mi kha na kithaw chon hai hi thaw rangnih. Khan hihainek a aliendet kha thaw rangnih. Ajarla kapa dieng ahawng rang kanih joi.
43014013	Kapa na Shapa dieng lurnathiei rang, kiriming a nanginik u kholok kha thaw rang kanih.
43014014	Ih nitjoiawm kiriming a nangnik u joiatu, kiei na thawngir rang kanih.
43014015	“Numnangnopok uatu, kawchawngpek hai hi rung u roh.
43014016	Khan kiei na kapa dieng nik rang kanih, khan nangni rang Narashappui shik `khat nepek u rangnih. Makha ama na nangni le kumshawt a awmna rang a inih.
43014017	Mahi manmieshie na iman ngam boi Ratha adik kha inih. Ajarla manmieshie na mahi muawm muh mak, khan jetawm jet mak. Inia ama kha nangni le awm, khan jong awm rang a nitjarkhan, nangni na ama kha nangjet uh.
43014018	Nulepa boi `khat a namah u naw ning. Nangni dieng ajong rang kanih.
43014019	Pha bawngte shole tu, manmieshie na kiei hi numulai naw nih, inia nangni na tu nangnumuk u rangnih. Ajarla kiei hi aring kanih, khan nangniawm nangring u rangnih.
43014020	Kha nikho khan kiei na kapa dieng ka`awm, khan nangni na kiei dieng nangawm uh, khan kiei na nangni dieng ka`awm, iti kha nangjet u rangnih.
43014021	Kawchawngpek hai kha iniei a khahaikha arung ama kha kiei hi numnapoh miring kha inih. Khajarkhan kiei numnapoh miring kha kapa na numpok rangnih. Khan kiei na ama kha numpok rang kanih, khan ama dieng kinining a ralar rang kanih.”
43014022	Judas (Iscariot nih boi) na ama dieng ruti, “Pumi, itia nang nining a kieini dieng nangralar a manmieshie dieng ralar boi a awm rawng?”
43014023	Jesu na mashang a ama dieng ruti, “Tukhat na kiei hi numnopok a tu, kawchawng kha rung rangnih, khan kapa na ama kha numpok rangnih. Khan kieini na ama dieng va ua awmna a thaw u rang kanih.
43014024	Kiei hi numanapoh boi ama kha na kawchawng hai kha rung mak. Inia nangirangai u chawng kha katah nimak, inia kiei nojongtir kapa tah inih.
43014025	“Hihaihi nangni le kaw`awmlai a kitisha inih.
43014026	Inia kapa na kiriming a Narashappui u rang a ijongtir rang a, Ratha Riethieng kha na irikip nuruchuk u rangnih, khan nangni dieng kiruriei hai rikip kha niminingmashak u rangnih.
43014027	Lungdamna kha nangni dieng kamak joi, khan kulungdamna kha nangni dieng kenepek u joi. Manmieshie na inepek u kha ang boi a, nangni dieng kenepek u joi. Nang mulung u kha mawshaw u naw roh, khan michitawm michit u naw roh.
43014028	“ ‘Kiei ahawng a jong kir rang kanih,’ kiniti u kha nangrujet u joi. Numnangnopok u joiatu, ‘Kapa dieng ahawng rang kanih,’ kiruti jarkhan nang ningrungai u rangnih, ajarla kapa hi kieinek a liendet.
43014029	Khan oshok phakhan, takanangnawshawnna u rang, tun shok mala hin nangni dieng kirieimasha inih.
43014030	Kaishiei a nangni le chawngrieilai naw ning, ajarla manmieshie rampopa kha jong joi, khan ama na kuchung a ranak niei mak.
43014031	Inia kiei na kapa hi numkopok, iti hi manmieshie na jetna rang, kapa na kiei dieng chawnginurupek kha ang a hitihin a kithaw inih. Thoitaia hin ah put ah she u rang rawi.
43015001	“Kiei hi drakha kung adik kha kanih, khan kapa hi drakha rielienpa kha inih.
43015002	Kiei dieng a awm ara boi abak rikip kha erelem, khan ara abak rikip kha ara mupungna rang, ierielien.
43015003	Nangni dieng kirurieisha chawng jar a nangriethiengsho u joi.
43015004	Kiei dieng hin awm u roh, khan kiei na`awm nangni dieng awm rawng. Drakha kung khan abak kha na awm nawkatu, nining a ara imoshok boi kha ang a, kiei dieng nangawm u joi nawkatu, ra ngam u naw tinih.
43015005	“Kiei hi drakha kung kha kanih, nangni hi abak hai kha nangnih uh. Kiei dieng a awm ama dieng khan kieiawm ka`awm. Ama kha na ara arawp moshok, ajarla kiei jaw boi a iawm thaw ngam u makche.
43015006	Tukhat na kiei dieng awm joi nawkatu, abak kha ang a, apai a makha achar. Amani kha rawkhawm uh, khan miei a vawr a iha u inih.
43015007	Kiei dieng nangawm u joi a, khan kawchawng hai kha nangni dieng awm joiatu, nanginik jawt u kha nangni dieng nithiei rangnih.
43015008	Ara arawp nangimoshok u kha na kapa kha imulur inih. Khanitatu kakhaichawi hai kha nangnih u rangnih.
43015009	“Kapa na kiei hi numinopok kha ang a, kiei na`awm nangni kha numkonopok uh. Kunumpok khan awm u roh.
43015010	Kapa chawngpek hai kha kirung a ama numpok a ka`awm kha ang a, kawchawngpek hai kha nangrung u joiatu, kunumpok khan nangawm u rangnih.
43015011	Kiningaina kha nangni dieng awmnathiei rang le nang ningaina u kha rupumnathiei rang, nangni dieng hihaihi kinieriei u inih.
43015012	Mahi kawchawngpek inih, makhala kiei na numkinopok u hi ang a, nangni khatlekhat numropoh u roh.
43015013	Tukhat na awlawm hai rang iringkho irupek ngam, hinek a aliendet numpok tute na niei mak.
43015014	Nangni dieng kinepek u chawngpek hi nangthaw u joiatu, nangni hi kawlawm hai kha nangnih u joi.
43015015	Shok hai kha niti u lai mi`ing, ajarla shok na upumi na ithaw kha imaw nih, iti kha jet mak. Inia kawlawm hai kha kiniti u joi, ajarla kapa ah put ah kijet kholok nangni dieng kenemejet u joi.
43015016	Kiei hi ninurumadan u nimak, khania kiei na kinurumadan u inih. Khan nangni na she a ara moshokna rang le nang ra u kha awmnathiei rang, khan kiriming a kapa dieng nanginik u rikip kha nepeknathiei rang, kunurumadan u joi.
43015017	Nangni khatlekhat numnangropokna u rang, hihai chawng hi nangni dieng kinepek u inih.
43015018	“Manmieshie na numukmak u joiatu, nangni nurumukmak mala khan, kiei hi nurumukmak joi, iti kha nangjet uh.
43015019	Manmieshie ah put ah nangrunih u joiatu, manmieshie na imiringtak hai kha numpok. Kiei na manmieshie ah put ah kunurukoi u joi jarkhan, manmieshie ah put ah nih u lai makche. Hijarhin manmieshie na nangni hi inumukmak u inih.
43015020	‘Shok `khat hi upuminek a liendet mak,’ tia kiei na nangni dieng kiruti kha mininghep u roh. Kiei hi epshawna nurupek u joiatu, nangniawm epshawna nepek u rangnih. Kawchawng kha nururung pe u joiatu, nang chawng u kha`awm nurung pe u rangnih.
43015021	Inia hihai kholok hi kiriming jarbak a nangni dieng thaw u rangnih, ajarla nojongtirpa kha jet u maklai.
43015022	Amani dieng kajong a kururiei pe u nawkala, munu runiei u naw nih, inia tuntu amani munu chungchanga rangaidam kha niei u lai mak.
43015023	Kiei hi namumah miring kha na kapa kha`awm imukmak inih.
43015024	Shik miring tute na iruthaw boi chon hai kha amani dieng kuruthaw pe nawkala, munu runiei u naw nih, inia tuntu amani na kiei hi numuk u joi, khan kiei le kapa kadinre hi numukmak u joi.
43015025	Inia amani Dan shung ah irumiejiek kha hawng rupumna rang a inih, ‘Jar niei boi a amani na kiei hi nurumukmak uh.’
43015026	“Inia kapa ah put ah kijongtir rang a, makhala kapa ah put ah jong, Narashappui Ratha adik kha jong phakhan, ama na kajar a kungchang rangnih.
43015027	Kung ah put ah nangnawrawtawp pui u jarkhan, nangni na`awm kungnangchang u rangnih.
43016001	“Nangbakna boi u rang, hihaihi nangni dieng kiriei nih joi.
43016002	Nangni kha synagogue hai ah put ah nawnawt u rangnih. Khan nangni nathat rikip na Pathien dieng a rawthawi inih, tia miningna rang a pha kha jong rangnih.
43016003	Amani na hihaihi nangni dieng thaw u rangnih, ajarla kapa kha`awm, khan kiei hiawm rujet u mak.
43016004	Inia apha kha jong phakhan, amani chungchanga nangni dieng kiruti inih, iti nangmininghepna u rang, hihaihi kirieisha inih. Nangni le kuruawm jarkhan, kung ah put khan nangni dieng ruriei mi`ing.
43016005	“Inia tun nojongtirpa dieng ahawng rang kanih joi. Khanikengta tute na ‘Ih ah hawng rang a maw nangnih?’ tia nawrawdawn u makche.
43016006	Inia hihaihi nangni dieng kieriei joi jarkhan, shawna kha na nang mulung u kha nimiship pe u joi.
43016007	Khanikengta kiei na nangni dieng adik kiriei inih. Kahawng rang a hi nangni rang nemna inih. Ajarla kahawng joi nawkatu, Narashappui u kha nangni dieng jong naw nih. Inia kahawng joiatu, ama kha nangni dieng jong tir rang kanih.
43016008	Khan ama na jong phakhan, munu chungchanga, dikna chungchanga, khan chawngshatna chungchanga manmieshie hi jong khin rangnih.
43016009	Munu chungchanga, ajarla kiei hi takanawshawn u mak.
43016010	Dikna chungchanga, ajarla kapa dieng ahawng rang kanih, khan numuh u lai naw tinih.
43016011	Chawngshatna chungchanga, ajarla hi manmieshie rampopa kha chawngshat pe joi.
43016012	“Nangni dieng riei rang tampui kienieilai, inia tun hin rupu ngam u naw tinih.
43016013	Ratha adik ama na jong phakhan, adikrok a lamnakai pe u rangnih, khan nining a imining kha riei naw nih, inia ijet kha riei rangnih. Khan ashok rang a chon hai kha nangni dieng rophong rangnih.
43016014	Ama na kiei hi numulur rangnih, ajarla katah kha loi ning, tia nangni dieng rophong rangnih.
43016015	Kapa na iniei kholok kha katah inih. Hijarhin katah kha loi a nangni dieng rophong rangnih, tia kiriei inih.
43016016	“Pha bawngte shung a numuh u lai naw tinih. Khan pha bawngte anuk a nangnumuk u ret rangnih, ajarla kapa dieng ahawng rang kanih joi.”
43016017	Khajarkhan akhaichawi hai eshen na khatlekhat dieng ruti uh, “ ‘Pha bawngte anuk a numuh u lai naw tinih, khan pha bawngte anuk a nangnumuk u ret rangnih,’ khan ‘Ajarla kapa dieng ahawng rang kanih joi,’ iti hi kieini dieng imaw irieina?”
43016018	Amani na ruti uh, “ ‘Pha bawngte anuk a,’ iti kha imaw itina? Imaw iriei kieini na jet u makme.”
43016019	Khajarkhan amani na irurawdawn jawt u kha Jesu na jet a amani dieng ruti, “ ‘Pha bawngte anuk hin numuh u lai naw tinih, khan pha bawngte shung a nangnumuk u ret rangnih,’ kiruti jar a khatlekhat dieng nangitawk u maw nih?
43016020	Nangni dieng diktak a kiriei inih, nangchap a nangna`awi u rangnih, inia manmieshie hi tu ningai rangnih. Nang mulung shaw u rangnih, inia nang mulungshaw u kha ningai a jir rangnih.
43016021	Nupang `khat na nai niei phakhan, doila niei rangnih, ajarla ama rang pha kha jong joi. Inia nai kha niei phakhan, miring `khat rieliei a jong shok ningaina jarkhan, awshawna kha miningheplai mak.
43016022	Tun mulungshaw nangniei uh, inia kunumuk u ret rangnih, khan nang mulung u kha ningai rangnih. Khan nang ningaina u kha tute na nangni ah put ah noloi pe u lai naw nih.
43016023	Makha nikho khan kiei dieng iawm nawrawdawn u naw tinih. Diktak a nangni dieng kiriei inih, kapa dieng kiriming a nanginik u kholok nangni dieng nepek u rang kanih.
43016024	Tunshe hin kiriming a iawm ninih u makchelai. Nang ningaina u kha shipna rang, nikna niei u roh, khan nangmuk u rangnih.
43016025	“Hihaihi nangni dieng chawngmeloi a kiriei nih joi. Inia nangni dieng chawngmeloi a kirieina boi rang a pha kha jong rangnih. Inia malangsheng a nangni dieng kapa chungchanga rophong rang kanih.
43016026	Kha nikho khan kiriming a nangninik u rangnih, khan nang ruhut ua kapa dieng nikna niei rang kanih, tia nangni dieng kiei na timi`ing.
43016027	Ajarla kapatak na numnopok uh, ajarla kiei hi numnangnopok u joi, khan Pathien ah put ah ajong kanih, iti kha takanangshawn u joi.
43016028	Kapa ah put ah ajong kanih, khan rieliei a kajong joi. Manmieshie hi mathanret a kapa dieng ahawng rang kanih joi.”
43016029	Akhaichawi hai na ama dieng ruti uh, “Enro, tun malangsheng a nangriei joi, khan chawngmeloi a rieilai makche.
43016030	Tun nieinak kholok nangjet, iti kha kejet u joi, khan tukhat na inawrawdawn rang, rangailai mak. Mahin Pathien ah put ah ajong nangnih, iti kha takakawshawn u joi.”
43016031	Jesu na amani dieng rumashang, “Tun takanangnawshawn u joi maw?
43016032	Enro, mi rikip na i`inin ah retheh a kiethien a ninamakna u rang a pha kha jong joi. Khan tun hin jong joi. Khanikengta kiethien a nimi`ing, ajarla kapa na nawawm pui.
43016033	“Kiei dieng lungdamna nangnieina u rang, nangni dieng hihaihi kieriei joi. Manmieshie hin shawrana nangniei uh, inia nang mulung mangarmashak u roh. Kiei na manmieshie kha kawmawtawr joi.”
43017001	Hihaihi ruriei shole, Jesu na ravan tieng khonga a ruti, “Aw kapa, apha kha jong joi. Nang shapa na`awm nang kha numulurnathiei rang, nang shapa kha mulur rang roh.
43017002	Manmieshie kholok chung a cham kha ama dieng nangrupek joi. Makha ama dieng nangipeksha kholok dieng kumshawt ringna peknathiei rang a inih.
43017003	Nang ranga Pathien adik, nang le khan nijongtir Jesu Christa kha ijet u rang a hi kumshawt ringna kha inih.
43017004	Rieliei chung a kiei na nang kha kunumulur joi. Thaw rang a chon ninurupek kha kiei na kawmawtawr joi.
43017005	Aw kapa, manmieshie jir mala a nang le kiruniei lurna khan tun nang le numulur rang roh.
43017006	“Manmieshie ah put ah ninurupek hai dieng khan nang riming kha kemejet joi. Kiei dieng a ninurupek hai kha nangtah runih, khan nang chawng kha urung uh.
43017007	Tun kiei dieng a ninurupek hai kholok kha nangtah inih, iti ejet u joi.
43017008	Ajarla kiei dieng ninurupeksha chawng hai kha amani dieng kepek a ruloi u joi, khan nang ah put ah ajong kanih, iti hi rujet u joi. Khan nang na ninojongtir inih, iti hi takarushawn u joi.
43017009	Amani rang kinik inih, manmieshie rang kinik nimak, inia kiei dieng ninurupeksha hai rang a inih, ajarla amani hi nangtah inih.
43017010	Katah hai kholok hi nangtah inih, khan nangtah hai kholok hi katah inih. Khan amani dieng lurna kha kumuk joi.
43017011	Manmieshie hin awmlai naw ning, inia amani tu manmieshie shung a awm u lai. Kiei nang dieng kahawng joi. Kapa Riethieng, kiei dieng a ninurupeksha hai hi kieini ang a akhat nitna u rang, amani hi nang riming a nurung pe roh.
43017012	Manmieshie shung a amani le kuruawmlai khan, nang riming a kiei dieng a ninurupeksha hai kha kururung, khan athang rang a imadansha ama kha niboia, tuawm athang awm mak. Mahi Miejiek kha hawng rupumna rang a inih.
43017013	Tun nang dieng kahawng joi, khan kiningaina kha amanirilik dieng rupumna rang, hihaihi manmieshie shung a kiriei inih.
43017014	Amani dieng nang chawng kha kepek joi, khan amani hi manmieshie na mukmak u joi, ajarla kiei hi manmieshie tah kanih boi hi ang a, amani hi manmieshie tah nih u mak.
43017015	Amani hi manmieshie ah put ah nangloina rang, kinik nimak, inia thaboi ama ah put ah nangshanna rang a inih.
43017016	Kiei hi manmieshie tah ah put ah kanih boi hi ang a, amani hi manmieshie tah nih u mak.
43017017	Amani hi nang dikna khan riethiengmashak roh. Nang chawng kha adik inih.
43017018	Kiei hi manmieshie shung a ninojongtir hi ang a, amani hiawm manmieshie shung a kitir joi.
43017019	Khan amani hiawm adik a riethiengnathiei rang, amani rangbak khan kinining a riethieng kanih joi.
43017020	“Amani thiente rang a kinik nimak, inia amani chawng hai jar a kiei takanawhawngshawn hai rangawm kinik inih.
43017021	Makha kapa, nang na kiei dieng nangawm, khan kiei na nang dieng ka`awm hi ang a, amani kholok na akhat nitnathiei rang a inih. Mahi nang na ninojongtir inih, iti hi manmieshie na takashawnna rang a inih.
43017022	Kieini `khat nanih hi ang a, `khat nitnathiei u rang, ninurupek lurna kha amani dieng kepek joi.
43017023	Amani na rupumping a `khat nitnathiei rang, kiei hi ninojongtir inih, iti hi manmieshie na jetna rang, kiei hi numninopok hi ang a, amani hi numnangpok, iti jetnathiei rang, kiei na amani dieng ka`awm, khan nang na kiei dieng nangawm.
43017024	Aw kapa, kiei dieng a ninurupek hai hi kaw`awmna mun ah kiei le awmna rang le ninurupek lurna kha muknathiei rang, kadit. Ajarla manmieshie hi phun mala khan kiei hi numnangnurupok joi.
43017025	Aw kapa midik! Manmieshie na nang kha nejet maklai, inia kiei na tu kenejet joi. Khan kiei hi ninojongtir inih, iti kha amani na jet u joi.
43017026	Khan numninurupokna numpok kha amani dieng awmnathiei rang le kieiawm amani dieng kaw`awmnathiei rang, nang riming kha amani dieng kurumejet joi, khan makha amani dieng mejet a awm rang kanih.”
43018001	Jesu na hihaihi ruriei shole, akhaichawi hai le Kidron tuihawr kha rakan a vara `khat ah rushe joi. Makhan rohon `khat ruawm. Ama na kha mun khan akhaichawi hai le rulut.
43018002	Khan ama rujor Judas na`awm makha mun kha rujet, ajarla makha Jesu na akhaichawi hai le ruruchun jawnjaina mun inih.
43018003	Khajarkhan Judas na thiempu ulien hai le Pharisee hai ah put ah rarup `khat le riethiengmun shipai kha vak chawi a mieisher le thaomiei, khan mieriem raklam a kha mun khan va joi.
43018004	Khajarkhan Jesu na khahai kholok kha ama chung a ashok rang a inih, iti kha rujet. Khan amani kha rujawng a ruti, “Tumaw nangitawk uh?”
43018005	Ama dieng rumashang uh, “Nazareth Jesu.” Jesu na amani dieng ruti, “Kiei kanih.” Ama rujor Judas na amani le ruding a ruawm.
43018006	Khajarkhan amani dieng “Kiei kanih,” ruti phakhan, anuk tieng rurakai ua pieipak chung ah rupur uh.
43018007	Khashole amani kha rurawdawnret, “Tumaw nangitawk uh?” Amani na ruti uh, “Nazareth Jesu.”
43018008	Jesu na rumashang, “Nangni dieng kiei kanih kiniti u joi. Kiei hi ninatawk u nitjoiatu, hihai miring hi meshe u rang roh.”
43018009	Mahi iruriei chawng kha hawng rupumna rang a inih, “Kiei dieng a ninurupeksha amani kar a tuteawm rumathang mi`ing.”
43018010	Simon Peter na iniei chemjam kha rupawttap a thiempu rashang shok `khat rutuk a, chang tieng ah nokor kha rutan pe joi. Shokpa riming kha Malchus iti.
43018011	Khashole Jesu na Peter dieng ruti, “Nang chemjam kha awkawk khan thong roh. Kapa na kiei dieng a inurupeksha hai kha kinek boi rang a maw nih?”
43018012	Khashole rarup hai, rabawpkhat lamkai, khan Jihudi hai riethiengmun shipai hai kha na Jesu kha shur ua rukhop u joi.
43018013	Rapapek a Annas dieng ruchawi uh, ajarla ama kha, kha kum a thiempu rashang ruchang, Caiaphas upu runih.
43018014	Mi kholok ruhut a mi `khat athi kha thadet, tia Jihudi hai dieng a chawng rurachah Caiaphas kha runih.
43018015	Khan Simon Peter le khaichawi shik `khat na Jesu anu kha rujui uh. Makha khaichawi kha thiempu rashang kha le rurejet, khan ama na Jesu le thiempu rashang tolawng ah rulut u joi.
43018016	Inia Peter na mawkawt vai khan ruding a ruawm. Khajarkhan thiempu rashang le rejet khaichawi shik kha na rushok a mawkawt rungnu dieng ruriei a Peter kha hawng lut pui joi.
43018017	Khajarkhan mawkawt rung shok-nungak kha na Peter dieng ruti, “Nangawm hi miring khaichawi hai kar a akhat nimakche maw?” Peter na ruti, “Kiei nimi`ing.”
43018018	Khan shok hai le riethiengmun shipai hai kha na, adai jarkhan, mieirawhaw riti a ru`ulam a ruding uh. Peterawm amani le ruding a miei kha ruru`uh.
43018019	Khashole, thiempu rashang kha na akhaichawi hai le ama iruchukna chungchanga Jesu dieng rurawdawn.
43018020	Jesu na ama dieng rumashang, “Kiei na manmieshie dieng malangsheng a kiruriei inih. Pha rikip a synagogue hai le Jihudi hai na lawp a vak ruchun jawnjaina u riethiengmun khan kiruruchuk inih. Kiei na rethe a iawm ruriei mi`ing.
43018021	Ijar a ninawrawdawn maw nih? Amani dieng kiruriei rangai miring hai khaw rawdawn roh. Enro, kiei na kiruriei hai kha amani na jet uh.”
43018022	Ama na hihaihi rurieisho phakhan, kha dieng ah ruding riethiengmun shipai `khat na Jesu kha ruben a ruti, “Thiempu rashang dieng khatikhan nangimashang maw nih?”
43018023	Jesu na ama dieng rumashang, “Ashie kha kiruriei nitjoiatu, ashie chungchanga kungchang roh. Atha kha kiruriei nitala, ijar a kiei hi ninaben maw nih?”
43018024	Khashole Annas na Jesu kha khoplam a thiempu rashang Caiaphas dieng rutir joi.
43018025	Khan Simon Peter na ruding a miei ru`u a ruawm. Khajarkhan ama dieng ruti uh, “Nangawm akhaichawi hai kar a akhat nimakche maw?” Ama na rurapha a ruti, “Kiei nimi`ing.”
43018026	Peter na onokor ituk pe inko, thiempu rashang shok hai kar a akhat na ruti, “Rohon ah ama le awm kinurumuk boi maw nih?”
43018027	Peter na makhan rurapharet, makhan arkhawng hawng khongrelen joi.
43018028	Jingkara hin Jesu kha Caiaphas ah put ah Praetorium khan amani na ruchawi u joi. Khan rono boi a Rakanna shakna u rang, amani na Praetorium khan rulut u mak.
43018029	Khajarkhan Pilate na amani dieng vak shok a ruti, “Hi miring chung hin ih nawngna maw nivakchawi uh?”
43018030	Amani na mashang a ama dieng ruti uh, “Chon shie ruthaw joi nawkatu, ama hi nang dieng nepeh u naw ning.”
43018031	Pilate na amani dieng ruti, “Ama kha chawi u tana nang dan u dungjuia ama chung a chawngvakshat u roh.” Jihudi hai na ama dieng ruti uh, “Miring `khat that rang a hi kieini rang dan nimak.”
43018032	Mahi ih thit a athi rang a maw nih, tia Jesu na iruriei chawng kha hawng shokna rang a inih.
43018033	Khashole Pilate na Praetorium khan rulutret, khan Jesu kha rukoi a ama dieng ruti, “Nang Jihudi hai Reng kha maw nangnih?”
43018034	Jesu na ama dieng rumashang, “Mahi nang nining a nangiti maw nih, ninawkle miring shik hai na nang dieng kajar a iruti maw nih?”
43018035	Pilate na rumashang, “Kiei hi Jihudi maw kanih? Nang phung miring hai le thiempu ulien hairilik na nang kha kiei dieng inepek u inih. Imaw nangiruthaw awm joi?”
43018036	Jesu na rumashang, “Kerengchangna kha tu manmieshie ah put ah nimak. Kerengchangna kha mahi manmieshie ah put ah nitjoiatu, koshok hai na Jihudi hai dieng kerepekna boi rang, ra thaw u rangnih. Khania tun kerengchangna hi manmieshie hin ah put ah nimak.”
43018037	Pilate na ama dieng ruti, “Khanitala reng maw nangnih?” Jesu na rumashang, “Reng nangnih, nangiti kha keng. Ajarla adik khan kungkachangna rang, manmieshie a jong shok kanih. Adik a awm mi rikip na kawchawng kha rangai.”
43018038	Pilate na ama dieng ruti, “Adik kha imaw nih?” Khan hihaihi ruriei shole, Jihudi hai dieng rusheret a amani dieng ruti, “Ama chung a shietna `khatshe muk pe mi`ing.
43018039	Rakanna nikho a miring `khat kimoshok rang a hi nangni rang shena dan inih. Khajarkhan nangni rang Jihudi hai Reng kimoshok rang a hi nangdit u maw?”
43018040	Kha pha khan amani kholok na ra`airet a ruti uh, “Hi miring hi nimak, inia Barabbas kha!” Barabbas kha minieisho miring runih.
43019001	Khashole Pilate na Jesu kha ruchawi a rumejem joi.
43019002	Khan ramiring hai na riling le iphan u renglukhum kha ama lu ah rurukhumashak uh. Khan ama kha ponshendup kha rurieshieimashak u joi.
43019003	Khan ama dieng va ua ruti uh, “Lawm roh, Jihudi hai Reng hi!” Khan ama kha ruben uh.
43019004	Takthar a Pilate na vai vak moshok a amani dieng ruti, “Enro, ama shietna `khatshe muk pe mi`ing, iti nangjetna u rang, ama hi nangni dieng kivakshok puiret inih.”
43019005	Khashole Jesu na riling renglukhum kha rukhu a ponshendup rieshieilam a vak shok phakhan, Pilate na amani dieng ruti, “Miringpa kha hilah!”
43019006	Khashole thiempu rashang hai le riethiengmun shipai hai na rumuk u phakhan, ra`ailam a ruti uh, “Ama kha cross ling ah that roh, cross ling ah that roh!” Pilate na amani dieng ruti, “Nangni na chawi u tana cross ling ah vak that u roh, ajarla ama shietna `khatshe muk pe mi`ing.”
43019007	Jihudi hai na ama dieng rumashang uh, “Dan kieniei uh, nining a Pathien Shapa rurasha jarkhan, kadan u dungjuia a athingir rang a inih.”
43019008	Pilate na makha chawng kha rujet phakhan, ruchidet joi.
43019009	Khan takthar a Praetorium shung khan rulut a Jesu dieng ruti, “Khoshekawt a jong maw nangnih?” Inia Jesu na ama dieng rumashanglai mak.
43019010	Khajarkhan Pilate na ama dieng ruti, “Kiei dieng chawngriei naw rawng maw? Nang hi cross ah thatna rang le moshokna rang, cham kieniei, iti hi jet makche maw?”
43019011	Jesu na rumashang, “Chung ah put ah nang dieng inurupeksha nitnawkatu, kuchung a cham shukniei a runiei naw tinih. Hijarhin kiei hi nang dieng nurupepa kha na munu aliendet ieniei.”
43019012	Khan ah put ah Pilate na ama kha moshokna rang lam rutawk. Inia Jihudi hai na ra`ailam a ruti uh, “Hi miring hi nangmoshok joiatu, Caesar lawmpa kha nilai makche. Tunita`awm nining a reng rasha miring kha na Caesar re`erpuina chawngiriei inih.”
43019013	Pilate na hihai chawng hi rujet phakhan, ama na Jesu kha vak shok pui a Lunglamrakam iti u, inia Hebrew chawng a tu Gabbatha iti, chawngshat shutna khan rushuh joi.
43019014	Khan Rakanna Rashamna Nikho nidan `ruk dawr hawng nih joi. Khan Pilate na Jihudi hai dieng ruti, “Nang Reng u kha hilah!”
43019015	Amani na rura`ai uh, “Chawite chawi rang roh, ama kha cross ling ah vak that rang roh.” Pilate na amani dieng ruti, “Nang Reng u hi cross ling ah kithat rang a maw nih?” Thiempu rashang hai na rumashang, “Caesar niboia, reng niei u mi`ing.”
43019016	Khashole cross ling ah thatna rang, ama kha amani dieng rupek joi. Khajarkhan Jesu kha rupawt ua ruchawi u joi.
43019017	Khan ama cross kha ruputlam a, Hebrew chawng a Golgotha iti Luru Mun khan, Jesu na ruhawng joi.
43019018	Kha mun khan ama kha cross ling ah rumakhai u joi. Khan shir le shir ah miring shik idiawm makhai a Jesu kha alai ah rumakhaichen uh.
43019019	Pilate na khetmiejiek `khat hi cross chung khan rumiejiek. Irumiejiek kha la: NAZARETH JESU HI JIHUDI HAI RENG INIH.
43019020	Makha khetmiejiek kha Jihudi hai kar a tampui na rute uh. Ajarla Jesu cross ling ah irumakhaina u mun kha khopui le ruranai, khan miejiek kha Hebrew, Greek, khan Latin chawng a irumiejiek inih.
43019021	Khashole Jihudi hai thiempu ulien hai na Pilate dieng ruti uh, “ ‘Jihudi hai Reng,’ tia miejiek naw roh, inia ‘Ama na “Jihudi hai Reng kanih ruti,” ’ tia miejiek roh.”
43019022	Pilate na rumashang, “Kiemiejieksha kha miejieksho keng joi.”
43019023	Ramiring hai na Jesu kha cross ling ah rumakhai u shole, ama ponledier kha ramiring rikip dieng tum `khat a changna rang, tum mili a rushem uh. Khan takdep kha`awm ruloi pe uh, inia takdep kha ichi boi, chung ah put ah rotho, inih.
43019024	Khajarkhan khatlekhat dieng ruti uh, “Mahi ther u naw rawi. Inia hi chung hin tu tah maw chang nih, tia vanmuk en u rawi.” Mahi Miejiek na iruriei kha hawng rupumna rang a inih: “Amani na koponledier hai kha amani kar a rushem uh, khan kopon rieshiei chung a vanmuk ruen uh.” Makha dungjuia ramiring hai na hitihin a iruthaw u inih.
43019025	Khan unu, unu naipangnu, Clopas inkonu Mary, khan Mary Magdalene, amani na Jesu cross diengtak khan ruding uh.
43019026	Khashole Jesu na unu le numipok akhaichawi kha rumuk phakhan, unu dieng ruti, “Nupang, nang shapa kha en roh!”
43019027	Khashole akhaichawi dieng khan ruti, “Nangnu kha en roh!” Makha pha ah put khan akhaichawi kha na ama kha i`intak ah ruchawi joi.
43019028	Mahi shole, Jesu na ih kholok hawng mawtawr joi, iti rujet `le, Miejiek kha hawng rupumna rang, “Kutuira,” ruti.
43019029	Kha mun khan ju athur shipmer be `khat ruawm. Khajarkhan spongos kha ju athur khan rumechemen ua hyssop bak ah aje ua, abai ah ruthong pe uh.
43019030	Jesu na ju athur kha rumechep shole, ruti, “Mawtawr joi.” Khashole ulu mukun a aratha kha rupek joi.
43019031	Rashamna Nikho nit jarkhan, Jihudi hai na amani rok hai kha Sabbath shung a rutetna boi rang (ajarla makha Sabbath kha nikholien runih), amani keranga hai kha khiek pe a amani rok hai kha chawina rang, Pilate dieng vak nik uh.
43019032	Khashole ramiring hai na va ua akhat changna le khan ama le cross ling ah imakhaishom shik `khat ke hai kha vak khiek pe uh.
43019033	Inia Jesu dieng vat phakhan, ruthisha a ivakmuk u le roroia eke hai kha rukhiek pe u lai mak.
43019034	Khania ramiring hai kar a akhat na shiei le edep ah vak shun a thishen le tui vak shokrelen joi.
43019035	Khan amupa kha na kungruchang. Khan ama kungchangna kha adik inih. Khan iriei kha adik inih, iti kha ejet. Makha takanangshawnna u rang a inih.
43019036	Hihai ashok hi Miejiek kha hawng rupumna rang a inih: “Uru `khatshe khiek pe naw nih.”
43019037	Khan Miejiek mun shik `khat na ieriei, “Iruvit u ama kha en u rangnih.”
43019038	Hihaihi shole, Jihudi hai kha chit jar a muruk a Jesu khaichawi ruchang, Arimathea Joseph na Jesu rok kha loina rang, Pilate dieng vak nik. Pilate na makha rujawt pe. Khashole rushe a Jesu rok kha vak loi joi.
43019039	Khan arapalai a jan a Jesu dieng rushe Nicodemus na`awm myrrh le aloe reche litre rajakhat dawr hi vak chawi.
43019040	Khashole amani na Jesu rok kha ruloi ua Jihudi hai khumna shedan dungjuia ponramasha le manamhoi rieipartui le rujo u joi.
43019041	Khan cross ling ah ithatna u mun khan rohon `khat ruawm, khan makha rohon shung khan tute na ijana boi thankhur athar `khat ruawm.
43019042	Jihudi hai Rashamna Nikho nit jar a le khan than kha iedieng ah ruawm jarkhan, Jesu kha makha mun khan rumaja u joi.
43020001	Hapta shung a akhat changna nikho varmuk a, Mary Magdalene na thanmun ah vat phakhan, than ah put ah lungpek rurawthawt kha vak muk.
43020002	Khajarkhan vak tan a Simon Peter le Jesu na numipok akhaichawi shik `khat dieng ava a amani dieng ruti, “Than shung ah put ah Pumi kha ruloi u joi, ama kha khoshekawt ah itet u maw nih joi, jet u lai mi`ing.”
43020003	Khashole Peter na khaichawi shik `khat kha le rushe a than khan va u joi.
43020004	Pasha `di kha na rutanshom ua khaichawi shik `khat kha na Peter kha rukhe a thanmun kha matieng rushok joi.
43020005	Ama na butlam a ruen a ponramasha hai rapai kha vak muk, inia rulut maklai.
43020006	Khashole Simon Peter na ama kha rujui a than shung khan vak lut; khan ponramasha hai rapai kha vak muk.
43020007	Khan lu ah ruawm pontete kha ponramasha hai kha le rurapai mak, inia shikjek a mun `khat ah rurethep a ruawm.
43020008	Khashole thanmun ah matieng rushok khaichawi shik kha na`awm rulut joi, khan ama na rumuk a takarushawn joi.
43020009	Ajarla ama na athi ah put ah hawng ringngir rangnih, iti Miejiek kha tunshe rujet u maklai.
43020010	Khajarkhan takthar a akhaichawi hai na amani inin ah rukir u joi.
43020011	Inia than vai tieng khan Mary na ding a rie`ieklam a ruchap. Achap le roroia than shung khan butlam a ruen.
43020012	Khan ponchek rieshiei ravantir idi kha Jesu rok irena mun khan ulu tieng `khat, khan eke tieng `khat rushuh u kha rumuk.
43020013	Amani na ama dieng ruti uh, “Nupang, ijar a chap maw nangnih?” Amani dieng ruti, “Ajarla kupumi kha nuruchawi pe u joi, khoshekawt a inatet pe u maw nih joi, jetlai mi`ing.”
43020014	Hihaihi ruti shole, anuk tieng vak hiei a Jesu ading kha vak muk, inia Jesu keng, iti rujet mak.
43020015	Jesu na ama dieng ruti, “Nupang, ijar a chap maw nangnih? Tumaw nangitawk?” Rohon rung miring `khat a rumining a ama dieng ruti, “Oja, ama kha ninuruchawi pe nitjoiatu, khoshekawt ah nitet maw nih, nieriei roh. Kiei na chawi rang kanih joi.”
43020016	Jesu na ama dieng ruti, “Mary!” Ama na vak hiei a ama dieng ruti, “Rabboni!” (mahi Oja tina inih).
43020017	Jesu na ama dieng ruti, “Numukui a awmlai naw roh, ‘Kiei na kapa dieng hawng mi`inglai. She tana kuliennai hai dieng vak riei rang roh. Kiei na kapa le nangpa u, kapathien le nang Pathien u dieng ahawng rang kanih joi.’ ”
43020018	Mary Magdalene na rushe a Pumi kha umuk joi, khan ama dieng hihaihi riei joi, tia khaichawi hai dieng vak rophong joi.
43020019	Hapta shung a akhat changna nikho nitak khan akhaichawi hai na Jihudi hai kha ruchih ua, ruruchunna u in mawkawt kha rukhar uh. Jesu na hawng lut a amani kar khan hawng ding a ruriei, “Lungdamna kha nangni le awm rosho.”
43020020	Makha ruriei shole, amani dieng ukhut hai le edep kha rumumuk uh. Khajarkhan khaichawi hai kha na Pumi kha rumuk u phakhan, ningrungai pe uh.
43020021	Takthar a Jesu na amani dieng ruti, “Lungdamna kha nangni dieng awm rosho. Kapa na inojongtir hi ang a, nangniawm kinitir uh.”
43020022	Mahi ruriei shole, amani dieng phuk thong pe a ruriei, “Ratha Riethieng kha tum u roh.
43020023	Miring hai munu kha nangrangaidam pe u joiatu, irangaidam pe inih. Nangni na nangdawn pe u joiatu, idawn pe inih.”
43020024	Inia Didymus iti u shawmlieidi kar a akhat Thomas kha Jesu na vatlai khan amani le ruawm mak.
43020025	Khaichawi shik hai na ama dieng ruti uh, “Pumi kha kumuk u joi.” Inia amani dieng ruti, “Ukhut ah hemthir shebe kha kumuk nawk a, hemthir shebe kha kukhut mieriei le kama nawk a, khan edep kha kukhut le kishit nawkatu, takashawn naw ning.”
43020026	Ni `riet shole, takthar a akhaichawi hai na inshung khan ruawm uh. Thomas`awm amani le ruawm joi. Mawkawt kha rurakhar joiawm, Jesu kha hawng lut, khan amani kar a ding a ruriei, “Lungdamna kha nangni dieng awm rosho.”
43020027	Khashole Thomas dieng ruti, “Nang khut mieriei kha vak shawn tana vak ma roh, khan nang khut kha vak shawn tana kedep hi vak shih roh. Takashawn boi miring kha niboia, takashawn miring kha chang roh.”
43020028	Thomas na mashang a ama dieng ruti, “Kupumi kapathien.”
43020029	Jesu na ama dieng ruti, “Thomas, nangnumuk joi jarkhan, takanangnawshawn joi. Amuh boi a takashawn miring hai kha rahvanmuh miring kha inih.”
43020030	Khan mahi behangbuk ah imiejiek boi Jesu na akhaichawi hai dieng iruthaw jetna tampui awmlai.
43020031	Khania Jesu hi Christa, Pathien Shapa kha inih, iti takanangshawnna u rang a irumiejiek inih. Makha, takanangshawn u phakhan, ama riming a ringna kha nangnieina u rang a inih.
43021001	Hihaihi shole, Jesu na Tiberias Thampui khan akhaichawi hai dieng hitihin rularret.
43021002	Simon Peter, Didymus iti u Thomas, Galilee shung ah awm Cana kho ah put ah Nathanael, Zebedee shapa hai le akhaichawi hai kar a idi hai kha ruawmshom uh.
43021003	Simon Peter na amani dieng ruti, “Ngashur she rang kanih.” Ama dieng ruti uh, “Kieiniawm nang le she u rang kanih.” Relentak a rushe ua rokong shung khan rulut u joi. Kha jan khan `khatshe rushur u mak.
43021004	Jingkar hin Jesu na kawmchang khan ruding, nitjoiawm khaichawi hai na Jesu keng, iti rujet u mak.
43021005	Khajarkhan Jesu na amani dieng ruti, “Naite hai, nekleshak nanginiei boi u maw nih?” Ama dieng rumashang uh, “Niei u mi`ing.”
43021006	Amani dieng ruti, “Len kha rokong chang tieng ah shir khan vawr u roh, khan nangshur u rangnih.” Makha dungjuia amani na ruvawr uh. Khan nga hai kha rawphai jarkhan, akaishe rumawtawr u lai mak.
43021007	Jesu na numipok khaichawi kha na Peter dieng ruti, “Mahi Pumi inih!” Simon Peter na Pumi inih, iti kha rujet phakhan, kotai ruko a (ajarla rekengver a ruawm inih) nining a thampui shung khan ruchawm joi.
43021008	Inia khaichawi hai eshen na tu, nga shipmer len kha pawtlam a rokongte a rushe uh (ajarla kawmchang kha le rurala mak, inia cubit rajadi dawr runih).
43021009	Kawmchang ah eke rumuchum u phakhan, kha mun khan rawhaw ra`ajin chung ah nga le khan tan vak muk uh.
43021010	Jesu na amani dieng ruti, “Tun a nangishur u nga hai kha eshen vak chawi u roh.”
43021011	Simon Peter na hawng ka a nga alien rajakhat shawm rahngalieithum shipmer len kha kawmchang ah hawng pawt joi. Khan nga hai kha tampui nitjoiawm len kha ruchiet mak.
43021012	Jesu na amani dieng ruti, “Khai! Jingkarbu neh u rang rawi.” Pumi keng, iti rujet u jarkhan, akhaichawi hai kar a tute na “Tumaw nangnih?” tia rurawdawn ngam u lai mak.
43021013	Khashole Jesu na ava a tan kha ruloi, khan amani dieng rupek. Khan nga kha`awm ra`angre a khatikhan rupek joi.
43021014	Jesu na athi ah put ah hawng thoi shole a akhaichawi hai dieng rularna kha mahi na athum changna kha inih.
43021015	Amani na jingkarbu kha runek u shole, Jesu na Simon Peter dieng ruti, “Jonah shapa Simon, kiei hi hihaihinek hin numnangnopok maw?” Ama dieng rumashang, “Awh, Pumi, numkonopok, iti kha nangjet.” Ama dieng ruriei, “Kekengamte hai hi navai pe roh.”
43021016	Adi changna khan rieiret, “Jonah shapa Simon, kiei hi numnangnopok maw?” Ama dieng rumashang, “Awh, Pumi, numkonopok, iti kha nangjet.” ama dieng ruriei, “Kekengam hai hi noroi pe roh.”
43021017	Athum changna a ama dieng ruti, “Jonah shapa Simon, kiei hi numnangnopok maw?” “Numnangnopok maw?” tia voithumhet ruti jarkhan, Peter kha mulungrushaw pe joi. Khan ama dieng ruti, “Pumi irikip nangjetviek; numkonopok, iti kha nangjet.” Jesu na ama dieng ruriei, “Kekengam hai hi navai pe roh.”
43021018	Diktak a nang dieng kiriei inih, “Nang shindetlai khan kawngkhit thaw a nangshena jawt mun khan nangshe, inia nang tar phakhan, nang khut lawm a shik miring na nang kawng nikhit pening, tia nangiditna boi mun khan nawchawi rangnih.”
43021019	Mahi iruti hi ih ang chat thitna kha le ama na Pathien imulur rang a maw nih, iti jetna inih. Mahi ruti shole, ama dieng ruriei, “Nujui roh.”
43021020	Peter na ruhiei a Jesu na numipok khaichawi kha na irujui kha rumuk. Ama kha janbu nekna a tebol ah Jesu kha irungiei a “Pumi, tumaw nih anajor rang a pa kha?” tia rurieipa kha inih.
43021021	Peter na ama kha muk phakhan, Jesu dieng ruti, “Pumi, ama la imaw rachang nih?”
43021022	Jesu na ama dieng ruriei, “Kojong masheng a`awm rang kadit joiatu, nang roiruputna imaw awm? Nujuite nujui roh.”
43021023	Khajarkhan uliennai shung khan ama hi thi naw nih, tia chawngrushok joi. Inia Jesu na ama dieng thi naw nih ruti mak, inia “Kojong masheng a`awm rang kadit joiatu, nang roiruputna imaw awm?” iruti inih.
43021024	Mahi khaichawi hi keng hihai chungchanga kungruchang miring le hihaihi irumiejiek kha. Khan ama na kungruchangna kha adik inih, iti kejet uh.
43021025	Jesu na iruthaw chon shik tampui awm, `khatkhat a miejiekviek joiatu, miejiek rang a behang hai kha manmieshie rieliei shung hin tawng naw nih, tia kimining. Amen.
44001001	Aw Theophilus, akhat changna behangbuk khan Jesu na iruthaw le iruruchukna putna kholok le ama kha ravan a iruchawina nikhoshe kha jar a kirumiejiek inih.
44001002	Ama kha ruchawi mala khan Jesu na irumadan tirtawn hai kha Ratha Riethieng dieng chawng rupekna.
44001003	Ama shawdoi shole, akalangshok ngieichon tampui le amani dieng ama na aring a awm kha nining a rumumuk. Ni shawm mili hi amani dieng rular a Pathien rengchangna jar kha ruriei pe.
44001004	Amani kha lawp `khat a ruruchun puilai khan Jerusalem kha rumathan u naw roh, kiei ah put ah nangirujet u Apa chawngrakham kha rungak u roh, tia amani dieng chawng rupek. Jesu na ruti, “Mahi keng kiei ah put ah nangirujet u kha.
44001005	Ajarla John na tui a baptisma nurupek uh, inia nikhothang shawt boi a Ratha Riethieng le baptisma nepek u rang kanih.”
44001006	Khashole amani na vak ruruchun ua ama dieng rawdawn a ruti uh, “Pumi, mahi pha hin Israel hai rengchangna kha nihawngmikir rang a maw nih?”
44001007	Amani dieng ruti, “Apa na ama chamtak a imuchuk rang a pha ninawkle kumletha ajet rang a kha nangni nih u makche.
44001008	Inia Ratha Riethieng na nang chung ua jong phakhan, ranak nangtum u rangnih. Khan Jerusalem shung ah, Judea le Samaria kholok ah, khan rieliei dawngkhitshe khan kiei rang kungchang miring hai kha anih rang nangnih uh.”
44001009	Hihaihi ruriei shole, amani na i`en u le roroia, ama kha chung tieng rudawm a amani mik`en ah put ah romiei na ama kha ruringi joi.
44001010	Ama na ruka le roroia, amani na ravan tieng ruenrep u lai khan enro, ponchek rieshiei pasha `di na amani dieng ruding uh.
44001011	Khan amani dieng ruti uh, “Galilee miring hai, iloia ravan tieng khonga a ading maw nangnih uh? Nangni ah put ah ravan a iruchawi Jesu hi, ravan a aka nangimuk u hi ang a, jong rangnih.”
44001012	Khashole amani na Olivet iti Lawn ah put ah Jerusalem ah jong kir u joi. Makha Sabbath nikho a lawnnathiei Jerusalem dieng ah awm inih.
44001013	In khan jong lut ua, awmna u chungindan khan ruka u joi. Amani khala: Peter, James, John, Andrew, Philip, Thomas, Bartholomew, Matthew, Alphaeus shapa James, Zealot iti Simon, khan James shapa Judas runih uh.
44001014	Hihai kholok na nupang hai, Jesu nu Mariam, khan anaipangpa hai le mulung `khat a nikna le rieina runiei jawnjai uh.
44001015	Khalaikhan Peter na takashawn hai kar a thoi a ruti (Ruchun mirawp kha rajakhat shawm `di dawr runih),
44001016	“Uliennai hai, Jesu ashur hai lamkai ruchang, Judas chungchanga Ratha Riethieng na David kam a irurieimashana, Miejiek kha ashokngir rang a inih.
44001017	Ajarla Judas kha kieini le techen runih, khan mahi chonmun hin ama na tum irumuk inih.”
44001018	(Khan mahi miringpa hi na idikna boi lawh kha le loimun irurawchawkna mun khan shuk tieng jongcho, khan awvawn rupok pe a ariei kholok vak shok pe.
44001019	Mahi Jerusalem ah awm mi kholok na rujet uh. Khajarkhan amani chawng a Akeldama, makhala, Thishen Loimun ruti uh.)
44001020	“Ajarla Lah behangbuk ah hitihin rumiejiek: ‘Ama awmna mun kha ramthim chang pe rosho; tute na makhan awm naw rosho.’ Khan ‘Ama chonmun kha shik `khat na loi pe rosho.’
44001021	Khan thoiretna chungchanga kieini le kungchangna rang, nimadan u rang a shok. Kieini na nimadan u rang a kha tu, Pumi Jesu na kieini le shehawng a ruawmlai khan kieini le rawtawp jawnjai
44001022	makhala, John na ama baptisma irupek ah put ah kieini ah put ah iruchawina nikho haishe miring `khat aningir rang a inih.”
44001023	Khajarkhan Barsabbas tia ikoi u, Justus iti Joseph le Matthias, pasha `di hi rumiding uh.
44001024	Khan amani na runik a ruti uh, “Pumi nang na mi kholok mulung nangjet, idi kar hin akhat nimadan kha numumuk u roh.
44001025	Mahi Judas na irukhoi a nining a iminingna mun a rushe jar a irumak chonmun le tirtawn changna kha lona rang a inih.”
44001026	Amani rang khan vanmuk ruen ua, Matthias dieng ruchu joi, khan amani na ama kha tirtawn shawmlieikhat khan rubo u joi.
44002001	Pentecost ni kha hawng shok phakhan, amani kholok kha mun `khat ah mulung khatte a ruawm uh.
44002002	Khan jetboithieiboi a helehoi kha ravan ah put ah rithirang ang a jong a, rushutna u inshung kholok kha jong miship.
44002003	Mieliei hai kha na mieichon ang a amani dieng jong lar. Khahaikha na jong reshen ua, amani rikip dieng jong chutna uh.
44002004	Khan Ratha Riethieng na jong miship ua, Ratha na baishona irupek u le roroia, amani kholok na chawngshik a achawng ruput u joi.
44002005	Kha mun khan ramram ah awm phung rikip ah put ah richichawi Jihudi hai kha Jerusalem ah ruawm uh.
44002006	Makhan helehoi kha rujet u phakhan, mipui kha vak ruchun ua, shindawngna runiei uh. Ajarla tirtawn rikip na amama phung chawng a achawng rujet uh.
44002007	Shindawng le amramalam a amani na khatlekhat dieng rurierieina uh, “Enro, achawng miring kholok khaw Galilee miring hai nih u mak maw?
44002008	Itia kieini na nojongshokna u phung chawng rikip a nijet u hi?
44002009	Parthia, Mede, Elam miring hai, khan Mesopotamia, Judea le Cappadocia, Pontus le Asia ram ah awm miring hai,
44002010	Phyrgia le Pamphylia, Egypt, khan Cyrene le ranai Lybia shie `khat, khan Rome ah put ah khomijin hai, Jihudi hai le phungtho hai dire,
44002011	Crete tuikawram le Arab miring hai, kieini na Pathien chon thaw hai rekhek kha nawchawngtak a nijet u inih.”
44002012	Amani kholok shindawng le amramalam a khatlekhat dieng ruti uh, “Mahi ih itina maw nih?”
44002013	Eshen na erawh a ruti uh, “Amani khaw juning le aship u keng.”
44002014	Inia Peter na shawmlieikhat le ding a amani dieng he rashangtak a ruriei, “Judea le Jerusalem ah awm miring hai, mahi nangijet u nih rosho, khan kawchawng hai hi rangairep u roh.
44002015	Hihai miring hi nangimining u kha ang a, jukhawp nih u mak. Jingkar nidan kobak cholai.
44002016	Inia mahi thiempulien Joel dieng irureina kha inih:
44002017	‘Nikho dawng khan hitihin awm rangnih. Makhala, karatha kha miring kholok shung a thong pe rang kanih. Nang shapa u hai le nang shanu u hai na chawng rophong u rangnih. Nang khangdawng u hai na mulungmik muk u rangnih, khan nang khanglui u hai na ramang raman u rangnih.
44002018	Kha nikho hai khan koshok hai nupang apa diengshe karatha thong pe rang kanih. Amani na chawng rophong u rangnih.
44002019	Chung ravan a rekhekchon hai le noi rieliei a jetna hai kha mumuk rang kanih. Khahaikha thishen, miei, khan mieikhu ruhu nih rangnih.
44002020	Alien le alur PUMI Nikho jong mala khan ni na ajing a, khan tha na thishen a jir rangnih.
44002021	Khan PUMI riming aban mi rikip kha shan rangnih, tia Pathien na ieriei.’
44002022	“Aw Israel miring hai, chawng hai hi rangai u roh. Pathien na ama jar a nang kar ua iruthaw chonrekhek hai, rekhekchon hai le jetna hai kha rotokna a, mahi miring Nazareth Jesu hi irumuchuk nih joi. Nangnitak na mahi nangijet u inih.
44002023	Pathien na irumuchuksha le irujetsha dungjuia mahi miringpa hi nangni dieng inurupek u inih. Danishawnboi hai khut kha rotokna a cross ling ah nangruthat uh.
44002024	Pathien na thitna natna ah put ah rumoshok a rumiring joi, ajarla thitna ranak kha na ama ikhop rang a kha anithiei nimak.
44002025	Ajarla David na Jesu chungchanga ruti: ‘PUMI kha kamaton a kumuk jawnjai. Ih kha na kiei hi nanawk ngam naw nih. Ajarla ama kha kukhut chang tieng awm.
44002026	Khajarkhan kumulung na apar, khan kiemieliei na ningaidet. Kha khea kupum na ngakmining a ring rangnih.
44002027	Ajarla Thikho khan kiringphuk kha namak pe naw tinih, ninawkle nang Riethieng Akhat kha na omoro imuk rang a kha jawt pe naw tinih.
44002028	Ringkho lam hai kha kiei dieng nangnumumuk joi. Kiei dieng a nangawm kha na mulungparna kha le nangnimiship joi.’
44002029	“Uliennai miring hai, phungpa David jar a lungartak a riei rawng, makhala ama kha ruthi a rukhum u joi. Ama than kha von nikhoshe hin kieini le awmlai.
44002030	Thiempulien `khat runit jarkhan, taksha dungjuia ama vawnchawi ara ah put ah Christa kha Pathien na mothoi a ama rengmun ah mushut rang, tia Pathien na riming ban a chawngirurakham pe kha David na rujet.
44002031	Mahi rumukmasha jarkhan, David na Christa thoiretna jar a ruriei, makhala ama ringphuk kha Thikho khan rumak pe mak, khan ama taksha kha na`awm morona, iti kha rumuh mak.
44002032	Mahi Jesu hi Pathien na irumothoi inih. Mahi nokholok na kungnachang uh.
44002033	Pathien khut chang tieng rulawm a apa ah put ah chawngirurakham Ratha Riethieng kha ruman shole, tun a nangimuk u le nangijet u hi ama na ijongmephe nih joi.
44002034	Ajarla David na ravan tieng ruka mak, inia amatak na ruti, ‘PUMI na kupumi dieng ruti,
44002035	“Nang rahapui hai kha nang kekhawng kamachang malalim, kukhut chang tieng shuh roh.” ’
44002036	“Khajarkhan Israel inshung kholok na jet rosho, makhala cross ling ah nangiruthat u mahi Jesu hi Pumi le Christa dire kha iruminit inih.”
44002037	Amani na rujet u phakhan, amani mulung rushit pe ua Peter le tirtawn kholok dieng ruti uh, “Uliennai miring hai, kieini na imaw thaw u ning?”
44002038	Peter na amani dieng ruriei, “Pathien na nang munu u kha arangaidamna rang, nang mulung lek u tana mi rikip na Jesu Christa riming a baptisma loi u roh. Khan Ratha Riethieng khutchawi kha nangmuk u rangnih.
44002039	Ajarla chawngrakham hi nangni rang le nang nai hai rang, khan latak ah awm hai rang le Pumi napathien na tukha nitjoiawm ikoi amani rang a inih.”
44002040	“Nangni ashie hi rong ah put ah rekhe u roh,” tia chawng tampui le chawng rupek a rumawshawk uh.
44002041	Khan ningaitak a ama chawng aloi hai kha na baptisma ruloi uh. Makha nikhotak khan miring bawp `thum hi irubo inih.
44002042	Amani na tirtawn hai ruchukna le rawlawpna, shakriethieng shakna le nikna khan mulung rupek uh.
44002043	Mi rikip chung a ratharakakna jong shok, ajarla tirtawn hai na rekhekchon le jetna tampui kha ruthaw uh.
44002044	Takashawn kholok na lawp `khat a ruawm ua, nieinak kholok rureshem uh.
44002045	Iniei u inleloi le nieinak kholok kha rujor ua, irangai u dungjuia amani dieng rupek uh.
44002046	Nikhonikho a riethiengmun ah mulung pum `khat a ruruchun uh. In rikip ah tan rukhoi uh, khan rawshaw le mulung renem a nekleshak kha rushak uh.
44002047	Amani na Pathien kha rumapak uh, khan miring kholok le riengieihiem a ruawm uh. Ishan miring hai kha Pumi na nikhonikho a biekrup khan rubo a ruawm.
44003001	Khan Peter le John na riethiengmun ah nikna pha nidan `thum hin riethiengmun ah ruhawng uh.
44003002	Unu vawn shung ah put ah kekhawr miring `khat vak chawi uh. Makha riethiengmun ah alut hai dieng numpokpek nikna rang, Metha iti riethiengmun pakawt khan ningthingkip rutet uh.
44003003	Peter le John na riethiengmun lut rang a rasham u kha rumuk phakhan, numpokpek kha runik a ruawm.
44003004	Peter le John na enrep a ruti uh, “Kieini hi ne`en roh.”
44003005	Ih `khat kumuk rangnih ti jarkhan, amani kha rumiejierep.
44003006	Inia Peter na ruti, “Kiei na rangkachak le dangka kha niei mi`ing, inia kiniei hi kinepek inih: Nazareth Jesu Christa riming a thoi tana lawn rang roh.”
44003007	Peter na ama khut chang khan rurak a rumothoi, khan relentak a eke hai le ekeartui hai kha hawng ngar pe joi.
44003008	Ama na hawng chawm a hawng ding le roroia rulawn joi. Khan chawmlam a amani le lawn a Pathien mapaklam a riethiengmun khan rulut joi.
44003009	Khan lawnlam a Pathien imapak kha mi kholok na rumuk uh.
44003010	Khan ama kha riethiengmun Metha Pakawt ah rushuthiei khutdawpa kha inih, iti kha amani na rujet uh. Ama chung a ashok khan erekhek a shindawngna runiei uh.
44003011	Kekhawrpa kha na Peter le John kha irumukui le roroia, mi kholok na, shindawngtak a, Solomon shumkung iti khan ah awm amani dieng rutan uh.
44003012	Peter na mahi rumuk phakhan, mi hai dieng khan rumashang, “Aw Israel miring hai, ijar a mahi chung hin shindawngna nanginiei u maw nih? Ninawkle, karanak ua ninawkle kirichichawina u khan a ama hi kimawlawn u ang a, ijar a nine`enrep u maw nih?
44003013	Abraham Pathien, Isaac Pathien, Jacob Pathien, pilepu hai Pathien kha na ama shok Jesu kha rumulur joi. Ama kha Pilate na rumoshok jawt phakhan, nangni na Pilate maikung a nangirujawt boi ua, mi hai dieng a nangirupek u kha inih.
44003014	Inia nangni na Riethieng le Midik kha rujawt u makche a mithatpa kha nangni rang moshokna rang, nangrunik uh.
44003015	Khan nangni na ringna apeh Rengshapa kha nangruthat uh. Pathien na ama kha athi ah put ah rumothoi. Mahin kieini na kungkachang uh.
44003016	Ama riming a takashawntak kha na nangimuk u le nangijet u miringpa hi imarat inih. Khan Jesu dieng ama takashawn kha na nang kholok maikung a miringpa hi amadamna joi.
44003017	“Tun uliennai hai, nang rampo hai na iruthaw u kha ang a, nangni na jet boi a niruthaw u inih, iti kha kejet.
44003018	Hitihin Pathien na ama thiempulien hai kholok ner a irurophongna, makhala Christa kha ashawngir rang a inih, iti kha hawng shok nih joi.
44003019	Khajarkhan nang mulung lek u roh, khan jir u roh. Khanitatu Pathien na nang munu u hai kholok kha nurushuk pe rangnih. Makha pha khan Pumi ah put ah matharnaret pha kha jong rangnih.
44003020	Khan nangni dieng matieng a irurophong Jesu Christa kha jong tir rangnih.
44003021	Nieinak kholok hawng mikir masheng, Jesu kha ravan a awmngir rang a inih. Makha chungchanga Pathien na manmieshie put mala a ama thiempulien riethieng hai ner a irurieina inih.
44003022	Ajarla Moses na pilepu hai dieng diktak a iruriei inih, ‘Nang PUMI nang Pathien na kiei a`ang Thiempulien `khat nang miring ah put ah mothoi rangnih. Nangni dieng a iriei kholok kha nangirangai u rang a shok.
44003023	Khan makha Thiempulien chawng rangai boi mi rikip kha mi hai kar ah put ah mathang rangnih.’
44003024	Samuel ah put ah anujui thiempulien kholok na hihai nikho chungchanga irurophongmasha inih.
44003025	Khan nangni hi thiempulien hai nai hai kha nangnih uh. Pathien na nangpa hai dieng irupek rawjawtna nai hai kha nangnih uh. Abraham dieng ruti, ‘Nang chicha jar a rieliei a inshungkhur kholok dieng rahvan pek rangnih.’
44003026	Pathien na ama shok Jesu kha rumothoi shole, akhat changna a ama kha nangni dieng rahvan pek rang jong tir joi. Makha nang kholok kha nang thatna boi uah put ah niemiehieina u rang a inih.”
44004001	Peter le John na mi hai dieng chawngruriei u lai khan thiempu hai, riethiengmun arung ralamkai le Sadducee hai na amani dieng va uh.
44004002	Jesu dieng athi ah put ah thoiretna awm, tia miring hai kha iruruchuk a irurophong u kha na amani mulung kha rumahang pe.
44004003	Khajarkhan amani kha rushur uh. Nitak runit jarkhan, jing tiengshe khan lungroko shung ah amani kha rukhum uh.
44004004	Inia chawng rangai hai tampui na takarushawn uh, khan amani jat kha bawp rahnga dawr runih.
44004005	Jing tieng hin rampo hai, lamkai hai, khan danoja hai kha na Jerusalem ah ruruchun joi.
44004006	Thiempu rashang Annas le Caiaphas, John, Alexander, khan thiempu rashang inshung hai tampui ruawm uh.
44004007	Peter le John kha alai ah miding a rurawdawn uh, “Ih ranak ninawkle tu riming a mahi nangithaw u maw nih?”
44004008	Ratha Riethieng shiplam a Peter na amani dieng ruriei, “Miring chung a chamniei hai le Israel lamkai hai,
44004009	von hin anapa dieng chon atha thaw jar a le itia hi miringpa damna dan kha kieini dieng ennanginerete u nitjoiatu,
44004010	nang kholok le Israel miring kholok na ijet nih rosho, mahi Nazareth Jesu Christa riming a nang kar ua damveng a ading nih joi. Mahi Jesu hi nangni na cross ah nangiruthat u, khan Pathien na athi ah put ah irumothoi kha inih.
44004011	Mahi ‘Inthaw hai nangni na nirudawnda u runiei kik ah lung ruchang kha inih.’
44004012	Tute jar a shandamna hi awm mak, ajarla kieini niringna u rang ravan noi a awm miring hai kar a ipek riming shik awm mak.”
44004013	Khan amani na Peter le John mulung ngar kha rumuk u phakhan, amani kha behangthiei boi, miriem inih, iti kha rujet ua shindawngna runiei uh. Khan amani kha Jesu le rawtawp miring hai keng, iti kha rujet uh.
44004014	Amani na irumadam u miringpa kha akar ua ading kha rumuk u jarkhan, amani na ama chung a chawngruriei ngam u mak.
44004015	Khajarkhan Sanhedrin kha mathan a shena rang, chawng rupek u shole, chonmun kha amani na rureshe uh.
44004016	Khan amani na ruti uh, “Amani dieng imaw nithaw u rang? Ajarla Jerusalem ah awm mi kholok dieng jetna ithawna hi madang joi. Mahi kieini na shok mak ti rang a hi anithiei boi inih.
44004017	Inia miring hai dieng dawnshe a majarna boi rang le hi riming hin tute dieng rieina boi rang, michitrip u rang rawi.”
44004018	Khajarkhan amani kha rukoi ua Jesu riming a chawngriei ninawkle ruchukna boipet rang, chawng rupek u joi.
44004019	Inia Peter le John na rumashang uh, “Pathiennek a nang chawng u rangai rang a hi Pathien mik`en a dikna maw chang nih, chawngshat u roh.
44004020	Ajarla kimuk u le kijet u chungchanga chawngriei hi bang ngam u naw ning.”
44004021	Takthar a amani kha rumichitsho u le, rumeshe u joi. Ajarla ashok chon jarkhan mi kholok na Pathien kha mapak a ruawm le khan amani jarkhan, amani chepna rang, lam rumuk u mak.
44004022	Ajarla damna chonrekhek ithawna miringpa kha kum shawm mili khe miring runih joi.
44004023	Amani kha rumoshoksho u le, thiempu ulien le shierulien hai na amani dieng iruriei hai kha Peter le John na amani lawm hai dieng thang vak koi uh.
44004024	Khan amani na rujet u `le, mulung `khat a he rashangtak a Pathien dieng ruti uh, “Aw Pumpa, nang ravan le rieliei, thampui le ushung ah awm kholok akonpa kha nangnih.
44004025	Nang shokpa David ner a nangruriei: ‘Ijar a phung hai kha rurang u maw nih, khan miring hai na nemna boi a chonirashak u maw nih?
44004026	Rieliei reng hai na rumiding u joi, khan rampo hai na PUMI chung a le ama Christa chung a re`erpuina rang, ruruchun u joi.’
44004027	Ajarla diktak a thao nangirunawt nang shok riethieng Jesu chung a Herod le Pontius Pilate na Phungshik hai, khan Israel miring hai le lawp `khat a ruruchun u joi.
44004028	Makha nang ranak le nang mulungmining nirumuchuksha kha ashok inih.
44004029	Tun, Aw Pumi, amani mimichit hi enro, khan mulungartak a nang chawng kha rieina rang, nang shok hai dieng hin ranak peh roh.
44004030	Nang mimadamna nang ranak kha jong peh tana, jetna le rekhekchon hai kha nang shok riethieng Jesu riming a thaw u rosho.”
44004031	Amani na nikna kha runieisho u le, lawp `khat a ruchunna u mun kha hawng rawnawk, khan amani kholok dieng Ratha Riethieng na jong ship ua Pathien chawng kha ngartak a ariei ruput u joi.
44004032	Khan takashawn mipui kha mulung `khat le ringphuk `khat a ruawm uh. Tute na`awm inleloi kha bing niei rumachang u mak, inia irawkhawm u rikip kha mun `khat a rurotokna uh.
44004033	Ranaknieitak a tirtawn hai kha na Pumi Jesu thoiretna khan kungruchang uh, khan amani kholok chung a numpokmirit kha lawmlawm a jong pe uh.
44004034	Amani kar a ravat `khatshe ruawm pe u mak, ajarla inleloi aniei hai kha na rujor ua khahai man kha vak chawi uh.
44004035	Amani na tirtawn hai keshun khan vak tet ua rangai hai dieng khan rushem pe uh.
44004036	Cyprus tuikawram a ashok, Levi phung Joses iti miring `khat ruawm. Tirtawn hai na ama dieng Barnabas iti riming kha rupek uh (Makha mawshawkna apeh shapa tina inih).
44004037	Ama na iniei loipuk kha rujor a shier kha tirtawn hai keshun a vak tet.
44005001	Inia Ananias iti miring `khat na ama inkonu Sapphira le rejet a ram `khat hi rujor.
44005002	Ama na, ama inkonu le rejet a, ikhawn shier kha eshen rurawt, khan khoikhat kha ruchawi a tirtawn hai keshun a vak tet.
44005003	Inia Peter na ruti, “Ananias, ijar a Satan na nang mulung kha ibuk a Ratha Riethieng chung a mielieishiei inawmawthaw a makha ram man kha eshen nangirawt maw nih?
44005004	Nangjor mala khan makha nang tah anih boi maw nih? Nangjor sholeawm shier chung khan nang cham a awm boi maw nih? Ijar a nang mulung shung a hiti chon hi nangirashak maw nih? Nang na miring hai dieng mielieishiei nangithaw nimak a Pathien dieng mielieshiei nangithaw inih.”
44005005	Ananias na hihai chawng hi rujet phakhan, pur a ruthi joi, khan hihai chon ajet miring kholok na ajeng a chitna runiei uh.
44005006	Rothar hai na va ua rok kha vak jo uh, khashole ruchawi ua vak khum u joi.
44005007	Khan nidan `thum dawr hi rakar `le ashok chon kha jet boi a ama inkonu kha vak lut.
44005008	Peter na ama dieng rurawdawn, “Ram kha kha jat khan a nangijor u maw nih?” Ama na rumashang, “Inih, kha jat khan a kijor u inih.”
44005009	Peter na ama dieng ruti, “Itia Pumi Ratha kha enretena rang, rawjawtshom maw nangnih uh? Enro, nang inkopa akhum miring hai na mawkawt kung ah ding a awmlai, nangawm nawchawi u rangnih joi.”
44005010	Relentak a ama kha rupur a eke kung a ruthi joi. Rothar hai na va ua athi kha vak muk u phakhan, ruchawi ua ama inkopa diengtak khan vak khum u joi.
44005011	Khajarkhan biekrup le khahai ajet kholok chung a chitna jong shok joi.
44005012	Khan tirtawn hai khut dieng jetna le rekhekchon tampui hi miring hai kar a ruthawna. Khan amani lawpsheng ua mulung khatte a Solomon Tomai`in khan ruruchun uh.
44005013	Mi hai na amani kha rashangtak a ruen uh, khan tute na amani dieng rujaw ngam u mak.
44005014	Inia Pumi takashawn nupang apa tampui kha rubo uh.
44005015	Khajarkhan Peter na vak pang pha a, ama riliptak a kha nita`awm, amani dieng chona rang, ruti ua ana miring hai kha lamlien khan jana le pher chung ah rumaja uh.
44005016	Diengvai ah awm mipui kholok na Jerusalem ah vak ruchun ua, amani na ana miring hai le raikho rono na ichutna miring hai kha vak chawi uh, khan amani lawpsheng a damna rumuk uh.
44005017	Khashole thiempu rashang na ama le rawtawp Sadducee lawpreshen kholok le ruthoi joi. Manarshie kha na amani kha rubuk joi.
44005018	Amani na tirtawn hai kha rushur ua mithat miring hai thongna lungroko shung ah rutet u joi.
44005019	Inia Pumi ravantir na jan a lungroko mawkawt hai kha rumawlawng pe a vai rumoshok uh, khan ruti,
44005020	“She u rang roh, riethiengmun ah vak ding u tana mahi ringna chawng kholok hi mi hai dieng vak riei pe u roh.”
44005021	Amani na mahi rujet u phakhan, kha jingkar khan jingkara riethiengmun ah rulut ua mi hai kha ruruchuk u joi. Thiempu rashang na ama le rawtawp hai kha le vak shok phakhan, Sanhedrin le Israel nai hai shierpui rikip ruruchun ua, amani kha lungroko shung ah put ah vak chawina rang, mi rutir uh.
44005022	Inia mirung hai kha na rushe u phakhan, amani na lungroko shung khan tirtawn hai kha vak muh u lai mak. Khajarkhan vak kir ua thang vak koi uh.
44005023	“Kieini na lungroko kha thatak a rakhar, mirung hai kha mawkawt ah ading kha`awm kumuk uh, inia kawmawlawng u phakhan, shung ah tute muh u mi`ing.”
44005024	Khan thiempu rashang hai, riethiengmun arung lamkai, khan thiempu ulien hai na hihaihi rujet u phakhan, imaw shok nih, tia shindawngna runiei uh.
44005025	Khalaitak khan miring `khat vak shok a vak rophong, “Enro, lungroko shung ah nangikhum u hai kha na riethiengmun ah ding a mi hai kha ruchuk a awm uh.”
44005026	Khan lamkaipa kha na mirung hai kha le rushe a rawmawreshem moshok boi a amani kha vak chawi uh, ajarla mi hai kha na lung le nedeng u nih, tia ruchih uh.
44005027	Amani na vak chawi u phakhan, Sanhedrin maikung a rumiding ua thiempu rashang kha na amani dieng rurawdawn,
44005028	khan ama na ruti, “Mahi riming hin mi ruchukna boi rang, kieini na chawngkinabenrep u nimak maw? Inia enro, nangiruchuk u kha na Jerusalem hi ship joi. Hi miring thishen kha kieini dieng nangmocho jawt uh.”
44005029	Inia Peter le tirtawn hai na mashang a ruti uh, “Miring hainek khan Pathien chawng kha kirangai u rang a shok.
44005030	Thingling ah nangirumakhai ua nangiruthat u Jesu kha nipilepu hai Pathien kha na irumothoi inih.
44005031	Pathien na Israel hai dieng mulung lekna le munu rangaidamna pekna rang, Rengshapa le Shandampa `khat a, ukhut chang tieng awmna rang, rumulur joi.
44005032	Khan hihai jar hin kieini na kungachang kanih uh. Pathien na ama chawng rangai miring hai dieng ipek Ratha Riethieng na`awm hihai chungchang hin kungachang u inih.”
44005033	Amani na mahi rujet u phakhan, ajeng a mulung ruhang pe ua amani kha thatna rang, lam rutawk u joi.
44005034	Inia mi kholok na richit ipek, Dan oja, Gamaliel iti Pharisee miring `khat na Sanhedrin khan ruding a tirtawn hai kha vai ah tetbawtna rang, chawng rupek.
44005035	Khashole amani dieng ruti, “Israel miring hai, hihai miring dieng hin thaw rang nangiti u kha miningrep u roh.
44005036	Ajartu kum `khat le `di mala khan Theudas iti miring `khat ruawm, ama na kiei kanih, tia miring rajamili dawr na ama anu rujui uh, inia ama kha ruthat uh. Khan ama rungamna miring kholok kha`awm chekrurachai ua ruthangsho u joi.
44005037	Ama shole, Judas iti Galilee miring `khat ruthoi. Mijattelai khan mitampui na ama anu kha rujui uh. Ama`awm khatikhan ruthang a ama rungamna miring hai kha chekrurachai uh.
44005038	Khajarkhan tunawm chonmun hi nangni dieng kinieriei u inih: hihai miring hi ralat pui u roh, ithaw jawt kha thaw u rosho. Hihai chonmun hai hi manmieshie miring na irashak chonmun nitatu, thang rang keng.
44005039	Inia mahi Pathien ah put ah nitatu, mathang ngam u naw tinih. Pathien le rosho nangchang u rang keng.”
44005040	Amani kha khatikhan ama na rumawjawt. Khashole amani na tirtawn hai kha koi ua, rujem uh. Khan Jesu riming a chawngriei tha mak, tia chawngrubenrep ua rumoshok u joi.
44005041	Sanhedrin kha irumathan u le roroia, ama riming jar a maimawk rang a kha Pathien na irutukmashak inih, tia ningaina kha runiei uh.
44005042	Khan ningthingkip hin riethiengmun ah nit a in ah nita`awm, Jesu hi Christa inih, iti kha ruchuh le rophong ruchat u mak.
44006001	Khalai a nikho hai khan akhaichawi hai jat kha hawng rawp shishit le roroia, Greek hai na, nikhonikho a nekleshak reshemna khan, amani mieirawng hai kha ruenda uh, tia Hebrew hai chung a ningnitna boi kha rurophong uh.
44006002	Khan tirtawn shawmlieidi kha na khaichawi hai kholok kha ruchun a ruti uh, “Tirtawn kieini na Pathien chawng kha mathan a tebol chung ah nekleshak reshepna niboi pui u hi adik nimak.
44006003	Khajarkhan uliennai hai mahi chonmun hin a rashap pui rang, mi na kungichangna, Ratha Riethieng le shingna aship, ashing miring shiri nang kar ua tawk u tana kieini na madan u rang kanih.
44006004	Inia kieini tu anih le chawngshemna a repeh u rang kanih.”
44006005	Mahi chawng hi na mipui kha ningruminit pe a takashawn anieitak le Ratha Riethieng aship, Stephen, Philip, Prochorus, Nicanor, Timon, Parmenas, khan Jihudi ajir Antioch miring, Nicolas, amani hai hi rumadan uh.
44006006	Amani kha tirtawn hai maikung a rumiding ua nikna runiei pe uh, khan amani chung a khut rutet pe uh.
44006007	Khan Pathien chawng kha rurajar a Jerusalem shung ah khaichawi hai jat kha ajeng a rupung joi. Khan thiempu hai kar a tampui na takashawn kha rushap u joi.
44006008	Stephen na, takashawn le ranak ship a, miring hai kar a rekhekchon le jetna lienpui ruthaw.
44006009	Khania Synagogue Moshok Miring hai iti ah put ah miring, Cyrene, Alexandria, khan Cilicia le Asia miring hai na Stephen le chawngrieshietna rumothoi uh.
44006010	Inia ama ruchawngna shingna le Ratha chung khan rumene ngam u mak.
44006011	Khashole amani na miring eshen muruk a rurachak ua, “Ama na Moses le khan Pathien mieshietna chawngiriei kha kejet uh,” rumiti uh.
44006012	Amani na shierulien hai, danoja hai kha le roroia, mi hai kha rumarang uh. Khashole amani na jetboithieiboi a va uh, khan ama kha rushur ua Sanhedrin ah ruchawi uh.
44006013	Amani na adik boi kungchangna hai kha rupek ua ruti uh, “Mahi miringpa hi na riethiengmun le Dan irodoi pui mieshietna chawngriei kha bang mak.
44006014	Ajarla ama na iriei kejet uh, makhala mahi Nazareth Jesu hi na hi mun hi mathang rangnih, khan kieini dieng inepek Moses shedan kha melet rangnih.”
44006015	Khan Sanhedrin shung a rushuh miring kholok na ama kha ruenrep u phakhan, ama meh kha ravantir meh ang a rumuk uh.
44007001	Khashole thiempu rashang na ama dieng rurawdawn, “Hihaihi khati maw nih?”
44007002	Stephen na rumashang, “Uliennai miring hai le kapa hai, narangai pe u roh. Nupu u Abraham na Haran ah ruawm mala khan, Mesopotamia ah ruawm. Khan Pathien alur na ama dieng rular.
44007003	Khan Abraham dieng ruti, ‘Nang ram le nang inkoshangram kha mah tana kinumumuk rang a ram khawn she rang roh.’
44007004	Khashole ama na Chaldea miring hai ram kha rumathan a Haran khan kho ruloh. Apa thit shole, Pathien na tun a nangawmna u ram hin ivakthawt inih.
44007005	Ama na kepha tetna khawpshe inkoklo `khat a rupeh mak. Inia Abraham na nai runiei joi nawkawm, Pathien na ama dieng le ama shole ichicha dieng mahi ram hi tumna rang, chawngirurakham inih.
44007006	Pathien na hitihin ama dieng ruti, makhala ama chicha hai na mejet boi ram ah khotang chang u rangnih, khan amani na shok machang a kum rajamili engshiet a thaw u rangnih.
44007007	Inia Pathien na ruti, ‘Kiei na shok namachang hai phung kha chep rang kanih, khashole amani na vak shok u ning, tia mahi mun hin kiei hi chubainabawk u rangnih.’
44007008	Khashole Abraham dieng vunepna rawjawtna kha rupek. Khatikhan Abraham na Isaac runiei a ni `riet changna a vunruep pe. Khan Isaac na Jacob kha runiei, khan Jacob na phungpa hai shawmlieidi kha runiei.
44007009	“Khan phungpa hai kha na Joseph kha rueng ua, Egypt ah rujor uh. Inia ama kha Pathien na rurawtawp pui.
44007010	Khan shawna kholok ah put ah rukhek a ama dieng Egypt reng Pharaoh maikung a numpokmirit mukna ngam rang, varna kha Pathien na rupek. Khan Pharaoh na Egypt le ama inshungkhur kholok chung a rampo rumachang.
44007011	Tun Egypt le Canaan ram kholok ah nekleshak hawng ravat joi. Mahi na shawna lientak `khat hawng moshok a pilepu hai kha na nekleshak rumuh u lai mak.
44007012	Jacob na Egypt ah nekleshak awm, iti rujet phakhan, akhat changna a pilepu hai kha rutir.
44007013	Adi changna a Joseph na ama ulien hai dieng ama kha tumaw nih, iti kha rumejet. Khan Joseph inshungkhur hai kha Pharaoh dieng rumejet.
44007014	Khashole Joseph na rutir a apa Jacob le ama inshung shawm shirilieirahnga kholok kha rukoi joi.
44007015	Jacob na Egypt khan rushe a ruthi joi, khan pilepu hai kha`awm kha ram khan ruthi u joi.
44007016	Amani rok hai kha Shechem khan ruchawi ua Abraham na Shechem apa Hamor shapa hai dieng a irurawchawk thanmun khan rukhum uh.
44007017	“Inia Pathien na Abraham dieng chawngirurakham kha hawng rupumna rang a pha kha hawng nai phakhan,
44007018	Joseph ajet boi reng shik `khat hawng awm malalim Egypt ah amani jat kha rupung shishit uh.
44007019	Mahi reng hi na nuphung u kha rumohon uh, shietak a rutawn, khan pilepu hai kha engshiet a ruthaw a amani nai shentengek hai kha ringna boi rang, ranak a rumapai uh.
44007020	Hi pha hin a Moses kha rushok inih. Khan ama kha Pathien maikung a metha `khat ruchang, khan apa in khan tha `thum rujawk uh.
44007021	Khan ama kha vai ah rupai u phakhan, Pharaoh shanu na rushar a ashapatak ang a rujawk.
44007022	Khajarkhan Moses na Egypt miring hai varna kholok khan hawng ruchuk a, chawng le chon hai khan ranak hawng niei.
44007023	“Ama na kum shawm mili hawng nih phakhan, ama uliennai Israel nai hai kha phakna rang, mulung hawng niei.
44007024	Khan mi `khat hi na adik boi a ama uliennai itawn kha rumuk phakhan, rumakhana khan khutrumieshiei a Egypt miringpa kha Moses na ruthat.
44007025	Pathien na amani kha ama khut le ishanna inih, iti kha jet u rangnih, tia rumining, inia amani na rujet u mak.
44007026	Jing tieng hin ama na rushe a Israel miring pasha `di rosho a ruawm kha riengieimashakna rang, ama na ruti, ‘Miring hai nangni uliennai nangnih uh, ijar a nangni khatlekhat adik boi a rawtawn maw nangnih uh?’
44007027	Inia adik boi a rutawnpa kha na Moses kha rutor a ama dieng ruti, ‘Tu na nang kha kieini anapo rang le chawngshat rang a inamadan maw nih?
44007028	Majan a Egypt miring nangiruthat kha ang a ninathat jawt maw nih?’
44007029	Makha chawng khan Moses na rutan a Midian ram ah khotang ruchang. Makha mun khan shapa `di apa ruchang.
44007030	“Khan kum shawm mili shole, Pumi ravantir `khat na Sinai Mo ramthim khan rampabuk mieichon a ama dieng rular.
44007031	Moses na makha rumuk phakhan, imuk khan shindawngna runiei a tintana rang, rujawng phakhan, Pumi he kha ama dieng jong.
44007032	‘Kiei hi nang pilepu hai Pathien, Abraham Pathien, Isaac Pathien, khan Jacob Pathien kha kanih.’ Moses na chihai a ruen ngam mak.
44007033	‘Khashole PUMI na ama dieng ruti, “Nang kekawk kha thut roh, ajarla nang dingna mun kha mun riethieng inih.
44007034	Egypt ah kimiring hai dieng a tawnshie kha kiei na kumuk joi. Khan amani shawra`ai kha kurujet joi. Amani akhek rang khan ajong kanih joi. Tun va rang roh, Egypt ah nitir rang kanih joi.” ’
44007035	“Mahi Moses hi keng amani na irujawt boi u kha. Amani na ruti uh, ‘Tu na rampo rang le chawngshat rang, inamadan maw nih?’ Ama kha Pathien na lamkai rang le noroshoh a nakhek rang, rampabuk ah rular ravantir ranak jar a irutir inih.
44007036	Egypt ram ah Thampui Shen khan ama na rekhekchon le jetna ruthaw shole, amani kha lamirukai pe inih. Khan ramthim khan rekhekchon kha kum shawm mili iruthaw inih.
44007037	“Mahi Moses hi na keng Israel hai dieng a iruriei, ‘Nang PUMI nang Pathien na nangni rang, kiei a`ang Thiempulien `khat nang uliennai hai kar a mothoi rangnih. Ama chawng kha nangijui u rang a inih.’
44007038	Mahi Moses hi na ramthim ah puiruchun khan rujaw. Makhan ravantir na Sinai Mo khan ama dieng le nipilepu hai dieng chawngruriei. Khan kieini dieng a pek rang a ringna chawng hai kha ruloi.
44007039	Pilepu hai kha na ama chawng kha rujui jawt u mak. Kha ruhut a ama kha ruheng ua amani mulung a Egypt tieng rukir jawt uh.
44007040	Amani na Aaron dieng ruti uh, ‘Kamaton uah lawn rang pathien hai kha nokon pe u roh. Egypt ah put ah lamnawhawngkai pe u mahi Moses hi tu, ama chung a ih shok maw nih joi, iti jet u mi`ing.’
44007041	Makha phakhan, shieite rukon ua rilim khan rurawthawi uh, khan amani khutkontak khan ningrungai pe uh.
44007042	Inia Pathien na amani ah put ah mai rumiehiei a ravan a arshi chubaibawk rang rupek joi. Hitihin Thiempulien hai behangbuk ah rumiejiek: ‘Aw Israel inshung miring hai, nangithat u juleva hai kha le ramthim ah kum shawm mili nangrurawthawi u lai khan, kiei dieng nanginurupek u boi maw nih?
44007043	Moloch thamber in le nang pathien u Remphan arshi nangruchawi uh. Moloch le Remphan kha chubaibawk rang a nangirukon u konrilim hai kha inih. Khajarkhan Babylon kha mekhe a nawnawt u rang kanih joi.’
44007044	“Nipilepu hai na ramthim khan kungchangna thamber kha runiei uh. Makha Pathien na Moses dieng irilim irumumuk a chawngirupek dungjuia irukon inih.
44007045	Khan pilepu hai na, Phungshik hai khut chung a put ah amani ram rukhek u lai khan, makha Joshua le ivakchawi u inih. Pathien na amani kha pilepu hai maikung a runawt a thamber kha David phashe khan ruawm.
44007046	David na Pathien maikung a enlar rumuk a Jacob Pathien awmna rang, mun irunik inih.
44007047	Inia Solomon kha keng Pathien rang a in rumothoi kha.
44007048	“Nitjoiawm Chungchon a Rashang ama na miring hai khut le kon rilimin khan awm mak. Mahi thiempulien na iruriei kha le ra`ang inih:
44007049	‘Ravan hi kerengmun inih, khan rieliei hi kekekhawng inih. Ih ang in kha maw kiei rang nomothoi pe u rawng? Ninawkle kawshawmuchumna mun kha imaw nih?
44007050	Kukhut na hihai kholok hi ikon nimak maw? tia PUMI na ieriei.’
44007051	“Aw kangshawng, khan mulung le nokor a vunep boi miring hai! Nang pilepu hai kha ang a Ratha Riethieng kha nangre`erpui jawnjai uh.
44007052	Ih ang thiempulien hai kha maw nang pilepu hai na epshawna irupek boi uh? Amani na Midik `Khat jong rangnih, tia rurieimasha hai kha ruthat uh, khan ama ajor le athat hai kha nangruchang uh.
44007053	Nangni hi ravantir hai na irumuchuk Dan kha ruloi a rujui boi miring kha nangnih uh.”
44007054	Miring hai kha na hihaihi rujet u phakhan, mulungruhang pe ua, ama chung a harureshe uh.
44007055	Ratha Riethieng ship a ravan tieng ruen a Pathien lurna le Jesu na Pathien khut chang tieng ading kha rumuk.
44007056	Ama na ruti, “Enro! Kiei na ravan rawlawng a Miring Shapa kha na Pathien khut chang tieng ading a awm kha kumuk.”
44007057	Inia amani na nokor rushing uh, khan ra`ailam a rushukbir a ama kha rujawng uh.
44007058	Khashole amani na khopui vai tieng rupawt ua lung le rudeng u joi. Khan a kungachang hai kha na Saul iti rothar `khat keshun ah amani ponledier kha rubawm uh.
