44007059	Amani na Stephen kha rudeng u lai khan, ama na nikna runiei, “Aw Pumi Jesu, karatha hi noloi pe roh.”
44007060	Khashole rukhuk shunlam a he rashangtak a rura`ai, “Aw Pumi, hihai munu hi amani dieng mutung pe naw roh.” Mahi ruriei shole, arangruchat joi. Khan amani na Stephen iruthat u khan Saul rujawt.
44008001	Khanikhan Jerusalem biekrup chung a epshawna lientak `khat hawngshok joi. Tirtawn hai niboia, takashawn kholok kha Judea le Samaria ram ah rurethehmashak joi.
44008002	Khan richichawi miring hai na Stephen kha rukhum ua, ama chung a mulung jumna runiei uh.
44008003	Inia Saul na tu in rikip ah lut a biekrup kha mupuhok a ruthaw, khan nupang apa jet boi a lungroko shung ah rukai a rukhum joi.
44008004	Khajarkhan retherak miring hai kha na munmun ah rushe ua athachawng kha rushem uh.
44008005	Philip na Samaria ah rushe a amani dieng Christa kha rurophong.
44008006	Philip na iruthaw jetna hai kha rujet a rumuk u phakhan, mipui na ama chawngriei kha mulungluttak a rurangaishom uh.
44008007	Ajarla raikho rono hai kha na ra`ailam a, aniei miring tampui ah put ah, vak shok uh, khan takthi ninawkle kekhawr miring tampui kha rumadam.
44008008	Khajarkhan kha khopui khan ningaina lientak `khat ruawm joi.
44008009	Khalaikhan makha khopui shung khan matienglai a dawileai chon thaw, Simon iti miring `khat ruawm. Ama na ibibing a alien `khat kanih, tia, Samaria miring hai kha shinrumawdawng pe uh.
44008010	Ashinalien mi kholok na “Hi miring hi Pathien ranak alien kha keng,” tia mulunglut a rurangai uh.
44008011	Ama dieng mulungluttak a irurangaina u ajartu, pha shawttak mahi dawileai hai hi le shinirumawdawng pe u inih.
44008012	Inia amani na Pathien rengchangna jar a le Jesu Christa riming chungchanga chawng rushem, Philip kha takarushawn u phakhan, nupang apa dire na baptisma ruloi uh.
44008013	Simonshe kha na`awm takarushawn joi. Khan ama na baptisma ruloi shole, Philip le chatboi a rurawtawp joi, khan ranakniei chon le jetna hai kha rumuk phakhan, shinrudawng pe.
44008014	Khan Samaria miring hai na Pathien chawng kha loi u joi, iti chawng kha Jerusalem ah awm tirtawn hai na rujet u phakhan, Peter le John kha amani dieng rutir uh.
44008015	Idi hai kha na rushe ua, takashawn `thar hai na Ratha Riethieng tumna u rang, runik pe uh.
44008016	Ajarla Ratha Riethieng na amani `khat diengshe jong maklai. Amani na Pumi Jesu riming ranga kha le baptisma iruloi u nilai.
44008017	Khashole Peter le John na amani chung ah khut rutet pe ua Ratha Riethieng kha rutum u joi.
44008018	Khan tirtawn hai khut kha amani chung ah atet shole, Ratha Riethieng irupek kha Simon na rumuk phakhan, amani dieng shier rupek.
44008019	Khan ama na ruti, “Tukhat chung ah khut hai hi katet `le, Ratha Riethieng muknathiei rang, kiei diengawm mahi cham hi nepeh u roh.”
44008020	Inia Peter na ama dieng ruti, “Pathien khutchawi hi shier pek a mukthiei, tia nangmining jarkhan, nang shier hi nang le athangchen nih rosho!
44008021	Mahi chonmun hin tum ninawkle roiruputna niei makche, ajarla nang mulung kha Pathien maikung a dik mak.
44008022	Khajarkhan mahi ashie ah put ah mulung lek tana Pathien dieng nikna niei roh. Khanitatu nang mulung na ikhin kha rangaidam pekthiei rangnih.
44008023	Ajarla mulung akha na inubuk khan dikna boi thirakarui na inokhop kha kiei na kumuk.”
44008024	Simon na mashang a ruti, “Nangiti hai kholok kha kiei dieng shokna boi rang, kiei rang Pumi dieng ninik pe roh.”
44008025	Tun Peter le John na kungruchangsho ua, Pumi chawng kha rushemsho u `le, Jerusalem ah rukir u joi. Khan lam ah athachawng kha Samaria miring hai kho tampui dieng vak shem u joi.
44008026	Khashole Pumi ravantir na Philip dieng ruriei, “Thoi roh, khan thang tieng she tana Jerusalem ah put ah Gaza tieng shena lamshuk ramthim lam kha rawh roh.”
44008027	Khajarkhan Philip na thoi a rushe joi. Khan enro, chamnieitak Ethiopia eunuch `khat ruawm. Ama kha Ethiopia miring hai rengnu Candace niei`in kholok apana runih. Ama na Jerusalem ah Pathien bieh rushe inih.
44008028	In tieng rukirna ama shakawr gari chung ah shutlam a thiempulien Isaiah behangbuk kha rute a ruawm.
44008029	Khashole Ratha na Philip dieng ruti, “Jawng tana shakawr gari khaw vak dep roh.”
44008030	Philip na rutan a ama na thiempulien Isaiah behangbuk irute a ruawm kha vak rangai phakhan, rurawdawn, “Nangite kha nangjet maw?”
44008031	Ama na ruti, “Mi `khat na lamnakai pe nawkala, itia maw kiei na jet ngam ning?” Khan Philip kha hawng lut a hawng shutna rang, ama na rudawi.
44008032	Ama na irute Miejiek khala hi inih: “That rang a ichawi kengam ang a, khan moeppa maikung a a`awmchien kengamte kha ang a, ama na bai rumakak mak.
44008033	Ama redena khan, ama dikna kha loi pe joi. Tu na maw ama chicha hai jar a rophong nih? Ajarla rieliei ah put ah iringkho kha loi pe joi.”
44008034	Eunuch na Philip dieng ruti, “Nawrawdawn rawng, thiempulien na tu jar a iriei maw nih, ibibing jar a maw nih ninawkle tu `khat chungchanga iriei maw nih?”
44008035	Khashole Philip na ener rumakak a mahi miejiektak hin ah put ah Jesu chungchanga athachawng kha rurophong pe joi.
44008036	Khan amani na lam kha ivakrawh u le roroia, tui awmna mun `khat ruawm, khan eunuch na ruti, “Enro, hin tui awm joi, kiei baptisma ninomoloi rang hin tu na maw namakha nih?”
44008037	Khan Philip na ruti, “Nang mulung kholok le takanangshawn a tu, nangthawthiei.” Khan ama na mashang a ruti, “Kiei na Jesu Christa hi Pathien Shapa kha inih, iti hi takakawshawn.”
44008038	Shakawr gari kha dingna rang chawng rupek a, Philip le eunuch adin u tui awmna tieng khan ruchum uh, khan ama na baptisma rupek joi.
44008039	Amani na tui ah put ah hawng shok phakhan, Pumi Ratha na Philip kha ruchawi joi. Eunuch na ama kha rumulai mak, khan ama na ningailam a rupang joi.
44008040	Inia Philip na Azotus khan rurumuh joi, khan Philip na khopui kholok ah athachawng kha Caesarea vak shok masheng, rushem joi.
44009001	Khalaikhan Saul na Pumi khaichawi hai kha michitna rang le thatna rang, chawngrumoshok a thiempu rashang dieng rushe.
44009002	Ama na Damascus ah awm synagogue hai dieng mawchawi rang, chawngmawchawi `khat runik. Makha ama na Lam khan a awm, nupang apa, muk joiatu, Jerusalem ah vak chawi a lungroko shung ah thongna rang a inih.
44009003	Khan ama na rushe a Damascus rushokdeng le jetboithieiboi a ravan ah put ah mieivar na ama kha rokochip a jong eh joi.
44009004	Pieipak ah rupur a he `khat na ama dieng iriei kha rujet: “Saul, Saul, iloia kiei hi epshie a ninawthaw maw nih?”
44009005	Ama na rurawdawn, “Tumaw nangnih, Pumi?” Khan Pumi na rumashang, “Kiei hi epshie a nangithaw Jesu kha kanih. Rujumjap ruthui, iti hi amatat inih.”
44009006	Ama na rawnawk le shindawnglam a ruti, “Pumi, kiei hi nang rang imaw ninawmawthaw jawt?” Khan Pumi na ama dieng rumashang, “Thoi tana khopui khawn lut roh, nangithaw rang a kha nieriei rangnih.”
44009007	Ama le rurawtawp hai kha na chawng boi a ruding uh, ajarla he kha rujet u joiawm, tute rumuh u mak.
44009008	Pieipak ah put ah Saul na ruthoi a imik hawng makak phakhan, mik rumuh ngamlai mak. Khajarkhan amani na khut ah rumuroi ua Damascus tieng ruchawi u joi.
44009009	Khan ama na ni `thum mik muh boi a le nekleshak shah boi a ruawm.
44009010	Damascus shung khan Ananias iti khaichawi `khat ruawm. Pumi na mulungmik a ama dieng ruriei, “Ananias.” Ama na rumashang, “Hin ka`awm, Pumi.”
44009011	Pumi na ama dieng ruriei, “Thoi tana Lamton iti lamlien khawn she roh, khan Saul iti Tarsus miring `khat Judas in ah vak tawk roh, ajarla enro, ama na nikna niei a awm.
44009012	Khan imik hawng muknathiei rang, Ananias iti miring `khat va a ama chung ah khut ivaktet pe rang a kha Saul na mulungmik a rumuk joi.”
44009013	Inia Ananias na rumashang, “Pumi, Jerusalem ah awm nang miriethieng hai dieng khadawr khan ashie ruthaw, iti hi mi tampui ah put ah hi miringpa jar hi kurujet.
44009014	Khan mahin nang riming aban kholok kha shurna rang, thiempu ulien hai ah put ah cham `khat iniei inih.”
44009015	Inia Pumi na ama dieng ruti, “She roh, ajarla Phungshik hai, reng hai le Israel miring hai maikung a kiriming achawi rang khutshui `khat a kiei rang kamadan joi.
44009016	Hijarhin kiriming jarbak a idawrshe a shawna idoingir rang a maw nih kiei na mumuk rang kanih.”
44009017	Khashole Ananias na rushe a in khan rulut joi. Khan Saul chung ah ukhut rutet pe a ruti, “Uliennai Saul, lam ah nang dieng rular Pumi Jesu na, nangmuknathiei rang le Ratha Riethieng na nang chung a shipnathiei rang, kiei hi inavaktir inih.”
44009018	Khan relentak a imik ah put ah ngalip a`ang kha jongcho pe a imik kha hawng var pe joi, khan ruthoi a baptisma ruloi joi.
44009019	Khan nekleshak lekte rushak shole, ranak hawng niei joi. Khashole Damascus ah awm khaichawi hai le nikho shawtlawk ruawm.
44009020	Khan relentak a ama hi Pathien Shapa kha inih, tia Christa kha synagogue ah rophong ruput joi.
44009021	Ama chawng rurangai mi kholok na shindawngna runiei ua, ruti uh, “Hi miringpa hi Jerusalem ah Jesu riming aban hai mathangpa le amani kha shur a thiempu ulien hai dieng chawina rang, hin ah ava nimak maw?”
44009022	Saul na ranak ajeng a hawng niei shishit joi, khan Jesu hi Christa inih, iti hi akalang madangmashak phakhan, Damascus ah awm Jihudi hai kha awkruchak u joi.
44009023	Nikhothang hawng shawtbawt le Jihudi hai na ama kha thatna rang, rurashak uh.
44009024	Inia Saul na amani chonrashak kha rujet. Ama kha thatna rang, shumkawtpakawt ah shunlejan a amani na ruva uh.
44009025	Inia khaichawi hai na ama kha ruchawi ua jan a bang rebeng ah tiengkum lien `khat a rumuchum u joi.
44009026	Ama na Jerusalem ah vat phakhan, khaichawi hai kha le rawlawpna rang ruthaw. Inia amani kholok na ama kha ruchih uh, ajarla amani na khaichawi `khat chang joi, iti kha takarushawn u mak.
44009027	Inia Barnabas na ama kha vak moroi a tirtawn hai dieng vak chawi. Ama na lamlien ah Pumi kha irumuk a ama dieng chawng irurieina le Jesu riming a ngartak a Damascus shung ah chawng irurieina hai kha amani dieng rumejet.
44009028	Khashole amani le shehawng a Jerusalem ah ruawm joi.
44009029	Khan Pumi Jesu riming a ngartak a chawngruriei joi. Ama na Greek chawng a chawng Jihudi hai le chawngrurieshiet, khan amani na ama kha that rang rurashak uh.
44009030	Uliennai hai kha na makha rujet u phakhan, Caesarea tieng ruchawi ua Tarsus tieng rumuchum u joi.
44009031	Khalaikhan Judea, Galilee khan Samaria ah awm biekrup hai kha lungdamtak a ruawm ua rulien uh. Pumi chitna le Ratha Riethieng maw`awina kha le amani jat kha rupung shishit uh.
44009032	Khan hitihin ruawm makhala Peter na ram kholok a rushe a Lydda ah awm miriethieng hai kha`awm ruphak.
44009033	Kha mun khan rishi delap a kum riet ana, Aeneas iti miring `khat hi Peter na vak muk. Ama kha takthi miring runih.
44009034	Peter na ama dieng ruti, “Aeneas, Jesu Christa na nang kha namadam joi. Thoi tana nang jana kha jo rang roh.” Khan ama na relentak a ruthoi joi.
44009035	Khan Lydda le Sharon ah awm mi kholok na ama kha rumuk ua, Pumi dieng ruhiei u joi.
44009036	Khalaikhan Tabitha iti khaichawi `khat hi Joppa khan ruawm. Makha nemele `le, Dorcas tina inih. Ama kha chon atha le numpokpek chonthaw miring `khat runih.
44009037	Khalaikhan ama kha ana a ruthi joi. Amani na tuirobomashaksho u le, chungindan `khat a rumaja u joi.
44009038	Lydda kha Joppa le ranai nit jarkhan, khaichawi hai na Peter kha khawn awm iti kha rujet ua akoi pasha `di rutir uh. Amani na relentak a navat pe u roh, tia rudawi uh.
44009039	Khajarkhan Peter na ruthoi a rushe, khan kha mun kha rushok phakhan, amani na ama kha chungindan khan ruhawng pui uh. Mieirawng hai kholok na ama dieng ruding ua, amani le ruawmlai a, Dorcas na iruchi pe u takdep le ponledier hai kha rumumuk ua ruchap uh.
44009040	Peter na amani kholok kha vai rumoshok a rukhuk shunlam a nikna runiei. Ama na rok tieng khan hiei a ruti, “Tabitha, thoi rang roh.” Khashole ama na imik hawng makak a Peter kha hawng muk phakhan, hawng shuh joi.
44009041	Khan ama na khut rushawn a ama kha rumothoi joi. Khashole miriethieng hai le mieirawng hai kha rukoi a, iringlam a ama kha rupek joi.
44009042	Mahi Joppa ah awm kholok na rujet ua, miring tampui na Pumi kha takarushawn uh.
44009043	Khalaikhan Joppa ah Simon iti mevunchonthaw `khat le nikho shawtbawt ruawm.
44010001	Caesarea ah Cornelius iti miring `khat ruawm. Ama kha Italy rarup iti rarajakhat lamkai runih.
44010002	Ama inshung kholok le ama kha richichawi, Pathien kha achih, mi hai dieng numpokpek arat, khan Pathien dieng nikna aniei jawnjai miring `khat runih.
44010003	Nishun nidan `thum dawr hin Pathien ravantir `khat na jong a “Cornelius!” tia ijonghai kha mulungmik a malangsheng a ama na rumuk.
44010004	Ama dieng chitlam a ruenrep a ruti, “Mahi imaw nih, Pumi?” Ama na rumashang, “Nanginikna le nang numpokpek hai kha miningna `khat a Pathien maikung hawng shok joi.
44010005	Tun Joppa ah miring hai kha tir tana Peter iti Simon kha vak mokoi roh.
44010006	Ama kha thampui kawmchang ah awm, mevunchonthaw miring, Simon iti miring `khat in ah awm inih. Peter na nangithaw rang a kha nieriei rangnih.”
44010007	Ama dieng chawng ariei ravantir kha rushe shole, Cornelius na ama inshung shok `di le ama arung richichawi ramiring `khat rukoi.
44010008	Khan amani dieng irikip ruriei shole, Joppa ah rutir joi.
44010009	Jing tieng, nidan shawmlieidi dawr hin, amani na lam rurawh ua khopui kha ivakdep u le roroia, Peter na inphu chung ah Pathien dieng anih rang ruka.
44010010	Ama kha vawnrucham pe a ih `khat rushak jawt. Khan amani na ama rang rurasham pe u lai khan, ama kha shuika a ruawm joi.
44010011	Ama na ravan rawlawng kha rumuk, khan ama dieng nieinak `khat pon alien mawr mili a khit a rieliei a ijongmuchum kha rumuk.
44010012	Makha shung khan ke mili niei rieliei ranring kholok, ramsha hai, vawn a rawshawn, khan ravan a va haiawm ruawm.
44010013	Khan he `khat na ruriei, “Peter, thoi roh, that tana shah roh.”
44010014	Inia Peter na ruti, “Nithiei naw nih, Pumi! Ajarla itikte nita`awm orono ninawkle riethieng boi nieinak kiei na shah mi`ing.”
44010015	He kha na voidi changna a jong rieiret, “Pathien na iriethiengsho hai kha nang na orono keng tithiei naw tinih.”
44010016	Hitihin voithum rushok a nieinak hai kha ravan tieng ruchawiret joi.
44010017	Peter na mulungmik a irumuk kha ih tina maw nih, tia shindawngna runieilaitak khan, Cornelius na ivaktir hai kha na pakawt khan ruding ua, Simon in kha rurawdawn uh.
44010018	Amani na rukoi ua Peter iti Simon kha hin maw awm, tia rurawdawn uh.
44010019	Peter na mulungmik chungchanga rumininglaitak khan, Ratha na ama dieng ruriei, “Enro, miring pasha `thum na nang kha natawk uh.
44010020	Thoi tana chum rang roh, khan rakhana niei boi a amani le she roh, ajarla amani hi kivaktir hai kha inih.”
44010021	Khajarkhan Peter na jong chum a Cornelius na ivaktir miring hai dieng ruti, “Nangitawk u kha kiei hi kanih, ijar a va maw nangnih uh?”
44010022	Amani na rumashang uh, “Rarajakhat lamkai, midik, Pathien kha achih miring, khan Jihudi phung kholok na richit ipek u, Cornelius na nang kha ama in ah koi a nang ah put ah chawng rangaina rang hin, ravantir riethieng na jong mejet.”
44010023	Khajarkhan Peter na amani kha rukoi a ama in ah rumutung joi. Jing tieng hin ama na ruthoi a amani le khan Joppa ah awm uliennai eshen le rawtawp a rushe joi.
44010024	Jing tieng hin amani na Caesarea vak shok u joi. Cornelius na amani kha rungak a ruawm, khan inshung miring hai le lawmdit hai kha lawpkhat a rukoi.
44010025	Peter na vak shok le roroia, Cornelius na lamjawng ruthaw a ekeshun ah bawklap a ama kha chubairubawk.
44010026	Inia Peter na rumothoi a ruti, “Thoi roh, keiawm miring kanih keng.”
44010027	Khan Peter na chawngiruriei pui le roroia, in rulut a mi tampui ruchun a ruawm kha vak muk.
44010028	Khan amani dieng ruti, “Jihudi `khat na Phungshik le rawtawp ninawkle alawn hi dan nih boi inih, iti hi nangjet uh. Inia kiei na tu kha`awm rono ninawkle riethieng boi kitina boi rang, Pathien na kiei dieng numumuk joi.
44010029	Khajarkhan kiei hi nangnavak mokoi phakhan, rakhana niei boi a kava hi inih. Khajarkhan tun kiei na nawrawdawn rawng: ijar a kiei hi ninavakmokoi u maw nih?”
44010030	Cornelius na rumashang, “Ni mili mala khan, mahi phatak hin kiei na chamrakurudoi, khan nidan `thum dawr hin ki`in ah nikna kuruniei. Khan enro, pon cheklak rieshiei miring `khat na kamaton ah jong ding.
44010031	Khan ama na ruti, ‘Cornelius, nanginikna kha Pathien na rangai joi, khan nang numpokpek hai kha Pathien na nimininghep pe joi.
44010032	Khajarkhan Joppa ah awm, Peter iti Simon kha akoi tir roh. Ama kha thampui kawmchang ah awm, mevunchonthaw Simon in ah awm inih. Ama na vat phakhan, nang dieng chawng nieriei pe rangnih.’
44010033	Khajarkhan relentak a nang kha anakoi rang kivaktir inih. Nangnavat pe jar hin mapak awm. Pathien na nang dieng chawng inepek kholok rangai rang, tun Pathien maikung a kokholok a ka`awm u hi inih.”
44010034	Khashole abai makak a Peter na ruti, “Diktak a Pathien na enshietenlar thaw mak iti hi kejet joi.
44010035	Inia phung rikip shung a tunita`awm ama achih le adik athaw miring kha ama na ipawm inih.
44010036	Mahi Pathien na Israel miring hai dieng ijongtir chawng kha inih. Jesu Christa jar a lungdamna kha ama na irushem inih. Ama kha kholok Pumi inih.
44010037	Baptisma chungchanga John na rushem shole, Galilee ah put ah Judea kholok ah ashok chon kha nangrujet u joi.
44010038	Pathien na Ratha Riethieng le khan ranak le Nazareth Jesu kha thaoirunawt kha nangjet uh. Pathien na ama kha rawtawp pui jarkhan, shehawng a chon atha kha ruthaw a diabol ranak thoi a ruawm kholok kha irumadam inih.
44010039	“Jihudi hai ram ah le Jerusalem ah iruthaw hai kholok kha kungkuruchang uh. Amani na ama kha thing ling ah makhai a iruthat u inih.
44010040	Inia Pathien na ni `thum changna khan rumothoi a malangsheng a ruralarmashak.
44010041	Mi kholok dieng rular nimak, inia kungchang rang, Pathien na matieng irumadan hai, khan athi ah put ah hawng thoi shole, ama le runerusha hai, kieini dieng a inih.
44010042	Mi hai dieng chawngshem rang le khan Pathien na irumadan ama kha aring le athi hai chung a chawngshatpa kha inih, tia kungchangna rang, chawng nurupek u joi.
44010043	Thiempulien kholok na mahi Jesu chungchanga kungruchang uh, makhala tunita`awm ama dieng takashawn kha na ama riming jar a munu ah put ah rangaidamna kha muk rangnih.”
44010044	Peter na chawngriei a ruawmlai khan, Ratha Riethieng na chawngrurangai hai kholok dieng jong chutna joi.
44010045	Peter le ava vunep takashawn hai kha na, Phungshik hai diengawm Ratha Riethieng khutchawi jong shok jarkhan, shindawngna runiei uh.
44010046	Ajarla amani na chawngshik a ruchawng ua Pathien imapak u kha rujet uh. Khashole Peter na ruriei,
44010047	“Kieini na niniei u tak kha ang a, Ratha Riethieng amuh miring hai hi baptisma aloi ah put ah tu maw amakha ngam rang?”
44010048	Khajarkhan Pumi riming a amani kha baptisma loina rang, chawng rupek uh. Khashole amani na nikho shawtbawt awmna rang, Peter kha rudawi uh.
44011001	Khan Judea ah awm tirtawn hai le uliennai hai na Phungshik hai na`awm Pathien chawng kha man u joi, iti kha rujet u joi.
44011002	Khajarkhan Peter na Jerusalem ah rushe phakhan, vunep miring hai na chawngrurieshiet pui uh.
44011003	Amani na ruti uh, “Vunep boi hai dieng nangshe a amani le nekleshak nangvakshak pui.”
44011004	Khania Peter na amani dieng dawdawn a ariei ruput,
44011005	“Kiei na Joppa ah nikna kuruniei a shuika a kuruawmlai khan mulungmik `khat kurumuk. Makhan pon alientak `khat ang a ravan ah put ah nieinak `khat shir mili ah khitlam a jong rede a nojong dep.
44011006	Depkhit a kuruen phakhan, rieliei a awm ke mili niei ranring, ramsha, vawn a rawshawn, khan chung a va hai kha kurumuk.
44011007	He `khat na kiei dieng inieriei kha kurujet, ‘Peter, thoi roh. That tana shah roh.’
44011008	“Inia kiei na kurumashang, ‘Nithiei naw nih, Pumi! Ajarla itikte nita`awm orono ninawkle riethieng boi kabai ah lut mak lai.’
44011009	Inia voidi changna a ravan a he kha na nurumashang, ‘Pathien na iriethiengsho hai kha nang na rono tithiei naw tinih.’
44011010	Hitihin voithum rushok, khan irikip kha ravan tieng ruchawiret joi.
44011011	“Khalaitak khan enro, Caesarea ah put ah ivaktir miring `thum kha kaw`awmna in khan vak tung uh.
44011012	Amani le rakhana niei boi a sheshomna rang, kiei dieng Ratha na nururiei. Uliennai `ruk hi na`awm nawrawtawp pui ua miringpa in khan kurulut uh.
44011013	Ama in ah ravantir na jong ding kha rumuk a ‘Joppa ah awm Peter iti Simon akoi rang miring tir roh.
44011014	Nang le nang inshung miring kholok inashanna rang a chawng kha ama na nepek u rangnih,’ tia ijongriei dan kha kieini dieng nururiei uh.
44011015	“Kiei na amani dieng chawngriei kiruput le roroia, putna ah put ah kieini dieng ajong kha ang a, Ratha Riethieng kha amani dieng jong shok nih joi.
44011016	Khan ‘John na tui a baptisma nurupek uh, inia kiei na tu Ratha Riethieng a baptisma nepek u rang kanih,’ iti Pumi chawng kha kurumininghep.
44011017	Kieini na Pumi Jesu Christa kha takanurushawn u phakhan, inurupek u kha le ra`angre a, khutchawi kha Pathien na amani dieng rupek u joiatu, Pathien kha makha ngam rang kiei tumaw kanih?”
44011018	Amani na makha rujet u phakhan, ruawmchien uh, khan Pathien kha mulur a ruti uh, “Khanitatu Pathien na Phungshik hai diengawm ringna muknathiei mulung lekna kha rupek joi.”
44011019	Khan Stephen chung a iruthaw u epshawna jar a achairak hai kha Phoenicia ram, Cyprus tuikawram, khan Antiochshe kha ruravak u joi. Amani na Jihudi hai dieng niboia, tute dieng chawng kha rushem u mak.
44011020	Inia amani kar a Cyprus tuikawram le Cyrene miring eshen na Antioch ah va ua Greek chawng a chawng Jihudi hai diengawm Pumi Jesu chungchanga athachawng kha rurophong uh.
44011021	Pumi khut kha amani le ruawm, khan miring tampui na takarushawn ua, Pumi dieng ruhiei uh.
44011022	Mahi chawng hi Jerusalem biekrup nokor vak shok phakhan, Barnabas kha Antioch ah shena rang, rutir u joi.
44011023	Ama na ava a Pathien numpokmirit kha vak muk phakhan, ningrungai pe, khan amani na mulungdingrep a Pumi dieng awmna jawnjai u rang, amani kholok kha rumawshawk uh.
44011024	Ajarla Barnabas kha miring atha runih, khan Ratha Riethieng le takashawn kha aship miring kha runih. Khan Pumi dieng mi tampui rubo joi.
44011025	Khan Barnabas na Tarsus tieng Saul atawk rushe joi.
44011026	Khan ama kha rumuk phakhan, Antioch ah vak chawi joi. Khajarkhan kum rupumping a biekrup le ruruchun ua, mi tampui ruruchuk uh. Antioch hin akhat changna a khaichawi hai kha Christian hai, tia rukoi uh.
44011027	Kha pha khan thiempulien hai na Jerusalem ah put ah Antioch tieng va uh.
44011028	Amani hai kar a Agabus iti miring `khat ruding a Ratha na nuk a ashok rang a kha rurieina, makhala manmieshie pumpui hin nekleshak hawng ravat rangnih. Mahi Claudius Caesar na reng ruchanglai khanawm rushok nih joi.
44011029	Akhaichawi hai na imawtawrtuk ua Judea ah awm takashawn hai dieng shanna mawchawina rang, mulungrumiding uh.
44011030	Hitihin ruthaw ua Barnabas le Saul khut a bieklamkai hai dieng rumawchawi uh.
44012001	Khalaikhan reng Herod na khut ruraw a epshie a thawna rang, biekrup miring eshen hi rushur joi.
44012002	Ama na John ulienpa James kha chemjam le ruthat joi.
44012003	Khashole makha na Jihudi hai kha ningmangai pe, iti rujet `le, dawn a Peter kha`awm shurna rang, rurashak joi. Makha Chawjawboi Tan Nikho hai khan a inih.
44012004	Ama na ama kha rushur shole, lungroko shung ah ruthong joi. Ama kha arung rang tetradion mili dieng khutrurotho joi. Makha Rakanna shole, miring hai dieng vak chawina rang a inih.
44012005	Peter kha lungroko shung ah rutetlai khan, biekrup na ama rang mulungluttak a Pathien dieng nikna runiei uh.
44012006	Herod na vai ivakmoshokna rang a jantak khan, Peter na thirakarui `di le khoplam a ramiring `di kar ah ruja, khan mawkawt maton khan mirung hai kha na lungroko kha rurung uh.
44012007	Khan jetboithieiboi a Pumi ravantir na Peter maikung a jong lar a lungroko kha jong erak joi. Khan Peter kha edep ah jong shun, khan mothoi a ruti, “Relentak a thoi roh.” Khan aban ah thirakarui hai kha ruruthut pe joi.
44012008	Ravantir na ama dieng ruti, “Rasham tana nang kethawp kha mawrawn roh.” Makha Peter na ruthaw. Khan ravantir na rutiret, “Nang kotai rosho kha ko tana nujui roh.”
44012009	Peter na vak shok a ama anu kha rujui joi. Inia ravantir na iruthaw kha tak keng, tia rumining mak, inia mulungmik imuk `khat a rumining.
44012010	Amani na akhat changna le adi changna mirungna kha vak rakansho u le, khopui jawngna thirkawtpui kha vak shok uh. Amani rang khan nining a rurawlawng a makha vak rakan u joi. Khan kholaidung `khat hi rulawn u `le, jetboithieiboi a ravantir kha na rumak joi.
44012011	Khashole Peter na hawng chehep a ruti, “Herod khut ah put ah le Jihudi miring kholok na irumining uah put ah nashan rang, Pumi na ama ravantir kha ijongtir inih, iti hi ridinghet a kejet joi.”
44012012	Mahi jetphit `le, Mark iti John unu, Mary in ah rushe joi. Makha mun khan miring tampui ruruchun a nikna niei a ruawm uh.
44012013	Peter na vai tieng mawkawt kha rutaw phakhan, mashang rang, Rhoda, iti nungak-shok `khat hi rushe.
44012014	Peter hesho keng, iti rujet le ningai pe hai a mawkawt kha mawlawng ruhut a inshung tieng rutan a Peter mawkawt ah ding joi, tia vak riei.
44012015	Amani na ama dieng ruti uh, “Nang vet joi.” Inia ama na dikhet, tia ranaktak a ruriei. Khan amani na “Makha Peter ravantir keng,” ruti uh.
44012016	Peter na mawkawt kha rutaw a ruawm. Amani na mawkawt kha mawlawng a rumuk u phakhan, dawnga shinrudawng pe uh.
44012017	Amani kha awmchienna u rang, khut le rumakha a, Pumi na ama kha lungroko ah put ah ivakmoshokna dan kha ruriei. Khan ama na ruti, “Hihaihi James le uliennai hai dieng vak rophong u roh.” Khashole makha mun kha mathan a mun `khat tieng rushe joi.
44012018	Peter chung a khatikhan a ashok chon jarkhan, jingkar tieng ramiring hai kar a roshorakhana lientak rushok.
44012019	Herod na ama kha rutawk a rumuk boi phakhan, arung hai kha riringtak a enrete a thatna rang, chawng rupek joi. Hi shole hin Herod na Judea kha mathan joi, khan Caesarea ah rushe a makhan ruawm joi.
44012020	Khalaikhan Herod na Tyre le Sidon miring hai dieng dawnga mulung hangna runiei. Inia amani na mulung `khat a rengpa jana apana Blastus kha le rurashap ua, lungdam awmna rang ruthaw uh, ajarla rengpa ram kha na amani ram miring hai kha nekleshak irupek u inih.
44012021	Herod na nikho madan `khat a rengpon kha rurieshiei a chawngshatna shutna kha ruloh joi. Makhan Herod na mipui dieng chawngruriei pe.
44012022	Miring hai na hitihin rura`ai uh, “Pathien he keng, manmieshie he nimak!”
44012023	Ama na Pathien kha rumulur boi jarkhan, relentak a, Pumi ravantir `khat na ama kha jong jem a rulung na shak a ruthi joi.
44012024	Inia Pathien chawng kha rupung a rurajar joi.
44012025	Khashole amani chonmun kha rurupummashak ua, Barnabas le Saul kha Jerusalem ah put ah vak kir u joi. Khan amani na Mark iti John kha vak rawtawp pui uh.
44013001	Khan Antioch biekrup khan thiempulien hai le oja hai ruawm uh. Amani khala: Barnabas, Niger iti Simeon, Cyrene ah awm Lucius, tetrarch Herod le rulienshom Manaen, khan Saul, hihaihi runih uh.
44013002	Amani na Pumi chon thaw a chamrarudoi u lai khan, Ratha Riethieng na ruti, “Barnabas le Saul kha kikoina chonmun khan kiei rang shikjek a natet pe u roh.”
44013003	Khashole chamradoilam a nikna runiei uh, khan amani chung ah khut rutet pe ua amani kha rutir u joi.
44013004	Khajarkhan amani kha Ratha Riethieng na rutir ua Seleucia khan rushe u joi. Khan ah put ah Cyprus tieng rokong a rushe u joi.
44013005	Amani na Salamis kha rushok u phakhan, Jihudi hai synagogue ah Pathien chawng kha rushem uh. Khan John kha`awm amani rashap pui rang, rurawtawp pui uh.
44013006	Amani na tuikawram kholok kha rakan a Paphosshe kha rushok uh, khan Bar-Jesu iti Jihudi miring `khat rurawtawng pui uh. Ama kha dawipu le thiempulien jok `khat runih.
44013007	Ama na proconsul Sergius Paulus mishingtak `khat le ruawm. Sergius Paulus na Barnabas le Saul kha rukoi a Pathien chawng kha rurangai jawt.
44013008	Inia dawipu, Elymas (makha iriming imele inih) ama na amani kha rure`erpui a proconsul kha makha takashawn ah put ah hieina rang, ruthaw.
44013009	Inia Paul tia`awm ikoi, Saul na, Ratha Riethieng na jong ship a, ama kha enrep a
44013010	ruti, “Nang hi mimohonna kholok le milemmidawi aship, dikna kholok le raha, diabol shapa kha nangnih. Pumi lam ridik nangirehermashak kha bang naw rawng maw?
44013011	Enro, Pumi khut kha nang dieng jong cho joi. Nang mik chawning, tia richinkhat ni kha muh ngamlai naw tinih.” Relentak a romiei le ajing kha ama dieng jong pe a tukhat na khut mukui a lamikai pe rang a kha rutawk joi.
44013012	Proconsul kha na ashok chon kha rumuk phakhan, takarushawn, khashole Pumi chungchanga ruchukna khan shindawngna runiei.
44013013	Khashole Paul le irawtawp pui hai kha na Paphos ah put ah rushe ua, Pamphylia ah awm Perga khan rokong a va u joi. Inia John tu amani kha mak a Jerusalem tieng rukir joi.
44013014	Inia amani na Perga ah put ah rokong a rushe ua Pisidia ah awm Antioch ah va uh, khan Sabbath nikho khan synagogue ah rulut a rushuh uh.
44013015	Synagogue lamkai hai kha na Dan le Thiempulien behangbuk hai kha rutesho u le, amani dieng chawngrumeshe a ruti uh, “Uliennai miring hai, nangni na miring hai rang mawshawkna nangniei u joiatu, nieriei pe u roh.”
44013016	Khajarkhan Paul na ruthoi a khut le jetna thawlam a ruti, “Aw Israel miring hai le Pathien kha achih miring hai, rangai u roh.
44013017	Mahi Israel miring hai Pathien hi na nipilepu hai kha iruramadan inih. Amani na Egypt ram ah milak `khat a ruawm u lai khan, Pathien na amani kha irumielien a banbo rashang kha le makha ram ah put ah ivakroshoh u inih.
44013018	Ajarla ramthim khan kum shawm mili dawr hi amani ringdan kha irushaw pui inih.
44013019	Pathien na Canaan ram khan phung shiri rumathang shole, amani ram kha inkoklo `khat a amani dieng irushem pe inih.
44013020	Makha shole, thiempulien Samuelshe kha, kum rajamili shawm rahnga dawr hi amani dieng chawngshat hai kha rupek.
44013021	Makha shole, amani na reng runik uh, khan Pathien na Kish shapa Saul kha amani rang rupek. Ama kha Benjamin phung ah put ah inih, khan ama na kum shawm mili reng ruchang.
44013022	Ama kha rumabang shole, David kha Pathien na amani reng rumachang. Ama chungchanga kungchang a ruti, ‘Kumulung le racha rang Jesse shapa David kha kumuk joi. Ama na kimining kholok kha thaw rangnih.’
44013023	“Chawngrakham dungjuia David chicha ah put ah Israel hai rang Shandampa Jesu kha ijongmoshok inih.
44013024	Jesu jong shok mala khan John na mulung lek a baptisma loina chungchanga Israel miring kholok dieng rurophong pe joi.
44013025	Khan John na ama chon kha rumawtawr shole, ruti, ‘Kiei hi tumaw kanih, tia nangmining uh? Kiei hi ama kha nimi`ing, inia enro, kanuk a ajong rang a ama kha tu, ama kethawp thut rangshe kiei rutuk mi`ing.’
44013026	“Uliennai miring hai, Abraham chicha hai le nang kar ua Pathien kha achih miring hai, nangni dieng mahi shandamna chawng hi jong tir joi.
44013027	Ajarla Jerusalem ah awm miring hai le rampo hai kha na ama kha rujet u mak. Amani na Jesu kha iruheng u kha na, Sabbath rikip a irute u, Thiempulien hai hesho hai kha irurupummashak u inih.
44013028	Ama thitna rang a jar kha rumuk pe u nawkawm, ama kha thatna rang, amani na Pilate dieng runik uh.
44013029	Ama chungchanga irumiejiek rikip kha rurupummashaksho u `le, thing ling ah put ah ruloi ua than ah rumaja uh.
44013030	Inia Pathien na ama kha athi hai kar ah put ah irumothoi inih.
44013031	Khan nikhothang shawtbawt `le, Galilee ah put ah Jerusalemshe a ihawngpuishom hai dieng rular. Khan amani na mi hai dieng kungruchang uh.
44013032	“Khan pilepu hai dieng chawngirurakham athachawng kha nangni dieng kirophong u inih.
44013033	Jesu kha athi hai kar ah put ah rumothoi a, mahi chawngrakham hi Pathien na amani nai hai kieini rang rurupummashak joi. Mahi adi changna Lah a imiejiek kha le ra`ang inih: ‘Nang kashapa kha nangnih, von nikho hin konomoshok joi.’
44013034	Ama rok kha thutna boi rang, Pathien na athi hai kar ah put ah rumothoi joi. Ama chungchanga Pathien na hitihin ruriei: ‘David dieng irupek takashawn rang a rutuk le chawngrakham riethieng kha nang dieng nepek rang kanih.’
44013035	Khajarkhan Lah `khat a`awm ruti: ‘Nang Miring Riethieng kha na thutna imuk rang a kha nang na jawt naw tinih.’
44013036	“Ajarla David na Pathien idit dungjuia ama rongtak hai chon kha ruthaw shole, ruthi joi. Khan pilepu hai jana khan rumaja uh, khan thutna kha rumuk.
44013037	Inia Pathien na imothoi miring kha na tu thutna rumuh mak.
44013038	“Khajarkhan uliennai miring hai, mahi miring jar a munu chung a rangaidamna kha nangni dieng kirophong inih. Mahi nangni na nangijet u nih rosho.
44013039	Takashawn miring rikip kha, Moses Dan na iridik ngam boi kholok ah put ah, Jesu jar a iridik ngam inih.
44013040	Khajarkhan thiempulien behangbuk ah iruriei hai kha nangni dieng shokna boi rang, riring u roh:
44013041	‘Enro, mi ishawnboi a thaw hai, shindawngna niei u tana thang u roh. Ajarla nang nikho u hai hin, tukhat na nangni dieng nieriei u sheawm takashukshawn a nangishawn boi u rang a chon kha thaw rang kanih.’ ”
44013042	Jihudi miring hai synagogue kha irumathan le roroia, hawng shok rang a Sabbath hin Paul le Barnabas na hi hai chungchanga roirieinaret rang, Phunshik hai kha na rudawi uh.
44013043	Synagogue ah ruchun kha ruchin u `le, Jihudi hai tampui le Jihudi richi a jir richichawi hai kha na Paul le Barnabas kha rujui ua, amani na Pathien numpokmirit khan ruawm jawnjaina u rang, chawngruriei pe uh.
44013044	Ahawng rang a Sabbath khan khopui shung ah awm miring arawplam na Pathien chawng rangai rang, ruruchun uh.
44013045	Inia Jihudi hai na mipui kha rumuk u phakhan, mukmakna runiei uh. Paul na iriei hai kha perawlaw le mieshietna chawng rumachang pe ua rurodoi pui uh.
44013046	Khashole Paul le Barnabas na mulungar`er a rumashang uh, “Akhat changna a Pathien chawng hi nangni dieng riei rang a hi irangai inih. Inia makha nangni na nangheng ua kumshawt ringna rang khan nang nining ua rutukmashak u lai makche. Khajarkhan enro, kieini Phungshik hai dieng kahiei u joi.
44013047	Ajarla Pumi na kieini dieng chawng nurupek uh: ‘Phungshik hai rang mieivar nitna rang, kiei na nang kha kanamadan joi. Makha rieliei dawngshe khan shandamna kha nangchawina rang a inih.’ ”
44013048	Phunshik hai na mahi rujet u phakhan, ningai a Pumi chawng kha rumulur uh. Khan kumshawt ringna rang a madansha hai kholok kha na takarushawn uh.
44013049	Khatikhan Pumi chawng kha ram kholok khan rura`ar joi.
44013050	Inia Jihudi hai na richichawi le richit`awm nupang hai, khan khopui shung ah lamkai hai kha rumawphawk ua, Paul le Barnabas chung a epshawna pek rang rumuchun uh. Khan amani ram ah put ah amani kha runawt u joi.
44013051	Khajarkhan Paul le Barnabas na eke uah akawp vaiphin kha amani le re`erpuina `khat a rukhawng ua Iconium ah rushe u joi.
44013052	Khan khaichawi hai kha na ningai le Ratha Riethieng khan ruship uh.
44014001	Khan Iconium ah hitihin rushok makhala Paul le Barnabas na Jihudi hai synagogue ah rulut a khatikhan chawngruriei u shole, Jihudi le Greek mipui lientak `khat na takarushawn uh.
44014002	Inia takarushawn boi Jihudi hai kha na Phungshik hai kha rumuchun ua, uliennai hai chung a ningshietna rumieniei uh.
44014003	Khajarkhan amani na pha shawttak kha mun khan ruawm ua, ama numpokmirit chawng chungchanga kungruchang, jetna le rekhekchon hai kha amani khut hai kha le thawna rang rupeh, Pumi chungchanga mulungar`er a chawng ruriei uh.
44014004	Inia khopui shung ah awm miring hai kha rureshen uh. Eshen na Jihudi hai kha rurachang pui uh, khan eshen na tirtawn hai kha.
44014005	Khan Phungshik hai le Jihudi hai na amani rampo hai kha le engshiet thawna rang le lung le dengna rang, rurasham u joi.
44014006	Makha tirtawn hai kha na rujet ua Lycaonia ah awm Lystra le Derbe, khan makha ramroko shung hai khan rutan u joi.
44014007	Khan kha mun khan athachawng kha rurophong uh.
44014008	Lystra shung khan eke mothoi thiei boi miring `khat rushuh, ajarla ama kha unu shung ah put ah kekhawr, alawn boilak, miring `khat runih.
44014009	Paul na chawngrurieilai khan ama na mulungluttak a rurangai. Paul na ama kha ruenrep a damnathiei rang a ama takashawn kha rumuk pe.
44014010	He rashangtak a ruti, “Thoi tana nang ke a thaning a ding roh.” Khan ama na hawng chawm a rulawn joi.
44014011	Paul na iruthaw hai kha mirawp na rumuk phakhan, Lycaonia chawng a ra`ai a ruti uh, “Pathien hai kha na manmieshie me loi a jong chum u joi!”
44014012	Barnabas kha Zeus ruti uh, khan Paul kha lutu a chawngriei miring nit jarkhan, Hermes ruti uh.
44014013	Zeus thiempu kha na, ama riethiengmun kha khopui vaitak a awm jarkhan, shieratcha hai le rieiparrui hai kha pakawt hai khan vak chawi a mirawp kha le rawthawina `khat pekna rang, rurasham.
44014014	Tirtawn Paul le Barnabas na makha rujet u phakhan, amani ponledier hai kha ruther uh, khan mipui kar khan rutan ua, rura`ai uh.
44014015	Amani na ruti uh, “Miring hai, ijar a hihaihi nangithaw u maw nih? Nangni le ra`angre kanih u keng. Nangni na hihai nemna boi ah put ah aring Pathien dieng nanghieina u rang, athachawng hi kivakchawi u inih. Pathien hi na ravan le rieliei, thampui, khan kha shung ah awm kholok hi irukon inih.
44014016	Ashesho rong khan phung kholok dieng amani ningnom a ringna rang, ama na rujawt pe.
44014017	Inia ama na atha thaw a kungchangna mak boi a ruawm mak, makhala ravan ah put ah ro nomojong pe a choicha thatna pha hai kha kieini dieng nurupek uh. Khan ama na numulung u hai hi nekleshak, khan ningaina kha le nimiship pe uh.”
44014018	Hihai chawng haishe leawm, amani dieng rawthawina pek ah put ah mipui kha rumakha ngam u mak.
44014019	Inia Antioch ah put ah le Iconium ah put ah Jihudi hai jong shok ua, chawng jong mielien pe uh. Khajarkhan amani na Paul kha lung le rudeng ua thi joi, tia ama kha khopui ah put ah rupawt u joi.
44014020	Khanikengta khaichawi hai kha na ruhieichip u phakhan, ama na hawng thoi a khopui khan rulut joi. Khan jing tieng hin ama na Barnabas le Derbe tieng rushe joi.
44014021	Amani na kha khopui khan athachawng kha rurophongsho ua khaichawi tampui rukonsho u le, Lystra, Iconium, khan Antioch ah vak kir u joi.
44014022	Kha mun khan khaichawi hai mulung hai kha rumenet pe uh, khan takashawn kha awm jawnjaina rang, mulung rumangar pe ua ruti uh, “Kieini na Pathien rengchangna kha hihai epshawna tampui hi doi a alutngir rang nanih uh.”
44014023	Khan amani na biekrup rikip ah bieklamkai rumadan ua chamradoi a nikna runieisho u le, amani na taka`irushawn u Pumi dieng pekna runiei uh.
44014024	Khashole Pisidia kha rurakan ua Pamphylia tieng rushe u joi.
44014025	Amani na Perga ah Pathien chawng kha rurieisho u le, Attalia tieng rushe u joi.
44014026	Khan ah put ah Antioch ah rokong a rushe u joi. Makha mun kha irurupummashak u chon hai rang khan Pumi numpokmirit kha irupekna u mun kha inih.
44014027	Amani na vak shok u phakhan, biekrup hai kha mun `khat ah ruruchun pui ua Pathien na amani le chon ithawna dan le Phungshik hai dieng takashawn mawkawt imawlawng pena dan kha ruriei uh.
44014028	Khan amani na khaichawi hai kha le pha shawttak ruawm uh.
44015001	Khan Judea ah put ah miring eshen jong ua, uliennai hai kha ruruchuk uh, “Nangni na Moses shena dungjuia vunnangep u joi nawkatu, shandamna kha muh ngam u naw tinih.”
44015002	Paul le Barnabas na jawtna boi lientak `khat runiei ua, amani le chawngrieshietna runiei uh. Khajarkhan mahi rawdawnna chungchang hin tirtawn hai le bieklamkai hai le reshena rang, Paul le Barnabas, khan miring eshen hi Jerusalem ah hawngna rang rumadan uh.
44015003	Khajarkhan biekrup na amani kha rutir u joi. Phoenicia le Samaria vak rakan u lai khan, Phungshik hai na Pathien dieng hieina u kha amani dieng thang vak koi uh. Amani na uliennai kholok kha ajeng a ningrumangai pe uh.
44015004	Amani na Jerusalem vak shok u phakhan, biekrup, tirtawn hai, khan bieklamkai hai na amani kha lamjawng ruthaw uh. Khan Pathien na amani dieng chon iruthawna hai kholok chungchanga thangrukoi uh.
44015005	Inia Pharisee lawp takashawn miring eshen na ding a ruti uh, “Amani na vuni`ep ua, khan Moses Dan kha juina rang, chawngnipek u rang a hi rangai.”
44015006	Tirtawn hai le bieklamkai hai na hi roireshena rang hin ruruchun u joi.
44015007	Ashawttak roireshena ruawm shole, Peter na ding a ruti, “Uliennai miring hai, nikhothang shawtbawtlai khan Pathien na nakar ua madanna runiei. Makha, kenertak na kiriei a Phunshik hai na athachawng kha irangai ua, takashawn miring changna u rang a inih.
44015008	Khan miring mulung ajet Pathien na kieini dieng a iruthawtak kha ang a, amani dieng Ratha Riethieng kha irupek a kungruchang inih.
44015009	Khan takashawn jar a amani mulung hai kha riethiengmashak joi jarkhan, kieini le amani kar a kairekhena tetlai mak.
44015010	Khajarkhan tun, ih jar a pilepu hai na`awm, khan kieini na`awm niruput ngam boi ringkaw kha khaichawi hai ring ah tet a Pathien kha ennangirete u maw nih?
44015011	Inia Pumi Jesu Christa numpokmirit jar a amanitak kha ang a, kieini na ringna numuk u rangnih, iti hi takanishawn u inih.”
44015012	Ruchun kholok kha ruawmchien uh. Khan amani dieng Phungshik hai kar a jetna le rekhekchon hai kholok Pathien na iruthawna chungchanga Barnabas le Paul na iruriei u kha rurangai uh.
44015013	Amani na ruawmchiensho u le, James na rumashang, “Uliennai miring hai, narangai pe u roh,
44015014	Pathien na putna ah put ah Phungshik hai kha iruphak a, amani ah put ah ama riming rang miring hai iruloina dan kha Simeon na rurophong joi.
44015015	Mahi thiempulien hai chawng kha aracha inih, hitihin a miejiek hi le ra`ang inih:
44015016	‘Mahi shole kiei jong kir rang kanih, khan apur David thamber kha jong mothoi rang kanih. Achim hai kha kiei na mothoi a rietienret rang kanih.
44015017	Makha mienieng miring kholok na le kiriming aban Phungshik kholokshe na PUMI kha atawkna rang a inih. Hihai kholok athaw PUMI na ieriei.’
44015018	“Kumshawt a ama chonthaw kholok kha Pathien na ejet.
44015019	Khajarkhan Pathien dieng vak hiei Phungshik hai kha nimatatmashak boi rang a shok, iti hi kawchawngmocho inih.
44015020	Inia mirilim le rawpawr nieinak, rejai, rek meher a that me, thishen, hihai ah put ah rechenna u rang, miejiek a nimejet u rang a shok.
44015021	Ajarla Moses chawng kha tu ashawt rong ah put ah khopui rikip ah irurophong u, khan Sabbath rikip a synagogue ah irute u nih joi.”
44015022	Kha pha khan tirtawn hai le bieklamkai hai kha na, biekrup kholok le rawjawt a, Paul le Barnabas rawtawp pui rang, amani kar a madan miring Antioch ah tir rang hi atha, tia rumining uh. Amani khala: uliennai hai kar a lamkai hai, Barsabbas iti Judas le Silas runih uh.
44015023	Amani dieng mahi chawngmawchawi hi miejiekna uh: Kieini, tirtawn hai le bieklamkai hai na Antioch, Syria le Cilicia ah awm Phungshik uliennai hai dieng chubai kenepek uh.
44015024	“Nangni vunepngir rang nangnih uh, khan Dan kha nangijuingir u rang a inih,” tia nangni kha chawng a chawkna rang le nang mulung u kha shukletna rang, kieini ah put ah ava u, iti kejet uh. Kieini na kha ang chawngpek kha amani dieng peh u mi`ing.
44015025	Khajarkhan kunumpok u Barnabas le Paul, khan amani le roroia madan miring hai kha nangni dieng tirna rang a rawjawtshom hi atha, tia kurumining uh.
44015026	Amani kha Pumi Jesu Christa riming rang a iringkho rupeh miring hai kha runih uh.
44015027	Khajarkhan kieini na Judas le Silas hi kavaktir u joi, amani na ra`angre a ner a`awm nieriei u rangnih.
44015028	Thawboithaboi hihaihi niboia, nangni dieng dawnshe a pokrik pekna boi rang, Ratha Riethieng dieng le kieini dieng atha `khat ruchang joi.
44015029	Makhala, mirilim dieng a rawthawina nieinak a, thishen a, rek meher a that me, khan rejai, hihai chon ah put ah rechen u roh. Hihaihi nangrung u joiatu, atha joi. Chubai.
44015030	Khajarkhan amani kha rutir ua Antioch tieng rushe u joi. Amani na mipui kha ruruchun a chawngmawchawi kha rupek uh.
44015031	Amani na rute u phakhan, kha mawshawkna chawng khan ningrungai pe uh.
44015032	Thiempulienawm achang, Judas le Silas, na uliennai hai dieng mawshawkna chawng tampui ruriei pe a rumenet uh.
44015033	Amani na makha mun khan ruawmbawt u shole, uliennai hai kha na lungdamna chawng le tirtawn hai dieng rumikir u joi.
44015034	Inia Silas na tu makha mun khan a`awmbawt rang a kha atha, tia rumining.
44015035	Khan Paul le Barnabasawm Antioch ah rurangah uh, khan kha mun khan shik miring tampui le, Pumi chawng kha ruruchuk ua rushem uh.
44015036	Nikhothang shawtbawt `le, Paul na Barnabas dieng ruti, “Pumi chawng rophongna khopui rikip a shetaia uliennai hai khaw itia maw awm u vak phah u rawi.”
44015037	Barnabas na Mark iti John kha amani le rushe pui jawt.
44015038	Inia Paul na, Pamphylia ah amani kha irumak a chon iruthaw pui boi miring kha, amani le rushe pui jawt mak.
44015039	Rawjawtna boi kha ratanbang jarkhan, amani kha rureshen u joi. Barnabas na Mark kha rawtawp pui a Cyprus tieng rokong a rushe joi.
44015040	Inia Paul na Silas kha rumadan a uliennai hai na Pathien numpokmirit kha ipek u le roroia, rokong a rushe u joi.
44015041	Amani na Syria le Cilicia kha palam a rushe ua biekrup hai kha vak menet uh.
44016001	Paul na Derbe le Lystra kha vak shok joi. Khan enro, kha mun khan Timothy iti khaichawi `khat ruawm. Ama kha takashawn Jihudi nupang `khat shapa runih, inia apa kha tu Greek miring runih.
44016002	Ama kha Lystra le Iconium ah awm uliennai hai na atha a iruriei u akhat runih.
44016003	Paul na ama kha rurawtawp pui jawt. Khan makha mun ah awm Jihudi hai na apa kha Greek miring inih, iti rujet u jarkhan, ama kha vunruep pe.
44016004	Amani na khopui hai kha irurakan u le roroia, Jerusalem ah tirtawn hai le bieklamkai hai na irumocho u chawngpek hai kha rungna u rang, amani dieng rurophong uh.
44016005	Khajarkhan biekrup hai kha takashawn a rumenet uh, khan miring jat kha nikhonikho a rupung shishit joi.
44016006	Amani na Phyrgia le Galatia ram kha rurakan u phakhan, Asia shung ah Pathien chawng irophong u rang a kha Ratha Riethieng na rumakha joi.
44016007	Amani na Mysia kha vak shok u phakhan, Bithynia lutna rang, rurashak uh, inia Ratha na rujawt pe u mak.
44016008	Khajarkhan Mysia kha rurakan ua, amani kha Troas tieng khan ruchum u joi.
44016009	Makha jan khan Paul na mulungmik `khat rumuk. Macedonia miring `khat na iding a ama dieng rudawi a ruti, “Macedonia hin va tana kieini hi navakshan u roh.”
44016010	Ama na mulungmik kha rumuk shole, amani dieng athachawng rophong rang hin Pumi na inokoi u inih, iti kha kejet ua, relentak a Macedonia ah shena rang, kurudit uh.
44016011	Kieini na Troas ah put ah Samothrace kha jawngphit a rokong a kurushe uh. Khan jing tieng hin Neapolis kurushok uh.
44016012	Khan ah put ah colony `khat, Macedonia ah runiei khopui, Philippi khan kurushe uh. Makha khopui khan pha shawtlawk kuruawm uh.
44016013	Sabbath nikho khan khopui vai tieng ah awm vapui khan kurushe uh. Kha mun khan mi hai na nikna inieina u mun `khat awm, tia kiruring u inih. Kha mun ah ruruchunsha nupang hai dieng kurushuh ua chawng kururiei pe uh.
44016014	Pathien rubieh miring, Lydia iti nupang `khat ruawm. Ama kha Thyatira ah put ah ponshendup jor miring `khat runih. Pumi na ama mulung mawkawt kha rumawlawng pe a Paul na iriei hai kha mulungluttak a rurangai.
44016015	Ama le ama inshungkhur hai kha baptisma ruloisho u le, kieini kha nawdawi ua ruti, “Kiei hi Pumi dieng takashawn miring `khat a nangnoloi u joiatu, va tana ki`in hin vak tung u roh.” Hitihin ama na nurukhap uh.
44016016	Nikhat hin kieini na nikna mun ah kurushe u le roroia, tashanna ratha ranak aniei nungak-shok `khat kururawtawng pui uh. Ama na tashanna khan upumi hai rang shier tampui irumuk inih.
44016017	Paul le khan kieini kha nurujui ua rura`ai, “Hihai miring hi Rashangving Pathien shok hai kha inih. Amani hi shandamna lam kha kieini dieng rophong ava u inih.”
44016018	Khanu kha na nikho shawttak khatikhan ruthaw. Paul kha iningrunih pelai mak a ratha thaboi dieng khan iehiei a ruti, “Jesu Christa riming a chawngkenepek, nang ama ah put ah vak shok rang roh.” Kha phatak khan ama kha vak shok joi.
44016019	Inia upumi hai kha na shier imukna u miring athang kha rumuk u phakhan, Paul le Silas kha shur u joi, khan rievieithawna mun khan vak kai ua chamniei hai dieng ruchawi u joi.
44016020	Amani na chawngmocho hai dieng vak chawi u phakhan, ruti uh, “Mahi Jihudi miring hai hi na nokhopui u hi achawk u joi.
44016021	Kieini Rome miring `khat a niloithiei boi le nishenathiei boi shena le dan nih boi kha amani na rophong u joi.”
44016022	Mipui kha na amani chung a mulung hangna kha rutet uh. Khan chawngmocho hai kha na amani kotai hai kha ruther ua, amani kha rawmaw le jemna rang, chawng rupek u joi.
44016023	Amani kha khawktak a rujemsho u le, lungroko shung ah ruthong uh. Khan lungroko rungpa kha na nettak a atetna rang, chawng rupek uh.
44016024	Ama na chawngpek rumuk shole, shungkhit ah atet a thinglong a eke u kha ruthung pe uh.
44016025	Inia janchim khan, Paul le Silas na Pathien dieng runik uh, khan Pathien mapakna lah kha ruthaw uh. Khan shurkhop miring hai kha na rurangai uh.
44016026	Jetboithieiboi a nieinu lientak `khat hawng rawnawk a, lungroko keshunshe kha hawng rawnawk joi. Khan relentak a mawkawt kholok kha hawng rawlawngsho a, mi rikip rokhopna thirakarui hai kha hawng ruthutsho joi.
44016027	Lungroko rungpa kha hawng che a lungroko mawkawt hai kha rurawlawngbiek kha hawng muk phakhan, lungroko shung ah awm hai kha shoksho joi, tia rumining jarkhan, ama chemjam kha rosho a nining a rathatna rang ruthaw.
44016028	Inia Paul na he rashangtak a ra`ai a ruti, “Kokholok a hin ka`awm uh, nang nining a rathatna rang thaw naw roh.”
44016029	Ama na mieivar runik a khan Paul le Silas tieng khan vak tan a amani maikung a rawnawklam a vak bawklap joi.
44016030	Khashole amani kha vai tieng ruchawi a ruti, “Pumi hai sheng, kiringna rang imaw kithawngir rang?”
44016031	Amani na ruti uh, “Pumi Jesu Christa kha takashawn roh, khanitatu nang kha nashan rangnih, khan nang inshungawm shan rangnih.
44016032	Amani na Pumi chawng kha ama dieng le ama in ah awm kholok dieng khan ruriei pe uh.
44016033	Makha jantak khan ama na amani kha ruchawi a rawmaw shebe hai kha rurushuk pe, khan relentak a ama le ama inshungkhur kholok kha na baptisma ruloi uh.
44016034	Ama in ah vat pui phakhan, bu rumenek uh. Khan ama inshungkhur kholok le Pathien kha takarushawn u jarkhan, ningaina kha runiei.
44016035	Jingkar tieng hin chawngshat hai kha na amani police hai kha lungroko rungpa dieng khan “Miring hai kha meshe u rang roh,” ti rang khan vak tir u joi.
44016036	Khajarkhan lungroko rungpa kha na hihai chawng hi Paul dieng thangrukoi. Ama na ruti, “Nang shena u rang khan chawngmocho hai na chawng vak mawchawi u joi, lungdamtak a she u rang roh.”
44016037	Inia Paul na rumashang, “Rome khomiring kanih u chuchung a chawng mocho boi a mipui maikung a nejem ua lungroko shung ah nothong uh. Khan tun, muruk a meshe rawng initi u maw nih? Mahi nithiei naw nih. Amani pumtak va u rieshie kieini hi navak moshok u rosho.”
44016038	Police hai kha na hihai chawng hi chawngmawcho hai dieng thang vak koi uh. Khan amani kha Rome khomiring hai keng, iti kha rujet u phakhan, ruchih uh.
44016039	Khajarkhan amani dieng va ua vak dawi uh. Amani kha vak shok pui ua khopui kha mathan a shena u rang ruriei u joi.
44016040	Khajarkhan lungroko kha rumathan ua Lydia in ah rulut u joi. Khan uliennai hai kha rurumuk pui u phakhan, lungarna chawng ruriei pe u shole, rushe u joi.
44017001	Amani na Amphipolis le Apollonia kha rurakan u shole, Jihudi hai synagogue awmna Thessalonica ah vak lut u joi.
44017002	Khan ama shena dungjuia Paul na amani dieng rulut a, Sabbath nikho `thum khan amani le Miejiek ah put ah chawng ruthir.
44017003	Makhala Christa hi na shawna idoingir rang a inih, khan athi ah put ah hawng thoingir rang a inih, iti kha rumeler, khan rumumuk a ruti, “Nangni dieng a kirophong mahi Jesu hi Christa kha inih.”
44017004	Amani eshen kha rumawjawt, khan richichawi Greek mipui lientak le runiei nupang hai na`awm Paul le Silas kha rushap uh.
44017005	Inia imawjawt boi Jihudi hai kha na rumukmak uh. Amani na rievieithawna ah put ah mi tha boi hai kha vak chawi ua, hawipui `khat ruruchun uh. Khopui kholok kha marang a Jason in kha rukhoi uh. Amani kha miring hai dieng vak chawina rang, rutawk uh.
44017006	Inia amani kha rumuk boi u phakhan, Jason le uliennai eshen hi khopui rampo hai dieng rupawt ua, rura`ai uh, “Manmieshie shukthala a atet hihai miring hi hinawm va u joi.
44017007	Jason na amani kha rumutung a Caesar chawngmocho kholok le re`er a, Jesu iti Reng shik `khat awm, ruti uh.”
44017008	Khan amani na mahi rujet u phakhan, amani na mipui le khopui rampo hai kha mulung rahalam a rutet.
44017009	Khajarkhan Jason le shik hai kha roiruputna rumoloi ua, amani kha rumoshok u joi.
44017010	Khashole relentak a Paul le Silas kha Berea tieng rumeshe u joi. Amani na rushok u phakhan, Jihudi hai synagogue ah rulut uh.
44017011	Berea miring hai kha Thessalonica miring hainek a mulungliendet miring runih uh. Amani na ningawroitak a chawng kha ruloi uh, khan hihaihi anih maw nih, tia ningthingkip hin Miejiek hai kha enrurete uh.
44017012	Khajarkhan mi tampui na takarushawn uh, khan runiei Greek miring apa le nupang tampui na`awm takarushawn uh.
44017013	Inia Thessalonica Jihudi hai kha na Berea ah awm Pathien chawng kha Paul na rophong joi, iti kha rujet u phakhan, makhan va ua mipui kha vak marang uh.
44017014	Khashole uliennai hai kha na Paul kha relentak a thampui tieng rumeshe u joi. Inia Silas le Timothy tu kha mun khan rurangah u lai.
44017015	Khajarkhan Paul aroi miring hai kha na Athenshe kha vak thak uh. Silas le Timothy na relenthieishe ama kha vak rawlawp puina u rang, amani dieng chawng rupek a rushe u joi.
44017016	Khan Athens ah Paul na amani kha rungaklai khan, makha khopui khan konrilim shipmer a awm kha rumuk. Makha na aratha kha ajeng a rumawshaw pe.
44017017	Khajarkhan Jihudi hai, khan richichawi miring hai kha le synagogue ah le rievieithawna ah awm miring hai kha le ningthingkip chawngruthir a ruawm.
44017018	Khashole Epicurean le Stoic lungthimthiei hai kha na ama kha rurodoi pui uh. Khan eshen na ruti uh, “Mahi chawng rawkhawmpa hi na imaw iriei jawt?” Shik eshen na ruti uh, “Ama hi milak pathien hai ashem miring ang.” Ajarla ama na Jesu le thoiretna kha amani dieng irurophong inih.
44017019	Amani na ama kha rushur ua Areopagus mun ah ruchawi uh. Amani na ruti uh, “Nangiriei mahi ruchukna `thar hi imaw nih? Kieini na jet maw tha?
44017020	Ajarla nang na chonrekhek hi konokor uah nangivakchawi inih. Khajarkhan hihaihi ih itina maw nih kejet jawt uh.”
44017021	Ajarla khan ah awm Athens miring hai le milak hai kholok kha na ih thaw boi a chawng `thar riei rang, ninawkle chawng `thar rangai rang, amani pha hai kha irumehek u inih.
44017022	Khashole Paul na Areopagus kar khan ruding a ruti, “Athens miring hai, kholok dungjuia nangni hi richi a ajeng a mulunglut nangnih u, iti hi kumuk.
44017023	Ajarla nangni na chubainangibawk u nieinak hai hi kahiei a kimuk le roroia, MEH JET BOI PATHIEN `KHAT DIENG, tia khetimiejiek maicham ading `khatawm kumuk. Khajarkhan meh jet boi a chubainangibawk u ama kha nangni dieng kirophong inih.
44017024	“Manmieshie le mahi shung ah awm rikip akonpa, Pathien hi ravan le rieliei Pumi nit jarkhan, miring hai na khut a ikon rilimin khan awm mak.
44017025	Ama na ih kha irangai a, miring hai khut le ama chon thaw pe rangawm nimak, ajarla amatak na miring kholok dieng ringkho, phuk, khan kholok kha ipek inih.
44017026	Thishen `khat ah put ah rieliei mai kholok hin awmna rang, phung kholok rukon, khan amani awmna mun hai khan pha le ramri hai kha`awm irumuchuk pe inih.
44017027	Ama kha kieini ah put ah ala ah awm boi nitjoiawm, malam a ama kha mukthiei `khat a, amani na Pumi kha itawk u rang a shok.
44017028	Ajarla ama dieng hin naring, naper, khan na`awm inih. Khan nang thiemshun haitak eshen na`awm iruti kha inih: “Ajarla kieini hiawm ama chicha kha nanih uh.
44017029	Kieini hi Pathien chicha kha nanih u jarkhan, Pathien hi miring hai khut thiemna le mulungmining na ikon, rangkachak ninawkle dangka ninawkle konrilim lung keng, tia mining boi rang a inih.
44017030	Hihai jetna boi pha hai hi Pathien na imik le irumilim inih, inia tuntu ama na mun rikip ah mi kholok dieng mulung lekna rang, chawng pek joi.
44017031	Ajarla manmieshie hi dikna kha le imadan miring dieng khan ama na chawngishatna rang a pha le nikho kha madan joi. Ama kha athi ah put ah rumothoi a mi kholok dieng akalang chona rang, rupeksho joi.”
44017032	Athi ah put ah thoiretna rujet phakhan, mi eshen na rumunui uh, khan shik eshen na tu “Hi chawngmun jarhin rangai u ret rang kanih,” ruti uh.
44017033	Khan amani ah put ah Paul rushe joi.
44017034	Inia amani kar a eshen tu ama kha rushap ua, takarushawn uh. Amani hai khala, Areopagite Dionysius le Damaris iti nupang `khat, khan amani le rawtawp shik hai kha runih uh.
44018001	Hihaihi shole, Paul na Athens kha mathan a Corinth ah rushe joi.
44018002	Makha mun khan Pontus ah shok Aquila iti Jihudi miring `khat rurumuk pui. Jihudi miring kholok na Rome mathanna rang, Claudius na chawngrumocho jarkhan, i`inkonu Priscilla le Italy ah put ah ava `thar runih uh. Paul na amani kha rumuk pui rushe.
44018003	Amani kha khoiruponin chonthawshom runih u jarkhan, amani le ruawm a chon ruthaw.
44018004	Sabbath rikip khan ama na Jihudi hai le Greek hai kha mawkawina rang, synagogue ah chawngruthir pui uh.
44018005	Silas le Timothy na Macedonia ah put ah jong tung u phakhan, Ratha na Paul kha rumawshawk a Jesu kha Christa inih, tia Jihudi hai dieng kungruchang.
44018006	Amani na ama kha rurodoi pui ua rumieshiet u phakhan, ama ponledier hai kha akhawng a amani dieng ruti, “Nang thishen u kha nang lu uah awm nih rosho, kiei tu roiruputna nieilai mi`ing, tun ah put ah kiei Phungshik hai dieng she rang kanih joi.”
44018007	Khashole makha mun kha rumathan a Justus iti miring `khat in ah rulut joi. Ama kha Pathien mining runih, khan ama in kha synagogue diengtak ah ruawm pe inih.
44018008	Khan synagogue ulienchang Crispus na ama inshungkhur kholok le Pumi kha takarushawn. Corinth miring tampui na rurangai u phakhan, takarushawn ua baptisma ruloi uh.
44018009	Jan `khat hin Pumi na Paul dieng mulungmik a ruriei, “Chih naw roh, chawng kha riei roh, bang naw roh.
44018010	Ajarla kiei na nang kha kawnawrawtawp pui. Khan tute na nang kha nishih naw nih, khan engshiet a nawthaw naw nih. Ajarla mahi khopui hin kimiring tampui awm.”
44018011	Kha mun khan kum `khat le tha `ruk hi amani le awm a, Pathien chawng kha ruruchuk.
44018012	Inia Gallio na Achaia ram kha rupoklai khan, Jihudi hai na rushukbir a Paul kha rurudoi pui ua danin khan vak chawi uh.
44018013	Amani na ruti uh, “Miringpa hi na Dan le racha boi Pathien biekna rang, mi hai kha mawkawi.”
44018014	Paul na ener makak diengtak khan Gallio na Jihudi hai dieng ruti, “Aw Jihudi miring hai, danrekhe ninawkle chon shie jar a nitatu, kiei na kirangai rang a hi rutuk inih.
44018015	Inia chawng hai le riming hai, khan nang dan u jar a nit jarkhan, nang nining ua vak riethiengmashak u roh. Hihai chung hin kiei na chawngshat jawt mi`ing.”
44018016	Khashole danin kha mathanna rang, amani kha runawt joi.
44018017	Khashole Greek hai kholok na synagogue lamkai Sosthenes kha shur ua, danin khan rujem uh, inia Gallio na hihai kholok kha irushawnlai mak.
44018018	Paul na Corinth khan ashawtbawt ruawm. Khan uliennai hai kha chubai ruthaw pui a Syria tieng rokong a rushe joi. Priscilla le Aquila na ama kha rurawtawp pui uh. Ama chawngrakhamna Cenchrea khan ama sham kha ruep joi.
44018019	Ephesus rushok u phakhan, amani kha kha mun khan rumak joi. Paultak na synagogue ah rulut a Jihudi hai kha le chawngruthir.
44018020	Amani na ama kha ashawtbawt awm puina rang, rudawi uh, inia rujawt pe mak.
44018021	Amani le reshenna ruthaw shole, ruti, “Ih kha nita`awm ahawng rang a rohoi hi Jerusalem ah kithawngir rang a inih. Pathien na ijawt nitjoiatu, nangni dieng vak kirret rang kanih.” Khashole Ephesus ah put ah rokong ah rushe joi.
44018022	Caesarea kha rushok shole, Jerusalem ah ruhawng a biekrup miring hai kha le chubai hawng thaw pui. Khashole Antioch tieng ruchum joi.
44018023	Kha mun khan pha bawng `khat ruawm shole, ama na Galatia le Phrygea ram ah dawdawn a rushe a, akhaichawi hai kholok kha vak menet joi.
44018024	Khan Alexandria ah ashok Jihudi miring Apollos iti `khat na Ephesus ah put ah vak shok. Ama kha chawngrieilariei thiei le Miejiek kha ajeng a ajet miring runih.
44018025	Ama kha Pumi lam khan tukhat na iruruchuksha inih, khan ratha a mulungluttak a Pumi chungchanga ridingpip a chawng iruriei kha iruruchuk inih. Inia John baptisma jar ranga kha irujet inih.
44018026	Ama na lungar nieitak a synagogue ah chawngriei ruput. Inia Aquila le Priscilla na rujet u phakhan, shir `khat a ruchawi ua, ama dieng Pathien lam chungchanga ridingdet a ruriei pe uh.
44018027	Khan ama na Achaia tieng rushe jawt phakhan, akhaichawi hai na ama kha lamjawng ruthawna u rang, uliennai hai na mawshawkna chawng kha rumiejiek pe uh. Khan rushok phakhan, numpokmirit jar a takashawn ruchang hai kha ajeng a vak shan.
44018028	Ajarla mipui maikung a, Jihudi hai kha chawngrieshietna khan maimawk rupek. Khan Jesu hi Christa inih, tia Miejiek hai ah put ah ama na rumumuk joi.
44019001	Khan hitihin rushok joi, Apollos kha Corinth ah ruawmlai khan, Paul na shak tieng ah ram hai kha vak rakan a Ephesus ah va joi. Kha mun khan khaichawi eshen vak muk.
44019002	Amani dieng ama na rurawdawn, “Takanangshawn u ni khan Ratha Riethieng maw nangmuk uh?” Amani na rumashang uh, “Muh u mi`ing, Ratha Riethieng awm, iti hi jetshe jet u mi`ing.”
44019003	Khashole ama na rurawdawn, “Ih baptisma khan maw baptisma nangruloi uh?” Amani na rumashang uh, “Baptisma apeh John baptisma kha kuruloi uh.”
44019004	Paul na ruti, “John na ama anuk a ajong rang a Christa Jesu kha miring hai na taka`ishawnngir rang a inih, tia iruriei pe a, mulung lek a baptisma loina kha le baptisma irupek inih.”
44019005	Mahi rujet u phakhan, Pumi Jesu riming a baptisma ruloi uh.
44019006	Paul na amani chung ah ukhut `hai kha rutet pe phakhan, Ratha Riethieng na amani chung a jong, khan chawng shikshik a ruchawng ua, chawng kha rurophong uh.
44019007	Amani lawpsheng a miring shawmlieidi dawr runih uh.
44019008	Synagogue kha rulut a tha `thum hi Pathien rengchangna chungchanga thirna le mawkawina kha lungartak a ruriei.
44019009	Inia amani eshen na mulung rumichimmashak ua takarushawn u mak. Khan mipui maikung a Lam kha rumieshiet u phakhan, Paul na amani kha rumak joi. Khan khaichawi hai kha ruchawi a Tyrannus behangin khan ningthingkip chawngruthir pui joi.
44019010	Makha kum `di rawjawn a rumeshe uh. Makha na Asia ram shung ah awm Jihudi hai le Greek hai adinre na Pumi Jesu chawng kha rurangai u joi.
44019011	Khajarkhan Pathien na rekhekchon hai kha Paul khut hai dieng khan ajeng a ruthawna joi.
44019012	Khan amatak le rishih khutrakpon hai ninawkle rekpon hai kha ana hai dieng ivakchawi pe u she khanawm, rai hai kha na rumathan uh, khan raikho ashie hai kha na amani ah put ah vai rushok uh.
44019013	Khashole shehawng a alawn Jihudi dawithiei hai kha na, Pumi Jesu riming kha ban a ratha thaboi hai chung a ruti uh, “Paul na ishem Jesu riming a kawnawdawi uh.”
44019014	Jihudi thiempu ulien Sceva shapa shiri kha na mahi ruthaw uh.
44019015	Inia ratha thaboi kha na amani dieng rumashang uh, “Kiei na Jesu kha kejet, khan Paul kha`awm kejet, inia nangni hi tumaw nangnih uh?”
44019016	Khashole ratha thaboi anieipa kha na amani dieng vak chawm a, aranak le vak mukhu a ruchutna u joi. Khan amani na makha in ah put ah ponledier boi a pawplam a rutan u joi.
44019017	Mahi Ephesus ah awm, Jihudi le Greek kholok na rujet ua, amani kholok dieng chitna ruthoi joi. Makha na Pumi Jesu riming kha rumielien shishit joi.
44019018	Makhan a takarushawn miring tampui na`awm rushe ua ithaw u chon shie hai kha malangsheng a rurophong u joi.
44019019	Dawithiei miring tengamthoiboi na`awm amani behangbuk hai kha rurawkhawm ua mipui maikung a miei le ruha u joi. Amani man kha ruthai pha ua dangka bawp shawm rahnga inih.
44019020	Khatikhan Pumi chawng kha ranaknieitak a rupung a ruawm.
44019021	Hihaihi mawtawr shole, Macedonia le Achaia ram rakan a Jerusalem tieng shena rang, Paul na mulung rumiding joi. Ama na ruti, “Makhawn kashe shole, Rome`awm kimukngir rang a shok.”
44019022	Khashole ama chonthaw pui, Timothy le Erastus, kha Macedonia ah rutir joi. Ama tu pha bawng `khat Asia ah rurangalai.
44019023	Khalaikhan Lam chungchanga helehoi lientak `khat rushok.
44019024	Dangkashupa Demetrius iti miring kha na Artemis rang rilimin `khat rukon a khutthiem hai rang shiertong ashin runih pe u mak.
44019025	Ama chonmun ra`ang pui hai kha le lawp `khat a ruruchun a ruti, “Miring hai, mahi shierraban ah put ah kieini na nieilelung niniei u inih, iti hi nangijet u inih.
44019026	Ephesus ranga hin niboia Asia kholok hin, mahi Paul hi na khut a kon pathien hai hi tu pathien nimak, tia miring tampui mawkawi a rumiehiei joi, iti hi nangmuk ua nangrangai u joi.
44019027	Khan mahi na nieshierraban u ranga hi riming imieshiet nimak a pathiennu alien Artemis rilimin hiawm iriming mieshiet pe ning, tia ama lurna kha mawmawk pe rangnih. Inia Asia shung ah awm mi kholok na la chubai ibawk inih.”
44019028	Amani na mahi rujet u phakhan, mulung hanglam a rura`ai uh, “Ephesus miring hai Artemis hi alien inih!”
44019029	Khopui khan reheshuna ruship joi, khan Paul na khomijin a ivakrawtawp pui, Macedonia miring hai, Gaius le Aristarchus, kha radainamun khan lawp `khat a vak tan ua vak shur u joi.
44019030	Paul na mirawp shung khan rulut jawt, inia khaichawi hai kha na rumakha uh.
44019031	Khan Asia shung ah ama lawmdit chonpo haishe na`awm radainamun khan lutna boi rang, rudawi uh.
44019032	Ruchunna kha reheshuna kha na ruship, eshen na akhat jar a rura`ai uh, eshen na shik jar a rura`ai uh. Khan arawplam na, makha mun khan ijar a vak ruchun u maw nih, iti kha rujet u mak.
44019033	Jihudi hai eshen na chawngiriei rang a kha riei rosho, tia Alexander kha mi kar khan vak tor uh. Khan Alexander na ukhut kha rulawm a miring hai mai kung a ama rohonna kha ruriei jawt.
44019034	Inia ama kha Jihudi miring keng, iti rujet u phakhan, nidan `di dawr hi lawp `khat a, “Ephesus miring hai Artemis hi alien inih!” tia amani kholok rura`ai uh.
44019035	Inia khopui behang miejiekpa kha na mipui kha phuk muchummashak a ruti, “Ephesus miring hai, Ephesus miring hai hi pathiennu alien Artemis rilimin le Zeus ah put ah jong cho rilim arung hai kha inih, iti hi ajet boi tumaw awm?”
44019036	Hihaihi jawt boi tha boi `khat nit jarkhan, renem u roh, mulungmining boipet a iawm thaw u naw roh.
44019037	Nangivakchawi u hihai miring hi rilimin muru rang a le nang pathiennu u kha mieshiet rang a kha nih u mak.
44019038	Khajarkhan Demetrius le khutthiem miring hai kha na tukhat chung a chawngmeshie niei u joiatu, danin hai kha rawlawng a awm, khan kha mun khan rampo hai awm, amani na khatlekhat chung a awm nawngna hai kha vak chawi u rosho.
44019039	Inia chonmun shik chungchanga nangtawk jawt u joiatu, dan dungjuia ruchunna ah imuchuk rang a inih.
44019040	Ajarla von a ashok phumoshokna chungchanga rawdawnna `khat inokoi u rang a chitroina `khat awm joi. Ajarla mahi chawngshok jar hin ajar pek rang `khatshe awm mak.
44019041	Ama na hihaihi ruriei shole, ruchunna kha rureshenmashak joi.
44020001	Phumoshokna kha theng shole, Paul na akhaichawi hai kha rukoi a amani kha chubai ruthaw pui a Macedonia tieng khan rushe joi.
44020002	Irurakan ram ah awm uliennai hai kha mawshawkna rupek shole, Greece tieng va joi.
44020003	Kha mun khan tha `thum ruawm. Ama na Syria tieng rokong a rushe diengtak khan, Jihudi hai na ama kha rurep u jarkhan, ama na Macedonia kha rakan a kirna rang, mulung rumiding joi.
44020004	Ama kha Berea ah awm Sopater, Thessalonica ah awm Aristarchus le Secundus, Derbe ah awm Gaius, khan Asia ram ah awm Timothy, Tychicus, khan Trophimus, amani hai hi na Asia ramshe khan rurawtawp pui uh.
44020005	Amani kha matieng rushe ua Troas ah nurungak uh.
44020006	Inia Chawjawboi Tan Nikho hai shole, Philippi ah put ah kurushe ua ni rahnga shung a Troas ah amani kha kuruphak uh. Kha mun khan ni shiri kuruawm uh.
44020007	Hapta shung a akhat changna nikho khan khaichawi hai le tan khoina rang kururuchun u phakhan, Paul na, jing tieng shena rang mining jarkhan, janchimshe khan chawngruriei.
44020008	Kururumukna u chungindan khan thaomiei tampui ruawm.
44020009	Eutychus iti rothar `khat hi tukber ah rushuh a ruawm. Paul na chawng rieilai khan, Eutychus kha imik rukhu pe a ningnittak a inrurungui jarkhan, indan `thum ah put ah jongcho a ithitlam a rushar u joi.
44020010	Inia Paul na ruchum a ama chung ah jong bawkna, khan ama kha rukawrep a ruti, “Nang mulung rakakmashak u naw roh, ajarla ama dieng ringphuk awmlai.”
44020011	Khashole Paul na chungindan khan rukaret a tan kha rukhoi a rushak shole, khovarshe khan amani le chawngruriei a, rushe joi.
44020012	Khashole rotharpa kha ringlam a ruchawi u jarkhan, ajeng a mulung rumangar pe uh.
44020013	Kieini na maton shawn a Assos tieng rokonglien ah kurushe u joi. Assos ah put khan kieini na Paul kha rokonglien ah kurushe pui jawt uh, ajarla ama na Assos rang khan kelam a rurasham inih.
44020014	Assos ah nurumuk pui u phakhan, kurumulut ua, khan Mitylene ah kurushe u joi.
44020015	Khan ah put ah kava ua, jing tieng hin Chios dieng khan kavak shok uh. Khan thiem hin Samos kavak shok ua Trogyllium khan kuruawm uh. Khan thiem `khat hin Miletus kha kavak shok uh.
44020016	Asia ram ah pha mehekna boi rang, Paul na Ephesus kha rakan a rushe jawt. Initthiei a tu Pentecost nikho khan Jerusalem kha rushokna rang, rurawnawt jawt inih.
44020017	Ephesus ah bieklamkai hai kha rurumukna pui rang, Miletus ah put ah Paul na mi rutir.
44020018	Ama dieng va u phakhan amani dieng ruti, “Akhat changna a Asia ram ah kekimuchum nikho ah put ah nangni le rawtawp jawnjai a kuruawm dan kha nangni na nangjet uh.
44020019	Redena kholok le, mikrithi le khan kiei dieng ah hawng Jihudi hai repna le enretena kholok le Pumi chon kha kiruthaw inih.
44020020	Nang nemna u rang a kholok kha kiei na mitik mi`ing. In rikip ah vanoi maikung a kinururuchuk u inih.
44020021	Jihudi miring hai le Greek miring hai dieng Pathien maikung a mulung lekna rang le Pumi Jesu Christa dieng takashawnna rang, mirittak a kungkuruchang inih.
44020022	“Khan tun enro, Ratha na Jerusalem ah shena rang ne`ep joi. Makhawn kuchung a imaw shok nih, iti kiei jet mi`ing.
44020023	Kiei na kijet khatte kha tu lungroko le shawrana kha na kiei hi inangakchak a awm inih, tia Ratha Riethieng na khopui rikip ah kiei dieng inierieisha inih.
44020024	Inia hihai kholok hi na nerephetmashak mak. Pathien numpokmirit athachawng kha kamalarna rang, katanrieshiet hi ningailam a kumutum a Pumi Jesu na inepek chonmun hi kurupummashak joiatu, kiringkho hi kiei rang man awm tia loi mi`ing.
44020025	“Pathien rengchangna chungchanga nangni dieng chawngkirushem inih, inia tuntu nangni na kemeh hi numuh u lai naw tinih, iti hi kejet joi.
44020026	Khajarkhan hi nikho hin kiei na kamalar, makhala nang kholok thishen rang khan kiei roiruputna niei mi`ing.
44020027	Ajarla Pathien chonmuchuk kholok kha kiei na ip boipet a kururophong.
44020028	Ama thishentak le irurawchawk Pathien biekrup aroi rang, Ratha Riethieng na kengam hai kar a kengamroi hai `khat a inamadan u nih joi. Khajarkhan nang bibing u rang le kengamhawi hai rang riring u roh.
44020029	Kiei kanuk `le, melang arangtak hai kha nang kar ua va rangnih. Khan amani na kengam `khatshe hawi naw nih iti kha kejet.
44020030	Nang kar u she khanawm khaichawi hai kha amani anu mujuina rang, adik kha rehermashak miring hawng thoi rangnih.
44020031	Khajarkhan kum `thum shung a shunlejan a mikrithi le chatboia kirieisha hai kha mining u tana riring u roh.
44020032	“Uliennai hai, tun kiei na nangni hi Pathien dieng le ama numpokmirit chawng khan kenepek u joi. Makha chawng kha na iniemielienna u rang a inih, khan iriethieng hai amani kholok le inkoklo kha nangni dieng nepekna u rang a inih.
44020033	Kiei na tute dangka ninawkle rangkachak ninawkle ponledier hai kha ningaw mi`ing.
44020034	Kiei le khan kirawtawp pui hai vaina rang, kukhuttak le chon kawthaw, iti hi nangjet uh.
44020035	Hihai kholok hin kiei na nangni dieng rekhenna kinepek u inih. Adawk miring hai kha chon thaw tana vai u roh. Pumi Jesu amatak na, ‘Amunek a apeh hi rahvantha inih,’ iruti kha mining u roh.”
44020036	Ama na chawngruriei shole, amani kholok le rukhuk shun a Pathien dieng runik uh.
44020037	Amani lawpsheng a rie`ieklam a ruchap uh, khan amani na Paul kha rukawrep a rutum uh.
44020038	Ama me kha muret, iti awmlai naw nih ruti chawng jardet khan, amani kha mulung rujum pe uh. Khashole amani na rokonglien tieng khan rushe pui u joi.
44021001	Khan hitihin rushok, makhala amani kha kurureshen pui u shole, kieini na Cos kha jawngphit a kurujap uh. Khan jing tieng hin Rhodes le khan kha mun ah put ah Patara ah rokong a kurushe uh.
44021002	Kha mun khan Phoenicia ah she rang rokonglien `khat kurumuk uh, khan kurulut ua kurupang u joi.
44021003	Cyprus kha kurumuk u `le, viei tieng kuruhiei ua Syria tieng kurujap uh, khan Tyre khan kuruchum u joi, ajarla rokonglien kha kha mun khan nieinak muchum rang a inih.
44021004	Kha mun khan khaichawi hai kha kurumuk ua ni shiri kuruawm uh. Ratha jar a Jerusalem ah shena boi rang, Paul dieng ruti uh.
44021005	Inia kinikho u kha hawng heksho phakhan, kieini na kakuruchawi u joi. Inkonu hai le khan nai hai, amani kholok na khopui vaishe kha navakthak uh. Khan tuikawmchang khan rukhuk shun a Pathien dieng nikna kuruniei uh.
44021006	Khan khatlekhat dieng chubai kururepeh u shole, rokonglien shung khan kurulut u joi, khan amaniawm in tieng rukir u joi.
44021007	Tyre ah put ah kajaplawn u kha kurumawtawr u shole, Ptolemais ah kurushe uh, khan uliennai hai kha chubai kuruthaw pui ua amani le ni `khat kuruawm uh.
44021008	Jing tieng hin Paul le rawtawp kieini na makha kurumathan ua Caesarea ah kava u joi. Khan shiri hai kar a akhat, chawngshempa Philip, in ah kurulut ua ama le kuruawm uh.
44021009	Ama na chawng rophongna ngam khutchawi aniei shanu nungak mili runiei.
44021010	Kha mun khan nikho shawttak kuruawm u lai khan, Agubus iti thiempulien `khat Judea ah put ah ava.
44021011	Ama na kieini dieng va a Paul kawngkhit kha loi pe a makha le ukhut le eke hai kha nining a rukhit a ruti, “Ratha Riethieng na hitihin nieriei, ‘Hitihin mahi kawngkhit anieipa kha Jihudi hai na Jerusalem ah khop u rangnih, khan Phungshik hai khut ah pek u rangnih.’ ”
44021012	Hihaihi kurujet u phakhan, kieini le kha mun ah awm hai kha na Jerusalem ah hawngna boi rang, kurudawi uh.
44021013	Khashole Paul na rumashang, “Ithaw chap a kumulung ninumujum pe u maw nih? Ajarla inokhopte kha niboia Jerusalem ah Pumi Jesu riming rang athi rangshe rasham kanih.”
44021014	Ama kha kurudawi ngam boi u jarkhan, “Pumi mulungmining kha nih rosho,” kuruti ua kuruawmchien u joi.
44021015	Hihai nikho shole, kieini na kururasham ua Jerusalem ah kuruhawng u joi.
44021016	Caesarea ah put ah khaichawi eshenawm kieini le vashom uh. Amani na khaichawi alui Cyprus tuikawram miring Mnason dieng tungna rang, ama in ah nuruchawi uh.
44021017	Kieini na Jerusalem kurushok u phakhan, uliennai hai na ningaitak a lamjawng nuruthaw uh.
44021018	Jing tieng hin Paul na James dieng kieini le rulut. Makhan bieklamkai hai kholok ruawm uh.
44021019	Chubai ruthaw pui u shole, ama chonmun ah put ah Pathien na Phungshik hai kar a iruthaw dan hai kha khatkhat a ruriei.
44021020	Amani na rurangai u phakhan, Pumi kha rumapak uh. Khashole ama dieng ruti uh, “Uliennai, nangmuk makhala Jihudi hai kar a takashawn miring bawpbawp a awm joi, amani kholok hi Dan kha ningawmer miring runih uh.
44021021	Phungshik hai kar a awm Jihudi hai kholok na Moses Dan kha paina rang le amani nai hai kha na vunepna boi rang, ninawkle shena hai dungjuia ringna boi rang, nangruruchuk, iti chungchanga nang jar kha rujet uh.
44021022	Dawn a imaw shok nih? Amani na nangva joi, iti jetngir u rangnih joi, amani na mipui rawkhawmngir u rangnih joi.
44021023	Khajarkhan kiriei u hi thaw roh. Nining a Pathien dieng a chawngrakham miring pasha mili kieniei uh.
44021024	Amani hi le rashap a nang nining a vak riethieng roh. Khan amani sham voina rang a shier kha pek pe roh. Khanitatu mi kholok na nang jar a ijet u kha dik mak, tia loi u rangnih, khan nang na`awm Dan kha nangrung a nangjui ti u rangnih.
44021025	Inia Phungshik takashawn hai rang tu amani na konrilim hai dieng a rawthawina, changkhit me, thishen le uire ah put ah rechen u rang a inih, khan tieitang kha tu amani na irung boi u rang a inih, tia kimiejiek ua chawngkimocho u nih joi.”
44021026	Jing tieng hin Paul na miring hai kha ruchawi a khan amani kha le ruriethieng, khan riethiengmun khan rulut a riethiengna nikho mawtawrna kha rurophong joi. Mahi pha hin a inih amani rikip rang rawthawina kha ithaw u rang a kha.
44021027	Ni shiri kha hawng rupumdeng `le, Asia ah awm Jihudi hai na ama kha riethiengmun ah rumuk u phakhan, mirawp kholok kha rurawphawk ua, ama chung a khut rujawn u joi.
44021028	Amani na ra`ai a ruti uh, “Israel phung miring hai, nashan u roh! Hi miringpa hi na mun rikip ah nimiring hai le hi mun Dan le re`er a mi kholok iruchuk inih. Makha khea ama na Greek miring hai kha riethiengmun ah ivakchawi a mahi mun riethieng hi ironomashak inih.
44021029	Ajarla matienglai khan Ephesus miring Trophimus kha Paul le rawtawp a khopui shung ah ruravak kha rumuk uh. Khan amani na ama kha Paul na riethiengmun ah irulut pui ang a rumining uh.
44021030	Khashole khopui kholok kha rumawphawk ua miring hai kha lawp `khat a vak tan uh. Amani na Paul kha vak shur ua, riethiengmun ah put ah vak pawt uh. Khan relentak a mawkawt hai kha rukhar u joi.
44021031	Amani na ama kha thatna rang, rutawk u laitak khan, Jerusalem kholok phumoshok a awm joi, iti chawng kha Rome rarup rabawpkhat lamkai kung rushok joi.
44021032	Relentak a ramiring hai kha ruchawi a rarajakhat lamkai hai kha amani dieng rutan joi. Amani na rabawpkhat lamkai le ramiring hai kha rumuk u phakhan, Paul ajem kha rubang uh.
44021033	Khashole Rome rabawpkhat lamkaipa kha ava a ama kha rushur joi. Khan ama kha thirakarui `di le khitna rang, chawng rupek. Khan ama kha tumaw nih, khan imaw iruthaw iti kha rurawdawn.
44021034	Mirawp eshen na akhat, khan eshen na akhat riei a, rura`ai uh. Phumoshok kha na jar chang a ama na chawngkung chawngler kha rujet ngamlai mak. Khajarkhan ama kha rakhur tieng chawina rang, chawng rupek joi.
44021035	Paul na kabe hai khan hawng lawn phakhan, mipui kha ranghai jarkhan, ramiring hai na ama kha iruphung u inih.
44021036	Ajui mipui kha na “Ama kha mathan u roh!” ti a rura`ai uh.
44021037	Rakhur shung ah lut diengtak khan Paul na rabawpkhat lamkai dieng ruti, “Kiei na nang dieng chawng dikhatte riei maw tha nih?” Ramiring lamkai kha na rumashang, “Greek chawng maw nangjet?
44021038	Nang hirachangtak khan ra moshok a mithat hai bawp mili ramthim ah lamrukai Egypt miring kha maw nangnih?”
44021039	Paul na rumashang, “Kiei hi Jihudi miring kanih keng. Cilicia ah awm runiei khopui, Tarsus ah shok kanih. Nang dieng kawnawdawi, miring hai dieng hin niemieriei roh.”
44021040	Ama na jawtna rupek phakhan, Paul na kabe hai khan hawng ding a miring hai kha awmchienna rang, khut rumajap. Khan mi hai kha ruawmchien `le, ama na Hebrew chawng a amani dieng chawngruriei pe,
44022001	“Uliennai miring hai le kapa hai, kiei na nang maikung ua tun a korohonna hi narangai pe u roh.”
44022002	Hebrew chawng a iruriei kha rujet u phakhan, amani rurenemdet uh. Khashole ama na ruti,
44022003	“Kiei hi Cilicia ah awm Tarsus ah shok Jihudi miring `khat kanih. Mahi khopui hin Gamaliel keshun a behang ruchuh a hawng lien miring `khat kanih. Ama na nulepa hai akhawktak Dan dungjuia riringtak a inuruchuk inih. Von a nangnitak hi ang a Pathien kha ningkiruawmer inih.
44022004	Kiei na mahi Lam hi thitnashe a epshawna kurupek, nupang apa kiruchawi a lungroko shung ah kirukhum inih.
