44022005	Thiempu rashang na le Jihudi hai shierpui lamkai kholok na`awm mahi chungchang hin kiei rang kungchang ngam uh. Amani ah put ah chawngmawchawi hai kha uliennai hai rang kurumuk, khan amani kha khoplam a chawi a Jerusalem ah chepna rang, Damascus ah kurushe.
44022006	“Lam kururawh a Damascus kha kururanai pui phakhan, nishun dawr hin, ravan ah put ah mieivar lientak `khat na kiei hi rokochip a nojongeh.
44022007	Pieipak a kurupur phakhan, he `khat na kiei dieng nuruti, ‘Saul, Saul, ijar a kiei hi epshawna ninepek maw nih?’
44022008	“Kiei na kurumashang, ‘Tumaw nangnih, Pumi?’ Khashole kiei dieng nuruti, ‘Kiei hi nang na epshie a nangithaw a awm Nazareth Jesu kha kanih.’
44022009	Khalai a kiei le ruawm hai kha na mieivar kha rumuk ua ruchih uh, inia kiei dieng a chawng arieipa hesho kha tu rujet u mak.
44022010	“ ‘Pumi, kiei na imaw thaw ning?’ tia kururawdawn. Pumi na kiei dieng nururiei, ‘Thoi tana Damascus khawn she roh, khawn kiei na nang rang a kimadansha nangithaw rang a kholok kha nieriei rangnih.’
44022011	Mieivar lurna kha na kiei rumuh ngamlai mi`ing. Khajarkhan kiei le rawtawp hai kha na kukhut ah nomoroi ua Damascus tieng nuruchawi u joi.
44022012	“Dan dungjuia richichawi miring, khan kha mun ah awm Jihudi hai kholok na atha, tia iriei u Ananias iti miring `khat ruawm.
44022013	Ama na ava a kiei dieng ding a ruti, ‘Uliennai Saul, muh rang roh.’ Kha phatak khan kimik kha hawng var a ama kha kawhawngen joi.
44022014	“Khashole ama na ruti, ‘Nulepa hai Pathien kha na, ama mulungmining kha jetna rang, Diknapa kha mukna rang le ama nertak a jetna rang, nang kha namadan joi.
44022015	Ajarla nangimuk nangijet chungchanga mi kholok dieng ama rang a kungachang miring kha anih rang a nangnih joi.
44022016	Khan tun, ithaw rashai maw nangnilai? Thoi tana baptisma loi rang roh, khan Pumi riming kha ban tana nang munu hai kha rushuksho rang roh.’
44022017	“Khan hitihin rushok, makhala kiei na Jerusalem ah kavakkir shole, riethiengmun ah Pathien dieng kuruniklai khan, shuika a kuruawm.
44022018	Khalai khan Jesu na kiei dieng chawngiriei kha kurumuk, ‘Relentak a Jerusalem ah put ah shok rang roh, ajarla kuchungchanga nang kungchangna kha amani na loi u naw nih.’
44022019	“Khan kiei na kuruti, ‘Pumi nang takanashawn hai kha synagogue rikip ah dawdawn a kieitak na lung roko shung ah kiruthong a kirujem kha amani na jet uh.
44022020	Khan amani na nang kungachang miring, Stephen thishen rumolong pe u lai khan, iedieng ah kuruding a atha kuruti, khan ama athat hai ponledier hai kha kiei na kururung pe.’
44022021	“Khashole Jesu na kiei dieng nuruti, ‘She rang roh, ajarla ram latak ah awm Phungshik hai dieng nitir rang kanih joi.’ ”
44022022	Khakawtshe khan amani na rurangai pe uh, inia dawdawn a rura`ai ua ruti uh, “Rieliei ah put ah ralatmashak u rang roh, ajarla ama kha aring a awm rang kha rutuklai mak.”
44022023	Khan amani na rura`ai u le roroia, amani ponledier hai kha ruther ua rithi ah vaiphin ruvawr uh.
44022024	Rabawpkhat lamkai kha na ama kha rakhur ah chawina rang, chawng rupek joi. Khan ama chung a ara`aina u jar kha jetna rang le jem a mawchawngna rang, chawng rupek joi.
44022025	Inia amani na ama kha mevun rui le rukhit u phakhan, Paul na ama dieng ah ading rarajakhat lamkai dieng ruti, “Eheng boi Rome khomi jem rang a hi nang rang dan maw nih?”
44022026	Rarajakhat lamkai kha na makha rujet phakhan, rushe a rabawpkhat lamkai dieng rumejet. Ama na ruti, “Thaw rang a nangiti khan riring roh, ajarla miringpa hi Rome khomi inih.”
44022027	Rabawpkhat lamkai kha na Paul dieng rushe a rurawdawn, “Nang Rome khomi maw nangnih?” Khan ama na rumashang, “Awh.”
44022028	Rabawpkhat lamkai kha na ruti, “Rome khomi changna rang shier ajeng a kurulut.” Paul na rumashang, “Kiei hi koshok ah put ah Rome khomi kha kanih keng.”
44022029	Ama ajem rang le chawngrawdawn rang a rasham hai kha relentak a rurakai u joi, khan rabawpkhat lamkai kha`awm Rome khomi `khat irukhop nit jarkhan, ruchih joi.
44022030	Ama na Paul kha ijar a Jihudi hai na inawng u maw nih, iti jetna rang, jing tieng hin Paul kha khop ah put ah rumoshok u joi. Khan ama na thiempu ulien hai kholok le Sanhedrin kholok rumukna rang, chawng rupek joi. Ama na Paul kha jong chawi a amani maikung a rumiding joi.
44023001	Paul na Sanhedrin kha ruenrep a ruti, “Uliennai miring hai, vonshe hin irikip chung a lungthim riethienghiei a Pathien maikung a karinglai.”
44023002	Khan thiempu rashang Ananias na iedieng ah ading hai dieng khan Paul kha ener ah jemna rang, chawng rupek.
44023003	Mahin Paul na ama dieng ruti, “Pathien na nang kha nejem rang nih joi, Aw angoi nawt bang! Ajarla Dan dungjuia kuchung a chawngshat rang a ashuh nangnih, dan le kairekhe a kiei hi jemna rang chawng nangipek maw nih?”
44023004	Iedieng ah ading hai kha na ruti uh, “Pathien thiempu rashang hi maimawk nangipek maw nih?”
44023005	Khan Paul na ruti, “Kiei na ama hi thiempu rashang keng, iti rujet mi`ing, ajarla uliennai hai, hitihin rumiejiek, ‘Nang miring hai rampo chung a ashie chawng a rachaithiei naw tinih.’ ”
44023006	Amani shenrajat hi Sadducee, khan shenrajat hi Pharisee keng, iti kha Paul na rujet le Sanhedrin khan rura`ai, “Uliennai miring hai, kiei hi Pharisee kanih, khan Pharisee shapa `khat kanih. Kiei na enretena a ka`awm hi ngakmining le athi ah put ah hawng thoiretna chungchanga inih.”
44023007	Makha ruti phakhan, chawngrieshietna alientak `khat Pharisee hai le Sadducee hai kar a ruthoi a puiruchun kha idi a rureshen joi.
44023008	Ajarla Sadducee hai na thoiretna ninawkle ravantir ninawkle ratha awm mak iti u inih, inia Pharisee hai na tu lawpsheng a ipawm u inih.
44023009	Khashole herum moshokna lientak `khat ruthoi joi. Makhan Pharisee hai le rachang danoja hai kha na ruthoi ua enchak a chawng rurieshiet pui ua ruti uh, “Miringpa chung hin ashie muk pe u mi`ing. Ratha ninawkle ravantir na ama chung a chawngiriei nitjoiala, Pathien le re`er chon thaw u naw rawi.”
44023010	Chawngrieshietna lientak hawng mothoi u phakhan, rabawpkhat lamkai kha na amani na leklek a ther u rang keng joi, iti kha ruchit pui jarkhan, ramiring hai dieng khan Paul kha amani ah put ah ranak a rakhur tieng chawina rang, chawng rupek joi.
44023011	Makha jan khan Pumi na ama dieng ruding a ruti, “Nang mulung mangar roh, Paul. Ajarla Jerusalem ah kiei rang a kungnangruchang kha ang a, Rome a`awm kungachangngir rang nangnih.”
44023012	Kho hawng var phakhan, Jihudi hai eshen na lawp `khat a ruruchun ua Paul kha that masheng bulean shah u naw nih, tia chawngrurakham uh.
44023013	Miring shawm mili mieliei na mahi repna hi rurashak uh.
44023014	Amani na thiempu ulien hai le shierulien dieng rushe ua ruti uh, “Kieini na Paul kathat u masheng iawm shah u naw ning, tia chawngkarakham u joi.
44023015	Khajarkhan tun nangni na, Sanhedrin le rashap u tana nangni na ama chungchanga jirjar kha dawn a riringdet a tawkna rang, jing hin nangni dieng ivakchawi u rang a dan a rabawpkhat lamkai dieng khan chawngrashak pui u roh, khan Paul na mun jong shok mala khan kieini na ruthat u rang kanih.”
44023016	Khan Paul sharnu shapa kha na amani na irep u kha rujet phakhan, rushe a rakhur khan rulut a Paul dieng thangrukoi joi.
44023017	Paul na rarajakhat lamkai kar a akhat kha rukoi a ruti, “Mahi shanaipa hi rabawpkhat lamkai dieng chawi roh, ajarla ama dieng iriei rang chawng dikhat ieniei.”
44023018	Khajarkhan ama na shanaipa kha rabawpkhat lamkai dieng khan ruchawi a ruti, “Shurkhop miring Paul na kiei hi nokoi a mahi shanaipa hi na nang dieng thanginokoi jawt awm ti jarkhan, nang dieng kivakchawi hi inih.”
44023019	Rabawpkhat lamkai kha na ama khut ah mukui a bingte a ruchawi a rurawdawn, “Kiei dieng thangnangikoi jawt kha imaw nih?”
44023020	Ama na rumashang, “Jihudi hai na Sanhedrin ruchunna ah Paul kha nang jong chawina rang le nang dieng nikna rang, rawjawtna niei uh. Amani na ama chung a chawng reshethep rasha u inih.
44023021	Amani na nang kha nawdawi u phakhan, jawt pe naw roh. Ajarla amani miring shawm mili mieliei na Paul that malalim u nekleshak shah u naw ning, tia chawngrakham u joi. Tun amani na nang mulungding ranga kha ingak a awm u inih.”
44023022	Khajarkhan ramiring lamkaipa kha na shanaipa dieng khan “Nang na kiei dieng a thangnanginokoi hi tute dieng riei naw roh,” tia chawng rupek a ama kha rumeshe joi.
44023023	Khashole ama na rarajakhat lamkai hai kar a idi rukoi a ruti, “Ramiring rajadi le shakawr ramiring shawm shiri, khan shiei rak ramiring rajadi le von jan nidan `ko a Caesarea ah shena rang, rasham u rang roh.
44023024	Khan rampopa Felix kung damtak a shok puina rang, Paul rang shakawr rasham pe u roh.”
44023025	Hitihin ama na chawngmawchawi a rumiejiek:
44023026	Claudius Lysias kiei na richit`awm rampopa Felix dieng: Chubai.
44023027	Miringpa hi Jihudi hai na ishur ua that rang a rasham u nih joi, inia ama hi Rome khomi `khat inih, iti hi kurujet phakhan, ramiring hai le kirushan inih.
44023028	Ama dieng a inawngna kha kejet jawt jarkhan, ama hi amani Sanhedrin khan kuruchawi.
44023029	Inawngna u kha tu amani dan rawdawnna chungchanga inih, iti hi kurujet. Inia inawngna u kha thitna ninawkle lungroko shung ah khumnashe rang a rutuk tu nimak.
44023030	Khajarkhan miringpa chung a Jihudi hai irepna u chawng kha kejet jar a rawnawttak a nang dieng kivaktir hi inih. Khan ama anawng miring hai diengawm, amani na inawngna u jar kha nang maikung a peh u rosho, tia chawngkipek inih. Chubai.
44023031	Khajarkhan ramiring hai kha na chawngpek dungjuia, khan Antipatris rang khan jan a Paul kha ruchawi u joi.
44023032	Jing tieng hin amani na shakawr ramiring hai kha ama le dawn a she rang rumak ua, amani kha tu rakhur tieng vak kir u joi.
44023033	Amani na Caesarea vak shok u phakhan, rampopa dieng chawngmawchawi kha rupek uh, khan Paul kha`awm ama dieng rupek u joi.
44023034	Chawngmawchawi kha rampopa kha na rute shole, ih ram ah put ah maw nangnih, tia Paul dieng rurawdawn. Khan ama kha Cilicia ah put ah inih, iti kha rujet `le,
44023035	ama na ruti, “Nang ananawng hai vak shok pha a nang ah put ah rangai rang kanih.” Khashole ama kha rung a Herod chawngshatna Praetorium ah tetna rang, chawng rupek joi.
44024001	Ni rahnga shole thiempu rashang Ananias na shierulien eshen le Tertullus iti danthiei `khat le Caesarea ah rushe joi. Amani na Paul kha rampopa maikung a vak nawng uh.
44024002	Paul kha rukoi phakhan, Tertullus na Paul inawngna chawng kha ariei ruput a ruti, “Nang sheshepna thoi a kieini na pha shawttak a lungdamna lientak hoikihawngthiei u inih. Khan nang mik`enshiei kha na phung dieng hin takchangna ihawngchawi inih.
44024003	Mahi munlepha rikip a mapak le roroia, kieini na lam rikip a kawpawm uh, Aw richit`awm Felix.
44024004	Inia ashawt nawmawshaw jawt u lai mi`ing, nang roihoina jar a pha bawngte kawchawng u dikhat hi ninarangaina pe rang hin kawnawdawi.
44024005	“Ajarla mahi miringpa hi railawn, manmieshie kholok a awm Jihudi hai dieng a shawna mothoi, khan Nazareth lawpreshen hai lutu a lamkai miring `khat inih, iti hi kieini na kumuk uh.
44024006	Ama na riethiengmunshe kha`awm pawrmechetna rang rurai jarkhan, kirushur ua kadan u dungjuia mawchawngna rang, kirumining u inih.
44024007	Inia ramiring lamkai Lysias na va a kukhut chung uah put ah ranak a inurosho u inih.
44024008	Ama anawng miring hai kha nang dieng vatna rang, chawng irupek inih. Ama hi nang na nangmawchawng phakhan, kieini na kinawngna u ajar kholok rupumping a nangjet ngam rangnih.”
44024009	Jihudi hai kholok na rurachang ua hihaihi adik inih, tia rurophong uh.
44024010	Rampopa kha na Paul kha chawng rieina rang ukhut le jetna ruthaw a pha rupek phakhan, Paul na rumashang, “Nang na mahi phung chung hin kumshawttak chawngshat miring nangnih hi kejet jarkhan, rangamna nieitak a korohonna hi kipek inih.
44024011	Nang na nangjet rangnih, makhala kiei na Jerusalem ah Pathien chubaibawk kurushena kha ni shawmlieidi khe maklai.
44024012	Kiei na riethiengmun ah ninawkle synagogue ah ninawkle khopui shung ah mipui kha kirumuputna nurumuk pe u mak.
44024013	Amani na inawnawngna u hiawm nang dieng rachamashak ngam u naw nih.
44024014	Inia Lam ajui miring `khat a, kiei hi lawpreshen initi u hi tu nang maikung a kiei kajawt. Dan shung ah ninawkle Thiempulien hai behangbuk ah irumiejiek kholok kha takakurushawn a pilepu hai Pathien kha kirubiek inih.
44024015	Amani na`awm ijawt u Pathien dieng a ngakmining kha kiei na`awm kieniei, makhala midik midik boi adinre athi ah put ah thoiretna awm rangnih, iti hi inih.
44024016	Khajarkhan Pathien dieng le miring hai dieng lungthim riethieng kha nieina rang, munlepha rikip a kiruthaw inih.
44024017	“Kiei na kum shawtbawt shole, kuphung hai dieng numpok-khutchawi le rawthawina pekna rang, kuruhawng.
44024018	Mahi kuruthawlai hin Asia ah put ah ajong Jihudi hai kha na riethiengmun ah kururiethieng kha nurumuk uh. Makhan mirawp`awm ruawm mak, khan roshorakhana`awm ruawm mak.
44024019	Kuchung a nawngna niei u joiatu, mahin nang maikung a a`awmngir u rang a shok.
44024020	Sanhedrin ah kurudinglai khan, chonrehe kiruthawna maw nurumuk pe uh? Hin ah awm miring hai hi na riei u rosho.
44024021	Ninawkle, amani maikung a kuruding a kurura`aina `khat jar a runithiei, ‘Von a chawngrawdawnna ah ka`awm hi athi ah put ah thoiretna chungchang hin a inih.’ ”
44024022	Felix na hihaihi rurangai a ama na Lam jirjar kha thatak a rujet jarkhan, chawngmeshie kha rudeh a ruti, “Rabawpkhat lamkai Lysias vak shok `le, nang chawngmeshie u hi shat rang kanih joi.”
44024023	Khashole Paul kha rungna rang le ama lawm hai na irangai hai kha ipek khan makha boi a ningchamna pekna rang, rarajakhat lamkai dieng ama na chawng rupek joi.
44024024	Nikhothang shawtbawt le Felix na i`inkonu Drusilla, Jihudinu kha le ava a Paul kha vak mokoimashak. Paul na Christa dieng taka`ishawnna chungchanga iruriei kha ama na rurangai.
44024025	Paul na dikna, takshurna, khan ajong rang a chawngshatna chungchanga ruriei pe phakhan, Felix na ajeng a ruchih a ruti, “Tun a hin tu she rang roh, kiei na pha rolotna kumuk phakhan, navakmokoi rang kanih joi.”
44024026	Khalaikhan ama moshokna rang, Paul na shier maw nepekngai, tia rawnawrawnaw a Paul kha vak mokoi a chawngruriei puithiei.
44024027	Inia kum `di theng shole, Porcius Festus na Felix mun kha hawng loh phakhan, Jihudi hai dieng enlar ruthaw jawt jarkhan, Felix na Paul kha lungroko shung khan rumak joi.
44025001	Festus na makha ram khan hawng shokna nithum shole, ama na Caesarea ah put ah Jerusalem tieng ruhawng.
44025002	Kha mun khan thiempu ulien le Jihudi lamkai hai na ama kha rurumuk pui ua, Paul chungchanga thangrukoi uh.
44025003	Paul kha Jerusalem tieng vak rawthawtmashakna rang, amani na enlar runik uh. Makha thawna jartu, amani na lam a rurep ua ruthatna rang a inih.
44025004	Festus na rumashang makhala Paul hi Caesarea ah tet rang a inih, khan relentak a kha mun khan she rang kanih.
44025005	Khajarkhan ama na ruti, “Nang kar ua chamniei hai na kiei le she u rieshie, miringpa chung hin adik boi awm joiatu, amani na nawng u rosho.”
44025006	Amani kar khan ni shawm dawr ruawm shole, Caesarea tieng ruchum joi. Jing tieng hin ama na chawngshatna mun khan rushuh a Paul kha vak chawina rang, chawng rupek joi.
44025007	Ama na vak shok phakhan, Jerusalem ah put ah ahawng ama dieng ah ading Jihudi hai kha na ama chung a irachamashak ngam boi u akhawk nawngna kha Paul chung a rupek uh.
44025008	Paul na ibibing a rohonna kha rupek a ruti, “Khoshekhoshe ah nita`awm, kiei na Jihudi hai dan, riethiengmun, khan Caesar chung a rehena chon ruthaw mi`ing.”
44025009	Inia Festus na Jihudi hai enlar rang khan rumining a Paul dieng ruti, “Nang na Jerusalem ah she a hihai nawngna chungchanga kamaikung a chawngrawdawn rang hin nangdit maw?”
44025010	Paul na rumashang, “Caesar chawngshatna mun ah kading hin nang na chawngninashat penangir rang a mun kha inih. Nang na thaning a nangijet kha ang a, Jihudi hai dieng kiei na kirehena awm mak.
44025011	Kiei na dikna boi, khan thitna rangshe rutuk chon kha kiruthaw nitjoiatu, athi rang khan kiei jawt boi thaw naw ning. Inia amani na inawnawng u hin iawm awm joi nawkatu, tute na kiei hi amani dieng nepeh ngam naw nih. Kiei na Caesar dieng chawngkito inih.”
44025012	Khashole Festus na chawngrashak pui hai dieng chawngruloi shole, rumashang, “Caesar dieng chawng nangito maw nih joi? Caesar dieng she rang nangnih!”
44025013	Nikhothang shebawt `le, reng Agrippa le Bernice na Festus lamjawng thawna rang, Caesarea vak shok u joi.
44025014	Amani na makha mun khan nikhothang shawtbawt ruawm ua, Festus na Paul chawngmeshie chungchanga rengpa dieng rurophong a ruti, “Hi mun hin Felix na lungroko ah irumak miring `khat awm.
44025015	Jerusalem ah kuruawmlai khan, thiempu ulien hai le Jihudi shierulien hai na ama chung a kiei dieng jar rupek ua, chawngkishat rang kha rudit uh.
44025016	“ ‘Anawng hai kha na inawngpa u kha mailemai rumusheng a ama chung a nawngna kha mashangna rang chanthatna muk mala a, mi `khat thatna rang pek rang a hi Rome miring hai shena dan nimak,’ tia kiei na amani dieng kirumashang inih.
44025017	Khajarkhan amani na vat u phakhan, kiei na pha mathang boi a, jing tieng chawngshatna mun khan kurushuh a miringpa kha vak chawina rang chawng kirupek inih.
44025018	Anawng miring hai kha na ruding u phakhan, kirumining ang a chonshie hai kha le ama kha runawng u mak.
44025019	Inia amanirilik richi jar a ama chung a chawngrawdawnna runiei pui uh. Khan Jesu iti miring `khat ruthi a ama kha ring, tia Paul na irurophong chungchanga chawng rurieshiet pui uh.
44025020	Hihai rawdawnna kha kurujet boi jarkhan, Paul kha Jerusalem ah she a hihai nawngna hi envakrete pui jawt maw, tia kururawdawn.
44025021	Inia Paul na Augustus chawngmocho mukna rang thangrukoi phakhan, Caesar dieng kurutir malalim, tetna rang chawngkirupek inih.”
44025022	Agrippa na Festus dieng ruti, “Kieitak na`awm miringpa chawng kha karangai jawt.” Ama na rumashang, “Jing a nangrangai rang keng.”
44025023	Khashole jing tieng hin Agrippa na Bernice le va a, chawngrangaina mun kha rabawpkhat lamkai hai le khopui shung ah alien-arang hai le lieklawr a rulut u joi. Khashole Festus na chawng rupek a Paul kha vak chawi u joi.
44025024	Festus na ruti, “Reng Agrippa le hin ah hawng ruchun miring kholok, miringpa hi nangmuk u joi. Ama chung hin, Jerusalem ah le hin ah awm, Jihudi mipui kholok na ama hi aring rang hin rutuklai mak, tia ra`ailam a kiei dieng thangnurukoi uh.
44025025	Inia kiei na ama chung a thitna rangshe rutuk jar kha iawm rumuk pe mi`ing. Khan upumtak na Augustus dieng thangrukoi joi jarkhan, ama dieng tirna rang kumulung kimiding joi.
44025026	Inia ama jar hi kupumi dieng khinrit a miejiek rang niei mi`ing. Khajarkhan ama hi nangni dieng, khinniei a reng Agrippa nang dieng kivakchawi inih. Makha kieini na nawmawchawng shole, miejiek rang dikhat kinieina rang a inih.
44025027	Ajarla shurkhop `khat ama dieng a pek nawngna kha khin boipet a meshe rang a hi kiei rang rolotmashak mi`ing.”
44026001	Agrippa na Paul dieng ruti, “Nang bibing rang khan chawngna rang, nang dieng pha pek inih.” Khashole Paul na khut kha rulawm a ibibing a rohonna kha ruriei,
44026002	“Aw reng Agrippa, von a nang maikung a Jihudi hai na inawnawngna u kholok chungchanga rohonna `khat a kirieina rang a hi rahvantha `khat inih, tia koloi.
44026003	Ajarla khinniei a nang na Jihudi hai shena le chawngreper kholok kha nangjet joi. Nang na mulungluttak a narangai pe roh, tia kenengen.
44026004	“Putna ah put ah kimiring haitak kar a le Jerusalem ah karingdan hai kha Jihudi hai kholok na kanaite chang ah put ah rujet uh.
44026005	Amani na kungchang jawt uatu, inejetna u hi shawt joi. Kiei na nirichi u khawktak lawpreshen, Pharisee `khat a kuruawm.
44026006	Khan tun kiei na mawchawngna a kading hi Pathien na pilepu hai dieng chawngirurakham ngakmining jar a inih.
44026007	Mahi chawngrakhamtak hin nuphung u shawmlieidi na mulungluttak a Pathien chon kha shunlejan a iruthaw ua shokna rang, ngak`irumining u inih. Mahi ngakmining jar hin a, Aw reng Agrippa, Jihudi hai na kiei hi inurunawng u inih.
44026008	Pathien na athi miring kha mothoi, iti hi iloia takashawn nimatatmashak u maw nih?
44026009	“Kieitak na Nazareth Jesu riming le kairekhe chon tampui kha thaw rang, tia kirumining inih.
44026010	Makha inih kiei na Jerusalem ah kiruthaw kha. Thiempu ulien hai ah put ah cham kha kurumuk a miriethieng hai kha lungroko shung ah kirukhumte kha niboia, amani kha ruthat u phakhan, kawjawtna kha kirupek inih.
44026011	Synagogue rikip ah amani kha kiruchep jawnjai a amani kha ranak a mieshietna mawthaw rang, kururai. Amani chung a kumulung ruhanghai a mejet boi khopui haishe khan epshawna pek rang khan kurushe.
44026012	“Hilaihin thiempu ulien hai cham le amani tirna ah put ah Damascus khan kurushe.
44026013	Nishun dawr hin, Aw rengpa, ravan a ninek a avar `khat na lam ah kiei le khan kirulawn pui hai kha rokochip a nojong eh u kha kurumuk.
44026014	Kokholok na thoi a kurupur u phakhan, he `khat na kiei dieng Hebrew chawng a inieriei kha kurujet, ‘Saul, Saul, ijar a epshawna nanginepek maw nih? Rujumjap ruthui, iti hi nang rang matat inih.’
44026015	“Kiei na kururawdawn, ‘Tumaw nangnih, Pumi?’ Ama na nurumashang, ‘Nang na epshawna nangipek a awm Jesu kha kanih.
44026016	Inia thoi tana nang ke khan ding rang roh. Ajarla nangimuk nieinak hai le kinumumuk rang a nieinak dire chungchanga shepding changna rang le kungmachangna rang, mahi chonmuchuk rang hin a, nang dieng jong lar kanih joi.
44026017	Khan tun kinitirna miring hai le Phungshik hai dire ah put ah nashan rang kanih.
44026018	Amani mik mavarna rang, ajing ah put ah mieivar tieng hieina rang, Satan cham ah put ah Pathien dieng hawng hieina u rang, kinitir inih. Makha amani munu hai kha rangaidam mukna rang le inkoklo kha takashawn jar a kiei dieng, riethiengsho hai le, mukna rang a inih.’
44026019	“Khajarkhan Aw reng Agrippa, ravan ah put ah ajong mulungmik dieng kiei na rieirangai boi ruthaw mi`ing.
44026020	Inia akhat changna a Damascus le Jerusalem ah awm, khashole Judea ram kholok ah awm, khan Phungshik hai dieng kieina kirurophong inih. Makha amani na mulung lek a Pathien dieng vak hieina u rang le mulungilek u kha le racha a chon thawna u rang a inih.
44026021	Hijarhin Jihudi hai na kiei hi riethiengmun ah nurushur ua that rang nururai uh.
44026022	Khajarkhan Pathien ah put ah ranak kumuk a, von nikhoshe hin dinglam a ashin-alien dieng kungkuruchang inih. Thiempulien hai na le Moses na iruriei ashok rang a kha niboia, iawm ruriei mi`ing.
44026023	Makhala Christa na shawna idoingir rang a inih, khan ama kha athi ah put ah hawng thoi akhat changna nih rangnih. Khan ama na Jihudi miring hai le Phungshik hai adinre dieng mieivar kha rophong rangnih.”
44026024	Ama na ibibing rang rurohonlai khan, Festus na rashangtak a “Nangvet joi Paul, nangthiemna hai kha na miropoboi namachang joi,” tia rura`ai.
44026025	Inia Paul na rumashang, “Kiei vet mi`ing, Aw richit`awm Festus. Inia chawng adiktak le mulungmining riethieng kha kiriei inih.
44026026	Ajarla rengpa na hihaihi ejet, khan kiei na rangamer a ama dieng kiriei inih. Khan karangam pui, makhala hihai kholok hi ama dieng rethe awm mak, ajarla muruk a thaw nimak.
44026027	Reng Agrippa, thiempulien na iruriei hai kha takanangshawn maw? Takanangshawn iti kejet.”
44026028	Agrippa na Paul dieng ruti, “Pha bawngte shung hin nang na kiei hi Christian nangnamachangdeng joi.”
44026029	Paul na rumashang, “Pha shawt ninawkle pha bawngte loi a, shurkhop kanih hi niboia, nang ranga niboia, von a kiei narangai hai kholok na kiei hi angna u rang, tia Pathien dieng kinik.”
44026030	Ama na hihaihi ruriei shole, rengpa kha na rampo Bernice, khan ama le rushuh miring hai kha le ruthoi joi.
44026031	Khan amani kha rushe u le roroia, khatlekhat dieng ruriei uh, “Hi miring hi na thatna rang ninawkle lungroko shung ah khumna rang rutuk chon iawm thaw mak.”
44026032	Agrippa na Festus dieng ruti, “Caesar dieng thangrukoi nawkatu, hi miring hi moshoktha inih.”
44027001	Kieini hi Italy a meshena rang, mulung rumiding u phakhan, Paul le shurkhop eshen hai kha Augustus rarup a awm Julius iti rarajakhat lamkai dieng rupek joi.
44027002	Asia ram shir tieng ah she rang a rasham Adramyttium rokonglien khan kurulut ua, makhan rokong a kurushe u joi. Khan Thesalonica ah put ah Macedonia miring Aristarchus kha kieini le rushe.
44027003	Jing tieng hin Sidon kurushok uh, khan Julius na Paul kha numpoktak a rutawn a awlawm hai dieng she a tenretna mukna rang, ningchamna kha rupek.
44027004	Khan ah put ah tuikhanglien tieng kuruchum ua, Cyprus tuikawram ringi a rokong a kurupang uh, ajarla rithi kha kieini dieng hawng rang.
44027005	Cilicia le Pamphylia ram kha kururakan u shole, Lycia khopui Myra khan kava uh.
44027006	Kha mun khan rarajakhat lamkai kha na Italy ah she rang, Alexandria rokonglien `khat rumuk a nurumulut u joi.
44027007	Nikho tampui loi a jamtia kurushe uh; dengre a Cnidus kha kuroshok uh. Khan rithi na nurukhar u jarkhan, Salmone le re`en Crete ringi a kurushe u joi.
44027008	Dengre a makha kavakrakan ua Lasea dieng ah awm Fair Havens, iti mun khan kava u joi.
44027009	Khan pha hawng hek a rokonglien torna rangawm chithawngroi joi. Ajarla Chamradoina pha kha`awm thengsho joi jarkhan, Paul na amani dieng chawng rupek joi.
44027010	Ama na ruti, “Miring hai nokhomijin she u hi hawng matat rang a hi kumuk, nieinak hai le rokonglien akoi`athang ranga niboia, niringkho u hiawm thang rangnih.”
44027011	Inia rarajakhat lamkai kha na Paul iriei hainek khan rokonglien torpa le pumpa kha takarushawndet.
44027012	Ajarla rokong muchumna mun kha phabi a awmna rang, rurolo mak. Mi arawpdet kha na dawn a rokong a shena rang, mulung rumiding u joi. Amani na itia maw thaw a Phoenix shokngir a phabi kha makhawn vak metheng rang, tia rumining uh. Makha thangmar le shakmar tieng ah maisho Crete ah rokong muchumna kha inih.
44027013	Thang tieng ah rithi na hawng renemdet le khan amani na irumining u kha hawng shok rangnih joi, ti u jarkhan, thirchuk kha ruthut ua Crete tuikawram kha deprit a rushe uh.
44027014	Inia shawt boipet a Euroclydon iti rithikhopui hawng rang joi.
44027015	Rithikhopui kha na rokonglien kha rushur a rithi shung khan maton shawn a lawn ngam boi jarkhan, tui a rulan u joi.
44027016	Clauda iti tuikawram ringi khan kurushe ua dengre a ringrokong hai kha kururethiei uh.
44027017	Amani na shung ah rumulutsho u le, rokonglien kha rui le rukhop uh. Khan amani na Syrtis Nge ah ruphun nih, tia ruchit pui u jarkhan, thirchuk mathaklam a amani kha rulan u joi.
44027018	Rithikhopui na shehawng a nawnawnghai u jarkhan, rokonglien shung ah awm nieinak hai kha rupai u joi.
44027019	Khan ni `thum changna khan tu kukhuttak u le rokonglien khutrak hai kha kurupai u joi.
44027020	Nikhothang khadawr shawt a ni le arshi hawng malang boi jarkhan, khan rithikhopui kha`awm hawng renem, iti awm boi phakhan, karing u rangnih, iti ngakmining kholok kha ruthang joi.
44027021	Nikhothang khadawr shawt khan nekleshak shak boi a hawng awm u phakhan, Paul na amani kar a ding a ruti, “Miring hai nangni na kawchawng kha nangnarangai pe ua, Crete tuikawram ah put khan rokong a najong u nawkatu, mahi thangna le shietnakoina hai hi rawtawng pui u naw minih.
44027022	Mahi rokonglien hi niboia, ringkho thangna `khatshe awm naw nih. Khajarkhan nang mulungmangar u roh, tia kinawdawi u inih.
44027023	Ajarla janginlai khan kiei na chonkithaw pe Pathien ravantir na kiei dieng jong ding a
44027024	ruti, ‘Chih naw roh, Paul, nang Caesar maikung a adingngir rang nangnih, khan diktak a nang le rawtawp hai miring kholok kha Pathien na nang dieng nepek joi.’
44027025	Khajarkhan miring hai nang mulungmangar u roh, ajarla Pathien na kiei dieng inieriei hi ang a shok rangnih, iti hin Pathien kha takakawshawn.
44027026	Inia kieini na tuikawram `khat nirojongir u rang a shoklai.”
44027027	Jan shawmlieimili changna khan Adria Thampui khan shehawng a inotor u le roroia janchim a ator hai kha na`awm ram kha le karanai u kha ruring u joi.
44027028	Amani na tui athuk dan kha ruen u phakhan, lam shawmdi rumuk uh. Khan rushebawt u phakhan, lam shawmlieirahnga rumuk uh.
44027029	Lung alien le rawtaw nih, tia ruchit pui u jarkhan, amani na thirchuk mili kha rumuchum ua khovar rangte kha rungakrala u joi.
44027030	Inia ator hai kha na thirchuk muchum rurasha ua, ringrokong hai kha muchum a atan rang rurashak uh.
44027031	Inia Paul na rarajakhat lamkai le ramiring hai dieng ruti, “Hihai miring hi rokonglien shung ah awm u joi nawkatu, nangni rekhe ngam u naw tinih.”
44027032	Khashole ramiring hai kha na ringrokong rui hai kha rushat ua rumalan u joi.
44027033	Khovar diengtak khan Paul na amani kholok dieng nekleshak shakna rang, mawshawk a ruti, “Ih shak boi a, vawnchamlam a, nangingakna u hi von le ni shawmlieimili changna nih joi.
44027034	Khajarkhan, nang ringna u rang nekleshak shak rang hin kawnawmawshawk uh. Ajarla nang lu uah shampum `khatshe thangna awm naw nih.”
44027035	Mahi ruriei shole, ama na tan hai kha ruloi a, amani kholok maikung a Pathien dieng mapakna runiei, khan ama na makha rukhoi a ashah ruput joi.
44027036	Amani kholok na lungarna runiei ua, ibibing u rang nekleshak kha ruloi uh.
44027037	Rokonglien shung ah awm kha kokholok ua miring rajadi shawm shirilieiruk kurunih uh.
44027038	Amani na rutukthep a rushak u shole, amani na rokonglien kha rumajangdet u joi, khan gehu hai kha thampui chung ah rupai u joi.
44027039	Kho hawng var phakhan, amani na ram kha rujet u mak. Inia ngebuk ram kha rumuk uh. Kha mun khan nitthiei a la rokonglien kha shok puina rang, rumining uh.
44027040	Thirchuk kha ruthut ua tui shung khan rumak u joi. Khan radar le rushui rui kha ruthut uh. Khashole rithiloi kha rulawm ua kawmchang tieng khan rushe u joi.
44027041	Thampui `di rumukna mun ah ngebuk kha rushuk ua rokonglien lu kha ruruphun a leh miehieibawt `le, ruper thieilai mak. Khan tuilawm kha na ama takdon kha leklek a akhoi ruput joi.
44027042	Ramiring hai chonrashak kha tu shurkhop hai kha tuihot thaw a rekhena boi rang that rang, iti hi inih.
44027043	Inia rarajakhat lamkai kha na Paul kha rushan jawt jarkhan, amani chonrashak ah put ah rekhemashakna rang ruthaw. Ama na tuihot thiei hai kha akhat changna a chawm a kawmchang tieng shena rang, chawng rupek joi.
44027044	Khan ravat sheng kha na thinglong le rokonglien lekvai hai kha rotokna rang, chawng rupek joi. Khatikhan mi kholok kha ramhona khan rurekhemashak joi.
44028001	Khatikhan rurekhe u shole, makha tuikawram kha Malta iti kha rujet uh.
44028002	Ajarla roshur a adaihai jarkhan, khomiring hai kha na shindawngroi a numnurupok uh. Khomiring hai kha na miei rurukum ua kieini kha lamjawng nuruthaw uh.
44028003	Paul na remrei pawm `khat vak rawkhawm a miei vak rukum phakhan, rawshawk `khat hi miei na re`em phakhan, vak shok a Paul khut kha vak kher pe joi.
44028004	Khomiring hai kha na ranring kha ama khut ah akhai kha rumuk u phakhan, khatlekhat dieng ruti uh, “Miringpa hi mithat miring ningir rangnih, ama na thampui ah put ah hawng rekhe joiawm, dikna hi na imiring jawt boi keng joi.”
44028005	Ama na ranring kha miei shung ah ruthing a, ama na shiekho kha rutawnglai mak.
44028006	Upum kha hawng pom pe ninawkle pur a thirelen rangnih joi, tia amani na rumining uh. Inia pha shawtbawt rungak uh. Ama dieng ih shok boi kha rumuk u `le, mulung rulek uh, khan ama kha pathien `khat keng ruti uh.
44028007	Makha ram khan tuikawram kholakpa kha na ram tampui runiei. Ama riming kha Publius ruti. Ama na lamjawng nuruthaw ua mirittak a ni `thum nurumieriek uh.
44028008	Hitihin rushok, makhala Publius apa kha raitun le ekshenrai na rumaja. Paul na rushe a Pathien dieng runik pe, khan ukhut rutet pe a damna runiei.
44028009	Mahi ruthaw shole, tuikawram ah awm natna aniei mi kholok na va ua damna rumuk uh.
44028010	Amani na lam tampui a richit nurupek uh. Khan rokong a kurushe u phakhan, kirangai u kholok kha nurupek uh.
44028011	Tha `thum shole pathien aphir hai limbit akawp, Alexandria rokonglien khan kurushe u joi. Makha tuikawram khan phabi irumehek a ruawm inih.
44028012	Syracuse khan kuruchum ua kha mun khan ni `thum kuruawm uh.
44028013	Kha mun ah put ah kavakhiei ua Rhegium kha kavakshok uh. Ni `khat shole, thang tieng ah rithi hawng a jing tieng hin Puteoli kawhawngshok uh.
44028014	Kha mun khan uliennai hai kurumuk ua amani le ni shiri awmna rang nururiei uh. Khatikhan Rome kurushok u joi.
44028015	Kha mun khan uliennai hai kha na kava u kha rujet u `le, Appius rievieithawna le tungna In ‘Thum iti munshe kha lamjawng navakthaw uh. Paul na amani kha rumuk phakhan, Pathien mapak a ngarna runiei.
44028016	Kieini na Rome kurushok u phakhan, rarajakhat lamkai kha na shurkhop hai kha mirung hai lamkai dieng rupek joi. Inia Paul kha tu arungpa ramiring `khat kha le ibibing a awmna rang rujawt pe.
44028017	Ni `thum shole Paul na Jihudi lamkai hai kha rukoi. Amani kha vak ruchun u shole, amani dieng ruti, “Uliennai miring hai, kiei na nimiring hai dieng ninawkle nipilepu hai shena le re`er a chon kha kuruthaw nawkawm, Jerusalem ah nurushur ua Rome miring hai dieng nurupek uh.
44028018	Amani na kiei hi nawmawchawng u phakhan, nurumoshok jawt uh. Ajarla kithitna rang a rutuk shikmieshiei kha ruthaw mi`ing.
44028019	Inia Jihudi hai na moshokna kha le re`er a chawngruriei u phakhan, kiei na Caesar dieng thangkoi boi thaboi `khat a kuruawm. Kuphung hai chung a nawngna kivakchawi tu nimak.
44028020	Hijarhin a inih kiei na nangni le rumuh a chawng kiriei jawtna hi. Ajarla kiei na hitihin a thirakarui le kirikhit hi Israel hai ngakmining rangbak a inih.”
44028021	Amani na ruti uh, “Kieini na Judea ah put ah chawngmawchawi `khatshe nang jar a rumuh u mi`ing. Khan khan ah put ah ajong uliennai hai `khatshe na thanginavakkoi u ninawkle nang jar a chon shie `khatshe riei u mak.
44028022	Inia nang imining kha karangai jawt uh. Ajarla mahi lawpreshen chungchanga mun rikip a re`erpuilam a iriei u kha kejet uh.”
44028023	Amani na nikho `khat ruren ua ama awmna khan mi tampui rushe uh. Jingkar ah put ah nitakshe Pathien rengchangna chungchanga rumeler a riringtak a kungruchang. Khan ama na Jesu chungchanga Moses Dan behangbuk ah le Thiempulien hai behangbuk ah put ah amani kha rumawjawtna rang ruthaw.
44028024	Eshen hai na iruriei hai kha rujawt pe uh, inia eshen hai na takarushawn pe u mak.
44028025	Amani khatlekhat rurawjawt boi u phakhan, Paul na chawng `khat ruriei shole, rushe u joi: “Ratha Riethieng na nipilepu hai dieng diktak a Isaiah thiempulien dieng irurieina inih.
44028026	Hitihin ruti, ‘Hihai miring dieng hin she tana riei roh: “Nangrangai tu nangrangai u rangnih, inia nangni na jet u naw tinih, khan nangen tu nangen u rangnih, inia muh u naw tinih.
44028027	Ajarla mahi miring hai mulung kha momo pe joi. Khan amani nokor u kha na rangai matatmashak u joi. Khan imik u kha mawchawt pe u joi. Khanawkatu amani mik le umuk u rangnih, khan amani nokor u le rangai u rangnih, khan amani mulung le jet u joiatu, kiei dieng vak hiei u rangnih. Khan kiei na madam u rang kanih.’
44028028	“Khajarkhan mahi nangni dieng kinemejet jawt u inih, makhala Pathien na Phungshik hai dieng ama shandamna kha jong tir joi, khan amani na rangai u rangnih!”
44028029	Khahaikha Paul na ruti shole, Jihudi hai kha rushe ua amani kar a chawngrurieshiet u joi.
44028030	Paul na manpekin khan kum `di rupumping a ruawm, khan ama dieng ava kholok kha rumulut.
44028031	Pathien rengchangna chungchang khan chawngrushem, khan Pumi Jesu Christa jar kha alo-atang boipet a lungartak a ruchuk a ruawm joi.
45001001	Paul kiei hi Jesu Christa shok `khat a tirtawn `khat nitna rang, Pathien na athachawng rang khan inurukoi a inuruchaw nih joi.
45001002	Makha athachawng kha Miejiek Riethieng a tona a Pathien na thiempulien hai dieng chawngirurakhamna inih.
45001003	Makha taksha shena dungjuia David chicha shung a rushok Ashapa Jesu Christa chungchanga inih.
45001004	Riethiengna Ratha jar a athi ah put ah Pathien na ranak nieitak a rumothoi phakhan, nupumi u Jesu Christa hi Pathien Shapa inih, tia irumumuk inih.
45001005	Ama jar a le ama riming rang khan kieini na numpokmirit le tirtawn changna kha kimuk u nih joi. Makha phung kholok kar a miring hai kha takamawshawn a mujuina rang a inih.
45001006	Nangniawm phung hai kar a Jesu Christa na inurukoi kha nangnih u joi.
45001007	Miriethieng changna rang, Pathien na numipok Rome ah awm kholok dieng, kiei na kimiejiek inih. Napa u Pathien le nupumi Jesu Christa numpokmirit le lungdamna kha nangni dieng a`awm nih rosho.
45001008	Rapapek a nang kholok chungchanga kapathien kha Jesu Christa jar a kamapak, ajarla nang takashawn u kha manmieshie kholok dieng rophong joi.
45001009	Ashapa athachawng chungchanga karatha le chon kithaw pe Pathien hi, kinikna rikip a nangni kha kinawmawjawchak u inih, iti kukungchangna kha inih.
45001010	Nangni dieng kavatna rang, dawng tieng, Pathien na ijawt a lam nawmawlawngna pe rang hin enchak a nikna kiniei inih.
45001011	Nangni dieng rathalam khutchawi dikhattak a nita`awm kinepek ua nangni kha namaratnathiei rang, nangni kha kunumuk jawt uh.
45001012	Makhala, khatlekhat takashawn jar a kiei hi nangni le lungar nerepeh shomna u rang a inih.
45001013	Uliennai hai, nangni na nangijet boi u rang a hi dit mi`ing, makhala Phungshik shik hai kar a kha ang a, nang kar ua`awm, ara dikhat kamanna rang, nangni dieng vatna rang hin karashak jawnjai, inia vonshe hin inakhar inih.
45001014	Kiei na Greek hai dieng le Greek nih boi hai dieng, khan mishing hai le mimawng hai dire dieng lieishie niei miring kha kanih.
45001015	Khajarkhan, kingamtukshe a, Rome ah awm nangni diengawm athachawng kha kirophong jawt inih.
45001016	Ajarla Christa athachawng rang khan kiei jak mi`ing, ajarla takashawn mi rikip shandamna rang a mahi Pathien ranak kha inih. Mahi athachawng hi rapapek a Jihudi hai rang a inih, khan dawn a Greek hai rang a inih.
45001017	Ajarla mahi athachawng shung hin Pathien dikna kha takashawn ah put ah takashawnshe khan imalangmashak inih. Mahi hitihin a imiejiek hi le ra`ang inih: “Midik miring kha na takashawn jar a aring rang a inih.”
45001018	Pathien lunghangna kha ravan ah put ah Pathienjetna boi le dikna boi kholok dieng malangmashak joi. Amani na adik kha dikna boi kha le ishawm inih.
45001019	Ajarla Pathien jetnathiei kha amani dieng imalar pe nih joi, ajarla amani dieng Pathien na irumalar pe nih joi.
45001020	Ajarla manmieshie kon ah put ah mukthiei boi tharingna hai kha na irukon khutkon hai dieng khan malangsheng a irumumukna inih. Amani kha la kumshawt ranak le Pathien changna kha inih. Khajarkhan amani chung a rangaidam awm mak.
45001021	Ajarla, amani na Pathien kha rujet u joiawm, Pathien ang a lurna rupeh u mak, ninawkle rumapak u mak. Inia mulungmining khan nemna boi ruchang uh, khan amawng mulung hai kha irumijing pe u inih.
45001022	Mishing kanih ti u joiawm, mimawng kha ruchang uh.
45001023	Amani na athithiei boi Pathien lurna kha athithiei miring, va hai, kemiliniei sha hai, khan vawn a rawshawn juleva hai rilim hai kha le rurotho uh.
45001024	Khajarkhan ditrekhe dungjuia pawrche chon thawna rang khan Pathien na amani kha rono chon hai dieng irupek inih. Makha na jar chang a amani pum hai kha amanirilik dieng richit boi a ruthaw uh.
45001025	Amani na Pathien adik kha mielieishiei kha le rurotho uh, khan Akonpanek khan ama khutkon kha chubaibawk a chon ruthaw pe uh. Pathien ama kha kumshawt a mapak chang rosho. Amen.
45001026	Khajarkhan richit awm boi jaknaroi kha thawna rang, Pathien na amani kha rupek joi. Dawn a amani nupang hai kha na balam chon kha balam nih boi chon kha le rurotho uh.
45001027	Khatikhan, apa hai na`awm, nupang hai le balam a she rang a kha mak ua, manilemani chung khan takjatna mothoi nana uh. Amani palepa kha na jaknaroi chon kha ruthaw ua, makha rehena jarkhan, rutukthep chepna kha rumuk uh.
45001028	Amani na Pathien jetna kha iruniei u jawt boitak kha ang a, rutuk boi chon hai thawna rang khan, Pathien na amani kha mulung mawngna dieng khan irupek inih.
45001029	Amani mulung shung khan dikna boi kholok, rejaichon, thatna boi, shak a raphamna, michung a mulung hoina boi, mukmakna shipmer, mithatna, raha mothoina, mimohonna, mulungpok ashie, khan muruk a mimieshietna hai kha ruship pe uh. Amani kha mimieshiet miring hai kha runih uh.
45001030	Amani kha mi anuk a mieshiet, Pathien amumak, chitniei boi, lienrasha, aphing, ashie chon athar moshok, nupa chawng jui boi,
45001031	jetna aniei boi, takashawn rang a rutuk boi, minumpok thiei boi, rangaidam thiei boi, khan roihoi thiei boi miring hai kha runih uh.
45001032	Kha ang athaw miring hai kha athi rang a rutuk inih, iti Pathien dikna dan kha rujet u joiawm, amani na khahaikha iruthaw u ranga kha niboia, kha hai athaw miring hai kha amani na irujawt pe u inih.
45002001	Khajarkhan nang kha rangaidam niei boi `khat nangnih, Aw mi chung a chawngshat miring. Ajarla nang na shik miring dieng chawngnishattak kha na nang kha inaheng inih. Ajarla chawngshat miring nang na makhatak kha nangithaw inih.
45002002	Kha`ang chon athaw miring chung a Pathien na chawngshat phakhan, adik dungjuia chawngshat, iti kha nejet uh.
45002003	Aw miring, khahai chon athaw hai chung a chawngnishattak athawpa, Pathien na chawngshat phakhan, kerekhe rangnih, tia maw nangmining?
45002004	Ninawkle ama ninghoina, doiratna, ashawt a shawdoina rawchawngna hai kha nangida maw nih? Pathien ninghoina kha na mulung lekna tieng lam inakai pe inih, iti kha nangijet boi maw nih?
45002005	Inia nang mulung michimna le nang mulung lekthieina boi dungjuia, Pathien na adik a chawngishat kha irophongna rang a Nikho a Pathien lunghangna kha nangrilik rang a nangirutung inih.
45002006	Pathien na “mi rikip dieng amama chonthaw dungjuia mikir pe rangnih.”
45002007	Doiratna kha le chon atha hai kha ithaw a, lurna, richit, khan athithiei boi kha itawk a awm amani dieng khan kumshawt ringna kha ipek inih.
45002008	Inia ama rangbak a itawk khan adik kha ijui boi a dikna boi kha ijui amani dieng khan Pathien na mulung rahana le lunghangna kha pek rangnih.
45002009	Shawrana le mulungshaw kha ashie chon athaw miring rikip dieng chuh rangnih. Makha rapapek a Jihudi hai rang a inih, khan dawn a Greek hai rang a inih.
45002010	Inia atha thaw miring rikip dieng lurna, richitna, khan lungdamna kha awm rangnih. Makha Jihudi dieng chubak rangnih, khan dawn a Greek miring dieng chuh rangnih.
45002011	Ajarla Pathien dieng enshietenlar iti awm mak.
45002012	Ajarla Dan vai a munu athaw mi kholok na Dan vai a thang rangnih. Khan Dan shung a munu athaw mi kholok na Dan kha na chawngshat pe rangnih.
45002013	Ajarla Dan na iriei rangai hai kha Pathien maikung a dikna miring hai kha achang nimak, inia Dan na iriei athaw miring hai kha Pathien na midik rangnih.
45002014	Ajarla Dan niei boi Phungshik hai kha na balam a Dan na ikhin hai kha thaw uh. Hihai miring hi na, Dan kha niei u joi nawkawm, khahaikha na dan achang inih.
45002015	Hihai miring hi na Dan na ikhin chon kha Pathien na amani mulung shung a imiejiek pe inih, iti kha imumuk u inih. Amani lungthim kha na`awm makha chungchanga kungachang inih. Amanirilik kar khan amani mulungmining hai kha na ipawm ninawkle iheng inih.
45002016	Pathien na Jesu Christa jar a miring hai murukchon hai kha chawngishatna rang a Nikho khan, kiei na kirophong athachawng dungjuia thaw rangnih.
45002017	Enro, nang Jihudi kanih nangti joi, Dan khan a nangingiei nih joi, khan Pathien dieng nangawm jarkhan, lienrashatna kha nangniei joi.
45002018	Khan mulungmining kha nangjet joi, Dan ah put ah narachak jarkhan, athaving nieinak hai kha nangmuchuk joi.
45002019	Khan mikchaw lamkai `khat a le ajing a awm miring hai dieng mieivar `khat a nang nining a rangamna kha nangniei joi.
45002020	Amawng hai mirachah miring kha nangnih, naite hai oja kha nangchang. Nang na jetna le adik awmchan kha Dan jar a nanginiei inih.
45002021	Khajarkhan shik dieng a miruchupa nang, nangrilik dieng ruchuh makche maw? Murushah tha mak, tia mi dieng a chawngshempa, muru maw nangshak?
45002022	“Uire thaw naw roh” atipa, uire maw nangthaw? Rilim chubaibawk kha imitir nang na, mun riethieng nieinak kha ranak a maw nangsho?
45002023	Dan chungchanga lienrashatna aniei nang na, Dan kha nangkhoi a, Pathien kha maimawk maw nangpek?
45002024	Ajarla hitihin miejiek hi a`ang inih: “Phungshik hai kar a Pathien riming mieshiet hi nang jar ua inih.”
45002025	Nang na Dan kha nangrung joiatu, nang vunep kha nemna inih, khan nang na Dan kha nangkhoi a tu, nang vunep kha vunep nih boi achang.
45002026	Khajarkhan vunep boi miring `khat na Dan dikna irangai kha jui joiala, vunep boina kha vunep `khat a te naw nih maw?
45002027	Nang na Dan shung ah chawng kholok kha le vunepna kha nangmuk joi. Nitjoiawm dan kha nangkhoi joiatu, taksha a vunep boi kha na, dan kha rupummashak joiatu, nang chung a chawngshat naw nih maw?
45002028	Ajarla vai tieng a Jihudi achang miring kha tu Jihudi nimak, khan taksha vai tieng a vunep kha tu vunep nimak.
45002029	Inia shung rieirit a Jihudi ama kha Jihudi inih, khan mulung a vunep kha vunep inih. Mahi Ratha jar a inih, dantak a nimak, ama chung a mapakna kha miring ah put ah nimak a Pathien ah put ah ajong inih.
45003001	Khanitala, Jihudi miring `khat na chanthatna kha imaw niei? Ninawkle, vunep nemna kha imaw nih?
45003002	Lam rikip a nemna ieniei. Chungchon a, Pathien chawng hai kha amani dieng khutirurothona inih.
45003003	Khana tukhat na takashawn joi nawkala, imaw rachang nih? Amani takashawn boi kha na Pathien takashawn rang a rutukna kha chon thaw boi machang nih maw?
45003004	Makha nihet mak! Inia Pathien kha adik chang rosho, khan mi rikip kha mielieishiei chang rosho. Hitihin miejiek, “Chawng nangriei phakhan, nangdikthiei. Mi na nang chung a chawngshat phakhan, nangmawtawrthiei.”
45003005	Inia nidikna boi u kha na Pathien dikna kha malangmashak joiala, imaw niti u rang? Lunghangna rotoknapa Pathien hi adik boi maw nih? (Miring `khat a kiei na chawngkiriei inih.)
45003006	Makha nihet mak! Makha nitala, Pathien na manmieshie hi itia maw chawngshat nih?
45003007	Kiemielieishiei thawna hi na Pathien adik changna kha ama lurna dieng mielien shishit joiala, ijar a kiei hi munu miring `khat a inawnawng maw nilai?
45003008	“Atha shokna rang ashie kha thaw u rawi,” ti u rawi maw? Makha mi na kieini dieng a iniei mieshietna le khan kieini na niti uh, tia eshen na inojor u kha a`ang inih. Amani chung a hengna kha adik inih.
45003009	Khanitala imaw nih? Kieini hi amaninek a athadet maw kanih uh? Shuknih a nimak. Ajarla matieng khan kieini na Jihudi hai le Greek miring hai dire hi munu thoi a awm inih, tia kirumieshiet u inih.
45003010	Makha hitihin a imiejiek hi le ra`ang inih: “Tuteawm midik awm mak, `khatshe awm mak.
45003011	Ajet tute awm mak. Pathien atawk tute awm mak.
45003012	Mi kholok na lamrehe joi. Lawpsheng a nemna boi chang u joi. Atha athaw tute awm mak. Tute awm mak, `khatshe awm mak.”
45003013	“Amani rek hai kha rawlawng thankhur kha inih; amani mieliei hai kha le milemna chawng kha riei uh.” “Moro tur kha ner ah awm pe uh.”
45003014	“Amani vai khan pumbotna le mulung akha kha ship pe uh.”
45003015	“Thishen moshok rang khan relen uh.
45003016	Thangna le shawna kha maton ah awm pe uh.
45003017	Lungdamna lam kha amani na jet u mak.”
45003018	“Amani mik hai khan Pathien chitna awm pe u mak.”
45003019	Inia Dan na iriei rikip kha Dan thoi a awm miring hai dieng a iriei inih, iti kha nejet u joi. Ajarla bai rikip kha makha a manmieshie kholok na Pathien maikung a mashangna rang a inih.
45003020	Ajarla Dan hai chon jar a miring kha Pathien na ama maikung a midik naw nih. Ajarla Dan jar a munu kha nijet u inih.
45003021	Khania tun Dan jaw boi a Pathien dikna kha malangmashak joi. Mahi Dan le Thiempulien behangbuk hai na kungachang inih.
45003022	Jesu Christa dieng takashawn jar a Pathien dikna kha kholok dieng le takashawn miring kholok chung a jong joi. Ajarla kairekhena awm mak.
45003023	Ajarla mi kholok na munu thaw a Pathien lurna khan shok ngam mak.
45003024	Christa Jesu dieng a awm khekna jar a Pathien na manboi a ama ninghoina kha le iridikmashak inih.
45003025	Christa thishen khan takashawn jar a Pathien na ama kha ringnikna rawthawina `khat a imiding inih. Makha ama dikna kha numumukna rang a inih. Ajarla ama doiratna khan matienglai a iruthaw u munu hai kha Pathien na irurakan nih joi.
45003026	Makha tun a pha hin ama dikna kha mumukna rang a inih. Makha Jesu dieng a takashawn jar a ama kha midik le mi midikpa nitnathiei rang a inih.
45003027	Khanitala lienrashatna kha khoshekawt a maw awm? Mahi akhar joi. Dan jar a maw nih? Chon jar a maw nih? Nimak, inia takashawn dan jar a inih.
45003028	Khajarkhan Dan na ikhin chon hai kha jaw boi a, miring `khat hi takashawn jar a imidik inih, iti hin a nimuchum u nih joi.
45003029	Ninawkle, Pathien hi Jihudi hai ranga Pathien maw nih? Ama hi Phungshik hai rangawm Pathien anih boi maw nih? Inih, Phungshik hai rangawm inih.
45003030	Ajarla Pathien `khat a`awm inih. Ama na vunep hai kha takashawn jar a, khan vunep boi hai kha`awm ra`angre takashawn jar a midik rangnih.
45003031	Khanitala takashawn jar a Dan hi chon thaw boi nimachang u maw nih? Makha nihet mak! Inia Dan kha kieini na nimenet u inih.
45004001	Khajarkhan napa u Abraham na miring `khat chang a irumuk dungjuia imaw riei u rang?
45004002	Ajarla chon hai kha jar a Abraham kha imidik nitjoiala, lienrashatna rang a mun ieniei, inia Pathien maikung a nimak.
45004003	Ajarla Miejiekna imaw riei? “Abraham na Pathien kha takarushawn a midik `khat a irute nih joi.”
45004004	Chon athaw ama dieng khan nilawh hai kha numpokmirit `khat a te mak, inia lieishie `khat a ite inih.
45004005	Khan tukhat na chon tu ithaw boi, inia pathienjet boi hai imidik Pathien kha tu taka`ishawn, ama kha dikna khan itechen inih.
45004006	Chon le ruirakaimashak boi a Pathien na dikna khan ite miring kha rahvanmuh miring kha inih, tia David na iruti kha le ra`ang inih:
45004007	“Pathien na danishawnboi hai kha irangaidam pe a amani munu hai kha imukhu pe kha rahvanmuh miring hai kha nih uh.
45004008	PUMI na ama chung a munu ite pe boi rang a ama kha rahvanmuh miring kha inih.”
45004009	Mahi rahvanmuh changna hi vunep hai dieng ranga maw nih ninawkle vunep boi hai diengawm ajong maw nih? Kieini na niti uh, makhala ama takashawn jar a Abraham kha midik `khat a irute nih joi.
45004010	Itia irute pe maw nih? Ama na vunruep shole a maw nih, ninawkle vunruep mala khan a maw nih? Vuneplai khan a nimak a vunruep boilai khan a inih.
45004011	Jetna `khat a imuk vunepna kha vunep mala a irumuk takashawn jar a imuk dikna jetnam `khat inih. Makha takashawn miring kholok apa nitnathiei rang a inih. Amani kha vunep boi miring runih u joiawm, amani diengawm dikna kha peknathiei rang a inih.
45004012	Ama kha vunep miring hai ranga apa runimak a napa u Abraham na vunruep mala a ama takashawn kenu hai chung a alawn hai amani rangawm apa inih.
45004013	Ajarla manmieshie koklo nitna rang a Abraham ninawkle ama chicha hai dieng chawngrakham kha Dan jar a runimak a takashawn dikna jar a runih.
45004014	Ajarla Dan ah put ah aring amani kha koklo hai kha nitjoiatu, makha na takashawn kha arok imachang inih, khan chawngrakham kha chon thaw boi imachang inih.
45004015	Dan na Pathien lunghangna kha imoshok inih. Ajarla Dan awmna boi mun khan Dan khoina, iti awm mak.
45004016	Khajarkhan numpokmirit dungjuia nitna rang, chawngrakham kha takashawn jar a ajong inih. Makha chawngrakham kha chicha kholok dieng anihet nitna rang a inih. Makha Dan thoi a awm miring hai ranga nimak a, nokholok apa achang Abraham takashawn ang a aniei miring hai rangawm inih.
45004017	Hitihin a miejiek hi le ra`ang inih, “Phung tampui apa `khat rang khan kinamadan nih joi.” Makha ama na taka`ishawn Pathien maikung a inih. Ama na athi miring kha ringna ipek inih, a`awm boi nieinak hai kha`awm irukoi a irumaw`awm inih.
45004018	Abraham na ngakmining runiei boi phakhan, ngakmining kha le takarushawn. Makha na phung tampui apa irumachang inih. Makha le racha a hitihin ruriei, “Nang chicha hai kha hitihin rawp rangnih.”
45004019	Ama takashawn kha mawdawk boi a ama pum kha athi `khat a rumining (ajarla ama kha kum rajakhat runih joi). Sarah naikawk kha`awm athi `khat a rumining joi.
45004020	Takashawn boi jar a Pathien chawngrakham khan rurawnawk mak. Inia ama takashawn kha na Pathien dieng lurna rupek a ranak iruniei shishit inih.
45004021	Ama chawngrakham khan Pathien na thawna rang, ranakawm ieniei, iti kha Abraham na rujet`het.
45004022	Khajarkhan “ama takashawn jar a Pathien na midik `khat a irute nih joi.”
45004023	Ama kha irutechen, iti ama ranga khan a imiejiek runimak.
45004024	Inia kieini rangawm inih. Nupumi u Jesu athi ah put ah rumothoipa takashawn khan inetechen u inih.
45004025	Ajarla nieshietna u jar a Pathien na ama kha irupek inih. Khan kieini hi nimidikna rang, Pathien na ama kha irumothoi inih.
45005001	Takashawn jar a kieini hi nimidik jarkhan, Pumi Jesu Christa jar a Pathien le lungdamna kha nieniei u joi.
45005002	Ama jar a nidingna u makha numpokmirit khan takashawn jar a lutna numuk u joi. Khan Pathien lurna ngakmining khan lienrashatna nieniei u joi.
45005003	Khan kha ranga kha nimak, shawrana hai khan lienrashatna`awm nieniei uh. Ajarla shawrana kha na doiratna moshok, iti kha nejet uh.
45005004	Doiratna kha na tharingna, khan tharingna kha na ngakmining imoshok inih.
45005005	Ngakmining kha na mulung rakaina nepeh mak. Ajarla kieini dieng a inepek Ratha Riethieng jar a Pathien numpok kha numulung u shung a thong joi.
45005006	Ajarla kieini na adawk a nuruawm u lai khan, pha rutukthep a, Christa na Pathienjetna boi hai ruhut a ruthi.
45005007	Midik `khat ruhut a tukhat athi rang a kha ashokngawt boi chon inih. Miring atha `khat ruhut a tukhat na thitna rang lungar inieithiei inih.
45005008	Inia kieini na munu miring a nuruawmlaitak khan, nuruhut a Christa na ruthi a Pathien na ama numpok kha kieini dieng inumumuk inih.
45005009	Makha khea, tun Christa thishen jar a Pathien na kieini hi nimidik joi. Khajarkhan ama jar a kieini hi Pathien na lunghangna ah put ah nashan rangnih joi.
45005010	Ajarla kieini hi rahapui nurunilai khan, ashapa athi khan kieini hi Pathien le nieriengieimashak joiatu, riengieina thaw shole hin, ashapa aring jar a, kieini hi idawr a inashan rang a maw nih!
45005011	Makhate kha niboia, nupumi u Jesu Christa jar a Pathien dieng ningaina kha nieniei u joi. Ama dieng tun kieini na riengieina kha numuk joi.
45005012	Khajarkhan miring `khat jar a munu kha manmieshie shung a jong lut kha ang a, munu jar a thitna kha jong lut joi. Khatikhan thitna kha mi kholok dieng eshem joi, ajarla mi kholok na munu iruthaw inih.
45005013	Ajarla Danshe khan munu na manmieshie shung a ruawm, inia Dan awm boilai khan, munu kha rute mak.
45005014	Nitjoiawm thitna kha na Adam ah put ah Mosesshe kha, Adam shietna dungjuia, munu ruthaw boi hai chungshe khan, reng ruchang. Adam kha ajong rang a ama meloi `khat inih.
45005015	Khania manboi khutchawi kha tu shietna kha le ra`ang mak. Ajarla miring `khat shietna jar a mi tampui ruthi joiatu, makha khea, Pathien numpokmirit le miring `khat, Jesu Christa, numpokmirit jar a khutchawi kha na mi tampui dieng ruphu a ruawm.
45005016	Khan khutchawi kha miring `khat munu thaw jar a ajong kha ang mak. Ajarla miring `khat shietna ruthaw jar a ajong chawngshatna kha hengna tieng rujir. Inia shietna tampui jar a ajong manboi khutchawi kha midikna a rujir.
45005017	Miring `khat na shietna ruthaw jarkhan, makha miring `khat jar a thitna na reng ruchang joiatu, makha khea, numpokmirit le dikna khutchawi ruphu a amuh kha na, miring `khat, Jesu Christa, jar a ringkho a reng chang rangnih.
45005018	Khajarkhan miring `khat shietna jar a hengna kha mi kholok dieng ajong inih, khan miring `khat dikna chon jar a mi kholok dieng ringkho jong chawi ridikna kha a`awm inih.
45005019	Miring `khat chawngjui boi jar a mi tampui kha munu miring rumachang, kha le ra`ang a, miring `khat chawngjui jar a mi tampui kha midik rangnih.
45005020	Shietna kha pung shishitna rang a Dan kha ajong inih. Inia munu ruphu a awmna khan numpokmirit kha ruphudet a awm.
45005021	Munu kha na thitna a reng ruchangtak kha ang a, nupumi u Jesu Christa jar a, numpokmirit kha na dikna jar a kumshawt ringna khan rengchang rangnih.
45006001	Khajarkhan kieini na imaw nithaw u rang? Numpokmirit kha ruphuna rang, munu chon kha thaw a awm u rawi maw?
45006002	Makha nihet mak! Munu a ruthi kieini hi na itia maw makhan ring a awm minih?
45006003	Ninawkle, Christa Jesu dieng a baptisma niruloi u khan ama thitna a baptisma niruloi u nih joi, iti hi nangijet boi u maw nih?
45006004	Khajarkhan ama thitna baptisma loina khan Christa le inukhumchen u nih joi. Makha, Apa lurna jar a Christa kha irumothoi kha le ra`ang a, ringkho `thar shung a kieini niringna rang a inih.
45006005	Kieini hi ama thitna meloi khan nurushuimashak joiatu, thoiretna meloi khan kieini hi nurushuimashakngir rangnih.
45006006	Nimiringlui changna kha le cross ah inuruthat pe nih joi. Khan munu na ibuk nupum u kha na dawn a chon thawna boi rang le kieini na munu shok achang a nawawmna boi rang a inih, iti kha kieini na nejet joi.
45006007	Ajarla Christa le athi miring ama kha munu ah put ah imoshok nih joi.
45006008	Kieini na Christa kha le nathi joi jarkhan, kieini na ama le naring rangnih, iti kha takanishawn inih.
45006009	Christa na athi ah put ah hawng thoi joi jarkhan, thilai naw nih, iti kha nejet uh. Thitna kha na ama chung a pumi changlai naw nih.
45006010	Ajarla Christa na ruthi kha munu jar a voikhatte ruthi joi, inia ama na aring hi Pathien jarbak a aring inih.
45006011	Hitihin nangniawm munu ah put ah athihet, khan nupumi u Christa Jesu jar a Pathien dieng aring `khat a mining u roh.
45006012	Khajarkhan munu ditrekhe kha jui a athithiei nang pum u shung khan munu kha reng machang u naw roh.
45006013	Munu dieng khan nang pasha u kha dikna boi khutrak hai `khat a peh u naw roh, inia athi miring hai ah put ah aring `khat a Pathien dieng peh u roh. Khan nang pasha u kha Pathien dieng dikna khutrak `khat a peh u roh.
45006014	Ajarla munu na nang chung ua pumi chang naw nih. Ajarla Dan thoi a awm u makche, inia numpokmirit thoi a awm nangnih uh.
45006015	Khanitala imaw? Kieini hi Dan thoi a awm boi, inia numpokmirit thoi a awm ninit jarkhan, munu maw thaw rang? Makha nihet mak!
45006016	Nangni na shok hai `khat a tukhat chawng kha jui a nangrepeh joiatu, chawngnangijui pe ama dieng khan shok nangchang nih joi. Khajarkhan nangni kha thitna napeh munu ninawkle dikna napeh chawngjuina shok kha anithiei nangnih. Mahi jet u makche maw?
45006017	Pathien dieng khan mapak chang rosho. Ajarla matienglai khan munu shok hai kha nangrunih u joiawm, ruchukna `khat nangni dieng nurupek joi. Makha mulungluttak a nangrujui u joi.
45006018	Pathien na munu ah put ah nomoshok u joi jarkhan, dikna shok hai kha nangchang u joi.
45006019	Nang miringchangna u kha dawk jarkhan, miring awmchan a kiriei inih. Danishawnna boi aliendet tieng a anachawi, ronochon le danishawnboi dieng shok hai `khat a nang pasha u kha nangirupek u kha ang a, tun riethiengna tieng a anachawi dikna dieng khan nang pasha u kha shok `khat ang a peh u roh.
45006020	Ajarla munu shok hai nangrunih u phakhan, dikna ah put ah rushok miring kha nangnih uh.
45006021	Khajarkhan nangijak pui u chon hai shung khan ara ih kha maw nangruniei uh? Ajarla khahai ara kha tu thitna inih.
45006022	Inia tuntu, Pathien na munu ah put ah nomoshok a ama shok hai kha nangchang u joi. Riethiengna tieng a ara kha nangniei u joi, khan makha ara kha kumshawt ringna kha inih.
45006023	Ajarla munu thawlawh kha thitna inih, inia Pathien khutchawi kha nupumi u Christa Jesu jar a kumshawt ringna kha inih.
45007001	Ninawkle uliennai hai, miring `khat na iringlailim ama chung a Dan na pumi`ichangna inih, iti hi nangijet boi u maw nih? (Ajarla kiei na mahi dan ajet hai dieng a kiriei inih).
45007002	Ajarla inkopa awm nupang kha ama inkopa kha ringlaishe khan Dan na ikhop inih. Inia ama inkopa kha thi joiatu, inkopa dan ah put ah ama kha imoshok nih joi.
45007003	Khajarkhan inkopa ringlai khan, ama na miring `khat niei joiatu, ama kha uire athaw nupang, tia koi rangnih. Inia inkopa kha thi joiatu, ama na shik `khat niei joiawm, ama kha uire athaw nupang kha changna boi rang, dan ah put ah ningchamna kha niei joi.
45007004	Khajarkhan, kuliennai hai, nangni na shik `khat, nitila, athi hai kar ah put ah hawng thoi ama tah nachangna u rang, Christa pum jar a, nangniawm Dan ah put ah athi miring kha nangnih u joi. Makha Pathien rang ara kha nienieina u rang a inih.
45007005	Ajarla kieini na taksha a nuruawmlai khan, Dan jar a munu ditrekhena hai kha thitna ara moshokna rang, napasha dieng chon iruthaw inih.
45007006	Matieng a nurushur dieng khan nuruthi ua, tuntu kieini hi Dan ah put ah nakhek joi. Makha miejieklui khan niboia Ratha a ringna athar chon kha nawthawna u rang a inih.
45007007	Dawn a imaw kieini na niriei rang? Dan hi munu maw nih? Makha nihet mak! Makha le perawlaw a, Dan jar a runih joi nawkatu, munu kha kiei na rujet naw ning. Ajarla Dan na “Phamrai nangithaw boi rang a inih,” ruti nawkatu, phamrai iti kha rujet naw ning.
45007008	Inia chawngpek jar a munu kha na chanthatna ruloi a, phamrai chat rikip kha kushung a irumoshok inih. Ajarla Dan jaw boi a munu hi athi inih.
45007009	Pha `khat khan Dan boi a kururing, inia chawngpek jong phakhan, munu kha hawng ring a kiei ruthi kanih joi.
45007010	Ringna nurupeh rang a chawngpektak kha na kiei dieng thitna kha nurupek.
45007011	Ajarla chawngpek jar a munu na chanthatna ruloi a kiei hi nurulem, khan makha jar a munu na kiei hi inuruthat inih.
45007012	Khajarkhan Dan hi riethieng inih, khan chawngpek hi riethieng, adik, khan atha kha inih.
45007013	Khajarkhan atha kha kiei rang thitna ruchang maw nih? Makha nihet mak! Inia munu kha munu `khat a malangna rang, atha jar a kiei dieng thitna kha irumoshok inih. Makha chawngpek jar a munu kha aliendet munu changna rang a inih.
45007014	Ajarla Dan hi rathalam inih, iti kha nejet uh. Inia kiei tu balam miring kha kanih. Kiei hi munu dieng khan shok `khat a inurujor inih.
45007015	Ajarla kithaw chon kha alawtna jet mi`ing. Ajarla kithaw jawt chon kha kiei na thaw mi`ing, inia kimitir chontak kha keng kiei na kithaw.
45007016	Inia kiei na kithaw jawt boi chontak kha kawthaw joiatu, Dan kha atha, tia kijawt pui inih.
45007017	Khajarkhan makha athaw kha kiei nilai mi`ing a, kiei dieng a awm munu kha na ithaw inih.
45007018	Ajarla kushung a (makhala taksha a) atha `khatshe awm mak, iti kha kiei na kejet. Ajarla thawjawtna kha kushung a awm, inia atha thaw kha kiei ngam mi`ing.
45007019	Ajarla kithaw jawt atha kha kiei na thaw mi`ing, inia kithaw jawt boi ashie kha kithaw inih.
45007020	Kithaw jawt boi kha kiei na kawthaw joiatu, makha athaw kha kiei nilai mi`ing, inia kushung a awm munu kha na ithaw inih.
45007021	Khajarkhan atha kawthaw jawt phakhan, ashie hi na kushung a chonithaw inih, iti chawngshebe hi kiei na kumuk.
45007022	Ajarla shungmiring dungjuia Pathien Dan khan ningaina kha kieniei.
45007023	Inia kulungthim idit kha le rathaw kapasha shung hin dan shik kumuk. Khan makha na kapasha shung a awm munu dan khan kiei hi shurinonokhop a awm inih.
45007024	Kiei hi idawr a rahvanshie miring maw kanih! Mahi athi rang a pum ah put ah tu na maw kiei hi nakhek nih?
45007025	Nupumi u Jesu Christa jar a Pathien kha kamapak. Khajarkhan kumulungmining hin kiei hi Pathien Dan shok kha kanih jawt, inia kupum a tu munu dan shok kha kanih.
45008001	Khajarkhan munu balam dungjuia nih boi Ratha dungjuia aring hai Christa Jesu dieng a awm miring hai chung khan tuntu hengna awm mak.
45008002	Ajarla Christa Jesu dieng a awm ringna apeh Ratha dan kha na munu le thitna dan ah put ah kiei hi nomoshok joi.
45008003	Munu balam jar a Dan kha rudawk jarkhan, makha na chon thawna ranak kha runiei mak. Khajarkhan Pathien na ashapatak kha munu miring awmchan meloi a munu rang khan ijongtir a, pum shung khan munu kha ijongheng inih.
45008004	Makha dikna irangai Dan kha munu balam dungjuia aring boi, inia Ratha dungjuia aring kieini dieng rupumna rang a inih.
45008005	Ajarla munu balam dungjuia aring hai kha na munu balam nieinak hai chung khan mulungmining atet uh, khan Ratha dungjuia aring hai kha na Ratha nieinak hai chung khan mulungmining atet uh.
45008006	Ajarla taksha chungchanga lungthim kha thitna inih, inia Ratha lungthim kha ringna le lungdamna kha inih.
45008007	Ajarla taksha lungthim hi Pathien le re`er inih, ajarla mahi na Pathien Dan thoi a awm ngam mak, khan niawm nithiei naw nih.
45008008	Khajarkhan munu a ring amani kha na Pathien kha ningminit pe ngam mak.
45008009	Pathien Ratha kha nang shung ua awm phakhan, nangni kha munu a awm boi a Ratha a awm nangnih uh. Tukhat na Christa Ratha kha niei joi nawkatu, ama kha ama tah nimak.
45008010	Christa kha nang shung ua awm joi jarkhan, munu jar a, pum kha athi inih. Inia dikna jar a Ratha kha ringna inih.
45008011	Jesu kha athi hai kar a rumothoipa ratha kha nang shung ua awm joi jarkhan, athi hai kar a Christa rumothoi ama kha na athithiei nang pum u hai kha ringna pek rangnih. Makha nang shung ua awm aratha jar a ithaw inih.
45008012	Khajarkhan uliennai hai, kieini hi lieishieton miring hai kha nanih uh, inia taksha dungjuia ringna rang, taksha a tu nimak.
45008013	Taksha dungjuia nangring u joiatu, nangthi u rangnih. Inia Ratha jar a pum chon hai kha nangthat u joiatu, nangring u rangnih.
45008014	Ajarla Pathien Ratha na lamikai pe mi kholok Pathien shapa hai kha inih.
45008015	Ajarla chit pui rang a shok changna ratha kha ruman u makche, inia naimachangna Ratha kha niruman u nih joi. Makha jar a “Abba, Kapa,” tia ra`ai nanih uh.
45008016	Ratha amatak na naratha u kha le kieini hi Pathien nai hai kha nanih u, tia kungachang inih.
45008017	Kieini hi anai hai kha nanih u joi jarkhan, koklo hai kha nachang u joi. Makha kieiniawm lawp `khat a numulurchenna rang, kieini na ama le shawna nodoishom a tu, Pathien ah put ah koklo hai le Christa le koklo achangshom kha nanih joi.
45008018	Ajarla tun a nawshawna hi kieini dieng a imalar rang a lurna kha le rakamthiei chang naw nih, tia kimining.
45008019	Ajarla khutkon dingrakang ngak kha na Pathien shapa hai imalarna kha ngakrala a awm inih.
45008020	Ajarla khutkon kha ningrahana awnoi a itet inih. Makha ama idit dungjuia nimak a, ngakmining awnoi a atetpa jar a inih.
45008021	Ajarla khutkon kha`awm thangna shokchangna ah put ah moshokning, tia ajeng a lur Pathien nai hai ningchamna tieng khan chawi rangnih.
45008022	Ajarla khutkon kholok na vonshe hin, nupang `khat na nainiei pha a shawrieviei kha ang a, rokoilam a shawna doi a awm, iti kha kieini na nejet uh.
45008023	Amani ranga kha niboia, akhat changna Ratha ara aniei, kieinirilikawm nushung ua rokoi nanih uh. Kieini na shapa machangna, nupum u rekhekna rang a pha kha ngakrala a awm nanih uh.
45008024	Ajarla mahi ngakmining hin a kieini hi inurushan inih, inia mik a muk ngakmining kha tu ngakmining nimak. Ajarla tukhat na imuk kha ngak a awm nih maw?
45008025	Inia kieini na nimuk boi kha ngaknimining joiatu, makha doiratna kha le ningakrala inih.
45008026	Khatikhan Ratha na`awm nawdawkna u khan inashan inih. Ajarla ninik u rang a kha itia ninik u rang a maw nih iti kha kieini na jet u makme. Inia Ratha amatak na ner a riei ngam boi natrokoina kha le kieini ruhut a ininik pe inih.
45008027	Mulung hai atawk Pathien na Ratha lungthim kha imaw nih iti kha ejet. Ajarla miriethieng hai rang khan Ratha na Pathien mulungmining dungjuia nikna iniei inih.
45008028	Inia Pathien numapoh amani rang khan Pathien na kholok atha a chonmawthawshom, iti kha nejet uh. Amani kha Pathien chonmuchuk dungjuia ikoi miring hai kha inih.
45008029	Ajarla ama na matieng a irujet amani kha ashapa meloi a konchenna rang khan iruminitsha`awm inih. Makha uliennai hai tampui kar a ama kha konmasha kha nitnathiei rang a inih.
45008030	Makha khea iruminitsha hai kha irukoi inih. Irukoi amani kha irumidik inih. Irumidik amani kha irumulur inih.
45008031	Hihai dieng hin kieini na imaw niriei u rang? Pathien hi kieini rang a nitjoiala, tu na maw kieini hi nere`erpui nih?
45008032	Ashapatak kha iruhawi boi a, nokholok rang a ama kha irupek kha na nieinak kholok kha nokholok rang khan manboi a nepek boi a maw awm nih?
45008033	Pathien na imadansha amani dieng khan, tu na maw mieshiet nih? Imidik ama kha Pathien inih.
45008034	Aheng ama kha tumaw nih? Ama kha ruthi Christa kha inih. Makha khea athi hai kar a Pathien na irumothoi inih. Ama na Pathien khut chang tieng khan awm a nuruhut ua nikna iniei inih.
45008035	Christa numpok ah put ah tu na maw kieini hi nereshenmashak nih? Shawrana ninawkle mulung rakaina, ninawkle epshawna, ninawkle nekleshak tangna, ninawkle rekengverna, chiroichon, ninawkle chemjam, kha na maw kieini hi neshen nih?
45008036	Hitihin rumiejiek: “Nang rangbak khan kieini hi nishunshawt inuruthat inih. That rang a kengam `khat a kieini hi inurute inih.”
45008037	Nitjoiawm hihai kholok chung hin numnurupoh ama jar a kieini hi ramawtawr hainek khan a liendet nanih uh.
45008038	Ajarla kiei na rangamna kieniei, makhala thitna kha na`awm, ringna kha na`awm, ravantir hai kha na`awm, rampo hai kha na`awm, ranak hai kha na`awm, tun a nieinak le ajong rang a nieinak hai kha na`awm,
45008039	arashang kha na`awm, athuk kha na`awm, khan khutkon ih kha na`awm, nupumi u Christa Jesu dieng a awm Pathien numpok ah put ah kieini hi neshen ngam naw nih.
45009001	Christa maikung a adik kiriei inih. Kiei na mielieishiei kithaw nimak. Ratha Riethieng jar a kulungthim na kiei dieng kungachang inih.
45009002	Makhala, kumulung shung hin mulungshaw lientak kieniei, khan lungnatna kha chatboia awm.
45009003	Ajarla taksha dungjuia kuliennai hai le ki`inshungkhur hai rangbak khan, kiei hi pumbot kachang a Christa le nereshenmashak a la tha rangnih, tia kimining.
45009004	Amani kha Israel miring nih uh. Amani dieng shapa changna, lurna, rawjawtna hai, Dan pekna, Pathien chon, khan chawngrakham hai kha awm.
45009005	Pilepu hai kha amani ah put ah inih. Taksha dungjuia Christa kha amani ah put ah inih, ama kha kholok chung a Pathien inih. Kumshawt a ama chung a mapakna kha awm rosho. Amen.
45009006	Inia Pathien chawng kha chon a she boi kha tu nimak. Ajarla Israel ah put ah jong shok kholok kha adik Israel miring kha nimak.
45009007	Abraham chicha hai niti jarkhan, kholok kha Abraham nai hai nimak. “Inia Isaac jar a nang chicha hai kha koi rangnih.”
45009008	Makhala, taksha nai hai kha Pathien nai hai kha nimak. Inia chawngrakham nai hai kha chicha `khat a ite inih.
45009009	Ajarla chawngrakham chawng kha hi inih: “Mahi pha hin kiei ajong rang kanih, khan Sarah na shapa niei rangnih.”
45009010	Inia hi ranga hi nimak, Rebecca kha`awm napa u Isaac na naimawvawng rangnih.
45009011	Shapa hai kha niei mala, amani na atha-ashie thaw mala, Pathien na ama dieng iruriei inih. Makha Pathien chonmuchuk dungjuia madanna kha netnathiei rang a inih. Mahi chon hai ah put ah nimak a akoipa ah put ah inih.
45009012	Pathien na Rebecca dieng ruti, “Ulienchang kha na naipanglam kha chon thaw pe rangnih.”
45009013	Hitihin a miejiek hi le ra`ang inih, “Jacob kha numkurupok, inia Esau kha kurumukmak.”
45009014	Khanitala imaw niriei u rang? Pathien dieng dikna boi kha a`awm maw nih? Makha nihet nimak!
45009015	Ajarla ama na Moses dieng ieriei, “Roihoina kitetna rang a ama dieng khan roihoina kha katet, khan lainatna kitetna rang a ama dieng khan lainatna kha katet.”
45009016	Khajarkhan adit ninawkle rojo ama tah nimak, inia roihoi Pathien tah inih.
45009017	Ajarla Miejiek na Pharaoh dieng iti, “Nang chung a karanak mumukna rang le rieliei kholok a kiriming hi rophongna rang, kiei na nang kha kinomothoi inih.”
45009018	Khajarkhan ama na idit ama dieng khan roihoina kha atet, khan idit ama dieng khan mulung michimna kha ipek inih.
45009019	Dawn a kiei dieng nangnitithiei uh, “Ijar a ama na mi maran kha itawk maw nilai? Tu na maw ama chonmuchuk kha khar joi?”
45009020	Inia diktak a, Aw miring, Pathien dieng mashang rang, nang tumaw nangnih? Ikon nieinak kha na akonpa dieng khan “Ijar a hitihin a nanginokon maw nih?” tia riei nih.
45009021	Bekonpa kha na chir ah put ah be `khat hi richit a rotokna rang, khan akhat hi richit boi a rotokna rang, ikon chung khan ranak iniei boi maw nih?
45009022	Pathien na ama lunghangna kha mumuk jawt a ama ranak kha mejet jawt joiawm, lunghangna amuh rang a le thangna rang a irutukmashak amani hai kha ajeng a idoi pui,
45009023	lurna rang a masha a irukon roihoina itetna be hai chung a ama lurna rawchawngna kha mumukna rang,
45009024	Jihudi hai ranga kar ah put ah inokoi nimak a, Phungshik hai kar ah put a`awm inokoi anih boi maw nih?
45009025	Hosea behangbuk khanawm iti: “Kimiring runih boi hai dieng khan kimiring, tia koi rang kanih. Numkipok boi amani dieng khan kunumpok, tia koi rang kanih.”
45009026	“Khan ‘Nangni kimiring nih u makche,’ irutina muntak khan nangni hi aring Pathien shapa hai kha nangnih uh, ti rangnih.”
45009027	Isaiah na`awm Israel chungchanga rura`ai: “Israel nai hai jat kha tuikhanglien nge ang a rawp joiawm, arangah hai ranga kha shan rangnih.
45009028	Ajarla ama na chon kha mawtawr rangnih, khan dikna khan umushum rangnih. Ajarla PUMI na chon hai kha rieliei chung hin mushum rangnih.”
45009029	Isaiah na matieng a iruriei kha a`ang inih: “Ramiring hai PUMI kha na chicha dikhattak a`awm ruhawi joi nawkatu, Sodom kha nuruang u rangnih, khan Gomorrah kha nuruma`ang u rangnih.”
45009030	Khanitala kieini na imaw niti u rang? Dikna rurojo boi Phungshik hai na dikna, nititu, takashawn jar a dikna kha tum u joi.
45009031	Inia dikna dan rojo miring Israel hai kha na dikna dan kha muh u maklai.
45009032	Ijar a maw nih? Ajarla takashawn le makha rutawk u mak, inia Dan chon le irutawk u inih. Makha keruthuina lung chung khan keruruthui uh.
45009033	Hitihin a miejiek hi le ra`ang inih: “Enro, Zion khan keruthuina lung le bakna lungbiei `khat kirutet inih, ama dieng takashawn miring rikip na shirna niei naw nih.”
45010001	Uliennai hai, kumulung na idit le Pathien dieng kinik tu, Israel miring hai na shanna imuk rang a hi inih.
45010002	Amani na Pathien rang ditrangai kha niei uh, inia makha lungvar dungjuia nimak, iti hi kiei na kungkachang.
45010003	Ajarla Pathien dikna kha rujet u mak. Amanirilik dikna kha mothoi jawt u phakhan, Pathien dikna khan rulut u mak.
45010004	Ajarla takashawn mi rikip dieng Christa hi richichawi changna rang, Dan mawtawrna kha inih.
45010005	Ajarla Dan ah put ah jong dikna chungchanga Moses na rumiejiek, “Khahai athaw miring kha na amani jar a ring rangnih.”
45010006	Inia dikna chung a ingiei takashawn kha na hitihin ieriei, “ ‘Ravan a tu maw hawng nih?’ tia nang mulung a ti naw roh” (makha na Christa kha ijong muchum inih)
45010007	ninawkle, “ ‘Tu maw chimniei ah chum nih?’ tia riei naw roh” (makha na Christa kha athi hai kar a ihawng chawi inih).
45010008	Inia Miejiek na imaw ti? “Chawng kha nangni le ranai a awm, nang ner u le nang mulung shung ua awm joi” (makha kirophong u takashawn chawng kha inih):
45010009	nang ner kha le Pumi Jesu kha nang rophong a Pathien na ama kha athi hai kar a mothoi, iti kha nang mulung a takanangshawn a tu, Pathien na nang kha nashan rangnih.
45010010	Ajarla dikna shokna rang, tukhat na mulung le taka`ishawn inih, khan shandamna mukna rang, tukhat na ner le irophong inih.
45010011	Ajarla Miejiek na ieriei, “Ama dieng takashawn ama kha na shirna niei naw nih.”
45010012	Ajarla Jihudi le Greek kairekhena awm mak, ajarla vanoi chung a Pumi amatak kha akoi miring kholok dieng rawchawng inih.
45010013	Ajarla “tunita`awm PUMI riming aban ama kha shan rangnih.”
45010014	Khania taka`ishawn boi u ama dieng khan itia maw koi u nih? Ama chungchanga ijet boi u lai ama dieng khan itia maw takashawn u nih? Chawngshempa jaw boi a itia maw rangai u nih?
45010015	Amani kha tir u joi nawkatu, itia maw chawngshem u nih? Hitihin a irumiejiek hi le ra`ang inih: “Lungdamna athachawng rophong a atha nieinak athachawng jong chawi amani kepha hai kha idawr a metha maw nih!”
45010016	Inia amani arawplam na athachawng kha rujui u mak. Ajarla mahi Isaiah na iruti kha le ra`ang inih: “Pumi, tu na maw nawchawngriei u kha takashawn nih?”
45010017	Rangai jar a takashawn kha ajong inih, khan Pathien chawng jar a rangai kha ajong inih.
45010018	Inia kiei na kiti, irurangai boi u maw nih? Diktak a amani na rurangai uh: “Amani hesho kha rieliei pumpui a shok joi, khan amani chawng hai kha miring awmna kawdawngshe kha shok joi.”
45010019	Inia kiei na kiti, Israel miring hai na irujet boi u maw nih? Akhat changna a Moses na iti, “Phung `khat anih boi hai kha ningmaw`awna rang kanih. Phung amawng rotokna a nangni dieng lunghangna kha mothoi rang kanih.”
45010020	Isaiah na ngartak a ieriei, “Inurutawk boi amani kha na kiei hi numuk joi. Nurutawk boi amani dieng khan kinining a kurular joi.”
45010021	Inia Israel hai dieng ama na ieriei, “Chawngrangai boi le perawlaw miring hai dieng nishunshawt kukhut le kuruban.”
45011001	Khajarkhan kiei na kiti, Pathien na imiring hai kha irupai maw nih? Makha nihet mak! Kiei hiawm Israel miring `khat, Abraham chicha, Benjamin phung ah put ah jong shok kanih.
45011002	Pathien na irujetmasha imiring hai kha rupai mak. Ninawkle, Elijah chungchanga Miejiek na iruriei kha jet u makche maw? Itia maw Israel hai chung a Pathien dieng thangrukoi? Ama na ruti,
45011003	“PUMI, nang thiempulien hai kha ruthatsho u joi. Khan nang lungkheng hai kha rukhoisho u joi. Kiei ranga kerekhe joi, khan amani na kiei hi that rang natawk uh.”
45011004	Inia Pathien chawng mashang kha na ama dieng imaw ruti? “Baal dieng rukhuk shun boilai miring bawp shawmshiri kiei rang kawhawi joi.”
45011005	Khatikhan tun a pha shung hin tukchawr miring hai madanna kha numpokmirit dungjuia inih.
45011006	Numpokmirit jar a nitjoiatu, chon hai jar a nilai mak. Khanawkatu numpokmirit kha numpokmirit nih naw nih. Inia chon hai jar a nitjoiatu, numpokmirit nilai mak. Khanawkatu chon kha chon nilai mak.
45011007	Dawn a imaw awm? Israel na itawk kha muh maklai, inia madansha na man joi, inia aliemlim kha tu Pathien na mulung michimmashaklai.
45011008	Hitihin a imiejiek hi le ra`ang inih: “Pathien na amani dieng amiei ratha, mukna boi rang a mik hai le rangaina boi rang a nokor hai kha, vonshe hin, pek joi.”
45011009	David na ieriei, “Amani tebol kha chang le lim, keruthuina rang le lieichawina kha chang pe u rosho.
45011010	Muknathiei boi rang, amani mik hai kha Pathien na mijing pe rosho, khan amani kawng kha mubut pe jawnjai rosho.”
45011011	Khan kiei na kiti, purna u rang a ke`iruthui u maw nih? Makha nihet mak! Inia amani na shietna ruthaw u jarkhan, shandamna kha Phungshik hai dieng jong joi. Makha ningmaw`awna rang a ithaw inih.
45011012	Amani shietna kha manmieshie rang a rawchawngna nih joi a, amani rehena kha Phungshik hai rang a rawchawngna nitjoiala, amani rupumna kha idawr maw Phungshik hai rang rawp nih?
45011013	Kiei na Phungshik hai nangni dieng kiriei inih, makhala kiei hi Phungshik hai tirtawn kinit jarkhan, kochonthaw hi kiei na kamapak.
45011014	Ki`inshung miring hai kha ningkawmaw`aw a amani kar a shentaka`awm kashan a la, tia kochonmun hi kilawm inih.
45011015	Ajarla Jihudi hai na athachawng ipai kha na manmieshie hi Pathien le iriengieimashak nitjoiala, amani na awpawm u joiala imaw nih nih? Makha athi ah put ah ringna kha nih naw nih maw?
45011016	Akhat changna ara kha riethieng joiatu, jam kholok kha`awm riethieng rangnih. Khan rujung kha riethieng joiatu, abak hai kha`awm riethieng rangnih.
45011017	Bak eshen hai kha tuk a ram ah mawng olive thingkung nang kha olive thingkung khan kalam nawthaw a, amani le olive thingkung rujung le thai kha atumshom nangnih joiatu,
45011018	ituk bak hai dieng khan lienrasha naw roh. Inia liennangrasha joiatu, rujung kha doi makche inia rujung kha na idoi inih, iti kha mining roh.
45011019	“Kiei hi kalam nawthawnathiei rang, bak hai kha ituk inih,” tia dawn a nangti rangnih.
45011020	Makha adik inih. Takashawn boi u jarkhan, amani kha ikhiek inih, inia takashawn jar a ading nangnih. Nang nining a mapak nana naw roh, inia chitna niei roh.
45011021	Ajarla Pathien na balam bak hai kha ruhawi boi jarkhan, nangawm nawhawi naw nih.
