45011022	Khajarkhan Pathien ninghoina le khawkna kha enro. Apur amani dieng khan ama hi akhawk inih. Inia ama ninghoina khan nangawm joiatu, nang dieng ama ninghoina kha nepek rangnih. Khanawkatu nangawm nutuk rangnih.
45011023	Khan Jihudi hai na amani takashawn boi khan awm joi nawkatu, amani kha kalam thaw rangnih. Ajarla kalam thawnaret rang, Pathien na ranak iniei.
45011024	Balam a ram ah awm olive thingkung ah put ah nutuk ua, balam le re`er olive atha thingkung khan kalam nawthaw u joiatu, idawr maw balam bak hai kha na amanitak kha olive thingkung khan kalam nawthaw inih?
45011025	Ajarla uliennai hai, mahi murukchawng hi nangijet boi u rang a hi kiei dit mi`ing. Khanawkatu nang nining a ashing nangrasha u rangnih. Chonrekhek khala: Phungshik hai rupumna kha hawng shok masheng, Israel miring hai mulung eshenlawk kha michimmashak joi.
45011026	Khatikhan Israel kholok kha Pathien na shan rangnih. Makha Miejiek ah iriei kha le ra`ang inih: “Zion ah put ah ashanpa kha va rangnih, khan Jacob ah put ah Pathienjetna boi kha miehiei pe rangnih.
45011027	Amani munu hai kha kiei na koloi pe phakhan, makha amani le kawrawjawtna kha nih rangnih.”
45011028	Athachawng chungchang khan tu, nangni rangbak khan, rahapui miring nih uh. Inia madanna chungchang khan tu, pilepu hai jar a, amani kha Pathien na numipok chang rangnih.
45011029	Ajarla Pathien khutchawi hai le koina kha Pathien na loitheplai naw nih.
45011030	Pha `khat khan Pathien dieng chawngjui boi kha nangruchang uh. Khania tuntu, amani chawngjui boi jar a, roihoina kha nangman u joi.
45011031	Kha le ra`ang a, tun a chawngjui boi hai hiawm, nangni dieng ninghoina kha inumumuk jar a, amani na`awm ninghoina kha man rangnih.
45011032	Mi kholok chung a roihoina awmnathiei rang, Pathien na mi kholok kha chawngjuina boi khan ithongsho inih.
45011033	Pathien varna le shingna rawchawngna kha idawr a thuk maw nih? Tute na ama chawngshatna kha tawk ngam mak, tute na ama lam hai kha thir ngam mak.
45011034	“Ajarla tu na maw PUMI mulungmining kha jet joi? Ninawkle, tu maw ama chawngrachah kha chang joi?”
45011035	“Ninawkle, tu na maw Pathien dieng rupekbak a Pathien na ama dieng mikir nih?”
45011036	Ajarla nieinak kholok hi ama ah put ah, ama jar a, khan ama dieng a`awm inih. Kumshawt a ama dieng mapak kha chang rosho. Amen.
45012001	Khajarkhan uliennai hai, Pathien roihoina jar a, nang pum u hai kha aring, riethieng, khan Pathien dieng ningnitroi rawthawina `khat a pekna rang, kinawdawi u inih. Makha orohoi Pathien chon kha inih.
45012002	Khan mahi rong hi le rokonchen u naw roh, inia nang mulungmining nimathar u khan chenkon kha chang u roh. Makha atha, ningnitroi, khan rupumping Pathien mulungmining kha imaw nih, iti kha ennangretena u rang a inih.
45012003	Ajarla kiei dieng inepek numpokmirit jar a, nang kar ua awm mi rikip dieng kiriei inih. Imining rang a shok kha niboia, tute na nining a rashang a mining naw rosho. Inia Pathien na mi rikip dieng ipek takashawn le racha dungjuia rachalim mulungmining khan mining rosho.
45012004	Ajarla pum `khat shung a pasha tampui niniei u hi ang a, pasha kholok na chonmun ra`angre kha niei mak.
45012005	Hitihin kieini hi tampui nanih joiawm, Christa jar a pum `khat chang a, kieini hi khatlekhat rang a pasha hai kha nanih uh.
45012006	Kieini dieng inepek numpokmirit dungjuia khutchawi shikshik nieniei uh: rophongchawng kha nitjoiatu, natakashawn u le rachathep khan rophong u rawi.
45012007	Chon thawna kha nitjoiatu, chon nithawna u khan rotokna u rawi. Miruchuh miring ama kha na imiruchukna khan rotokna rosho.
45012008	Lungarna chawng arieipa kha na chawngriei a, apeh miring kha na mulung lien a apeh a, lamkai ama kha na mulungluttak a, roihoi mulung aniei kha na ningailam a khutchawi kha rotokna rosho.
45012009	Numpok kha thanunchan jaw boi chang rosho. Ashie kha mitir u roh. Atha kha mukuirep u roh.
45012010	Khatlekhat numropokna kha uliennai numpok kha chang rosho. Khatlekhat dieng a richitna kha ulien machang roh.
45012011	Rathashie boi a ningawroitak a chon thaw u roh. Pumi chon nangithawna khan mulunglutna niei u roh.
45012012	Ngakmining shung khan ningai u roh. Shawrana khan adoirat chang u roh. Nikna khan mulung repeh u roh.
45012013	Miriethieng hai rangaina khan nanginiei u kha reshem pui u roh. Milak hai jinchon kha thaw u roh.
45012014	Epshawna napeh amani rang rahvan peh u roh. Amani kha rahvan peh u roh, pumboh u naw roh.
45012015	Ningai miring hai kha ningai pui u roh, achap miring hai kha chap pui u roh.
45012016	Khatlekhat le riengieishom a ring u roh. Nang nining a arashang a mining u naw roh. Kha ruhut a rede miring hai kha rawtawp pui u roh. Nang mulungminingrilik u chung khan kashing, tia loi u naw roh.
45012017	Ashie jar a ashie kha mikir u naw roh. Mi kholok mik`en a atha thaw rang khan mulung niei u roh.
45012018	Nithawngamtuk khan mi kholok le lungdam a ring u roh.
45012019	Kunumpok hai, phuhen loi u naw roh. Kha ruhut a, Pathien lunghangna rang khan mun peh u roh. Ajarla hitihin miejiek, “Phuhen loina chon kha katah inih, kiei na ruhut thung rang kanih,” tia Pumi na iti.
45012020	Khajarkhan, “Narahapui miring kha vawncham pe joiatu, nekleshak kha peh roh. Tuira pe joiatu, nek rang tui kha peh roh. Ajarla khatikhan a nangithaw kha na ama lu ah rawhawring hai kha nangirietien pe chang rangnih.”
45012021	Ashie kha na nadek naw rosho, inia ashie kha atha kha le dek roh.
45013001	Mi rikip na chamniei rashang hai dieng lut rosho, ajarla Pathien ah put ah niboia cham awm mak. A`awm chamniei hai kha Pathien na imadan inih.
45013002	Khajarkhan cham rodoi pui ama kha na Pathien chawngmocho kha irodoi pui inih. Irodoi pui miring hai kha na amanirilik chung a chawngshatna kha muk u rangnih.
45013003	Ajarla chamniei miring hai na atha athaw hai dieng khan chitna peh mak, inia ashie thaw hai dieng chitna ipek inih. Chamniei dieng khan chih boi a maw nangawm jawt? Atha kha thaw roh, chamniei ah put ah mapakna kha nangmuk rangnih.
45013004	Ajarla ama kha nang dieng a atha thaw rang a Pathien shok kha inih. Ashie kha nangthaw joiatu, chih roh, ajarla chemjam kha nemna boi a irak nimak. Ajarla ama kha ashie thaw hai dieng a lunghangna rang a phuhen aloi Pathien shok `khat inih.
45013005	Khajarkhan, lunghangna jarbak a niboia lungthim jarbak khan ama dieng lut roh.
45013006	Mahi jarhin khaichana hai kha`awm peh u roh. Ajarla amani hi mahi rangbak hin a chatboia pha apeh Pathien shok hai kha inih.
45013007	Ramshan nih le ramshan, khaichana nih le khaichana, chitna nih le chitna, khan richit nih le richit, tumphawm shok kholok kha amani dieng peh u roh.
45013008	Khatlekhat dieng a numpok ranga kha niboia, tute dieng lieishie ton u naw roh. Ajarla shik `khat dieng a numapoh ama kha na Dan kha irupummashak inih.
45013009	Ajarla “Uire nangithaw boi rang a inih,” “Mi nangithat boi rang a inih,” “Nangimuruk boi rang a inih,” “Adik boi a kungachang boi rang a nangnih,” “Ditrekhe chon nangithaw boi rang a inih,” tia Dan na ieriei. Khan chawngpek shik hai kha nangniei joiatu, kholok kha hitihin a imawtawi inih, makhala “Nang ringchangpui kha nang pumtak kha ang a numnangipok rang a inih.”
45013010	Numpok na ringchangpui kha ashie a thaw mak. Khajarkhan numpok na Dan kha irupummashak inih.
45013011	Hi le roroia, tun a pha hi aja ah put ah inshangloina pha keng joi, iti kha jet u roh. Ajarla nashandamna u hi takanurushawn u lai a phanek khan anai a nawhawngdep joi.
45013012	Janpha kha hekdeng joi, nikho kha hawng nai joi. Khajarkhan ajing chonmun hai kha pai u taia mieivar mieriem kha ko u rang rawi.
45013013	Nishun var a lawn kha ang a, lawp a shakshah rat, jukhawp, rejaikawk, taksha pawrchetna, rosho rakhana le manarshie chon khan nih boi a, riringtak a lawn u rawi.
45013014	Inia Pumi Jesu Christa kha pon ang a rieshiei u tana taksha kha na ditrekhe kha rupummashakna rang, mun peh u naw roh.
45014001	Takashawn a adawk ama kha pawm u roh. Mining ra`angna boi chung khan chawngrieshietna niei u naw roh.
45014002	Nieinak kholok hi shakthiei inih, tia tukhat na taka`awshawn, inia adawk ama kha na anshawbo hai ranga kha ishak inih.
45014003	Aneh-ashah ama kha na aneh-ashah boi ama kha mieshiet naw rosho. Khan aneh-ashah boi ama kha na aneh-ashah ama kha chawngshat pe naw rosho, ajarla Pathien na ama kha ipawm nih joi.
45014004	Shik miring `khat shok chung a chawngashat nang tumaw nangnih? Upumpatak maikung khan ading ninawkle apur inih. Inia ama kha imiding rangnih, ajarla Pathien na ama kha imiding ngam inih.
45014005	Shik `khat nikhonek a nikho `khat hi runieidet tia mi `khat na mining, shik `khat miring na ningthingkip hi ra`angre, tia mining. Mi rikip na ama mulungminingtak kha akalang shok a jet rosho.
45014006	Makha nikho arung ama kha na Pumi rang a irung inih. Makha nikho arung boi ama kha na, Pumi rang a irung boi inih. Aneh-ashah ama kha na Pumi rang a inek-ishak inih, ajarla Pathien dieng mapakna ieniei. Khan aneh-ashah boi ama kha na, Pumi rang a ishak boi inih, khan Pathien dieng khan mapakna ieniei.
45014007	Ajarla tute na amarilik rang khan ring mak, khan tute na amarilik rang khan thi mak.
45014008	Ajarla naring u joiatu, Pumi rang a aring nanih uh, nathi u joiatu, Pumi rang a athi nanih uh. Khajarkhan nithit niring u joiawm, kieini hi Pumi tah kha nanih uh.
45014009	Ajarla mahi rangbak hin a Christa na ruthi a ruthoi, khan ruringret inih. Makha athi le aring dire Pumi changna rang a inih.
45014010	Khania ijar a nang uliennai chung a chawngnishat maw nih? Ninawkle, ijar a nang uliennai kha nangida maw nih? Ajarla nokholok na Christa chawngshatna mun khan adingviek rang nanih uh.
45014011	Hitihin rumiejiek, “Kiei aringhet kha kanih, rukhuk rikip na kiei dieng bu rangnih, khan mieliei rikip na Pathien dieng rophong rangnih, tia PUMI na ieriei.”
45014012	Khajarkhan mi rikip na amama jar a mushungna kha Pathien dieng pek rangnih.
45014013	Khajarkhan kieini khatlekhat chung a dawnshe a chawngrashat nana u lai naw rawi. Makha ruhut a mahi chung a mulung miding u rawi: uliennai `khat keruthuina rang, ninawkle mupurna rang, thaw u naw roh.
45014014	Pumi Jesu jar a kejet, khan karangam pui, makhala nieinak `khatsheawm nining a pawrche awm mak, inia ih kha nita`awm pawrche, tia imining ama dieng khan a makha pawrche inih.
45014015	Inia nang nekleshak jarkhan, nang uliennai `khat kha ningshie joiatu, numpok shung khan a ring nilai makche. Christa na ama rang a ruthi pe miring kha nang nekleshak kha le mathang naw roh.
45014016	Khajarkhan nang na atha, tia nangiloi kha ashie `khat a riei naw rosho.
45014017	Ajarla Pathien rengchangna kha ninek le nishak kha nimak, inia Ratha Riethieng jar a dikna, lungdamna, khan ningaina kha inih.
45014018	Ajarla khatikhan a Christa chon athaw ama kha na Pathien kha ningiminit pe inih, khan miring hai na imenet inih.
45014019	Khajarkhan lungdamna moshok le khatlekhat imothoi nieinak hai kha kieini na rojo u rawi.
45014020	Pathien chon kha nekleshak rangbak khan mathang naw roh. Nieinak kholok diktak a riethieng inih, inia ishak kha na mi mupur joiatu, makha ashie inih.
45014021	Nang uliennai `khat keruthuimashak me ninawkle juneh ninawkle ih kha nita`awm, nishak boi kha atha inih. Makha na ama mulung shit pethiei, ninawkle keruthuimashakthiei, ninawkle adawk machangthiei.
45014022	Takashawn kha nangniei maw? Makha Pathien le nang kar a tet roh. Nining a imenet chung a reheng nana boi ama kha rahvanmuh miring kha inih.
45014023	Khania rakhana aniei ama kha na shak joiatu, ama kha iheng inih. Ajarla takashawn boi a ishak inih. Ih nita`awm, takashawn ah put ah anih boi kha tu munu inih.
45015001	Arat hai kieini na arat boi hai dawkna kha niruput pui u rang a shok. Ninining u ningnitna kha thaw u naw rawi.
45015002	Ringchangpui atha shokna rang, kieini na ama ningnitna kha nithaw perim u rang a shok. Makha na ama kha mothoi rangnih.
45015003	Ajarla Christashe na`awm amarilik rang ningnitna kha ruthaw mak, inia hitihin a miejiek hi le ra`ang inih: “Nangni jakna apeh jakna hai kha kiei dieng rucho joi.”
45015004	Ajarla ih nita`awm matienglai a irumiejiek hai kha kieini na nejetna u rang a irumiejiek inih. Makha Miejiek hai doiratna le mawshawkna jar a kieini na ngakmining kha nienieina u rang a inih.
45015005	Doiratna le mawshawkna napeh Pathien na, Christa Jesu dieng a awm kha le ra`ang a, khatlekhat dieng mulung `khat a awmna rang, nepeh u rosho.
45015006	Makha mulung `khat hesho `khat a nupumi u Jesu Christa Pathien le apa kha mulurna rang a inih.
45015007	Khajarkhan Pathien mulurna rang, Christa na`awm kieini hi inuruloi u kha ang a, khatlekhat rawpawm nana u roh.
45015008	Khan kiei na kiriei hi inih, makhala Pathien kha adik changna rang, Jesu Christa na vunep miring hai rang shok chang joi. Makha napa hai dieng a Pathien na chawngirurakham hai kha menetna rang a inih.
45015009	Makha ama roihoina rang le Phungshik hai na Pathien kha mulurna rang a inih. Hitihin miejiek hi le ra`ang inih: “Mahi jar hin Phungshik hai kar a nang kha rieirophong rang kanih, khan nang riming khan kiei na lah thaw rang kanih.”
45015010	Takthar a iti, “Aw Phungshik hai, ama miring hai kha le ningai u roh,”
45015011	Khan takthar a, “Phungshik kholok na PUMI kha mapak u roh. Mi kholok na ama kha mapak u roh.”
45015012	Takthar a Isaiah na iti, “Jesse rujung kha thoi rangnih, ama kha Phungshik hai chung a reng achang rang hawngthoi rangnih. Phungshik hai na ama chung a ngakmining kha niei rangnih.”
45015013	Khajarkhan takanishawn u le roroia, ngakmining apeh Pathien na ningaina le lungdamna kholok le nimiship u rosho. Makha Ratha Riethieng ranak jar a ngakmining a ruphu nangchangna u rang a inih.
45015014	Uliennai hai, nangni atha kha le nangship u joi. Nangni na khatlekhat dieng rachakna nangpekna ngam u rang, shingna kholok le nimiship u joi, iti hin rangamna kieniei.
45015015	Nitjoiawm, uliennai hai, chawng dikhat chungchanga nangni dieng mejetnaret rang, lungardet a kiemiejiek joi. Makha Pathien na kiei dieng a inepek numpokmirit jar a inih.
45015016	Makha kiei na Jesu Christa shepding `khat chang a Pathien athachawng kha thiempu ang a Phungshik hai dieng shemna rang a inih. Khan Phungshik hai kha Ratha Riethieng na iriethieng a Pathien maikung a loithiei rawthawina `khat changna rang a inih.
45015017	Khajarkhan kiei na Pathien dieng a kochon thawna shung khan Christa Jesu jar a lienrashatna rang a jar kha kieniei.
45015018	Ajarla chawng le chon a, Phungshik hai kha chawngmujuina rang, Christa na kajar a irurupummashak boi chon hai kha le kiei na iawm riei ngam naw ning.
45015019	Pathien Ratha ranak jar a ranakniei jetna hai le rekhekchon hai kha le hihai hi rushok inih. Hijarhin kiei na Jerusalem ah put ah Illyricum kha hieijiek a Christa athachawng kha rupumping a kururophong joi.
45015020	Khan Christa riming ibanna boi mun khan athachawng kha rophongna rang, kulungkhin kamachang joi, khanawkatu miring shik `khat keshun phunna khan kirashak chang rangnih.
45015021	Inia hitihin a imiejiek hi le ra`ang inih: “Ama chungchanga irurophongna boilai amani na muk rangnih, rangai boilai amani na jet u rangnih.”
45015022	Hijarhin nangni dieng vatna rang, kieiawm inakhar jawnjai inih.
45015023	Inia tun hihai ram shung hin kiei na mun `khatshe kiniei boi a nangni dieng vatna rang, kum shawttak ngakrala a kuruawm nitjarkhan,
45015024	Spain a kashe phakhan, nangni dieng va rang kanih. Ajarla kokhomijinna lam khan nangni kha mukna rang, ngakkimining. Rapapek a nangni le rawlawpna kha hoikiethieibawt shole, kokhomijinna khan nangni na kiei hi nangnashan u rangnih.
45015025	Inia tuntu, kiei miriethieng hai chon thaw rang Jerusalem tieng kashe joi.
45015026	Ajarla Jerusalem ah awm miriethieng hai kar a shara hai rang a roshong shier dikhat kha na Macedonia le Achaia ah awm hai kha ningruminit pe uh.
45015027	Diktak a amani kha ningiruminit pe inih, khan lieishieton miring kha runih uh. Ajarla Phungshik hai na Jihudi hai rathalam nieinak kha itum puishom kha runih u joiatu, amani na`awm taksha nieinak kha le amani chon kha ithaw pengir rang a inih.
45015028	Khajarkhan kiei na mahi kawthawsho a mahi ara hi amani dieng jetkanamsho phakhan, Spain ah keshena khan navakpa u rang kanih.
45015029	Kiei na nangni dieng kavat phakhan, Christa athachawng rahvan shipna kha le kavaklut rangnih, iti kha kiei na kejet.
45015030	Khania uliennai hai, Pumi Jesu Christa jar a le Ratha numpok jar a kinawdawi u inih: kiei rang Pathien dieng enchak a nikna nieniei pui u roh.
45015031	Makha Judea ah awm takashawn boi hai ah put ah kerekhena rang le Jerusalem ah awm miriethieng hai dieng kochonmun hi loithiei changna rang a inih.
45015032	Khan Pathien mulungmining jar a nangni dieng ningailam a kavatna rang le nangni le shawmuchumna kumukna rang a inih.
45015033	Lungdamna apeh Pathien na nang kholok le awm rosho. Amen.
45016001	Kanaipangnu u Phoebe kha nangni rang khan jawtna kepek. Ama hi Cenchrea ah awm biekrup shepding `khat inih.
45016002	Miriethieng hai rang a rutuk awmchan a Pumi riming a ama kha rupawm u roh. Inarangaina u chonmun rikip a ama kha rashap pui u roh. Ajarla ama hi mi tampui rang a le kiei rangawm narashappui `khat a awm inih.
45016003	Priscilla le Aquila kha chubai peh u roh. Christa Jesu chonmun a kochonthaw pui u miring inih.
45016004	Kiringkho rang a iring hai kha irudaw u inih. Kiei ranga na amani kha kimapak nimak a, Phungshik biekrup hai na`awm imapak u inih.
45016005	Amani in ah awm biekrup diengawm chubai peh u roh. Kunumpok Epaenetus kha chubai peh u roh. Ama kha Christa rang a Achaia ah akhat changna ara kha inih.
45016006	Mariam kha chubai peh u roh. Kieini rang a chon ranak ruthaw `khat inih.
45016007	Andronicus le Junia kha chubai peh u roh. Amani kha ki`inshungkhur miring le lungroko shung ah kiawm pui miring inih. Amani kha kamatieng a Christa takarushawn miring le tirtawn hai kar a runiei miring runih.
45016008	Amplias kha chubai peh u roh. Ama kha Pumi riming a kunumpok miring inih.
45016009	Urbanus kha chubai peh u roh. Christa chonmun a ama kha kochon thaw pui miring inih. Khan kunumpok Stachys kha`awm chubai peh u roh.
45016010	Apelles kha chubai peh u roh, ama kha Christa riming a muchuk runih joi. Aristobulus inshungkhur hai kha chubai peh u roh.
45016011	Herodion kha chubai peh u roh. Ama kha ki`inshungkhur inih. Narcissus inshungkhur hai kha chubai peh u roh. Amani kha Pumi riming a awm nih joi.
45016012	Tryphena le Tryphosa kha chubai peh u roh, amani kha Pumi riming a chon ranak ruthaw inih. Kunumpok Persis kha chubai peh u roh, ama kha Pumi riming a chon ranak ruthaw inih.
45016013	Rufus kha chubai peh u roh, ama kha Pumi riming a irumadan nih joi. Kiei rangawm kunu achang, unu kha`awm chubai peh u roh.
45016014	Asyncritus, Phlegon, Hermas, Patrobas, Hermes, khan amani le awm uliennai hai kha chubai peh u roh.
45016015	Philologus le Julia, Nereus le anaipangnu, Olympas, khan amani le awm miriethieng hai kholok kha chubai peh u roh.
45016016	Riethieng biengrutum kha le khatlekhat dieng chubai repeh u roh. Christa biekrup hai na nangni kha chubai nepek uh.
45016017	Uliennai hai, nangni dieng kinawmawshawk u inih: nangijet u ruchukna kha le kairekhe reshenna le keruthuina moshok miring hai kha jet u tana amani kha lawi u roh.
45016018	Ajarla kha`ang miring hai kha na nupumi u Jesu Christa kha chon thaw pe u mak. Inia amani vawnpui rangbak a chon ithaw u inih. Chawng rana hai le mimapakna khan amani na ariem miring hai mulung hai kha imohon pe u inih.
45016019	Ajarla nang chawngjuina u kha mi kholok na jet u joi. Khajarkhan nang jar ua kiei na ningaina kieniei. Atha chungchang khan shing u roh, khan ashie chungchang khan nang mulung u kha mieriem u roh, iti hi kidit inih.
45016020	Lungdamna apeh Pathien na Satan kha relentak a nang keshun ua rawnawi rangnih. Pumi Jesu Christa numpokmirit kha nangni le awm nih rosho. Amen.
45016021	Kochonthaw pui, Timothy le ki`inshungkhur, Lucius, Jason, khan Sosipater na chubai nepek uh.
45016022	Mahi chawngmawchawi miejiekpa Tertius kiei na Pumi riming a chubai kenepek uh.
45016023	Kiei le biekrup kholok numutungpa Gaius na nangni dieng chubai nepek uh. Khopui nieitinpa Erastus na nangni dieng chubai nepek uh. Uliennai `khat achang Quartus na`awm chubai nepek uh.
45016024	Pumi Jesu Christa numpokmirit kha nang kholok dieng awm rosho. Amen.
45016025	Tun kirophong athachawng le Jesu Christa chungchanga chawngshem dungjuia, Pathien na nangni kha nomothoi ngam u joi. Makha athachawng kha manmieshie put ah put ah Pathien na iruthe murukchawng rophongna dungjuia inih.
45016026	Inia tuntu, makha malangmashak joi, khan thiempulien hai Miejiek jar a hektiknieiboi Pathien chawngpek dungjuia menet joi. Makha phung kholok dieng, takashawn rang mejet joi.
45016027	Thiente a ashing Pathien ama dieng khan, Jesu Christa jar a kumshawt a alur kha chang rosho. Amen.
46001001	Pathien mulungmining jar a Jesu Christa tirtawn `khat rang a irukoi,
46001002	Christa Jesu jar a riethieng rang a irukoi a iruriethieng, khan mun rikip ah nupumi u Jesu Christa riming aban, Corinth ah awm Pathien biekrup dieng, uliennai Sosthenes le Paul kiei na kimiejiek u inih. Jesu Christa hi amani le kieini Pumi kha inih.
46001003	Napa u Pathien le Pumi Jesu Christa numpokmirit le lungdamna kha nangni dieng a`awm nih rosho.
46001004	Christa Jesu jar a nangni dieng inurupek Pathien numpokmirit chungchang khan kapathien kha kamapak jawnjai.
46001005	Makhala ama na chawng kholok a le varna kholok a nawrawchawngmashak uh.
46001006	Christa chungchanga kukungchangnashe kha`awm nangni dieng runet joi.
46001007	Khajarkhan nupumi u Jesu Christa larna kha nangingak u le roroia, khutchawi hai khan nangravatna u awm mak.
46001008	Nupumi u Jesu Christa Nikho khan metek boi nangnitna u rang, dawngshe khan ama na nemenet u rangnih.
46001009	Pathien hi takashawn rang a rutuk inih. Ama na ashapa nupumi u Jesu Christa rawlawpna shung khan nangni kha inurukoi inih.
46001010	Tun uliennai hai, mi kholok na khatte a nangrieina u rang le nang kar ua reshenrokhoi awmna boi rang, mulungmining khatte a nangruchunna u rang le khan chawngnangshatna u rang, nupumi u Jesu Christa riming a kinawmawshawk u inih.
46001011	Ajarla kuliennai hai, nang kar ua roshorakhana awm, tia Chloe inshungkhur ah put ah kiei dieng thangkoina vak niei uh.
46001012	“Paul tah kha kanih,” “Apollos tah kha kanih,” “Cephas tah kha kanih,” “Christa tah kha kanih,” tia nangiriei u kha kiriei inih.
46001013	Christa hi reshen maw? Nangni rang Paul na cross ling ah maw ruthi? Ninawkle, nangni na Paul riming a baptisma maw nangruloi uh?
46001014	Crispus le Gaius niboia, nangni `khatshe baptisma kunurupek boi u jarkhan, Pathien kha kamapak.
46001015	Makha tute na kiriming a tui kurumulut tina boi rang a inih.
46001016	Khanita`awm Stephanas inshungkhur kha tu baptisma kurupek. Makha niboia kiei na tute dieng baptisma kurupek, iti jet mi`ing.
46001017	Ajarla Christa na kiei hi baptisma pek rang a inojongtir nimak, inia lungvar chawng a niboia, athachawng kha rophongna rang a inih. Makha Christa cross kha ranakniei changna rang a inih.
46001018	Ajarla athang a awm hai rang tu, cross chawng hi mawngna kha inih, inia ishan a awm kieini dieng tu mahi Pathien ranak kha inih.
46001019	Ajarla hitihin rumiejiek: “Kiei na ashing miring hai lungvar kha mathang pe rang kanih. Ajet miring hai jetthieina hai kha momot pe rang kanih.”
46001020	Ashing miring kha khoshekawt ah maw awm? Danoja kha khoshekawt ah maw awm? Mahi rong a mihepa kha khoshekawt ah maw awm? Pathien na hi manmieshie lungvar kha mawngna imachangsho nimak maw?
46001021	Ajarla, Pathien lungvar shung khan manmieshie na lungvar jar a Pathien kha rujet maklai. Takashawn miring hai kha shanna rang, amawng chawngshem jar a, Pathien kha ningiruminit pe inih.
46001022	Jihudi hai na jetna inik uh, khan Greek hai na lungvar atawk uh.
46001023	Inia kieini na tu cross ling ah iruthat u Christa kha chawng a korophong uh. Jihudi hai rang mahi keruthuina inih, khan Greek hai rang mahi mawngna inih.
46001024	Inia Jihudi nit a Greek nita`awm, irukoi miring hai dieng tu, Christa hi Pathien ranak le Pathien lungvar kha inih.
46001025	Ajarla Pathien mawngna kha miring hai shingnanek a shingdet, khan Pathien dawkna kha miring hai ranaknek a ratdet.
46001026	Ajarla uliennai hai, inokoina u kha en u roh. Manmieshie ichatna dungjuia ashing tampui, ranakniei tampui, rashang a shok tampui hai kha irukoi nimak.
46001027	Inia ashing hai kha majakna rang, manmieshie a awm amawng hai kha Pathien na irumadan inih. Arat hai kha majakna rang, manmieshie a awm adawk hai kha irumadan inih.
46001028	Khan manmieshie a awm ih nih boi, inawng a awm hai, khan a`awm boi hai kha Pathien na irumadan inih. Mahi a`awm nieinak hai kha ih nih boi machangna rang a nih.
46001029	Makha tute na Pathien maikung a lienrashatna boi rang a inih.
46001030	Inia ama jar a Christa Jesu dieng nangawm u joi. Ama kha kieini rang a Pathien ah put ah jong lungvar kha inih. Christa kha kieini rang a dikna, riethiengna le rekhekna kha inih.
46001031	Makha “Lienrasha ama kha na PUMI dieng lienrashatna kha niei rosho,” tia imiejiek kha nitna rang a inih.
46002001	Khan uliennai hai, kiei na nangni dieng kavat phakhan, chawngriei thieitak a ninawkle lungvar kha le Pathien kungchangna kha rophong va mi`ing.
46002002	Ajarla Christa Jesu le cross ah thitna kha niboia, kiei na nangni dieng iawm jetna boi rang, mulung kurumiding.
46002003	Khan dawkna le chitna khan rawnawklam a nangni le kuruawm inih.
46002004	Khan kawchawng le kawchawngshem kha hawrna lungvar chawng hai kha runimak, inia Ratha na ranaknieitak a chon thaw, tia imumuk inih.
46002005	Makha nang takashawn u kha miring hai lungvar khan niboia Pathien ranak khan ngieina rang a inih.
46002006	Nitjoiawm puichang miring hai kar khan lungvar chawng kha kieriei uh. Inia mahi rong lungvar chawng kha nimak, khan athang a awm mahi rampo hai rong lungvar kha`awm nimak.
46002007	Inia rethe a awm Pathien lungvar kha kishem u inih. Makha murukchawng lungvar kha nulurna u rang, Pathien na rong hai mala a irumadansha nih joi.
46002008	Makha mahi rong rampo hai tute na rujet mak. Ajarla makha rujet u joiatu, lurna aship Pumi kha cross ling ah ruthat u naw nih.
46002009	Khania irumiejiek kha a`ang inih: “Mik na mumaklai, nokor na jet maklai, ama numapoh amani rang a Pathien na irurasham nieinak hai kha miring mulung a lut maklai.”
46002010	Inia aratha jar a amani kha kieini dieng malangmashak joi. Ajarla Ratha na nieinak kholok kha atawk, awh, Pathien nieinak hai athukshe kha`awm itawk inih.
46002011	Ajarla ih miring kha na maw, ama shung a awm ratha kha na niboia, miring `khat mulungmining hai kha jet nih? Makha ang a Pathien Ratha na niboia, tute na Pathien mulungmining hai kha jet mak.
46002012	Tun manmieshie ratha nih boi, Pathien ah put ah Ratha kha, kieini na naman u joi. Makha Pathien na kieini dieng manboi a inurupek nieinak hai kha nejetna u rang a inih.
46002013	Miring lungvar na iruchuk chawng a niboia, Ratha Riethieng na iruchuk chawng a kiriei u inih. Rathalam nieinak hai kha rathalam chawng a kimeler u inih.
46002014	Inia balam miring kha na Pathien Ratha nieinak hai kha muh mak, ajarla hihaihi ama dieng mawngna kha inih. Khan amani kha jet ngam mak, ajarla amani kha ratha le enrete rang a inih.
46002015	Inia Ratha miring kha na nieinak kholok enirete inih, khania ama chung a chawngshat pe mak.
46002016	“Ajarla ama kha chawng peknathiei rang, PUMI mulungmining ajet tumaw awm joi? Inia Christa mulungmining kha niniei u inih.”
46003001	Uliennai hai, kiei na nangni dieng rathalam miring `khat dieng a ang a chawng riei mi`ing, inia Christa dieng a naite hai taksha miring hai dieng a ang a chawng kiriei inih.
46003002	Burum le niboia runutui le kinavai u inih. Ajarla burum kha neh ngam u makchelai, khan tunshe hin mawtawr u makchelai.
46003003	Ajarla taksha a nangawm u lai. Ajarla mukmakna, roshona, khan reshenna awmlai jarkhan, nangni taksha le balam miring hai kha ang a aleng nih makche maw?
46003004	Ajarla tukhat na “Paul tah kha kanih” khan shik `khat na “Apollos tah kha kanih,” ti phakhan, nangni taksha a awm nih makche maw?
46003005	Khanitala Paul hi tumaw nih? Apollos hi tumaw nih? Pumi na amama dieng a chon ipek dungjuia, amani kha shepding hai kha nih mak maw? Amani jar a takanangirushawn u nih mak maw?
46003006	Kiei na kiruling inih, Apollos na tui`iruliei inih, inia Pathien na irumawmawng inih.
46003007	Khajarkhan alingpa le tuilieipa kha iawm nimak, inia runiei tu mawmawng Pathien kha inih.
46003008	Alingpa le tuilieipa kha akhat inih, khan amani ithawithaw dungjuia amama lawh kha tum u rangnih.
46003009	Ajarla kieini hi Pathien chon athawshom miring kha kanih uh, khan nangni kha Pathien loipuk le Pathien inrashak kha nangnih uh.
46003010	Kiei dieng a inurupek Pathien numpokmirit dungjuia, inrashak thiemtak `khat a, kiei na inmun kha kirurashamsho nih joi. Khan shik `khat na makha chung khan irashak inih. Inia mi rikip na makha chung khan itia irashak maw nih, iti kha riring pui rosho.
46003011	Iruphunsha chawpui Christa kha niboia, tute na shik `khat chawpui kha phun ngam naw nih.
46003012	Inia iphun chawpui chung hin tukhat na rangkachak, dangka, manlu lung, thing, rangai, khan shawpaw le inrashak joiatu,
46003013	amama chon hai kha malangmashak rangnih, ajarla Nikho kha na makha rophong rangnih. Ajarla miei na makha rophong rangnih. Khan miei na amama chonthaw kha ih maw nih, iti kha enrete rangnih.
46003014	Makha chung a irashak tukhatpa chonthaw kha kang pe joinawkatu, ama na lawh kha tum rangnih.
46003015	Ama chonthaw hai kha miei na kang joiatu, lawh kha thang pe rangnih, inia mieichon ah put ah rekhe `khat ang a, thiethien a tu shanna kha muk rangnih.
46003016	Pathien riethiengmun kha nangnih uh, khan Pathien Ratha kha nangni dieng awm, iti kha jet u makche maw?
46003017	Tukhat na riethiengmun kha pawrmechet joiatu, Pathien na ama kha mathang rangnih. Ajarla Pathien riethiengmun kha riethieng inih, makha nangni nangnih uh.
46003018	Tute na nining a mohon nana naw rosho. Tukhat na mahi rong hin ashingdan a awm joiatu, ashing miring kha changna rang, amawng kha chang rosho.
46003019	Ajarla mahi manmieshie varna hi tu Pathien rang a mawngna kha inih. Ajarla hitihin iemiejiek: “Amani hongthawtak khan ashing miring hai kha ishur inih.”
46003020	Khan takthar a, “PUMI na mishing hai lungthim kha nemna boi inih, iti kha jet pe.”
46003021	Khajarkhan tute na miring hai jar a lienrashatna niei naw rosho. Ajarla nieinak kholok hi nang tah u inih.
46003022	Paul ninawkle Apollos ninawkle Cephas ninawkle manmieshie ninawkle aring ninawkle thitna ninawkle a`awm nieinak ninawkle ajong rang a nieinak kholok hi nang tah u inih.
46003023	Khan nangni hi Christa tah, khan Christa hi Pathien tah kha inih.
46004001	Mi na kieini hi Christa shok hai le Pathien murukchawng inchonpo hai `khat a noloi rosho.
46004002	Makha chung a, inchonpo hai rang a kha takashawn rang a rutuk anih rang a hi rangai.
46004003	Inia nangni ninawkle miring danin ih khan nita`awm, kuchung a ennanginerete u hi, kiei rang tu ashinving inih. Kininingshe a enrete nana mi`ing.
46004004	Ajarla kuchung a ashie iti jet mi`ing, inia mahi na kiei hi inimidik tu nimak. Inia kiei enneretepa kha Pumi inih.
46004005	Khajarkhan, Pumi jong masheng, pha mala khan tute chung a iawm chawngshat u naw roh. Ama na ajing a rethe nieinak hai kha avar tieng vak chawi rangnih. Khan mulung hai chonmuchuk kha malangmashak rangnih. Khashole mi rikip na itum rang a mapakna kha Pathien ah put ah muk rangnih.
46004006	Uliennai hai, hihaihi nangni rangbak khan meloi a kiei le Apollos chung a kimocho inih. Makha nangni na imiejiek kha khea mining boi a kieini ah put ah nangruchukna u rang a inih. Khan tukhat jar a tukhat chung a liennangrashatna boi u rang a inih.
46004007	Ajarla tu na nangni kha shik miring ah put ah kai`inerekhemashak u maw nih? Khan Pathien ah put ah nangiruloi boi u imaw nangniei uh? Khan nangni na nangruloi u joiala, aloi boi ang a, ijar a lienrasha maw nangnih uh?
46004008	Nangni ashipsha kha nangnih joi! Nangni rawchawngsha kha nangnih joi! Kieini jaw boi a reng hai kha ang a rengnangchang u joi! Makha kieiniawm nangni le rengkachangna u rang, rengnangchang u rang a kha kidit inih!
46004009	Ajarla kiei na kimining, Pathien na kieini hi, athi rang a iheng ang a, inophoi u tirtawn adawkving hai kha kanih u joi. Ajarla kieini hi manmieshie, ravantir le miring hai en rang a kha namachang u joi.
46004010	Christa rangbak khan kieini hi mimawng hai kha kanih u joi, inia nangni tu Christa jar a ashing kha nangnih uh! Kieini hi kadawk uh, inia nangni tu nangrat uh! Nangni kha lurna nepek uh, inia kieini tu nepeh u mak!
46004011	Tunshe hin tuiravawncham a ka`awm uh, ponledier boi a ka`awm uh, nejem uh, khan inleloi niei boi a ka`awm uh.
46004012	Khan chon ranak kawthaw uh, khuttak le chon kawthaw uh. Narachai u phakhan, rahvan kepek uh, epshawna nepek u phakhan, kodoi uh.
46004013	Maimawk nepek u phakhan, renem a kamashang uh. Vonshe hin manmieshie arih le rieliei pawrche kha kachang u lai.
46004014	Nangni dieng jak pekna rang a hihaihi kimiejiek nimak, inia kunumpok naite hai `khat a kinarachak u inih.
46004015	Ajarla Christa chungchanga mirachah hai kha tengamboi a nangniei u joiawm, nangpa u hai kha tampui niei u makche. Ajarla athachawng jar a Jesu Christa riming a nangpa u kha achang kanih joi.
46004016	Khajarkhan kunun kha ruchuh u roh, tia kinawmawshawk u inih.
46004017	Mahi jar hin Timothy kha nangni dieng kivaktir inih. Pumi jar a ama kha kunumpok le takashawn rang a rutuk shapa kha inih. Kiei na, mun rikip ah awm biekrup rikip ah kiruchuk kha ang a, Christa dieng a kaw`awmchan hai kha nangni dieng nemejet rangnih.
46004018	Kiei na nangni dieng kava boi rang ang a eshen na liennangrasha uh.
46004019	Inia Pathien na jawt joiatu, nangni dieng kiei varelen rang kanih. Khan lienrasha miring hai chawng kha niboia, amani ranak kha kiei na jet rang kanih.
46004020	Ajarla Pathien rengchangna kha chawng kha nimak a ranak kha inih.
46004021	Rawmaw le maw ninawkle numpok le maw, khan mulung renem le maw nangni dieng kiei va ning? Ih kha maw nangdit uh?
46005001	Nang kar ua pawrche chon awm, iti thangkoina `khat hi kiei dieng jong tung. Kha`ang pawrche chon hai kha Phungshik hai diengshe riming ban boi inih, makhala miring `khat na apa inkonu le irishih hi inih!
46005002	Khan nangni na lienrashatna nangniei uh, makha chon athaw miring kha nang kar uah put ah nawtna rang, mulung shaw puidet u makche.
46005003	Ajarla taksha a ka`awm joi nawkawm ratha a ka`awm. Khan a`awm miring `khat ang a, kha`ang chon athaw miring chung khan chawngkashat joi.
46005004	Pumi Jesu Christa riming a nangni na lawp `khat a karatha le, nupumi u Jesu Christa ranak le nangruchun u phakhan,
46005005	taksha mathangna rang, kha`ang miring kha Satan dieng peh u roh. Makha Pumi Jesu Nikho khan aratha kha shannathiei rang a inih.
46005006	Nang lienrashatna u kha atha nimak. Chawh shilite kha na vaipaw kholok kha rakangmashak, iti kha jet u makche maw?
46005007	Khajarkhan vaipaw athar nangchangna u rang, chawh alui kha riethieng u roh, ajarla diktak a chawjawboi kha nangnih uh. Ajarla diktak a narakanna u Christa kha kieini rangbak khan irurawthawina inih.
46005008	Khajarkhan alui chawh kha le niboia, ashie le pawrche chawh kha leawm niboia, chawjawboi mulung riethieng le adik khan rachang kha rung u rawi.
46005009	Pawrche miring kha le nangrawtawpna boi u rang, kawchawngmawchawi khan kirumiejiek inih.
46005010	Inia hi manmieshie pawrchetna ninawkle phamrai athaw hai ninawkle mishiersho hai ninawkle rilim chubaibawk hai kha kiti nimak. Makha nitjoiatu, nangni na hi manmieshie hi nangimathan u rang a inih.
46005011	Inia tun uliennai tu iti pawrche chon thaw, phamrai athaw ninawkle rilim chubaibawk, ninawkle mi maimawk apeh, ninawkle jukhawp miring, shierliemthaw miring hai kha le rawtawpna boi rang, amani le aneh-ashashe thawna boi rang, kiei na nangni dieng kirumiejiek inih.
46005012	Ajarla biekrup vai tieng a awm miring hai kha chawngshat pe a kiei na imaw thaw ning? Biekrup shung a awm miring hai kha nangni na chawngnangishat pe boi maw nih?
46005013	Inia vai tieng a awm miring hai kha Pathien na chawngishat pe inih. Khajarkhan “pawrche miring kha nangni ah put ah nawt u roh.”
46006001	Nang kar ua tukhat na tukhat chung a chawngreperna niei phakhan, makha chawngshatna rang, miriethieng hai dieng niboia, midik boi hai dieng nangshe u maw nih?
46006002	Miriethieng hai na manmieshie hi chawngshat pe rangnih, iti kha nangijet boi u maw nih? Khan manmieshie hi chawngnangishat pe u rang a nitjoiatu, ashinving chon hai kha chawngshatna rang, rutuk boi maw nangnih uh?
46006003	Kieini na ravantir hai kha chawngnishat pe rang a inih, iti kha nangijet boi u maw nih? Khanitala hihai ringkho hi idawr a chawngnishat pe u rang a maw nih?
46006004	Mahi ringkho chon chungchanga chawngshatna kha nangniei u joiala, biekrup na ashinving a imining miring hai kha chawngshat rang madan u roh!
46006005	Mahi nang jakna u rang a kiriei inih. Uliennai hai kar a chawngshat ngam, nang kar ua ashing miring `khatshe awm boi maw nih?
46006006	Inia uliennai `khat na uliennai `khat chung a chawngreperna pui rang, danin ah ashe kha takashawn boi hai dieng ashe inih!
46006007	Khajarkhan khatlekhat chung a danin ah nangshe u hi maimawk kha nangimuksha u nih joi. Kha ruhut a erehe chang rang ithaw maw jawt u makche? Mi na inomohon u rang khan ithaw maw jawt u makche?
46006008	Inia nangnitak na adik boi kha nangthaw uh, khan mi kha nang mohon uh. Khan mahi nang uliennai dieng nangthaw uh!
46006009	Midik boi hai na Pathien rengchangna kha tum ngam naw nih, iti kha jet u makche maw? Mi na nangni kha inelem boi chang rosho. Pawrche chon thaw hai, rilim chubaibawk hai, uire thaw hai, nupangmunlo hai, palepa rishih hai,
46006010	murushah hai, rapham miring hai, jukhawp miring hai, maimawk apeh hai, khan shierliemthaw hai kha na Pathien rengchangna kha tum ngam naw nih.
46006011	Nangni eshenawm kha`ang miring hai kha nangrunih uh. Inia nangni tu Pumi Jesu riming le napathien u Ratha kha na nururushuk u joi, nururiethieng u joi, khan nurumidiksho u joi.
46006012	Ih kholok hi kiei rang dan niviek, inia ih kholok hi nemna nimak. Ih kholok hi kiei rang dan niviek, inia amani ranak thoi khan awm mi`ing.
46006013	Nekleshak hai hi vawnpui rang a inih, khan vawnpui hi nekleshak hai rang a inih, inia Pathien na adinre kha mathang rangnih. Pum hi pawrche thawna rang a nimak, inia Pumi rang a inih, khan Pumi hi pum rang a inih.
46006014	Khan Pathien na Pumi kha irumothoi inih, ama ranak khan kieiniawm nomothoi u rangnih.
46006015	Nang pum u hai kha Christa pasha hai kha inih, iti kha jet u makche maw? Christa pasha hai kha loi a nawchijor pasha hai kha machang ning maw? Makha nihet mak!
46006016	Ninawkle, nawchijor `khat le ruchun ama kha, ama kha le pum `khat chang joi, iti kha jet u makche maw? Ajarla Pathien na iti, “Idi kha taksha `khat nih joi.”
46006017	Inia Pumi le ruchun ama kha ama le ratha `khat nih joi.
46006018	Pawrche chon ah put ah tan u roh. Miring `khat na ithaw munu rikip kha pum vai tieng ah inih, inia pawrche chon athaw ama kha na upumtak chung a munu ithaw inih.
46006019	Ninawkle, nang pum u kha nangni dieng a awm, Pathien ah put ah nangimuk u, Ratha Riethieng riethiengmun kha inih, iti jet u makche maw? Nangni hi nang tah u nih u lai makche.
46006020	Ajarla nangni hi aman pek a inawrawchawk u nih joi. Khajarkhan Pathien tah nang pum u le nang ratha u khan Pathien kha mulur u roh.
46007001	Khan kiei dieng a nivakmiejiek u chungchanga kiemiejiek jawt: apa na nupang ishit boi rang a hi atha inih.
46007002	Nitjoiawm pawrche chon jar hin, apa rikip na amama inkonu niei rosho, khan nupang rikip na amama inkopa niei rosho.
46007003	Inkopa na ama inkonu dieng a thaw rang a rangai kha thaw rosho, khan inkonu kha na`awm khatikhan ama inkopa dieng khan thaw rosho.
46007004	Inkonu na upumtak chung a cham niei mak, inia inkopa na iniei. Kha le ra`ang a, inkopa na upumtak chung a cham niei mak, inia inkonu na iniei.
46007005	Chamradoina le nikna rang a pha bawng `khat rang nangrawjawtshom u niboia, khatlekhat idit kha heng u naw roh. Takshur ravat jar a Satan na nelemna boi u rang, vak ruchunret u roh.
46007006	Mahi kiei na themna `khat a kiriei inih, chawngpek `khat a kiriei nimak.
46007007	Ajarla mi kholok na kiei hi ang a a`awm rang hi kadit. Inia mi rikip na Pathien ah put ah khutchawi inieirim inih, akhat dieng hitihin, khan akhat dieng khatikhan.
46007008	Inia inniei boi hai le mieirawng hai dieng kieriei: kiei hi ang a awm u joiatu, thadet.
46007009	Inia amani na takshurna kha niei u joi nawkatu, inniei u rosho. Ajarla taksha mieisha doinek a tu inniei kha thadet.
46007010	Khan inniei miring hai dieng mahi chawngpek hi kepek (Kiei na nimak Pumi chawngpek kha inih): inkonu na inkopa le reshen boi rang a inih.
46007011	Inia reshen joiatu, ama na inniei boi a awm rosho, ninawkle ama inkopa kha le riengiei rosho. Khan inkopa na inkonu kha mele naw rosho.
46007012	Inia mienienglim dieng (Pumi na nimak, kiei na kiriei inih): uliennai `khat na takashawn boi inkonu`khat niei a, amanu kha na ama le awm jawt joiatu, ama na mele naw rosho.
46007013	Khan nupang `khat na takashawn boi inkopa `khat niei a, amapa kha na ama le awm jawt joiatu, ama na mele naw rosho.
46007014	Ajarla inkopa takashawn boi kha inkonu jar a ieriethieng joi, khan inkonu takashawn boi kha inkopa jar a ieriethieng joi. Khanawkatu naite hai kha rono rangnih, inia tuntu amani kha riethieng chang u joi.
46007015	Inia takashawn boi kha tan joiatu, tan rosho, kha`ang chonmun khan uliennai ninawkle uliennainu kha ikhop nimak. Inia Pathien na kieini hi lungdamna rang a inokoi inih.
46007016	Ajarla, Aw nupang, nanginkopa kha nangshan rangnih, iti kha itia nangijet maw nih? Ninawkle, Aw apa, nanginkonu kha nangshan rangnih, iti kha itia nangijet maw nih?
46007017	Inia Pathien na mi rikip dieng irushem pe le Pumi na mi rikip irukoi kha ang a, khatikhan ring rosho. Khatikhan biekrup kholok ah kirachak inih.
46007018	Tukhat kha vunep anuk khan irukoi maw nih? Vunep boi kha changlai naw rosho. Tukhat kha vunep mala khan irukoi maw nih? Vunep kha changlai naw rosho.
46007019	Vunep, iti hi iawm nimak, khan vunepboi, iti hi iawm nimak, inia Pathien chawngpek hai arung, iti hi runiei inih.
46007020	Mi rikip na amama irukoina awmchan khan awm rosho.
46007021	Shok nangchanglai khan a inurukoi maw nih? Makha shaw pui naw roh, inia nang kha nomoshok ngam joiatu, makha rotokna roh.
46007022	Ajarla shok ruchanglai a Pumi jar a irukoi ama kha Pumi moshok miring kha inih. Kha le ra`ang a, rukoilai a moshok ruchang ama kha Christa shok kha inih.
46007023	Nangni hi man pek a inururawchawk u nih joi, miring hai shok kha chang u lai naw roh.
46007024	Uliennai hai, mi rikip na, irukoilai a awmchantak khan, Pathien le awm rosho.
46007025	Khan nungak hai chungchanga, kiei na Pumi ah put ah chawngpek kha niei mi`ing. Inia Pumi ama roihoina thoi a takashawn rang a rutuk miring `khat a, kimining hi kipek inih.
46007026	Tuntun a rangai dungjuia miring `khat na amama awmchan a a`awm kha atha, tia kiei na kimining.
46007027	Inkonu `khat na inikhit maw nih joi? Nang na ruthutna rang, tawk naw roh. Inkonu `khat ah put ah ruthut maw nangnih joi? Nang na nungak tawk naw roh.
46007028	Inia innanginiei nitsheawm, munu thaw makchelai. Khan nungak `khat na inniei joiatu, munu thaw maklai. Inia inniei miring hai kha na ringkho shawna niei u rangnih, inia kenerekhemashak jawt uh.
46007029	Inia uliennai hai, kiei na mahi kieriei, apha hi tawi joi. Inkonu niei hai kha na aniei boi ang a awm u rosho.
46007030	Khan achap miring hai kha na, achap boi ang a awm u rosho. Khan ningai hai kha na ningai boi ang a awm u rosho. Khan nieinak rawchawh miring hai kha na aniei boi ang a awm u rosho.
46007031	Khan rieliei nieinak rotokna hai kha na irotoknahet boi ang a awm u rosho. Ajarla hi rieliei shung ah awm nieinak hi hawng hek shishit joi.
46007032	Inia mulungshaw boi a awm rang khan kanadit uh. Inniei boi ama kha na Pumi dieng a awm nieinak hai kha ishaw pui inih. Ama na itia maw Pumi kha ningkiminit pe rang, tia mining.
46007033	Inia inniei miring ama kha na manmieshie nieinak kha mulungshaw pui. Itia maw ama inkonu kha ningkiminit pe rang, tia mining.
46007034	Inniei nupang le nungak kairekhena awm. Inniei boi nupang kha na pum a le ratha dire a riethiengna rang, Pumi nieinak jar a mulungshaw ieniei. Inia inniei nupang kha na, itia maw ama inkopa kha ningkiminit pe rang, tia manmieshie nieinak jar a mulungshaw kha ieniei.
46007035	Nang maton u kharna rang a nimak, inia mahi nangnemna u rang a kiriei inih. Mahi nangni na perepet boi a Pumi chon kha nangthawna u rang, iriding kha hitihin a kiriei inih.
46007036	Inia tukhat na ama na ishot nungaknu chung a riding boi awmchan a ka`awm, tia mining a khan nungaknu kha kumletha na ilim rang a nitjoiatu, khan ama na iloingir rang a inih, tia mining joiatu, imining kha thaw rosho. Ama na munu kha thaw mak, amani na inniei u rosho.
46007037	Khanikengta tukhat na mulung a dingrep a rangai, iti niei boi a, ama mulungminingtak chung khan ranak niei a, nungaknu kha loilai naw ning, tia mulungmiding joiatu, ama na`awm atha kha ithaw inih.
46007038	Khajarkhan nungaknu aloipa kha na atha ithaw inih, khan aloi boi ama kha na athadet ithaw inih.
46007039	Inkonu `khat na ama inkopa ringlaishe khan Dan thoi a awm inih, inia ama inkopa kha thi joiatu, imining tukhat dieng in`iloh rang khan rakharna awm pe mak, nitjoiawm Pumi kha takashawn anih rang a inih.
46007040	Inia khatikhan inniei boi a awm joiatu, kimining dungjuia tu, ama kha rahvanthadet kha inih. Pathien Ratha kha kiei na kieniei, tia kimining.
46008001	Khan konrilim hai dieng a pek nieinak hai chungchanga: nokholok dieng shingna awm, iti hi nokholok na nijet u inih. Shingna na lienrashatmashak, inia numpok na rawshawnmashak.
46008002	Tukhat na kejet, tia mining a tu, ijet rang a rutuk kha iawm ijet boi inih.
46008003	Inia tukhat na Pathien kha numpok joiatu, ama kha Pathien na ejet.
46008004	Khajarkhan konrilim hai dieng a pek nieinak hai shakna chungchanga, manmieshie hin konrilim hi iawm nimak, khan Pathien shik awm mak, inia khatte awm, iti hi nijet u inih.
46008005	Ajarla pathien hai le pumi hai tampui a`awm ang hin, ravan ninawkle rieliei chung hin pathien iti u hai kha a`awm nitsheawm,
46008006	kieini rang tu napa u Pathien khatte awm. Ih kholok ama ah put ah jong shok inih. Kieini hi ama rang a ring nanih uh. Pumi Jesu Christa khatte awm. Nieinak kholok ama jar a jong shok inih. Kieini hi ama jar a ring nanih uh.
46008007	Inia mi rikip na makha shingna kha niei mak. Eshen na tu, konrilim hai kha ruriejiei pui jarkhan, tunshe hin konrilim dieng a pek nieinak ang a shak u lai. Khan amani lungthim kha dawk pe u jarkhan, amani lungthim kha pawrimechet pe u inih.
46008008	Inia nekleshak kha na Pathien dieng namathatdet mak, ajarla nashak le nemnadetawm awm mak, khan nashak nawk `le, thangnadetawm awm mak.
46008009	Inia riring u roh. Mahi ningchamna hi adawk hai keruthuina achangthiei inih.
46008010	Ajarla shingna aniei nang na konrilimin ah nangishak kha tukhat na navakmuk phakhan, lungthim dawk anieipa kha na konrilim hai dieng a pek nieinak hai kha shakna rang, lungar niei naw nih maw?
46008011	Khan adawk uliennai, Christa na ama rang a ruthi miring kha nang shingna kha na mathang naw nih maw?
46008012	Inia khatikhan uliennai chung a munu nangthaw a, amani lungthim dawkna kha nang mawpawp pe phakhan, Christa chung a munu nangithaw inih.
46008013	Khajarkhan nekleshak kha na ku`uliennai kha keruthuimashak joiatu, uliennai keruthuimashakna boi rang, kiei na me kha shukshah a shalai naw ning.
46009001	Kiei hi tirtawn `khat anih boi maw kanih? Kiei hi moshok anih boi maw kanih? Nupumi u Jesu Christa kha kimuk boi maw nih? Pumi riming a nangni hi kochonthaw ara kha nih u makche maw?
46009002	Shik miring hai dieng kiei hi tirtawn kinit joi nawkawm, rakhana niei boi a, kiei hi nangni dieng tu tirtawn `khat kanih. Ajarla Pumi riming a nangni hi kitirtawnchangna jetnam kha nangnih uh.
46009003	Ennerete hai dieng a korohonna kha tu hi inih:
46009004	Kieini na nekna rang le shakna rang cham kiniei boi maw nih?
46009005	Tirtawn shik hai, Pumi naipang hai le Cephas ang a, takashawn nupang hai kha niei a chon thawna pui rang, cham kiniei boi u maw nih?
46009006	Ninawkle, Barnabas le kadinte na chon thaw boi a ringna rang, cham kiniei boi maw nih?
46009007	Tu na maw ama cholam thaw a ramun ah ashe awm joi? Tu na maw drakha iling a ama ara kha ashah boi awm? Ninawkle, tu na maw kengam ohoi a kengam hai runu aneh boi awm?
46009008	Hihaihi miring `khat chang a kiriei nenek maw nih? Ninawkle, Dan na`awm khatak kha iriei boi maw nih?
46009009	Ajarla Moses Dan khan hitihin ieriei: “Shiecha `khat na shang achieilai khan ener nangikhop pe boi rang a inih.” Pathien na tenireh kha shiecha hai kha maw nih?
46009010	Ninawkle, nokholok jar a iriei maw nih? Rakhana boipet a, mahi kieini rangbak a iriei inih. Makhala, loikhoi miring kha na ngakmining a ikhoi inih, khan makha ngakmining a mawnawi miring kha na, ngakmining a ara kha lokna rang a ithaw inih.
46009011	Rathalam nieinak hai kha nangni rang kawvawr uala, kieini na nang rielieiniei hai kha kirawkhawm u khan rekhe chon maw nih?
46009012	Mahi cham hi shik miring hai na nangni ah put ah tum u joiala, kieini na ruphu a kitum u rang a nimak maw? Nitjoiawm kieini na mahi cham hi rotokna u mi`ing, inia Christa athachawng kha kakharna boi u rang, kholok kha kidoi u inih.
46009013	Riethiengmun ah chon thaw hai kha na riethiengmun ah put ah nekleshak hai kha ishak rang a inih. Maicham ah chon thawa hai kha na maicham ah pek nieinak hai kha itum rang a inih, iti kha jet u makche maw?
46009014	Kha le ra`ang a athachawng rophong hai kha na athachawng ah put ah ravaina kha imuk rang a inih, tia Pumi na chawng rupek joi.
46009015	Inia kiei na hihai cham hi `khatshe rotokna mi`ing. Hihaihi kiei dieng thaw rang a inih, tia kiei na nangni dieng kimiejiek nimak. Ajarla kielienrashatna hi tukhat na nemna boi imachang rangnek a tu, kiei rang tu athi kha athadet inih.
46009016	Ajarla kiei na athachawng kha korophong joiawm, makha chung a lienrashatna rang niei mi`ing, ajarla thawngir rang a chon kha kiei dieng nepek joi. Inia kiei na athachawng kha korophong joi nawkatu, kuchung a idawr a shawna a`awm rang a maw nih naw!
46009017	Ajarla mahi kupum repeh a kithaw nitjoiatu, kiei na lawh kha kieniei. Inia kimining kha le re`er a nitjoiatu, inchonpona `khat le roiruputna kha kiei dieng inepek nilai.
46009018	Khanitala kawlawh kha imaw nih joi? Makha, athachawng kha korophong phakhan, Christa athachawng kha manboi a keshemna rang le athachawng chung a cham korotokna boi rang a inih.
46009019	Ajarla mi kholok ah put ah moshok kha kanih joiawm, arawp kamanna rang, mi kholok dieng kinining a shok achang kanih.
46009020	Jihudi hai kha kamanna rang, Jihudi hai kar a Jihudi `khat ang a ka`awm, khan Dan thoi a awm hai kha kamanna rang, Dan thoi a awm hai kar a Dan thoi a awm `khat ang a ka`awm.
46009021	Danishawnboi hai kha kamanna rang, Danishawnboi hai kar a Danishawnboi `khat ang a ka`awm (Pathien maikung a danishawnboi kha nimi`ing a Christa maikung a dan thoi a awm kanih).
46009022	Adawk miring hai kha kamanna rang, adawk miring hai kar a adawk miring `khat ang a ka`awm. Mi kholok dieng ih kholok kha kanih. Makha nitthieishe a eshentak a nita`awm kashan ngamna rang a inih.
46009023	Khan athachawng rangbak a kithaw hi nangni le atumshom kachangna rang a inih.
46009024	Tanrieshiet khan mi kholok tan a miring khatte na lawh kha aman, iti kha jet u makche maw? Makha nangmannathiei u rang, tan u roh.
46009025	Khan rieshietna ajaw mi rikip na irikip a takshurna kha ieniei. Amani na athangthiei renglukhum kha manna rang, ithaw u inih, inia kieini tu athangthiei boi renglukhum kha manna rang a inih.
46009026	Khajarkhan munmangboi a kiei tan mi`ing, rithi kar a ijem kha ang a, kiei na ra thaw mi`ing.
46009027	Inia kupum kha kiei na kachep a shok kamachang, khanawkatu, shik miring hai dieng chawng tu kishem, inia kinining a rutuk boi kha kachang rangnih.
46010001	Uliennai hai, nangijet boi u rang a kha kiei dit mi`ing, makhala napa u hai kha romiei thoi ah ruawm uh, kholok na tuipui kha rurakan uh.
46010002	Kholok na romiei shung ah le tuipui shung ah Moses dieng baptisma ruloi uh.
46010003	Khan mi kholok na rathalam nekleshak kha rushak uh.
46010004	Mi kholok na amani rujui rathalam Lungpum ah put ah runek uh. Makha Lungpum kha Christa runih.
46010005	Inia arawplam dieng Pathien na ningnitna runiei mak, khajarkhan amani rok hai kha ramthim khan chaiachai a irutet pe inih.
46010006	Amani na ashie ningiruaw u kha ang a, kieini na`awm ashie kha ningnawawna boi rang, hihaihi kieini dieng endar hai kha ruchang inih.
46010007	Amani eshen kha ang a konrilim chubaibawk hai kha chang u naw roh. Hitihin rumiejiek: “Miring hai kha na nekna rang le shakna rang rushuh uh, khan rishirajam a hoiriethieina rang ruthoi uh.”
46010008	Amani eshen na iruthaw u kha ang a, kieini na taksha rono chon kha thaw u naw rawi. Khan ni `khat shung a bawp shawmdilieithum ruthi uh.
46010009	Amani eshen na iruthaw u kha ang a, kieini na Christa kha lem u naw rawi. Khan amani kha moro hai na rumathang uh.
46010010	Amani eshen na irurieishiet u kha ang a, rieishiet u naw roh. Amani kha mimathangpa kha na irumathang inih.
46010011	Hihai kholok hi endar hai `khat a amani dieng rushok inih. Rong mawtawrna jong tungna kieini dieng rachakna `khat a irumiejiek inih.
46010012	Khajarkhan kading, tia imining ama kha na riring rosho, khanawkatu ama kha apurthiei inih.
46010013	Miring dieng a tangjam a awm lemna kha niboia, ih lemna kha na nushur u maklai. Inia Pathien tu takashawn rang a rutuk inih. Nangidoi ngam boi u rang a lemna kha ama na jawt naw nih. Lemna kha nangdoina ngam u rang, ama na rekhena rang, lam mawlawng rangnih.
46010014	Khajarkhan, kunumpok uliennai hai, konrilim chubaibawk ah put ah rechen u roh.
46010015	Miningthiei miring hai dieng ang a kiriei inih, kiriei hi nang nining ua enrete u roh.
46010016	Nimapak u mapakna hai kha Christa thishen rawlawpna kha nithawshom u anih boi maw nih? Nikhoi u tan kha Christa pum rawlawpna kha anih boi maw nih?
46010017	Khajarkhan kieini hi tampui nanih joiawm, tan `khat le pum `khat kha nanih uh, ajarla tan khatte kha niloi u inih.
46010018	Israel miring hai kha miring shena dungjuia en u roh: rawthawina nieinak ashah hai kha na maicham hai ah put ah rawlawpna kha imuk u nimak maw?
46010019	Khanitala kiei na imaw kiriei? Makha konrilim kha ih kha maw nih? Ninawkle konrilim hai dieng a pek hai kha ih kha maw nih?
46010020	Inia kiei na kieriei, makhala Phungshik hai rawthawi kha Pathien dieng nimak a raikho hai dieng a rawthawi inih. Khan nangni hi raikho hai le nawrawlawpmashak jawt u mi`ing.
46010021	Nangni na Pumi hai le raikho hai hai kha neh ngam u naw tinih. Nangni na Pumi le raikho hai tebol ah nekleshak kha shathiei u naw tinih.
46010022	Ninawkle, Pumi kha ningnangimaw`aw u maw nih? Kieini hi amanek a aliendet maw nanih uh?
46010023	Kiei rang tu nieinak kholok hi thawthieibiek inih, inia nieinak kholok hi nemna nimak. Kiei rang tu nieinak kholok hi thawthieibiek inih, inia nieinak kholok na rawshawnmashak mak.
46010024	Tute na ama idit ranga kha tawk naw rosho, inia shik miring hoina rangawm tawk rosho.
46010025	Nang lungthim ah put ah rawdawnna niei boi a, me rievieithawna mun a ijor hai kha shah u roh.
46010026	Ajarla, “rieliei hi PUMI tah inih, khan makhan a awm kholokawm ama tah inih.”
46010027	Takashawn boi hai kar a akhat na nang kha nitakbu nek rang nokoi a nangshe jawt joiatu, nang lungthim rangbak khan rawdawn boi a, ih kha nita`awm nang maton ah itet hai kha shah roh.
46010028	Inia “Mahi konrilim dieng a ipek kha keng,” tia tukhat na nang dieng nieriei joiatu, anarieipa le nang lungthim rangbak khan makha shah naw roh. Ajarla, “rieliei hi PUMI tah inih, khan makhan a awm kholokawm ama tah inih.”
46010029	Kiei na kiti tu, miringpa lungthim rangbak a inih, nang lungthim rang a kiti nimak. Ajarla kiningchamna kha miring shik `khat lungthim na ijar a maw chawngshat nih?
46010030	Inia kiei na mapak le roroia kashak joiatu, kimapaksha nekleshak jarkhan, ijar a kiei hi ashie a inierieina rang a maw nih?
46010031	Khajarkhan nangishak nanginek u, ninawkle ih kha nita`awm, nangithaw u kholok kha Pathien lurna rang thaw u roh.
46010032	Jihudi hai diengawm, ninawkle Greek hai diengawm, ninawkle Pathien biekrup hai diengawm, tute kha`awm keruthuimashak naw roh.
46010033	Mahi amani kha shanna mukna rang, kenemna kha tawk boi a, vanoi nemna kha tawk a, ih kholok a, mi kholok ningkiminit pe hi ang a, thaw u roh.
46011001	Christa awmchan kiruchuk hi ang a, nangniawm kaw`awmchan hi ruchuh u roh.
46011002	Uliennai hai, irikip a kiei hi nangnimininghep ua, nangni dieng a kinuruchuk u kha nangrung u jarkhan, kanamapak uh.
46011003	Inia apa rikip lu kha Christa inih, nupang lu kha apa inih, khan Christa lu kha Pathien inih, iti hi nangni dieng kenemejet jawt uh.
46011004	Apa rikip na nik pha ninawkle chawng rophong phakhan, ulu kha mukhu joiatu, ama lu kha richit ipek boi inih.
46011005	Inia nupang rikip na nik phakhan, ninawkle chawng rophong phakhan, ulu kha mukhu nawkatu, ulu kha richit ipek boi inih, ajarla makha ama na lu iboi kha le ra`angre inih.
46011006	Ajarla nupang `khat na mukhu nawkatu, asham kha ep rosho. Inia nupang `khat na sham i`ep ninawkle lu iboi kha jaknaroi chon nitjoiatu, ulu kha mukhu rosho.
46011007	Ajarla apa na ulu kha imukhu boi rang a shok, ajarla ama kha Pathien meloi le lurna kha inih, inia nupang hi apa lurna kha inih.
46011008	Ajarla apa hi nupang ah put ah nimak, inia nupang hi apa ah put ah inih.
46011009	Khan apa hi nupang rang a ikon nimak, inia nupang hi apa rang a ikon inih.
46011010	Hijarhin, ravantir hai jar a, nupang na ama chung a chamniei akhat awm iti jetna ulu ah itet rang a inih.
46011011	Nitjoiawm, Pumi riming a apa hi nupang ah put ah, khan nupang hi apa ah put ah rechenving tu nimak.
46011012	Ajarla nupang hi apa ah put ah anih kha ang a, apa`awm nupang jar a inih. Inia nieinak kholok Pathien ah put ah inih.
46011013	Nang nining a chawngshat u roh. Nupang `khat na lu mukhu boi a Pathien dieng inik hi iriding maw nih?
46011014	Balamshe na`awm nangni kha inuruchuk boi u maw nih? Apa `khat na asham kha mieshiei a tu, ama dieng richitna boi a`awm inih.
46011015	Inia nupang `khat na sham mieshiei joiatu, makha ama lurna inih. Ajarla sham kha ama mukhu rang a ipek inih.
46011016	Inia tukhat na makha chungchang khan roshorakhana rang mining a tu, kha ang shena kha niei u makme, Pathien biekrup hai diengawm niei u mak.
46011017	Hihai chawngrachakna hi kinepek u le roroia, nangni kha namapak u mi`ing, ajarla nangni na lawp `khat a nangva u hi thatnadet rang a nimak a shienadet rang a inih.
46011018	Ajarla, rapapek a, nangni na biekrup `khat a lawp a nangva u phakhan, nang kar ua reshenna awm, iti hi kejet: makha ichanshe tu takakawshawn.
46011019	Ajarla nang kar ua lawpreshen awmngir rangnih. Makha Pathien na ijawt amani kha meh nangjetna u rang a inih.
46011020	Khajarkhan nangni na mun `khat a lawp a nangvakruchun u phakhan, nangishak u kha Pumi shakriethieng kha nilai mak.
46011021	Ajarla mi rikip na ama nitakbu kha shik hai mala a shak uh, khan akhat na vawncham phakhan, shik `khat tu jukhawp joi.
46011022	Nangnekna u rang le nangshakna u rang, in niei u makche maw? Ninawkle, Pathien biekrup kha maimawk nangipek u maw nih, khan iawm aniei boi miring hai kha jak nangipek u maw nih? Nangni dieng imaw riei ning? Mahin nangni kha namapak u ning maw? Namapak u mi`ing.
46011023	Ajarla nangni dieng a kinurupek u kha Pumi ah put ah kirumuk kha inih: Pumi Jesu kha ijorna jantak khan ama na tan kha ruloi.
46011024	Khan ama na mapakna runiei phakhan, ama na tan kha rukhoi a ruti, “Loi u roh, shah u roh. Mahi nangni rang a akoisha kupum kha inih. Nangnimininghepna u rang, mahi thaw u roh.”
46011025	Khatak kha ang a, nitakbu shole, hai kha ruloi a ruti, “Mahi hai hi kithishen jar a rawjawtna `thar kha inih. Mahi nangnek u laisheng, nangnimininghepna u rang thaw u roh.”
46011026	Ajarla mahi tan hi nangshak ua mahi hai hi nangnek u laisheng, Pumi jong masheng, ama thitna kha nangirophong u inih.
46011027	Khajarkhan tukhat na mahi tan le mahi hai hi rutuk boi awmchan a enek-ashak a tu, Pumi pum le thishen chung a shietna kha thaw rangnih.
46011028	Inia miring `khat na nining a enrete rieshie, makha tan kha shah rosho, khan hai kha loi rosho.
46011029	Urutuk boi awmchan a aneh-ashah ama kha na amatak chung a chawngshatna pe rang a inek-ishak inih. Ajarla Pumi pum chung khan mulungmining thaning a peh mak.
46011030	Mahi jar hin nang kar ua mi tampui na takshon, ana, khan athi inih.
46011031	Ajarla ninining ua ennerete nana uatu, nuchung ua chawngshat naw nih.
46011032	Inia nuchung ua chawngshat phakhan, kieini hi Pumi na inimidik inih. Makha kieini hi manmieshie le nahengchenna boi rang a inih.
46011033	Khajarkhan uliennai hai, aneh rang lawpkhat a nang vak ruchun u phakhan, khatlekhat rangak nana u roh.
46011034	Inia tukhat kha vawncham pe joiatu, i`in ah vak neh rosho. Khanawkatu chawngshatna rang a nang vak ruchun u inih. Inia shik chonmun hai rang tu, kavat phakhan, midik rang kanih.
46012001	Khan uliennai hai, rathalam khutchawi hai chungchanga nangijet boi u rang a kha kiei dit mi`ing.
46012002	Nangni hi Phungshik nangruchang u lai khan, laminurukai pe u kha ang a, chawngthieiboi konrilim tieng khan shehawng a nuruchawi u, iti kha nangjet uh.
46012003	Khajarkhan nangni dieng kinemejet u hi inih, makhala Pathien Ratha jar a achawng tute na “Jesu kha pumbot chang rosho,” ti mak, khan Ratha Riethieng jar a niboia, tute na “Jesu hi Pumi inih,” ti ngam mak.
46012004	Khutchawi hai hi shikshik awm, inia Ratha khatte inih.
46012005	Pathien chon hai kha shikshik awm, inia Pumi khatte inih.
46012006	Chonmun hai kha shikshik awm, inia Pathien khatte na mi kholok dieng chon ithaw inih.
46012007	Inia kholok nemna rang mi rikip dieng Ratha ralarna kha ipek inih.
46012008	Ajarla Ratha jar a tukhat dieng lungvar chawng kha ipek inih, shik `khat dieng makha Ratharilik jar a, shingna chawng kha ipek inih.
46012009	Shik `khat dieng makha Ratha kha na takashawn kha ipek inih, khan shik `khat dieng makha Ratha kha na madamna khutchawi kha ipek inih.
46012010	Shik `khat dieng chonrekhek thawna, shik `khat dieng chawngrophongna, shik `khat dieng ratha hai kha kairekhemashakna, shik `khat dieng chawng shikshik, shik `khat dieng chawngshik hai kha melerna khutchawi hai kha ipek inih.
46012011	Inia Ratha khatte na hihai kholok hi ithaw inih, ama idit dungjuia a mi rikip dieng ipekrim inih.
46012012	Ajarla pum hi `khat nita`awm, pasha tampui ieniei. Makha pum `khat khan pasha tampui awm joiawm, amani kha pum `khat anih kha ang a, Christa kha`awm kha inih.
46012013	Ajarla pum `khat khan Jihudi nit a, Greek nit a, shok nit a, moshok nita`awm, Ratha `khat jar a nawlawpsheng u na baptisma kha niloi u inih. Khan Ratha khatte kha inemenek u inih.
46012014	Ajarla pum kha pasha khatte nimak a tampui inih.
46012015	“Kiei hi khut kha kinit boi jarkhan, kiei hi pum khan jaw mi`ing,” tia ke kha na ti jarkhan, pum khan ajaw boi maw nih?
46012016	“Kiei hi mik kha kinit boi jarkhan, pum khan kiei jaw mi`ing,” tia nokor kha na ti jarkhan, pum khan a ajaw boi maw nih?
46012017	Pumplang kha na mik kha nit joiala, ih na maw rangai nih? Pumplang kha na rangai a la, ih na maw manam nih?
46012018	Inia tun Pathien na pasha rikip kha pum khan ama imining dungjuia itetrim inih.
46012019	Khan amani kha pasha khatte nitjoiala, pum kha ih ah maw awm nih?
46012020	Khania pasha tampui awm, inia pum kha khatte inih.
46012021	Mik kha na khut dieng “Kiei na nang kha narangai mi`ing,” khan lu kha na ke dieng “Kiei na nang kha narangai mi`ing,” tithiei naw nih.
46012022	Makha le kairekhe a, pum shung ah adawkdet a malang pasha kha runieitak `khat inih.
46012023	Khan pum shung ah runiei nimak, tia nimining pasha kha runieidet inih. Khan inishawn boi pasha kha teniredet inih.
46012024	Inia nimoroidet pasha kha tenredet rang, rangai mak. Inia Pathien na adawkdet pasha kha mieliendet a, pum kha ikon inih.
46012025	Makha pum shung ah reshenna awmna boi rang le pasha hai kha na ra`angre a khatlekhat dieng tenreh nana rang a inih.
46012026	Khan pasha `khat kha nat joiatu, pasha kholok kha ama le anashom inih. Ninawkle pasha `khat kha na lurna muk joiatu, pasha kholok na ama le ningaishom inih.
46012027	Nangni Christa pum kha nangnih u joi, khan khatkhat a makha pum pasha kha nangnih u joi.
46012028	Khan hihaihi Pathien na biekrup shung a imadan inih: akhat changna a tirtawn hai, adi changna a thiempulien hai, athum changna a oja hai, khashole chonrekhek thaw hai, khashole madamna khutchawi amuh hai, mishan miring hai, inlevaipona, chawng shikshik a chawng miring hai kha inih.
46012029	Mi rikip kha tirtawn maw nih? Mi rikip kha thiempulien hai kha maw nih? Mi kholok kha oja hai kha maw nih? Mi rikip kha chonrekhek thaw hai kha maw nih?
46012030	Mi rikip na madamna khutchawi maw niei? Mi rikip na chawngshik a maw chawng? Mi rikip na meler maw?
46012031	Khania athadet khutchawi hai kha mulungluttak a dit u roh. Khan kiei na athadet lam kha numumuk u rang kanih.
46013001	Kiei na miring hai le ravantir hai chawng a kachawng joiawm, numpok kha kieniei joi nawkatu, imiri khong ninawkle thirkhong kha le ra`ang kanih.
46013002	Khan chawng rophongna khutchawi kha kieniei joiawm, murukchawng kholok le shingna kholok kha kejet joiawm, khan mo hai kha thawtna rang, takashawn kholok kha kieniei joiawm, numpok kha kieniei joi nawkatu, kiei iawm nimi`ing.
46013003	Khan shara hai vaina rang, kienieinak kholok kha kepek joiawm, khan kupum kha ha rang kepek joiawm, numpok kha kieniei joi nawkatu, kiei dieng nemna iawm nepeh mak.
46013004	Numpok tu ashawt a odoi, khan roihoi inih, numpok na manarshie thaw mak, numpok na nining a mapak mak, khan lienrasha mak.
46013005	Numpok na rum mak, ama rangbak khan tawk mak, baitek a shang mak, ashie kha mining mak.
46013006	Dikna boi khan ningai mak, inia adik khan ningai.
46013007	Nieinak kholok kha odoi, nieinak kholok kha takashawn, nieinak kholok kha ngakmining, nieinak kholok kha ruput.
46013008	Numpok tu shukcho a cho mak. Inia chawngrophong hai kha mawngawh rangnih, chawngshik hai kha rangatna awm rangnih, khan shingna kha mathang rangnih.
46013009	Ajarla khoite kha nijet u inih, khan khoite a nirophong u inih.
46013010	Inia rupumping kha jong phakhan, rupumpingna kha mathang rangnih.
46013011	Kiei na naite kuruchanglai, naite ang a kuruchawng, naite ang a kurujet, naite ang a kurumining. Inia kawhawngchang phakhan, naite awmchan hai kha kapai joi.
46013012	Ajarla tun mengsheng a varjinglam a nimuk u inih, inia makha nimiktak na riethienghiei a numuk u rangnih, tun khoite kha kijet inih, inia nuk a Pathien na inejet hi ang a, urupum a kejet rangnih.
46013013	Khan takashawn, ngakmining, numpok, hihai `thum hi, awm. Khania hihai kar a alienving tu numpok hi inih.
46014001	Numpok kha rojo u roh, rathalam khutchawi hai kha ningaw u roh. Aliendet a rophongna rang ratha khutchawi kha ningaw u roh.
46014002	Ajarla chawngshik a chawng miring kha na miring hai dieng a chawngiriei nimak a, Pathien dieng a chawngiriei inih, ajarla tute na ama chawngriei kha jet pe mak. Nitjoiawm ratha jar a murukchawng kha iriei inih.
46014003	Inia chawngirophong ama kha na rawshawnna le mawshawkna chawng, khan mulung renemna chawng kha iriei inih.
46014004	Chawngshik a achawng ama kha nining a rawshawn inih, inia chawngirophong ama kha na biekrup kha irawshawnmashak inih.
46014005	Nang kholok na chawngshik a achawng rang kadit, inia chawngnangirophong u rang kha kaditdet. Ajarla biekrup rawshawnna rang, ama na meler joi nawkatu, chawngirophong ama kha chawngshik a achawng amanek khan liendet.
46014006	Inia tun, uliennai hai, chawngshik a chawnglam a nangni dieng kava a, chawngrophong ninawkle varna ninawkle rophongchawng ninawkle miruchukna a kieriei nawkala, imaw nenemna u rawng?
46014007	Phukniei boi thieikhang ninawkle shalangdar kha na he moshok. Hesho hai khan kairekhena awm joi nawkatu, idai kha thieikhang maw nih, ninawkle shalangdar maw nih, iti kha itia maw jet nih?
46014008	Ajarla tekawlawi kha na munmangboi hesho kha moshok joiala, tu na maw rathaw rang rasham nih?
46014009	Nangniawm kha inih, mieliei kha le baitek a jetna rang chawngnangriei u nawkatu, nangiriei u kha itia maw jet nih? Rithi kar a chawngniriei u kha chang rangnih.
46014010	Manmieshie shung hin chawng tampui a`awm inih. Amani kha tina niei boi `khatshe awm mak.
46014011	Khajarkhan kiei na chawng kha tina kejet nawkala, chawngrieipa dieng kiei hi mejet boi kachang rangnih, khan chawng arieipa kha kiei dieng mejet boi chang rangnih.
46014012	Nangni diengawm khatak kha inih, nangni na ratha khutchawi kha ningnangaw u jarkhan, makha biekrup rawshawnna rang a athadet kha tawk u roh.
46014013	Khajarkhan chawngshik a achawng ama kha na melerna rang, Pathien dieng nikna niei rosho.
46014014	Ajarla kiei na chawngshik a nikna kieniei a tu, karatha na inik inih, inia kijetna kha ara boi inih.
46014015	Khanitala imaw nih? Kiei na ratha le nikna niei rang kanih, khan kiei na kijet chawng a`awm nikna niei rang kanih. Kiei na ratha le lah thaw rang kanih, khan kijet chawng a`awm kiei na lah thaw rang kanih.
46014016	Khanawkatu, ratha le mapakna nangniei phakhan, itia maw arangaithiei boi miring kha na nangiriei kha jet boi jarkhan nimapak na chawng khan “Amen,” tinih?
46014017	Ajarla nang na mapakna chawng kha thaning a nangriei, inia shik miring kha na rawshawnna niei mak.
46014018	Nang kholok nek a chawngshik a kachawng jarkhan, kapathien kha kamapak.
46014019	Jetthiei boi chawngrama bawp shawm kirieinek khan, biekrup shung a mi kuruchukna rang, kiei na jetthiei chawngrama rahngabak kha riei rawng.
46014020	Uliennai hai, jetnathiei khan naite hai chang u naw roh, inia ashie chon khan naishen hai kha chang u roh. Inia jetnathiei khan puichang kha nih u roh.
46014021	Dan ah hitihin miejiek: “Miring chawngshik le milak hai ner a, hi miring dieng hin chawngriei rang kanih. Khashe khan amani na kawchawng kha rangai u naw nih,” tia Pumi na ieriei.
46014022	Khajarkhan chawngshik hai hi jetna `khat inih, takashawn hai dieng a nimak a takashawn boi hai dieng a inih. Inia rophongchawng hi takashawn boi hai rang a nimak a takashawn miring hai rang a inih.
46014023	Khajarkhan biekrup miring kholok na mun `khat ah vak ruchun a mi rikip na chawngshik a chawng u joiala, makha mun ah ajet boi ninawkle takashawn boi miring vak lut hai kha na nangvet u joi, niti u naw nih maw?
46014024	Inia mi rikip na chawngrophong a, takashawn boi `khat ninawkle ajet boi miring `khat va joiatu, kholok na ama kha mawjawthet, khan kholok na ama chung a enretena kha ieniei.
46014025	Khatikhan umulung irawt kha mawlawng pe a ama na bawklap a Pathien kha chubai abawk rangnih, khan Pathien hi nangni kar a awmhet, tia rophong rangnih.
46014026	Khanitala mahi imaw nih, uliennai hai? Nangni na nang vak ruchun u phakhan, lah kha nangnieirim uh, ruchukna kha nangniei uh, chawngshik kha nangniei uh, chawngrophong kha nangniei uh, melerna kha nangniei uh. Hihai kholok hi rawshawnna rang a thaw chang rosho.
46014027	Tukhat na chawngshik a chawng a tu, idi ninawkle rawptak a uthum, dawna chawng riei rosho, khan akhat na meler rosho.
46014028	Inia meler miring awm nawkatu, biekin khan awmchien rieshie ibing dieng le Pathien dieng khan chawng riei rosho.
46014029	Thiempulien idi ninawkle uthum na chawng riei rosho, khan shik miring hai kha na mushung rosho.
46014030	Inia rophongchawng kha iedieng ah ashuh ama dieng khan jong joiatu, akhat changna miring kha na awmchien rosho.
46014031	Mi kholok na jetna rang le lungar pekna rang, nang kholok na dawna chawng nangrophongthiei uh.
46014032	Khan thiempulien hai ratha kha thiempulien hai awnoi a awm inih.
46014033	Ajarla Pathien hi reheshuna Pathien kha nimak a, miriethieng hai biekrup kholok shung a kha ang a, ama hi lungdamna apeh Pathien kha inih.
46014034	Nang nupang hai kha na biekrup khan awmchien u rosho, ajarla amani dieng chawngrieina rang jawt pe mak. Inia Dan na iriei dungjuia amani na luraw thaw a a`awm u rang a inih.
46014035	Khan amani na ih `khat kha ruchuk jawt u joiatu, i`inkopa hai dieng in ah rawdawn u rosho. Ajarla nupang `khat na biekin ah chawngiriei rang kha jaknaroi `khat inih.
46014036	Ninawkle, Pathien chawng kha nangni ah put ah hawng put maw nih? Ninawkle nangni dieng ranga vak tung maw nih?
46014037	Tukhat na nining a thiempulien ninawkle rathalam miring kha kanih ti joiatu, kiei na kimiejiek chawng hai hi Pumi chawngpek hai kha inih, tia loi rosho.
46014038	Inia tukhat na jet nawkatu, ajet boi kha chang rosho.
46014039	Khajarkhan uliennai hai, chawngrophong rang a kha ditmer u roh, khan chawngshik a chawngriei kha makha u naw roh.
46014040	Ih kholok kha imirit niei a le rieshieihiem a thaw chang rosho.
46015001	Uliennai hai, nangni dieng a kirophong athachawng kha tun nangni dieng kenemejet jawt uh. Makha nangni na niruloi ua, nirudingna u kha inih.
46015002	Kiei na nangni dieng kirurophong chawng kha nangrurakrep u joiatu, makha jar a shanna kha nangimuk u inih. Khanawkatu nemna boi a takanangrushawn u joi.
46015003	Ajarla kiei na`awm kirumuk kha rapapek a nangni dieng kinurupek u inih. Makhala, miejiek dungjuia Christa na numunu u jar a ruthi inih.
46015004	Khan miejiek dungjuia, ama kha rukhum ua, ni `thum changna khan hawng thoiret inih.
46015005	Khan ama kha Cephas na rumuk, khashole khaichawi shawmlieidi na rumuk uh.
46015006	Makha shole ama kha uliennai rajarahnga chung a na pha khatte a rumuk uh. Amani kar khan eshen ruthi u joiawm, arawpdet ring a awm u lai.
46015007	Makha shole ama kha James na rumuk, khashole tirtawn kholok na rumuk uh.
46015008	Khan dawngkhit a, pha niboia shok, kiei diengawm rular.
46015009	Ajarla kiei hi tirtawn tia koi rang a rutuk boi, tirtawn hai kar a ashinving kha kanih, ajarla Pathien biekrup kha kiei na shawna kirupek inih.
46015010	Inia Pathien numpokmirit jar a kiei hi hi kanih joi, kiei dieng a ama numpokmirit kha nemna boi ruchang mak. Ajarla kiei na amani kholoknek a chon kuruthawdet, nitjoiawm makha kiei na kiruthaw nimak a, Pathien numpokmirit kha na kiei dieng a iruthawna inih.
46015011	Khajarkhan kiei na ninawkle amani na nita`awm, hitihin a kirurophong ua khatikhan a takanangirushawn u inih.
46015012	Khan ama kha athi ah put ah hawng thoi joi, tia Christa kha rophong u joiala, itia nang kar ua eshen na athi ah put ah thoiretna awm mak, iti u maw nih?
46015013	Inia athi ah put ah thoiretna kha awm nawkatu, Christa kha rumothoi mak.
46015014	Khan Christa kha ruthoi joi nawkatu, kawchawngrophong u kha nemna boi inih, khan nang takashawn u kha`awm nemna boi inih.
46015015	Khan athi hai kha hawng thoihet boi nitjoiatu, kieini hi Pathien kungchang jok hai `khat a numuk u joi, ajarla kieini na ama na irumothoi boi Christa kha ama na rumothoi, tia Pathien kungchang kha kanih u joi.
46015016	Ajarla athi hai kha thoi joi nawkatu, Christa kha thoi mak.
46015017	Christa kha thoi joi nawkatu, nang takashawn u kha nemna boi inih, nang munu u hai khan nangawm u lai!
46015018	Khajarkhan Christa riming a ruthi miring hai kha thang u joi.
46015019	Mahi ringkho shung ranga hin Christa dieng ngakmining aniei kha nanih u joiatu, mi kholok hai kar a minek a numpokroi kha nanih u joi.
46015020	Inia Christa kha athi ah put ah thoi joi, khan athi miring hai akhat changna ara kha chang joi.
46015021	Miring `khat jar a thitna kha jong jarkhan, miring `khat jar a thitna ah put ah thoiretna kha`awm ajong inih.
46015022	Ajarla Adam jar a mi kholok ruthi kha ang a, Christa jar a mi kholokawm khatikhan miring rangnih.
46015023	Inia mi rikip na amama pha khan nih rangnih: Christa kha akhat changna ara kha inih, khashole ama jong phakhan, Christa tah achang miring hai kha thoi rangnih.
46015024	Rampona kholok, cham kholok khan ranak kholok kha dawng minit a, rengchangna kha Apa Pathien dieng pek phakhan, dawng kha jong rangnih joi.
46015025	Ajarla irahapui kholok kha eke thoi ah atet masheng, ama na rengchangngir rang a inih.
46015026	Imathang rang a irahapui dawngkhit kha tu thitna kha inih.
46015027	Ajarla “Ama na ih kholok kha eke thoi ah atet joi.” Inia “ih kholok kha eke thoi ah atet joi,” tia ama na ti phakhan, ih kholok ama thoi ah atet Pathien kha ajaw boi inih.
46015028	Khan nieinak kholok Christa thoi ah atet phakhan,shapa kha`awm, nieinak kholok ama thoi ah atet Pathien thoi ah awm rangnih. Makha Pathien kha kholok chung a Pumi changna rang a inih.
46015029	Athi hai ruhut a baptisma aloi hai kha na imaw thaw u nih? Athi hai kha na hawng thoihet nawkatu, ijar a amani rang a baptisma iloi u maw nih?
46015030	Ijar a nidan rikip a chitroina dingmun a awm maw nanih uh?
46015031	Nang jar ua nupumi u Christa Jesu dieng a kiniei lienrashatna kha jar a, ningthingkip kathi, tia kiriei inih.
46015032	Kiei na miring awmchan a, Ephesus ah ramsha hai kha le rakawthaw joiatu, kiei rang a nemna kha imaw nih? Athi hai kha na hawng thoi joi nawkatu, “Neh u rawi, khan shah u rawi, ajarla kieini jing a athi rang a nanih uh!”
46015033	Mi na inomohon u kha chang u naw roh. “Lawm tha boi kha na awmchan atha kha me`imieshiet inih.”
46015034	Mining ridiktak khan hawng kir u tana, munu thaw u naw roh, ajarla eshen na Pathien jetna lungvarshe kha niei mak. Mahi nang jakna u rang a kiriei inih.
46015035	Inia tukhat na ti rangnih, “Itia maw athi hai kha na hawng thoi nih? Khan ih pum kha le maw amani na hawng lar nih?
46015036	Aw amawng miring, nangivawr kha thi joi nawkatu miring naw nih.
46015037	Khan nangvawr phakhan, hawng mawng rang a kung kha vawr makche, inia rumomoi, gehu ninawkle tieitang ru kha nangivawr inih.
46015038	Inia Pathien na idit le roroia, muchi khan kung ipek inih; khan muchi rikip dieng ama na kung kha ipek inih.
46015039	Taksha kholok kha ra`angre nimak, inia miring hai taksha `khat, sha hai taksha `khat, nga hai taksha `khat, khan va hai taksha `khat a`awm inih.
46015040	Ravan pum hai le rieliei pum hai kha`awm awm, inia ravan lurna kha akhat inih, khan rieliei lurna kha shik inih.
46015041	Ni na lurna `khat ieniei, tha na lurna shik ieniei, khan arshi hai na lurna shik ieniei, ajarla arshi `khat lurna hi arshi `khat le kairekhe inih.
46015042	Athi ah put ah thoiretna kha`awm kha le ra`ang inih. Athangthiei a ivawr kha athangthiei boi a imothoi inih.
46015043	Richit boi a ivawr kha lurna khan imothoi inih. Dawkshamna a ivawr kha ranak khan imothoi inih.
46015044	Balam pum ivawr kha, rathalam pum khan imothoi inih. Balam pum kha a`awm inih, khan rathalam pum kha`awm a`awm inih.
46015045	Ajarla hitihin miejiek, “Akhat changna miring Adam kha aring miring hawng chang inih.” Dawngkhit Adam kha ringkho apeh ratha kha hawng chang.
46015046	Nitjoiawm rathalam kha masha nimak a balam kha masha inih, khashole rathalam kha inih.
46015047	Akhat changna miring kha rieliei tah inih, pieipak ah put ah ikon inih. Adi changna miring kha ravan ah put ah Pumi kha inih.
46015048	Pieipak ah put ah ikon miring kha, pieipak ah put ah ikon amani le ra`ang inih. Ravan ah put ah anih miring kha, ravan ah put ah anih amani kha le ra`ang inih.
46015049	Khan pieipak miring rilim kha kieini na niloi u hi le ra`ang a, kieini na ravan miring rilim kha`awm noloi u rangnih.
46015050	Uliennai hai, taksha le thishen kha na Pathien Rengchangna kha tum ngam naw nih, khan athangthiei nieinak kha na athangthiei boi nieinak kha tum ngam naw nih, tia kiriei inih.
46015051	En u roh, kiei na nangni dieng murukchawng kha kiriei inih: nokholok na miei naw minih, inia kieini hi menotho pe rangnih.
46015052	Makha pha bawngte shung a, mikmichim `khat shung a, dawngkhit tekawlawi kha miri phakhan, nih rangnih. Ajarla tekawlawi miri phakhan, athi hai kha athangthiei boi rang khan thoi rangnih, khan kieini hi menotho pe rangnih.
46015053	Ajarla mahi athangthiei hi na athangthiei boi kha irieshieingir rang a inih, khan mahi athithiei hi na athithiei boi kha irieshieingir rang a inih.
