46015054	Khajarkhan mahi athangthiei hi na athangthiei boi kha irieshiei, khan mahi athithiei hi na athithiei boi hi rieshiei phakhan, mahi chawngriei hi hawng shok rangnih. Hitihin rumiejiek, “Ramawtawr kha na athi kha ava joi.”
46015055	“Aw thitna, nang tur kha khoshekawt ah maw awm joi? Aw Thikho, nang ramawtawr kha khoshekawt ah maw awm joi?”
46015056	Thitna tur kha tu munu kha inih, khan munu ranak kha tu dan kha inih.
46015057	Inia nupumi u Jesu Christa jar a ramawtawr napeh Pathien dieng mapak chang rosho.
46015058	Khajarkhan kunumpok uliennai hai, dingrep u roh, meperthiei boi kha chang u roh. Pumi rang khan nang chonthaw u kha nemna boi chang mak, iti kha jet u tana Pumi chon kha mulungluttak a thaw jawnjai u roh.
46016001	Khan miriethieng hai rang a thawlawm chungchanga, Galatia biekrup hai dieng a chawngkirupek kha ang a, nangniawm khatikhan thaw u roh:
46016002	Hapta a akhat changna nikho khan nangni khatkhat na ih kha nita`awm nangimadan u rang a shok. Nanginieidan u dungjuia makha thaw u roh. Makha kiei na nangni dieng kavat phakhan, thawlawm thawna rangaina boi rang a inih.
46016003	Kiei na kavat phakhan, nangmulung ua achu miring hai kha chawngmawchawi le khutchawi hai kha achawi rang, Jerusalem ah tir rang kanih.
46016004	Kieiawm kashe rang a kha iriding nitjoiatu, kiei le she u rangnih.
46016005	Khan Macedonia kha kavaklut shole, nangni dieng va rang kanih, ajarla Macedonia khan she rang kanih.
46016006	Nangni le ka`awmbawt jawt, ninawkle phabishawt khan nangni le ka`awmawm jawt. Makha kokhomijin shena ih mun khan nita`awm nangnashanna u rang a inih.
46016007	Ajarla lampapawt nawthaw jawt u mi`ing, inia Pumi na jawt joiatu, nangni le phabawng `khat awmna rang kimining.
46016008	Inia Ephesus khan Pentecostshe awm rang kanih.
46016009	Ajarla kiei rang hin ranak moshok a chon thawna rang, mawkawt `khat hi rajaitak a mawlawng joi, inia nere`erpui tampui awm.
46016010	Timothy kha nangni dieng va joiatu, chih boi a awmna rang, tinta u roh. Ajarla ama na`awm kithaw hi ang a, Pumi chon kha ithaw inih.
46016011	Khajarkhan tute na ama kha maimawk peh naw rosho. Inia kiei dieng vatna rang, lungdamtak a vak tir u roh, ajarla ama kha uliennai hai le ngak a ka`awm inih.
46016012	Khan nu`uliennai u Apollos chungchanga tu, uliennai hai kha le nangni dieng vatna rang hin enchak a kimawshawk inih, inia vatna rang hin tun hin mulungmining niei mak, inia chanthatna muk phakhan, va rangnih.
46016013	Riring u roh, takashawn khan dingrep u roh, rang u roh, khan ranak niei u roh.
46016014	Nangithaw u kholok kha numpok le roroi rosho.
46016015	Uliennai hai, kinawmawshawk u inih. Stephanas inshungkhur kha nangjet uh. Makha Achaia ah akhat changna ara kha inih. Amani kha miriethieng hai chon thawna khan mulunglut `khat nih uh.
46016016	Makha nangni na kha`ang miring, kieini le chon thaw kholok dieng, nangbutna u rang a inih.
46016017	Stephanas, Fortunatus le Achaicus na nangni dieng va jarkhan, kiningai, ajarla nang ravatna u khan amani na imiship inih.
46016018	Ajarla karatha le nang ratha u kha inamathar pe u inih. Khajarkhan kha ang miring hai runiei changna kha jet pe u roh.
46016019	Asia biekrup hai na chubai nepek uh. Pumi riming a Aquila le Priscilla, khan amani in ah awm biekrup kholok na chubai rothom nepek uh.
46016020	Uliennai kholok na chubai nepek uh. Biengrutum riethieng kha le khatlekhat chubai repeh u roh.
46016021	Chubai pekna hi Paul, kiei na kukhuttak le kimiejiek inih.
46016022	Tukhat na Pumi Jesu Christa kha numpok joi nawkatu, ama dieng pumbotna kha chang rosho. Maranatha!
46016023	Nupumi u Jesu Christa numpokmirit kha nangni le awm rosho.
46016024	Christa Jesu riming a nang kholok chung a kunumpok hi a`awm nih rosho. Amen.
47001001	Pathien mulungmining jar a Jesu Christa tirtawn, Paul kiei le uliennai Timothy na Corinth ah awm Pathien biekrup dieng le Achaia kholok a awm miriethieng hai dieng kiemiejiek uh.
47001002	Napa u Pathien le Pumi Jesu Christa ah put ah numpokmirit le lungdamna kha nangni dieng a`awm nih rosho.
47001003	Nupumi u Jesu Christa apa le Pathien kha mapak chang rosho. Ama hi roihoina apa le lam rikip a lungar apeh Pathien kha inih.
47001004	Kieini na shawrana kholok a acho amani kha, Pathien na kieini dieng a inurupek lungar kha pekna rang, nawshawrana kholok khan ama na lungar nepek uh.
47001005	Ajarla Christa shawna hai kha kieini dieng ruphu a awm kha ang a, Christa jar a lungar kha kieini dieng ruphu a awm.
47001006	Kieini na shawna kodoi uatu, makha nang lungarna u le nang shandamna u rang a inih. Kieini na maw`awina kha kieniei uatu, makha nangni rang maw`awina kha nitna rang a inih. Makha kieini na kidoi u doiratna kha le ra`ang shawna kha nangdoina u rang a inih.
47001007	Khan nangni rang a kangakmining u hi rephet boi inih. Ajarla shawna hai khan atumshom nangnitak u kha ang a, lungarna kha`awm atumshom rang nangnih u, iti kha kieini na kejet uh. 2
47001008	Ajarla uliennai hai, Asia ah ashok kawshawna u kha nangni na nangijet boi u rang kha dit u mi`ing. Kidoi ngam boi rang a kha le ajeng a nachep uh. Khajarkhan aring rangshe rumining u mi`ing.
47001009	Diktak a thitna rang a chawngshatna kha kieniei u joi, tia kurumining uh. Makha kieinirilik dieng niboia, athi miring hai mothoipa Pathien dieng takashawnna rang a inih.
47001010	Ama na khadawr a chitroi thitna ah put ah inurukhek ua, kieini hi inakhek inih. Ama na nakhek rangnilai, tia`awm ama dieng ngakmining kha kieniei uh.
47001011	Nangni na`awm kieini rang nikna a nangnarashap pui uh. Makha vanoi nikna jar a kieini dieng inurupek u khutchawi chungchanga kuruhut ua mi tampui na mapakna nieina rang a inih.
47001012	Ajarla kielienrashatna u kha hi inih: kulungthim u kungchangna kha tu manmieshie shung a, khan aliendet a nang maikung ua mulungriem le Pathien ah put ah mulung riethieng a karing u hi inih. Makha rieliei lungvar jar a nimak a Pathien numpokmirit jar a inih.
47001013	Ajarla nangite u le nangijet u kha niboia, shik iawm miejiek u mi`ing.
47001014	Kieini hi khoi `khat a nanginejet u hi ang a, kholok a nangjet u rangnih, tia ngakkimining. Makha Pumi Jesu Nikho khan nangni jar a lienkarashah u hi ang a, nangni na`awm kieini jar a liennangrashatna u rang a inih.
47001015	Khan mahi rangamna hi le nangni dieng matieng vatna rang kirudit inih. Makha nangni na voidi changna nemna kha nangnieina u rang a inih.
47001016	Makhala Macedonia ah keshena khan nangni kha vak pa a, Macedonia ah put ah nangni dieng kavakkir, khan Judea ah keshena khan nangnashan u rangnih.
47001017	Khajarkhan kiei na hitihin a kirashak hin, kiei na baitek a kithaw maw nih? Ninawkle, kirashak chon hi “Awh” kha “Awh,” khan “Nang” kha “Nang,” tina rang, taksha dungjuia kirashak maw nih?
47001018	Pathien tu takashawn rang a rutuk anih le roroia, nangni dieng kawchawngriei u kha “Awh” le “Nang” tina rang a nimak.
47001019	Ajarla nangni dieng a kirurophong u Pathien Shapa Jesu Christa kha kiei kinit a, Silvanus nit a, khan Timothy nita`awm, “Awh” le “Nang” tina rang a nimak, inia “Awh” iti kha ama jar a inih.
47001020	Ajarla ama jar a Pathien chawngrakham kholok kha “Awh” inih, khan ama jar a “Amen” inih. Hitihin Pathien lurna kha miring hai na kieini dieng inurupekna u inih.
47001021	Khan Christa jar a nangni le kieini ranak nurupek a thaonurunawt ama kha Pathien inih.
47001022	Ama na`awm kieini hi jetnanamna u joi, khan numulung u shung a Ratha kha rentukna `khat a kieini dieng nurupek joi.
47001023	Corinth ah kavakkirnaret boi kha kawnawmawshawna boi u rang a inih, iti hin Pathien kha kukungchang rang, kokoi uh.
47001024	Makha nang takashawn u kha dekna rang nimak, inia nang ningaina u rang, nangni le chonkithawshom u inih. Ajarla takashawn jar a ading nangnih uh.
47002001	Inia nangni kha mulungshaw apeh valai naw ning, tia kinining a mulung kirumiding inih.
47002002	Ajarla kiei na nang mulung kawnawmawshaw pe u joiala, kiei na mulung kimawshawmashak nangni na niboia, tu na maw kiei dieng ningaina kha nepeh nih?
47002003	Khan kiei na kavat phakhan, ningai kimukna rang a amani dieng mulungshaw kumukna boi rang, makhatak kha nangni dieng kirumiejiek inih. Khan kiningaina hi nang kholok ningaina kha inih, iti hi nang kholok dieng rangamna pui kieniei.
47002004	Ajarla shawrana kha mulungkoina le roroia mikrithi tampui cholam a, nangni dieng kimiejiek inih. Makha nangni kha lungshawna pek boi a kiei na ajeng a numkonopok u, iti kha nangjetna u rang a inih.
47002005	Inia tukhat na mulungshaw kha nepek u joiatu, kiei dieng tu mulungshaw kha nepeh maklai. Inia idawrshe tu, nang kholok dieng ithaw nih joi. Mahi kiei na mopoi boi a kiriei inih
47002006	Tampui na ama dieng a ipek shawna kha, kha ang miring rang tu, ahun nih joi.
47002007	Shir `khat tieng, mulungshaw na adona boi rang, ama kha rangaidam a maw`awi u roh.
47002008	Khajarkhan ama dieng numpok kha menetna rang, kinawmawshawk u inih.
47002009	Ajarla nangni na irikip a chawng maw nangjui u, iti kha kejetna rang, danenna `khat a kirumiejiek inih.
47002010	Nangni na tukhat kha rangaidam nangpek u joiatu, kiei na`awm kepek. Ajarla kiei na`awm tukhat dieng rangaidam kawthaw joiatu, nangni rangbak a Christa maikung a kithaw inih.
47002011	Makha Satan na chanthatna kha loina boi rang a inih, ajarla ama chonrashak hai kha kijet boi u nimak.
47002012	Khan Troas ah Christa athachawng rophongna rang, kavat phakhan, Pumi na kiei rang mawkawt `khat nurumawlawng pe joi.
47002013	Ku`uliennai Titus kha kumuk boi jarkhan, karatha a shawmuchumna kha rumuh mi`ing. Khajarkhan amani kha mathan a Macedonia ah kurushe joi.
47002014	Inia Christa riming a ra nawmawtawrmashak jawnjai le kieini jar a ama varna manamhoi kha mun rikip a moshok Pathien dieng khan mapak chang rosho.
47002015	Ajarla Pathien dieng kieini hi ishan a awm hai le athang hai dieng Christa manamhoi kha nanih uh.
47002016	Khan tukhat dieng kieini hi thitna rang a thitna manam kha nanih uh, khan shik `khat dieng kieini hi ringna rang a ringna manam kha nanih uh. Hihai rang hin tumaw rutuk awm?
47002017	Ajarla mi tampui hai kha ang a, Pathien chawng khan rievieithaw kha nih u makme, inia mulung riethieng a chon thaw `khat a le Pathien ah put ah kha ang a, Christa riming a Pathien maikung a chawng kha niriei u inih.
47003001	Kieini le kieini hi takthar a tharieiret nana rang maw nanih uh? Ninawkle, mi eshen hai ang a, nangni dieng ninawkle nangni ah put ah thariei chawngmawchawi hai kha kirangai u maw nih?
47003002	Nangni hi kholok na ijet le ite kumulung shung ua miejiek kawchawngchawi u kha nangnih uh.
47003003	Nangni kha kieini na chon kithaw pe u, Christa chawngmawchawi kha nangnih u, tia Pathien na namalar u joi. Muktui le imiejiek nimak a aring Pathien Ratha le imiejiek kha inih. Lungpek hai chung ah imiejiek nimak a miring mulung hai lungpek chung ah imiejiek inih.
47003004	Christa jar a Pathien dieng kha ang rangamna pui kha kieini na kieniei uh.
47003005	Ih kha nita`awm kajar ua hawng put inih, tia miningna rang, kibingte ua rupum nih u mi`ing, inia kurupumna u hi Pathien ah put ah ajong inih.
47003006	Ama na`awm rawjawtna athar chon thaw hai `khat a inurutukmashak inih. Kieini na dan miejiek khan chonnithaw u nimak a Ratha chon kha nithaw u inih, ajarla dan miejiek kha na athat, inia Ratha kha na ringna ipek inih.
47003007	Inia lung hai chung ah ikhet a miejieksho thitna chonthaw kha alur ruchang a Moses maisho kha ahek dedet lurna jarkhan, Israel nai hai na ama mai kha ridingpip a ruen ngam u nawkatu,
47003008	itia Ratha chon thawna kha alurdet boi rang a maw nih?
47003009	Ajarla hengna chonthaw kha na lurna niei joiala, dikna chonthaw kha na akhedet a lurna iniei inih.
47003010	Mahin ajeng a lur hi na jar chang a alur a ruawm kha na lurna nieilai mak.
47003011	Ajarla ruheksha kha na rulur joiala, tuntun a awm hi na lurna nieidet.
47003012	Kha`ang ngakmining kha kieniei u jarkhan, rangamer a chawngkiriei u inih.
47003013	Jong hek dedet lurna kha Israel nai hai na ridingpip a enna boi rang, ama maisho a maikhar akawp, Moses kha a`ang nih u makme.
47003014	Inia amani mulungmining kha rumichimmashak pe uh. Ajarla vonshe hin Rawjawtna Lui kha rute u phakhan, makha maikhartak kha lik boi a awmlai. Ajarla Christa dieng a takashawn ranga kha na makha ilik ngam rang a inih.
47003015	Inia vonshe hin Moses behangbuk kha te u phakhan, maikhar kha amani mulung a awm pe uh.
47003016	Inia tukhat na Pumi dieng mai miehiei phakhan, maikhar kha loi pe joi.
47003017	Pumi hi Ratha inih, khan Ratha awmna khan ningchamna kha awm.
47003018	Mengsheng ah muk ang a Pumi lurna kha, maikhar jaw boi mai kha le, nokholok na ne`en phakhan, lurna ah put ah lurna khan, makha rilimtak khan nechenkon u lai. Mahi lurna hi Pumi Ratha ah put ah ajong inih.
47004001	Khajarkhan kieini na roihoina kirumuk u kha ang a, mahi chonmun hi kaman u jarkhan, mulung rakaina kha niei u mi`ing.
47004002	Inia kieini na jakna nieinak rethe hai kha kurumiei u joi. Mohonna khan lawn u mi`ing khan Pathien chawng kha`awm pawrmechet u mi`ing, Inia adik kha malar a Pathien maikung a miring hai lungthim rikip khan mathat nana kieniei uh.
47004003	Inia ka`athachawng u kha mukhu joiawm, athang miring hai dieng a imukhu pe inih.
47004004	Takashawn boi hai amani mulungmining kha mahi rong pathien na mik mawchawmashak joi. Makha, Pathien rilim, Christa lurna athachawng mieivar kha amani chung a varna boi rang a inih.
47004005	Ajarla kieinirilik kha rophong u mi`ing, inia Pumi Jesu Christa kha kirophong u inih. Khan Jesu jar a kieini hi nang shok u kha kanih uh.
47004006	Ajarla ajing ah put ah mieivar kha var rosho ati Pathien momoi kha na mieivar pekna rang, numulung u shung a nurueh joi. Makha mieivar kha Jesu Christa maikung a Pathien lurna ijet kha inih.
47004007	Inia mahi bawmniei hi lieibe hai shung khan kieini na niniei u inih. Rakamthoiboi ranak kha kieini ah put ah niboia, Pathien ah put ah nitna rang a inih.
47004008	Irikip a kieini hi ine`ep u inih, inia rawnawinek u mi`ing. Awkchak a natet uh, inia mulung rakaina niei u mi`ing.
47004009	Epshawna nepek uh, inia napai u mak. Nawvawr uh, inia namathangvieng u mak.
47004010	Pum shung a Pumi Jesu athi kha kichawi jawnjai u inih. Makha kupum u shung a Jesu ringna kha ralarna rang a inih.
47004011	Ajarla aring a awm kieini hi Christa jar a thitna dieng nepek jawnjai uh. Makha athithiei kupum ua Jesu ringna kha`awm ralarna rang a inih.
47004012	Khajarkhan thitna kha na kieini dieng chonithaw inih, inia ringna kha na nangni dieng chonithaw inih.
47004013	Inia takashawn rathatak kha kieniei u jarkhan, imiejiek dungjuia, “Takakurushawn jar a kiruriei inih,” kieini na`awm takakurushawn u jarkhan, kiriei u inih.
47004014	Ajarla Pumi Jesu rumothoipa kha na kieiniawm Jesu le nomothoi rangnih, khan nangni le kieini hi Pathien dieng nepek rangnih, iti kha kejet uh.
47004015	Ajarla nieinak kholok hi nangni jarbak a inih. Makha mi tampui jar a hawng pung numpokmirit kha na mapakna kha Pathien lurna khan mupungna rang a inih.
47004016	Khajarkhan mulung rakaina kha niei u mi`ing. Inia vai tieng a kimiring u kha kiem joiawm, kushung ua awm miring kha nikhonikho a imathar inih.
47004017	Ajarla ajong nawshawna u richinkhat le iniboi kha na rakamthoiboi kumshawt lurna khan kieini rang imoshok inih.
47004018	Mukthiei nieinak hai khan a ni`en u nimak a mukthiei boi nieinak hai khan a ni`en u inih. Ajarla mukthiei nieinak hai kha pha bawngte rang a inih, inia mukthiei boi nieinak hai kha kumshawt rang a inih.
47005001	Ajarla ni`in u achang taksha thamber hi mathang a`awm, khut le kon boi in, kumshawt a ravan a awm, Pathien ah put ah awmna, kha nieniei u, iti hi kieini na nejet uh.
47005002	Ajarla taksha thamber hin kieini hi nuruphuher u inih. Ajarla ravan ah put ah ni`in u kha rieshieina rang, kieini na niditmer u inih.
47005003	Makha nirieshieihet u nitjoiatu, kieini hi rekengver u naw minih.
47005004	Ajarla mahi thamber shung a awm kieini hi nuruphuher ua pokrik kha niruniei u inih. Ajarla, makha kieini na rieshiei boi a awm kha nidit u nimak a inierieshieimashak u rang a kha nadit u jar a inih. Makha thitna kha ringna kha na avana rang a inih.
47005005	Khan hihaitak hi kieini rang a inarasham pe ama kha Pathien inih. Ama na`awm rentukna `khat a Ratha kha kieini dieng inurupek inih.
47005006	Khajarkhan rangam jawnjai a na`awm uh. Makha kieini na taksha a na`awm u lai hin, Pumi ah put ah arala a awm nanih uh, iti hi nejet u jar a inih.
47005007	Ajarla kieini hi mikmuk jar a nimak a, takashawn jar a ring nanih uh.
47005008	Kieini na rangamna nieniei uh. Pumi le rala a awmnek khan Pumi le ranai a awm kha kiditdet u inih.
47005009	Khajarkhan arala a awm nit a anai a awm nita`awm, nikhinmun u tu ama rang ningnitroi nachangna u rang a inih.
47005010	Ajarla nokholok u na Christa chawngshatna shutna khan naleng u rangnih. Makha mi rikip na pum a atha nit a ashie nita`awm, amama ithaw dungjuia mukna rang a inih.
47005011	Khajarkhan Pumi chitna kha kejet ua, kieini na miring hai kha kidawi u inih, inia Pathien na thatak a inejet u inih. Khan mahiawm kiei na ngakkimining, makhala nang lungthim u hai khan kholok a nejet u, tia takakawshawn.
47005012	Ajarla nangni dieng takthar a kinining ua tharieina kha niei u mi`ing, inia kuruhut ua lienrashatna rang mun kinepek u inih. Makha na mulung shung a niboia mailang a lienrashatna aniei nangni chung a nangmashang ngamna u rang a inih.
47005013	Ajarla kieini hi avet kha kanih u joiawm, makha Pathien rang a inih. Kavet u nawkatu makha nangni rang a inih.
47005014	Ajarla Christa numpok kha na kieini hi inawmawthawngir u inih. Mahi kieini na nathirsho u joi jarkhan, mi kholok rang Mi khat hi ruthi inih. Makha dungjuia mi kholok ruthi inih.
47005015	Khan ama na mi kholok rang ruthi. Makha aring a awm amani kha na amani rangbak niboia, amani rang a ruthi a irumothoi, ama rang ringna rang a inih.
47005016	Khajarkhan tun ah put ah tute hi taksha dungjuia jet u makme. Christa kha taksha dungjuia nurujet u joiawm, tuntu ama kha khatikhan jet u lai makme.
47005017	Khajarkhan tukhat na Christa dieng awm joiatu, ama kha khutkon `thar kha nih joi. Alui nieinak kholok kha rupaisho a, enro, nieinak kholok hawng thar joi.
47005018	Nieinak kholok hi Pathien ah put ah ajong inih. Christa jar a Pathien na amarilik dieng khan nieriengieimashak joi. Ama na kieini dieng hin riengieina chonmun hi nepek joi.
47005019	Makhala, Christa jar a Pathien na manmieshie hi amarilik dieng riengieimashak joi. Ama na amani shietna hai kha te pe boi a, riengieina chawng kha kieini dieng khutnorothona joi.
47005020	Khajarkhan kieini hi Christa ruhuttir kha nanih joi. Makha Pathien na kieini dieng inawmaw`awina u a`ang inih. Pathien dieng riengiei u roh, tia kieini na Christa ruhut a kinawmawshawk u inih.
47005021	Munu rujet boi ama kha kieini rang munu irumachang inih. Makha ama jar a Pathien dikna kha ninitna u rang a inih.
47006001	Kieini hi Pathien le chonthawshom ang a, Pathien numpokmirit kha nemna boi a nangloina boi u rang, kinawmawshawk u inih.
47006002	Ajarla ama na ieriei, “Chanthatna pha `khat khan kiei na nang chawng kha karangai joi, khan shandamna nikho khan kunurushan joi.” Enro, tun hi chanthatna pha kha inih. Enro, tun hi shandamna nikho kha inih.
47006003	Pathien chon kithaw u kha biena boi rang, tute dieng bakna peh u mi`ing.
47006004	Kieini hi Pathien chon thaw hai kha nanih, iti hi chon rikip a kimalar u inih: doiratna tampui khan, shawrana khan, ravatna khan, phairavaina khan,
47006005	inejemna u hai khan, lungroko shung khan, mipui na inahokna u khan, chon thawna hai khan, jana pha mukna boi khan, vawnchamtuira doina khan,
47006006	riethieng khan, shingna khan, ashawt a shawna khan, ninghoina khan, Ratha Riethieng khan, miri`ir numpok khan,
47006007	adik chawng khan, Pathien ranak khan, viei le chang a dikna mieriem khan,
47006008	richit le maimieshietna khan, thangshietna le thanghoina khan, mimohon hai `khat a inoloi a adik `khat a,
47006009	meh jet boi inia meh jet `khat a, athi miring hai `khat a inia, enro, karing uh. Inachep u miring hai `khat a, inia nathat u mak,
47006010	mulungshaw miring hai `khat a kiningai jawnjai uh, sharachang’ khat a inia mi tampui kawrawchawngmashak uh. Ih niei boi `khat a inia nieinak kholok kieniei uh.
47006011	Aw Corinth miring hai, nangni dieng madangsheng a chawngkiriei u hi inih, nangni rang kumulung u hi rawlawnghawng a awm.
47006012	Nangni rang kunumpok u hi khar u mi`ing, inia kieini rang nang numpok u kha nangkhar u joi.
47006013	Kunumpoktak u kha ruhutthung `khat a kieini dieng hawng mutung u roh. Kiei na nangni dieng naite hai dieng a ang a kiriei inih.
47006014	Takashawn boi hai le rachan boi ringkaw rupushom kha chang u naw roh. Ajarla dikna le danishawnboi ruirakaina imaw awm? Khan mieivar le ajing ruirakaina imaw awm?
47006015	Khan Christa le Belial rawjawtna imaw awm? Ninawkle, takashawn le takashawn boi ruirakaina imaw awm?
47006016	Khan riethiengmun le rilim hai rawjawtna imaw awm? Ajarla nangni hi aring Pathien riethiengmun kha nangnih uh. Hitihin Pathien na ruti, “Kiei na amani dieng awm rang kanih, khan amani kar a lawn rang kanih. Kiei hi amani Pathien kha nih rang kanih, khan amani hi kimiring kha nih u rangnih.”
47006017	Khajarkhan “Amani ah put ah vak shok u tana rechen kha chang u roh. Orono kha shih u naw roh, khan nangni kha kiei na noloi u rang kanih,” tia Pumi na iti.
47006018	“Kiei hi nangpa u kha chang rang kanih, khan nangni hi kashapa hai le kashanu hai kha nangchang u rangnih,” tia Chungchon a ranakniei PUMI na iti.
47007001	Khajarkhan kunumpok hai, hihai chawngrakham hi nieniei u jarkhan, pum le ratha pawrchetna kholok ah put ah riethieng u taia Pathien chitna le riethiengna kha rupummashak u rawi.
47007002	Kieini hi nawpawm u roh. Tute dieng rehe u mi`ing, tute kha pawrmechet u mi`ing, tute kha mohon u mi`ing.
47007003	Nawngna rang kiriei nimak, ajarla thitnashom rang le ringnashom rang, nangni hi kumulung shung ua nangawm u joi, tia matieng kieriei joi.
47007004	Nangni dieng rangamer a chawngrieina kiniei hi ielien. Nang ruhut ua lienrashatna kiniei hi ielien. Mawshawkna hi kiei dieng ship a awm. Kawshawna u kholok chung a ajeng a ningaina kieniei.
47007005	Ajarla diktak a Macedonia ah kava u lai khan, pum a shawmuchumna niei u mi`ing, inia irikip a, vai tieng a roshona hai le khan shung a chitna hai kha kodoi uh.
47007006	Inia Titus na kieini dieng vat phakhan, mulungkoi hai dieng lungar apeh Pathien na lungarna kha nurupek uh.
47007007	Ama ava ranga kha niboia, ama dieng a nangirupek maw`awina jar a`awm inih. Kiei hi nangna`awi uh, mulung nangnumukurna uh, khan mulung nangnepekna u, iti kha ama ah put ah kurujet `le, lieklawr a kiningai.
47007008	Chawngmawchawi a nang mulung kanamanat pe u joiawm, shirna kieniei a`awm, kiei shir mi`ing. Ajarla makha chawngmawchawitak kha na phabawngte tu nang mulung inawmawshaw pe u kha kejet.
47007009	Tun kiningai, ajarla nang lungnatna u khan niboia a, mulung lekna kha nurupek u jar a inih. Ajarla Pathien na idit dungjuia mulungshaw kha nangnih uh. Makha kieini ah put ah thangna iawm nangnieina boi u rang a inih.
47007010	Ajarla Pathien idit dungjuia lungnatna kha na shandamna rang mulung lekna kha imoshok inih. Mahin shirna rang awm mak. Khania manmieshie dungjuia lungnatna kha na thitna kha imoshok inih.
47007011	Ajarla Pathien idit dungjuia, lungnatna kha na ara imaw moshok, iti kha en u roh: adik boi chung a chonthawrat, jar niei boi, ashang, chitna, ditrangai, mulunglut, adik boi kha ichep! Hihai kholok chung hin nang riethieng u, iti kha nangimumuk u inih.
47007012	Khajarkhan kiei na nangni dieng kiemiejiek joiawm, chon shie athawpa le makha ithawnapa chung a kithaw nimak, inia Pathien maikung a kinarena u kha nangni dieng larna rang a inih.
47007013	Khajarkhan Pathien na nawmawshawk u phakhan, kieini hi inawmawshawk inih. Titus ningaina khan kieini na ningaina liendet kieniei uh, ajarla nang kholok na ama mulung kha dawnthar nangimoloi u inih.
47007014	Ajarla ih khan nita`awm, nang jar ua Titus maikung a lienrashatna kha kieniei a kiei jakna niei mi`ing. Inia adik a nangni dieng ih kholok kiriei u hi ang a, Titus dieng a kielienrashatna u kha adik ruchang.
47007015	Ama kha lamjawng nangruthaw u lai khan, khadawr khan chitna le rawnawklam a nangruloi uh. Nang kholok chawngjuina kha mining a nangni dieng ama numpok kha ajeng a rashang pe.
47007016	Khajarkhan irikip a nangni dieng rangamna kieniei a kiningai.
47008001	Uliennai hai, Macedonia biekrup hai dieng irupek Pathien numpokmirit kha nangni dieng kenemejet uh.
47008002	Makhala, shawrana chungchanga enretena lientak kha runiei u joiawm, amani na ajeng a ningrungai pui uh. Amani kha ajeng a shararuchang u joiawm, rawchawng ang a, pekjawtna nieitak a rupek uh.
47008003	Ajarla imawtawrtuk ua le amani ranak na iphak ngam boishe khan amani na mulunglientak a pek jawt u, iti kha kungachang kanih.
47008004	Macedonia biekrup hai na khutchawi le khan miriethieng hai rachang puina rang a kha koloina u rang, ajeng a kieini hi nawdawi uh.
47008005	Khan kirumining u kha ang a niboia, Pathien mulungmining dungjuia, arapa a Pumi dieng le kieini dieng rurepeh u inih.
47008006	Khajarkhan, matieng a iruput kha ang a, nangni diengawm mahi numpokmirit hi rupummashakna rang, Titus kha kirumawshawk u inih.
47008007	Inia takashawn a, chawng a, shingna a, lunglutna a, kieini rang a nang numpok u khan irikip a nangruphu u kha ang a, mahi numpokmirit hinawm ruphu kha chang u roh.
47008008	Mahi chawngpek ang a kiriei nimak, inia shik miring hai mulunglut kha le enrete a nangnumpok u kha idawr maw riethieng, iti kha enkirete inih.
47008009	Ajarla Pumi Jesu Christa numpokmirit kha nangjet uh. Ama kha rawchawng joiawm, nangni rangbak khan, sharachang inih. Makha ama sharachangna khan rawchawng nangnitna u rang a inih.
47008010	Kawchawngpek tu hi inih: nikum a nangiruput u le nangiruthaw jawt u thawna khan mahi nangni rang a chanthatna ranga kha niboia,
47008011	tun awm nangiruthaw u kha rupummashak u roh. Thaw rang khan nangirudit ua nangrurasham u kha ang a, nanginiei dungjuia put ah makha rupummashak u roh.
47008012	Ajarla thawjawtna mulung kha arapa a awm joiatu, iniei boi dungjuia nimak a, iniei dungjuia Pathien na khutchawi iloi rang a kha rutuk inih.
47008013	Ajarla shik miring hai kha maw`aw a nangni kha shawna pek rang, tia kimining nimak.
47008014	Kha ruhut a, irikip rachanmashak rang hin kidit inih. Makha tun a nang ruphu u kha na amani ravatna kha mishipna rang le amani ruphu u kha na nang ravatna u kha miship a rachanshom a tetna rang a inih.
47008015	Hitihin miejiek, “Arawp a rawkhawm ama kha na rothom a iawm niei mak, atawm a rawkhawm ama kha na ravatna niei mak.”
47008016	Inia nangni rang a kiniei ra`angre tenretna Titus mulung a atet Pathien kha mapak chang rosho.
47008017	Ajarla ama na rachakna kha iruloi ranga niboia, mulung irulek a, ama idittak a, nangni dieng ava inih.
47008018	Khan athachawng chung a chonthaw jar a biekrup kholok na imapak uliennai kha ama le kivaktirshom u inih.
47008019	Inia kha ranga kha niboia, mahi numpokmirit hi le kijin puishom u rang a biekrup hai na imadan inih. Makha Pumi amatak kha mulurna rang le nangishan jawtna u kha mumukna rang a kithaw u chon inih.
47008020	Khutchawi rothom chung a chonkithaw u hin, mi na iniemieshiet u rang a kha kiriring pui uh.
47008021	Ajarla Pumi maikung ranga a atha kha niboia, miring hai maikung a`awm atha kha thawna rang a inih.
47008022	Khan kuliennai u hi amani le kavaktir uh. Chon arawplam a kieini na ama kha mulunglut miring inih, iti kha kejet uh. Khan tun ama hi mulunglutdet joi. Ajarla ama na nangni dieng takashawn kha ajeng a niei joi.
47008023	Titus kha tu, nangni rang a kirawtawp pui le chon kithaw pui miring `khat inih. Uliennai hai kha tu, biekrup hai tirtawn hai kha inih. Amani kha Christa lurna kha inih.
47008024	Khajarkhan biekrup hai dieng nang numpok u le nang chungchang ua kielienrashatna u jetna kha amani dieng mumuk u roh.
47009001	Khan miriethieng hai rang a chon thawna chungchang khan nangni dieng kimiejiek rang a kha rangai mak.
47009002	Ajarla nangithaw jawt u kha kiei na kijet. Makha chung khan Macedonia miring hai dieng lienkinarashatna u inih, makhala Achaia ah miring hai kha tu, nikum khan a rasham u nih joi. Khan nang mulunglutna kha na amani arawplam kha muchunmashak joi.
47009003	Khanikengta nang chung ua kielienrashatna u kha mahin arok changna boi rang, uliennai hai kha kivaktir nih joi. Makhala, kiriei kha ang a nangrashamna u rang a inih.
47009004	Kha nitnawkatu, Macedonia miring hai kha na kiei le va a arasham boi a navakmuk uatu, nangni kha te boi a, rangamer a kielienrashatna u chung hin jak kumuk u rangnih.
47009005	Khajarkhan arapa a chawngnangrurakham u khutchawi hai kha masha a rashamna rang, nangni dieng matieng vatna rang, uliennai hai kha mawshawkna `khat hi rangai, tia kimining. Makha manarshie a pek niboia pekjawttak a pekna rang, khutchawi `khat a nangrashamjer a nangrutetna u rang a inih.
47009006	Inia mahi adik inih, chikchelam a avawr ama kha na chikche kha le rawkhawm rangnih, rahvan peklam a avawr ama kha na rahvan kha le rawkhawm rangnih.
47009007	Mi rikip na ningshietlam a ninawkle thawboithaboi `khat a niboia, mulung a imuchuk kha peh rosho. Ajarla mulung parlam a apeh miring kha Pathien na numipok inih.
47009008	Pathien na numpokmirit kholok kha nangni dieng iruphumashak ngam inih. Makha ih kholok a ahun a nieina rang le atha chon kholok a ruphu changna rang a inih.
47009009	Hitihin a imiejiek hi inih: “Ama na athe a rajaimashak joi, ama na shara hai dieng pek joi. Ama dikna kha kumshawt a awm.”
47009010	Khan avawrpa dieng a muchi le khan nek rang nekleshak mawjawnpa Pathien kha na nangivawrna rang, ara kha nawmawjawn pe a numupung pe rangnih, khan nang dikna ara hai kha imupung chang rosho.
47009011	Pekjawtna kholok chung khan irikip a nawrawchawngmashak u joi. Makha na Pathien namapakmashak u rangnih.
47009012	Ajarla mahi Pathien chon thawna hi na miriethieng hai ravatna kha imawjawn pe ranga niboia, amani kha ruphu a Pathien imapakmashak inih.
47009013	Mahi pekna chon hin tumaw nangni u, iti kha mi hai na muk ua, Pathien kha mapakna rang a inih. Makha Christa rieirophongna rawtawp pui chawngjuina, khan amani le mi kholok dieng nang khutjangna u jar a inih.
47009014	Khan nangni dieng a awm danlakngam boi Pathien numpokmirit jar a, nangni rang nikna niei u phakhan, ajeng a anarangai uh.
47009015	Angrieingam boi ama khutchawi jar a Pathien kha mapak chang rosho.
47010001	Christa mulung renem le raw`awina jar a, nangni le mailemai a ka`awm phakhan, mulung rede, inia nangni le ka`awm boi phakhan, mulung ngarna aniei, Paul kiei na kinawmawshawk u inih.
47010002	Kieini hi manmieshie ichatna dungjuia aring `khat a nimining amani dieng kavat phakhan, kirumining rangamna hi amani dieng mumukna boi rang, kinawdawi u inih.
47010003	Ajarla kieini na dawkshamna le karing u joiawm, miring awmchan dungjuia rakithaw u nimak.
47010004	Ajarla karathawna u mieriem hai kha rieliei mieriem nimak, inia ashie ranakbuk kha mathangna rang, Pathien ranakniei mieriem kha inih.
47010005	Chawngrieshietna le khan Pathien jetna le rodoi rashang lungthim kholok kha kimathang inih. Khan Christa chawngjui rang khan mulungmining kholok kha shurkhop `khat a kichawi u inih.
47010006	Khan nang chawngjuina u kha rupum phakhan, chawngjuina boi kholok kha chepna rang, rasham a awm kanih uh.
47010007	Me malang dungjuia nieinak hai kha nangi`en u maw nih? Tukhat na Christa tah kha kanih, tia rangam nana joiatu, takthar a mahi nining a mining rosho, makhala ama na Christa tah anih kha ang a, kieiniawm Christa tah kha kanih uh.
47010008	Ajarla nangthangna u rang a nimak a, nangni kha nomothoina u rang, Pumi na inepek u kachamnieina u hi chungchanga lienkarashah u joiawm, jakna niei u naw ning.
47010009	Makha chawngmawchawi hai kha le nangni kha kinimichit u kha angna boi rang a inih.
47010010	Ajarla amani na ti uh, “Ama chawngmawchawi hai kha irik, khan ranak niei pe, inia upum jawna khan dawkshamna ieniei, khan ama chawngriei kha mieshietthiei a awm pe.”
47010011	Kha ang miring kha na mahi mining rosho, makhala kieini na kaw`awm boi u phakhan, chawngmawchawi a kivakmawchawi ua, kiriei u kha ang a ka`awm u phakhan, khatak kha chon a kanih u rangnih.
47010012	Ajarla nining a mathat nana hai amani kha le rachan a ninawkle rapana rang, ngam u mi`ing. Inia nining a manilemani kha retena uh, khan nining a rietiet nana ua ashing kha chang u mak.
47010013	Pathien na kieini dieng a inepek rietietna kha khea lienrashatna niei u naw ning. Inia kha`ang lienrashatna Pathien na inumutumsha rikaina rietietna shung khan a inih. Makha rikaina kha nangnishe iphak inih.
47010014	Nangnishe kavakshok ngam boi u ang a, kielienrashatna khan rekhe u mi`ing, ajarla Christa athachawng kha le nangni dieng vak shok kanih uh.
47010015	Shik miring hai chon thawna khan rekhe a lienrashatna kha niei u mi`ing, inia mahi ngakmining hi kieniei uh, makhala nang takashawn u kha hawng lien shishit le roroia, nang jar ua kirikaina u kha Pathien na narajai pe u rangnih.
47010016	Makha nangni rang a kha khea athachawng kha rophongna rang le, shik miring chonthawnasha rikaina khan lienrashatna boi rang a inih.
47010017	Inia “lienrashah ama kha na PUMI riming a lienrashah rosho.”
47010018	Ajarla nining a rieimielien ama kha muchuk mak a, Pumi na irieimielien ama kha imuchuk inih.
47011001	Kawmawngna shilite hin nangnodoi pui uala naw! Diktak a nangnodoi pui uh.
47011002	Ajarla Pathien ah put ah kimuk ningawna kha le ningkawnawaw uh. Ajarla inkopa `khat dieng nangni inniei rang khan chawngkururakham joi. Makha Christa dieng nangni kha shimnu taklak `khat a pekna rang a inih.
47011003	Inia moro na ama mimohonna le Eve irumohon kha ang a, makha na Christa dieng nang mulungmining u ariem kha memieshietthiei, tia chitna kieniei.
47011004	Ajarla tukhat na nangni dieng va a kieini na kirophong boi u Jesu shik kha ivakrophong rang a, ninawkle nangirumuk boi u ratha shik nangiloi u rang a, ninawkle nangiruloi boi u athachawng shik nangiloi u rang a, hihaihi nangrodoi puithiei u, tia chitna kieniei.
47011005	Rashangving tirtawn hai dieng kiei hi noirede mi`ing, tia kimining.
47011006	Khan chawngriei hin miriem kinitjoiawm, shingna a tu nih mi`ing, iti hi ih kholok a kieini hi nangni dieng kirumalar u inih.
47011007	Manboi a athachawng kirurophong a kinining a kururede khan kiei na munu kithaw maw nih?
47011008	Nang chon u kawthawna rang, biekrup shik hai ah put ah shawlawh kha ranak a kiruloi inih.
47011009	Nangni le kaw`awmlai khan kiei ravat a kuruawm, inia tute dieng kiei na pokrik peh mi`ing. Karavatna hai kholok kha Macedonia ah put ah ajong uliennai hai kha na nimiship pe uh. Khan nangni dieng irikip a pokrik kachangna boi rang, kirurung inih, khan rung rang kanih.
47011010	Christa adik kha kiei dieng a`awm le roroia, Achaia ah mahi kielienrashatna hin tute na namakha ngam naw nih.
47011011	Ijar a maw? Numkonopok boi u jar a maw nih? Numkonopok uh, iti hi Pathien na ejet.
47011012	Inia miring hai na kieini ang a lienrashatna rang a chanthatna adit hai chanthatna kha shatna pe rang, kithaw kha kiei na thaw rang kanih.
47011013	Ajarla kha ang miring hai kha tirtawn jok, mimohon chonthaw hai kha nih uh. Nining ua Christa tirtawn rang a rasha nih uh.
47011014	Mahin shindawngna rang awm mak, ajarla Satan amatak na mieivar ravantir `khat rurashah inih.
47011015	Ama shepding hai kha na dikna shepding hai kha rasha u joiawm, mahi rekhekchon nimak. Amani dawng kha ochonthaw u dungjuia nih rangnih.
47011016	Kiei na kirieiret inih, tute na kiei hi avet `khat a noloi naw rosho. Noloi joiatu, lektetak a nita`awm, lienkarashatna rang, kiei hi avet `khat a noloi u roh.
47011017	Mahi rangamna chung a lienrashatak a chawngkiriei hi Pumi na iriei ang a tu kiriei nimak, inia avet miring `khat a kiriei inih.
47011018	Rieliei ichatna dungjuia, mi tampui na lienrashatna niei uh. Khatikhan kieiawm lienrashah rang kanih.
47011019	Nangni hi nang shing u jarkhan, amawng hai le ningaitak a nangawm ngam uh.
47011020	Tukhat na shok namachang u joiawm, tukhat na nawkhawver u joiawm, tukhat na ama nemna rang norotokna u joiawm, tukhat na nining a rawlawm joiawm, khan tukhat na nang mai uah naben u joiawm, nangdoi uh.
47011021	Kajakna u rang, nangni le enkerete ua, kieini hi kadawk u, tia kiriei inih. Ih khan nita`awm tukhat na lienrasha joiatu, kieiawm lienrasha kanih. Avet `khat ang a achawng kanih.
47011022	Amani kha Hebrew miring maw nih uh? Kieiawm kanih. Amani kha Israel miring maw nih uh? Kieiawm kanih. Amani kha Abraham chicha hai kha maw nih uh? Kieiawm kanih.
47011023	Amani kha Christa shepding kha maw nih uh? Kiei kanidet. Avet miring ang a achawng kanih. Chonthaw khan kiei na kawthawdet, rawmawtawng khan kiei na kawtawngdet, lungroko shung khan rawnaw a kiei ka`awmdet, thitna le ranai khan kiei rawnaw a ka`awmdet.
47011024	Jihudi hai ah put ah shawm mili a khatte ta rawmaw voirahngahet kurutawng.
47011025	Voithumhet thirpum le nurujem uh, voikhat lung le nurudeng uh, voithum korokong kha rukoi, jan `khat le ni `khat tuipui chung ah shawtak a kuruawm.
47011026	Khomijin she kururawnaw, tuidung hai chitroina khan kurocho. Shiersho miring hai chitroina khan kurocho, kimiringtak hai chitroina khan kurocho, Phungshik hai chitroina a kurocho, khopui chitroina khan kurucho, ramthim chitroina khan kurocho, tuikhanglien chitroina khan kurocho, khan uliennai jok hai chitroina khan kurocho.
47011027	Shawrieviei a chon kuruthaw, rawnaw a ja boi a kuruawm, vawnchamtuira a kuruawm, rawnaw a bukuruhien, ponledier boi a dai kururieviei.
47011028	Tieitang kha te boi a, biekrup kholok rang a kumulungkham hi na ningthingkip inachep inih.
47011029	Mi eshen na dawkshamna niei phakhan, kieiawm dawkshamna kiniei boi maw kanih? Amani na mi eshen keruthuimashak phakhan, kupum rieirit a natna kiniei boi maw nih?
47011030	Kiei na lienkarashangir rang a shok nitjoiatu, kawdawkshamna khan lienrashatna niei rang kanih.
47011031	Kumshawt a kimapak u, kupumi u Jesu Christa Pathien le apa kha na mielieishiei kithaw nimak, iti hi ejet.
47011032	Damascus khan kiei hi nurushur jawt jarkhan, reng Aratas thoi a rampo kha na Damascus miring hai khopui kha irurung inih.
47011033	Inia bangpui tukber khan kiei hi tiengkum ah nurumuchum ua ama khut ah put ah rurekhe kanih.
47012001	Diktak a kielienrashatna hi nemna mi`ing, inia Pumi ah put ah mulungmik hai le chawngrophong hai kha dawna riei rang kanih:
47012002	kum shawmlieimili mala khan Christa takashawn miring `khat kejet. Ama kha athum changna ravan khan iruchawi inih. Taksha pum a maw nih, ninawkle taksha pum boi a maw nih, kiei jet mi`ing, Pathien na ejet.
47012003	Kha ang miring kha kurujet: taksha pum a maw nih, ninawkle taksha pum boi a maw nih, kiei jet mi`ing, Pathien na ejet.
47012004	Ama kha itia paradise khan iruchawi maw nih, khan ama na rieingam boi chawngriei hai kha irujet maw nih, iti kha miring `khat na iriei rang khan dan nih boi inih.
47012005	Kha ang miring chungchang khan kiei lienrashatna niei rang kanih. Inia kuchungchanga tu, kawdawkshamna chungchanga niboia, lienrashatna niei naw ning.
47012006	Lienrashatna rang khan kidit rang a nitjoiawm, avet kha nih naw ning, ajarla adik kha riei rang kanih. Inia tukhat na kiei dieng a imuk ninawkle ijet kha khea niminingna boi rang, arakai kanih.
47012007	Khan rekhek a lien chawngrophong jar a kiei na kawrawlawmna boi rang, kataksha shung a riling hi inurupek inih. Makha riling kha kiei hi analo rang a Satan ah put ah palai kha inih.
47012008	Mahi na kiei hi namathanna rang, hi chungchang hin Pumi dieng voithum kirudawi inih.
47012009	Khan ama na kiei dieng nuruti, “Kunumpokmirit hi nang rang ahun inih, ajarla dawkshamna khan karanak hi irupummashak inih.” Khajarkhan kawdawkshamna khan kiei ningaitak a lienrashatna niei rang kanih. Mahi Christa ranak kha kuchung a awmna rang a inih.
47012010	Khajarkhan Christa jarbak a kawdawkshamna khan, engshiet thawna khan, karavatna hai khan, epshie a inawthawna u hai khan, kaphairavaina hai khan ningnitna kieniei. Ajarla dawkshamna kieniei phakhan, arat kha kanih.
47012011	Lienrashatna kieniei phakhan, kiei avet kha kachang. Thawboithaboi `khat a ninawmawthaw u inih. Ajarla nangni na rieininurumielien u rang a shok inih. Ajarla kiei hi ih kinit joi nawkawm, rashangving tirtawn hai anuk a awm mi`ing.
47012012	Diktak a tirtawn `khat kinitna kha na, nang kar ua doiratna kholok le jetna hai khan, rekhekchon hai le chonrekhek hai khan chon ruthaw joi.
47012013	Nangni dieng pokrik kurunitna boi ranga kha niboia, ih khan maw biekrup shik hainek a adawk kha nangrunih uh? Mahi dikna boi hin rangaidam nepeh u roh!
47012014	Nangni dieng vatna rang, voithum karasham joi. Khan nangni rang pokrik chang naw ning, ajarla nang tah u hai kha kidit nimak a nangni kha kinadit u inih. Ajarla naite hai na nulepa hai rang niei vawm pe naw nih, nulepa hai na naite hai rang a ibawm pengir rang a inih.
47012015	Khan nang ratha u rang ningaitak a kiei na sheng rang kanih, khan resheng rang kanih. Kiei na ruphu a numkonopok u joiawm, ravat a kiei hi numnangnopok uh.
47012016	Inia nih rosho, nangni kha kiei na pokrik nepeh u mi`ing. Khanikengta hong kiethiei jarkhan, hong a kinushur u inih!
47012017	Nangni dieng kivaktir hai kha nemna kinoloina u maw nih?
47012018	Titus kha kirumawshawk inih, ku`uliennai kha ama le kivaktir inih. Titus na nangni dieng nemna iloi maw nih? Ra`angre Ratha a aringshom nih u mi`ing maw? Ra`angre kethawt a lawn nih u mi`ing maw?
47012019	Takthar a, nang maikung ua karapha u keng, tia nangimining u maw nih? Christa jar a Pathien maikung a kiriei u inih. Inia kunumpok hai, ih kholok hi nang lienna u rang a kithaw u inih.
47012020	Ajarla kavat phakhan, kimining ang a kinavakmuk boi u rang a le nangimining u ang a nanginumuk boi rang a tak khan kiei kachi: roshorakhana awmthiei, manarshie awmthiei, mulung hang mawshawkna awmthiei, bing a raphamna awmthiei, ashie chawngrieina awmthiei, mi mieshietna awmthiei, lienrashatna awmthiei, khan reshenna awmthiei.
47012021	Khan takthar a, kavat phakhan, kapathien na nang kar ua jak nepekthiei. Mi tampui na matieng a iruthaw u munu hai: rono chon, rejaichon, rejaikawk chon ithaw u ah put ah mulung lekna inieina boi u chung a kumulung kurthiei.
47013001	Nangni dieng kava hi voithum changna inih. “Miring idi ninawkle uthum na kungichangna rikip kha chawngcho nih rangnih.”
47013002	Matieng khan voidi changna a nangni le kuruawmlai khan kirieimasha inih. Khan tun ka`awm joi nawkawm, matieng a munu ruthaw hai le aliemlim kholok dieng kimiejiek inih: kavaret joiatu, amani kha kiei na hawi naw ning.
47013003	Ajarla Christa na kiei dieng chawngirieina rentukna kha nangni na nangtawk uh. Ama kha nangni dieng adawk nimak a nangni dieng arat inih.
47013004	Ajarla dawkna khan ama kha cross ling ah ruthat u joiawm, Pathien ranak jar a aring inih. Ajarla kieiniawm ama le adawk kanih uh. Inia Pathien ranak jar a chonkithaw pe u hin ama le aring rang kanih uh.
47013005	Takashawn a nangawm u maw nih, iti kha nang nining ua enrete u roh. Nang nining ua rentukna niei u roh. Enretena khan nangcho u nawkatu, Jesu Christa kha nangni dieng awm, iti kha nangijet boi u maw nih?
47013006	Inia kieini hi enretena khan cho u mi`ing, iti kha nangjet u rangnih, tia takakawshawn.
47013007	Khania nangni na ashie nangthawna boi u rang, Pathien dieng nikna kieniei. Rentuk ang a namalang u rangnih, iti nimak a, nemna boi `khat ang a namalang u joiawm, atha kha nangthawna u rang a inih.
47013008	Ajarla adik le re`er a kieini na iawm thaw u mi`ing, inia adik jarbak a kithaw u inih.
47013009	Ajarla kieini kadawk ua nangni nangrat u phakhan, ningai kanih uh. Inia nangni nurupummashakna rangawm, kieini na nikna kieniei u inih.
47013010	Ajarla rieshietna rang niboia konna rang, Pumi na kiei dieng a inepek cham hi kavat phakhan, herum a korotokna boi rang, a`awm boi `khat a hihaihi nangni dieng a kimiejiek inih.
47013011	Mawtawrna a, kuliennai hai, chubai. Rupum u roh, mulungar repeh nana u roh, mulung `khat a awm u roh, lungdamtak a ring u roh, khan numpok le lungdamna apeh Pathien na nangni le awm rangnih.
47013012	Riethieng biengrutum kha le khatlekhat chubairawthaw nana u roh.
47013013	Miriethieng kholok na chubai nawthaw uh.
47013014	Pumi Jesu Christa numpokmirit le Pathien numpok, khan Ratha Riethieng rawlawpna kha nang kholok le awm rosho. Amen.
48001001	Miring hai ah put ah le miring jar a niboia, Jesu Christa jar a le athi ah put ah ama rumothoi, apa Pathien jar a tirtawn,
48001002	khan kiei le rawtawp uliennai hai kholok le, Galatia Biekrup hai nangni dieng, Paul kiei na kimiejiek inih.
48001003	Apa Pathien le kupumi u Jesu Christa ah put ah numpokmirit le lungdamna kha nangni dieng a`awm nih rosho.
48001004	Napathien u le napa u mulungmining dungjuia, tun a ashie rong ah put ah nakhek rang, numunu u jar a rurepeh,
48001005	ama dieng kumshawt a alur jawnjai nih rosho. Amen.
48001006	Christa numpokmirit jar a nangni anakoipa ah put ah hidawrtak relen a athachawng shik `khat a nangrurawthawt u jarkhan, shindawngna kieniei.
48001007	Athachawng shik awm mak, inia miring eshen na nangni kha reheshu a natet jawt uh, khan Christa Athachawng kha rawpawrmashak jawt uh.
48001008	Inia kieini kanih ua, ninawkle ravan a ravantirshe nita`awm, kirophong u athachawng le re`er athachawng shik rophong joiatu, pumbawtna nih rosho.
48001009	Matieng a kiruriei u kha ang a, tunshe hinawm kirieithep inih, makhala tukhat na niruloisha u kha le re`er athachawng shik norophong pe u joiatu, pumbawtna nih rosho.
48001010	Ajarla miring kha maw ninawkle Pathien kha maw tun kiei na kimawkawi? Ninawkle, miring hai dieng a ningnitna kha maw kitawk? Miring hai ningnitna kha kidit nitlai a tu, kiei Christa shok runithiei naw ning.
48001011	Khania uliennai hai, nangni dieng mejet jawtna kieniei, makhala kirophong athachawng hi miring ah put ah nimak.
48001012	Ajarla miring ah put ah mahi kimuk nimak, khan mi na mahi inuruchukawm nimak, inia Jesu Christa chawngrophong jar a inih.
48001013	Ajarla arapalai a Jihudi hai richi a kaw`awmchan kha nangrujet uh, ajeng a Pathien Biekrup kha shawna kurupek, khan makha mathangna rang, kururai.
48001014	Khan kuphung shung a koro hai tampui kar a Jihudi hai richi a kururashangmasha inih, khan rekhe a pilepu hai shena dan khan kumulung kururepeh inih.
48001015	Inia kunu vawn shung ah nurumadanpa le ama numpokmirit jar a nurukoi Pathien kha ningrunit phakhan,
48001016	Phungshik hai dieng athachawng rophongna rang, ashapa kha kiei dieng jong malar. Inia relentak a miring dieng rurawdawn mi`ing.
48001017	Khan Jerusalem ah awm kamatieng a tirtawn hai diengawm ruhawng mi`ing. Inia Arabia ah kurushe, khan Damascus ah kurukirret.
48001018	Khan kum `thum shole, Jerusalem ah Peter aphah kuruhawng a ama le ni shawmlieirahnga kuruawm.
48001019	Inia, Pumi naipangpa James niboia, tirtawn shik rumuh mi`ing.
48001020	Khania nangni dieng a kimiejiek hai hi, Pathien maikung a mielieishiei thaw mi`ing.
48001021	Khashole Syria le Cilicia ah kurushe.
48001022	Inia Judea Biekrup shung a awm Christa takashawn hai kha na kemeh nurujet u mak.
48001023	Khania irujet u khatte tu awm, makhala “Arapalai a shawna nurupepa kha na tuntu pha `khat a mathangna rang a irurai takashawnna kha eshem joi.”
48001024	Khajarkhan kajar a amani na Pathien kha rumapak uh.
48002001	Khan kum shawmlieimili shole, Barnabas le Jerusalem ah kuruhawngret. Titusawm kuruhawng pui.
48002002	Chawngrophong jar a kuruhawng, khan Phungshik hai dieng a kirurophong athachawng chungchanga thangkoina kuruniei. Khania nemna boi a atan ninawkle rutansha kha kinitna boi rang, rimingniei hai dieng shikving a thangkoina kuruniei.
48002003	Inia kiei le rurawtawp Titus kha Greek nitjoiawm, vunrume`epngir u mak.
48002004	Inia kieini hi shok kachangna u rang, uliennai jok hai kha na Christa Jesu jar a ningchamna kiniei u kha tinta rang, muruk a hawng lut uh.
48002005	Nangni le athachawng adik kha awmnathiei rang, amani dieng apha bawngteshe rulut u mi`ing.
48002006	Inia rimingniei rasha jawt miring hai dieng tu, ikha nita`awm, kiei dieng kairekhena nepeh mak. Ajarla rimingniei miring hai na kiei dieng inurubo pe iawm awm mak. Pathien na miring mai en a chon thaw mak.
48002007	Kha le kairekhe a, vunep hai dieng athachawng riei rang, Peter dieng irurotho pui kha ang a, vunep boi hai dieng athachawng riei rang, kiei dieng nurorotho pui joi. Makha amani na rumuk uh.
48002008	Ajarla vunep hai dieng a tirtawn rang a Peter chung a chon ruthaw Pathien na kiei diengawm Phungshik hai rang chon iruthaw inih.
48002009	Khan rimingniei chawpui hai James, Cephas, khan John, amani na kiei dieng a inurupek numpokmirit kha rujet u `le, kiei le Barnabas Phungshik hai dieng, khan amani vunep hai dieng shena rang, rawlawpna khutchang kha nurupek uh.
48002010	Amani chawngben khatte kha tu shara hai kha miningna rang a inih. Kieiawm makhatak kha thawna rang, ngakrala a kuruawm inih.
48002011	Khan Peter na Antioch ah vat phakhan, amaikungtak ah kirurodoi pui inih. Ajarla ama kha metek phawm shok inih.
48002012	Ajarla James na ijongtir miring eshen vat mala khan, ama na Phungshik hai le shak rushakshom, inia amani vat phakhan, vunep hai kha ruchih a nining a rurakai a rurechen joi.
48002013	Khan Jihudi hai eshenawm ama le thanunchan ruthaw uh. Khan Barnabasshe kha amani thanunchan kha na lamrurehemashak.
48002014	Inia amani athachawng adik dungjuia awmrachan boi u kha kurumuk phakhan, amani kholok maikung a Peter dieng kuruti, “Nang Jihudi nangnih a Jihudi hai ringdan a ring boi a Phungshik hai ringdan a nangring. Inia ijar a Phungshik hai kha Jihudi hai ringdan a ringna rang, niruep maw nih?
48002015	“Kieini hi balamtak a Jihudi kha nanih uh, Phungshik hai kar ah put ah munu miring hai kha nih u makme.
48002016	Dan na ikhin chonthaw kha na miring hi imidik ngam nimak, iti kha nejet uh. Khajarkhan Christa dieng takashawn jar a kieini hi nimidikna rang, Jesu Christa kha takanishawn u inih. Makha Dan na ikhin chonthaw jar a nimak a, Christa dieng takanawshawn u jar a inih. Ajarla miring `khatsheawm Dan na ikhin chonthaw kha na midik ngam naw nih.
48002017	“Inia Christa jar a nimidikna rang, kieini na natawk phakhan, kieinirilik munu miring hai `khat a nurumuh uh. Christa hi munu thoithaw miring kha maw nih joi? Makha nihet mak!
48002018	Kishiet hai kha kiei na karashakthep joiala, kinining a shiet miring kha achang kanih.
48002019	Ajarla Pathien dieng kiringnathiei rang, Dan jar a Dan khan kuruthi joi.
48002020	Khan Christa le cross ah kuruthichen joi. Aring hi kiei nilai mi`ing, inia Christa na kiei dieng aring kha nih joi. Tun pum a karing hi kiei hi numnurupoh a upumtak rurepeh Pathien Shapa dieng takashawn jar a aring kanih joi.
48002021	Pathien numpokmirit kha kiei ishawn boi a thaw mi`ing. Ajarla dikna hi Dan jar a nitjoiatu, Christa kha nemna boi a ruthi inih.”
48003001	Aw amawng Galatia miring hai! Adik nangijui boi u hi, tu na inama`am u maw nih? Jesu Christa na Cross ah thitna kha nangmukna u rang, nang kar ua irutar nimak maw?
48003002	Dan na ikhin chon hai jar a ninawkle nangirangai u kha takanangshawn u jar a Ratha kha nangimuk u maw nih? Hi ranga hi nangni dieng kejet jawt.
48003003	Ijar a mawnghai maw nangnih uh? Ratha a nangruput ua taksha dieng maw mutumna u rawng?
48003004	Nemnahet boi nitjoiatu, nemna boi a shawna tampui maw nangdoi uh?
48003005	Khajarkhan nangni dieng Ratha napeh ama le nang kar ua chonrekhek athaw ama kha na Dan chonthaw jar a iruthaw maw nih, ninawkle nangirurangai u kha takashawn jar a iruthaw maw nih?
48003006	Khatikhan Abraham na “Pathien kha takarushawn jar a midik `khat a irute nih joi.”
48003007	Khajarkhan jet u roh, makhala takashawn amani ranga kha Abraham nai hai kha nih uh.
48003008	Takashawn ah put ah Pathien na Phungshik hai kha midik rangnih, iti hi Miejiek na rumukmasha jarkhan, Abraham dieng matieng athachawng kha hitihin rurophongmasha, “Nang ah put ah phung kholok na rahvan muk rangnih.”
48003009	Khajarkhan takashawn miring hai kha na takarushawn Abraham kha le rahvan muk rangnih.
48003010	Dan na ikhin chonthaw kholok pumbotna thoi a awm. Ajarla hitihin miejiek, “Dan behangbuk shung ah thaw rang a irumiejiek athaw boi kholok chung a pumbotna awm.”
48003011	Khajarkhan Dan na tuteawm Pathien maikung a midik ngam naw nih, iti hi malangsheng inih, ajarla “takashawn jar a adik miring kha ring rangnih.”
48003012	Dan kha takashawn ah put ah nimak, inia “amani na ikhin athaw miring kha na amani jar a ring rangnih.”
48003013	Kieini nuruhut rang pumbot kha ruchang a, Christa na Dan pumbotna ah put ah nurukhek joi. Ajarla hitihin miejiek, “Thing ah imakhai miring rikip pumbotna thoi a awm inih.”
48003014	Makha Christa Jesu jar a Abraham rahvan kha Phungshik hai dieng jongna rang le takashawn jar a kieini na Ratha a chawngrakham kha mukna rang a inih.
48003015	Uliennai hai, miring shedan kha kiriei inih: miring rawjawtnashe kha`awm menet shole, tute na ipai boi ninawkle ibo boi inih.
48003016	Chawngrakham hai kha Abraham dieng le ama Chicha dieng a ipek inih. Ama na tampui jetna, “Chicha hai dieng,” ti mak, inia `khatte jetna, “Nang Chicha dieng,” iti. Makha Christa inih.
48003017	Mahi kiti inih, Pathien na Christa jar a irumenetsha rawjawtna kha kum rajamili shawm `thum shole, ahawng Dan kha na chawngrakham kha chon thaw boi minitna rang, mathang ngam mak.
48003018	Ajarla inkoklo kha Dan jar a nitatu, makha chawngrakham jar a nilai mak, inia makha Abraham dieng tu Pathien na chawngrakham jar a irupek inih.
48003019	Ijar a Dan kha a`awm maw nih? Chawngirurakhamna amani dieng Chicha kha na va masheng, mahi shietna jar a irubo inih. Mahi ravantir hai jar a palai khut ah chon na irumenet inih.
48003020	Palai kha khatte rang a nimak, inia Pathien tu khatte inih.
48003021	Khanitala Dan hi Pathien chawngrakham hai kha le re`er maw nih? Makha nihet mak! Ajarla irupek dan `khat hi na ringna pek ngam joiala, dikna kha Dan jar a nihet joi.
48003022	Jesu Christa dieng takashawn jar a chawngrakham kha takashawn amani dieng pekna rang, Miejiek na nieinak kholok kha munu thoi a rukhar joi.
48003023	Inia takashawn kha jong mala khan kieini hi Dan na nurukhop uh. Takashawn kha Pathien na rophongphit `le, dan kha rurakhar joi.
48003024	Khajarkhan takashawn ah put ah niridikmashakna rang, Dan hi Christa tieng nomoroi lamkai kha runih.
48003025	Inia takashawn jong joi jarkhan, kieini nomoroipa thoi a awm u lai makme.
48003026	Ajarla Christa Jesu dieng nang takashawn u jar a Pathien nai hai kha nangniviek u joi.
48003027	Christa dieng baptisma aloi nang kholok na Christa kha pon a nangrieshiei u joi.
48003028	Jihudi le Greek awmlai mak, shok le moshok awmlai mak, nupang le apa awmlai mak. Ajarla Christa Jesu jar a nang kholok khatte nangnih u joi.
48003029	Khan nangni Christa tah kha nangnih u joi jarkhan, Abraham chicha hai kha nangnih u joi, khan chawngrakham dungjuia koklo hai kha nangnih u joi.
48004001	Khan kiei na kieriei makhala koklo kha naite nit lailim, ama kha kholok pumi nitjoiawm, shok le kairekhena awm mak.
48004002	Inia apa na irutukmashak apha kha hawng shun malalim, ama kha aenajawn hai le inchonpo hai thoi a awm.
48004003	Kieiniawm kha nanih: nanaite changlai khan manmieshie balam khopna khan nuruawm u inih.
48004004	Inia apha kha hawng rupum phakhan, nupang ah put ah le Dan thoi a rumoshok a, Pathien na ashapa kha jong tir.
48004005	Makha Dan thoi a awm hai kha khekna rang le naimachang kha numukna u rang a inih.
48004006	Shapa nangnih u jarkhan, Pathien na ashapa Ratha kha nang mulung ua jong tir a Ratha na “Abba, Kapa,” tia ra`ai.
48004007	Khatikhan shok kha nih u lai makche, inia shapa kha nangnih u joi. Shapa kha nangnih u joiatu, Christa jar a Pathien koklo kha nangnih u joi.
48004008	Khania Pathien nangrujet boi u lai khan, balam a pathien nih boi hai chon kha nangiruthaw pe u inih.
48004009	Inia tun Pathien kha nangjet u shole, shirkhat tieng, Pathien na inurujet u nih joi, itia takthar a adawk, akip boi ruchukna khan kirna rang le amani dieng shok changna rang, nangiminingthep u maw nih?
48004010	Nikho le tha, khan pha le kum hai kha nangsher pui uh.
48004011	Nangni rang chon kithawsha hi nemna boi maw nih joi, iti hin kachi.
48004012	Uliennai hai, kiei hi angna rang, kawnawmawshawk uh, ajarla kieiawm nangni kha a ang kanih. Kiei dieng rehena chonawm nawthaw pe u makche.
48004013	Akhat changna a nangni dieng athachawng kururophonglai khan, katak rudam mak, iti kha nangrujet uh.
48004014	Kupum shung a lemna hi mitir a napai u makche. Inia Pathien ravantir le Christa Jesu kha ang a nangnuruloi uh.
48004015	Nang rahvanmuk u kha imaw nih joi? Initthiei rang a tu, nang mik u kha kaw a amani kha nangnurupek ngam u, iti hi kiei na kungkachang.
48004016	Nangni dieng adik kieriei jarkhan, nang rahapui u achang maw kanih joi?
48004017	Nangni kha atha a inahawr u nimak, inia naralatmashakna rang, amani kha ninginawmaw`aw u inih.
48004018	Kiei na nangni le ka`awm pha ranga hin niboia, pha rikip a atha a ningaw hi atha inih.
48004019	Kanai hai, nangni dieng Christa kha moshon malalim, nairo`oi shawna kha kidoithep inih.
48004020	Tun hin nangni dieng awm a kehesho tho rang hin kadit, ajarla nang chungchang ua kiei awkchak a ka`awmlai.
48004021	Dan thoi a awm jawt miring hai, kiei dieng nieriei u roh, dan kha rangai u makche maw?
48004022	Ajarla hitihin miejiek, “Abraham na shapa `di runiei: shoknu le akhat, khan ningchamnu le akhat.
48004023	Inia shoknu ah put ah ama kha taksha dungjuia ashok inih, khan ningchamnu ah put ah ama kha chawngrakham jar a inih.
48004024	Mahi chawngmeloi inih, ajarla nupang idi kha chawngrepekna idi kha inih. Chawngrepekna `khat kha Sinai Mo ah put ah inih, khan shok achang rang a nai hai kha ieniei. Ama kha Hagar inih.
48004025	Ajarla Hagar hi Arabia ah awm Sinai Mo kha inih. Khan mahi tun a Jerusalem hi itina nih joi. Ajarla Jerusalem hi anai hai kha le shok a awm nih joi.
48004026	Inia chung a awm Jerusalem kha tu ningcham a awm inih, ama hi nawlawpsheng u nunu u inih.
48004027	Ajarla hitihin miejiek: “Ningai roh, nairong, nai bawng boi nu! Ra`ai tana riei roh, Aw rieviei adoi boi nu! Ajarla inkopa nieinu nai hainek a idanu nai hai kha rawpdet.”
48004028	Khajarkhan uliennai hai, Isaac kha ang a, kieini hi chawngrakham dungjuia nai hai kha nanih uh.
48004029	Inia tunshe hin, khalaia kha ang a taksha dungjuia ashok ama na Ratha a ashok ama kha epshie a thawlai.
48004030	Inia Miejiek na imaw ieriei? “Shoknu le ashapa kha nawt roh, ajarla shoknu shapa kha na ningchamnu shapa kha le koklo changthiei naw nih.”
48004031	Hijarhin uliennai hai, kieini hi shoknu nai hai kha nih u makme, inia ningchamnu nai hai kha nanih uh.
48005001	Khajarkhan Christa na nomoshok ua ningchamna kha nepek joi, makhan dingrep u roh. Shok ringkaw kha na inokhopthep kha nih u lai naw roh.
48005002	Enro, nangni dieng Paul kiei na kieriei makhala nangni na vunnangep u joiatu, Christa kha nangni rang iawm nemna awm naw nih.
48005003	Khajarkhan takthar a nangni dieng kungkachang makhala vunep miring rikip na Dan kholok jui rang a itonchip nih joi.
48005004	Dan a ridik hai nangni kha Christa na chon ithawna boi le numpokmirit ah put ah acho miring kha nangnih u joi.
48005005	Ajarla Ratha jar a takashawn a dikna ngakmining kha kieini na ningak u inih.
48005006	Ajarla Christa Jesu dieng vunep vunep boi na chonithaw nimak a, numpok jar a takashawn chon athaw kha na chonithaw inih.
48005007	Thatak a nangrutan u joi. Adik kha juina boi rang, tu na inurukhar u maw nih?
48005008	Makha mawkawina kha anakoipa ama ah put ah nimak.
48005009	Chawh lekte na jam kholok rakangmashakviek.
48005010	Pumi riming a kanarangam pui uh, nangni na shik mining u naw tinih. Tunitjoiawm nawmawshaw u hai kha na chawngshatna kha ruput rangnih.
48005011	Inia uliennai hai, vunepna chawng kha kishem nilai a la, ijar a kiei hi shawrieviei inepek u maw nilai? Khajarkhan cross jar a keruthuina kha imathang nih joi.
48005012	Awi e, nangni nerehemashak hai kha nining ua rurechenving uala naw!
48005013	Ajarla, uliennai hai, ningchamna mun khan nurukoi u joi, makha taksha chanthatna rang tu rotokna u naw roh, inia numpok jar a khatlekhat rang chon thaw u roh.
48005014	Ajarla Dan kholok kha chawng `khat a ruchun, “Nang ringchangpui kha nang pumtak kha ang a numnangipok rang a inih.”
48005015	Inia nangni khatlekhat nangreke nana ua, khan nang rashah nana uatu, riring u roh, khanawkatu nangni khatlekhat nangmathang nanaviek u rangnih!
48005016	Inia kieriei, Ratha a ring u roh, khan taksha ditrekhe a rupummashak u naw roh.
48005017	Ajarla taksha na Ratha chung a, khan Ratha na taksha chung a ama ditrekhena kha ieniei. Ajarla hihaihi khatlekhat chung a re`er inih. Mahi na nangidit u kha nawmawthaw u mak.
48005018	Inia Ratha na lamnakai pe u joiatu, Dan thoi khan awm u lai makche.
48005019	Khan taksha chon hai kha amalar, makhala: uire, rejai, riethieng boi, rejaikawk,
48005020	rilim chubaibawk, dawileai chon thaw, mukmakna, rahana, vanhatna, mulung hang rekhe, bingriei mulung niei, reshenrokhoi, lawpreshen hai,
48005021	manarshie, mithat, jukhawp, lawp a shakshah rat miring, khan hi ang chonthaw hai, hihaihi inih. Matieng a kinieriei u kha ang a tunawm kirieimasha u inih, kha ang athaw miring hai kha na Pathien rengchangna kha tum ngam naw nih.
48005022	Inia Ratha ara kha tu numpok, mulungparna, lungdamna, adoirat, numpokthiei, nunrenem, atha, takashawn,
48005023	pum khop ngam: hihai chung a dan awm mak.
48005024	Christa dieng a awm miring hai kha na tu taksha kha ditrekhe chon le takjatna kholok le cross ah iruthat nih joi.
48005025	Kieini na Ratha a naring jarkhan, Ratha a aring rang a nanih uh.
48005026	Nining a mapak nana kha nih u naw rawi, khan akhat chung a rahana pek le khatlekhat chung a manarshie miring kha nih u naw rawi.
48006001	Uliennai hai, miring `khat na shietna ithaw nangshur u joiatu, rathalam miring nangni na renem a vak mikir u roh. Nang nining ua`awm riring u roh, khanawkatu nangniawm nelemthiei uh.
48006002	Khatlekhat pokrik khan rashan u roh. Khatikhan Christa dan kha rupummashak u roh.
48006003	Iawm nih boi miring `khat na mi `khat kanih, tia imining joiatu, nining a mohon nana inih.
48006004	Inia mi rikip na ama chontak kha enrete rosho. Tukhat chon kha le rakam boi a, ama chon ranga khan lienrasha rosho.
48006005	Ajarla mi rikip na ama pokrik ranga kha phung rangnih.
48006006	Chawng chungchanga ruchuh ama kha na miruchuh ama kha le nieinak atha kholok kha ireshem pui rang a inih.
48006007	Inomohon u kha chang u naw roh. Pathien hi eshethiei nimak. Ajarla ivawrivawr kha rawkhawm rangnih.
48006008	Ama munuphung awmchantak a avawr ama kha na munuphung awmchan ah put ah thangna kha rawkhawm rangnih, khan Ratha a avawr ama kha na Ratha ah put ah kumshawt ringna kha rawkhawm rangnih.
48006009	Atha thaw khan ngawk u naw rawi, ajarla nawrawngawi u nawkatu, pha rutukthep a nawrawkhawm u rangnih.
48006010	Apha ahoi nimuk u le roroia, mi kholok dieng le, khinniei a takashawn inshungkhur a awm hai dieng atha thaw u rawi.
48006011	Khan kukhuttak na khutjem lienpui le nangni dieng kimiejiek hi en u roh!
48006012	Christa cross jar a epshawna nangrawtawng puina boi rang, vailar a alar jawt mi hai kha na nangni kha vunep rang inuruep u inih.
48006013	Ajarla vunep haishe na`awm Dan kha jui u mak. Inia nang pum ua lienrashatnathiei rang, nangni kha vunineme`ep jawt u inih.
48006014	Nupumi u Jesu Christa cross ranga khan niboia, kiei lienrashatna nieihet mi`ing. Mahi jar a manmieshie hi kiei dieng, khan kiei hi manmieshie dieng athi nih joi.
48006015	Ajarla Christa jar a vunep vunep boi kha na nemna niei mak a, khutkon athar ranga kha na nemna iniei inih.
48006016	Khana mahi shena dungjuia aring kholok chung a le Pathien Israel chung a lungdamna le roihoina kha awm rosho.
48006017	Tun ah put ah tute na kiei hi nawmawshawlai naw rosho, ajarla kupum ah Pumi Jesu phaitar kha kawchawi joi.
48006018	Uliennai hai, nupumi Jesu Christa numpokmirit kha nang ratha u le a`awm nih rosho. Amen.
49001001	Pathien mulungmining jar a Jesu Christa tirtawn, Paul kiei na Ephesus ah awm miriethieng hai le Jesu Christa maikung a takashawn rang a rutuk miring hai dieng kiemiejiek.
49001002	Napa u Pathien le Pumi Jesu Christa ah put ah numpokmirit le lungdamna kha nangni dieng awm rosho.
49001003	Christa jar a ravan mun a rathalam rahvan kholok le rahvan napeh nupumi Jesu Christa Apa Pathien kha mapak chang rosho.
49001004	Mahi manmieshie phun mala a kieini hi Christa jar a inurumadan u dungjuia inih. Mahi numpok jar a ama maikung a riethieng le mieshietna awm boi miring ninitna u rang a inih.
49001005	Jesu Christa jar a ama dieng shapa inamachangna shung khan, kieini hi inurumuchuksha inih. Mahi ningnitna mulungmining dungjuia iruthaw inih.
49001006	Mahi ama numpokmirit lurna mapakna rang a inih. Ama na mahi numpokmirit hi Numipok ama jar a kieini dieng manboi a nurupek joi.
49001007	Ama thishen jar a rekhekna kha ama dieng nieniei u joi. Makha ama numpokmirit rawchawngna dungjuia shietna rangaidamna kha inih.
49001008	Makha numpokmirit kha kieini rang a imupung inih. Shingna le thieina kholok le
49001009	Ama mulungmining murukchawng kha kieini dieng nemejet joi. Makha Christa dieng ama na masha a irumuchuk ama ningnitna dungjuia inih.
49001010	Khan rong kha hawng rupum a ama na ravan le rieliei a awm nieinak kholok kha Christa dieng khatte a ruchunmashakna rang a chonrashak inih.
49001011	Nieinak kholok kha ama mulungmining a renirutuk dungjuia iruthaw ama chonmuchuk dungjuia muchuksha jar a inkoklo kha kieini na ama ah put ah nutum u joi.
49001012	Christa dieng ngakmining runieisha kieini na ama lurna kha mapakna rang, hihai kholok hi iruthaw inih.
49001013	Adik chawng, makhala nang shandamna u athachawng kha nangrurangai u shole, takanangrushawn ua, chawngirurakham Ratha Riethieng kha le Christa jar a nangni dieng jetrunam joi.
49001014	Pathien na iniei miring hai kha khekna niei malalim, Ratha Riethieng hi nokoklo u rang a rentukna kha inih. Mahi ama lurna kha mapakna rang a inih.
49001015	Pumi Jesu dieng nang takashawn u le miriethieng hai kholok chung a nang numpok u kha kurujet joi.
49001016	Khajarkhan kinikna rikip a kanaban u phakhan, nangni rang Pathien kha amapak chat mi`ing.
49001017	Nupumi Jesu Christa Pathien, lurna apa kha na varna le chawngrophong Ratha kha inepek u nih rosho. Ama kha nangjetna u rang nikna kieniei.
49001018	Nang mulung u mik kha var rosho. Makha Pathien na inokoina u ngakmining khan miriethieng hai kar a koklo alur rawchawngna kha nangjetna u rang a inih.
49001019	Makha ama takashawn hai kieini dieng a awm danlakngam boi ama ranak kha nangjetna u rang a inih. Mahi ranak hi Pathien ranak alien chonthaw dungjuia inih.
49001020	Pathien na Christa dieng iruthaw khala, ama kha athi ah put ah irumothoi, khan ravan mun ah ama khutchang tieng irumushut kha inih.
49001021	Pathien na ama kha rampokna kholok, cham kholok, ranak kholok, Pumi changna kholok, khan ipho riming kholok riming chung a hi rongte hin niboia, ajong rang a rong rangshe hin rashangtak a rumushut joi.
49001022	Nieinak kholok ama ke thoi ah rutet, khan biekrup rang a nieinak kholok lu changna kha ama dieng rupek joi.
49001023	Biekrup hi Christa pum kha inih, khan lam rikip a le irikip a miship ama rupumna kha inih.
49002001	Matienglai khan nangni shietna le munu jar a ruthi nangnih uh.
49002002	Khalai khan nangni mahi manmieshie shena dungjuia le muntawng a awm ranak rampopa dungjuia nangruring uh. Ama kha tun a chawngrangai boi shapa hai dieng a chonthaw ratha kha inih.
49002003	Pha `khat khan kieiniawm taksha ditrekhe a amani le nuruawm uh. Taksha khan mining ditrekhena kha nurujui uh. Khan eshen hai kha ang a, balam a lunghangna amungir rang a nai hai kha nuruchang uh.
49002004	Inia Pathien hi roihoi a rawchawng inih, ajarla numpok alien kha le kieini hi numinurupok inih.
49002005	Kieini hi shietna jar a nuruthi u laitak khan, Christa le nurumiringchen u joi. Numpokmirit jar a nangni kha nashan joi.
49002006	Khajarkhan Pathien na kieini hi nurumothoichen a Christa Jesu le ravan mun hai khan nurumushutchen joi.
49002007	Makha Christa Jesu jar a, ajong rang a rong hin, ama numpokmirit danlakngam boi rawchawngna kha ninghoina le nuchung ua malarna rang a inih.
49002008	Ajarla Pathien ah put ah numpokmirit jar a nang takashawn kha le shandamna kha nangmuk u joi. Makha nangni ah put ah nimak a Pathien khutchawi kha inih.
49002009	Makha chon hai jar a nimak a tute na lienrashatna boi rang a inih.
49002010	Ajarla kieini hi Pathien khutkon kha nanih. Christa Jesu jar a, ama na irurashamsha chon atha hai kha thawna rang, inurukon u inih. Makha amani dieng khan niringna u rang a inih.
49002011	Khajarkhan pha `khat a nang ringchangna u kha Phungshik kha nangrunih u, iti kha mininghep u roh. Vunep miring kanih ati hai kha na nangni kha vunep boi miring nuruti uh. Vunep, iti kha miring khut hai kha na pum chung a iruthaw chon inih.
49002012	Ajarla khalai khan Christa aniei boi, Israel khomi changna a mejet boi, chawngrakham chawngrepekna hai khan milak, ngakmining niei boi le manmieshie shung a Pathien niei boi miring kha nangrunih uh.
49002013	Inia tuntu Christa Jesu tah kha nangchang u joi. Pha `khat a arala a nangruawm u kha Christa thishen jar a Pathien na ama le naranaimashak joi.
49002014	Ajarla amatak kha nulungdamna u kha inih. Ama na alai a awm reshenna bang kha leklek a khoi a idi kha khatte machang joi.
49002015	Ama taksha khan rahana kha rumathang joi. Makha chawngchona hai shung a awm Dan chawngpek hai kha inih. Makha nining a idi kha miring `thar niminitna rang a inih. Khatikhan ama na riengieina kha kon joi.
49002016	Makha dire kha Pathien dieng pum `khat a cross jar a riengieimashak a makha rahana kha thatna rang a inih.
49002017	Khan ala le anai a ruawm nangni dieng lungdamna chawng kha ashem va joi.
49002018	Ajarla ama jar a kieini dire hi napa dieng Ratha `khatte a lutna kha nieniei u joi.
49002019	Khajarkhan tuntu nangni milak le khotang kha nih u lai makche, inia miriethieng hai le khoshung miring, khan Pathien inshung kha nangnih u joi.
49002020	Jesu Christatak kha runiei lung kha nit jarkhan, nangni tirtawn hai le thiempulien hai na iphun chung khan innangirashak u nih joi.
49002021	Ama dieng iruchunlap in kholok kha Pumi jar a riethiengmun riethieng kha hawng chang inih.
49002022	Ratha jar a Pathien awmna rang nangni kha ama dieng inarashakchen u nih joi. Phungshik hai dieng
49003001	Hijarhin Paul kiei hi Phungshik nangni rangbak a Jesu Christa surkhop miring kha kanih joi.
49003002	Nangni rang kiei dieng a inepek Pathien numpokmirit reshepna kha nangjethet u joi.
49003003	Matienglai a shampeng a kirumiejiek kha ang a, murukchawng kha kiei dieng chawngrophong a nemejet joi, iti kha nangrujet uh.
49003004	Makha nangte u phakhan, Christa murukchawng kijetna kha nangjet ngam u rangnih.
49003005	Makha tun a ama tirtawn le thiempulien riethieng hai dieng Ratha jar a irophong hi ang a, rong `shik shapa hai dieng rumejet mak.
49003006	Makhala Phungshik hai hi Christa jar a le athachawng jar a kokloshom, pum `khat a ruchunshom, khan ama chawngrakham kha reshemshom kha nih u joi.
49003007	Athachawng jar a, Pathien numpokmirit khutchawi dungjuia shepding kanih joi. Mahi numpokmirit hi Pathien ranak chonthaw dungjuia kiei dieng a inurupek inih.
49003008	Miriethieng hai kholok kar a adawkving kiei dieng hin mahi numpokmirit hi nepek joi. Makha thirngam boi Christa rawchawngna kha Phungshik hai dieng rophongna rang a inih.
49003009	Makha Christa jar a nieinak kholok akon Pathien dieng a rongrong a rethe murukchawng ruchunna kha mi kholok na mukna rang a inih.
49003010	Biekrup jar a, thotho a awm Pathien shingna kha, ravan mun a awm rampo hai le chamniei hai dieng tun mejetna rang a inih.
49003011	Mahi nupumi Jesu Christa jar a kumshawt chonmuchuk dungjuia iruthawna inih.
49003012	Christa jar a le ama dieng natakashawn u jar a rangamna le lungartak a Pathien dieng lutna niniei u inih.
49003013	Khajarkhan nangni rang kawshawna khan mulung rakaimashak u naw roh, tia kenengen uh. Amani kha nangni rang a lurna kha inih.
49003014	Hijarhin nupumi Jesu Christa Apa dieng rukhuk shun a kabu.
49003015	Pathien dieng hin ravan le rieliei a inloh rikip riming phona awm.
49003016	Makha ama rawchawng lurna dungjuia nangni dieng nepeknathiei rang le aratha jar a ranak le nang miring rieirit kha maratna rang a inih.
49003017	Khan Christa na takashawn jar a nang mulung shung ua awmnathiei rang le numpok shung khan rujung nangmeshena u rang a inih.
49003018	Makha na miriethieng hai kholok le Christa numpok dung le khang, rashang le athuk chungchanga nangjetna ngam u rang a inih.
49003019	Khan jetna kholok akhe Christa numpok kha nangjetnathiei u rang, Pathien shingna kholok le nangni kha nimishipna u rang a inih.
49003020	Kieini dieng chon thaw ama ranak dungjuia kieini na nirawdawn u ninawkle nimining u nek a ruphu a Pathien na chonthaw ngam.
49003021	Christa Jesu jar a biekrup hin kumshawt a rongrong dieng ama lurna kha awm nih rosho. Amen.
49004001	Khajarkhan Pumi jar a shurkhop a awm kiei na inokoina rutukthep khan ringna rang, kenengen uh, ajarla Pathien na makha le inurukoi u inih.
49004002	Nunrenem, mulung raw`awi, khan doiratna kholok le numpok jar a khatlekhat rashan nana u roh.
49004003	Inumushuina u lungdamna khan Ratha jar a mulung rushukna kha tetna rang, enchak a thaw u roh.
49004004	Pathien na ngakmining `khat khan inurukoi u tak kha ang a, pum `khat le Ratha `khat awm.
49004005	Pumi `khat, takashawn `khat khan baptisma loina `khat awm.
49004006	Pathien `khat hi kholok apa inih. Ama hi kholok chung a le kholok jar a nang kholok dieng a`awm inih.
49004007	Christa khutchawi danlak dungjuia numpokmirit kha mi rikip dieng nurupek joi.
49004008	Khajarkhan ama na ruti, “Arashang a rurawlawm phakhan, lungroko kha lungroko shung ah ruthong a miring hai dieng khutchawi rupek joi.”
49004009	Rapapek a rieliei thoi a rurede ama kha, rurawlawm ama kha keng, iti hi nithiei nih maw?
49004010	Nieinak kholok mishipnathiei rang, rurede ama kha, ravan kholok chung a rurawlawm ama kha inih.
49004011	Irupek khutchawi hai khala, eshen dieng tirtawn hai nitna rang, eshen dieng thiempulien hai nitna rang, eshen dieng chawngshem hai nitna rang, eshen dieng kengamroi hai le oja chonthaw hai nitna rang, hihaihi inih.
49004012	Makha Pathien chon rang le Christa pum kha mothoina rang, miriethieng hai kha rupummashakna rang a inih.
49004013	Makha nokholok na takashawn ruchunna le Pathien Shapa jetna khan nashok masheng irupek inih. Khan nokholok na Christa rupumna danlak shipmer khan pashalak miring minit masheng irupek inih.
49004014	Kieini hi ruchukna rithi rikip na miring radaina khan mohonna chonrashak hai kha na shehawng a inawng naite hai kha nih u lai makche.
49004015	Inia numpok jar a adik kha kawrep a, lam rikip a ama dieng rawshawnna rang a nih rosho. Mahi ulu hi Christa hi inih.
49004016	Ama ah put ah pum kholok ruchun a arang rikip kha rushuichip a imenet inih. Lek rikip na thatak a chonithaw le roroia nining a irashak a upum kha numpok a irawshawnmashak inih.
49004017	Khajarkhan Pumi riming a mahi kiriei a kungachang kanih. Makhala Phungshik hai, amani arok nunchan a aring ang a, nangni aring boi rang a nangnih u joi.
49004018	Amani dieng jetna boi a`awm le amani mulung michim jar a jetna kha rumijing pe uh, khan Pathien na ipek ringkho ah put ah riephiei ruchang uh.
49004019	Amani na jak jet boi a rejaikawk chon khan rurepeh uh, khan rono chon rikip thawna rang khan rurapham uh.
49004020	Inia Christa kha khatikhan rutawk u makche.
49004021	Jesu dieng adik a`awm kha ang a, ama kha nangruloi ua ama rishim kha nururuchuk u joi.
49004022	Milem ditrekhe dungjuia matieng a pawrche ringkholui awmchan kha pai u roh.
49004023	Khan nang mulungmining u ratha khan athar kha chang u roh.
49004024	Khan adik dikna le riethieng a Pathien na emeh dungjuitak a ikon miring `thar kha rieshiei u roh.
49004025	Makha rang khan dikboina kha pai u tana “Miring rikip na ringchangpui le adik kha riei u roh,” ajarla kieini hi aringshom nanih u inih.
49004026	“Munu thaw boi a shang u roh.” Nang mulung hangna u khan ni tah naw rosho.
49004027	Raikho rang khan mun peh u naw roh.
49004028	Murushah hai kha na murulai naw rosho. Kha ruhut a chon thaw rieshie rangai miring le reshem rang, atha kha thaw rosho.
49004029	Turniei chawng kha nang ner uah put ah vak shok naw rosho, inia mothoina rang a nemna kha, rangai dungjuia riei u roh. Makha rangai hai dieng khan numpokmirit kha peknathiei rang a inih.
49004030	Khan Pathien Ratha Riethieng kha mawshaw u naw roh. Ama kha Pathien na inakhekna rang a Nikho rang khan nangni dieng jetirunam kha inih.
49004031	Mulung akha, ashang, lunghang, hareshawng khan mieshietna kholok kha ashie rikip kha le nangni ah put ah pai u roh.
49004032	Inia Pathien na Christa jar a inarangaidam u kha ang a, khatlekhat dieng ninghoi, mulung renem, khan khatlekhat chung a rangaidam repethiei kha chang u roh.
49005001	Khajarkhan numipok naite hai kha ang a, Pathien nunchan ruchuh miring kha nih u roh.
49005002	Christa na kieini hi numinopok a kieini rang nining a rurepeh kha ang a, numpok aship ringkho khan ring u roh. Makha Pathien dieng a pek rawthawina manamhoi kha inih.
49005003	Inia rejai le riethieng boi kholok ninawkle raphamna kha tute na nang kar ua irimingshe ban naw rosho. Makha miriethieng hai rang a awmchan rohoi kha inih.
49005004	Khan chawngtar le vetchawng ninawkle aracha boi chawngmejer ruhut a mapakna chawng kha riei u roh.
49005005	Hijarhin nangjet uh, makhala rejai ninawkle mirono ninawkle phamrai athaw miring, rilim abieh miring hihaihi na Christa le Pathien rengchangna shung a inkoklo kha tum ngam naw nih.
49005006	Tute na nangni kha hongchawng le nelem u naw rosho. Ajarla hijarhin Pathien lunghangna kha chawng rangai boi hai dieng ajong inih.
49005007	Khajarkhan amani le chonthawshom hai kha chang u naw roh.
49005008	Ajarla matienglai khan ajing kha nangrunih uh. Inia tuntu Pumi jar a mieivar kha nangnih u joi. Mieivar kha ang a ring u roh.
49005009	Ajarla Ratha ara kha tu atha, dikna le adik rikip kha inih.
49005010	Pumi maikung a ningnitroi chon kha mumuk u roh.
49005011	Khan ara boi ajing chonthaw miring hai kha ringruchun pui u naw roh. Kha ruhut a rawkawk u roh.
49005012	Amani na muruk a ithaw u hai kha riei rangshe jaknaroi inih.
49005013	Inia rawkawkna kholok kha mieivar na imalar inih, ajarla imalar rikip kha mieivar inih.
49005014	Khajarkhan ama na iti, “Che u rang roh, aja miring hai! Athi ah put ah thoi u rang roh, khan Christa na anaeh u rangnih.”
49005015	Khajarkhan mimawng hai kha ang a niboia, ashing miring hai kha ang a, riringtak a ring u roh.
49005016	Apha kha thatak a rotokna u roh, ajarla nikho hai hi thalai mak.
49005017	Hijarhin amawng kha nih u naw roh, inia Pumi mulungmining kha imaw nih, iti kha jet u roh.
49005018	Ju khawp u naw roh, makha mitiroi inih. Inia Ratha kha le nimiship u rosho.
49005019	Pathien lah le, Biekrup lah le khan Rathalam lah le nangni khatlekhat rashai u tana, nang mulung ua Pumi kha mapakna lah le awi u roh.
49005020	Nupumi u Jesu Christa riming a pha rikip a irikip rang Apa Pathien dieng mapakna niei u roh.
49005021	Pathien kha chih a khatlekhat awnoi a awm u roh.
49005022	Nupui hai, Pumi awnoi a nangawm u kha ang a, nang param hai awnoi a awm u roh.
49005023	Ajarla Christa hi Biekrup lu anih hi ang a, param hai hi nupui hai lu inih. Khan Christa hi pum Shandampa kha inih.
49005024	Khajarkhan biekrup na Christa dieng thoirede kha ang a, nupui hai na`awm amani paramtak hai dieng thoirede u rosho.
49005025	Param hai, Christa na`awm biekrup numipok a nining a ama ruhut a rurepeh kha ang a, nang nupui hai kha numpoh u roh.
49005026	Makha chawng jar a tui le rushuk shole, ama kha riethiengmashak a machaina rang a inih.
49005027	Khan biekrup alur `khat, shebe boi, ninawkle irikin boi, ninawkle kha le ra`ang, inia riethieng le mieshiet boi amatak dieng malarna rang a inih.
49005028	Khatikhan param hai na unupui hai kha amani pumtak ang a, numipok u rang a shok. Khajarkhan unupuitak numapoh kha nining a numropoh inih.
49005029	Ajarla upumtak amumak tute awm mak, inia Pumi na Biekrup dieng iruthaw kha ang a, makha ivai a irielien inih.
49005030	Ajarla kieini hi ama pum, ama taksha, ama ru hai pasha hai kha nanih uh.
