49005031	“Hijarhin miring kha na unulepa kha mak rangnih, khan ama inkonu dieng ruchun rangnih, khan idi kha taksha `khat chang rangnih.”
49005032	Mahi murukchawng alientak inih, inia Christa le biekrup jar a kiti inih.
49005033	Khanikengta mi rikip na ama inkonutak kha amatak kha ang a khatikhan numpoh rosho. Khan inkonu na`awm inkopa kha richit peh rosho.
49006001	Naite hai, Pumi jar a nang nulepa chawng kha rangai u roh, ajarla mahi dikna kha inih.
49006002	“Nangnu le nangpa kha richit peh u roh,” makha chawngrakham le roroia, akhat changna chawngpek kha inih.
49006003	“Makha nangni rang hoina le rieliei chung a ringshawtna kha nih rangnih.”
49006004	Khan apa hai, nang nai hai kha ningmieshiet pe u naw roh, khania Pumi chawngrachakna kha le riji u roh.
49006005	Shok hai, rieliei ichatna dungjuia, Christa dieng a nangithaw u kha ang a, mulungkiptak a le chitnieitak a rieliei a nang pumi hai chawng kha jui u roh.
49006006	Miring hai mik`en a ningnitna ang boi a, Christa shok hai, mulung rieirit ah put ah Pathien mulungmining athaw kha nih u roh.
49006007	Miring hai dieng a nangithaw u kha ang boi a, Pumi dieng a nangithaw u kha ang a, mulungluttak a chon thaw u roh.
49006008	Ajarla ih kha nita`awm atha kha nangithaw u nitjoiatu, shok nit a moshok nita`awm, Pumi ah put ah makhatak kha man rangnih.
49006009	Khan pumpa hai, nang Pumi u takawm ravan a awm, khan ama dieng engshietenlar awm mak, iti kha jet u tana, makhatak kha, amani dieng michit boi a thaw u roh.
49006010	Dawngkhit a, kuliennai hai, Pumi jar a le ama ratna ranak a arat kha nih u roh.
49006011	Diabol mohonna maton a nangdingna ngam u rang, Pathien rapon kha mawkawp u roh.
49006012	Ajarla kieini hi taksha, khan thishen le robon nih u makme, inia ranakniei hai le chamniei hai, mahi ajing manmieshie apoh hai, ravan mun a rathalam ashie hai le inih.
49006013	Khajarkhan ashie nikho hai hin nang dingna ngam u rang le kholok mawtawrviek a dingna rang, Pathien rapon kha mawkawp u roh.
49006014	Khajarkhan adik kha kawngkhit a nangikhit u le roroia, dikna phaw kha mawkawp u tana nettak a ding u roh.
49006015	Nangrashamna u rang, lungdamna apeh athachawng kha le nangke u kha thawp u roh.
49006016	Chungchon a takashawn phaw kha loi u tana makhan ashie miring ah put ah ivakkap mieichong tharu kholok kha nangthat ngam u rangnih.
49006017	Khan shandamna ralukhum kha rukhu u roh. Khan ratha chemjam kha`awm rak u roh, makha Pathien chawng inih.
49006018	Mahin Ratha jar a pha rikip a nikna le irikip chung a rieina niei u roh. Doiratna le rieina kholok le, miriethieng hai kholok ruhut a, riring u roh.
49006019	Khan athachawng murukchawng kha mulung ngar`er a rophongna rang, chawngrieina nepeknathiei rang, kiei rangawm ninik pe u roh.
49006020	Mahi rang hin khoplam a ruhuttir kha kanih. Kiei na kirieingir rang a kha mulung ngar`er a kierieina rang, ninik pe u roh.
49006021	Inia kiei dieng a ashok chon hi nangni na`awm nangjetna u rang, kunumpok kanaipangpa le Pumi dieng a mulung repeh shepding, Tychicus ama na irikip kha nangni dieng nemejet u rangnih.
49006022	Kieini dieng ashok chon nangjetna u rang le nang mulung u kha numuchumna pe rangbak khan a, nangni dieng kivaktir inih.
49006023	Pathien le Pumi Jesu Christa ah put ah lungdamna le khan numpok le rawtawp takashawn kha uliennai hai dieng a`awm nih rosho.
49006024	Mulunglut a nupumi Jesu Christa numapoh mi kholok dieng numpokmirit kha na chatboi a nawawm pui u rosho. Amen.
50001001	Jesu Christa jar a Philippi ah awm miriethieng hai, kengamroi hai le deacon hai kholok dieng Jesu Christa shok hai, Timothy le Paul kieini na kimiejiek u inih.
50001002	Napa u Pathien le Pumi Jesu Christa numpokmirit le lungdamna kha nangni dieng inepek u nih rosho.
50001003	Kinimininghepna u pha rikip a Pathien kha kamapak.
50001004	Nang kholok rang kinikna rikip a mulung parlamrok a kinik.
50001005	Athachawng jar a nangringruchun u putna ah put ah tunshe hin mapakna kieniei.
50001006	Nangni dieng chon atha ruput mi kha na Jesu Christa Nikhoshe khan rupummashak rangnih. Mahitak hin kirangam pui kha awm.
50001007	Nangni kumulung shung ua nangawm u jarkhan, hitihin a nang lawpsheng u jar a kimining hi kidikna inih. Ajarla kurukhumna le kirodoipuina dire a le athachawng kimuchukna khan numpokmirit kha kiei le nangitumshom u inih.
50001008	Ajarla Pathien hi kiei rang a kungchang kha inih, makhala Jesu Christa lainatna kha le khadawrshe khan kanarangai uh.
50001009	Khajarkhan nang numpok u kha jetna le thieina kholok a liekliek a lien shishitna rang, nikna kha kieniei.
50001010	Khajarkhan makha Christa nikho rang khan minek a athadet nieinak hai kha nangmumukna u rang, metek boi le atha kha nangnitna u rang a inih.
50001011	Ajarla Pathien na Jesu Christa jar a dikna ara hai kha le nimiship u joi. Khajarkhan miring hai na Pathien kha mulur a mapak uh.
50001012	Inia uliennai hai, kiei dieng a ashok chon hai kholok hi na athachawng kha irurajarmashak inih, iti hi nangni dieng kinemejet jawt u inih.
50001013	Khajarkhan lungroko ah kurukhum hi Christa jar a inih, iti hi Praetorium kholok ah le mun tieitang kholok ah hawng malang joi.
50001014	Khan Pumi jar a uliennai hai arawplam na kurukhumna khan rangamna niei uh, khan chih boi a chawngriei rang, mulung ngar shishitna niei uh.
50001015	Eshen na Christa kha mukmakna le rahana jar a rophong uh, khan eshen na mulung dik jar a rophong uh.
50001016	Matieng a hai kha na mulung dik a nih boi, inia bingrieina jar a Christa kha rophong uh. Amani na kurukhumna khan shawna kobo ngam u, tia rumining uh.
50001017	Anuk a hai kha na athachawng kodoi pui jar a inih, iti jet u jarkhan, numpok jar a eshem uh.
50001018	Khanitala imaw nih? Ih khan nitjoiawm, hong a nit a adik a nitjoiawm, Christa kha eshem uh. Makhan kiningai, awh, kiei na ningai rang kanih.
50001019	Ajarla nangininikna pe u le Christa Jesu Ratha vaina jar a mahi kashandamna kha chang rangnih joi, iti hi kejet.
50001020	Kingakrala le kangakmining dungjuia, makhan jakna lekshe niei naw ning, inia mulungar`er a pha rikip a, khan tunawm, aring a nit a athi a nita`awm, Christa kha kupum shung hin mielien rangnih.
50001021	Ajarla kiei rang tu aring hi Christa kha inih, khan athi hi nemna kha inih.
50001022	Inia pum a karing joiatu, makha kochonthaw ara rawpna rang a inih, nitjoiawm imaw kimadan rang, kiei jet mi`ing.
50001023	Kiei hi idi na nachep joi: rechen a Christa le ka`awm jawtdet joi, makha inekinek a athadet inih.
50001024	Inia aring a ka`awm rang a hi nangni rang rangai detlai.
50001025	Mahi na narangammashak, ajarla nang mashena u rang le takashawn a nang ningaina u rang, nang kholok le awm a dawn she rang kanilai, iti hi kejet.
50001026	Khajarkhan nangni dieng kavaret rang a hi, Jesu Christa jar a, kiei dieng nang lienrashatna u kha liendet rangnih.
50001027	Jesu Christa athachawng kha le rutukthep a ring u roh. Nangni aen kava ninawkle karangah joiawm, nang jar u jet rang kanih. Khajarkhan mulung `khat a athachawng a takashawn khan rojo shomna rang, Ratha `khat a ding u roh.
50001028	Khan nangni norodoi pui hai kha chih u naw roh. Mahi na athangna u rang a jetna kha inih. Inia nangni rang tu makha Pathien ah put ah shandamna kha nih rangnih.
50001029	Ajarla nangni Christa ruhut rang Pathien na nepek u joi, makhala Christa dieng takashawn ranga kha niboia, ama rangawm ashaw rang a nangnih u joi.
50001030	Kiei dieng a nangimuk u shawnatak kha doi u roh. Tunawm shawna kidoi a ka`awm nangijet u hi inih.
50002001	Khajarkhan Christa jar a mawshawkna kha awm jarkhan, numpok ah put ah jong maw`awina kha awm jarkhan, Ratha le ringruchunna kha awm jarkhan, mulungshitna le roihoina kha awm jarkhan,
50002002	makha mulungminingtak kha le, makha numpoktak kha le, makha Ratha ruchunna kha le mulung `khat niei u tana kiningaina kha nimikip pe u roh.
50002003	Bingrieina ninawkle nemna boi mapakna dungjuia chon kha thaw u naw roh, inia mining rede a shik miring hai kha nangninek a thadet, tia mining u roh.
50002004	Nangidit u ranga khan mulungrepeh u naw roh, inia shik hai idit rangawm mulungrepeh u roh.
50002005	Mahi mulungmining hi nangni dieng awm rosho, ajarla mahi Christa diengawm a`awm inih.
50002006	Ama hi Pathien meh ah ruawm nitjoiawm, Pathien le ra`angna kha shurna rang, rumining mak.
50002007	Inia nining a rurorok a shok meh ruloi, khan miring meh a jong shok.
50002008	Khan miring nitna khan ama na nining a rurede, khan cross ah thitnashe khan chawngjui a ruthi.
50002009	Khajarkhan Pathien na ama kha rashangtak a rulawm a riming rikip chung a riming kha ama dieng rupek.
50002010	Makha Jesu riming khan ravan le rieliei, khan rieliei thoi a awm kholok na rukhuk shun a buna rang a inih.
50002011	Khan mieliei rikip na Apa Pathien lurna rang, Jesu Christa hi Pumi inih, tia rophongna rang a inih.
50002012	Khajarkhan kunumpok hai, kaw`awmlaite hin niboia, arawplam a koboriethieishe khanawm, pha rikip a kawchawng kha nangrujui uh. Kha ang a nang shandamna u kha chon a shena rang, chit le rawnawklam a chon thaw u roh.
50002013	Ajarla ama ningnitna rangbak mining a chon thawna rang a nang kar ua chonathaw kha Pathien inih.
50002014	Rieishiet boi a le chawngrieshiet boi a chon kholok thaw u roh.
50002015	Makha nangni nawng boi le ariempeng nangnitna u rang a inih. Khan mahi hongthaw, pawrche rong kar hin, metek boi Pathien nai hai kha nangnitna u rang a inih. Khan amani kar khan manmieshie shung a arshi hai ang a nangvarna u rang a inih.
50002016	Khan ringna chawng kha mukuirep u roh. Makha kiei hi nemna boi a tanrieshiet rutan le nemna boi a chon thaw ruchang mi`ing, tia Christa Nikho khan lienrashatna kienieina rang a inih.
50002017	Inia Pathien na kiei hi rawthawina le nang takashawn u chonmun khan tuinapaina joiawm kiningai, khan nangni le kiningaishom.
50002018	Makha chonmuntak khan ningai u tana kiei le ningaishom u roh.
50002019	Timothy kha nangni dieng kavaktirrelenna rang, Pumi Jesu jar a ngakkimining. Makha nang jar u kejet `le, lungar nepekna rang a inih.
50002020	Mulungluttak a nangni kha tennareh rang ama le ra`ang miring shik niei mi`ing.
50002021	Ajarla Jesu Christa rang tawk boi a kholok na amani ranga rang atawk uh.
50002022	Shapa `khat na apa dieng chonithaw kha ang a, kiei le athachawng rang chonthawshom inih. Timothy na khatikhan awmchan kha mumuk, iti kha nangjet uh.
50002023	Kiei dieng imaw shok nih, iti ke`en shole, nawtshun a jong tirna rang, ngakkimining.
50002024	Khan kieiawm shawt boi a kajong rangnih, tia Pumi kha karangam pui.
50002025	Kha khea nangni dieng Epaphroditus kijongtir rang a hi thawboithaboi `khat a kimining. Ama hi uliennai `khat inih, kochonthaw pui le ramiring kichangpui, nang chawngchawipa u, khan kirangaina mun ah chon thaw miring kha inih.
50002026	Nangni kha anarangai uh, inia natlam a awm kha nangjet u jarkhan, mulung shawtak a awm.
50002027	Ajarla ama hi ana a athideng runih, inia Pathien na ama chung a roihoina kha irutetna inih. Ama ranga niboia kieiawm, makha mulungshaw chung a mulungshaw kha kienieina boi rang a inih.
50002028	Khajarkhan ngakrala a kijongtir inih. Makha nangni na ama kha nangrumuk u phakhan, nang ningaina u rang, khan kieiawm kumulungshaw kha rakaina rang a inih.
50002029	Khajarkhan Pumi riming a ningai kholok le rujawng u roh, khan kha ang miring hai kha richit peh u roh.
50002030	Ajarla Christa chon jar a athideng inih. Kiei dieng a nang chonthaw u arabat mishipna rang, iringkho manar boi inih.
50003001	Dawngkhit a, uliennai hai, Pumi riming a ningai u roh. Nangni dieng ra`angre miejiek rang hin amatatna awm mak, inia nangni rang mahi rodongna `khat inih.
50003002	Ui a`ang miring hai kha riring pui u roh. Ashie thaw hai kha riring pui u roh, khan mawr`ep hai kha riring pui u roh.
50003003	Ajarla kieini hi Ratha a Pathien chubaibawk, Christa Jesu jar a lienrasha le taksha a rangamna niei kha kinita`awm, vailar a rangamna niei boi miring kha nanih uh. Khajarkhan kieini hi adik vunep miring kha nanih uh.
50003004	Khan shik miring na vailar a rangamna kieniei, ti joiatu, kiei na kienieidet.
50003005	Kiei hi Benjamin vawnchawi Israel phung, ni riet changna a vunep, Hebrew riethiengbeng, Dan dungjuia Pharisee,
50003006	mulungrepeh dungjuia biekrup shawna rupeh, Dan shung ah awm dikna dungjuia, kiei metek boi kha kurunih.
50003007	Inia kiei dieng a nemna nieinak hai kha Christa jar a thangna, tia kimining joi.
50003008	Diktak a danlakngam boi kupumi Jesu Christa jetna jar a ih kholok hi thangna, tia koloi joi. Ama jar a nieinak kholok kamathang joi. Christa kha manna rang ih kholok mitiroi `khat a koloi joi.
50003009	Khan ama jar a Pathien na inumuk kinitna rang, Dan ah put ah kidikna kha nieilai mi`ing. Inia Christa jar a kiniei takashawn le Pathien ah put ah dikna chung a takashawn jar a nih joi.
50003010	Ama le ama thoiretna ranak kha le ama shawna ringruchunna kha kejet jar a, ama thitna khan nokonchen rangnih.
50003011	Makha, nitthieitukshe, thoiretna kha koshokna rang a inih.
50003012	Atumsha ninawkle rupumsha kha nimi`inglai, inia Christa na inushurna makhatak kha shurna rang, kirojo nilai.
50003013	Uliennai hai, kushur joi, tia mining mi`ing, inia kithaw `khat tu: kanuk a awm hai kha kiemieniei a, kamaton a awm hai kha kiban a awm kanilai.
50003014	Lawh kha mukna rang, khinmun tieng khan korojo joi. Makha lawh kha tu Christa jar a chung tieng a koina kha inih.
50003015	Khajarkhan rupumping miring kholok na mining ra`angna kha niei u rawi. Ih khan shik nangmining u joiatu, makha`awm Pathien na nangni dieng malar rangnih.
50003016	Nitjoiawm noshoknasho u shedan khan ring u rawi, khan makha lamtak kha mining u rawi.
50003017	Uliennai hai, kununruchuh u roh. Nangni rang endar `khat a ka`awm u hi ang a, khatikhan a aring miring hai kha enrep u roh.
50003018	Christa cross kha araha pui hai kha ang a, mi tampui ring uh. Amani jar a chatboia nangni dieng kunururiei u joi, inia tun chaplam a kinieriei u hi inih.
50003019	Rieliei nieinak a mulungrepeh hai maton khan thangna awm. Amani pathien kha tu vawnpui kha inih, khan amani jakna khan amani lurna kha awm pe uh.
50003020	Inia naw`awmna u rang a kha tu ravan a awm. Makha mun khan Shandampa, Pumi Jesu Christa kha ningakrala u inih.
50003021	Ama pum alur kha le ra`angmashakna rang, nupum u rede hi tho rangnih. Makha ranak kha na nieinak kholok ama thoi a itet ngam inih.
50004001	Khajarkhan uliennai hai, nangni hi numkipok le kirangai, khan kiningaina le kerenglukhum kha nangnih uh. Khajarkhan Pumi riming a dingrep u roh.
50004002	Euodia le Syntyche kha Pumi riming a mulungmining `khat a awmna rang, kidawi inih.
50004003	Inih, nangniawm kawnawdawi uh, Aw ringkaw adik kiruput pui miring hai, mahi nupang hai hi shan u roh. Ajarla amani hi athachawng rang khan kiei, Clement, khan kochonthaw pui tieitang le chon ranak thaw runih uh. Amani riming hai kha ringna behangbuk khan awm joi.
50004004	Pumi jar a pha rikip a ningai u roh. Takthar a kitiret, ningai u roh.
50004005	Nang mulung u renem kha miring rikip na jet rosho. Pumi jongna rang pha kha nai joi.
50004006	Ih rang khan mulung shaw u naw roh, inia irikip a anih le ariei a mapak le roroia nanginik u kha Pathien dieng mejet u roh.
50004007	Khan jetna kholok akhe Pathien lungdamna kha na nang mulung u le nang mulungmining u kha Christa Jesu jar a nurung pe u rangnih.
50004008	Dawngkhit a, uliennai hai, adik chon kha nit a, richitna kha nit a, dikna kha nit a, riethieng kha nit a, ningnitna kha nit a, rieihoina kha nit a, tharingna le mapak rang a rutuk kha awm joiatu, hihaihi mining u roh.
50004009	Kiei dieng nangiruruchuk u, nangiruman u, nangirurangai u, khan nangirumuk u kha thaw u roh, khanitatu lungdamna apeh Pathien na nangni le awm rangnih.
50004010	Pumi riming a lientak a ningaina kieniei, ajarla kaishiei a kiei dieng a nang mulung ninatetna u kha nang matharret ua kiei hi tennangnareh u joiawm, chanthatna kha niei u makche.
50004011	Ravatna chawng kiriei nimak, ajarla ih awmchan khan ka`awm joiawm, ningnitna rang, kururuchuk joi.
50004012	Arokpet a awm, khan ruphulam a awm, iti hi imaw nih iti kejet: vawnshiplam a awm, khan vawnchamlam a awm, ruphu le ravatlam a awm, ih khan nita`awm, kururuchuksho joi.
50004013	Ranak napeh Christa jar a chon kholok kawthaw ngam.
50004014	Ih kha nitjoiawm, kawshawna hin nangnarachang pui u jarkhan, mapak nangawm uh.
50004015	Khajarkhan Philippi miring hai, nangni na`awm jet u roh, makhala athachawng putpek a Macedonia ah put ah kakuruchawilai khan, Biekrup `khatshe na shumleshier a nururachang pui mak, nangni ranga nangnih uh.
50004016	Khan Thessalonica ah kuruawmlaishe khan, karavat phakhan, voikhatvoidi nangnawhawng-mawchawithiei uh.
50004017	Khutchawi kha kitawk nimak a, Pathien na nang nieimun ua ara imupung kha kitawk inih.
50004018	Nivakmawchawi u nieinak hai kha Epaphroditus ah put ah kurumuk a ih kholok ruphu a kieniei a kaship joi. Amani kha manam hoi, loithiei le Pathien ningminit rawthawina kha inih.
50004019	Inia kapathien na Christa Jesu jar a ama rawchawngna lurna dungjuia, nang ravatna u khan nimiship pe u rangnih.
50004020	Khan napa u Pathien dieng kumshawtkumshawt a alur kha nih rosho. Amen.
50004021	Christa Jesu riming a awm miriethieng rikip kha chubai thaw pui u roh. Kirawtawp pui uliennai hai na chubai navakmawchawi uh.
50004022	Miriethieng hai kholok na, khinniei a Caesar inshungkhur na, nangni dieng chubai navakmawchawi uh.
50004023	Nupumi Jesu Christa numpokmirit kha nang kholok dieng a`awm nih rosho. Amen.
51001001	Pathien mulungmining jar a Christa tirtawn, Paul le uliennai Timothy, kieini na Christa jar a Colossae ah awm miriethieng hai le takashawn uliennai hai dieng kiemiejiek uh.
51001002	Napa u Pathien le Pumi Jesu Christa ah put ah numpokmirit le lungdamna kha nangni dieng awm rosho.
51001003	Nangni rang ningthingkip nikna kieniei u phakhan, nupumi u Jesu Christa Apa Pathien dieng mapakna kieniei uh.
51001004	Ajarla Jesu Christa dieng nang takashawn u le miriethieng hai kholok rang a nanginiei u numpok kha kejet uh.
51001005	Makha Pathien na nangni rang ravan a ibawm ngakmining jar a inih. Mahi jar hin adik chawng chungchanga athachawng shung khan nangirurangaisha u nih joi.
51001006	Khan manmieshie kholok shung a ajong kha ang a, nangni na Pathien numpokmirit kha adik a nangirurangai u le nangirujet uah put ah nangni dieng ashok kha ang a, ara moshok a manmieshie shung a mupung joi.
51001007	Kunumpok koshok chang pui u Epaphras ah put ah nangirujet u kha le ra`angre inih. Ama hi nang ruhut ua rangam pui rang rutuk Christa shepding `khat inih.
51001008	Ama hi Ratha jar a nang numpok u kha kieini dieng nemejetpa kha`awm inih.
51001009	Khajarkhan nang chungchang ua kirujet u nikho ah put ah nangni rang anih chat u mi`ing. Rathalam shingna le thieina kholok jar a, ama mulungmining jetna kha nangshipna u rang, nikna kieniei uh.
51001010	Makha Pumi kha richit pek a, rupumping a ningminit pe a, atha chon rikip rang ara moshok a Pathien lungvar khan nanglien shishitna u rang a inih.
51001011	Ama ranak lurna dungjuia, ningai le roroia doiratna rang le shawtshawdoina rang, Pathien na ranak le namaratna u rang,
51001012	avar a miriethieng hai inkoklo kha amani le atum rang a nurutukmashak Apa dieng khan kamapak uh.
51001013	Ama na cham ajing ah put ah noroshoh a ama numpok shapa rengchangna shung khan nawthawt u joi.
51001014	Jesu dieng khan ama thishen jar a Pathien na kieini hi nurukhekna joi. Makha munu rangaidamna kha inih.
51001015	Ashapa kha malang boi Pathien rilim le khutkon rikip chung a ruawm konmasha kha inih.
51001016	Ajarla ravan le rieliei a awm kholok ama na irukon inih. Ravan le rieliei a awm kholok ama na rukon. Malang le malang boi, rengmun nit a, pumichangna nit a, rampo hai nit a, khan chamniei hai nit a, kholok ama na ama rang a irukon inih.
51001017	Khan ama hi kholok mala a awm inih, khan ama na kholok lawp `khat a irak inih.
51001018	Biekrup hi Christa pum kha inih, khan Christa hi biekrup lu kha inih. Ama kha putna le athi ah put ah ruthoi masha kha inih. Makha ama na nieinak kholok maton a awmna rang a inih.
51001019	Ajarla shipna kholok ama dieng a`awm rang a kha na Apa kha ningruminit pe.
51001020	Khan nieinak kholok kha amatak dieng riengieimashak. Ama cross thishen jar a, rieliei a le ravan a awm nieinak nitjoiawm, lungdamna kha rukon joi.
51001021	Nangni hi pha `khat khan ashie chon kha na inamachai u, khan nang mulung ua Pathien le re`er kha nangrunih uh,
51001022	inia tuntu ama maikung a riethieng, metek boi le rawkawk boi `khat a nurupekna u rang, Pathien na ama taksha pum thitna kha le nieriengieimashak u joi.
51001023	Nangni na khur choi a phunsha takashawn khan nangawm ua, athachawng ngakmining ah put ah nangrephet u joi nawkatu, Pathien na hitihin nurupek u rangnih. Makha athachawng kha nangrurangai u joi. Makha athachawng kha ravan noi a juleva kholok dieng irushemsha inih. Khan makha athachawng khan Paul kiei na shok kuruchang.
51001024	Khan nang ruhut ua kawshawna hai khan kiningai. Christa shawna a ravat kha kupum a kiei na kimiship joi. Makha ama pumtak kha biekrup inih. Makha rangbak khan a kithaw inih.
51001025	Pathien na kiei dieng a inurupek roiruputna khan kiei shok kachang joi. Makha Pathien chawng kha nangni dieng rupumping a pekna rang a inih.
51001026	Kum khatuk shawt ah put ah le rongrong ah put ah murukchawng kha tun miriethieng hai dieng malarmashak joi.
51001027	Mahi murukchawng hi rawchawng lurna kha Phungshik hai kar a mulurna rang, Pathien na madangmashak joi. Makha nangni dieng a awm Christa alur ngakmining kha inih.
51001028	Makha lungvar kholok le mi rikip dieng kieini na Christa kha michitlam a le ruchulam a korophong uh. Makha mi rikip kha rutukthep Jesu Christa miring `khat a pekna rang a inih.
51001029	Hi rang hin ama na kiei dieng a ranaktak a chon ithaw dungjuia, rojolam a, chon kithaw inih.
51002001	Ajarla nangni rang le Laodicea ah awm miring hai, khan pum a kemeh amuh boi hai rangbak kawshawna kha kenemejet jawt uh.
51002002	Makha Pathien na amani mulung kha mangar pe a numpok jar a ruchunna u rang a inih. Makhan amani na madanghet a jet u phakhan, ajong rawchawngna kha man u ning, tia Apa Pathien le Christa murukchawng kha jetna u rang a inih.
51002003	Christa dieng varna le jetna kholok niei hai kha rethe a awm.
51002004	Mahi kirieina hi tu nangni kha tute na dawina chawng le nomohonna boi u rang a inih.
51002005	Ajarla kiei na pum a nangni le ka`awm nawkawm, nangni le Ratha a ka`awm. Christa dieng a nang takashawn u kha rieshieihiem le nettak a awm kha kumuk `le, kiningai.
51002006	Khajarkhan Christa Jesu kha Pumi `khat a nangiloi u le roroia, ama chawng khan ring u roh.
51002007	Ama dieng khan rujung meshe u tana mawng u roh, khan nettak a ding u roh. Khatikhan nuruchuk u jarkhan, nangni leklawr a makhan ningai u roh.
51002008	Riring u roh. Tukhat na nangni kha lungthim le nemna boi mohonna chawng a nimikhit u nih. Makha miring shena le manmieshie miruchukna dungjuia inih, inia Christa miruchukna dungjuia nimak.
51002009	Christa dieng khan Pathien changna shipna kholok kha na miring pumtak a awm.
51002010	Ama dieng rupum kha nangnih u joi. Ama kha rampo changna le cham kholok lu inih.
51002011	Ama jar a khut jaw boi vunepna kha le nangniawm vunnuruep pe u joi. Inia Christa ah put ah ajong vunepna khan munuphung balam pumtak kha Pathien na chen joi.
51002012	Baptisma loina khan Christa le nukhumchen u joi. Pathien chonthawna khan takashawn jar a ama le nurumothoichen u joi. Pathien na ama kha athi hai kar a rumothoi joi.
51002013	Nieshietna u kholok chung a rangaidamna nepek u shole, Pathien na Christa le inimiringchen joi. Mahi nang munuphung u balam a nangruthi u lai a le vunnangruep boi u lai a iruthaw inih.
51002014	Pathien na kieini le re`er a ukhut le irumiejiek chawngmocho kha nurumomot pe joi. Ama na Cross khan rumakhai a kieini ah put ah ruloi joi.
51002015	Ama na rampo hai le chamniei hai mieriem kha rumetet a ranak niei boi rumachang. Khan vanoi dieng malangsheng a rumumuk a cross jar a amani chung a ra rumawtawr joi.
51002016	Tute na nangni kha nekleshak a ninawkle rohoi a ninawkle thathar a, khan Sabbath nikho chungchanga naheng u naw rosho.
51002017	Hihaihi ajong rang a irilip ranga inih, inia atak kha tu Christa kha inih.
51002018	Lawh muk rang khan tute na nangni kha rutuk boi namachang u naw rosho. Makha rang khan anih boi a noi rede jawt le ravantir chubaibawk miring hai kha na imuk boi nieinak hai rukukriekiek kha riei uh. Makha munuphung balam mulungmining kha na nemna boi a ama kha iphuk inih.
51002019	Kha ang miring kha na Lu kha mukuirep mak. Ama dieng khan upum kholok kha ru le rang na irushuimashak kha na ranak ipek a Pathien na imielien shishit inih.
51002020	Khajarkhan manmieshie miruchukna ah put ah Christa kha le nangruthi u joiala, manmieshie a awmngai ang a, ijar a miruchukna awnoi khan a awm maw nangnih u lai?
51002021	“Shih u naw roh, tuidan en u naw roh, khan rak u naw roh.”
51002022	Kha hai kha miring hai chawngpek le miruchukna dungjuia awm nit jarkhan, irotokna khan kholok athang rang a nimak maw?
51002023	Kha hai kha lungvar ang a malang. Amani hai kha nining a kon richi, mulungrede rasha, khan pumtak kha imawshaw inih. Inia taksha re`erna pui ranak kha tu niei mak.
51003001	Khajarkhan nangni Christa le nurumothoishom u jarkhan, chung a awm nieinak kha rojo u roh. Makha mun khan Christa na Pathien chang tieng shuh a awm.
51003002	Chung a awm nieinak hai khan nang mulung peh u roh, inia rieliei nieinak hai khan nang mulung peh u naw roh.
51003003	Ajarla nangruthi ua, nang ringna u kha Pathien dieng Christa le rethe joi.
51003004	Niringna u anih Christa kha rumalar phakhan, nangniawm ama le alur a namalar u rangnih.
51003005	Khajarkhan nang rieliei pasha hai: riethieng boi, takjatna, ashie ditrekhe kha that u roh. Rapham iti hi rilim chubaibawk inih.
51003006	Hihai jar hin Pathien lunghangna kha chawngrangai boi hai dieng jong rangnih.
51003007	Amani dieng nangruring u lai khan, hihaihinawm nangruring u inih.
51003008	Inia tuntu kha hai kholok kha`awm nangithut u rang a shok joi. Khahaikha la: ashang, lunghang, ashie, mimieshiet, khan nang ner uah put ah chawngtar kha inih.
51003009	Khatlekhat dieng mielieshiei thaw u naw roh. Ajarla nang miring changna u alui kha ama chonthaw hai kha le nangruthat u joi.
51003010	Khan ama akonpa rilim dungjuia jetna khan Pathien na irumathar miring changna athar kha nangruko u joi.
51003011	Mahi ringkho `thar hin Greek, Jihudi, vunep, vunep boi, Greek nih boi, Scythia miring, shok le moshok kairekhena awm mak. Inia mi kholok rang Christa hi ih kholok kha inih.
51003012	Khajarkhan, Pathien na imadan miring hai kha ang a, riethieng le numipok miring hai, numpokthiei, ninghoi, rede, renem, khan doiratna, hihaihi ko u roh.
51003013	Akhat na akhat chung a rieishiet niei joiatu, khatlekhat rangaithiei u tana rangaidam nana u roh. Christa na inarangaidam u kha ang a, nangniawm rangaidam u roh.
51003014	Hihai kholok chung hin numpok kha ko u roh. Mahi na rupumping a inurushuimashak u inih.
51003015	Pathien lungdamna kha na nang mulung ua lamkai rosho. Kha rang khanawm nangni kha pum `khat a inurukoi u inih. Khan mapakthiei miring kha chang u roh.
51003016	Varna kholok le Christa chawng kha nangni dieng rawchawngtak a awm rosho. Lah le biekna lah le khan rathalam lah hai kha le khatlekhat ruchuh le rachak nana u tana numpokmirit kha le nang mulung shung ua Pumi dieng lah thaw u roh.
51003017	Chawng a ninawkle chon a, ih kha nitjoiawm, irikip a Pumi Jesu riming a thaw u roh. Ama jar a Apa Pathien kha mapak u roh.
51003018	Nupui hai, Pumi mik`en a rutuk kha ang a, nang paramtak hai awnoi a awm u roh.
51003019	Param hai nang nupui hai kha numpoh u roh. Amani dieng khan rum u naw roh.
51003020	Naite hai, irikip a nang nulepa hai chawng kha rangai u roh, ajarla mahi na Pumi kha ningiminit pe inih.
51003021	Apa hai, nang nai hai kha ningmieshiet pe u naw roh. Makha na amani mulung kha irakaimashak chang rangnih.
51003022	Shok hai, rieliei a nang pumi hai kha irikip a chawng rangai pe u roh. Miring ningminit miring hai kha ang a, imuk ranga khan chon thaw u naw roh. Inia Pathien kha chih u tana mulungluttak a chon thaw pe u roh.
51003023	Ih kha nangithaw u nitjoiawm ningaihiei a thaw u roh. Makha miring dieng a nimak a Pumi dieng a nangithaw u inih.
51003024	Inkoklo kha lawh `khat a nangimuk u kha nangjet u jarkhan, khatikhan chon thaw u roh. Ajartu Christa Pumi chon kha nangithaw u inih.
51003025	Ajarla adik boi athaw ama dieng khan adik boi ithaw kha le Pathien na athung rangnih. Khan Pathien dieng tu enshietenlar, iti awm mak.
51004001	Pumi hai, ravan a Pumi nanginiei u kha jet u tana shok hai kha nunchan adik le nunchan ra`ang a tawn u roh.
51004002	Nikna khan repeh u roh, makhan mapak le roroia riring u roh.
51004003	Chawng rang le Pathien na mawkawt mawlawngna rang, kieini rangawm nik shomna niei u roh. Christa murukchawng rieinathiei rangawm kiei hi hitihin a rukhum kanih.
51004004	Kiriei rang a kha madangsheng a kierieinathiei rang, nikna niei u roh.
51004005	Vai tieng ah awm miring hai dieng khan lungvar le ring u roh. Apha kha thatak a rotokna u roh.
51004006	Nang chawngriei u khan numpokmirit kha awmchak rosho, khan michi le mechek nih rosho. Makha nangni na mi rikip dieng nangimashangngir u rang a kha nangjetna u rang a inih
51004007	Tychicus na kajar kholok nangni dieng nemejet u rangnih. Ama hi nunumpok u uliennai `khat inih. Khan takashawn rang a rutuk shepding le Pumi jar a koshok chang pui `khat inih.
51004008	Nang jar u ajet rang le nang mulung u nemenemna pe rang, nangni dieng kivaktir nih joi.
51004009	Ama le, nang kar ua akhat, Onesimus hi kivaktir inih. Ama kha takashawn rang a rutuk le numkipok uliennai `khat inih. Hin ah ashok kholok amani na nieriei u rangnih.
51004010	Shurkhop miring kichang pui Aristarchus na nangni kha chubai nepek uh. Barnabas ulienpa shapa Mark na`awm nangni kha chubai nepek uh. Ama chungchanga chawng kenepek u joi. Ama na vak shok phakhan, lamjawng ruthaw u roh.
51004011	Justus, tia ikoi u Jesu na`awm nangni kha chubai nepek uh. Amani ranga hi Pathien rengchangna rang chon kithaw pui Jihudi miring nih uh. Amani hi kiei rang mulung ngamna nih uh.
51004012	Epaphras na nangni kha chubai nepek uh. Amani hi nang kar ua Christa shok `khat inih. Nangni na Pathien mulungmining kholok a rupum le aship nangnitna u rang, mulung shawtak a nikna rikip a niminingchak uh.
51004013	Nangni rang le Laodicea le Hierapolis ah awm hai rang a ama mulunglutna kha kiei na kungkachang inih.
51004014	Numnipok u loipu Luke le Demas amani na chubai nepek uh.
51004015	Laodicea ah awm uliennai hai kha chubai peh u roh. Khan Nymphas le ama in ah awm biekrup dieng khan chubai peh u roh.
51004016	Mahi chawngmawchawi hi nang kar ua nangtesho u le, Laodicea miring hai biekrup diengawm mete u roh. Khan Laodicea ah put ah chawngmawchawi kha`awm te u roh.
51004017	Archippus dieng khan “Pumi jar a nangimuk u chonthawna kha rupummashakngir u roh,” tia riei u roh.
51004018	Paul kiei na kukhuttak le chubai thawna hi kimiejiek inih. Lungroko shung ah korokhop hi mining u roh. Numpokmirit kha nangni le a`awm nih rosho. Amen.
52001001	Apa Pathien le khan Pumi Jesu Christa takashawn, Thessalonica miring hai biekrup dieng Paul, Silvanus khan Timothy kieini na kimiejiek u inih. Napa u Pathien le Pumi Jesu Christa ah put ah numpokmirit le lungdamna kha nangni dieng a`awm nih rosho. Pathien dieng Ningai Malarna
52001002	Kinikna rikip a kinaban u le roroia, nang kholok rang Pathien kamapakchak uh.
52001003	Kapathien le kapa u maikung khan nang takashawn u chon, nang numpok chonthawna le kupumi u dieng a ngakmining doiratna kha kiminingchak uh.
52001004	Pathien na numipok uliennai hai, nangni Pathien na namadan u joi, iti kha kejet uh.
52001005	Ajarla ka`athachawng u kha nangni dieng chawng ranga a ajong nimak a, ranak a, Ratha Riethieng a le minitna lientak a awm ajong inih. Nangni rangbak a kieini hi nang kar ua ih miring maw kurunih u, iti kha nangirujet u kha inih.
52001006	Nangni na shawdoitak a Ratha Riethieng ningaina kha le chawng kha nangruloi u jarkhan, nangni kha kunun u le Pumi nun ruchuh kha nangnih uh.
52001007	Makha Macedonia le Achaia ah awm takashawn miring kholok dieng endar changna rang a inih.
52001008	Ajarla nangni ah put ah Pumi chawng kha Macedonia le Achaia ranga khan rehemmashak a, Pathien dieng nang takashawn u kha na mun rikip ah athe joi. Makha kieini na rieinadet rangaina boi rang a inih.
52001009	Ajarla amanitak na lamnanginurujawngna u chungchang le nangni na aring le adik Pathien chon thawna rang, Pathien na athi ah put ah irumothoi,
52001010	khan ajong rang a mulung hangna ah put ah nakhekpa ravan ah put ah ajong shapa Jesu kha ngakna rang, rilim chubaibawk ah put ah Pathien dieng nangruhieina u dan kha nieriei uh.
52002001	Ajarla uliennai hai, kavatna u kha nemna boi runimak iti kha nangnitak na nangjet uh.
52002002	Inia Philippi khan shawna kirudoi ua, maimawktak a inurutawn nitjoiawm, Pathien athachawng kha nangni dieng rophongna rang, kapathien u dieng lungar kuruniei u, iti kha nangjet uh.
52002003	Ajarla kinawmawshawkna u kha lamrehena ninawkle rono mulung ninawkle mohonna ah put ah nimak.
52002004	Inia athachawng kha kieini dieng nganshiena rang, Pathien na kieini hi nawjawt pe u joi. Makha dungjuitak khan miring hai ningminitna rang niboia, kumulung u enretepa Pathien ningnitna rang, chawng kiriei u inih.
52002005	Ajarla nangijet u kha ang a, itikte nita`awm nieiman boi kha ruriei u mi`ing, khan phamraiawm ruthaw u mi`ing. Mahin Pathien na kungachang inih.
52002006	Christa tirtawn hai `khat a nangni dieng niknathiei ranak kha kuruniei u joiawm, miring hai ah put ah, ninawkle nangni ah put ah, ninawkle shik miring hai ah put ah mapakna kha kieini na rutawk u mi`ing.
52002007	Inia nu `khat na anai haitak kha tenretak a itawn kha ang a, nang kar ua renem kha kuruchang uh.
52002008	Ajarla numkipoktak u miring kha nangruchang u joi jarkhan, nangni kha kanarangaimer uh. Khajarkhan Pathien athachawngte kha niboia, kiringkho u takshe kha`awm nangni le kunurureshem pui jawt uh.
52002009	Ajarla uliennai hai, kochonthaw u le kawshawna u kha mininghep u roh. Pathien athachawng kururiei u lai khan, nangni kha pokrik pekna boi rang, shunlejan a chon kiruthaw u inih.
52002010	Takashawn hai nangni dieng a kaw`awmchan u kha khadawrshe a riethieng, adik, khan metek boi inih, iti kha nangni na kungachang nangnih uh, khan Pathien na`awm kungachang inih.
52002011	Apa `khat na anai hai dieng a iriei kha ang a, nang kholok dieng kawnawmawshawk uh, lungar kenepek uh, khan kawnawdawi uh, iti kha nangjet uh.
52002012	Makha ama rengchangna le ama lurnatak khan anakoi Pathien dieng rutuk a nangringna u rang a inih.
52002013	Mahi jarhin kieini na`awm chatboia Pathien kha kamapak uh, makhala, kieini dieng a nangijet u Pathien chawng kha nangloi u phakhan, miring hai chawng ang a loi u makche, inia mahi adik`het anih le roroia, Pathien chawng kha inih, tia nangruloi uh. Mahi na takashawn miring hai nangni dieng rutukthep a chon ithaw inih.
52002014	Ajarla uliennai hai, Judea ah awm Christa Jesu takashawn Pathien biekrup hai nunruchuh kha nangnih u joi. Ajarla amani na Jihudi hai ah put ah irudoi u shawna kha le ra`angre kha nangni na`awm nang khomiring hai ah put ah nangirudoi u inih.
52002015	Amani na Pumi Jesu le amani thiempulien haitak kha ruthat uh, khan shawna nurupek uh. Pathien kha ningrumieshiet pe uh, khan mi kholok kha rurodoi pui uh.
52002016	Phungshik hai na ringnathiei u rang, chawngkiruriei u kha, Jihudi hai na rukhar uh. Hitihin amani munu kha mishipna jawnjai uh. Khan dawngkhit a Pathien lunghangna kha amani dieng jongshok pe u joi.
52002017	Inia uliennai hai, pha bawngte rang hin, mulung a niboia melemeh a, nangni le nereshenmashak ua mailemai a rumukna rang hin kanarangairiei u joi.
52002018	Khajarkhan kieini na nangni dieng kava jawt uh. Paul kieitak na`awm tharthar a kirumining inih, inia Satan na kalam u kha nurukhar pe uh.
52002019	Pumi Jesu Christa jong phakhan, ama maikung a kangakmining u ninawkle kiningaina u ninawkle kielienrashatna u rang, renglukhum kha imaw nih? Nangni hi nih u makche maw?
52002020	Ajarla nangni hi kulurna u le kiningaina u kha nangnih uh.
52003001	Khajarkhan kieini na kodoi ngam boi u phakhan, Athen ah kawlawpte u inamak u rang khan kurudit uh.
52003002	Nang takashawn u chungchanga ranak napeh le nawmawshawk u rang, Timothy kha kivaktir u inih. Khan ama kha kuliennai u le Pathien shepding, khan Christa athachawng rang a kochon thaw pui u `khat inih.
52003003	Hihai epshawna hi na tuteawm rawnawkmashakna boi rang, kivaktir u inih. Ajarla mahi rang hin kieini hi inurumadan u nih joi, iti hi nangnitak na nangrujet u joi.
52003004	Diktak a, nangni le kuruawm u lai khan, shawna nidoingir u rang a inih, iti hi kieini na masha a kinururiei u nih joi. Makhatak kha ang a, ashok kha nangijet u kha inih.
52003005	Hijarhin ashawt a kodoi ngam boi phakhan, nang takashawn u kha jetna rang, kivaktir inih. Khanawkatu milempa kha na nelem u ning, tia kochonthaw u kha nemna boi chang rangnih.
52003006	Khania tun Timothy kha nangni ah put ah kieini dieng vak shok joi. Khan nang takashawn u le nang numpok u athachawng kha vak chawi joi. Nangni kha rumukna pui rang, kinarangai u kha ang a, mirittak a nangniminingchak uh, khan rumukna pui rang nangnarangai u, iti chawng hi vak chawi joi.
52003007	Hijarhin uliennai hai, ke`epshawna u le kumulungkoina u kholok shung khan nang takashawn u kha na mulung chumna nepek uh.
52003008	Ajarla Pumi riming a nangdingrep u joiatu, tun kieini karingthiei uh.
52003009	Napathien u maikung a nangni rangbak a ningai kimoshokna u ningaina kholok jarkhan, nangni rang ih mapakna kha maw Pathien dieng chawi u ning?
52003010	Nang meh u kha mukna rang le nang takashawn u shung a ravat kha rupummashakna rang, shunlejan a mulungluttak a nikna kieniei uh.
52003011	Tun kapathien u le kapa u amatak na, khan kupumi u Jesu na nangni dieng kavatna u rang, lam inawmawlawng pe u nih rosho.
52003012	Kieini na nangni dieng kithaw u kha ang a, Pumi na nang numpok u kha khatlekhat dieng le mi rikip dieng iniemielien pe u, khan inumupung pe u nih rosho.
52003013	Makha nupumi u na ama miriethieng hai kholok le jong phakhan, kapathien u le kapa u maikung a nang mulung u hai kha riethieng a metek boi `khat a mothoina rang a inih.
52004001	Khajarkhan dawngkhit a uliennai hai, Pumi Jesu riming a kinawdawi u, khan kinawmawshawk u inih, makhala nang ringna dan u rang le Pathien ningminitna rang a kieini dieng a nangirumuk u kha liekliek a nangithaw u rang a shok.
52004002	Ajarla Pumi Jesu jar a ih chawngpek kha maw nangni dieng kinurupek u, iti kha nangjet uh.
52004003	Nangni riethiengngir rang nangnih uh, khan rejai, iti hi nangidep boi u rang a shok, iti hi Pathien mulungmining kha inih.
52004004	Makhala, mi rikip na itia nang pum u kha riethieng a le richit a nangitet u rang a maw nih, iti kha nangijet u rang a shok.
52004005	Pathien ajet boi Phungshik hai kha ang a, tute na ditrekhe ruhu a aring boi rang a shok.
52004006	Tute na uliennai chung a hitihin rehe ninawkle mohon naw rosho. Ajarla hihai kholok chung hin Pumi hi ruhutloipa kha inih. Mahi nangni dieng kienierieisha u le kungkuruchangsha u nih joi.
52004007	Ajarla Pathien na kieini hi rono a niboia riethieng a ringna rang inurukoi u inih.
52004008	Kha dungjui khan hihaihi aheng miring kha na miring kha iheng nimak a kieini dieng ama Ratha Riethieng napeh Pathien kha iheng inih.
52004009	Khania uliennai hai numpokna rang a chungchang khan tu nangni dieng miejiek rang kha rangai u lai makche, ajarla khatlekhat numropokna rang khan Pathien na inuruchuksha u nih joi.
52004010	Khan Macedonia ram ah awm uliennai kholok hai kha numnangpokrep uh. Inia liekliek a makha nangthawna u rang, uliennai hai, nangni dieng kinawmawshawk u inih.
52004011	Khan chawng kinepek u kha ang a, miri`ir a awmna rang rojo u roh. Nang chon u ranga kha mining u roh, khan nang khuttak u le chon kha thaw u roh.
52004012	Makha vai tieng a awm miring hai dieng khan thatak a nangawmna u rang le irikip a ravatna boi rang a inih.
52004013	Uliennai hai, aja hai chung khan ajet kha kanamachang jawt uh. Ajartu ngakmining niei boi shik miring hai kha ang a mulungshaw miring kha namachang jawt u mi`ing.
52004014	Ajarla Jesu na ruthi a hawng thoi kha takanawshawn u jarkhan, khatak kha ang a, Jesu riming a ruja miring hai kha Pathien na ama le hawng chawichen rangnih, iti kha takanishawn u inih.
52004015	Khajarkhan Pumi chawng jar a mahi kiriei u inih. Aring a awm le Pumi jong masheng rang a inamak kieini hi na itikte nita`awm ruja miring hai kha khe u naw minih.
52004016	Ajarla Pumi amatak na, chawngpekna hesho `khat le, ravantir ulienchang `khat hesho le khan Pathien tekawlawi kha le ravan ah put ah jong chum rangnih. Khan Christa riming a athi miring hai kha na masha a thoi rangnih.
52004017	Khashole dawn a aring a awm imak miring hai kieini hi na Pumi kha rithi kar a rumukna pui rang, romiei shung khan amani le nushurchen u rangnih. Khatikhan kieini na Pumi le kumshawt a na`awm u rangnih.
52004018	Khajarkhan hihai chawng hi le khatlekhat maw`awi nana u roh.
52005001	Khania uliennai hai, nikho le tha chungchanga kiei na nangni dieng kimiejiek rang khan rangai mak.
52005002	Ajarla Pumi Nikho kha murushah na jan a ava ang a, jong rangnih, iti kha madanghet a nangjet uh.
52005003	Ajarla amani na “Lungdamna le rekhena awm!” ti u phakhan, jetboithieiboi a naivawng nupang `khat na natrieviei kha ang a, amani chung a thangna kha jong shok. Makhan amani rekhe u naw nih.
52005004	Uliennai hai, nangni tu ajing a awm nih u makche. Khajarkhan murushah na ithaw kha ang a, makha Nikho kha na nawrawthawkmashak u naw nih.
52005005	Ajarla nang kholok a mieivar a ring shapa hai le nishun a lawn shapa hai kha nangnih uh. Kieini hi jan ninawkle ajing tah kha nih u makme.
52005006	Khajarkhan shik miring hai ithaw kha ang a, kieini ja u naw rawi, inia chelam a pashalak a awm u rawi.
52005007	Ajarla aja miring hai kha na jan a aja uh, khan jukhawp miring hai kha na jan a khawp uh.
52005008	Inia kieini hi nishun a awm nanih u jarkhan, pashalak a awm u rawi. Takashawn le numpok a phaw kha rak u roh. Khan shandamna ngakmining, ralukhum kha ang a rukhu u rawi.
52005009	Ajarla lunghangna rang Pathien na kieini hi inamadan u nimak, inia nupumi u Jesu Christa jar a shandamna kha manna rang a inih.
52005010	Ama kha kieini rang a ruthi inih. Khajarkhan kieini na amiei a ninawkle ache a na`awm u nitjoiawm, ama le aringshom rang nanih uh.
52005011	Khajarkhan nangni na nangithawtak u kha ang a, khatlekhat mawshawk nana u roh, khan khatlekhat mothoi nana u roh.
52005012	Uliennai hai, nang kar ua enchak a chon thaw miring hai kha richit pekna rang le Pumi riming a laminakai pe a anarachak miring hai kha richit pekna rang, kawnawdawi uh.
52005013	Numpok riming a amani chon jarkhan, rashangtak a loi u roh. Khatlekhat lungdam a awm u roh.
52005014	Uliennai hai, nangni dieng mawshawkna kieniei uh, makhala rathashie miring hai kha rachah u roh, mulungkur hai kha lungar peh u roh, adawk hai kha shan u roh, khan mi rikip le doiratna niei u roh.
52005015	Ashie kha ashie le ruhut thungna boi rang, riring u roh. Inia khatlekhat dieng le mi kholok dieng atha thawna rang, rojo jawnjai u roh.
52005016	Ningai jawnjai u roh.
52005017	Nikna niei jawnjai u roh.
52005018	Chonmun rikip a mapakna niei u roh, ajarla Christa Jesu jar a mahi nangni rang Pathien mulungmining kha inih.
52005019	Ratha kha miechiem u naw roh.
52005020	Chawngrophong hai kha metek u naw roh.
52005021	Irikip kha enrete u roh. Atha kha rakrep u roh.
52005022	Ashie awmchan rikip kha dep u naw roh.
52005023	Lungdam apeh Pathien amatak na nangni kha rupumping a inieriethieng u nih rosho. Nupumi u Jesu Christa jong phakhan, nang ratha, nang ringphuk, khan nang pum u kha metek boi a itet nih rosho.
52005024	Nangni anakoipa kha takashawn rang a rutuk inih. Ama na mahi thaw rangnih.
52005025	Uliennai hai, kieini rang nikna nieniei pe u roh.
52005026	Uliennai kholok kha biengrutum riethieng le chubai thaw pui u roh.
52005027	Mahi chawngmawchawi hi riethieng uliennai kholok dieng mete mashakna rang, Pumi riming a chawng kinepek u inih.
52005028	Pumi Jesu Christa numpokmirit kha nangni dieng a`awm nih rosho. Amen.
53001001	Napa u Pathien le khan Pumi Jesu Christa takashawn, Thessalonica miring hai biekrup dieng Paul, Silvanus le Timothy kieini na kimiejiek u inih.
53001002	Napa u Pathien le Pumi Jesu Christa ah put ah numpokmirit le lungdamna kha nangni dieng a`awm nih rosho.
53001003	Uliennai hai, nang kholok rang hin Pathien kha kimapak jawnjai u rang a shok. Mahi rutuk inih, ajarla nang takashawn u kha lien shishit joi, khan khatlekhat rang a mi rikip numropokna kha ra`ar shishit joi.
53001004	Khatikhan nang jar ua Pathien biekrup hai dieng lienrashatna kha kieini na kieniei uh, ajarla epshawna le shawrievieina kholok kha nangdoi u phakhan, takashawn le doiratna kha nangniei uh.
53001005	Hihai kholok hi na Pathien chawngshat dikna kha imadangmashak inih. Makha Pathien rengchangna khan nangni hi rutuk `khat a loinathiei rang a inih. Khajarkhan a nangniawm ashaw nangnih uh.
53001006	Nangni nawmawshaw hai kha Pathien na shawrievieina pek phakhan, Pathien rang tu, makha dikna inih.
53001007	Makha Pumi na ravan ah put ah ranakniei ama ravantir hai le lar phakhan, shawrieviei rudoi miring hai nangni kha kieini le shawmenemna kha nangnieina u rang a inih.
53001008	Pathien ajet boi hai le nupumi u Jesu Christa athachawng ajui boi miring hai dieng khan mieichonshok miei le ruhut jong loi rangnih.
53001009	Amani na kumshawt thangna chepna kha muk u rangnih. Mahi Pumi awmna vai tieng le ama lurna ranak vai tieng a ashok rang a chon inih.
53001010	Ajarla nangni dieng kukungchangna u kha takanangshawn u jarkhan, miriethieng hai jar a lurna rang le takashawn hai kholok jar a amani kha shinmawdawngna rang, makha Nikho khan jong rangnih.
53001011	Hi rang hin nangni rang nikna kieniei jawnjai uh. Makha napathien u na inokoina u khan rutuk namachangna u rang a inih. Khan atha ningawna kholok le khan takashawn chon kha, ama ranak kha le rupummashakna rang a inih.
53001012	Makha nangni jar a nupumi Jesu riming kha mulurna rang le ama jar a nangni kha mulurna rang a inih. Makha napathien u le Pumi Jesu Christa numpokmirit dungjuia inih.
53002001	Uliennai hai, nupumi Jesu Christa jongna rang le kieini na ama dieng nuruchunna u rang khan kawnawdawi uh.
53002002	Christa Nikho kha jong joi, tia ratha a ninawkle chawng a ninawkle kieini ah put ah chawngmawchawi `khat ang a, ih kha na nita`awm nang mulungmining u kha irawnawkmashak, ninawkle imuchunrelen chang naw rosho.
53002003	Ih khan nita`awm tute na nangni kha nomohon u naw rosho. Ajarla akhat changna richimathanna kha jong masheng, khan munubukpa kha rophong masheng, makha Nikho kha jong naw nih. Ama kha imathang rang a miring kha inih.
53002004	Ama na re`erpui ning, tia Pathien iti rikip ninawkle biekna iti rikip chung a nining a rawlawm rangnih. Khatikhan ama na Pathien riethiengmun khan Pathien ang a shuh a nining a Pathien kanih, tia irophong inih.
53002005	Kiei na nangni le kuruawmlai khan hihaihi nangni dieng kururiei joi, iti kha mininghep u makche maw?
53002006	Tun a rakhar hi imaw nih, iti kha nangjet u joi, makha ama phatak khan rophongna rang a inih.
53002007	Ajarla danishawnboi murukchawng kha na chon thaw joi. Akharpa kha vai moshok masheng ama na khatikhan thaw rangnih.
53002008	Danishawnboipa kha rophongning, tia khan Pumi na abairuhu kha le miechiem rangnih, khan ama jongna malang kha le mathang rangnih.
53002009	Danishawnboipa kha jong phakhan, Satan na ranak kholok le, jetna kholok le, khan mohonna rekhekchon kholok le ama dieng chon thawna rangnih.
53002010	Athang rang a miring hai dieng khan adik boi kholok le mohonna chon kha thaw rangnih. Ajarla amani ringna rang a numpok adik kha tum jawt u mak.
53002011	Khajarkhan Pathien na amani dieng reheshuna ranaknieitak `khat jong tir pe rangnih. Makha amani na adik boi kha takashawnna u rang a inih.
53002012	Makha adik kha takashawn boi a dikna boi a hoiriethieina runiei hai kha hengna rang a inih.
53002013	Inia Pumi na numipok uliennai hai, nangni rang Pathien kimapakchak u rang a shok. Ajarla Ratha jar a riethiengna chon le adik shung a takashawn jar a putna ah put ah Pathien na nangni kha shandamna rang inurumadan u nih joi.
53002014	Kishem u athachawng jar a nangni kha makha rang khan nokoi u joi. Makha nupumi u Jesu Christa lurna kha manna rang a inih.
53002015	Khajarkhan uliennai hai kawchawng jar a nit a, ninawkle kawchawngmawchawi jar a nita`awm, kinuruchuk u shena hai kha mukui u tana nettak a ding u roh.
53002016	Numpokmirit jar a ngakmining atha kha le kumshawt maw`awina nurupeh, kieini numnoropoh Pumi Jesu Christa amatak le,
53002017	khan napathien u le napa u kha na nang mulung u kha inemenem pe ua, chon atha kha le chawng adik rikip shung khan inomothoi u nih rosho.
53003001	Dawngkhit a, uliennai hai, kieini rang nikna nieniei pe u roh. Makha, nangni dieng a kha ang a, Pumi chawng kha ma relenmashakna rang le mun rikip a mulurna rang a inih.
53003002	Khan makha pawrche le mi shie ah put ah kieini hi nashannathiei rang a inih, ajarla mi kholok na takashawn kha niei mak.
53003003	Inia Pumi tu takashawn rang a rutuk miring kha inih. Mitha boi ah put ah ama na nangni kha namarat u rangnih, khan nurung u rangnih.
53003004	Kieini na chawng kinepek u kha nangthaw u, khan nangthaw u rangnih, tia nang jar ua Pumi kha karangam pui uh.
53003005	Pumi na Pathien numpok le Christa doiratna shung khan nang mulung u kha lamikhin pe nih rosho.
53003006	Khania uliennai hai, Pumi Jesu Christa riming a chawngkenepek uh. Kieini dieng a irumuk shena dungjuia aring niboia, lule a aring uliennai rikip ah put ah rechen u roh.
53003007	Kunun u nangiruchuk u rang a kha nangnitak na nangjet uh. Nang kar ua kuruawm u lai khan, lule a ruring u mi`ing.
53003008	Kieini na tute dieng manboi a nekleshak rushak u mi`ing. Inia nangni kha pokrik pekna boi rang, shunlejan a shawrana doilam a chon enchak a kiruthaw u inih.
53003009	Cham kha kiniei boi u tu nimak, inia nangni na itia kunun u kha nangijui u rang a maw nih, iti endar kha kinepek u inih.
53003010	Ajarla nangni le kuruawm u laishe khan, mahi chawngpek hi nangni dieng kinurupek u inih. Tunita`awm chon thaw jawt boi miring kha na nekleshakawm shah naw rosho.
53003011	Ajarla nang kar ua lule a ring, chon thaw jawt boi, inia chon mawrawp miring nangawm uh, iti kha kejet uh.
53003012	Tun, kha hai miring dieng khan, kupumi Jesu Christa riming a chawng kepek uh, khan kawmawshawk uh. Amani na muruk a chon thaw u rieshie amani nekleshaktak kha shah u rosho.
53003013	Khania uliennai hai, nangni na atha nangithaw u khan mohot u naw roh.
53003014	Mahi chawngmawchawi hin ah kiriei u hi ajui boi ama kha khin u roh. Ama na jak mukna rang, rawtawp pui u naw roh.
53003015	Rahapui miring `khat a loi u naw roh, inia uliennai `khat a rachah u roh.
53003016	Tun lungdamna apeh Pumi amatak kha na nangni dieng lam rikip a lungdamna kha inepek u jawnjai nih rosho. Pumi na nang kholok dieng a`awm nih rosho.
53003017	Kukhuttak le Paul kiei na mahi chubai hi kimiejiek inih. Kimiejiek chawngmawchawi rikip khan mahi jetna hi awm.
53003018	Nupumi u Jesu Christa numpokmirit kha nang kholok dieng a`awm nih rosho. Amen.
54001001	Nashandampa u Pathien le na`ngakmining u Pumi Jesu Christa chawngpek dungjuia, Jesu Christa tirtawn,
54001002	Paul kiei na takashawn jar a kashapa diktak, Timothy nang dieng kimiejiek inih. Napa u Pathien le nupumi u Christa Jesu ah put ah numpokmirit, roihoina, khan lungdamna kha nang dieng a`awm nih rosho.
54001003	Macedonia ah kurushelam a Ephesus ah awmna rang kunurudawi. Makha tukhat na ruchukna shik ruchukna boi rang, chawngnangbiena rang a inih.
54001004	Khan jokrishim le dawngawmboi thoinakeina khan mulung repena boi rang a inih. Ajarla Pathien dieng takashawn a rawshawnnek khan chawngrieshietna kha imothoi inih.
54001005	Khati chawngbie kha na ikhin kha tu, mulung riethieng, lungthim atha, khan thanunchan jaw boi takashawn ah put ah ajong, numpok kha inih.
54001006	Khania miring eshen na tu chawngbiena ah put ah riephiei ua, chawngshok boi chawngrieina tieng ruhiei u joi.
54001007	Dan oja hai kha chang jawt uh, inia iriei u kha imaw nih iti rujet u mak, khan ngartak a dingna u kha imaw nih, iti rujet u mak.
54001008	Inia tukhat na Dan kha dantak a rotokna joiatu, makha atha inih, iti nejet uh.
54001009	Dan hi midik rang a imushung nimak, inia danishawnboi le danjui boi, pathienjet boi le munu miring, riethieng boi le richi boi, nupa athat hai le mithat hai,
54001010	rejai hai, palepa rishih hai, mimuruh hai, mielieishiei thaw hai, khan chawngrakham akhoi hai rang a inih, iti kha nejet uh. Khan ih kha nita`awm atha ruchukna le kairekhe hai rang a dan hi ikon inih, iti hi nejet uh.
54001011	Makha ruchukna atha kha le rahvantha Pathien lurna athachawng dungjuia inih. Makha le kiei hi inanganshie inih.
54001012	Anamaratpa nupumi u Christa Jesu kha kamapak, ajarla ama na kiei hi ngamna `khat a nuruloi a, ama chon thaw rang nurumadan joi.
54001013	Matienglai khan kiei hi Pathien mieshiet miring, shawnapek miring, khan miphing `khat kurunih. Khania jet boi a le takashawn boi a kiruthaw nit jarkhan, numpokmirit kha kurumuk joi.
54001014	Christa Jesu dieng a awm takashawn le numpok kha le nupumi numpokmirit kha kiei dieng ship a awm joi.
54001015	Mahi takashawn rang a rutuk, vanoi na pawm rang a rutuk chawng kha inih. Makhala rieliei a Christa Jesu ajong kha munu miring hai shanna rang a inih. Makha kar khan kiei hi lutu kuruchang.
54001016	Nitjoiawm kiei dieng Jesu Christa na dawngkhit doiratna kha malarna rang, kumshawt ringna rang, takashawn a ama dieng ava hai dieng endar niminitna rang a inih. Makha jarbak khan kiei na numpokmirit kha kirumuk inih.
54001017	Rongrong rang a Reng, athi boi, malang boi, ashing Pathien khatte ama dieng richit le lurna kha kumshawt a awm nih rosho.
54001018	Kashapa Timothy, pha mala a nang chungchanga rophongchawng hai dungjuia, mahi chawngpek hi nang dieng kinepek inih. Hihai nangijui hi na ra atha kha inawmawthaw rang a inih.
54001019	Takashawn le atha lungthim nangnieilai khan ra thaw roh. Mi eshen na makha ruheng u jarkhan, amani takashawn u kha rokong ang a koi pe u joi.
54001020	Amani hai kar a Hymenaeus le Alexander jaw uh. Amani na Pathien mieshietna chawng kha ruchukna boi rang, amani kha Satan khut ah kepek joi.
54002001	Khajarkhan mi kholok rang anih le ariei a, mi rang ninikna a, mapakna rang akhat changna a kawnawmawshawk uh.
54002002	Reng hai le chamniei hai kholok rang nikna niei pe u roh. Makha kieini na Pathienjet a le richittak a rithip le lungdam ring a niringna u rang a inih.
54002003	Mahi nashandampa u Pathien maikung a atha le ijawt kha inih.
54002004	Pathien na mi rikip hi shan a adik jetna khan mavatna rang adit.
54002005	Ajarla Pathien `khat awm, khan Pathien le miring kar a palai `khat awm, makha miring kha Christa Jesu kha inih.
54002006	Ama na mi kholok khekman rang amatak kha rurepeh joi. Mahi pha rutukthep a irupek kungchangna kha inih.
54002007	Mahi kungchangna rang hin, Pathien chawngriei le tirtawn `khat a, takashawn le adik chungchanga, Phungshik hai oja `khat a, kiei hi nurumadan joi (Christa maikung a adik kiriei inih, kiei na mielieishiei thaw mi`ing).
54002008	Khajarkhan mun rikip ah apa hai na inik rang a kha kadit. Lunghangna le chawngrieshietna jaw boi a khut riethieng hai kha lawm u rieshie nikna niei u rosho.
54002009	Khan nupang hai na`awm ponledier kha miri`ir a le riemhiei a rielienna rang, mulung niei u rosho. Sham rikinmashak a ninawkle rangkachak ninawkle kongkeplung ninawkle manrawp ponledier le rielien u naw rosho.
54002010	Kha ruhut a Pathien achih kanih ati nupang hai rang a rohoi atha chon hai kha le rielien u rosho.
54002011	Nupang `khat na rede kholok le miri`ir a ruchuh rosho.
54002012	Nupang `khat na miruchuh rang a ninawkle apa `khat chung a chamniei rang hin kiei jawt mi`ing, a`awmchien rang a inih.
54002013	Ajarla Adam kha akhat changna a rumijir shole, Eve kha irumijir inih.
54002014	Khan Adam kha rumohon mak, inia nupangnu kha rumohon a, shietna miring `khat ruchang inih.
54002015	Khania takashawn a, numpok a, takshur le riethieng a awm joiatu, shanai mawshawmna shung khan Pathien na shan rangnih.
54003001	Tukhat na bieklamkai rang khan aditmer joiatu, atha chon kha idit inih. Mahi takashawn rang a rutuk chawng kha inih.
54003002	Bieklamkai `khat hi rawkawkna chung a awm rang a inih. Nungak `khat inko, acheveng, ariemhiei, richit pekthiei, jinchonthiei, ruchuthiei miring anih rang a shok.
54003003	Juneh boi, arang boi, nieinak a vanhat boi, mulung renem, lungdamna numapoh, shier a rapham boi,
54003004	inlothiei, nai hai kha lam rikip a richit ipek a chawngijui pe miring kha anih rang a inih.
54003005	Ajarla tukhat na ama intak kha lothiei nawkala, itia maw Pathien biekrup kha tinta ngam nih?
54003006	Lienrashatna khan ruphuk a diabol chawngshatna khan chona boi rang, ama kha takashawn `thar anih boi rang a shok.
54003007	Vai a awm mi hai na kungichangna aningir rang a shok. Khanitnawkatu mimieshietna le diabol lim khan cho rangnih.
54003008	Kha ang a deacon hai kha richitpekthiei, mulung ra`ak boi, juneh boi, khan shumleshier a rapham boi miring kha aningir rang a shok.
54003009	Amani na takashawn murukchawng kha lungthim riethieng le irakrep u rang a shok.
54003010	Rapapek a amani kha enrete rang a shok. Khashole eshebe awm nawkatu deacon a jaw rosho.
54003011	Kha ang a amani nupang hai kha richitpekthiei, mimieshiet boi, takshur ngam, irikip a takashawn rang a rutuk kha anih rang a shok.
54003012	Deacon hai kha nupang `khat inkopa nih rosho. Inshung le nai hai kha thaning a chon thaw pe rosho.
54003013	Ajarla deacon `khat a thaning a chon thaw hai kha na amani rangbak dingna atha kha iman inih. Khan Christa Jesu dieng a awm takashawn khan mulung ngarna tampui iman inih.
54003014	Nang dieng avarelen rang kanih, iti ngakmining jar a hihaihi kimiejiek inih.
54003015	Inia kavakshumawm jawt. Khajarkhan nang na Pathien inshung a itia aring rang a maw kanih, iti kha nangjetna rang a kimiejiek inih. Makha aring Pathien biekrup khan adik chawkier le chawkhur kha inih.
54003016	Pathienjet chungchanga murukchawng adik hi ielien, iti hi najawtviek uh: Pathien kha pum a rumalang, makha Ratha kha na idik, tia rurophong. Ama kha ravantir hai na rumuk, ama kha Phungshik hai kar a chawng a irushem inih. Manmieshie kholok na ama kha takarushawn, alur a Pathien na ruloi joi.
54004001	Nikhothang anuk a mi eshen na takashawn ah put ah hiei a milem-midawi ratha hai chawng le raikho hai miruchukna kha jui u rangnih, tia Ratha na madanghet a ieriei.
54004002	Anih boi chawngriei hai na thanunchan khan amani lungthimrilik kha imawmaw u inih.
54004003	Amani na inniei le nekleshak eshen ah put ah amakha uh. Khahaikha takashawn hai le adik ajet miring hai na mapaklam a loi rang a Pathien na irukon inih.
54004004	Pathien na irukon rikip kha atha inih. Amani kha mapaklam a noloi joiatu, `khatshe pai rang awm mak.
54004005	Ajarla mahi Pathien chawng le nikna jar a iriethiengmashak inih.
54004006	Hihai chawngbiena hi uliennai hai maikung a nangte pe joiatu, Jesu Christa deacon atha `khat kha nangchang rangnih. Ajarla nangirujuirep takashawn chawng hai kha le miruchukna atha kha le inuruvai inih.
54004007	Inia richiniei boi le tarshevet jokrishim kha jawt naw roh. Kha ruhut a nang nining a Pathienjetna rang ruchuh roh.
54004008	Ajarla pum takmajangna khan nemna dikhat awm, inia Pathienjet tu irikip a nemna awm. Mahi na tun a ringkho le ajong rang a ringkho rang chawngrakham kha iniei inih.
54004009	Mahi takashawnthiei le mi kholok na pawm rang a rutuk chawng kha inih.
54004010	Aring Pathien dieng khan ngakmining kha niniei u inih. Pathien hi mi kholok, khinniei a takashawn hai, Shandampa kha inih. Mahi rang hin chon nithaw u, khan rachainiphung u hi inih.
54004011	Hihaihi chawngpek le roroia ruchuh roh.
54004012	Nang khangdawng kha tute na mitir naw rosho. Khania chawng a, awmchan a, ratha a, riethieng a, takashawn hai rang a endar kha chang roh.
54004013	Kiei na nang dieng kavat masheng ate a, arachah a, khan miruchuh a mulung repeh roh.
54004014	Nang dieng a awm khutchawi kha enda naw roh. Makha chawngrophong jar a bieklamkai hai khut donglai a Pathien na nang dieng inurupek inih.
54004015	Hihaihin nang mulung mulut tana awm roh. Khanitatu mi hai kar a nang mameshe kha lar rangnih.
54004016	Nang pumtak chungchanga le nangiruchuk kha rung tana awm roh. Makha nangithaw kha na nang pumtak le khan nang chawng rangai hai kha nangshan rangnih.
54005001	Patar `khat dieng hare a rawkawk naw roh. Khania nangpa `khat ang a, rothar hai kha nang naipangpa hai `khat ang a dawi roh.
54005002	Nutar hai kha nangnu hai `khat ang a, nungak hai kha nang naipangnu hai `khat ang a riethieng kholok le dawi roh.
54005003	Mieirawng hai kha, aliendet a mieirawng jielak hai kha, richit peh roh.
54005004	Mieirawng tukhat na nai hai ninawkle tu hai niei joiatu, ama inshung a naite hai kha na richichawi nitna u rang, akhat changna a ruchuh u rosho. Khan unulepa hai kha ruhutthung rosho. Ajarla mahi Pathien maikung a atha le ningnitroi kha inih.
54005005	Thien a awm mieirawng adik kha na Pathien dieng ngakmining niei rosho. Khan shunlejan a anih le ariei chat naw rosho.
54005006	Inia hoiriethiei a awm ama kha iringlam a athi inih.
54005007	Amani na mieshiet nieina boi rang, hihai chawng hi peh roh.
54005008	Tukhat na amatak, khinniei a, ama inshung mi hai kha avai nawkatu, ama takashawn kha ijawt boi inih, khan takashawn boi miringnek khan ashiedet miring kha inih.
54005009	Kum shawm `ruk thoi a awm boi kha mieirawng a tethiei inih. Ama kha pa khatte inkonu anih rang a shok.
54005010	Amani kha chon atha a rimingniei, shanai rumawshawm, jinchon ruthaw, miriethieng hai ke rushuk, shawdoi hai rurachang pui, khan atha chon kholok a mulung rurepeh miring anih rang a shok.
54005011	Inia mieirawng noi hai kha te naw roh. Ajarla amani takjatna kha na Christa kha re`erpui ning, tia inniei jawt uh.
54005012	Amani na arapa a atakashawn u kha rupai u jarkhan, chawngshatna kha muk uh.
54005013	Kha le roroia adaw ruchuk a inin ah she ua, adaw ranga kha niboia, michawk a chonchin uh, khan riei boi rang a kha ieriei uh.
54005014	Khajarkhan mieirawng noi hai na in`iniei uh, nai`iniei uh, khan inshungkhur kha i`en ua mirahapui ama na mieshietna rang a mun kha ipek boi rang a kha kadit.
54005015	Ajarla mieirawng eshen na Satan anu juina rang, hieisho u joi.
54005016	Takashawn apa ninawkle nupang `khat na mieirawng hai kha awm pui joiatu, amani kha rachang pui u rosho. Khan biekrup pokrik machang u naw rosho. Makha mieirawng jielak hai kha biekrup na rachangna pui rang a inih.
54005017	Thatak a makai bieklamkai hai, khinniei a Pathien chawng ariei le miruchuh a chon ranak athaw hai kha na richit rothom imuk rang kha rutuk inih.
54005018	Ajarla Miejiek na ieriei, “Shiecha `khat na shang achieilai khan ener nangikhop pe boi rang a inih,” khan “Chon thaw miring kha na ama nilawh imuk rang a kha rutuk inih.”
54005019	Miring idi ninawkle uthum na kungchang joi nawkatu, bieklamkai akhat chung a jar peh u naw roh.
54005020	Eshen hai na`awm chitna nieina rang, munu thaw hai kha vanoi maikung a rawkawk u roh.
54005021	Hihaihi nangrungna rang, ningsha boi a le enshietenlar boi a nangthawna rang, Pathien le nupumi Jesu Christa, khan madan ravantir maikung a kungachang kanih.
54005022	Tute chung ah nawtshun a nang khut dong naw roh. Khan munu hai khan jaw naw roh. Nang pumtak kha riethieng a tet roh.
54005023	Tui neh roh, khania nang bukawk le khan phapha a nangnatna jarkhan, ju lekte neh roh.
54005024	Miring eshen hai munu kha malangsheng a awm a chawngshatna mun khan amani maton ah rushe pe uh. Khan mi eshen hai munu kha na unuk ah ujui uh.
54005025	Kha ang khan, chon atha hai kha malangsheng a awm, khan ashie chon hai kha`awm the ngam chat nimak.
54006001	Ringkaw rupu shok kholok na upumpa hai kha richit ipek rang khan urutuk inih, tia imining u rang a shok. Makhan Pathien riming le miruchukna kha mieshiet naw nih.
54006002	Takashawn pumpa aniei hai na amani kha uliennai nit jar a noishie a mining u naw rosho. Khania inemna hai kha takashawn miring le amani na numipok nit jarkhan, thadet a chon ithaw pe u rang a shok. Amani dieng hihaihi ruchuh le roroia rachah u roh.
54006003	Tukhat na shik miruchukna kha loi a nupumi Jesu Christa le Pathienjet ruchukna aracha chawng hai kha ijawt boi nitatu,
54006004	ama kha lienrasha le ih jet boi miring kha inih. Inia ama kha chawngreper le chawngrishietna khan ditrekhe iniei inih. Makhan ah put ah mukmakna, roshona, mieshietna, riringna boi khan ashie vak shok inih.
54006005	Makhan ah put ah mulung tha boi miring hai kar a chawng rekherna tampui vak shok inih. Amani ah put ah adik kha imuruk pe u inih. Amani na Pathienjet hi shumleshier mukna `khat inih, tia imining hai kha nih uh. Kha ang miring hai kha le rawtawp u naw roh.
54006006	Inia ninghien le roroia Pathienjet hi nemna lientak `khat inih.
54006007	Ajarla kieini na manmieshie shung hin iawm jong chawi u makme, khan hin ah put ah iawm chawi ngam makme, iti hi madangsheng inih.
54006008	Nekleshak le ponledier nieniei uh, hihaihi le ninghienna nieniei u rangnih.
54006009	Inia rawchawng jawt miring hai na lemna le lim, khan mawngna le mawpawpthiei ditrekhe tampui khan acho u inih, makha na thitna le thangna khan imulut inih.
54006010	Ajarla shumleshier numpoh hi ashie kholok rujung inih. Mi eshen na makha ahotna khan takashawn ah put ah iehiei a nining a mulungshaw tampui kha le rushun inih.
54006011	Aw Pathien miringpa, hihai ah put ah tan rang roh. Dikna, Pathienjet, takashawn, numpok doiratna le mulung renem hi rojo rang roh.
54006012	Takashawn ra atha kha thaw rang roh, kumshawt ringna kha mukui rang roh. Makha rang khan a inurukoi inih. Khan makha rang khan a nang na kungachang mi tampui maikung a rieirophongna atha kha nangirurophong inih.
54006013	Nieinak kholok chung a ringkho apeh Pathien maikung a, khan Pontius Pilate maton a kungruchang, khan thatak a rieirophongna rupeh Christa Jesu maikung a, nang dieng chawngkenepek.
54006014	Makha nupumi Jesu Christa na jong lar masheng, mahi chawngpek hi mawk boi a le metek boi a rungna rang a inih.
54006015	Pathien na Christa kha pha rutukthep a numumuk rangnih. Pathien hi nimapak u rang a ranakniei khatte, reng hai Reng, khan pumi hai Pumi kha inih.
54006016	Ama ranga na thitniei boi iniei, khan banngam boi varna mun ah awm, tute na imuk boilai, ninawkle imuk boi inih. Ama dieng richit le kumshawt ratna kha nih rosho. Amen.
54006017	Tun a rong a rawchawng miring hai kha mining rashang mashakna boi rang, ninawkle madang boi rawchawngna khan ngakmining nieina boi rang, rachah u roh. Khania nohoina u rang a nieinak kholok rawchawngtak a napeh, aring Pathien dieng khan ngakmining kha itet u rang a shok.
54006018	Khan atha thawna rang, atha chon hai khan rawchawng nitna rang, khutjang le mi hai le reshem jawt nitna rang, amani kha chawngbie roh.
54006019	Nuk rang a keshun atha kha amani rangbak khan ibawm u rang a shok. Makha kumshawt ringna kha mukuina rang a inih.
54006020	Timothy, nang dieng a kinanganshie kha rungrep roh. Anih boi a shingnavarna iti richiboi, chawngnawk le mining kairekhe hai kha lawi roh.
54006021	Mi eshen na makha varna kha kieniei, ti ua takashawn kha imahien u inih. Numpokmirit kha nang dieng a`awm nih rosho. Amen.
55001001	Jesu Christa dieng a awm ringkho chawngrakham dungjuia, Pathien mulungmining a Jesu Christa tirtawn,
55001002	Paul kiei na kashapa numpok Timothy nang dieng kimiejiek inih. Napa Pathien le nupumi u Jesu Christa ah put ah numpokmirit, roihoina le lungdamna kha nang dieng a`awm nih rosho.
55001003	Shunlejan a chatboia kinikna hai khan, nang kha kinimininghep le roroia, kapa hai na iruthaw kha ang a, lungthim diktak a kiei na chubaikirubawk Pathien kha kamapak.
55001004	Nang mikrithi hai kha kimininghep jarkhan, nang kha ajeng a kunumuk jawt. Makha kiei dieng ningaina kha shipna rang a inih.
55001005	Nang takashawn riethieng kha niminingmashak. Makha nangpi Lois le nangnu Eunice dieng a ruawmmasha inih. Makha nang diengawm awm rangnih, tia karangam pui.
55001006	Khajarkhan nang chung ah kukhut kodong jar a nang dieng a awm Pathien khutchawi hai kha mieichon moshokmashakna rang hin a kinemejetret inih.
55001007	Ajarla Pathien na chitna ratha kha kieini dieng nepeh mak, inia ranak, numpok le mulungmining atha kha inepek inih.
55001008	Khajarkhan nupumi chungchanga kungachang rang khan jak naw roh, khan ama shurkhop kajar a jak naw roh. Inia Pathien ranak kha biei tana athachawng jar a kawshawna hai hin narashap pui roh.
55001009	Pathien na kieini hi inurushan a koina riethieng kha le inurukoi u inih. Makha nochonthaw u dungjuia nimak, inia ama chonmuchuk le numpokmirit dungjuia inih. Makha numpokmirit kha pha put mala a Christa Jesu jar a kieini dieng inurupek u inih.
55001010	Makha, nashandampa u Jesu Christa rular jar a, irumalangmashak inih. Jesu Christa na thitna kha irumathang a ringna le thitniei boi kha athachawng jar a malangsheng a ijongchawi inih.
55001011	Mahi athachawng rang hin kiei hi Pathien chawngriei `khat a, tirtawn `khat a, khan Phungshik hai dieng a oja `khat a inurumadan inih.
55001012	Hijarhin a inih kieiawm shawna kidoi hi. Inia kiei jak mi`ing, ajarla takakishawn ama kha kiei na kejet. Khan ama dieng kinganshie kha, kha Nikhoshe khan ama na nurung pe ngam rangnih, tia karangam pui.
55001013	Kiei dieng a nangirurangai, Christa Jesu dieng a awm takashawn le numpok jar a, miruchukna atha endar kha mukuirep roh.
55001014	Kieini dieng a awm Ratha Riethieng shanna jar a, nang dieng a inanganshie atha nieinak hai kha rung roh.
55001015	Asia ah awm kholok kha kiei ah put ah hieisho u joi, iti kha nangjet. Amani hai kar a khala, Phygellus le Hermogenes nih uh.
55001016	Pumi na Onesiphorus inshungkhur dieng khan numpokmirit kha ipek nih rosho. Ama na kiei hi ringjin a natet jawnjai. Khan kurukhumna chungchanga ama na jakna runiei mak.
55001017	Ama na Rome hawng shok phakhan, ama na mulung luttak a natawk a navak muk.
55001018	Makha Nikho khan Pumi na ama dieng Pumi ah put ah roihoina kha ipek chang rosho. Khan Ephesus khan idawr maw kochon nawthaw pe, iti kha thatak a nangjet.
55002001	Khajarkhan kashapa nang na Christa Jesu dieng a awm numpokmirit khan ranak niei miring kha chang roh.
55002002	Kungchang hai tampui kar a kiei dieng a nangirujet hai kha, shik miring hai kha`awm ruchuh ngam rang a takashawn rang a rutuk miring hai dieng khan nganshie roh.
55002003	Khajarkhan, Christa Jesu ramiring atha `khat ang a, shawna kha nangidoi rang a shok.
55002004	Rachon a chonthaw miring tute na mahi ringkho chon le robon naw nih. Makha ramiring `khat a chon apepa kha ningminit pena rang a inih.
55002005	Khan tukhat na radai rieshietna a jaw joiatu, shena dungjuia rieshietna khan jaw masheng renglukhum kha mukhu naw nih.
55002006	Chon ranaktak a athaw loithaw ama kha ara hai kha atum akhat changna miring anih rang a inih.
55002007	Kiriei hi mining roh, ajarla Pumi na nieinak kholok chung a jetnathiei kha nepek rangnih.
55002008	David chicha ah put ah jong shok, athi ah put ah hawng thoi, Jesu Christa kha mininghep roh. Makha kiei rang a athachawng kha inih.
55002009	Makha jar a ashie thaw miring `khat ang a, rukhumnashe khan, shawna kodoi. Inia Pathien chawng kha tu khopthiei nimak.
55002010	Khajarkhan madansha hai rangbak a kiei na ih kholok hi kidoi inih. Makha Christa Jesu dieng a kumshawt lurna le a`awm shandamna kha amani na tumna rang a inih.
55002011	Mahi takashawn rang a rutuk rieina `khat inih: kieini na ama le nathishom u joiatu, kieiniawm ama le naringshom u rangnih.
55002012	Kieini na adoi narat u joiatu, kieiniawm ama le rengchangshom rang nanih uh. Ama kha naraphat pui u joiatu, ama na`awm naraphat pui u rangnih.
55002013	Takashawn rang a rutuk boi ninit u phakhan, ama tu takashawn rang a rutuk kha nih jawnjai, ajarla nining a rapha ngam naw nih.
55002014	Amani dieng hihaihi mejetret roh, khan Pumi maikung a chawng hai chungchanga roshona boi rang, masha a riei pe roh. Mahi nemna boi inih, khan makha na rangai hai kha imathang inih.
55002015	Pathien maikung a imuchuk kha nangnitna rang, ningamtuk kha thaw roh. Ajak boi le adik chawng kha diktak a meler chonthaw miring kha chang roh.
55002016	Chawngmejer rono kha thaw naw roh, ajarla Pathienjet boi tieng khan amani kha pung shishit rangnih.
55002017	Khan amani chawng kha cancer ang a rawjawh rangnih. Hymenaeus le Philetus kha, kha ang kha nih uh.
55002018	Amani na adik ah put ah lamrurehe uh. Thoiretna hi ashesho keng joi ruti uh. Amani na mi eshen hai takashawn kha shukthala a rutet pe uh.
55002019	Nitjoiawm mahi jetnam akawp Pathien chawkhur kha rudinger inih: “Pumi na ama tah hai kha ejet,” khan “Pumi riming aban rikip na shietna ah put ah hiei rosho.”
55002020	Inia in alien khan dangka rangkachak be ranga awm mak a, thing le lieibeawm awm: eshen kha richit a, khan eshen kha chochawp a rotokna rang a inih.
55002021	Khajarkhan tukhat na hihaihi ah put ah rechenving a riethieng rang a nitjoiatu, richitpekthiei be kha inih. Ama kha riethiengsha, Pumpa dieng a rotoknathiei, khan chon atha kholok rang a irashak kha inih.
55002022	Inia khangdawng ditrekhe ah put ah tan roh. Mulung riethieng ah put ah Pumi akoi hai kha le dikna, takashawn, numpok, lungdamna kha rojo roh.
55002023	Inia mimawng le mining awm boi chawngrieshietna hai kha lawi roh, amani kha na roshona metemashak, iti jet roh.
55002024	Khan Pumi shok kha na mi le rosho boi rang a inih, inia mi kholok dieng erenem, ruchuthiei miring, khan adoirat rang a shok.
55002025	Ama rodoi pui hai kha renem a midik rosho. Pathien na mulung lekna pek a adik jetna khan hawng kirthiei inih.
55002026	Khan amani na hawng jet ua, diabol lim ah put ah rekhethiei u inih. Ajarla ama mulungmining mawthaw rang a irushur a irukhum u inih.
55003001	Inia mahi jet roh: nikho dawng hai khan chichairoi pha kha awm rangnih.
55003002	Ajarla amani ranga numapoh, shumleshier numapoh, aphing, lienrasha, mimieshiet hai, nulepa chawng rangai boi, thawlawh jet boi, pawrche,
55003003	minumpok awm boi, dawi tha boi, chawng adik boi ariei, takshur boi, chichairoi, atha ditna niei boi,
55003004	mijor hai, ashak, ratrasha, Pathiennek a hoina numapoh miring,
55003005	Pathienjet rasha a ama ranak ajawt boi hai kha hawng awm rangnih. Khahai miring ah put ah nang mai miehiei roh.
55003006	Ajarla kha ang miring hai kha na adawk nupang hai inin ah rawraw ua, amani kha amani dieng rumawjawt uh. Khahai nupang hai kha munu hai kha na pokrik ipek ua, ditrekhe shikshik na ichawi miring hai kha inih uh.
55003007	Ruchuk jawnjai uh, inia hihai nupang hai hi na dikna jetthieina tieng khan va ngam u mak.
55003008	Khatak kha ang a, Jannes le Jambres na Moses kha rurodoi pui uh. Khatikhan hihaihi na`awm adik kha irodoi pui u inih. Amani hi mining pawrche, takashawn chungchanga iheng miring hai kha inih uh.
55003009	Inia amani na dawn a she ngam u naw nih. Ajarla, amani tah iruthaw u kha ang a, amani mawngna kha rupumping a malar pe u rangnih.
55003010	Inia kinuruchuk awmdan, chonmuchuk, takashawn, numpok, doiratna,
55003011	epshawna, shawrana hai khan mulung nangrurepeh joi. Khan Antioch ah, Iconium ah, khan Lystra ah kiei dieng a ashok shawna kholok ah put ah Pumi na inurukhek inih, iti kha`awm nangrujet joi.
55003012	Diktak a Christa Jesu jar a Pathienjet a aring jawt kholok na epshawna kha rawtawng pui rangnih.
55003013	Inia mi shie le milem-midawi hai kha na tha shishit naw nih. Amani na mi hai kha elem u rangnih, khan lemna khan cho u rangnih.
55003014	Inia nang tu nangiruchuk, nangijawtnahet nieinak hai khan dawn a she roh. Nangiruchuknapa kha eme jet roh.
55003015	Khan makha nang naite chang ah put ah Miejiek Riethieng kha nangrujet joi. Makha, Christa Jesu dieng a takashawn jar a shandamna rang a, shingna napeh ngam kha inih.
55003016	Miejiek kholok hi Pathien phuk na inepek inih, khan mahi miruchukna rang, rawkawkna rang, midikna rang, dikna khan rijina rang, nemna inih.
55003017	Makha Pathien miring kha na rutuk a awmna rang le atha chon rikip rang rupumpingna rang a inih.
55004001	Aring le athi chawngshat rang a Pathien le nupumi Jesu Christa maikung a, khan ama larna le ama rengchangna dungjuia, mirittak a mawshawkna kienieniei.
55004002	Chawng kha shem roh. Pha kha rutuk a rutuk joi nawkawm, rashamjer roh. Doiratna le ruchukna kholok le mawjawt roh, rawkawk roh, khan mawshawk roh.
55004003	Ajarla miruchukna atha kha rawkawna boi rang a pha kha jong rangnih. Inia amanirilik ditrekhe dungjuia, amani nokor mathak nemna rang, oja hai kha bawm u rangnih.
55004004	Khan adik ah put ah onokor u kha miehiei u ning, tia jokrishim tieng khan nokor miding u rangnih.
55004005	Inia hihai kholok hin riring tana shawna kha doi roh, khan Pathien chawngshemna chon kha thaw roh. Nang chonmun kha rupummashak roh.
55004006	Ajarla Pathien na kiei hi tuipaina `khat a nielieina a ka`awm joi, khan kakichawina rang a pha kha jong nai joi.
55004007	Ra atha kha kawthaw joi, tanrieshiet kha kawmawtawr joi, khan takashawn kha kurung joi.
55004008	Tun ah put ah, dikna renglukhum kha kiei rang bawm a awm joi. Makha, kha Nikho khan dikna a chawngashat Pumi na kiei dieng a inepek rang a kha inih. Makha kiei dieng ranga nimak a ama jong kirnaret numapoh kholok diengawm ipek rang a inih.
55004009	Kiei dieng relentak a vatna rang, rakangchak a awm roh.
55004010	Ajarla Demas tu, tun a pha hi numpok jarkhan, kiei hi namathan a Thessalonica ah she joi. Crescens na Galatia ah, Titus na Dalmatia ah she joi.
55004011	Luke ranga hi kiei le awm joi. Mark kha rumuk pui tana vat pui roh. Ajarla kochonthawna hin ama kha nemna awm.
55004012	Inia Tychicus kha Ephesus ah kurutir joi.
55004013	Troas ah Carpus dieng a kimak kotai kha nangvat phakhan, navakchawi roh. Khan behangbuk hai, khinniei a mevun behangbuk kha, navakchawi roh.
55004014	Thirchonthawpa Alexander kha na kiei dieng ashie chon tampui ruthaw. Ama chonthaw dungjuia Pumi na pek rangnih.
55004015	Nangawm ama maikung a riring rang a nangshok. Ajarla nawchawng u hai kha ama na ajeng a rure`erpui.
55004016	Akhat changna a korodoi puilai khan, tute na narachang pui mak, inia mi kholok na kiei hi namathan uh. Amani dieng chona boi rang, kiei na Pathien dieng kinik.
55004017	Inia Pathien na kiei le ding a ruawm, khan ama na ranak nurupek. Makha kajar a, chawng kha rupumping a rophong a Phungshik hai na`awm arangaina rang a inih. Khan kieipui bai ah put ah Pathien na nurukhek joi.
55004018	Khan Pumi na ashie chon rikip a nakhek ning, tia ama ravan rengchangna khan nashan rangnih. Ama dieng khan kumshawt a lurna kha chang rosho. Amen.
55004019	Priscilla le Aquila khan Onesiphorus inshungkhur hai kha chubai peh roh.
55004020	Erastus hi Corinth ah awm joi, khan Trophimus hi Miletus ah natlam a kamak joi.
55004021	Phabi mala hin vak shokna rang, rakangchak a awm roh. Eubulus, Pudens, Linus, Claudia khan uliennai kholok na chubai nepek uh.
55004022	Nang ratha kha le Pumi Jesu Christa kha a`awm nih rosho. Numpokmirit kha nangni le a`awm nih rosho. Amen.
56001001	Pathien na imadansha hai takashawn dungjuia le Pathienjet le adik jetna `khat a, Pathien shok le Jesu Christa tirtawn, Paul kiei na nang dieng kimiejiek inih.
56001002	Kiei hi rong put mala a mielieishiei boi Pathien na chawngirurakham kumshawt ringna ngakmining khan a`awm kanih.
56001003	Apha rutukthep a chawngshem jar a ama chawng kha amalar joi. Makha le, nashandampa u Pathien chawngpek dungjuia, kiei hi inurunganshie nih joi.
56001004	Takashawn nuruchun dungjuia kashapa dik, Titus nang dieng napa u Pathien le nashandampa u nupumi u Jesu Christa ah put ah numpokmirit, roihoina le lungdamna kha a`awm nih rosho.
56001005	Hijarhin a inih, kiei na nang kha Crete tuikawram ah kinurumakna kha. Makha thaw rang a ravat hai kha dawna nangtetna rang le, chawng kinepek kha ang a, khopui rikip ah bieklamkai hai kha nangmadanna rang a inih.
56001006	Ama kha metek boi, nungak `khat inkopa aningir rang a inih. Anai hai kha takashawn rang a rutuk, chonrekhe thaw a ninawkle chawngjui boi a nawng boi aningir rang a inih.
