56001007	Bieklamkai rang tu, Pathien inchonpo `khat a, bieniei boi, iminingrok a she boi, ashangrat boi, ju a vanhat boi, chichairoi boi, shier a rapham boi,
56001008	inia jinchonthiei, atha kha numapoh miring, mirachan, midik, miriethieng, takshur ngam anih rang a inih.
56001009	Ama kha miruchukna dungjuia takashawn rang a rutuk, chawng arakrep miring anih rang a inih. Makha miruchukna atha kha shemna rang le makha le perawlaw miring hai kha rachak a demna rang a inih.
56001010	Ajarla chungrasha miring tampui awm uh, khinniei a vunep hai kar a rathashie methena a mohon a chawngriei hai kha inih uh.
56001011	Amani kha maw`awmchien rang a shok. Amani na mulung riethieng boi nemna rangbak a ruchuk rang adik boi kha le miruchuk ua, inshung kholok kha pawrimechet u inih.
56001012	Amanitak thiempulien `khat na ruti, “Crete miring hai kha mielieishiei, ramsha mulung apoh, rathashie, shak a rapham miring kha nih jawnjai uh.”
56001013	Mahi kungchangna hi adik inih. Khajarkhan takashawn khan atha changna u rang, khawktak a amani kha rawkawk roh.
56001014	Jihudi hai jokrishim hai le adik ah put ah ahiei miring hai chawngpek kha rangai naw roh.
56001015	Riethieng hai dieng tu ih kholok riethieng inih. Inia rono hai dieng tu iawm riethieng awm mak. Amani mining le lungthimshe kha pawrche chang pe uh.
56001016	Amani na Pathien jet miring kha kanih ti uh, inia amani chonthaw a ama kha jawt u mak. Amani na mipawrche, chawng rangai boi miring chang u jarkhan, atha chon rikip rang khan rutuk boi chang uh.
56002001	Khania nang tu miruchukna atha kha le aracha kha riei roh.
56002002	Patar hai kha mulung renem a awmna rang, ningsha a, mulungnet a, takashawn a riethieng le numpok a adoirat kha changna rang, riei pe roh.
56002003	Nutar hai kha khatikhan richit a awmna rang, ashie mulung pokna boi rang, juneh khan shok changna boi rang, atha ruchuh oja nitna rang, riei pe roh.
56002004	Makha nainu noi hai na amani inkopa hai kha numpokna rang le amani nai hai kha numpokna rang, mawshawkna `khat nitna rang a inih.
56002005	Khan makha mulung menetna rang, riethieng, inshung kha thatak a ishinna rang, amani inkopa haitak dieng khan redena rang a inih. Makha na Pathien chawng kha mieshietna boi rang a nih.
56002006	Khatikhan mieila noi hai kha`awm mulung menet ngamna rang, rachah roh.
56002007	Ih kholok a atha chon endar `khat nitna rang, nang nining a mumuk roh. Nang miruchukna khan ningsha le a`am boi kha machang roh.
56002008	Nang chawngriei khan atha le heng boi kha machang roh. Makha na nang norodoi pui ama kha majak rangnih. Khan nang dieng ashie rieina kha niei naw nih.
56002009	Shok hai na amani pumpa hai awnoi a awmna rang le irikip a ningminit pe a amani le perawlawna boi rang, riei pe roh.
56002010	Amani na rawt boi a rutukthep takashawn kha mumuk rosho. Makha na ih kholok a nashandampa u Pathien miruchukna kha rohoimashak rangnih.
56002011	Ajarla mi kholok rang a shandamna jong chawi Pathien numpokmirit kha jong lar joi.
56002012	Pathienjet boi le manmieshie ditrekhena kha jawtna boi rang kieini hi nuruchuk u joi. Khajarkhan mahi tun a pha hin tu mulungnet a, adik a, Pathien jet a aring rang nashok uh.
56002013	Khan ngakmining rahvanmukna, khan rashang napathien u le nashandampa u Jesu Christa na lurtak a larna kha kieini na ngaklam a na`awm u inih.
56002014	Christa kha na nining a kieini rang khan rurepeh joi. Makha danishawnboi kholok ah put ah nakhekna rang le, atha chon hai rang a ningaw, ama miring `khat a riethiengmashakna rang a inih.
56002015	Hihaihi riei tana mawshawk roh. Chawngpek kholok kha le rachah roh. Tute na nang kha adawk `khat a numuh naw rosho.
56003001	Amani kha rampo hai le chamniei hai awnoi a awmna rang, chawng juina rang, atha chon rikip a rashamna rang,
56003002	tute dieng chawng shie rieina boi rang, lungdam a awmna rang, mulung renem a awmna rang le mi kholok dieng redena kha mumukna rang, amani kha miningmashakret roh.
56003003	Ajarla kieiniawm pha `khat khan mimawng, chawngrangai boi, mi na imohon, ditrekhe hai le hoina shikshik chon ruthaw, ashie awmchan le manarshie khan a ruring, mi na imukmak le khatlekhat chung a mukmakna aniei nuruchang uh.
56003004	Inia nashandampa u Pathien miritna le numpok kha miring hai dieng lar phakhan,
56003005	tharmoshok rushukna le Ratha Riethieng matharna jar a, ama na kieini hi inurushan inih. Makha kieini na niruthaw u dikna chon hai jar a nimak a, ama ninghoina jar a inih.
56003006	Nashandampa u Jesu Christa jar a Ratha Riethieng kha nuchung ua rothom a ama na inojongliei pe u inih.
56003007	Makha, ama numpokmirit jar a kieini hi nimidiksho u le, kumshawt ringkho ngakmining dungjuia, koklo hai kha nachangna rang a inih.
56003008	Mahi takashawn rang a rutuk chawng inih. Khan hihaihi nangni na rawnaw a nimenet u rang a hi kidit inih. Makha Pathien takarushawn miring hai kha na atha chon hai kha riringtak a tawnna u rang a inih. Khahaikha miring hai rang a atha le nemna nieinak kha inih.
56003009	Inia chawngrieshiet amawng hai, thoinakeina hai, roshona hai, Dan chungchanga rieshietna hai kha lawi u roh. Ajarla amani kha nemna boi le arok nieinak kha inih.
56003010	Akhat changna le adi changna khan mi reshenmashak chonthaw miring kha riei pe roh. Khashole ama kha lawi roh.
56003011	Kha`ang miring kha ashawi le munu ithaw khan nining a reheng nana inih, iti kha jet roh.
56003012	Artemas ninawkle Tychicus kha nang dieng kavaktir phakhan, Nicopolis ah kiei dieng vatnangir rang thaw roh. Ajarla makhawn kiei na phabi kemehek jawt.
56003013	Danthieipa Zenas le Apollos amani khomijinna khan ravatna boi rang, nang ngamtukshe a shan roh.
56003014	Khan nimiring hai na`awm atha chon khan mulung repena rang le rangai akhawk niei miring hai kha mumuknathiei rang, ruchuh u rosho. Makha amani na ara boi changna boi rang a inih.
56003015	Kiei le awm miring kholok na nangni kha chubai nepek uh. Takashawn a kieini numnapoh miring hai kha chubai peh u roh. Nang kholok chung a numpokmirit kha a`awm nih rosho. Amen.
57001001	Christa Jesu shurkhop Paul kiei le uliennai Timothy na kunumpok le kochonthaw puishom u Philemon nang dieng le
57001002	kunumpok Apphia, khan karamiring chang pui Archippus, khan nang in ah biekrup dieng kiemiejiek.
57001003	Napa u Pathien le Pumi Jesu Christa na numpokmirit le lungdamna kha nangni dieng nepeh u rosho.
57001004	Nang rang kapathien kha kamapak. Kiei na nikna kieniei phakhan, nang riming kaban jawnjai.
57001005	Ajarla Pumi Jesu le miriethieng hai kholok dieng a nanginiei nang numpok le nang takashawn kha kejet joi.
57001006	Nang takashawn ringruchunna kha nangni dieng a awm atha kholok nangijetna jar a takimachang inih, tia kinik inih. Mahi atha nieinak hai hi Christa jar a inih.
57001007	Ajarla nang numpok kha na ajeng a ningaina le lungar nepek uh. Ajarla uliennai, miriethieng hai mulung kha nang na nangmathar u joi.
57001008	Khajarkhan thaw rang a rohoi thawna rang a Christa riming a chawng pekna rang, lungar kha kieniei.
57001009	Khanikengta numpok dungjuia Paul kiei na, tar `khat a le tun Jesu Christa shurkhop `khat a, kinengen inih.
57001010	Khoplam a kaw`awmlai a kimoshok, kashapa Onesimus rang, nang dieng nikna kiniei inih.
57001011	Ama kha matienglai tu nang rang nemna boi runih, inia tuntu nang le kiei rang nemna kha chang joi.
57001012	Ama hi nang dieng kivaktirret inih. Khajarkhan kumulungtak `khat ang a, nurupawm pe roh.
57001013	Athachawng rang a shurkhop a kaw`awm shung hin, nang ruhut a, kochon nawthawna pe rang, ama hi kiei dieng kirutet jawt inih.
57001014	Inia nang jawtna awm boi a kiei na iawm ruthaw jawt mi`ing. Makha nang chonthaw atha kha thawboithaboi `khat a niboia, ningrepeh a nitna rang a inih.
57001015	Ama kha kumshawt a nangruloina rang, pha bawngte ama na nang le rureshen nithiei.
57001016	Ama kha shok `khat a niboia, shok chung a awm, khinniei a numkipok uliennai kha nih joi. Nang na numpodet roh, ajarla ama hi miring le Pumi maikung a uliennai kha inih.
57001017	Khajarkhan kiei hi nang le chonthawshom `khat a nangnoloi joiatu, kiei nanginoloi rang a kha ang a, ama kha ruloi roh.
57001018	Khania ama na nang dieng irehena ninawkle lieishie niei joiatu, makha kieshiermushung khan tet roh.
57001019	Hihai chawng hi Paul kiei na kukhuttak le kimiejiek inih. Kiei na thung rang kanih. Nang pumtak kha kiei dieng a lieishie `khat inih, ti jar a kiei na kiriei nimak.
57001020	Inih, Aw uliennai, Pumi riming a nang ah put ah mahi nemna hi kiei na niei rawng. Pumi riming a kumulung hi namapar pe roh.
57001021	Nang chawngjuina khan rangamna kieniei jar a, nang dieng kimiejiek inih. Kirieinek hin khedet a nangthaw rangnih, iti hi kejet.
57001022	`Khatret tu, kiei rang tungna nururasham pe roh. Ajarla nangnik jar a Pathien na kiei hi nang dieng navakpek rangnih, iti hi takakawshawn.
57001023	Christa Jesu jar a koshurkhop chang pui, Epaphras na chubai nepek.
57001024	Kochonthaw pui hai: Mark, Aristarchus, Demas le Luke na chubai nepek uh.
57001025	Nupumi Jesu Christa numpokmirit kha na nang ratha u le a`awm nih rosho. Amen.
58001001	Tolai khan Pathien na pilepu hai dieng rawnawrawnaw a le awmchan shikshik a thiempulien hai dieng irurieina inih.
58001002	Mahi nikho dawng hai hin Pathien na kieini dieng hin ashapa dieng irurieina inih. Irikip koklona kha ama dieng pek inih. Khan ama jar a manmieshie hiawm Pathien na irukon inih.
58001003	Shapa kha lurna engvar le ama ringchangna rilim kha inih. Ama chawng hai ranak jar a, nieinak kholok ama na irumukui inih. Khan amani munu hai riethiengmashakna kha thaw shole, Renglur chang tieng khan rashangtak a rushuh inih.
58001004	Ravantir hainek khan athadet chang jarkhan, irurawh riming kha amani rimingnek a alur inih.
58001005	Ajarla ravantir tu dieng maw “Nang hi kashapa kha nangnih, Von hin konomoshok joi.” Khan takthar a, “Ama dieng hin kiei Apa nih rang kanih, khan kiei dieng hin ama hi Shapa nih rangnih,” tia irieina pha awm joi?
58001006	Khan takthar a, ama sharapa kha rieliei chung a jong chawi phakhan, ama na ieriei, “Pathien ravantir kholok na ama dieng chubai ibawk nih rosho.”
58001007	Khan ravantir hai chungchanga ieriei, “Ama ravantir hai kha ratha hai machang joi, khan ama richichonthaw hai kha mieichon machang joi.”
58001008	Inia Shapa chungchang khan ieriei, “Aw Pathien, nangrengmun kha kumshawtkumshawt a awm inih. Khan dikna rawmaw kha nang rengchangna rawmaw kha inih.
58001009	Dikna kha numnangpok, khan danishawnboi kha nangmukmak. Khajarkhan Pathien, nang Pathien na nangrawtawp pui hainek a rawshawna thao kha le thaonanawt joi.”
58001010	Khan “Nang, Aw PUMI, putna khan rieliei hi kungnangphun, khan ravan hai hi nang khutkon kha inih.
58001011	Amani hi thang rangnih, inia nang tu nangawm. Ih kholok ponledier ang a lui rangnih.
58001012	Khan ponpha ang a amani kha nangjo a amani kha rotho rangnih, inia nang tu angangai a nangawm. Khan nang kum hai kha dawng, iti awm naw nih.”
58001013	Khan ravantir tu hai dieng khan maw “Nang rahapui hai kha nangke hai kekhawng kamachang masheng, kukhut chang tieng hin shuh roh,” tia irieina pha awm joi?
58001014	Ravantir hai kha shandamna arawh rang a hai chonthaw rang a ijongtir, chon thaw ratha hai kholok kha anih boi u maw nih?
58002001	Mahi jarhin kieini na lamrekhe thawna boi rang, nirangai u hai dieng khan mulunglutdet rang nashok uh.
58002002	Ajarla ravantir hai dieng a irurieina chawng kha anet inih, khan shietna rikip le chawngjuina boi kha na rutukthep lawh kha rumuk joi.
58002003	Mahi adik nitjarkhan, khadawr a alien shandamna kha ne`enda uala, itia maw rekhe u minih? Mahi shandamna hi putna a Pumi dieng a irurieina rangai hai na kieini dieng a irumenet inih.
58002004	Jetna le shindawngna, shikshik chonrekhek, khan Ratha Riethieng shemna khan, ama idit dungjuia, Pathien na`awm kungichang puishom inih.
58002005	Jong shok rang a rieliei kha ama na ravantir hai thoi a rutet mak. Makha chungchang khan kieini na niriei u inih.
58002006	Inia tukhat na kungchang a ieriei: “Nangimining miring ama kha imaw nih? Ninawkle, nangtenret miring shapa kha tumaw nih?
58002007	Ama kha ravantir hainek a pha bawngte rang khan nangrenemmashak. Lurna le richit a ama kha nang renglukhum kha nangmukhu joi. Khan nang khut hai chonthaw hai aen rang nangtet joi.
58002008	Irikip kha ama kepha thoi ah nangtet joi.” Ama kepha thoi ah nangitetna khan, ama kepha thoi ah itet boi `khatshe awm mak. Inia ih kholok ama thoi ah itet kha kieini na muh u makmelai.
58002009	Inia shawna thitna rang a, ravantir hainek a pha bawngte imawdawk a lurna le richit a renglukhum imukhu, Jesu kha numuk u joi. Makha Pathien numpokmirit jar a, Jesu na mi kholok rang thitna tuidan ru`enna rang a inih.
58002010	Pathien rang mahi rutuk inih, ajarla irikip hi ama rang le ama jar a aring inih. Ama na shapa tampui hi lurna khan ihawngchawi a, amani shandamna thoina, Jesu kha shawna jar a rupummashakna rang a inih.
58002011	Ajarla riethiengmashakpa le iriethiengmashak hai kholok kha akhat inih. Makha jarkhan amani kha uliennai, tia koi phakhan, ama na jakna niei mak.
58002012	Ama na iti, “Nang riming kha ku`uliennai hai dieng rophong rang kanih, biekrup kar khan nang mapakna lah kha thaw rang kanih.”
58002013	Khan takthar a, “Kiei na ama chung a karangam pui.” Khan takthar a, “Enro, Pathien na inurupek naite hai kha kiei le hin awm uh.”
58002014	Khajarkhan naite hai na athithiei balam itumshom u kha le ra`ang a, Jesutak na`awm amani kha irutum inih. Makha Jesu na athi a, thitna ranak aniei, diabol ama kha mathangna rang a inih.
58002015	Makha thitna kha chit jar a iringkho shungshe a shok a a`awm rang a amani kha moshoknathiei rang a inih.
58002016	Ajarla diktak a ravantir hai kha ishan nimak, inia Abraham chicha hai kha ishan inih.
58002017	Lam rikip a ama kha uliennai hai kha le ra`angngir rang a shok. Makha Pathien chon a numpokthiei le takashawnthiei Thiempu Rashang chang a miring hai munu jar a ringnikna konna rang a inih.
58002018	Ajarla amatakawm rulem a shawna kha irudoi inih. Makha na irulem miring hai kha ishan ngam inih.
58003001	Khajarkhan ravan koina atumshom uliennai riethieng hai, nierieirophongna u Tirtawn le Thiempu Rashang achang, Christa Jesu kha mining u roh.
58003002	Moses na Pathien inshung kholok a takashawn rang a rutuk kha ang a, rumadanpa ama dieng khan Christa kha takashawn rang a rutuk runih.
58003003	Ajarla ama kha Moses nek a lurna aliendet a rutuk `khat a ruloi. Khatak kha ang a, inrashakpa kha na innek khan lurna aliendet kha ieniei.
58003004	Ajarla in rikip kha tukhat na irashak inih, khanita`awm ih kholok rurashakpa kha Pathien inih.
58003005	Shok `khat a Moses na ama inshung kholok a takashawn rang a rutuk ruchang. Mahi kungchangna hi nuk a riei rang a inih.
58003006	Inia Shapa `khat a Christa na ama inshung a takashawn rang a rutuk ruchang. Khan narangamna u le nangakmining u shung a awm ningaina kha dawngshe khan numukuirep u joiatu, kieini hi Pathien inshung kha nanih uh.
58003007	Khajarkhan Ratha Riethieng na ieriei kha le ra`ang inih: “Von nikho hin ama hesho kha nangrangai u joiatu,
58003008	ramthim a enirete u nikho khan ra`irumothoi u kha ang a, nang mulung michimmashak u naw roh.
58003009	Makha enretena khan nang pilepu hai kha na kiei hi nuruthir uh. Khan kum shawm mili khan kochonthaw hai kha rumuk uh.
58003010	Khajarkhan makha rong dieng khan mulung hang a kuruti, ‘Amani mulung a lamrehemashak jawnjai uh, amani na kalam hai kha rujet u mak.’
58003011	Khajarkhan kumulung hangna khan chawng kururakham, ‘Kawshawmuchumna khan lut u naw nih.’ ”
58003012	Uliennai hai, aring Pathien ah put ah vai shokna rang, takashawn boi mulung shie kha tu diengawm awmna boi rang, riring u roh.
58003013	Inia “Von nikho,” iti awmlai hin khatlekhat dieng mulung ngarna kha ningthingkip repeh u roh. Makha munu mimohonna kha na nang mulung u kha michimmashakna boi rang a inih.
58003014	Ajartu kieini na kung putna a nirangam pui u kha dawngshe a diktak a numukuirep u joiatu, kieini hi Christa le atumshom miring kha nanih u joi.
58003015	Hitihin ieriei, “Von nikho hin, ama hesho kha nangrangai u joiatu, ra`irumothoi u kha ang a, nang mulung michimmashak u naw roh.”
58003016	Rangai chuchung a rosho mothoi kha, tu hai maw nih? Moses na Egypt ah put ah lamivakkai pe kholok kha runih boi maw nih?
58003017	Tu hai dieng a kum shawm mili mulung ruhang pe maw nih? Ramthim ah amani rok acho munu ruthaw hai kha runih boi maw nih?
58003018	Ama shawmuchumna khan amani lut naw nih, tia chawngirurakham kha, tu hai dieng a maw nih? Makha chawngrangai boi miring hai dieng a nih boi maw nih?
58003019	Khajarkhan amani takashawn boi jar a rulut ngam boi u inih, iti kha kieini na numuk u joi.
58004001	Khajarkhan shawmuchumna khan lutnathiei rang, chawngrakham kha ringjin a awmlai hin nichit pui u rang a shok. Khania tukhat na, makha mun khan nang hawng ngam boiawm jawt.
58004002	Ajarla amani dieng a kha le ra`ang a, kieini diengawm athachawng kha irurophong nih joi. Khania irurangai u chawng kha amani na runemna u mak, khan takashawn kha le makha rurechemashak u mak.
58004003	Ajarla shawmuchumna khan takarushawn hai kieini nalut u joi. Pathien na iriei hi le ra`ang inih, “Khajarkhan kumulung hangna khan chawngkururakham, ‘Kawshawmuchumna khan lut u naw nih.’ ” Nitjoiawm manmieshie phun ah put ah chon hai kha irumawtawrsho nih joi.
58004004	Ajarla ishiri changna chungchanga mun `khat a hitihin ieriei joi, “Ni shiri changna khan ama chon kholok ah put ah Pathien na shawrumuchum.”
58004005	Khan mahin takthar a, “Kawshawmuchumna khan lut u naw nih.”
58004006	Makha shawmuchumna khan eshen tu lut rangnih, iti kha ding a awm. Khan arapa a athachawng rurangai miring hai kha na chawngjui boi jar a rulut u mak.
58004007	Takthar a nikho `khat rumadan a, Pathien na “Von,” ruti. Iruti kha ang a, kum shawttak shole, Pathien na mahi David kam a iruti inih: “Von hin, ama hesho kha nangrangai u joiatu, nang mulung michimmashak u naw roh.”
58004008	Ajarla Joshua na amani dieng shawmuchumna kha rupek joiala, nikho shik `khat chungchanga Pathien na nuk a iruriei boi rang a inih.
58004009	Khashole Pathien miring rang shawmuchumna kha ringjin a awmlai.
58004010	Ajarla ama shawmuchumna ah put ah alut ama kha na, Pathien na amatak chon hai ah put ah iruthaw kha ang a, ama`awm ochon ah put ah shawirumuchum inih.
58004011	Khajarkhan makha chawngjuina boi endartak khan lutna boi rang, makha shawmuchumna khan lutna rang, ningamtuk a rojo u rawi.
58004012	Ajarla Pathien chawng hi aring le ranakniei, khan bediniei chemjam rikipnek a angai, ringphuk le ratha, rawlawh le rithing idi reshenshe ichi, khan mining le chonmuchuk kha ithir ngam inih.
58004013	Khan Pathien maikung a rethe khutkon awm mak, inia kieini na mushungna nipeknangir u rang a ama dieng ih kholok hi imukhu boi a rophoiviek inih.
58004014	Khajarkhan ravan kholok rurakan, Thiempu Rashang alien, Pathien Shapa Jesu kha nieniei u joi jarkhan, nirieirophong u kha mukuirep u rawi.
58004015	Ajarla nawdawkna u chungchanga nashaw pui ngam boi Thiempu Rashang kha niei u makme. Inia kieini ang a ih kholok a lemna kha irurawtawng pui inih, nitjoiawm munu runiei mak.
58004016	Khajarkhan numpokmirit aship rengmun kha rangamna nieitak a jawng u rawi. Makha rangai pha a nashan rang, roihoina nienieina rang le numpokmirit kha numukna u rang a inih.
58005001	Ajarla miring hai kar a iloi thiempu rashang rikip miring hai ruhut a Pathien chon aboi pui rang a irumadan inih. Makha munu rangbak a khutchawi hai le rawthawina hai kha pekna rang a inih.
58005002	Ama`awm dawkna kha na irubuk nit jarkhan, amawng hai le lamrehe miring hai dieng khan mulung raw`awi a ruthaw ngam.
58005003	Mahi jarhin miring hai munu chungchanga rawthawina khan amatak munu rangawm rawthawi rang a shok inih.
58005004	Khan tute na mahi richit kha ama idit dungjuia iman nimak a, Aaron kha ang a, Pathien na ikoi ama kha na iman inih.
58005005	Hitihin Christa na`awm Thiempu Rashang changna rang khan nining a rurulur mak, inia “Nang kashapa kha nangnih, von hin konomoshok joi,” atipa ama na irumulur inih.
58005006	Mun `khat khanawm ama na iti, “Nang hi Melchizedek awmchan a awm kumshawt thiempu kha nangnih.”
58005007	Ama na rieliei ringkho a ruringlai khan, mikrithi cho a ra`ai a, thitna ah put ah ashan ngam ama dieng nikna le rieina runiei. Ama na Pathien kha ruchih jarkhan, Pathien na inikna kha rurangai pe.
58005008	Ama na Shapa `khat runih joiawm, ama shawdoina hai ah put ah, chawngjuina kha iruruchuk inih.
58005009	Ama kha rupummashak a, ama chawngjui kholok dieng kumshawt shandamna tuinar kha ruchang.
58005010	“Melchizedek awmchan a awm,” Thiempu Rashang `khat inih, tia Pathien na ama kha riming irupek inih.
58005011	Ama chungchanga chawngriei rang tampui nieniei uh, rangai nangthiei boi u jarkhan, meler rang matat.
58005012	Ajarla tun a pha hin tu nangni kha miruchuh hai anih rang a tu nangnih u joi, inia takthar a, mi na Pathien chawngriei chawngrukung inuruchuk u rang a kha rangai. Khan burum kha niboia, runutui kha nangrangai u joi.
58005013	Ajarla runutui aneh mi rikip na dikna chawng kha, naite nit jarkhan, jet ngam mak.
58005014	Inia burum kha achang miring hai rang a inih. Atha-ashie reshenmashakna rang, thawshieina kha na imining a ijetna u kha imawjawng u inih.
58006001	Khajarkhan Christa chungchanga chawngriei putna kha mak u taia rupumping tieng she u rawi. Khan athi chon hai ah put ah mulung lekna le Pathien tieng a takashawn chungchanga chawkier kha phun u lai naw rawi.
58006002	Baptisma pekna hai miruchukna, khut dong a rahvan pekna, athi miring hai na hawng thoiretna, khan kumshawt a chawngshatna chawkier kha phun u lai naw rawi.
58006003	Khan mahi Pathien na jawt joiatu, nawthaw u rangnih.
58006004	Ajarla matieng a varna runiei hai, ravan khutchawi tuidan ruen hai, khan Ratha Riethieng atumshom ruchang hai,
58006005	khan Pathien chawng atha le ajong rang a rong ranak hai tuidan ruensha hai kha na cho u joiatu,
58006006	mulung lekna a matharnaret rang, anithiei boi inih. Ajarla Pathien Shapa kha amani rangbak khan cross ah ithatthep ua, ama kha mipui maikung a jakna kha ipek u inih.
58006007	Ajarla rieliei na ama chung ah phapha a jong cho rotui kha inek inih. Khan ama chung ah chon thaw hai rang khan nemna choicha mawmawng pe a rieliei na Pathien ah put ah rahvan imuk inih.
58006008	Inia riling le rampa mawmawng rieliei kha tu nemna boi inih, khan pumbot mukna rang a kha nai pe joi. Khan ama dawng kha tu miei a ha rang a inih.
58006009	Inia kunumpok hai, kieini na hitihin chawng kieriei u joiawm, nang chungchang uatu athadet, shandamna rawtawp pui chon hai kha, shok rangnih, tia karangam pui uh.
58006010	Nangni na miriethieng hai chon nangiruthaw u, khan thaw a nang awm ua, ama riming a nangimumuk u nang chonthaw u le numpok jar a, nang chonthaw ratna u kha mieniei rang a Pathien kha adik boi nimak.
58006011	Nang ngakmining u kha dawngshe khan minitna rang, nangni khatkhat na makha lunglutna kha nangimumuk u rang a kha kadit uh.
58006012	Makha rathashie boi, inia chawngrakham hai kha doirat a le takashawn a atum hai nunruchuh miring hai kha nangnitna u rang a inih.
58006013	Ajarla Pathien na Abraham dieng chawngrurakhamlai khan, ama chawngrakhamna rang tuawm aliendet awm boi jarkhan, amatak dieng chawngrurakham.
58006014	Ama na ruti, “Kiei na rahvan nepekngir rang kanih, khan nang chicha tampui numupung pengir rang kanih.”
58006015	Khatikhan, doirattak a irungak anuk a, ama na chawngrakham kha irumuk inih.
58006016	Ajarla miring hai na aliendet tukhat dieng chawngirakham inih. Khan chawngrieshietna rikip mawtawrna kha chawngrakham na imenet inih.
58006017	Chawngrakham atum hai dieng ama chonmuchuk kha thothieiboi runih, iti kha mumuknadet rang, Pathien na chawngrakham le irumenet inih.
58006018	Inurupek u ngakmining kha manna rang a rutan nanih uh. Khan lungar lientak nienieina u rang, Pathien na thothieiboi idi hi mahi iruthaw inih. Ajarla Pathien na mielieishiei ithaw rang a hi anithiei boi inih.
58006019	Makha ringphuk chuk `khat a niniei u, aningir le anettak, maikhar shung rieirit a alut, ngakmining kha inih.
58006020	Malamkai Jesu na, Melchizedek awmchan a awm kumshawt Thiempu Rashang ruchang a, nuruhut ua makhan rulut joi.
58007001	Ajarla Rashang Chungchon Pathien thiempu, Salem reng, Melchizedek hi na, reng hai that shole a vak kir, Abraham kha rumuk pui a rahvan rupek.
58007002	Abraham na raniei kholok kar a shawm a `khat hi ama dieng rupek. Akhat changna a iriming kha nemele le “Dikna aniei reng,” itina inih, khashole Salem rengawm inih. Makha “Lungdamna aniei reng,” tina inih.
58007003	Ama na apa runiei mak, unu runiei mak, thoinakeina runiei mak, ama nikho hai putna le ama ringkho mawtawrna runiei mak. Inia Pathien Shapa kha ruang, khan chatboia thiempu `khat a ruawm.
58007004	En u ro, ama hi idawr a rulien maw nih, phungpa Abraham na ama raniei hai shemshawm kha ama dieng irupek inih.
58007005	Khan thiempumun aloh Levi naitak hai na, Abraham chicha kha runishom u joiawm, miring hai, nititu uliennai hai dieng, shemshawm loina rang, Dan shung ah chawngpek runiei uh.
58007006	Inia amani rui a jong shok nih boi ama na Abraham ah put ah shemshawm rumuk a, chawngrakham hai runiei ama kha rahvan irupek inih.
58007007	Aliendet na adawkdet dieng rahvan ipek, iti hi perawlaw boi `khat inih.
58007008	Khan mahin athithiei miring hai na shemshawm ruloi uh, inia makhan amani na ring a awmlai, tia kungichangna ama na shemshawm iruloi inih.
58007009	Chawnga khan ti rawi, makhala shemshawm aloi Levishe na shemshawm kha Abraham dieng irupekna inih.
58007010	Ajarla Melchizedek na Abraham rurumuk puilai khan, Levi kha ipipu chirui a ruawmlai.
58007011	Khajarkhan rupumpingna kha Levi thiempumun jar a nitjoiala (ajarla mahi noi a miring hai na Dan kha imuk u inih), Aaron rui dungjuia niboia, Melchizedek rui dungjuia thiempu shik athoingir rang a hi irangai rang a maw nilai?
58007012	Ajarla thiempumun kha tho joi jarkhan, Dan kha`awm tho rang khan irangai`er nih joi.
58007013	Ajarla hihaihi chungchanga irieina ama hi phung `shik ah put ah inih. Makha phung ah put ah tute na lungkheng ah chon thaw maklai.
58007014	Ajarla nupumi u hi Judah phung a hawng thoi inih, iti hi madanghet inih. Moses na thiempumun chungchanga rieina khan makha phung kha ruban mak.
58007015	Thiempu shik hawng thoi kha Melchizedek le ra`ang nitjoiatu, akalang madanghet joi.
58007016	Jesu kha miring chawngpek dan dungjuia nimak a, dawngawmboi ringkho `khat ranak dungjuia inih.
58007017	Ajarla ama na kungruchang, “Melchizedek awmchan a awm dungjuia kumshawt thiempu kha nangnih.”
58007018	Ajarla matieng a chawngpek kha na dawkna le nemna boi niei jarkhan, chon a meshe boi nih joi.
58007019	Ajarla Dan na ih kha`awm rupummashak mak, inia shir `khat tieng, ngakmining athadet kha vak chawi joi. Makha jar a Pathien dieng naranai u joi.
58007020	Mahi chawngrakham jaw boi a runimak.
58007021	Ajarla thiempu shik hai tu, chawngrakham boi a, thiempumun kha iruloh u inih. Inia chawngrakham aniei ama na ruti, “PUMI na chawngrakham a mulung lek naw nih, ‘Melchizedek awmchan a awm dungjuia kumshawt thiempu kha nangnih.’ ”
58007022	Makha chawngrakham khan Jesu na athadet rawjawtna rentukna kha ruchang inih.
58007023	Dawn shena rang khan thitna na rukhar jarkhan, thiempu hai tampui ruawm joi.
58007024	Inia ama tu, kumshawt a dawn she jarkhan, rotho boi thiempumun `khat kha ieniei joi.
58007025	Khajarkhan ama jar a Pathien dieng ava miring hai kha rupumping a ishan ngam inih. Ajarla amani ruhut a nikna rang khan aring jawnjai inih.
58007026	Ajarla kha`ang Thiempu Rashang kha kieini rang a rutuk inih. Ama kha riethieng, metek boi, pawrche boi, munu miring hai ah put ah rechen, khan ravan hainek a rashang kha ruchang joi.
58007027	Khahai thiempu rashang hai kha ang a, ama rang khan ningthingkip rawthawi rang kha rangai mak. Amani na rapapek a amani munu hai rangbak khan rawthawi shole, miring hai rang khan rawthawina runiei uh. Ajarla ama na upumtak a rurawthawi phakhan, pha kholok rang voikhatte ruthaw joi.
58007028	Ajarla Dan na dawkna aniei miring hai kha thiempu rashang hai `khat a amadan, inia Dan shole a ajong chawngrakham chawng kha na kumshawt a rupum Shapa kha madan joi.
58008001	Tun niriei u hai kar a runiei kha hi inih: ravan a Renglur rengmun chang tieng ah rushuh, kha ang Thiempu Rashang kha niniei u inih.
58008002	Ama kha miring na nih boi, Pumi na ikon inriethieng, khan adik thamber ah richichonthaw `khat runih.
58008003	Ajarla thiempu rashang rikip kha, khutchawi hai le rawthawina hai kha pekna rang, irumadan inih. Khajarkhan ama na ih `khat irupek rang a shok inih.
58008004	Ajarla rieliei a ruawm joiatu, ama kha thiempu runih naw nih. Ajarla Dan dungjuia khutchawi hai rupeh, thiempu hai kha ruawm uh.
58008005	Amani na ravan a awm nieinak hai endar le rilim chon kha iruthaw u inih. Makha Moses na thamber rurashak diengtak a Pathien na ama dieng chawngirupek kha a`ang inih. Ama na hitihin ruti, “Enro, lawn ah nang dieng inurumumuk thawdan dungjuia irikip kha kon roh.”
58008006	Inia tuntu ama na athaving richichon kha man joi. Ama hi athadet rawjawtna, ranaknieidet Palai kha inih. Mahi rawjawtna hi athadet chawngrakham chung a imothoi inih.
58008007	Ajarla arapa rawjawtna kha metek boi runih joiatu, makha atho rang, adi changna rawjawtna tawkna rang, rangai mak.
58008008	Metekna kha muk pe a, ama na iti: “PUMI na iti, enro, Israel inshung le Judah inshung a rawjawtna `thar kikonna rang a nikho hai kha jong nai joi.
58008009	Amani khut mukui pe a, Egypt ah put ah kavakmoroilai a, amani pa hai dieng a kirukon rawjawtna kha le ra`anglai naw nih. Ajarla kawrawjawtna kon kha amani na rujui u mak. Khajarkhan amani kha ke`enda joi, tia PUMI na ieriei.
58008010	Ajarla kha hai nikho shole Israel inshung dieng a kikon rang a rawjawtna kha hi inih: amani mulungmining khan kadan hai hi thong rang kanih, amani mulung hai khan amani kha miejiek pe rang kanih, amani Pathien kha kiei nih rang kanih, khan amani kha kimiring nih u rangnih, tia PUMI na ieriei.
58008011	Tute na amani ringchangpui le uliennai hai dieng ‘PUMI kha jet roh,’ tia ruchuh naw nih. Ajarla mi kholok, ashinving ah put ah alienving, na kiei hi nejet rangnih.
58008012	Amani dikna boi khan koroihoina kha tetna rang kanih, khan amani munu hai kha le danishawnboi chon thaw hai kha mining pelai naw ning.”
58008013	“Rawjawtna `thar,” itina khan akhat changna kha rotoknathiei boi machang a rotoknathiei boi le alui kha athang rang rasham nih joi.
58009001	Diktak a akhat changna rawjawtna khan Pathien biekna le rieliei inriethieng shedan kha ieniei.
58009002	Ajarla hitihin thamber hi ikon inih: akhat changna indan kha inriethieng iti. Makhan thaomeishutna tebol khan rawthawina tan itet inih.
58009003	Khan adi changna maikhar anuk khan riethieng chungchon a Riethieng iti thamber `khat awm.
58009004	Makhan berawh hana rangkachak lungkheng le rangkachak le itoprep rawjawtna tapu `khat awm. Makha shung khan manna a`awm rangkachak be, achawr shok Aaron shunshawraw le rawjawtna lungpek hai kha awm.
58009005	Khan makha chung khan alur cherubim hai kha na irilip ringnikna mun `khat awm. Hihai chungchang hin tun kieini na thirviek ngam u naw minih.
58009006	Khatikhan irikip kha rashamsho u le, thiempu hai na akhat changna thamber khan richichon thawna rang, rulut uh.
58009007	Khania adi changna indan khan tu kumkhat shung a voikhatte thiempu rashang na thishen ichawingir a, iethien a alut inih. Makhan ama rangbak le miring hai na jet boi a ithaw munu hai rang khan Pathien dieng ipek inih.
58009008	Akhat changna thamber kha dinglaisheng, Riethiengving lutna lam kha tu imalangmashak boi nilai. Hitihin a Ratha Riethieng na imumuk inih.
58009009	Makha tun a pha chawngmeloi kha runih. Ipek khutchawi hai le rawthawina hai kha na rubiekpa lungthim kha rurupummashak ngam mak.
58009010	Thona pha kha jong shok masheng, shakna le nekna khan shikshik rushukna le taksha shedan hai kha she rangnih.
58009011	Inia khut le kon boi, aliendet le rupumdet thamber jar a, Christa na ajong nieinak atha hai Thiempu Rashang kha ruchang joi. Makha thamber kha hi khutkon rieliei ah put ah nimak.
58009012	Kumshawt rekhekna kha rumuk shole, kecha hai le shiecha remet hai thishen le niboia, ama thishentak le Riethiengving khan voikhatte rulut joi.
58009013	Ajarla shiecha hai le ke hai thishen le shiero ruvut hai kha na orono kha athing a pum riethiengmashakna khan riethiengmashak joiala,
58009014	idawrshe maw hektiknieiboi Ratha jar a Pathien dieng nining a rurepeh, Christa thishen kha na athi chon hai ah put ah aring Pathien chon thawna rang, nang lungthim u kha nieriethieng pe u nih?
58009015	Makha jarkhan ama hi rawjawtna `thar Palai kha inih. Akhat changna rawjawtna thoi a shietna rekhekna hai rang khan thitna runiei. Makha ikoi miring hai kha na kumshawt inkoklo chawngrakham kha manna rang a inih.
58009016	Ajarla rawjawtna `khat chon a meshena rang, amah miring athi rang a kha irangaingir inih.
58009017	Ajarla miring hai thit shole, chawngmah kha anet inih, inia chawngmah miring kha ringlai khan tu, makha na ranak niei mak.
58009018	Ajarla akhat changna rawjawtnashe kha`awm, thishen le iloh boi nimak.
58009019	Dan dungjuia Moses na chawngpek kholok kha miring hai dieng ruriei phakhan, ama na shiecha remet le kecha hai thishen kha tui le rumeche, khan moniei ponshen le hyssop kha rotokna a, behangjo le miring hai dire kha iruphen inih.
58009020	Ama na ruti, “Mahi Pathien na nangni dieng chawnginepek u rawjawtna thishen kha inih.”
58009021	Kha le ra`ang a, thamber le richichon thawna be kholok kha, thishen le iruphen inih.
58009022	Khan Dan dungjuia irikip kha thishen na iruriethiengsho inih. Thishen moshok boi a munu rangaidamna awm mak.
58009023	Khajarkhan ravan a nieinak endar hai hi, hihai rawthawina hi le riethiengmashakna rang, irangai inih. Inia hihainek hin a athadet rawthawina hai kha ravan nieinak hai rang khan irangai inih.
58009024	Ajarla Christa na khut le kon Riethiengving khan rulut mak. Hihaihi adik mera`ang kha inih. Inia tun Pathien maikung a larna rang, nuruhut ua ravantak khan a rulut inih.
58009025	Thiempu rashang hai na Riethiengving khan kumkip shik thishen le alut kha ang a, Christa na nining a repeh jawnjai rang a kha rangai mak.
58009026	Khanitjoiatu rieliei phun ah put ah ama na rawnawrawnaw a shawna irudoi rang a inih. Inia tun, voikhatte, rong mawtawr tieng hin, munu hai paina rang, ama rawthawina jar a rular joi.
58009027	Khatikhan miring hi voikhat tu athi rang a imadansha inih, makha shole chawngshatna kha inih.
58009028	Khajarkhan Christa na mi tampui munu hai kha ruputna rang, voikhatte rurepeh joi. Ngakrala a ruawm miring hai dieng shandamna apeh rang, voidi changna a jong lar rangnih. Mahi pha hin tu munu chungchanga boi puilai naw nih.
58010001	Ajarla Dan hi ajong rang a atha nieinak hai rilip kha inih. Khan mahi nieinak hai rilimtak kha tu nimak. Kumkip a rawthawina ipek makha rawthawina kha na chubaibawk rang a ajawng miring hai kha rupummashak ngamhet mak.
58010002	Rupummashak joiatu, amani na apeh kha bang u naw nih maw? Ajarla voikhat a iriethiengmashaksha biekmiring hai kha na amani munu hai miningnaret kha nieilai naw nih.
58010003	Inia khahai rawthawina kha na munu hai kha kumkip iminingmashak inih.
58010004	Ajarla shiecha hai le kecha hai thishen kha na munu hai kha ipai ngam rang a hi adikthieiboi inih.
58010005	Khajarkhan rieliei shung a jong phakhan, ama na ruti, “Rawthawina le pekna kha nang na rudit makche, inia pum `khat hi kiei rang nangnarasham pe joi.
58010006	Munu chungchanga havieng a pek le rawthawina khan ningnitna runiei makche.
58010007	Khashole kiei na kuruti, ‘Enro, Aw Pathien, nang mulungmining thaw rang khan kajong joi. Kuchungchanga imiejiek behangjo khan miejiek joi.’ ”
58010008	(Amani kha Dan dungjuia pek nitjoiawm), maton khan ruti, “Rawthawina hai le pekna hai, havieng a pek le munu jar a pek hai kha nang na rudit makche, khan amani chung khan ningnitna`awm runiei makche.”
58010009	Khashole ama na ruti, “Enro, Aw Pathien, nang mulungmining thaw rang khan kiei kajong joi.” Adi changna kha mothoinathiei rang, akhat changna kha loi joi.
58010010	Makha mining kha thaw a, Jesu Christa na voikhatte rang khan a ipek pum jar a, kieini hi nieriethiengmashak joi.
58010011	Khan thiempu rikip na ningthingkip ding a richichon thaw a ruawm, khan munu hai shukpai a apai ngam boi rawthawina hai momoi kha chatboi a pek a ruawm uh.
58010012	Inia mahi miring hi na, munu hai jar a kumshawt rang rawthawina `khatte kha rupek shole, Pathien khutchang khan rushuh joi.
58010013	Kha pha ah put ah ama rahapui hai kha ekekhawng machangna rang ngak a ruawm.
58010014	Ajarla makha rawthawina `khatte kha le riethiengmashak a awm hai kha kumshawt a irupummashak inih.
58010015	Khan Ratha Riethieng na`awm kieini dieng kungruchang a hitihin arapa khan ruti,
58010016	“PUMI na ruti, amani le kithaw rang a rawjawtna kha hi inih. Makha nikho hai kha shole, amani mulung shung khan kadan hai kha tet pe rang kanih, khan amani mulungmining hai khan miejiek pe rang kanih.”
58010017	Khan “Amani munu hai le amani danishawnboi chon hai kha kiei na miningthep pelai naw ning.”
58010018	Tun hihai munu rangaidamna awm joi jarkhan, munu chungchanga pekna kha awmlai naw nih.
58010019	Khajarkhan uliennai hai, Jesu thishen jar a, Riethiengving lutna rang rangamna kha nieniei u joi.
58010020	Mahi athar le aring lam hi maikhar, nitila ama pum kha le kieini rang iruloh nih joi.
58010021	Pathien inshung hai apoh rang, Thiempu Alien `khat nieniei u joi.
58010022	Khajarkhan takashawn nihetna rupumna shung a adik mulung kha le kieini na jawng u rawi. Ashie lungthim ah put ah numulung u kha aphen a tui riethieng kha le nupum u hai kha Pathien na rurushuk joi.
58010023	Nangakmining u rophongna khan kieini na rawnawk boi a mukuirep u rawi, ajarla chawngrakhampa kha takashawn rang a rutuk inih.
58010024	Khan numpok le atha chon hai khan khatlekhat mawphawkna rang, mining u rawi.
58010025	Mi eshen hai awmchan kha ang a, nuruchunna u kha pai u naw rawi, inia makha Nikho jong nai nangimuk u tukthep khan kieini khatlekhat mawshawk nana u rawi.
58010026	Ajarla adik kha nejet u shole, chana a munu kha kieini na nawthaw u joiatu, munu chungchanga rawthawina rang, mun awmlai mak.
58010027	Inia chiroi chawngshatna le akhawk miei ranga kha mukshashang a awm nih joi. Mahi na Pathien rahapui miring hai kha kang rangnih.
58010028	Tunita`awm Moses Dan ajawt boi ama kha, idi ninawkle uthum kungchangna khan, roihoina awm boipet a, athi inih.
58010029	Inia Pathien Shapa kha eke le ater, ieriethiengna rawjawtna thishen kha riethieng boi `khat a iloi nenek, khan numpokmirit apeh Ratha kha maimawk apeh ama rang khan chepna kha idawr ashie rang a kha nangmining u maw?
58010030	Ajarla ruriei ama kha nejet uh, “Phuhen aloi rang a kha kiei kanih, kiei na ruhutthung rang kanih,” tia Pumi na ieriei. Khan takthar a, “PUMI na ama miring hai chung a chawngshat rangnih.”
58010031	Aring Pathien khut ah acho, iti hi chiroi `khat inih.
58010032	Khan matienglai nangni nangruvar u shole, shawna apeh chawngreherna kha ajeng a nangirudoi u nikho hai kha miningret u roh.
58010033	Shir `khat a nangni kha mipui maikung a maimawk le shawna kha nepek uh, khan shir `khat khan khatikhan hi ang amuh amani kha le adingshom nangruchang uh.
58010034	Ajarla kiei na lungroko shung ah kuruawmlai khan nangnurushaw pui uh. Nang niei u hai kha ranak a nasho u phakhan, ningaitak a nangruloi uh. Ajarla ravan a athadet le ashawtshe niei kha nangni rang awm, iti kha nangrujet uh.
58010035	Khajarkhan nang ngarna u kha pai u naw roh. Mahi na lawh alien kha iniei inih.
58010036	Ajarla doiratna kha nangrangai uh. Makha Pathien mulungmining kha nangthaw u shole, chawngrakham kha nangtumna u rang a inih.
58010037	“Ajarla pha bawngte shung hin ajong rang a ama kha jong rangnih joi, khan jong shum naw nih.
58010038	Khan midik kha na takashawn a ring rangnih, inia tukhat na nukkir thaw joiatu, ama chung a kiringphuk ningnitna kha awm naw nih.”
58010039	Inia kieini tu nukkir thaw a amathang hai kha nih u makme a, ratha shannashe a takashawn rang a hai kha nanih uh.
58011001	Takashawn hi ningakmining u nieinak hai kha rangampuina le nimuk boi u nieinak hai rentukna kha inih.
58011002	Mahi jarhin pipu hai na kungruchang u inih.
58011003	Takashawn jar a rong hai hi Pathien chawng na irashak inih, iti nejet uh. Makha kieini na nimuk u nieinak hai hi mukthiei nieinak ah put ah ikon nitna boi rang a inih.
58011004	Takashawn jar a Abel na Cain nek a athadet khutchawi kha Pathien dieng rupek jarkhan, midik inih, tia Pathien na kungruchang a, ama khutchawi kha ruloi pe. Abel kha ruthi joiawm, ama takashawn jar a, kieini dieng chawng rieilai.
58011005	Takashawn jar a Enoch kha ringlam a ravan a iruchawi inih, “khan Pathien na ruchawi joi jarkhan, ama kha muk boi runih joi”; ajarla ama kha ruchawi mala khan ama na Pathien ningnitna chon ruthaw, tia kungchangna kha irumuk inih.
58011006	Inia takashawn jaw boi a ama ningminit pe, iti hi anithiei boi inih. Ajarla Pathien dieng ava ama kha na ama hi awm, khan mulungluttak a ama atawk hai lawh apepa kha inih, iti kha taka`ishawnngir rang a inih.
58011007	Takashawn jar a Noah na ama inshungkhur shanna rang, muk boilai nieinak hai chungchanga Pathien na irurieimasha chawng kha rujui a, chitnieitak a rokongpui `khat rukon. Makha takashawn kha le manmieshie kha ruheng a, takashawn jar a ajong dikna koklo kha ruchang.
58011008	Inkoklo `khat a itum rang a mun khan shena rang, ama kha rukoi phakhan, takashawn jar a Abraham na chawng kha rujui. Khan khoshekawt ah ashe rang a maw nih, iti jet boi a ama na karuchawi.
58011009	Takashawn jar a Pathien na chawngirurakham pe ram khan Abraham na chawngrakham chung a koklo itum puishom Isaac, khan Jacob le, milak ram a awm milak ang a, thamber in hai khan ruawm.
58011010	Ajarla keshun niei khopui `khat kha irungak inih. Makha khopui rashak le akonpa kha Pathien inih.
58011011	Takashawn jar a Sarah na`awm naivawngna rang, ranak rumuk. Ama dieng chawngrurakhampa kha takashawn rang a rutuk inih, tia ruloi jarkhan, kumletha na rulim joiawm, nai runiei.
58011012	Khajarkhan athi dawr miring `khat ah put ah, ravan a arshi arawp ang a le tuipui kawmchang ah tengamboi nge ang a, chicha hai kha runiei.
58011013	Chawngrakham kha man boi a takashawnlam a amani kha ruthi u joi. Inia ralatak ah put ah irumuk u le chawngrakham hai kha rurangam pui ua, rupawm uh. Khan rieliei a milak le khomijin miring nih uh, tia amani na ruruphong uh.
58011014	Ajarla kha`ang ati miring hai kha na nuram itawk u inih, iti kha imalar u inih.
58011015	Khan amani na vak shokna u ram kha irumining u nitjoiatu, kirna rang a chanthatna kha runiei u rangnih.
58011016	Inia tuntu ravan a awm athadet ram kha iawi u inih. Khajarkhan amani Pathien, tia koi rang khan Pathien na jak mak, ajarla ama na khopui `khat amani rang irurasham pe inih.
58011017	Takashawn jar a Abraham na, ama kha enrurete phakhan, Isaac kha rupek, khan chawngrakham hai amanpa kha na ashapa khatte kha irupek inih.
58011018	Abraham dieng ruti, “Isaac jar a nang chicha hai kha koi rangnih.”
58011019	Isaac kha athi miring hai kar a Pathien na`awm mothoi ngam rangnih, tia Abraham na rumining. Chawngmeloi `khat a, Isaac kha athi miring hai ah put ah irumanret inih.
58011020	Takashawn jar a ajong rang a chungchanga Isaac na Jacob le Esau kha rahvan rupek.
58011021	Takashawn jar a Jacob na thit dieng Joseph shapa rikip kha rahvan rupek. Ama na ushunshawraw chung khan angiei a, Pathien kha chubairubawk.
58011022	Takashawn jar a Israel nai hai na Egypt kha mathan rangnih, tia ama na iruban inih. Joseph na thit dieng uru hai khumna rang a chungchanga chawng rupek.
58011023	Takashawn jar a Moses shok phakhan, unulepa na tha `thum ruthe uh. Ama kha metha jarkhan, rengpa chawngmocho kha ruchih u mak.
58011024	Takashawn jar a Moses na hawng chang phakhan, Pharaoh shanu shapa, tia koi rang khan rujawt mak.
58011025	Pha bawngte rang a munu ningaina hoiriethieinek a, Pathien miring hai le shawna doi rang khan, ama na rumadan.
58011026	Egypt ah niei hainek khan Christa rangbak a jakmuh kha aliendet niei inih, tia ruloi. Ajarla nuk a lawh rang khan iruen inih.
58011027	Takashawn jar a rengpa lunghangna kha chih boi a, Egypt kha irumathan inih. Ajarla ama na mik a muk boi ama kha, imuktak ang a, shawna kha irudoi inih.
58011028	Takashawn jar a ama na Rakanna le thishen phenna kha rurung. Makha akhat changna shapa athat ama kha na Israel nai hai kha shitna boi rang a inih.
58011029	Takashawn jar a Israel nai hai na, ramho a lawn ang a, Thampui Shen kha rurakan uh. Khania khatikhan a athaw Egypt miring hai kha tuirah a ruthi uh.
58011030	Takashawn jar a Jericho bang hai kha, ni shiri ahieisho u le, ruchim.
58011031	Takashawn jar a Rahab na, mitinta hai kha lungdam a ruloi jarkhan, takashawn boi hai kha le ruthang mak.
58011032	Kiei na imaw rieiu ning? Ajarla Gideon, Barak, Samson, Jephthah, David le Samuelawm, khan thiempulien hai chungchanga rieina rang, pha nieilai mi`ing.
58011033	Ajarla amani na takashawn jar a rengchangna hai kha ra rumawtawr uh, dikna chon hai kha ruthaw uh, chawngrakham hai kha ruman uh, khan kieipui hai ner kha ruhup pe uh.
58011034	Amani na miei ranak kha ruthat uh, chemjam mawr ah put ah rurekhe uh, dawkna ah put ah ranak rumuk uh, ra shung khan arat chang a milak hai ramiring hai kha runawt uh.
58011035	Nupang hai kha na athi hai kha hawng ring jar a rumuk u joi. Amani na athadet thoiretna mukna rang, moshok rang khan eshen na rujawt u mak a, rekhek a epshawna kha rudoi uh.
58011036	Eshen na engmejer kha rumuk ua, ajeng a vunrawmaw rutawng uh. Khan thirakarui le khop a lungroko shung ah rukhum uh.
58011037	Amani kha lung le rudeng uh, her `di a thingat le ruat uh, amani kha rulem uh, chemjam le ruthat uh. Amani na kengam vun hai le kevun hai kha rieshiei a ruchai uh, khan amani kha ruravat uh, ruchep uh, khan engshiet a rutawn uh.
58011038	Manmieshie kha amani rang rurutuk mak. Amani na ramthim ah, lawn ah, koh le rieliei khur a ruawm uh.
58011039	Amani kholok na, takashawn jar a, kungchangna atha kha ruman uh, inia chawngrakham kha ruman u mak.
58011040	Pathien na athadet kha kieini rang rasham a atet joi. Makha, kieini jaw boi a, amani kha rupummashakna boi rang a inih.
58012001	Kieini hi romiei dawrthep a rawp kungchang miring hawi `khat na inoroko u inih. Khajarkhan kieini na arik irikip le khan inakherrep munu kha pai u taia, namaton ua irutet tanrieshiet kha doiratnieitak a tan u rang rawi.
58012002	Natakashawn u thoina le rupummashak Jesu kha en a awm u rawi. Amaton a awm ningaina jarkhan, ama na cross kha irudoi inih. Ama na jakna kha irushawn mak a Pathien rengmun khutchang khan rushuh joi.
58012003	Nang rawngawina u boi rang le nang mulung rakaina u boi rang, ama kha mining u roh. Ama chung a munu miring hai na amaikung a rodoi pui phakhan, ama na ajeng a shawna kha irudoi inih.
58012004	Munu chung a ranangithawna u khan thishenshe shok a dong u makchelai.
58012005	Khan ashapa hai dieng iriei ang a, nangni dieng iriei mawshawkna chawng kha nangmieniei u joi: “Kashapa, PUMI na nang kha nachep phakhan, ishawn boi a thaw naw roh. Khan nang kha nawrawkawk phakhan, mulung rakaimashak naw roh.
58012006	Ajarla PUMI na numipok ama kha achep, khan iman shapa rikip kha ama na ejem.”
58012007	Chepna kha nangdoi u joiatu, shapa hai dieng itawn ang a, Pathien na nawtawn u rangnih. Ajarla apa na ichep boi shapa tumaw awm?
58012008	Khania mi kholok na imanshom chepna khan nangjaw u joi nawkatu, adik shapa hai kha niboia, rejai nai hai kha nangnih u joi.
58012009	Khakhea kieini nachep rang rieliei a awm napa u hai kha nuruniei ua, amani kha richit nepek uh. Kieini na naratha u hai Apa dieng khan rawdawdet a aring boi rang maw nanih uh?
58012010	Ajarla napa u hai kha na athadet inih, tia imining khan pha bawngte shung rang khan kieini hi inuruchep u inih. Inia nenemna u rang, ama Riethiengna kha atumshom changna rang, kieini hi inachep u inih.
58012011	Tuntun hin tu chepna hi ahoi nimak, mahi ana inih. Inia chepna adoisha hai amani rang khan nuk a dikna moshok lungdamna ara kha moshok rangnih.
58012012	Khajarkhan nang khut u atalap le nang rukhuk u adawk kha ranak peh u roh.
58012013	Kekhawr miring kha na eke nawh ruhut a damna rang, nangke u hai rang khan lam atonpeng kha kon u roh.
58012014	Miring kholok le lungdam a ringna rang le khan riethieng a ringna rang, rojo u roh. Makha jaw boi a, tute na Pumi kha muh naw nih.
58012015	Tukhat na Pathien numpokmirit kha mathangna boi rang le mulung akha kha na rujung moshok a nawmawshawna u boi rang, riring u roh. Makha na mi tampui pawrimechet inih.
58012016	Tute na rejaichon ninawkle richiniei boi miring Esau kha ang a awmna boi rang, riring u roh. Ajarla nekleshak le ama shungshokpui kha ijor inih.
58012017	Ajarla nuk a ashok chon kha nangjet uh: rahvan kha arawh jawt phakhan, ama kha rujawt pelai mak. Ama na rahvan kha mikrithi le rutawk joiawm, mulung rulek ngamlai mak.
58012018	Ajarla shitthiei mo khan hawng u makche. Mieichong, ahang, ajing, khan rithikhopui awmna mun khan hawng u makche.
58012019	Tekawlawi miri le chawngriei hesho awmna khan hawng u makche. Ajet miring hai kha na chawng kha amani dieng rieina boi rang, rudawi uh.
58012020	Ajarla ipek chawngpek kha amani na rudoi ngam u mak: “Khan sha kha na`awm mo kha shit joiatu, ama kha lung le deng rang a inih, ninawkle tha le kap rang a inih.”
58012021	Ajarla mukchon kha chichairoi inih. Moses na ruti, “Kiei kachihai a kururawnawk.”
58012022	Khania Zion mo le aring Pathien khopui, ravan Jerusalem, khan ravantir tengamthoiboi hai dieng khan nang hawng u joi.
58012023	Khan ravan a riming imiejiek pe sharapa hai ruchunna le biekrup khan nang hawng u joi. Khan kholok Chawngshatpa Pathien, khan irupummashak midik hai ratha hai dieng nanghawng u joi.
58012024	Rawjawtna `thar Palai Jesu dieng nanghawng u joi. Abel thishennek a athadet a iriei, iruphen thishen dieng nanghawng u joi.
58012025	Nangni dieng chawngiriei mashapa kha jawt boi nangthawna boi u rang, riring u roh. Ajarla rieliei a chawnginieriei mashapa jawt boi hai kha na rekhe u joi nawkala, ravan ah put ah chawnginieriei masha ama ah put ah nahiei u phakhan, idawr a rekhedet boi rang a maw nanih uh?
58012026	Pha `khat khan ama hesho a rieliei hi rurawnawk. Khania tuntu ama na chawngrurakham a iti, “Voikhat tu rielieite hi niboia, ravan hai hiawm rawnawkmashak rang kanih.”
58012027	“Voikhat tu,” iti hi ama na ikonsha hai kholok hi rawnawkmashak a loi rangnih. Makha jartu rawnawkthiei boi nieinak hai kha khatikhan rangah rangnih.
58012028	Rawnawk ngam boi rengchangna kha kieini na naman u joi jarkhan, Pathien kha mapak u rawi. Mahi le richit le chitnieitak a Pathien chon kha loithiei `khat a thaw u rawi.
58012029	Ajarla napathien u hi iemiechiem miei kha inih.
58013001	Uliennai numropokna kha chatboia awm rosho.
58013002	Jinchonthaw kha mieniei u naw roh. Ajarla khatikhan a thaw kha na jet boi a ravantir hai kha imutung inih.
58013003	Shurkhop achangshom `khat ang a, shurkhop miring hai kha mining u roh. Amani le pum `khat anishom `khat ang a, engshiet a itawn miring hai kha nih u roh.
58013004	Inniei hi richit a mi kholok kar a shok rosho. Riethieng a ruchun nih rosho. Inia rejai le uire chon thaw miring hai kha Pathien na chawngshat pe rangnih.
58013005	Nang ringdan u kha shiernumpoh boi kha chang rosho. Nanginiei nieinak kha le ningnitna niei u roh. Ajarla amatak na iti, “Kiei na nang kha namathan naw ning, kiei na nang kha napai naw ning.”
58013006	Khajarkhan mulungartak a nitithiei: “PUMI hi kiei narachang pui kha inih, kiei na chitna niei naw ning. Mi na kiei dieng imaw thaw ngam nih?”
58013007	Pathien chawng nariei pe hai, nang lamkai hai kha mininghep u roh. Amani awmchan kha tinta u tana, amani takashawn nunjui kha chang u roh.
58013008	Jesu Christa hi majan, von, khan kumshawt a ra`angre inih.
58013009	Erekhek shikshik miruchukna kha na nawchawi u naw rosho. Ajarla nekleshak le niboia numpokmirit na nang mulung u imenet kha atha inih. Nekleshak a alut miring hai tute dieng makha na nemna peh mak.
58013010	Kieini na maicham `khat nieniei u inih. Thamber a chon thaw hai na makha maicham ah put ah shakna rang, cham niei mak.
58013011	Ajarla munu chungchanga pek rang a sha hai thishen kha thiempu rashang na inriethieng hai khan ilut pui inih. Inia sha hai pum hai kha tu ngakmun vai tieng iha inih.
58013012	Khajarkhan miring hai kha ama thishentak le riethiengmashakna rang, Jesu na`awm pakawt vai tieng shawna irudoi inih.
58013013	Khajarkhan ngakmun vai tieng ah awm ama dieng khan she u taia, ama jakmukna kha vak doi u rawi.
58013014	Mahin ashawt a awm rang a khopui kha nieniei boi u jarkhan, ajong rang a khopui `khat kha nitawk u inih.
58013015	Khajarkhan ama jar a mapakna moshok rawthawina kha Pathien dieng chatboi a peh u rawi. Nawrawthawina u hi ama riming rophong ner hai ara kha inih.
58013016	Inia atha thaw le nieinak reshem kha mieniei u naw roh. Kha ang rawthawina hai kha na Pathien kha ningiminit pe inih.
58013017	Nang lamkai hai chawng kha rangai u roh, khan amani cham khan lut u roh. Ajarla mushungna apengir rang a akhat ang a, amani na nang ratha u kha tenireh u inih. Ningshietlam a niboia, ningailam a amani na khatikhan thaw u rosho, ajarla amani ningshietna kha nangni rang nemna naw nih.
58013018	Kieini rang nikna nieniei pe u roh. Ajarla lungthim atha `khat kieniei uh, iti hi karangam pui uh. Irikip a richit a aring rang hi kadit uh.
58013019	Nangni dieng kawhawngkirrelen ngamna rang, aliendet a mahi nangthawna u rang’ kawnawmawshawk uh.
58013020	Tun kumshawt a ashe rang a rawjawtna thishen jar a, kengam hai Kengamroi alien, nupumi u Jesu kha athi ah put ah ihawng chawi, lungdamna apeh Pathien kha na
58013021	atha kholok a ama mulungmining thawna rang, inurupummashak u nih rosho. Jesu Christa jar a ama mik`en a ningnitroi kha nangni dieng ithaw nih rosho. Ama dieng kumshawt a alur kha chang rosho. Amen.
58013022	Uliennai hai, mahi chawngmawchawi hi atawitek nitjoiawm, mawshawkna chawng hai hi ashawt a doi u roh, tia kinawmawshawk u inih.
58013023	Uliennai Timothy kha moshok joi, iti hi jet u roh. Ama na kiei dieng varelen joiatu, nangni apha vat pui rang kanih.
58013024	Nang lamkai hai le miriethieng hai kholok kha chubai peh u roh. Italy ah awm hai na chubai navakmawchawi uh.
58013025	Numpokmirit kha nang kholok chung a a`awm nih rosho. Amen.
59001001	Pathien le Pumi Jesu Christa shok, James kiei na retherak ah a awm phung shawmlieidi dieng chubai pekna kieniei.
59001002	Kuliennai hai, danenna shikshik nangrawtawng pui u phakhan, ningaina tieng loi u roh.
59001003	Ajarla nang takashawn u enrete hi na doiratna moshok, iti kha nangjet uh.
59001004	Khan doiratna hi na ama chon rupumping kha rupumping a imoshok inih. Makha rupum le ahun, khan ih khanawm ravat boi nangnitna u rang a inih.
59001005	Nang kar ua tukhat na varna ravat joiatu, Pathien dieng nih rosho. Ama na ruphu a le rawkawk boi a ama dieng kholok pek rangnih.
59001006	Inia rakhana niei boi a, takashawn le roroia nih rosho. Ajarla rakhana aniei ama kha tu thampui hawng let a rithi na shehawng a ijap a ichawi kha le ra`ang inih.
59001007	Kha ang miring kha na tu Pumi dieng ih nita`awm kumuk rangnih, tia mining naw rosho.
59001008	Ama kha tu mulungding boi le lam rikip a anet boi miring kha inih.
59001009	Khania rede uliennai kha na, mi na ilawmna khan ningai rosho.
59001010	Inia rawchawng ama kha na mi na iredemashakna khan ningai rosho. Ajarla champi par achoi kha ang a ama`awm choi rangnih.
59001011	Ajarla ni na ama asha kha le hawng shok a champi kha rovoimashak. Ama apar kha cho a emethatna kholok kha thang pe. Kha ang a rawchawng miring ama kha`awm, ama niei rojona khan thang rangnih.
59001012	Lemna adoi ngam miring kha rahvanmuh miring kha inih. Makha enretena khan ding ngam jarkhan, Pumi na ama numapoh hai dieng a chawngirurakhamsha ringna renglukhum kha ama na tum rangnih.
59001013	Tute na lemna rawtawng pui phakhan, “Pathien na inelem keng,” ti naw rosho. Ajarla Pathien hi ashie kha na ilem ngam nimak, khan ama na tu kha`awm lem mak.
59001014	Inia mi rikip kha ama ditrekhe hai rikip kha na ipawt a ima`am inih.
59001015	Khan ditrekhe kha marai phakhan, munu a mete inih, khan munu kha hawng chang phakhan, thitna a mete inih.
59001016	Kunumpok uliennai hai, nangni kha mi na nomohon u naw rosho.
59001017	Atha khutchawi rikip le rupum khutchawi rikip hi chung ah put ah ajong inih, khan mieivar hai Apa ah put ah ajongrok inih. Ama dieng rotho, iti awm mak, khan rilip rawthawt hi ang a rawthawt mak.
59001018	Adik apeh chawng jar a ama idittak khan a kieini hi inieniei u inih. Makha ama khutkon hai ara arapa hai kha ninitna u rang a inih.
59001019	Khajarkhan kunumpok kuliennai hai, mi rikip na arangai khan relen, achong khan ashum, khan lunghangna khan ashum kha nih rosho.
59001020	Ajarla miring lunghangna kha na Pathien dikna kha thaw mak.
59001021	Khajarkhan rono rikip le ashie a hawng pung rikip kha heng u tana nang ratha ashan ngam phunsha chawng kha renem le roroia loi u roh.
59001022	Khania chawng ranga rangai nih boi a chon a`awm meshe miring hai kha nih u roh. Rangai ranga kha nangnit uatu, nang nining a mohon nana kha nangnih uh.
59001023	Ajarla tukhat na chawng kha irangai a, chon a imeshe boi nitjoiatu, ama balam maisho kha mengsheng ah i`en a, tinita kha le ra`ang inih.
59001024	Ajarla nining a tinrata a rushe joi, khan relentak a ichat miring runih maw nih, iti kha iemieniei.
59001025	Inia tunita`awm ningchamna apeh rupumping dan kha i`en a makhan a a`awm, ama kha ningmieniei miring kha nimak. Inia irangai chawng kha chon a meshe miring kha inih. Ithaw chon rikip khan ama na rahvan muk rangnih.
59001026	Nang kar ua tukhat na richichawi miring tu kanih iti, inia ener tu imakha ngam boi a umulungrilik kha imohon, amapa richichawi kha nemna boi inih.
59001027	Pathien le Apa maikung a riethieng le pawrche boi richi kha tu: nupaboi hai le mieirawng hai renrorieviei pha a, tenrena le rieliei mawkna ah put ah rechen kha inih.
59002001	Kuliennai hai, alur Pumi Jesu Christa dieng a nang takashawn u kha enshietenlar thawna u naw roh.
59002002	Ajarla nang ruchunna u khan miring `khat na rangkachak shumkieviek vak mawrawn a ponledier lurtak le rielien, khan shara miring `khat na ponledier rambieng a ava.
59002003	Nangni na ponledier atha vak thawpa dieng khan richit nangpekdet ua, “Hin hoining a nushut pe roh,” nangti uh. Khan sharapa dieng khan “Khan ruding roh, ninawkle kekekhawngna hin shuh roh,” nangti uh.
59002004	Makhan nangnirilik kar a enshietenlar nangithaw ua, mulungmining ashie aniei chawngshat hai kha anih boi maw nangnih uh?
59002005	Rangai u roh, kunumpok uliennai hai, mahi manmieshie shung a shara hai hi takashawn a rawchawng rang a le ama na numipok hai dieng chawngirurakham rengchangna koklo hai kha changna rang, Pathien na irumadan boi maw nih?
59002006	Inia nangni na tu shara hai kha richit peh u makche. Nangni epshie a nathaw hai kha rawchawng hai kha anih boi maw nih? Khan danin ah napawt hai kha rawchawng hai kha anih boi maw nih?
59002007	Inokoina u riming atha kha amani na imieshiet boi u maw nih?
59002008	Miejiek dungjuia rengdan, “Nang ringchangpui kha nang pumtak kha ang a numnangipok rang a inih,” iti hi diktak a nangmushun uatu, atha kha nangithaw u inih.
59002009	Nangni na enshietenlar nangthaw uatu, munu kha nangithaw u inih. Khan Dan kha na dankhoi miring hai `khat a inamalar u inih.
59002010	Ajarla Dan kholok arung tu kha nita`awm, nieinak `khat a keruthui joiatu, kholok chung a shiet aniei kha inih.
59002011	Ajarla “Uire thaw naw roh,” atipa kha na “Mithat naw roh,” awm iti inih. Tun uire kha nangthaw nawkawm, mi nangthat a tu, Dan akhoi miring kha nangnih joi.
59002012	Ningchamna napeh rang a dan jar a chawngishat rang a nitjarkhan, nangiriei u rang a shok kha riei u roh, khan nangithaw u rang a shok kha thaw u roh.
59002013	Ajarla roihoina mumuk boi ama dieng khan roihoina jaw boi a chawngshat rangnih. Ajarla roihoina kha na chawngshatna kha imawtawr inih.
59002014	Kuliennai hai, chon jaw boi a tukhat na takashawn kha kieniei iti kha na imaw nemna pe nih? Takashawn kha na shan ngam nih maw?
59002015	Shokpuipa ninawkle shokpuinu `khat hi rekengver a awm a ningthingkip nekleshak niei boi a awm phakhan,
59002016	amani pum na irangai kha pek boi a, nang kar ua tukhat na amani dieng “Damveng a she rang roh, lumping rang roh, khan nang vawn ship rang rosho,” ti joiala, imaw nemna nih?
59002017	Makha le ra`angre a takashawn kha`awm, chon jaw nawkatu, nining a athi inih.
59002018	Inia mi `khat na iti rangnih, “Nang na takashawn kha nangniei, inia kiei tu chon a kithaw inih.” Nang takashawn kha chon jaw boi a numumuk roh, khan katakashawn hi kochonthaw hai hin numumuk rang kanih.
59002019	Pathien hi khatte inih, iti kha takanangshawn ua atha joi. Raikho haishe na`awm takashawn ua, rawnawk uh!
59002020	Aw amawng miring, chon jaw boi a takashawn kha tu athi inih, iti hi nangjet jawt maw?
59002021	Napa u Abraham na ashapa Isaac kha lungkheng ah rupek phakhan, ama chonthaw kha na irumidik boi maw nih?
59002022	Ama takashawn kha chon le roroia rumeshe, khan takashawn kha ochonthaw hai kha na rupummashak pe, iti kha nang muk uh.
59002023	Miejiek na “Abraham na Pathien kha takarushawn a midik `khat a irute nih joi,” iti kha rurupum inih. Khan ama kha Pathien lawmpa, tia irukoi inih.
59002024	Chon na mi kha imidik inih, khan takashawn ranga kha na nimak, iti hi nang muk uh.
59002025	Kha le ra`angre a nawchijor Rahab na palai hai kha ama in ah rumutung a lam shik `khat tieng rumeshe phakhan, chon hai kha na irumidik boi maw nih?
59002026	Khajarkhan ratha jaw boi taksha kha athi inih, kha le ra`angre a, chon jaw boi takashawn kha`awm athi inih.
59003001	Kuliennai hai, akhawkdet chawngshatna nutum u rangnih, iti jet u tana arawplam na miruchuh hai kha nih u naw roh.
59003002	Ajarla nokholok na irikip a nirehena u arawp inih. Tukhat na chawngriei a rehelak nawkatu, ama kha rupumping miring kha inih, khan atak kholok akhop ngam kha`awm inih.
59003003	Enro, nawchawng u rangaina rang, shakawr bai ah jachan nimawrawn pe ua, upum kholok kha nimiehiei pe u inih.
59003004	Enro, rokonglien hi khadawr khan lien a rithi arat na enchak a nawng a`awm, rokong ahang shilite na imiehiei a ahangmeherpa iditna khan imeshe inih.
59003005	Kha le ra`ang a mieliei hiawm pasha shilite inih, inia lienrashatak a chawng. Enro, miei`ek shilite na mangpui lien ikang ngam hi!
59003006	Khan mieliei hi miei inih. Napasha u kar hin manmieshie dikna boi `khat a mieliei hi itet inih. Mahi na natak pumplang hi imawmawk inih. Mahi na balam ahiei hi ikang inih. Khan Gehenna ah put ah miei kha na ikang inih.
59003007	Ajarla ram ah juleva, vawn a rawshawn, khan thampui ranring rikip hi miring hai na imangam le irumangam a awm inih.
59003008	Inia mieliei hi tute na mangam ngam mak. Ajarla ama hi alak ngam boi a ashie kha inih, khan thitnathiei tur ashipmer kha inih.
59003009	Mahi le napathien u le khan napa u kha imapak inih, khan mahi le Pathien meloi a ikon miring hai kha pumibot inih.
59003010	Makha bai khatte shung ah put khan rahvan le pumbotna dire vak shok inih. Kuliennai hai, mahi anih boi rang a shok.
59003011	Tuinar khur khatte hin athum le akha tui hawng put maw?
59003012	Kuliennai hai, thieichangkung ah longmawt maw ra nih, nitnawkle drakha jam ah thieichang maw ra nih? Khatikhan mun khatte hin a`ah le athum tui putshom ngam mak.
59003013	Nang kar ua tumaw ashing le athiei? Ama na varna renem jar a ama awmchan atha kha chon a mumuk rosho.
59003014	Inia akha mukmakna le riekiemna kha nang mulung shung u khan nangniei u joiatu, lienrasha u naw roh, khan adik le re`er a mielieishiei thaw u naw roh.
59003015	Mahi varna hi chung ah put ah ajong nimak, inia rieliei nun, ratha nih boi le raikho nun ah put ah inih.
59003016	Ajarla mukmakna le riekiemna awmna khan reheshuna le ashie rikip kha awm rangnih.
59003017	Khania chung ah put ah varna kha tu rapapek a riethieng, lungdamna pekthiei, renem, mi awnoi a awm, ninghoina ship le ara atha, enshietenlar awm boi, khan thanunchan awm boi, hihaihi inih.
59003018	Khan dikna ara kha lungdamna rashak hai kha na lungdamhiei a ivawr inih.
59004001	Nang kar ua ra le roshona hai kha khoshekawt ah put ah hawng put maw nih? Amani hai kha nang shung ua ra athaw hoiriethiei ah put ah ahawng nimak maw?
59004002	Rekhe a nangdit uh, inia niei u makche. Mi nangthat uh, khan manarshie nangthaw uh, inia man u makche. Nangrosho ua, ra nangthaw uh. Nangnik u boi jarkhan, niei u makche.
59004003	Hoiriethiei a rotokna rang khan rehe a nangnik u jarkhan, nangniktu nangnik uh, inia man u makche.
59004004	Aw uirepa hai le uirenu hai! Manmieshie le lawmthaw hi Pathien le raha inih, iti hi jet u makche maw? Khajarkhan manmieshie le lawmthaw jawtpa kha tu nining a Pathien le rahana ikon inih.
59004005	Ninawkle, “Kieini dieng a awm Ratha kha na ningawroitak a rangai,” iti hi miejiek na nemna boi a iriei keng, tia nangimining u maw nih?
59004006	Inia ama na numpokmirit arawpdet kha ipek inih. Khajarkhan miejiek ah ieriei: “Pathien na lienrasha hai kha rodoi pui, inia mulung renem hai dieng khan numpokmirit kha ipek inih.”
59004007	Khajarkhan Pathien awnoi khan awm u roh. Diabol kha rodoi pui u roh, khan ama kha nangni ah put ah tan rangnih.
59004008	Pathien kha ranai pui u roh, khan ama na naranai pui u rangnih. Nang khut u kha rushuk u roh, Aw munu miring hai. Nang mulung u kha riethiengmashak u roh, Aw mulung ding boi hai.
59004009	Awi u roh, jum u roh, khan chap u roh! Nangmunui u kha jumna, khan nangningai u kha maikhuna kha chang rosho.
59004010	Pumi maikung a rede u roh, khan ama na nalawm u rangnih.
59004011	Khatlekhat dieng ashie a riebieh u naw roh, uliennai hai. Uliennai chung a ashie iriei a, chawngishat ama kha na dan kha imieshiet a chawngishat pe inih. Inia Dan chung a chawngnangshat a tu, Dan arung miring kha nimakche a, chawngmochomi kha nangnih joi.
59004012	Dan Apepa `khat awm. Ama na ashan ngam, khan amathang ngam. Khajarkhan tukhat chung a chawngshat nang tumaw nangnih?
59004013	Tun she roh, “Von ninawkle jing a khopui `khat ah she a kum `khat vak awm a, rievieithaw a, nemna tampui muk rang,” ati miring hai.
59004014	Inia jing a imaw shok nih, iti jet u makche. Nang ringkho u kha imaw nih? Mahi tuiruhu pha bawngte alar a athang kha inih.
59004015	Kha ruhut a “Pumi na adit joiatu, kieini naring a mahi ninawkle makha nawthawthiei uh,” nangiti u rang a shok.
59004016	Inia tun nangni na nang rangrat chon khan liennangrasha uh. Kha ang lienrashatna kholok kha ashie inih.
59004017	Khajarkhan tunita`awm atha thawna kha ejet a, makha thaw joinawkatu, ama rang khan makha munu inih.
59005001	Tun she rang roh, Aw rawchawng miring hai, nang chung a shawnarana ajong rang a jarkhan, rie`ieklam a chap u rang roh.
59005002	Nang rawchawngna kha rono joi, khan nang ponledier kha lieida na shaksho joi.
59005003	Nang rangkachak le nang dangka hai kha ek na shak joi, khan amani ek na ishak kha na nang chung ua kungchang joi. Makha na nang taksha u kha miei ang a nakang pe u rangnih. Nangni na nikho dawng rang khan niei nangbawm uh.
59005004	Shawlawh nangimohon u nang loivat hai kha na ra`ai uh. Khan rawkhawm miring hai ara`ai he kha Ramiring hai Pumi nokor kha shok joi.
59005005	Nang na ahur a le hoiriethiei a rieliei chung a nang ring joi, that rang a hai kha ang a, nang mulung u kha nangvai uh.
59005006	Nangni kha norodoi pui boi midikpa kha nangheng a nangruthat uh.
59005007	Khajarkhan uliennai hai, Pumi jong malalim adoi rat u roh. Enro, pieipak na rushur relen le rushur ashum imuk rang a kha, rieliei ara manlu kha arat malalim, loithaw miring hai na doirattak a ingak a awm u inih.
59005008	Nangniawm adoi rat u roh. Nang mulung kha menet u roh, ajarla Pumi jongna rang a kha anai joi.
59005009	Uliennai hai, nangni kha anahengna boi u rang, nangni khatlekhat chung a mieshiet nana u naw roh. Enro, chawngshatpa kha mawkawt kung ah iding a awm joi!
59005010	Kuliennai hai, Pumi riming a chawngruriei thiempulien hai kha shawna le doiratna endar `khat a loi u roh.
59005011	Enro, rudoingam miring hai kha rahvanmuh miring inih niti uh. Job doiratna kha nangni na nangrujet u joi. Dawng tieng Pumi na ama dieng a iruthaw pe kha nangrujet uh. Pumi na lungnatna le roihoina kha ama chung a rutet pe.
59005012	Inia chungchon a, kuliennai hai, rieliei le ravan, khan tieitang riming ban a chawngrakham u naw roh. Inia nangni na hengna khan nangchona boi u rang, “Awh,” nangitina u khan “Awh,” nih rosho, khan “Nang,” nangitina u khan “Nang,” nih rosho.
59005013	Nang kar ua tukhat na shawna maw doi? Ama na nikna niei rosho. Tukhat na mulungparna maw niei? Ama na mapakna lah kha thaw rosho.
59005014	Nang kar ua tukhat na natna maw niei? Ama na bieklamkai hai kha koi rosho. Amani na Pumi riming a thao nawt pe u rieshie ama rang nikna niei pe u rosho.
59005015	Takashawn nikna kha na anapa kha shan rangnih, khan Pumi na ama kha mothoi rangnih. Munu ruthaw joiatu, Pathien na rangaidam pek rangnih.
59005016	Nangdamna u rang, khatlekhat dieng nang shietna u kha rophong u roh, khan khatlekhat rang Pathien dieng nikna niei u roh. Midik miring nikna kha na chon tampui thawna ranak ieniei.
59005017	Elijah kha kieini le ra`ang balam miring `khat runih. Ama na mulungluttak a rushurna boi rang, Pathien dieng runik. Khan rieliei chung a kum `thum le tha `ruk ro rushur mak.
59005018	Khashole roshurna rang, Pathien dieng runikthep a ravan na ro jong pek, khan rieliei na ama ara kha rumoshok.
59005019	Uliennai hai, nang kar ua tukhat na adik ah put ah achai a shik `khat na vak mikir joiatu,
59005020	munu miring `khat lamirehena ah put ah avak mikirpa kha na ama ringphuk kha athi ah put ah ashan pe rangnih, khan munu tampui kha mukhu pe rangnih, iti hi jet rosho.
60001001	Jesu Christa tirtawn Peter kiei na Pontus, Galatia, Cappadocia, Asia, khan Bithynia ah retherak a awm khotang hai dieng kimiejiek inih.
60001002	Amani kha riethiengmashakna Ratha chonthaw jar a, apa Pathien na irujetmasha dungjuia, irumadan u nih joi. Makha Jesu Christa chawngriei rangaina rang le ama thishen kha nang chung ua athingna rang a inih. Numpokmirit le lungdamna kha Pathien na ruphu a nepeh u rosho.
60001003	Nupumi u Jesu Christa Apa Pathien kha mapak chang rosho. Ama roihoina ruphu dungjuia, Jesu Christa thoiretna jar a, ngakmining aring nienieina u rang, takthar a kieini hi inomoshok u nih joi.
60001004	Makha nangni rang a ravan a ibawm athangthiei boi, rono boi le achoi boi kha nangmanna u rang a inih.
60001005	Takashawn jar a dawng pha khan rophong rang a rasham shandamna rang, kieini hi Pathien ranak na nurung joi.
60001006	Pha bawngte shung hin enretena shikshik chung a shawna nangidoi u rang a kha rangai joiawm, makhan nangrawshaw uh.
60001007	Makha Jesu Christa kha malangmashak phakhan, nang takashawn u riethieng kha mapakna, richitna, khan lurna khan imuk changna rang a inih. Ajarla nang takashawn u kha na, miei na danenshe`awm athangthiei rangkachak kha, ikhe inih.
60001008	Ama kha nangmuk u nawkawm, numnangpok u joi. Ama kha nangmuk u nawkawm, takanangshawn u joi. Khajarkhan chawng na imeler ngam boi lurna aship khan nangrawshaw u joi.
60001009	Ajarla nang takashawn u ara, nang ratha u shandamna kha nangmuk u joi.
60001010	Nangni dieng ajong rang a numpokmirit chungchanga rurophong, thiempulien hai na mahi shandamna chungchang hin riringtak a ruthir ua, rutawk uh.
60001011	Amani dieng a awm Christa Ratha kha na Christa shawna hai chungchanga le unuk a ajong rang a lurna hai chungchanga, masha a kungruchang u hai kha itik a le itia rushok maw nih, iti chungchanga irutawk u inih.
60001012	Ravan ah put ah ijongtir Ratha Riethieng na nangni dieng athachawng kha ruriei u jar a, hihaihi amani rangte a iruthaw u nimak a, nang chon u awm iruthaw u inih, iti kha amani na nurumalangmashak pe joi. Khahaikha ravantir hai na`awm rumuk jawt uh.
60001013	Khajarkhan nang mulungmining u khan rasham u tana nang mulung u kha shur u roh. Jesu Christa kha malangmashak phakhan, nangni rang ijongchawi rang a numpokmirit chung khan nang ngakmining u kha rupumping a tet u roh.
60001014	Rieijui naite hai kha ang a, jet boi a matieng a taksha ditrekhena me kha loi u naw roh.
60001015	Inia nangni nurukoipa kha riethieng nit jarkhan, nang nunchan u kholok a riethieng kha chang u roh.
60001016	Ajarla hitihin rumiejiek, “Kiei hi riethieng kinit jarkhan, nangniawm riethieng u roh.”
60001017	Amama chonthaw dungjuia enshietenlar boi a chawngashat, nangpa u kha nangkoi u joiatu, khotang a nangawm shungshe khan chitlam a awm u roh.
60001018	Nang pilepu hai ah put ah nemna boi a nitum hai ringna ah put ah athangthiei dangka ninawkle rangkachak kha le inurukhek u nimak,
60001019	inia rehena le shebe awm boi kengam thishen ang a, manlu Christa thishen kha na inurukhek u inih, iti kha nangjet uh.
60001020	Pathien na ama kha manmieshie phun mala a irujetmasha inih, inia nangni rangbak a mahi dawng pha hin a imalarmashak inih.
60001021	Athi ah put ah irumothoi a, ama dieng a lurna rupeh Pathien kha Christa jar a takanangirushawn u inih. Hitihin nang takashawn u kha le nang ngakmining u kha Pathien dieng a`awm inih.
60001022	Ratha jar a adik kha nangjui u jarkhan, nang ratha u kha nangriethiengmashak u joi. Makha uliennai chung a thanunchan a niboia numropokna rang a inih. Khajarkhan mulung riethiengtak a khatlekhat numropoh u roh.
60001023	Aring le kumshawt a awm Pathien chawng jar a athangthiei muchi ah put ah niboia, athangthiei boi muchi ah put ah athar a inomoshok u nih joi.
60001024	Ajarla “Miring kholok hi champi a`ang inih, khan miring lurna kholok hi champi apar le ra`ang inih. Champi na achar, khan apar hai kha ocho.
60001025	Inia PUMI chawng tu kumshawt a awm.” Makha nangni dieng a ishem athachawng kha inih.
60002001	Khajarkhan shietmining kholok, mimohonna kholok, thanunchan kholok, mukmakna kholok le mimieshietna kholok kha pai u tana,
60002002	ashok `thar naite hai ang a, runutui riethieng a`ang Pathien chawng kha vanhat u roh. Makha jar a nangni nangrawshawn u rangnih.
60002003	Nangni na Pumi hi numpokthiei inih, iti tuidan kha nangen u joi jarkhan, makha vanhat u roh.
60002004	Miring hai na iruheng u, inia Pathien na tu irumadan, manlutak `khat achang, Aring a awm lung ama dieng khan ava nangnih uh.
60002005	Nangniawm rathalam inshung le thiempumun riethieng `khat a imothoi, aring lung hai kha nangnih uh. Makha Jesu Christa jar a Pathien dieng rutuk ratha rawthawina kha pekna rang a inih.
60002006	Ajarla miejiek a hitihin awm, “Enro, Zion khan kimadansha le manlu lung `khat kuphun joi. Ama takashawn miring kha na jakna shukmuh a muh naw nih.”
60002007	Khajarkhan takashawn nangni dieng ama hi manlu `khat inih. Inia chawngjui boi amani dieng tu, “Inthaw miring hai na iheng kik a runiei lung kha ruchang joi.”
60002008	Khan “Lung kha na amani keruthuina, khan lungbiei kha na amani bakna ruchang joi.” Amani na chawng kha jui boi u jarkhan, ke`iruthui u inih. Amani keruthui kha imuchuksha inih.
60002009	Inia nangni tu phung madan, reng thiempumun, phung riethieng, ama miring achang kha nangnih uh. Makha nangni kha ajing ah put ah ama mieivar ah nakoi shindawngroi Pathien rieihoina kha rophongna rang a inih.
60002010	Pha `khat khan Pathien miring runih u makche, inia tuntu Pathien miring hai kha nangnih u joi. Pha `khat khan roihoina kha rumuh u makche, inia tuntu nangni na roihoina kha nangtum u joi.
60002011	Kunumpok hai, nang ratha u chung a rathaw munuphung ditrekhe ah put ah nangrechenna u rang, milak hai le khotang hai `khat a, kinawmawshawk u inih.
60002012	Phungshik hai kar khan richittak a awm u roh. Makha amani na ashie athaw miring hai nangnih u, tia chawngriei u phakhan, nang chonthaw atha kha muk ua, manmieshie ijongphak rang a Nikho khan, amani na Pathien kha mapakna u rang a inih.
60002013	Khajarkhan Pumi rangbak khan, miring hai shena rikip awnoi khan awm u roh. Chungchon a ranakniei reng ama dieng khan nita`awm, ama awnoi khan awm u roh.
60002014	Ninawkle, ashie athaw hai kha chepna rang le atha thaw hai kha mapakna rang, reng na irutir rampo hai awnoi khan awm u roh.
60002015	Ajarla atha nangithaw u kha na mimawng hai jetnaboi kha nangimakha u kha Pathien mulungmining inih.
60002016	Ningcham miring hai kha ang a ring u roh. Ashie kha mukhuna rang, nang ningchamna u kha rotokna boi a, Pathien shok hai kha ang a, ring u roh.
60002017	Mi kholok kha richit peh u roh. Takashawn uliennai hai kha numpoh u roh. Pathien kha chih u roh. Reng kha richit peh u roh.
60002018	Shok hai, chit kholok le nang pumpa u hai dieng luraw thaw u roh. Atha le mulungrenem hai dieng ranga niboia, arum hai diengawm luraw thaw u roh.
60002019	Ajarla, Pathien dieng a nanginiei lungthim jar a, shawna doina boi rangshe khan shawna nangdoi phakhan, makha mapakthiei inih.
60002020	Ajarla, nangrehe u jar a rawmawtawng a nangidoi u nitjoiala, nangni rang imaw nemna nih? Inia atha nangthaw a, makha rang khan shawna nangdoi u joiatu, Pathien dieng a ningnitna kha nih rangnih.
60002021	Ajarla mahi rang hin a nangni kha inurukoi u inih. Ajarla Christa na kieini rang a shawna irudoi kha endar `khat irumak inih. Makha ama kenu kha nangjuina u rang a inih:
60002022	“Ama na munu ruthaw mak, khan ama ner khan milem-midawina rumuh mak.”
60002023	Ama kha irachai a engshiet a ruthaw u phakhan, amani dieng khan engshiet kha rumikir mak. Ama na shawna rudoi phakhan, amani kha rumichit mak. Inia adik a chawngashat ama dieng khan nining a rurepeh joi.
60002024	Cross chung khan numunu u hai kha upumtak na ruruput joi. Makha kieini na munu hai khan thitna niei a dikna khan ringna rang a inih. Ama apawp shebe kha na nangni kha inurumadam u inih.
60002025	Ajarla nangni kha kengam lamrehe kha a`ang nangnih uh, inia tuntu Kengamroi le khan nang ringphuk u tenareh ama dieng khan nangvakkir u joi.
60003001	Khatikhan nupui hai, nang inkotak hai awnoi khan awm u roh. Makha eshen na chawng kha jui u joi nawkawm, chawng jaw boi a, unungak hai awmchan kha na amani kha mawjawtna rang a inih.
60003002	Richit le taklak a nangring u kha amani na muk u phakhan, nangmawjawt u rangnih.
60003003	Nang sham u kha raphanmashak a, rangkachak kha li a, ninawkle ponledier atha thaw a, mailang khan rielien u naw roh.
60003004	Makha ruhut a athangthiei boi mulung renem le miri`ir shungrieirit miring kha le rielien u roh. Makha Pathien maikung a manlu inih.
60003005	Ajarla ronglui a nupang riethieng hai kha na Pathien dieng ngakmining runiei ua, hitihin rurielien uh. Khan amani inkotak hai awnoi khan ruring uh.
60003006	Khatikhan Sarah na Abraham chawng kha rujui a, pumi, tia ama kha rukoi. Inimichit jar a niboia, atha kha nangthaw u joiatu, ama shanu hai kha nangnih u joi.
60003007	Inkopa hai, khatikhan nang nungak hai kha riringtak a awm pui u roh. Bekoirat `khat a le ringkho numpokmirit kha atumshom `khat a loi u tana amani kha richit peh u roh. Makha nang inikna u hai kha kharna boi rang a inih.
60003008	Dawngkhit a, mulungmining `khat a nang kholok awm u roh. Khatlekhat numropoh u roh. Uliennai hai kha numpoh u roh. Nang mulung u kha renemmashak u tana rede u roh.
60003009	Ashie kha ashie le khan rachaina kha rachaina le thung u naw roh. Kha ruhut a rahvan nangtumna u rang, Pathien na inurukoi u inih, iti hi jet u tana rahvan peh u roh.
60003010	Ajarla “Ringkho numapoh jawt le khan atha nikho hai amuh jawt miring kha na ashie chawngriei ah put ah iemieliei le mohonna boi rang, ama ner kha makha rosho.
60003011	Ama na ashie ah put ah hieirieshie atha kha thaw rosho. Ama na lungdamna kha tawkrieshie makha rojo rosho.
60003012	Ajarla midik hai chung a PUMI na imik atetna, khan amani nikna hai kha rangaina rang onokor awdawna. Inia PUMI mai kha ashie athaw miring hai kha le re`er inih.”
60003013	Atha kha nangthaw jawt u joiatu, engshiet a natawn u rang a kha tumaw nih?
60003014	Dikna rangbak khan shawna nangdoi u joi a awm, rahvanmuh miring kha nangnih uh. “Khan amani michitna khan nangni chih u naw roh, ninawkle mulungshaw u naw roh.”
60003015	Inia nang mulung shung ua Pumi Pathien kha riethiengtak a tet u roh. Rede le richit a, nang mulung shung ua awm ngakmining jar a chawng inawrawdawn mi rikip dieng khan rodoi pui rang khan rasham jawnjai u roh.
60003016	Christa jar a nang awmchan atha kha ashie athaw `khat a rieishiet phakhan, lungthim atha kha tet u roh, amani na jak muk u rangnih.
