60003017	Pathien mulungmining kha nitjoiatu, atha nangithaw u jar a shawna nangidoi u kha ashie thaw jar a shawna doinek khan athadet inih.
60003018	Ajarla Christa na munu hai jar a voikhat shawna rudoi. Makha midik `khat na midik boi hai rang a iruthaw chon inih. Makha ama na Pathien dieng nawchawina rang a inih. Taksha khan ama kha ruthat uh, inia Ratha jar a ama kha rumiring joi.
60003019	Ratha jar a ama na`awm rushe a lungroko shung ah ratha hai dieng khan chawng rurophong.
60003020	Tolai voikhat Noah rong a Pathien na doirat a rungaklai, Noah na rokongpui kha rukonlai, tui kar khan ratha ieriet bakte irushan inih.
60003021	Tui kha na, Jesu Christa thoiretna jar a, tun a kieini nashan baptisma hi ikhin inih. Makha baptisma kha na nupum ua akhe hi iloi nimak a, atha lungthim ah put ah Pathien dieng a chawngrakham kha inih. Jesu Christa thoiretna jar a baptisma kha na inashan inih.
60003022	Ama na ravan a ruhawng a Pathien khut chang tieng khan awm joi. Khan ravantir hai, chamniei hai, khan ranak hai kha Pathien na ama awnoi ah atet joi.
60004001	Hitihin Christa na kieini rang taksha a shawna rudoi jarkhan, makha miningtak kha le rapon kha rieshiei u roh. Ajarla taksha a shawna rudoi ama kha na munu ah put ah aranga nih joi.
60004002	Khatikhan ama na ringkho dawnshe khan miring hai ditrekhe rang khan ring boi a Pathien mulungmining rang khan ruring inih.
60004003	Ajarla rejaikawk, taksha ditrekhena, jukhawp, juhoiriethiei, lawp a juneh, khan mitiroi rilim chubaibawk hai kha thaw a ashesho ringkho khan Phungshik hai mulungmining niruthaw u khan ahunlim nangnih u joi.
60004004	Kha`ang arangatna awm boi a along munu khan amani le nangtan boi u jarkhan, shindawngna niei uh. Khajarkhan amani na nangni kha niemieshiet uh.
60004005	Inia aring le athi chawngshat rang a rasham ama dieng khan amani na ithaw chon hai jar kha pek u rangnih.
60004006	Hijarhin tuntu athachawng kha athi miring hai dieng khanawm irushem pe u inih. Makha amani kha shik miring hai kha ang a taksha dungjuia chawngrushat pe joiawm, Ratha dungjuia amani na ringna rang a inih.
60004007	Tun nieinak kholok dawng kha hawng nai joi. Khajarkhan nikna rang khan mulunglut le riring kha nih u roh.
60004008	Hihai kholok chung hin khatlekhat rang numpok kha nieichak u roh, ajarla numpok na munu tampui kha imukhu inih.
60004009	Muruk a mimieshiet boi a khatlekhat rang a jinchonthiei kha chang u roh.
60004010	Mi rikip na khutchawi inieirim nit jarkhan, Pathien numpokmirit arawp dungjuia nieitin atha hai `khat a, khutchawi kha khatlekhat dieng chonthawna a rotokna u roh.
60004011	Tukhat na chawng riei joiatu, Pathien chawngtak kha ang a riei rosho. Tukhat na michon thaw joiatu, Pathien na ipek ranak kha le thaw rosho. Makha Jesu Christa jar a nieinak kholok chung a Pathien kha mapakna rang a inih. Lurna le ranak kha kumshawt a ama dieng a`awm nih rosho. Amen.
60004012	Kunumpok hai, enneretena u rang, ajeng a shawna enretena khan, nangni dieng erekhek ashok ang a, shindawngna niei u naw roh.
60004013	Inia Christa shawna khan shaw puishom u tana ningai u roh. Makha Christa lurna kha malangmashak phakhan, rawshawlam a nangningaina u rang a inih.
60004014	Christa riming rang khan engshiet nangtum u joiatu, rahvantha kha nangnih uh. Ajartu lurna le Pathien Ratha kha na nangni dieng awm joi. Amani rang tu ama hi mieshietna kha inih, inia nangni rang tu ama hi lurna kha inih.
60004015	Inia mithat ninawkle murushah ninawkle ashie athaw miring ninawkle mi tieitang jar a khut araw miring `khat a shawna kha doi u naw roh.
60004016	Inia tukhat na Christian `khat a shaw joiatu, jak naw rosho, inia hi chungchang hin Pathien kha mulur rosho.
60004017	Ajarla Pathien in ah chawngshatna putna rang a pha kha jong joi. Khan makha kieini dieng put masha joiatu, Pathien athachawng ajui boi hai dawng kha imaw ninih?
60004018	Tun “Midik rang khan shanna kha shaw joiala, pathienjet boi le munu miring rang khan imaw rachang nih?”
60004019	Khajarkhan Pathien mulungmining dungjuia shawna adoi miring hai kha na takashawn rang a rutuk nakonpa ama dieng, atha chon thaw a, amani ratha kha peh u rosho.
60005001	Christa shawna khan kungruchang le irophong rang a lurna kha atum rang, bieklamkai `khat changna a, nang kar ua bieklamkai hai dieng khan mawshawkna kieniei.
60005002	Nang kar ua awm Pathien kengam hai kha roina rang, kengamroi hai chon kha thaw u roh. Makha nangni na epchon a niboia, mulungdit a, khan mulung dik boi nemna rang khan niboia, ningawroitak a thaw u roh.
60005003	Khan nangni dieng khutinorotho u chung khan chungrasha boi a, kengam hai dieng khan endar chang u roh.
60005004	Khan Kengamroi Ulienchang kha na jonglar phakhan, achoi boi lurna renglukhum kha nangtum u rangnih.
60005005	Khatikhan khangthar hai, nangni na lamkai hai awnoi a awm u roh. Nang kholok na khatlekhat awnoi a awm u roh. Khan redena kha rieshiei u roh. Ajarla, “Pathien na lienrasha hai kha akhar, khan rede hai dieng khan numpokmirit kha ipek inih.”
60005006	Khajarkhan ranakniei Pathien khut noi khan rede u roh. Makha Pathien na chanthatna `khat a nangni kha nalawmna rang a inih.
60005007	Nang mulungshaw kholok kha ama dieng tetna u roh, ajarla ama na nangni kha anareh uh.
60005008	Mulung kha khop u roh. Riring u roh. Ajarla nang rahapui u diabol kha kieipui murung kha ang a, tumaw kashak rang, tia shehawng a awm.
60005009	Ama kha khar u roh. Nang shawna u kha le ra`ang shawnatak kha nang uliennai hai na`awm rieliei hin doi u, iti kha jet u tana, nang takashawnna u khan dingrep u roh.
60005010	Khan Jesu Christa dieng a ama kumshawt lurna a inurukoina numpokmirit kholok Pathien kha na, apha bawngte nangshaw u shole, nurupummashak u rangnih, namarat u rangnih, nemenet u rangnih, khan nettak a nimiding u rangnih.
60005011	Lurna le ranak kha kumshawtkumshawt a ama dieng awm rosho. Amen.
60005012	Takashawnthiei `khat inih, tia kiruloi uliennai Silvanus jar a, kiei na tawihiei a kiemiejiek inih. Pathien numpokmirit kha adik inih, tia kinawmawshawk ua, khan kungachang kanih. Numpokmirit khan dingrep u roh.
60005013	Nangni le imadanshom Babylon ah awmnu na chubai nepek uh. Khan kashapa Mark na`awm chubai nepek uh.
60005014	Numpok biengrutum kha le khatlekhat dieng chubai repeh u roh. Jesu Christa dieng a awm nang kholok dieng lungdamna kha a`awm nih rosho. Amen.
61001001	Jesu Christa shok le tirtawn Simon Peter kiei na takashawn aman hai nangni dieng kimiejiek inih. Napathien u le nashandampa Jesu Christa dikna jar a, nangiman u takashawn kha ki`iman u takashawn kha le manrawp ra`angre.
61001002	Pathien le nupumi u Jesu Christa jetna shung khan numpokmirit le lungdamna kha apung nih rosho.
61001003	Ringna le Pathien chitna rang a rangai rikip kha Pathien ranak na kieini dieng nepek joi. Makha ama lurna le ama thatna jar a kieini hi nurukoipa kha nejet u jar a inih.
61001004	Khahaikha jar a alientak le manlutak chawngrakham hai kha ama na kieini dieng nepek joi. Makha amani jar a, ditrekhena jar a manmieshie shung a awm morona ah put ah nangrekhe ua, Pathien balam kha atumshom nangnitna u rang a inih.
61001005	Ajarla makhatak jarkhan mulungluttak a nang takashawn u khan tharieina, tharieina khan jetna,
61001006	jetna khan takshurna, takshurna khan doiratna, doiratna khan Pathien chitna,
61001007	Pathien chitna khan uliennai numropokna, uliennai numropokna khan numpok kha bo u roh.
61001008	Ajarla hihai kholok hi nangniei ua, nang kar ua pung joiatu, nupumi u Jesu Christa jetna khan rongawm rong u naw tinih, khan ara boi kha`awm chang u naw tinih.
61001009	Ajarla hihaihi aniei boi ama kha mik`entawi le mikchaw inih, khan ama munu alui hai kha riethiengmashak joi, iti kha imieniei inih.
61001010	Khajarkhan uliennai hai, inokoina u le inamadanna u kha akalang moshokna rang, mulungluttak a thaw u roh. Ajarla makha nangthaw u joiatu, keruthuina kha shukniei a niei u naw tinih.
61001011	Ajarla nupumi le nashandampa u Jesu Christa kumshawt rengchangna khan rupumping a lutna kha nepek u rangnih.
61001012	Nanginiei u adik khan nettak a nimiding u, iti kha nangjet u joiawm, mejet jawnjai rang hin kiei na ishawn boi a thaw jawt mi`ing.
61001013	Kiei na mahi thamber hin kaw`awmlailim, nangni kha mejetret a meche rang hi adik chon `khat a koloi.
61001014	Nupumi u Jesu Christa na inumumuk dungjuia, kathamber hi relen a kimak rang a nih joi, iti hi kiei na kejet.
61001015	Kiei na kakawchawi shole, hihaihi nangmining jawnjaina u rang, kiei na thawtuk kha kithaw inih.
61001016	Ajarla nupumi u ranak le Jesu Christa jongna rang a kinemejetna u khan, miring hai na shingveng a ikon lungthurishim kha kieini na rujui u mi`ing, inia ama renglur mikkungchang hai kha kuruchang u inih.
61001017	Ajarla Erekhek a Lurna ah put ah he `khat na ama dieng chawngriei phakhan, Apa Pathien ah put ah richit le lurna kha irumuk inih: “Mahi kunumpok kashapa kha inih, ama dieng hin ningnitna kha kieniei.”
61001018	Khan ravan ah put ah ajong mahi hesho hi kieini na ama le lawn riethieng ah kuruawm u lai khan kirujet u inih.
61001019	Khajarkhan thiempulien hai chawng hai kha kieini rang anet nih joi. Kho hawng var masheng, khan jingkar arshi kha na nang mulung shung ua awm masheng, jingna mun a avar thaomiei khan nokor nangimiding u kha ang a, amani chawng hai khan nokor nangmiding pe u joiatu, nangni rang tha rangnih.
61001020	Akhat changna a mahi jet u roh, makhala miejiek rophong `khatsheawm miring `khat ah put ah hawng shok nimak.
61001021	Ajarla miring mulungdit a rophongchawng hawng shok mak. Inia amani kha Ratha Riethieng na imeper le roroia iruriei u inih.
61002001	Inia mi hai kar a thiempulien jok hai ruawm kha le ra`ang a, nang kar ua`awm thiempulien jok hai kha hawng awm rangnih. Inamathangthiei ruchukna jok kha amani na murukte a hawng chawi u rangnih. Amani rurawchawh Pumpashe kha rujawt u mak, khan relentak a thangna kha amanirilik dieng imuchut u inih.
61002002	Khan mi tampui na amani rejaikawk chon kha jui u rangnih. Amani jar a adik lam kha na mieshietna muk rangnih.
61002003	Khan amani raphamna jar a lemna chawng le nangni kha vetrotokna a nawthaw u rangnih. Ashawt pha ah put ah amani chung a chawngshatna kha rudaw mak, khan amani chung a thangna kha rumiei mak.
61002004	Ajarla Pathien na munu thaw ravantir hai kha ruhawi boi a rui ajing le khoplam a tartaros a ruthong a chawngshatna rang khan rutet joiatu,
61002005	ama na Pathienjet boi manmieshie chung a tuilien jong chawi phakhan, dikna rophong Noah kha shiri eshen le rushan joiawm, ronglui hai kha ruhawi nawkatu,
61002006	Sodom le Gomorrah khopui hai kha ruvut rurashatmashak a irumathangbieng kha ahawng rang a Pathienjet boi a aring hai rang a endar `khat a rutet joiatu,
61002007	danishawnboi miring hai rejaikawk chon kha na ningirumieshiet pe u midik Lot kha Pathien na rushan joiatu
61002008	(makha midikpa kha amani kar a ruawm inih. Amani danishawnboi chon hai kha irumuk a irujet nitjoiatu, makha na ama dikna ringphuk kha nikhonikho a irumawshaw pe u inih),
61002009	Pathienchi miring kha lemna ah put ah itia ishan rang a maw nih, khan midik boi hai kha chawngshatna Nikho rang le chepna rang itia ihawi rang a maw nih, iti kha Pumi na ijet inih.
61002010	Khinniei a taksha ashie ditrekhe dungjuia aring hai le chamniei hai ishawn boi hai chung khan inih. Amani kha chitchai jet boi, ningnom a awm, lienrang hai mieshiet rang, achih boi hai kha runih uh.
61002011	Ravantir hai kha amaninek a ratna le ranak a liendet u joiawm, Pumi maikung a amani chung a chawngshatna rang, mieshietna chawng kha riei u mak.
61002012	Inia hihai miring hi mining awm boi, shur a that rang a, ramsha hai a`ang, amani na ijet boi u nieinak hai chung a mieshietna chawng kha riei uh. Amani amna u khan ambieng u rangnih.
61002013	Amani idikna boi u lawh kha imuk u rang a inih. Amani na nishun khan lungtawr shie khan ningai uh. Amani kha adelawk le mieshiet kha chang uh. Amani na nangni le lungtawr shie thaw u phakhan, amani mimohonna khan ningai uh.
61002014	Imik u hai khan uire ship jarkhan, munu thaw chat u mak. Anet boi ratha hai kha ahawr uh. Rapham chon thaw rang khan amani mulung u khan ajeng a ruthaw uh. Pathien na pumibot naite hai kha chang uh.
61002015	Amani na adik lam kha apai ua, lamrehe uh. Dikna boi lawh numrupoh, Bosor shapa Balaam lam kha amani na rujui uh.
61002016	Inia achawngthiei boi ranngam kha na miring hesho a ruchawng a ama shietna jar a rurawkawk, khan thiempulien vetna kha rukhar pe.
61002017	Hihai miring hi tui awm boi tuikhur, rithikhopui na inawng romiei kha nih uh. Amani rang khan kumshawt a jingnakhap kha ihawi pe inih.
61002018	Ajarla nemna boi chawngriei a lienrasha hai kha na, amani taksha ditrekhe le rejaikawk chon khan, rehe a aring hai ah put ah dengre a vakrekhelimlai, amani kha ruhawr uh.
61002019	Amanirilik amna shok a awm chuchung ua, ningchamna chawngrakham kha amani dieng rophong uh. Ajarla ih `khat na miring chung a pumpa chang joiatu, makha miring kha makha nieinak shok kha achang inih.
61002020	Ajarla, Pumi le shandampa Jesu Christa jetna jar a manmieshie amna ah put ah rurekhe u shole, amani na lut u ret phakhan, elem a mawtawr u joiatu, putnanek khan dawng kha amani rang khan shiedet.
61002021	Ajarla amani na dikna kha jet u shole, Pathien na amani dieng a irupek chawngpek riethieng ah put ah akirnek a tu, dikna lam kha irujet boi u rang a kha amani rang athadet inih.
61002022	Inia chawngrichi adik dungjuia, mahi amani dieng a ashok inih: “Ui na ama moloktak dieng khan ikir,” khan “Vawkpui na tuirobo joiawm, chir irobothep inih.”
61003001	Kunumpok hai, adi changna chawngmawchawi hi tun nangni dieng kimiejiek inih (chawngmawchawi dire khan nang mulung u riethieng kha mothoina rang, mejetnaret `khat a kimiejiek inih).
61003002	Makha thiempulien riethieng hai na matieng a irurieisha chawng hai le khan nang tirtawn u hai dieng irurieinasha u Pumi le Shandampa chawngpek hai kha nangminingna u rang a inih.
61003003	Akhat changna a mahi jet u roh, makhala nikho dawng hai khan erawh thaw miring hai kha jong rangnih. Amani na amani ditrekhe dungjuia ring u rangnih.
61003004	Amani na ti u rangnih, “Ama jongna rang a chawngrakham kha khoshekawt ah maw awm joi? Ajarla nipilepu hai ruthi uah put khan nieinak kholok khati momoi khan konputpek ah put ah ruawm inih.”
61003005	Ajarla amani na mahi chana a jetnaw`awm iruthaw u inih, makhala tona a ravan hai hi Pathien chawng jar a irumaw`awm inih, khan rieliei hi tui ah put ah le tui shung ah irumidingsho nih joi.
61003006	Khalai a ruawmsha miring hai kha tui na ruhup a rumathang joi.
61003007	Khan makha chawngtak kha na tuntun a ravan le rieliei hi miei rang khan a ihawi inih. Mahi chawngshatna le pathienjet boi miring thangna Nikho rang khan a ama na itet inih.
61003008	Inia kunumpok hai, mahi `khat hi mieniei u naw roh, makhala Pumi rang tu ni `khat hi kum bawp `khat le ra`ang inih, khan kum bawp `khat hi ni `khat le ra`ang inih.
61003009	Tukhat na ashum `khat a mining joiawm, Pumi tu ama chawngrakham chungchang khan shum mak, inia kieini rang idoishom inih. Khan tukhatshe na athang rang a kha ama na dit mak, kha ruhut a mi rikip na mulung ilek rang a kha idit inih.
61003010	Inia Pumi Nikho kha jan a murushah ang a jong rangnih. Khan ravan hai kha helehoi rekhektak le hek rangnih, khan kha shung a awm nieinak kholok miei le longchen rangnih. Khan rieliei le kha shung a awm chon hai kha kang rangnih.
61003011	Hihai kholok hi hitihin a animjit rang a nit jarkhan, itia riethieng le Pathien chih miring achang rang a maw nangnih, iti kha mining u roh.
61003012	Pathien Nikho jongna rang a kha tuiravawncham ang a rungak u roh. Makha nikho jarkhan, ravan hai kha miei a rinim ning, tia kha shung ah awm nieinak hai kha miei a long rangnih.
61003013	Inia ama chawngrakham dungjuia, dikna awmna ravan athar hai le rieliei athar kha nirungakrala u inih.
61003014	Khajarkhan kunumpok hai, nangni na hihaihi nangingakrala u le roroia, jie awm boi, ninawkle metek boi a lungdam a ama na numukna u rang, enchak a rojo u roh.
61003015	Khan nupumi doiratna kha shandamna `khat a loi u roh. Nunumpok u uliennai, Paul na`awm, ama dieng varna ipek dungjuia, nangni dieng irumiejiek kha a`ang inih.
61003016	Hihai chungchang hin ama chawngmawchawi kholok a iriei inih. Amani shung khan eshen tu jet amatat inih. Makha mimawng le mi riding boi hai kha na amani thangnatak rang khan iriephiermashak u inih. Miejiek shik dieng khanawm khatikhan a ithaw u inih.
61003017	Khajarkhan kunumpok hai, hihaihi nangni na masha a nangjet u joi jarkhan, riring u roh. Khanawkatu mi shie hai irehena kha le nawchawichen u ning, tia nangnetna uah put ah nangcho u rangnih.
61003018	Inia nupumi le nashandampa u Jesu Christa numpokmirit le jetna khan rawshawn u roh. Ama dieng tun le kumshawt dire hin mapakna kha awm rosho. Amen.
62001001	Mahi putna ah ruawm, kirujet u, kimik le kirumuk u, khan kiruenrep ua, khut le kirushit u ringna chawng chungchanga inih.
62001002	Ringkho kha rular jarkhan, kieini na kurumuk ua, kungkachang u joi. Khan Apa dieng a ruawm le kieini dieng a rular, kumshawt ringna kha nangni dieng kirophong u inih.
62001003	Khan kieini na kirumuk u le kirujet u kha nangni dieng kirophong u inih. Makha nangniawm kieini le rawlawpnathiei rang a inih. Khan diktak a nawrawlawpna u hi tu Apa khan Ashapa Jesu Christa le inih.
62001004	Khan nang ningaina u kipna rang, hihaihi nangni dieng kimiejiek inih.
62001005	Khan ama ah put ah kirujet u chawngriei kha nangni dieng kirophong u inih, makhala Pathien hi mieivar kha inih, khan ama dieng hin jingna kha shukawm a awm mak.
62001006	Kieini na ama le nawrawlawp niti a ajing a nalawn uatu, mielieishiei nithaw u inih, khan adik kha thaw u makme.
62001007	Ama na mieivar a awm hi ang a, kieiniawm mieivar a nalawn uatu, khatlekhat rawlawpna kha nieniei u joi. Khan Ashapa Jesu Christa thishen kha na munu rikip ah put ah nieriethiengmashak u joi.
62001008	Kieini na munu niei mi`ing niti uatu, ninining a mohon nana nanih uh, khan adik kha kieini dieng awm mak.
62001009	Kieini na numunu u hai kha norophong uatu, ama tu takashawn rang a rutuk le dikna kha inih, ama na numunu u hai kha narangaidam pe u rangnih, khan dikna boi kholok ah put ah nieriethieng u rangnih.
62001010	Inia kieini na munu thaw mi`ing niti uatu, ama kha mielieishiei thaw miring nimachang a ama chawng kha kieini dieng awm mak.
62002001	Kanai hai, munu nangthawna boi u rang, hihaihi kimiejiek inih. Khan tukhat na munu thaw a`awm, kapa maikung a Narashappui rang, midik miring Jesu Christa kha nieniei u inih.
62002002	Khan Christa hi numunu u rang a ringnikna rawthawina kha inih; kieini ranga rang nimak, inia manmieshie kholok rangawm inih.
62002003	Ama chawngpek kha nurung uatu, mahin ama kha nejet uh, iti kha kieini na nijet u inih.
62002004	“Ama kha kejet,” ati miring kha na ama chawngpek hai kha rung nawkatu, ama kha mielieishiei miring kha inih, khan adik kha ama dieng awm pe mak.
62002005	Tunita`awm ama chawng kha arung ama dieng khan diktak a Pathien numpokna kha rupum pe inih. Mahin kieini na ama dieng na`awm uh, iti kha nijet u inih.
62002006	Ama dieng ka`awm ati miring kha na ama aring dan khan aringir rang a inih.
62002007	Uliennai hai, kiei na nangni dieng chawngpek athar kimiejiek nimak, inia putna ah put ah nangiruniei u chawngpek alui kha inih. Chawngpek alui kha putna ah put ah nangirurangai u chawng kha inih.
62002008	Khan chawngpek athar nangni dieng kiemiejiekthep, mahi ama dieng le nangni dieng adik inih. Ajarla ajing kha thangsho a adik mieivar kha tun var a awm joi.
62002009	Mieivar a ka`awm tu iti, inia ama uliennai tu imukmak ama kha tunshe hin ajing a awm nilai.
62002010	Uliennai numapoh ama kha mieivar a awm inih, khan ama dieng bakna awm pe mak.
62002011	Inia uliennai amumak miring kha tu ajing a awm kha inih, khan ajing khan aring inih. Ama na khotang tieng ah she maw kanih, iti jet mak, ajarla ajing kha na imik hai kha imawchawt pe inih.
62002012	Kunumpok naite hai, nangni dieng kiemiejiek, makhala ama riming jar a nang munu u hai kha arangaidam joi.
62002013	Apa hai, nangni dieng kiemiejiek, ajarla kung ah put ah ama kha nangjet u joi. Rothar hai, nangni dieng kiemiejiek, ajarla nangni na mi shie kha nangmawtawr u joi. Naite hai, nangni dieng kiemiejiek, ajarla nangpa u kha nangjet u joi.
62002014	Apa hai, nangni dieng kiemiejiek, ajarla kung ah put ah ruawm ama kha nangjet u joi. Rothar hai, nangni dieng kiemiejiek, ajarla nangni nangrat uh, khan Pathien chawng kha nangni dieng awm joi, khan nangni na mi shie kha nang mawtawr u joi.
62002015	Manmieshie le kha shung a awm nieinak hai kha numpoh u naw roh. Tukhat na manmieshie hi numpok a tu, ama dieng Apa numpokna kha awm mak.
62002016	Ajarla manmieshie shung a awm nieinak: pum ditrekhena, mik hai ditrekhena, khan ringkho lienrashatna, kholok hi apa tah kha nimak, inia manmieshie tah kha inih.
62002017	Khan manmieshie hi ama ditrekhena kha le thang rangnih, inia Pathien mulungmining athaw miring kha na kumshawt a awm rangnih.
62002018	Naite hai, dawng pha kha nih joi, khan Christa jok jong rangnih, iti kha nangjet uh. Kha ang khan tunawm Christa jok tampui pung joi. Mahi na dawng pha kha nih joi, iti kha inemejet u inih.
62002019	Kieini ah put ah amani kha rushesho joi, inia kieini ah put ah ruthoi nih u mak. Kieini ah put runih uala ruawm u rangnih. Inia rushe u kha na amani kholok kha kieini ah put runih u mak, iti kha imalar inih.
62002020	Khan Riethieng ah put ah thaonawtna kha nangniei u joi, khan kholok kha nangni na nangjet uh.
62002021	Adik kha nangjet boi u jar a nangni dieng kimiejiek nimak, inia makha nangjet u jar a inih, ajarla mielieishiei rikip adik ah put nimak.
62002022	Jesu hi Christa inih, iti rapha miring kha ninawkala, tumaw nih mielieishiei thaw miring kha? Ama kha Apa le Shapa chung a rapha Christa le re`er miring kha inih.
62002023	Tunita`awm Shapa chung a rapha kha na Apa kha niei mak. Ashapa rophong miring kha na Apa kha`awm ieniei inih.
62002024	Kung ah put ah nang irujetsha u kha nangni dieng awm rosho. Kung ah put ah nangirujetsha u kha nangni dieng awm a tu, Apa dieng le khan Shapa dieng khan nang awm u rangnih.
62002025	Khan mahi kieini dieng a chawngirurakhamsha chawngrakham kha inih, khan makha kumshawt ringna kha inih.
62002026	Nangni nomohon rang a hai jar a mahi nangni dieng kimiejiek inih.
62002027	Khan ama ah put ah nangiruloi u thaonawtna kha nangni dieng awm. Tukhat na inuruchuk u rang a kha nemna awm mak. Ajarla thaonawtnatak kha na kholok chungchanga inuruchuk u inih. Makhala adik kha inih, khan mielieishiei kha nimak. Khan makha na inuruchuk u tak kha ang a, nangni ama dieng awm u roh.
62002028	Khan tun, naite hai, ama jonglar phakhan, narangamna u rang le ama maikung a jak numukna boi u rang, ama dieng awm u roh.
62002029	Ama hi adik miring kha inih, iti kha nangjet uatu, dikna athaw miring rikip kha ama ah put ah jong shok inih, iti hi nangijet u inih.
62003001	Enro, kieini hi Pathien naite hai tia koina rang, idawr a alien numpok kha Apa na kieini dieng inepek maw nih! Khajarkhan manmieshie na kieini hi nejet u mak, ajarla mahi na ama kha rujet mak.
62003002	Kunumpok hai, tun kieini hi Pathien nai hai kha nanih u joi, khan kieini hi ih rachang rang a maw nanih u, iti kha lar maklai. Kieini na nijet u kha tu, alar phakhan, ama le nara`ang u rangnih, ajarla amama kha ang a kieini na numuk u rangnih.
62003003	Ama dieng a mahi ngakmining aniei rikip kha na, ama riethieng anih kha ang a, nining a riethieng rangnih.
62003004	Tunita`awm munu athaw kha na Danishawnboi kha ithaw inih, khan munu hi Danishawnboi kha inih.
62003005	Munu hai achawiviek rang a ama kha Pathien na malar joi. Ama dieng khan munu awm mak, iti kha nangjet uh.
62003006	Ama dieng a awm tu kha na munu kha thaw a awm mak. Khan munu athaw tu kha na ama kha muawm muh maklai, khan jetawm jet maklai.
62003007	Naite hai, tute na nangni kha nomohon u naw rosho. Ama kha midik anitak kha ang a, dikna athaw ama kha midik kha inih.
62003008	Munu athaw ama kha diabol ah put inih, ajarla kung ah put diabol kha na munu kha iruthaw inih. Makha jarkhan diabol chon thaw hai kha mathangna rang, Pathien Shapa kha irumalar inih.
62003009	Tunita`awm Pathien ah put ah jong shok ama kha na munu thaw naw nih. Ajarla ama chi kha ama dieng awm, khan ama na munu kha thaw ngam mak, ajarla ama kha Pathien ah put inih.
62003010	Mahi na Pathien nai hai le khan diabol nai hai kha imalar inih. Tunita`awm dikna athaw boi le uliennai numapoh boi ama kha Pathien ah put ah nimak. Khatlekhat Numropokna
62003011	Kieini khatlekhat numropoh u rawi, iti chawngkung hi keng nangni na kung ah put ah nangirurangai u kha.
62003012	Kieini na Cain kha a`ang boi rang nashok uh. Ama kha mi shie `khat ah put ah runih, khan anaipangpa kha iruthat inih. Ijar a ama kha iruthat maw nih? Ajarla ama chon hai kha ashie kha runih pe, khan anaipangpa chon hai kha dikna kha runih pe.
62003013	Kuliennai hai, manmieshie na numukmak u joiawm, shindawngna niei u naw roh.
62003014	Kieini na khatlekhat numnoropoh u jarkhan, thitna ah put ah ringna tieng rawthawt kha nanih u joi, iti kha nejet uh. Tunita`awm uliennai numapoh boi ama kha thitna khan a a`awm inih.
62003015	Uliennai amumak miring rikip kha mithat miring inih. Mithat miring rikip na ama dieng khan kumshawt ringna kha awm pe mak, iti kha nangjet uh.
62003016	Mahin kieini na numpok hi imaw nih, iti kha nejet uh, makhala amatak na kieini ruhut a iringkho kha irupek inih. Khajarkhan niringkho u hi nuliennai hai rang khan nipek u rang a shok.
62003017	Tukhat na manmieshie niei ieniei a, khan uliennai aravatna kha muk phakhan, lainatna kha niei nawkala, itia maw Pathien numpokna kha ama dieng awm nih?
62003018	Naite hai, chawng ninawkle mieliei a nih boi chon a le adik a numropoh u rawi.
62003019	Hin ah put ah kieini hi adik ah put ah nanih, iti hi nejet u rangnih, khan ama maikung a numulung u hi nawmawjawi u rangnih.
62003020	Numulung u hi na naheng ua`awm, Pathien tu numulung u nek a liendet, khan ama na kholok kha jetviek.
62003021	Kunumpok hai, numulung u hi na naheng u nawkatu, Pathien maikung a rangamna kha nieniei u joi.
62003022	Ama chawngpek hai kha nijui u le khan ama maikung a ningnitna kha nawthaw u jarkhan, kieini na ninik u hai kholok kha ama ah put ah nimuk u inih.
62003023	Mahi ama chawngpek inih, makhala kieini na ashapa Jesu Christa riming kha takashawnngir rang nanih uh. Khan ama na kieini dieng a chawnginepek u kha ang a, kieini khatlekhat numropongir rang a nanih uh.
62003024	Khan ama chawngpek ajui kha na ama dieng awm, khan ama na ama dieng awm. Mahin, kieini dieng a inurupek Ratha jar a, ama hi kieini dieng awm, iti kha nijet u inih.
62004001	Kunumpok hai, ratha rikip kha takashawn u naw roh, inia ratha hai kha Pathien ah put ah maw nih, iti kha enrete u roh. Ajarla thiempulien jok tampui rieliei a rushe u joi.
62004002	Mahin Pathien Ratha kha nangjet uh: Jesu Christa hi miring a jong inih, tia rophong ratha rikip kha Pathien ah put ah inih.
62004003	Jesu Christa hi miring a ajong inih, tia rophong boi ratha rikip kha Pathien ah put ah nimak. Mahi jong rangnih, tia nangirujet u Christa le re`er ratha kha inih. Tun manmieshie shung a mahi a`awmsha nih joi.
62004004	Naite hai, nangni Pathien ah put ah nangnih uh, khan amani kha nangmawtawr u joi. Ajarla manmieshie shung a awm amanek khan nangni dieng a awm ama kha liendet.
62004005	Amani kha manmieshie ah put ah nih uh, khan amani kha manmieshie chawng dan a chawng uh, khan manmieshie na amani chawng kha rangai pe uh.
62004006	Kieini hi Pathien ah put ah nanih uh. Pathien ajet miring kha na niriei u hai hi rangai. Pathien ah put nih boi ama kha na niriei u hi rangai mak. Mahin adik ratha le rehena ratha kha nijet u inih.
62004007	Kunumpok hai, kieini khatlekhat numropoh u rawi, ajarla numpok hi Pathien ah put ah inih. Khan numropoh miring rikip kha Pathien ah put ah shok inih, khan ama na Pathien kha ejet.
62004008	Numapoh boi ama kha na Pathien kha jet mak, ajarla Pathien hi numpok inih.
62004009	Mahin kieini dieng Pathien numpok kha rumalar: ama jar a niringnathiei rang, Pathien na ashapa khatte kha manmieshie shung hin jong tir joi.
62004010	Mahi shung hin numpok kha awm: kieini na Pathien kha numnirupok u nimak, inia ama na kieini hi numinurupok a ashapa kha numunu u jar a ringnikna rawthawina `khat a ijongtir inih.
62004011	Kunumpok hai, Pathien na kieini hi khatikhan numnurupok joiala, kieiniawm khatlekhat numropongir rang a nashok uh.
62004012	Tute na Pathien hi mumaklai. Kieini khatlekhat numnoropoh uatu, Pathien na kieini dieng awm, khan ama numpok kha kieini dieng irupummashak inih.
62004013	Aratha kha kieini dieng nepek joi jarkhan, kieini na ama dieng na`awm uh, khan ama na kieini dieng awm, iti hi nejet u joi.
62004014	Khan kieini na numuk u joi, khan kungnachang u joi, makhala Apa na Shapa kha manmieshie Shandampa `khat a jong tir joi.
62004015	Tunitjoiawm Jesu hi Pathien Shapa inih, tia rophong a tu, Pathien kha ama dieng awm, khan ama na Pathien dieng awm.
62004016	Khajarkhan Pathien na kieini dieng a iniei numpok kha kieini na nejet ua, takanawshawn u joi. Pathien hi numpok inih. Numpok shung a awm miring kha na Pathien dieng awm, khan Pathien na ama dieng awm.
62004017	Mahin chawngshatna Nikho a rangamna nienieinathiei rang, numpok kha nakar ua nurupummashak joi. Ajarla ama kha ang a kieini hi manmieshie shung a awm nanih uh.
62004018	Numpok shung a chitna kha awm mak, khan rupumping numpok kha na chitna kha inawt inih. Ajarla chitna hi chepna le asheshom inih. Khan achih miring ama dieng khan Pathien numpok kha irupummashak boi inih.
62004019	Ama na kieini hi numnurupokmasha jarkhan, kieini na ama kha numnipok u inih.
62004020	Tukhat na, “Pathien kha numkopok,” tia ama uliennai hai kha mukmak joiatu, ama kha mielieishiei thaw miring kha inih. Ajarla imik na imuk uliennai hai kha numapoh boi miring kha na itia maw mik a muk boi Pathien kha numpoh ngam nih?
62004021	Khajarkhan ama ah put ah nimuk chawngpek kha hi inih: Pathien numapoh miring kha na ama uliennai hai kha numipokngir rang a shok inih.
62005001	Tunita` awm Jesu hi Christa inih, tia takashawn ama kha Pathien ah put ah jong shok inih. Khan omoshok ama numapoh miring kha na ama na imoshok ama kha`awm numpok.
62005002	Kieini na Pathien kha numnopok a ama chawngpek kha nujui u phakhan, kieini na Pathien nai hai kha numnopok, iti kha nejet uh.
62005003	Ama chawngpek hai nijui u hi Pathien numpok kha inih. Khan ama chawngpek hai kha tu, arik nimak.
62005004	Ajarla Pathien ah put ah jong shok ama kha na manmieshie hi imawtawr inih. Manmieshie mawtawr ramawtawrna kha natakashawn u hi inih.
62005005	Jesu hi Pathien Shapa inih, tia takashawn miring ama kha manmieshie mawtawr miring nitjoiawm, ama kha tumaw ninih?
62005006	Jesu Christa hi tui le thishen ranak a ajong inih, tui ranga ranak a ajong nimak, inia tui le thishen ranak a inih. Mahi Ratha na kungachang inih, ajarla Ratha hi adik inih.
62005007	Ravan a kungachang `thum awm: Apa, Chawng, khan Ratha Riethieng, hihai `thum hi khatte inih.
62005008	Khan rieliei kungmachang hai kha `thum inih: Ratha, tui khan thishen, hihai `thum hi rawjawt inih.
62005009	Miring hai kungchangna kha noloi uatu, Pathien kungchangna kha liendet. Ajarla Pathien kungchangna kha hi inih: ama na ashapa chungchanga kungchang joi.
62005010	Pathien Shapa takashawn kha na nining a kungachang inih. Pathien takashawn boi kha na ama kha mielieishiei miring imachang inih, ajarla Pathien na ashapa chungchanga kungachang kha takashawn mak.
62005011	Khan kungchangna kha mahi inih: Pathien na kieini dieng kumshawt ringna kha nepek joi, khan makha ringna kha ashapa dieng khan a`awm inih.
62005012	Tunita`awm shapa aniei kha na ringna kha ieniei, Pathien shapa aniei boi kha na ringna kha niei mak.
62005013	Pathien Shapa riming a takashawn nangni dieng kumshawt ringna kha nangniei u, iti nangjetna u rang le Pathien Shapa riming kha dawdawn a takanangshawnna u rang, hihaihi nangni dieng kimiejiek inih.
62005014	Kieini na ama dieng rangamna niniei kha hi inih: kieini na ama mulungmining dungjuia ninik uatu, ninik u rikip kha ama na inarangai pe inih.
62005015	Khan kieini na ninik u rikip kha narangai pe, iti hi nejet uatu, ama dieng a ninik u rikip kha numuk u joi, iti kha nijet u inih.
62005016	Uliennai `khat na thitnathiei nih boi munu ithaw kha tukhat na muk a tu, ama rang nik pe rosho. Khan Pathien na thitnathiei nih boi munu athawpa le amani dieng khan ringna pek rangnih. Thitnathiei munu awm, makha jarkhan nikna niei rang a nanih u kiti nimak.
62005017	Dikna boi rikip hi munu inih, khan thitnathiei nih boi munu awm.
62005018	Kieini na nejet uh, makhala Pathien ah put ah jong shok ama kha na munu thaw mak, inia Pathien ah put ah jong shok miring kha na bibing a rurung inih, khan ashie kha na shih ngam mak.
62005019	Kieini na nejet uh, makhala kieini hi Pathien ah put ah jong shok nanih uh, khan manmieshie kholok hi mi shie ranak thoi a ring inih.
62005020	Kieini na nejet uh, makhala Pathien Shapa kha jong joi, khan kieini dieng jetthieina kha nepek u joi. Makha adik, ashapa Jesu Christa kha nejetnathiei rang le adik ama dieng naw`awmnathiei rang a inih. Mahi adik Pathien le kumshawt ringna kha inih.
62005021	Naite hai, konrilim ah put ah ralaving u roh. Amen.
63001001	Ulienchang `khat a, Pathien na imadan rengnu le anai hai dieng kiei na kimiejiek inih. Kiei na amani kha adik khan numkipok inih. Kiei ranga niboia adik ajet kholok na amani kha numipok u inih.
63001002	Mahi kieini dieng a awm adik jar a adik inih. Mahi adik hi a`awm, khan kumshawt a kieini le awm rangnih.
63001003	Apa Pathien le Apa Shapa Pumi Jesu Christa ah put ah numpokmirit, ninghoina, khan lungdamna kha na adik le numpok, khan kieini hi nawrawtawp pui rangnih.
63001004	Ajarla Apa na kieini dieng chawnginurupek kha le ra`ang a, nang nai hai eshen na adik khan ring u, iti hi kumuk a ajeng a kiningai.
63001005	Aw rengnu, kiei na nang dieng chawngpek athar `khat ang a kirumiejiek nimak a, kung ah put ah nirunieisha: khatlekhat numropoh u rawi, tia kinengen inih.
63001006	Ama chawngpek dungjuia aring hi numpok kha nih. Khan kung ah put ah nangirujet u makha shung khan aringir rang nangnih uh, iti kha chawngpek kha inih.
63001007	Jesu Christa hi miring a jong inih, tia rophong boi, mimohon tampui manmieshie hin jong shok joi. Kha ang kha keng mimohon le Christa le re`er miring kha!
63001008	Nochon thawna kha namathangna boi rang le rupumping a shawlawh kha namanna u rang, nang nining a riring u roh.
63001009	Christa miruchukna kha ikhoi a, khan a a`awm boi miring kha na Pathien kha niei mak. Christa miruchuk khan a awm ama kha na Apa le Shapa dire kha iniei inih
63001010	Khan tukhat na mahi miruchukna hi vak chawi nawkatu, nang in khan lamjawng ruthaw naw roh, khan chubaiawm ruthaw pui naw roh.
63001011	Ajartu ama kha lamjawng ruthawpa kha na ama chonthaw atha boi kha itum pui inih.
63001012	Kiei na nang dieng miejiek rang tampui kieniei a awm, muk le che rotokna jawtlai mi`ing. Kha ruhut a niningaina u hi kipna rang kupumtak va a mailemai re`en a chawng kieriei jawt joi.
63001013	Pathien na imadansha nang uliennu nai hai na nang dieng chubai navakmawchawi uh. Amen.
64001001	Ulienchang `khat a, adik a numkipok Gaius dieng kimiejiek inih.
64001002	Kunumpok, nang ratha rawchawng kha ang a, taksha damna khan nita`awm, irikip a nangrawchawngna rang, nikna kieniei.
64001003	Ajarla nang na adik a nangring dan khakha ang a, uliennai eshen na va ua, nang dieng a awm adik chungchanga kungvakchang u phakhan, kiei ajeng a kiningai.
64001004	Kanai hai na adik a ring u, iti chawng kha kejet le a kiningai dawrthep shik awm mak.
64001005	Kunumpok, nang na uliennai hai rang le, chungchon a, milak hai rang khan takashawnroi a chon nangthaw pe.
64001006	Amani na biekrup maikung a nang numpok chungchang khan kungvakchang uh. Amani kha Pathien maikung a rutuk, khan lam nangmojot joiatu, atha kha nangthaw joi.
64001007	Ajarla ama riming jarbak khan a ka`iruchawi u inih. Amani na Phungshik hai dieng shanna iawm muk boi a rushe u inih.
64001008	Khajarkhan adik khan chonthawshom nachangna u rang, kha ang miring hai kha nirachang pui u rang a shok.
64001009	Kiei na biekrup dieng kiemiejiek joi. Inia amani kar a ulienchang jawt, Diotrephes na kieini hi nawpawm u mak.
64001010	Khajarkhan kiei na kava a tu, ama na iruthaw, makhala anih boi a le ashie chawng a iniebiekna u kha, miring hai dieng hawng chawi rang kanih. Ama na, khan hun mak a, uliennai hai kha rupawm mak. Aloi jawt hai kha`awm amakha, khan amani kha biekrup ah put ah inawt inih.
64001011	Kunumpok, kha ang nunchan ashie kha loi naw roh, inia awmchan atha kha loi roh. Atha athaw ama kha Pathien ah put ah shok inih, ashie athaw ama kha na Pathien kha mumaklai.
64001012	Miring rikip na Demetrius chungchanga atha a kungchang uh, khan adiktak kha`awm ama dieng awm. Kieini na`awm ama chungchanga kungkachang uh, khan kukungchang u hi adik inih.
64001013	Kiei na kimiejiek jawt tampui awm, inia che le muk ah miejiek jawtlai mi`ing.
64001014	Inia relentak a rumuh a, kieini nokhoreng a mailemai re`en a nieriebieh u rangnih, tia ngakkimining joi. Nang dieng lungdamna kha awm rosho. Hin a awm lawm hai na chubai nepek uh. Khan a awm lawm hai kha riming ban a chubai pe roh.
65001001	Jesu Christa shok le James naipangpa Jude na irukoi a Apa Pathien na iruriethieng, khan Jesu Christa na iruhawi miring hai dieng kimiejiek inih.
65001002	Roihoina le lungdamna, khan numpok kha nangni dieng rothom a awm rosho.
65001003	Kunumpok hai, kieini na nimanshom u shandamna chungchanga nangni dieng miejiekna rang, enchak a kururasham inih. Miriethieng hai dieng a voikhatte a irupek takashawn kha mulunglut a nangrohonna rang, mawshawkna kimiejiek hi arangai, tia koloi.
65001004	Ajarla mahi hengna rang hin a tolai a phairutarsha eshen kha nang kar ua muruk a hawng riliklut u joi. Amani kha pathienjet boi miring kha runih uh. Amani na napathien u numpokmirit kha rejaikawk chon a mijir uh. Amani na nupumpa u Pathien `khatte le nupumi u Jesu kha rujawt u mak.
65001005	Pumi na ama miring hai kha Egypt ram ah put ah rukhek a, takashawn boi hai kha irumathang inih. Hihai kholok hi voikhat nangrujet u joiawm, makha kiniminingmashak jawt uh.
65001006	Khan amani akhat changna dingmun arung boi, inia amanitak awmna mathan, ravantir hai kha chawngshatna Nikho alien rang khan kumshawt a khop a jingnakhap mun khan ama na atet joi.
65001007	Makha Sodom le Gomorrah le dieng vai ah awm khopui hai kha a`ang inih. Kha le ra`ang a amani na mitiroi rejaikawk ringkho kha le ruring uh. Khan balam nih boi ditrekhe kha ruthaw uh. Amani na kumshawt miei a shawna irudoi u chepna khan endar ruchang uh.
65001008	Kha le ra`ang a ramang raman hai hi na amani pumtak hai kha pawrmechet uh, chamniei hai kha nawng uh, khan alur hai kha mieshiet uh.
65001009	Inia ravantir ulienchang Michael na Moses pum jar a diabol le chawngrurieshietlai khan, diabol chung a shietak a chawngrushat jawt mak, inia ama na ruti, “Pumi na nang kha nawrawkawk.”
65001010	Inia hihai miring hi na ijet boi u nieinak hai kha rumieshiet uh. Khan mining jaw boi sha hai kha ang a, balam a irujet hai kha na amani kha irumathang u inih.
65001011	Amani rang idawr a shawna rang a maw nih naw! Ajarla amani na Cain ring dan a ruring uh. Nemna rangbak khan Balaam rehena khan ru`um uh, khan Korah roshomothoina khan ruthang uh.
65001012	Amani hi nang numpok-bumichinna uah rethe lung hai kha inih. Nangni le nekleshak rushak u phakhan, chih boi a amani dieng ranga khan chon ruthaw uh. Amani kha rithi na inawng, tui jaw boi romiei hai kha inih. Ara awm boi ajar tha thingkung hai kha inih, voidi a thi, rujung a phawi thingkung hai kha inih.
65001013	Amani hi tuikhanglien rawngaw tuilawm, amani jakna kha tui chung ah aphon ang a vak shok, achai arshi hai kha nih uh. Amani rang khan kumshawt a ajingkhap mun kha ihawi pe nih joi.
65001014	Khan Adam ah put ah ishiri changna rong khan, Enoch na hihai miring chungchanga rurieimasha. Ama na ruti, “Enro, Pumi na ama miriethieng bawpbawp le jong joi.
65001015	Makha mi kholok chung a chawngshatna rang a inih. Khan pathienjet boi kholok na pathienjet boi chon kha pathienjet boi nunchan a iruthaw kha malangsheng a mumukna rang a inih. Khan Pumi chung a pathienjet boi munu miring hai na shietak a chawngiriei u kha mumukna rang a ajong inih.”
65001016	Amani kha muruk a achawng hai, ningnit boi hai, amani ditrekhe dungjuia aring hai, chawngriei a lienrasha hai, amani nemna rang khan mi mapak hai kha nih uh.
65001017	Inia kunumpok hai, nupumi u Jesu Christa tirtawn hai na irurieimasha chawng hai kha mininghep u roh.
65001018	Amani pathienjet boi ditrekhe dungjuia aring erawh thaw miring hai kha nikho dawng khan jong rangnih, tia tirtawn hai na ruriei uh.
65001019	Hihaihi Ratha niei boi, balam a aring, khan mi reshenmashak hai kha inih.
65001020	Inia kunumpok hai, Ratha Riethieng khan nikna niei u tana takashawn riethiengving khan nang ringkho u kha rawshawnmashak u roh.
65001021	Kumshawt ringna mukna rang, nupumi u Jesu Christa ninghoina kha ngaklam a Pathien numpokna khan awm u roh.
65001022	Rakhana aniei miring eshen dieng ninghoina kha tet u roh.
65001023	Inia chitlam a amani kha miei ah put ah khai u tana shan u roh. Inia munuphung awmchan le pawrimechet u kotaishe kha`awm mitir pe u roh.
65001024	Khan keruthuina ah put ah narung ngam, khan rawshawlam a ama lurna maikung a shietna awm boi a namalar ngam,
65001025	thiente a ashing nashandampa u Pathien dieng khan lurna le richit`awmna, ratna le cham kha tun le kumshawt a awm nih rosho. Amen.
66001001	Mahi Jesu Christa chawngrophong kha inih. Mahi relentak a ashokngir rang a chonshok hai, ama shok hai dieng mumuk rang a Pathien na ama dieng a irupek inih. Khan ama shok John dieng mejetna rang, ama ravantir kha irutir inih.
66001002	Pathien chawng chungchanga, Jesu Christa kungchangna chungchanga le ama na irumuk rikip chungchanga John na kungruchang inih.
66001003	Mahi rophongchawng hi ate le rangai, khan mahi shung ah miejiek hai ajui ama kha rahvanmuh miring kha inih. Ajarla pha hi jong nai joi.
66001004	Asia ah awm biekrup shiri dieng John, kiei na kiemiejiek: a`awm, ruawm, khan ajong rang a ama ah put ah, khan ama rengmun maton a awm ratha shiri ah put ah,
66001005	khan takashawn rang a rutuk kungchang, thitna ah put ah ruthoi masha, khan rieliei reng hai apoh, Jesu Christa ah put ah numpokmirit le lungdamna kha nangni dieng awm rosho. Kieini numnurupoh a ama thishen le numunu uah put ah nururushuk,
66001006	khan ama Pathien le Apa dieng reng hai le thiempu hai nurumachang, ama dieng khan lurna le ranak kha kumshawtkumshawt a awm nih rosho. Amen.
66001007	Enro, Jesu na romiei hai kha le jong rangnih. Mik rikip na ama kha muk rangnih, khan ama ruvit rikip na ama kha muk rangnih. Ama jar a rieliei a phung kholok na rie`iek pui rangnih. Mahi adik inih. Amen.
66001008	Pumi na ieriei, “Kiei hi Alpha le Omega, Putna le Mutumna, anih, runih, khan ajong rang a Chungchon a ranakniei kha kanih.”
66001009	John kiei hi nang uliennai u `khat kanih. Shawrana khan Jesu Christa rengchangna le doiratna kha atumshom `khat kanih. Pathien chawng jar a le Jesu Christa kungchangna jar a, kiei na Patmos, iti tuikawram khan kuruawm.
66001010	Pumi Nikho khan kiei na Ratha a kuruawmlai khan tekawlawi `khat a`ang hesho rashang `khat kanuk tieng kurujet.
66001011	Hesho kha na ruti, “Kiei hi Alpha le Omega, Akhat changna le Mawtawrna kha kanih,” khan “Nangimuk kha behang a miejiek tana Asia a awm biekrup shiri: Ephesus dieng, Smyrna dieng, Pergamos dieng, Thyatira dieng, Sardis dieng, Philadelphia dieng, khan Laodicea dieng mawchawi roh.”
66001012	Khan kiei le riebieh hesho kha mukna rang, kahiei a rangkachak thaomieishut shiri kha kurumuk.
66001013	Thaomieishut shiri kar khan Miring Shapa a`ang `khat ruawm. Ama keshe ihup kotai rosho kha ruko, khan rangkachak kawngkhit le runubo kha rumawkaw.
66001014	Ama lu le sham hai kha angoi shamo le vur ang a ruchek pe, khan ama mik hai kha mieichon ruang pe.
66001015	Ama ke hai kha mieipui shung ah miling shumeng atha kha ruang pe, khan ama hesho kha tui tampui miri ruang pe.
66001016	Ama khutchang khan arshi shiri runiei, abai ah put ah bediniei chemjam angaitak kha vak shok pe, khan ama maisho kha ranak moshok nivar kha ruang pe.
66001017	Khan kiei na ama kha kurumuk phakhan, athi ang a ama kekung a kurukieklap. Inia kuchung ah ama khutchang kha atet a kiei dieng nuruti, “Chih naw roh, kiei hi Akhat changna le Mawtawrna kha kanih.
66001018	Kiei hi aring ama kha kanih. Kuruthi, inia enro, kiei kumshawtkumshawt a karing joi. Amen. Khan Thikho le Thitna chabi kha kiei dieng awm.
66001019	“Nangimuk nieinak hai kha miejiek roh, khan anih nieinak hai, khan mahi shole jong shok rang a nieinak hai kha miejiek roh.
66001020	Mahi kukhutchang a nangirumuk arshi shiri chungchanga le rangkachak thaomieishut shiri murukchawng jar kha inih: arshi shiri kha biekrup shiri ravantir hai kha inih, khan nangirumuk thaomieishut shiri kha biekrup shiri kha inih.
66002001	“ Ephesus ah awm biekrup ravantir dieng miejiek roh, ‘Ama khutchang a arshi shiri arakpa le rangkachak thaomieishut shiri kar a alawn ama kha na hihaihi ruti,
66002002	“Nang chonthaw hai, nang chonthawrat hai, khan nang doiratna, khan mi shie hai kha doi ngam makche, iti kejet. Tirtawn hai kanih ati hai chung a nangenrete khan amani kha mielieishiei thaw miring hai kha inih, iti kha nangmuk joi.
66002003	Nang na shawna kha nangdoi a doiratna kha nangniei joi. Khan kiriming rangbak khan mulung rakaina niei boi a, chon kha ranaktak a nangthaw joi.
66002004	“Khanikengta nang chung a kijawtna boi `khat awm, makhala nang numpok akhat changna kha nangmak joi.
66002005	Khajarkhan khoshekawt a acho maw kanih, iti kha mining tana nang mulung lek roh, khan akhat changna chon hai kha thaw roh. Nang mulung nanglek nawkatu, kiei na nang dieng relentak a jong a, nang thaomieishut kha ama mun ah put ah noroshoh pe rang kanih.
66002006	Inia mahi nang na nangniei, makhala Nicolas miring hai chon thaw hai kha nang na nang mitir. Makha kiei na`awm kimitir.
66002007	“Nokor aniei ama kha na Ratha na biekrup hai dieng a iriei kha rangai rosho. Ramawtawr ama dieng khan ringna thingkung ah put ah shakna rang, pek rang kanih. Makha Pathien Paradise kar a awm inih.” ’
66002008	“Smyrna ah awm biekrup ravantir dieng miejiek roh, ‘Akhat changna le Mawtawrna, khan ruthi le hawng ring ama na hihaihi ieriei,
66002009	“Nang chon hai, shawrana, sharachangna (inia nang tu rawchawng kha nangni), iti kha kejet. Khan Jihudi nih boi chuchung a kanih ati hai mimieshietna kha kejet, amani kha Satan synagogue nih uh.
66002010	Nang shawna rang a chon ashie hai kar a akhat diengshe chih naw roh. Enro, diabol na enretena `khat a nangni hi lungroko shung ah thong rang, rasham joi. Makhan ni shawm hi shawrana nangdoi u rangnih. Thitnashe khan takashawn rang a rutuk kha chang roh, khan kiei na nang dieng ringna renglukhum kha nepek rang kanih.
66002011	“Nokor niei ama kha na Ratha na biekrup hai dieng a iriei kha rangai rosho. Ramawtawr ama kha na adi changna thitna khan pawpna niei naw nih.” ’
66002012	“Pergamos ah awm biekrup ravantir dieng miejiek roh, ‘Bediniei chemjam angai aniei, ama na hihaihi ieriei,
66002013	“Nang chon kha kejet, khan Satan rengmun awmna khan nangawm, iti kha kejet. Kiriming kha nangrakrep, khan takashawn rang a rutuk kungchangpa Antipas nikho haishe khan katakashawn kha jawt boi, iti ruthaw makche. Ama kha Satan awmna khan nang kar ua iruthat inih.
66002014	Inia nang chung a kijawtna boi dikhat awm. Ajarla Balaam miruchukna ajui miring kha nangniei. Israel miring hai kha keruthuimashakna rang, rilim hai dieng a pek nieinak mashakna rang le rejaichon mawthawna rang, Balaam na Balak dieng ruruchuk.
66002015	Khatikhan Nicolas miring hai miruchukna ajui miringawm nangniei. Makha kimitir inih.
66002016	Nang mulung lek roh, khanawkatu nang dieng relentak a jong a kener chemjam le amani chung a ra jong thaw rang kanih.
66002017	“Nokor aniei ama kha na Ratha na biekrup hai dieng a iriei kha rangai rosho. Ramawtawr ama dieng khan manna rethe kha shak rang pek rang kanih. Khan ama dieng khan lung angoi pek rang kanih. Makha lung angoi chung khan riming `thar miejiek a awm. Makha aman ama kha na niboia, tute na jet mak.” ’
66002018	“Thyatira ah awm biekrup ravantir dieng miejiek roh, ‘Mik hai mieichon le eke ah shumeng atha a`ang aniei, Pathien Shapa kha na hihaihi ieriei,
66002019	“Nang chon hai, nang numpok, nang takashawn, nang shepdingna thaw khan nang doirat kha kiei na kejet. Khan nang chonthaw hai rang khan tu, mawtawrna nang chonthaw kha akhat changna kha na ikhedet inih.
66002020	Khanikengta nangchung a kijawtna boi dikhat awm. Ajarla nining a thiempilien kanih ati nupang Jezebel na koshok hai kha rejaichon thawna rang le rilim hai dieng a pek nieinak hai kha shakna rang, iruruchuk a, lamirurehemashak kha nangrujawt pe.
66002021	Khan ama rejaichon thawna ah put ah mulung lekna rang, pha kepek, inia mulung lekna runiei u mak.
66002022	Enro, ama kha kiei na shawna jakhang khan kawvawr joi. Ama le uire athaw miring hai kha na, amani chon hai ah put ah mulung lek u nawkatu, shawrana khan ama le roroia vawrchen rang kanih.
66002023	Khan anai hai kha thitna khan that rang kanih. Khan biekrup kholok na kiei hi mulungmining hai le mulung hai atawk kha inih, iti jet u rangnih. Khan nang chon hai `khatkhat dungjuia kiei na pek rang kanih.
66002024	Khania nang dieng le Thyatira ah awm mienieng dieng tu, mahi miruchukna kha niei boi jar a le Satan shungrieirit kha nangjet boi u jarkhan, nangchung ua pokrik shik bolai naw ning, tia kiriei hi inih.
66002025	Inia kojong masheng nanginiei u kha rakrep u roh.
66002026	Khan ramawtawr khan dawngshe a kochon hai hi arung ama dieng khan phung hai chung a cham kha pek rang kanih.
66002027	‘Bekonpa be leklek a ikhoi kha ang a, ama na thir rawmaw le amani kha pok rangnih.’ Mahi kiei na`awm kapa dieng a kiman cham kha le ra`ang inih.
66002028	Khan ama dieng jingkar arshi kha pek rang kanih.
66002029	“Nokor aniei ama kha na Ratha na biekrup hai dieng a iriei kha rangai rosho.” ’
66003001	“Sardis ah awm biekrup ravantir dieng miejiek roh, ‘Pathien Ratha shiri le arshi shiri aniei miring kha na hihaihi ieriei, “Nangring, iti riming nangniei jarkhan, nang chon hai kha kejet, inia athi kha nangnih.
66003002	Iriring kha chang roh, khan athi rang a arangah nieinak hai kha menet roh, ajarla Pathien maikung a nang chonthaw hai urupum muh mi`inglai.
66003003	Khajarkhan nangirumuk le nangirujet dan kha mining roh. Khan makha rakrep tana mulung lekna kha niei roh. Khajarkhan nangriring nawkatu, nang dieng murushah ang a jong rang kanih, khan nang dieng ih nidan khan a ajong rang a maw kanih, iti shukjet a jet naw tinih.
66003004	Khania amani pon hai kha pawrmechet boi Sardis ah miring dikhat nangniei. Khan amani na angoi a kiei le lawn u rangnih, ajarla amani kha rutuk nih uh.
66003005	Ramawtawr ama kha ponledier angoi le ajo rangnih, khan Ringna Behangbuk ah put ah ama riming kha mathang pe naw ning. Inia kapa maikung a le ama ravantir hai maikung a ama riming kha rophong pe rang kanih.
66003006	“Nokor aniei ama kha na Ratha na biekrup hai dieng a iriei kha rangai rosho.” ’
66003007	“Philadelphia ah awm biekrup ravantir dieng miejiek roh, ‘Riethieng le Adik, “David chabi aniei miring, ama na mawlawng a tute na ikhar boi, akhar a tute na imawlawng boi” ama na hihaihi ierei,
66003008	“Nang chon hai kha kejet. Enro, nang maikung a rawlawng a tute na ikhar ngam boi mawkawt kha katet joi. Ajarla nang ranak lekte nangniei, khan kawchawng kha nang rung a kiriming kha raphat pui makche.
66003009	Enro, numkonopok, iti nangjetna rang, Satan synagogue miring hai kha nang kekung a mavat a mawbawklap rang kanih. Jihudi kanih ti u joiawm, mielieshiei keng, amani kha nih u mak.
66003010	Kidoiratna chawng kha nangrung jarkhan, rieliei chung a a`awm miring hai enretena rang, rieliei pumpui chung a ajong rang a enretena nidan ah put ah kiei na`awm nang kha nurung rang kanih.
66003011	Enro, relentak a ajong rang kanih! Nanginiei nang renglukhum kha tute na loina boi rang, rakrep roh.
66003012	Ramawtawr ama kha kapathien riethiengmun shung a chawpui `khat kha minit rang kanih. Khan ama na vai shokret, iti nieilai naw nih. Khan ama chung khan kapathien riming le kapathien khopui riming, Jerusalem `thar, kha miejiek rang kanih. Makha ravan ah put ah le kapathien ah put ah ajong inih. Ama chung khan kiriming `thar kha miejiek rang kanih.
66003013	“Nokor aniei ama kha na Ratha na biekrup hai dieng a irupek kha rangai rosho.” ’
66003014	“Laodicea ah awm biekrup ravantir dieng miejiek roh, ‘Amen, Takashawn rang a rutuk, khan Adik Kungachang, Pathien khutkon Putna ama kha na hihaihi ieriei,
66003015	“Nang chon hai kha kejet, makhala nang hi rachakawm nimakche, khan asha`awm nimakche. Rachak ninawkle asha kha nangrunih a la naw!
66003016	Khatikhan rachakawm nih boi asha`awm nih boi lumchiei kha nangnit jarkhan, kabai ah put ah nomoloh rang kanih joi.
66003017	Ajarla nang na ‘Kawrawchawng joi, niei arawp kieniei joi, iawm rangailai mi`ing,’ nangti. Inia rahvanshie, numpokroi, shara, mikchaw le rekengver kha nangnih, iti kha jet makche.
66003018	Nang rawchawngna rang khan miei a enretesha rangkachak kha kiei ah put ah nangrawchawkna rang, kinarachak inih. Khan jak nangmukna boi rang, ponledier angoi kha rawchawh tana ko roh. Khan nang mik hai kha damna rang, loileai kha nawt roh.
66003019	“Kiei na numkipok miring hai kha kiei na kirachak a kiriji inih. Khajarkhan ningawmer tana mulung lekna niei roh.
66003020	Enro, mawkawt khan kading a tawlam a ka`awm joi. Tukhat na kehesho hi rangai a, mawkawt kha mawlawng joiatu, ama dieng ajong rang kanih, khan nekleshak kha shak pui rang kanih, khan ama na kiei le shakshom rangnih.
66003021	Ramawtawr ama dieng khan, kiei na`awm rakawmawtawr a ama rengmun ah kapa le kashuh kha ang a, kerengmun khan kiei le shutna rang, jawt pe rang kanih.
66003022	“Nokor aniei ama kha na Ratha na biekrup hai dieng a iriei kha rangai rosho.” ’ ”
66004001	Hihaihi shole enro, kiei na ravan a mawkawt `khat rawlawng kha kurumuk, khan akhat changna hesho kirujet kha tekawlawi a`ang `khat na kiei dieng chawngruriei a ruti, “Hin hawng roh, hihaihi shole ashok rang a kha kiei na numumuk rang kanih.”
66004002	Makha shole relentak a kiei hi Ratha a kuruawm joi. Khan enro, ravan shung khan rengmun `khat kha ding a ruawm, khan rengmun chung khan miring `khat rushuh.
66004003	Khan ashuh miring kha jasper le sardius a rumalang, khan rengmun roko khan shumratang `khat na ruroko a emerald ang a rumalang.
66004004	Makha rengmun roko khan rengmun shawmdilieimili ruawm. Makha rengmun hai khan bieklamkai shawmdilieimili na achek ponledier rieshiei a rushuh uh. Amani lu hai khan rangkachak renglukhum rurukhu uh.
66004005	Khan makha rengmun ah put ah khomelek, hesho le khomiri hai kha vak shok. Khan rengmun maton khan thaomieichon shiri kha chong a awm. Amani kha Pathien Ratha hai shiri kha inih.
66004006	Rengmun maton khan avarlang likli thampui a`ang `khat ruawm. Khan rengmun kar a le rengmun roko khan anuk maton tieng mik shipmer aring juleva mili ruawm.
66004007	Akhat changna aring juleva kha kieipui ruang, adi changna aring juleva kha shiecha remet ruang, athum changna aring juleva kha na miring mai a`ang runiei, khan imili changna aring juleva kha avung a awm rumu ruang.
66004008	Khan aring juleva mili kha na matha rukruk runieirim uh, khan pumplang a mik rushipmer pe uh. Khan amani na shunlejan a shawmuchum boi a ruti uh, “Riethieng, riethieng, riethieng, Chungchon a Ranakniei Pumi Pathien, ruchang, anih, khan ajong rang a!”
66004009	Aring juleva hai kha na rengmun ah shuh a awm le kumshawtkumshawt a aring, ama dieng lurna le richit, khan mapakna rupek uh.
66004010	Makha phakhan bieklamkai shawmdilieimili hai kha na rengmun chung ah ashuh, kumshawt a aring ama maikung khan bawklap ua, chubairubawk uh. Khan amani renglukhum hai kha rengmun maton khan rushawn ua, ruti uh,
66004011	“Aw Pumi, lurna le richit, khan ranak amuh rang khan rutuk nangnih, ajarla nieinak kholok hi nangirukon inih. Nang mulungmining jar a amani hi aring inih, khan irukon inih.”
66005001	Khan rengmun chung ah ashuh ama khutchang tieng khan behangjo `khat kurumuk. Makha shung le vai khan miejiek ruawm, khan jetnam shiri le runam.
66005002	Khan ravantir arat `khat na “Behangjo hi mawlawng a jetnam hai hi athut rang a rutuk tumaw nih?” tia hesho rashang a irophong kurumuk.
66005003	Khan ravan shung a ninawkle rieliei chung a ninawkle chimniei a ruawm tute na behangjo kha rumawlawng ngam mak, ninawkle makha ruen ngam mak.
66005004	Khan tute na behangjo kha mawlawng rang ninawkle makha aen rang khan rurutuk boi jarkhan, kiei rie`ieklam a kuruchap.
66005005	Inia bieklamkai hai kar a akhat na kiei dieng nieriei, “Chap naw roh. Enro, Judah phung Kieipui, David Rujung kha na behangjo kha mawlawng rang le jetnam shiri rikip kha athut rang a kha chungshokna runiei joi.”
66005006	Khan rengmun kar a le aring juleva mili kar a le bieklamkai hai kar khan ithatsha a`ang Kengamte kha ding a ruawm kha kurumuk. Kengamte kha na riki shiri le mik shiri ieniei. Amani hai kha rieliei kholok a irutir Pathien Ratha shiri kha inih.
66005007	Khan ama na ava a rengmun ah ashupa khutchang ah put ah behangjo kha vak loi.
66005008	Khan behangjo kha ruloi phakhan, juleva mili le bieklamkai hai shawmdilieimili kha na Kengamte maikung khan rubawklap uh. Amani kha na sharangdar `khatkhat le verawh shipmer rangkachak khengkam hai kha arakrim uh. Khahaikha miriethieng hai nikna kha inih.
66005009	Amani na lah `thar `khat ruthaw uh: “Behangjo nangiloi le ama jetnam hai nangithut khan rutuk nangnih. Ajarla nang kha inuruthat nih joi, khan nang thishen kha le phung rikip ah put ah, chawng rikip ah put ah, khan miring le phung rikip ah put ah Pathien rang khan amani kha nangrukhek joi.
66005010	Khan kapathien u dieng khan reng hai le thiempu hai kha nangnurumachang u joi. Khan rieliei chung a reng chang u rangnih joi.”
66005011	Khan rengmun roko khan ravantir hai tampui, juleva hai, bieklamkai hai hesho kha kuruen a, kururangai. Khan amani jat kha bawp shawm bawp shawm le bawp hai bawp hai kha runih.
66005012	Amani na he rashangtak a ruti uh, “Ranak, rawchawng, varna, ratna le richit, khan lurna le mapakna rang a iruthat u Kengamte kha rutuk inih!”
66005013	Khan ravan, rieliei chung le chimniei ah awm, khan tuipui le makha shung ah awm juleva rikip na iti u kha kejet: “Rengmun chung ah ashuh ama dieng le Kengamte dieng khan mapak, richit, khan lurna le ranak nieina kha kumshawtkumshawt a a`awm chang rosho.”
66005014	Khan aring juleva mili kha na rubawklap a ruti uh, “Amen!” Khan bieklamkai shawmdilieimili kha na rubawk a chubairubawk uh.
66006001	Khan Kengamte kha na jetnam shiri kar a akhat mawlawng phakhan, kiei na kurumuk. Juleva aring mili hai kar a akhat na, khomiri hesho `khat ang a, “Va tana vak en roh,” iti kha kurujet.
66006002	Khan kiei na kurumuk: enro, shakawr angoi `khat, khan makha chung ah ashupa kha na tha `khat ieniei. Ama dieng khan renglukhum `khat rupek, khan ama na ramawtawrlam a ramawtawr rang khan rushe joi.
66006003	Khan Kengamte kha na adi changna jetnam kha rumawlawng phakhan, adi changna aring juleva kha na “Va tana vak en roh,” iti kha kurujet.
66006004	Khan shakawr shenpeng shik `khat rushe. Khan ama chung ah ashupa dieng khan rieliei ah put ah lungdamna roshoh rang, chemjam alien `khat rupek. Makha miring hai na khatlekhat rathat nana rang a inih.
66006005	Khan Kengamte kha na athum changna jetnam kha rumawlawng phakhan, athum changna aring juleva kha na “Va tana vak en roh,” iti `khat kurujet. Khan kiei na kurumuk: enro, shakawr ahang `khat, khan makha chung ah ashupa kha na ukhut ah phala `khat runiei.
66006006	Khan juleva aring mili hai kar ah put ah hesho `khat kurujet, “Gehu haikhup `khat a dinari `khat, nim haikhup `thum a dinari `khat nih rangnih, inia thao le ju kha pawrmechet tha mak.”
66006007	Khan Kengamte kha na imili changna jetnam kha mawlawng phakhan, imili changna juleva kha na “Va tana vak en roh,” iti hesho kha kurujet.
66006008	Khan kiei na kurumuk: enro, shakawr apawh `khat, khan ama chung ah ashupa riming kha Athi runih. Thikho hai kha na ama kha rujui uh. Mili a akhat rieliei kha chemjam le, vawncham le, thitna le khan rieliei sharang le thatna rang, ama dieng cham kha rupek.
66006009	Khan Kengamte kha na arahnga changna jetnam kha rumawlawng phakhan, khan Pathien chawng jar a le amani na irumukui u kungchangna jar a iruthat u hai ringphuk hai kha maicham thoi khan kurumuk.
66006010	Khan ringphuk hai kha na he rashangtak a rura`ai ua, ruti uh, “Aw Pumpa, Riethieng le Adik `Khat! Rieliei chung a awm hai chung a chawngshatna rang le kithishen u ruhut loina rang a kha idawr shawt rang a maw nilai?”
66006011	Khan ponrosho achek kha ringphuk hai dieng rupekrim uh, khan amani ang a ithat u rang a rasham, oshok changpui hai le ishokpui hai dire hi jat hawng rupum masheng, amani na pha bawng `khat shawimuchum u rang a shok.
66006012	Khan Kengamte kha na aruk changna jetnam kha rumawlawng phakhan, enro, nieinu lientak `khat rushok. Khan sham le iphan lemawnpon ang a ni kha ruhang, khan tha pumpui kha thishen ang a ruawm.
66006013	Khan ravan a arshi hai na rieliei a jong cho. Makha rithi arattak na ijap a inawk, pha niboia ara thieichang ang khan rucho.
66006014	Khan behang ijo ang a ravan kha ruloi joi. Lawn rikip le tuikawram rikip kha amani mun ah put ah rurechenmashak joi.
66006015	Khan rieliei reng hai, milienmirang hai, ramiring bawp `khat lamkai hai, rawchawng miring hai, ranakniei hai, shok le moshok miring hai rikip na lungko le lawn raw thoi hai khan rubi uh.
66006016	Khan mo le lungbiei hai dieng ruti uh, “Kuchung uah jong cho u roh, khan rengmun ah put ah ashupa mai le Kengamte mulung hang ah put ah nethe u roh!
66006017	Ajarla ama lunghangna Nikho lientak kha jong joi. Tumaw ding ngam nih?”
66007001	Khan mahi shole rieliei kiei mili ah ravantir mili ading a awm kha kurumuk. Amani na rieliei rithi mili kha arak a ruawm uh. Makha rithi na rieliei chung ah, tuipui chung ah le ih thingkung chung ah ajapna boi rang a inih.
66007002	Khan nishokna tieng ah hawng ravantir shik `khat kha kurumuk. Ama na aring Pathien jetnam kha runiei. Khan rieliei le thampui mawpawpna rang a irupek, ravantir mili dieng khan he rashangtak a ruti,
66007003	“Napathien u shok hai, amani macha hai khan kieini na jetnam kanam u masheng, rieliei le thampui khan thingkung hai kha mawpawp naw roh.”
66007004	Khan jetirunam hai jat kha kurujet. Israel nai hai phung rikip ah put ah bawp rajakhat le shawm mililieimili kha jetrunam.
66007005	Juda phung ah put ah bawp shawmlieidi jetrunam, Reuben phung ah put ah bawp shawmlieidi jetrunam. Gad phung ah put ah bawp shawmlieidi jetrunam.
66007006	Asher phung ah put ah bawp shawmlieidi jetrunam. Naphtali phung ah put ah bawp shawmlieidi jetrunam. Manasseh phung ah put ah bawp shawmlieidi jetrunam.
66007007	Simeon phung ah put ah bawp shawmlieidi jetrunam. Levi phung ah put ah bawp shawmlieidi jetrunam. Issachar phung ah put ah bawp shawmlieidi jetrunam.
66007008	Zebulun phung ah put ah bawp shawmlieidi jetrunam. Joseph phung ah put ah bawp shawmlieidi jetrunam. Benjamin phung ah put ah bawp shawmlieidi jetrunam.
66007009	Hihaihi shole kiei na kurumuk: enro, phung le phungte rikip ah put ah, miring rikip ah put ah, khan chawng rikip ah put ah, tute na ite ngam boi mipui lientak kha kurumuk. Amani na rengmun maton le Kengamte maton khan ponrosho angoi rieshiei a, amani khut ah naw bak hai kha rak a ruding uh.
66007010	Khan he rashangtak a ra`ai a ruti uh, “Shandamna kha rengmun chung ah ashuh kapathien u ama tah inih, khan Kengamte ama tah inih!”
66007011	Khan ravantir kholok kha na rengmun le bieklamkai hai, khan aring juleva mili kha rokojiek a ruding uh. Khan amani na rengmun maton khan bawklap ua, Pathien kha chubairubawk uh.
66007012	Amani na ruti uh, “Amen! Rahvan, lurna, varna, mapaknapek, richit, ranak, khan ratna kha napathien u dieng kumshawtkumshawt a a`awm nih rosho. Amen.”
66007013	Khan bieklamkai hai kar a akhat na namashang a, kiei dieng nuruti, “Ponrosho angoi rieshiei hai hi tu hai kha maw nih, khan khoshekawt ah put ah ava u maw nih?”
66007014	Khan kiei na kurumashang, “Pumi, nang na nangjet.” Khan ama na kiei dieng nuruti, “Hihaihi shawrana lientak ah put ah ahawng, amani ponrosho hai kha rushuk a Kengamte thishen kha na imongoi hai kha inih.
66007015	Khajarkhan amani kha Pathien rengmun maton ah awm u joi. Khan ama riethiengmun khan shunlejan a ama chon thaw pe uh. Khan rengmun ah ashupa kha na amani le awm rangnih.
66007016	Amani na chamna le rana, iti niei u lai naw nih. Ninawkle, nisha na jeilai naw nih, khan ih `khat asha na re`emawm re`emlai naw nih.
66007017	Ajarla rengmun kar a awm Kengamte kha na amani kha hoi u rangnih, khan aring tuinar hai dieng khan chawi u rangnih. Khan Pathien na amani mikrithi kholok kha imik uah put ah no pe u rangnih.”
66008001	Khan Kengamte kha na ishiri changna jetnam kha mawlawng phakhan, nidan khoi dawr hi ravan shung khan chipchip a ruawm.
66008002	Khan Pathien maikung a ading ravantir shiri dieng khan tekawlawi shiri irupek kha kurumuk.
66008003	Khan ravantir shik `khat na ava a maicham maton khan vak ding. Ama na berawh hana rangkachak khengkam runiei, khan ama dieng berawh tampui rupek. Makha rengmun maton a awm rangkachak maicham khan miriethieng hai nikna hai kha le roroia pekna rang a inih.
66008004	Khan berawh mieikhu kha le miriethieng hai kholok nikna kha ravantir khut ah put ah Pathien maikung a ruka joi.
66008005	Khan ravantir kha na berawh khengkam kha ruloi a maicham ah awm miei kha le rumiship a rieliei chung ah rupai joi. Khan hesho reshe, khomiri, khomelek, khan nieinu hai kha rushok.
66008006	Khan tekawlawi shiri aniei ravantir shiri kha na tekawlawi tum rang khan rurasham uh.
66008007	Akhat changna ravantir kha na ama tekawlawi kha rutum joi. Makha shole thishen le reche riei le miei kha ruawm. Amani kha rieliei chung ah rupai a, rieliei thumakhat, thingkung thumakhat, khan aring champi kholok kha rukang joi.
66008008	Khan adi changna ravantir kha na tekawlawi kha rutum. Khan akang mopum alientak `khat a`ang hi tuipui shung ah rupai. Khan tuipui thumakhat hi thishen ruchang.
66008009	Khan tuipui shung ah awm aring juleva hai thumakhat hi ruthi. Khan rokonglien hai kha thumakhat hi ruthang joi.
66008010	Khan athum changna ravantir kha na tekawlawi kha rutum. Makhan ravan ah put ah arshi lientak `khat hi jong cho. Makha thaomiei `khat ang a rukang, khan tuidung hai kha thumakhat chung le khan tuinar hai chung ah makha jong cho.
66008011	Khan arshi riming kha Nimshi inih. Khan tui thumakhat hi Nimshi ruchang a miring tampui ruthi, ajarla tui kha rumakhatmashak joi.
66008012	Khan imili changna ravantir kha na ama tekawlawi kha rutum. Khan ni thumakhat, tha thumakhat, arshi hai thumakhat kha rujem joi. Khajarkhan thumakhat kha rujing joi, khan nikho thumakhat le jan thumakhat na mieivar kha rupelai mak.
66008013	Khan kiei na ravan lai ah rumu avung kha kurumuk a he rashangtak a iruriei kha kurujet, “Rieliei a awm hai dieng khan shawna, shawna, shawna kha nih naw! Ajarla ravantir `thum kha na tekawlawi kha tumdeng joi!”
66009001	Khan arahnga changna ravantir kha na ama tekawlawi kha rutum. Khan ravan ah put ah arshi `khat rieliei a jong cho kha kurumuk. Khan ravantir dieng khan dawngawmboi khur chabi kha rupek.
66009002	Khan ama na dawngawmboi khur kha rumawlawng a, mieipui mieikhu a`ang khur ah put ah mieikhu hawng shok. Khan khur ah put ah mieikhu kha na ni le rithi kha hawng mijingkhap.
66009003	Khan mieikhu ah put ah khaishawr hai kha rieliei a vak shok uh. Khan amani dieng khan, rieliei a awm aikoshangpa hai na cham iniei u kha ang a, cham kha rupek uh.
66009004	Rieliei a awm, amacha ah Pathien jetnam aniei boi miring hai kha niboia, champi, thinglelung, khan thing hai kha mawpawpna boi rang, amani dieng chawng rupek.
66009005	Thatna rang niboia, tha rahnga mawshawna rang, amani dieng cham rupek uh. Amani shawna kha aikoshangpa `khat na miring reke pharoia shawna kha le ara`ang inih.
66009006	Khan kha nikho hai khan miring hai na thitna rutawk u rangnih, inia itikte nita`awm ruman ngam u naw nih. Amani na ruthi jawt u rangnih, inia athi kha na amani ah put ah tan rangnih.
66009007	Khaishawr hai kha shakawr hai na ra rang a rasham u kha le rura`ang uh. Khan amani lu hai kha rangkachak a`ang renglukhum rumukhu uh. Amani mai hai kha miring hai mai ruang pe uh.
66009008	Khan amani sham hai kha nupang hai sham ruang pe uh, khan amani ha hai kha kieipui hai ha ruang pe uh.
66009009	Khan amani phaw kha thir phaw hai kha ruang pe uh, khan amani matha miri kha ra ah atan shakawr gari tampui miri ruang pe uh.
66009010	Khan amani na, aikoshangpa hai kha ang a, riemiei hai kha runiei uh, khan amani riemiei hai khan turshim ruawm, khan miring hai kha tha rahnga mawpawpna rang, cham runiei pe uh.
66009011	Dawngawmboi a athuk kom ravantir `khat amani reng rang runiei uh. Ama riming kha Hebrew chawng a Abaddon, khan Greek chawng a Apollyon inih.
66009012	Akhat changna shawna kha mawtawr joi. Hihaihi shole enro, shawna `di ajong rang rashamlai.
66009013	Khan aruk changna ravantir kha na ama tekawlawi kha rutum. Khan kiei na Pathien maton a awm rangkachak maicham riki mili ah put ah hesho kha kurujet.
66009014	Iriei kha na tekawlawi anieipa aruk changna ravantir dieng ruti, “Euphrates tuidung alien ah ikhop ravantir mili hai kha moshok roh.”
66009015	Amani kha nidan, nikho, tha le kum ijat rurasham a, miring hai thumakhat thatna rang khan moshok joi.
66009016	Khan ruchun shakawr-ramiring hai jat kha baibe bawp `di inih, iti kha kurujet.
66009017	Khan shakawr hai le amani chung ah ashuh hai kha kiei na mulungmik a kurumuk. Amani na mieishen le adum, khan aeng phaw hai kha runiei uh. Khan shakawr lu hai kha kieipui lu hai kha ruang, khan amani bai ah put ah miei le mieikhu, khan mieidi vak shok.
66009018	Hihai railawn `thum– amani bai ah put ah vak shok, miei le mieikhu, khan mieidi-hi na miring hai kha thumakhat hi iruthat inih.
66009019	Ajarla shakawr hai ranak kha amani bai le riemiei hai khan awm. Ajarla amani riemiei hai kha moro hai kha ang. Amani kha na lu hai kha niei ua, khahaikha le imawpawp u inih.
66009020	Khan hihai railawn hi na iruthat boi miring hai kha na chubai`ibawk boi u rang a amani khutkon: raikho hai, dangka le rangkachak, shumeng, thingkunglungkung, amuthiei boi, arangaithiei boi, khan alawnthiei boi rilim hai khan mulung rulek u mak.
66009021	Khan amani mithat chon hai, amani dawileai chon hai, amani rejaichon hai le amani murushakna hai khan mulung rulek u mak.
66010001	Khan kiei na arat ravantir shik `khat hi romiei le rojolam a ravan ah put ah ajong kurumuk. Shumratang `khat hi ama lu ah ruawm pe, ama maisho kha ni ruang pe, khan ama ke hai kha miei chawpui hai kha ruang pe.
66010002	Khan ama khut khan rawlawngsha behangjo `khat ruawm pe. Ama chang tieng ah ke kha na thampui chung ah ruthin, viei tieng ah ke kha na rieliei chung ah ruthin.
66010003	Khan ama na he rashangtak a kieipui murung ang a rura`ai. Khan ama na rura`ai phakhan, khomiri shiri kha na amani hesho hai kha vak moshok uh.
66010004	Khan khomiri shiri hai kha na ruchawng phakhan, miejiek rang, kiei kururasham joi. Khan kiei na ravan ah put ah hesho kha hitihin a iriei kurujet: “Khomiri shiri hai na iriei nieinak hai kha jetnam roh, inia miejiek naw roh.”
66010005	Thampui chung ah le rieliei chung ah ruding kirumuk ravantir kha na ama khutchang kha ravan tieng rulawm.
66010006	Khan a aring, ravan le kha shung ah awm nieinak kholok rukonpa, rieliei le kha shung ah awm kholok rukonpa, khan thampui le kha shung ah awm hai rukonpa, ama riming a chawngrurakham. Makha dawnshe a mushumna boi rang a nih joi.
66010007	Khania ishiri changna ravantir hesho nikho hai khan, ama na tekawlawi tum dieng khan, Pathien murukchawng kha mawtawr rangnih joi. Makha athachawng `khat a oshok hai thiempulien hai dieng irurophong kha inih.
66010008	Khan ravan ah put ah kirujet hesho kha na kiei dieng nururieithep a ruti, “She tana thampui le rieliei chung ah adingpa ravantir khut ah awm behangjo ashin rawlawng khaw vak loi roh.”
66010009	Khan kiei na ravantir dieng kurushe a kuruti, “Behangjo ashin kha nepeh roh.” Khan ama na kei dieng nuruti, “Mahi loi tana shah roh. Mahi na nang vawn kha namakhat pe rangnih, inia nang bai kha tu khoining athum dawr a thum rangnih.”
66010010	Khan kiei na behangjo ashin kha ravantir khut ah put ah kuruloi a makha kurushak joi. Kabai kha khoining ang a ruthum, khan makha kiei na kurushak shole, kawvawn kha nurumakhat pe joi.
66010011	Khan ama na kiei dieng nuruti, “Nang na miring hai, phung hai, chawng hai le reng tampui dieng rophongthep pe roh.”
66011001	Khan kiei dieng rawmaw a`ang kairidik `khat hi nurupek a ruti, “Thoi tana Pathien riethiengmun le maicham, khan makha shung ah chubaibawk hai kha vak on roh.
66011002	Khan riethiengmun vai tieng ah awm tolawng kha mah roh, makha on naw roh, ajarla makha Phungshik hai dieng pek nih joi. Khan amani na khopui riethieng kha tha shawm mililieidi hi eke le ater u rangnih.
66011003	Khan kukungchang pasha `di hai dieng khan cham kha pek rang kanih. Khan amani na nikho bawp `khat rajadi shawm `ruk hi lemawnpon rieshiei a rophong u rangnih.”
66011004	Hihaihi rieliei Pumi maton ah ading, olive thingkung idi le thaomieishut idi hai kha nih uh.
66011005	Khan tukhat na amani kha mawpawp jawt joiatu, amani bai ah put ah miei vak shok a amani rahapui hai kha ikang inih. Tukhat na amani kha mawpawp jawt joiatu, khatikhan ama kha thatngir rang a inih.
66011006	Hihaihi na ravan kha kharna rang, cham ieniei. Amani rophongchawng nikho hai phakhan, ro `khatshe chona boi rang le amani na tui hai kha thishen rachangmashakna rang, cham ieniei uh. Khan rieliei railawn kholok le idittuk rawnaw a jemna rang, cham ieniei uh.
66011007	Khan amani kungchangna mawtawr u phakhan, dawngawmboi khur ah put ah hawng shok ranring kha na amani le ra thaw rangnih. Ama kha na mawtawr ning, tia amani kha that rangnih.
66011008	Khan amani rok kha khopui `lien lamlien khan rapai rangnih. Makha khopui alien kha rathalam a Sodom le Egypt iti, upumi u kha`awm cross ling ah iruthatna u, mun kha inih.
66011009	Khan amani miring hai, phungte hai, chawng hai, phung hai kha na amani rok kha nithum le khoishe muk uh, khan amani rok hai kha than shung ah khumna rang, rujawt u mak.
66011010	Khan rieliei chung a awm amani kha na amani chung a ningai ua, rohoi ruthaw uh, khan akhat na akhat dieng khutchawi tir u rangnih, ajarla thiempulien idi kha na rieliei chung a awm amani kha shawna irupek inih.
66011011	Khan nithum le khoi shole, amani chung a Pathien ah put ah ringna ratha kha jong lut, khan amani ke a ruding u joi, khan amuh hai chung a chitna alientak `khat hi jong shok.
66011012	Khan ravan ah put ah he rashangtak `khat na amani dieng iriei kha rujet uh, “Hin hawng u roh.” Khan amani na romiei a ravan tieng khan rurawlawm uh, khan irahapui miring hai kha na amani kha ruen uh.
66011013	Khan makha phakhan nieinu alientak hawng rawnawk, khan khopui kha shawm a `khat hi ruchim joi. Khan nieinu shung khan miring bawp shiri kha ruthat joi. Khan ihawi hai chung a chitna ruship a ravan Pathien dieng lurna kha rupek.
66011014	Adi changna shawna kha mawtawr joi. Enro, athum changna shawna kha jongrelen joi.
66011015	Khan ishiri changna ravantir kha na ama tekawlawi kha rutum. Khan ravan shung khan hesho hai lientak kha ruawm a ruti, “Manmieshie rengchangna hai kha nupumi uh le ama Christa rengchangna kha achang nih joi. Khan ama na kumshawtkumshawt a reng chang rangnih joi.”
66011016	Khan amani rengmun ah ashuh bieklamkai shawmdilieimili hai kha na Pathien maton a rubawklap ua, chubairubawk uh.
66011017	Amani na ruti uh, “Chungchon a ranakniei, Aw Pumi Pathien, nang kha kanamapak uh. Nang tu a`awm, ruawm kha nangnih, ajarla nang ranak lientak kha nangruloi a reng nangchang joi.
66011018	Khan phung hai kha lunghangna kha na ship u joi, khan nang lunghangna kha jong joi. Athi hai chawngshatna rang a pha kha jong joi. Khan nang shok thiempulien hai, miriethieng hai, khan nang riming achih hai alien ashin dieng lawh pekna rang, jong joi. Khan rieliei mathang hai mathangna rang a pha kha jong joi.”
66011019	Khan ravan a Pathien riethiengmun kha mawlawng a ama rawjawtna tapu kha kurumuk. Makhan khomelek hai, hesho hai, khomiri hai, khan nieinu le rieicho alientak kha ruawm.
66012001	Khan ravan a jetna alientak `khat hi rular: nupang `khat hi na ni rurieshiei, khan tha kha na ama ke noi a ruawm, khan ama lu khan arshi shawmlieidi renglukhum hai kha ruawm.
66012002	Nai ruvawng jarkhan, nainiei rang a natna shawrieviei khan ama na rura`ai.
66012003	Khan ravan khan jetna shik `khat hi rular: khan enro, rorei ashen alientak `khat hi lu shiri le riki shawm runiei, khan ulu hai khan renglukai shiri runiei.
66012004	Khan ama riemiei kha na ravan a arshi hai thumakhat hi apawt a amani kha rieliei a apai. Khan rorei kha na nainiei rang a rasham nupangnu maton khan ruding. Makha ama na nai kha niei pha a anai kha shakna rang a inih.
66012005	Khan ama na, phung kholok kha thirrawmaw le ahoi rang, shapa `khat hi runiei. Khan anai kha Pathien rang le ama rengmun rang, rusho joi.
66012006	Khan nupangnu kha Pathien na irurashamna pe ramthim khan rutan joi. Makha amani na nikho bawp `khat rajadi shawm `ruk ama kha vaina rang a inih.
66012007	Khan ravan shung khan ra ruawm: Michael le ama ravantir hai kha na rorei le ra ruthaw joi. Khan rorei le ama ravantir hai kha na amani le ra ruthaw joi.
66012008	Inia rorei kha na ranak runieilai mak, khan ravan a awmna rang, munawm runieilai mak.
66012009	Khan rorei alien kha jong vawr joi. Ama kha diabol le Satan iti u ronglui moro kha inih. Awmnathiei manmieshie pumpui hi ama na elem, ama kha rieliei a jong vawr joi, khan ama ravantir hai kha ama le jong vawrchen joi.
66012010	Khan ravan a he rashangtak `khat kiei na kurujet. Hitihin ruti, “Tun hin, shandamna, ranak, khan napathien u rengchangna le ama Christa cham kha jong joi. Ajarla nu`uliennai hai ajorpa kha nawt joi. Ama na Pathien maikung a shunlejan a amani kha irujor inih.
66012011	Khan Kengamte thishen jar a, amani kungchangna chawng jar a le amani ringkho hai kha athi rangshe khan numrupok boi u jar a, ama kha irumawtawr u inih.
66012012	Khajarkhan ningai u rang roh, Aw ravan hai le amani shung ah awm hai! Rieliei le thampui chung a shawna kha nih naw! Ajarla diabol kha na nangni dieng jong joi, apha bawngte iniei kha jet jarkhan, lunghangna lientak ieniei joi.”
66012013	Khan rorei kha na ama kha rieliei chung a nawt joi, iti kha rumuk `le, shapa aniei nupangnu kha ajui ruput joi.
66012014	Rumu alien matha idi hi ama dieng rupek joi. Makha ama mun, ama kha pha `khat le pha hai khan pha khoi shung a aravaina rang, moro awmna ah put ah matha a ramthim khan vungna rang a inih.
66012015	Khan moro kha na nupangnu anuk khan tui hi tuidung ang a ener ah put ah ruphuk joi. Makha tuilien kha na ama kha mawchawina rang a inih.
66012016	Inia rieliei kha na nupangnu kha rushan. Rorei na abai ah put ah ivakphuk tuidung kha avana rang, rieliei na abai kha rumawlawng joi.
66012017	Khan rorei kha nupangnu chung khan mulung ajeng a ruhang pe joi. Khan Pathien chawngpek hai kha arung le Jesu Christa chungchanga kungachang hai, nupangnu chicha shik hai le rathaw rang, rushe joi.
66013001	Khan John kiei na tuipui kawmchang khan kuruding. Khan ranring `khat hi tuipui ah put ah hawng shok kurumuk. Ama kha na riki shawm le lu shiri runiei, khan riki hai chung khan renglukai shawm, khan lu hai chung khan mieshietroi riming hai kha ruawm.
66013002	Khan kiei na kirumuk ranring kha kieishente `khat ruang, khan ama ke hai kha vawm ke ruang, khan ama bai kha kieipui bai ruang. Khan rorei kha na ama ranak le ama rengmun khan cham alientak `khat ama dieng rupek.
66013003	Khan lu hai kar a akhat kha thitna dawr a pawp a riekier pe joi. Khan rieliei kholok na shindawngna runiei ua, makha ranring kha rujui uh.
66013004	Khajarkhan ranring dieng cham apeh rorei kha chubairubawk uh. Khan ranring kha chubaibawk a ruti uh, “Mahi ranring a`ang tumaw awm? Khan tu na maw ama chung a ra athaw ngam rang?”
