66013005	Makha ranring dieng khan lienrashatna chawng le mieshietna chawng rieina rang, ner rupek. Khan tha shawm mililieidi hi ama cham kha rotokna rang, rupek.
66013006	Pathien le ama riming le ama thamber khan ravan a awm hai kha mieshietna rang, ama ner kha rumawlawng.
66013007	Khan miriethieng hai chung a rathawna rang le amani kha dekna rang, ama dieng cham kha rupek joi. Khan phungte rikip, miring rikip, chawng rikip le phung rikip chung a cham kha ama dieng rupek.
66013008	Khan rieliei chung a awm kholok na ama kha chubaiabawk rangnih. Khan manmieshie phun ah put ah iruthat u Kengamte Ringna Behangjo shung ah imiejiek boi rikip na ama kha chubaiabawk rangnih.
66013009	Nokor aniei ama kha na rangai rosho.
66013010	Shurkhop rang ama kha na shurkhopna tieng khan she rangnih. Chemjam na ithat rang a ama kha chemjam kha le ithatngir rang a inih. Mahin miriethieng hai doiratna le takashawn kha rangai.
66013011	Khan rieliei ah put ah hawng shok ranring shik `khat hi kurumuk. Ama na kengamte `khat ang a riki `di runiei, khan rorei `khat ang a ruchawng.
66013012	Khan akhat changna ranring cham kholok kha, ama maton a, ama na ruthaw. Khan rieliei le kha shung ah awm kholok hi thitna dawr a apawp riekier akhat changna ranring kha ama na chubairumawbawk.
66013013	Adi changna ranring na alientak jetna hai kha awthaw. Mi kholok imuk a, ravan ah put ah mieishe rieliei a jong muchummashak.
66013014	Ranring maton ah thaw rang a jetna hai jarkhan, rieliei a awm hai kha ama na rumohong. Khan rieliei a awm hai dieng khan chemjam a rupawp a ruriekier ranring rilim kha konna rang, ruriei.
66013015	Khan ranring rilim kha phuk pek a mawchawngna rang, makha ranring rilim chubaibawk boi hai kha nitthieitukshe mathatna rang, ama dieng ranak rupek joi.
66013016	Khan ashin alien, rawchawng shara, moshok miring le shok hai kha amani khutchang khan ninawkle amacha khan phairumatar joi.
66013017	Makha phaitar runiei le makha ranring riming ninawkle ama riming jat runiei hai kha na niboia, tute na rawchawk ninawkle jor thawna ngam boi rang a inih.
66013018	Varna kha hin awm. Jetthieina aniei ama kha na makha ranring jat kha te rosho, ajarla mahi miring `khat jat inih. Ama jat kha 666 inih.
66014001	Khan enro, Zion mo khan Kengamte na ding a awm. Ama le miring bawp rajakhat shawm mililieimili na ama riming le apa riming kha amani macha hai khan imiejiek u kha kiei na kurumuk.
66014002	Khan ravan ah put ah hesho `khat kurujet. Makha tui tampui le alientak khomiri hesho kha ruang. Khan kirujet hesho kha sharangdar le lah thaw hai na amani sharangdar i`at u kha le rura`ang.
66014003	Rengmun le aring juleva, khan bieklamkai hai maton khan amani na lah `thar ruthaw uh. Khan, rieliei ah put ah kheksha hai, bawp rajakhat shawm mililieimili kha na niboia, tute na makha lah kha ruchuk ngam u mak.
66014004	Hihaihi nupang hai le pawrche boilai apa hai, ajarla amani kha ashimbak runih uh. Hihaihi Kengamte kha eshena rikip a rujui hai kha nih uh. Hihaihi miring hai ah put ah kheksha hai, khan Pathien le Kengamte dieng a akhat changna ara kha nih uh.
66014005	Amani bai hai khan mohonna runiei u mak, ajarla amani kha Pathien rengmun maton a metek boi runih uh.
66014006	Khan ravan kawngkar a avung ravantir shik `khat hi kurumuk. Rieliei chung a a`awm hai phung le phungte rikip, khan chawng le miring rikip dieng thangtiknieiboi athachawng rophong rang, ama dieng ruawm.
66014007	Ama na he rashangtak a ruriei, “Pathien kha chih u roh, khan ama kha mulur u roh, ajarla ama chawngshatna rang a nidan kha jong joi. Khan ravan le rieliei, khan thampui le tuinar hai rukonpa ama kha chubaibawk u roh.”
66014008	Khan adi changna ravantir shik `khat na rujui a ruriei, “Cho joi, cho joi, Babylon khopui alien kha cho joi, ajarla ama rejai ditrekhena ju kha phung kholok irumenek inih.”
66014009	Khan athum changna ravantir shik `khat na amani kha rujui a he rashangtak a ruriei, “Tukhat na ranring le ama rilim kha chubaibawk a ama macha ah ninawkle ama khut chung ah phaitar kha awm pe joiatu,
66014010	Pathien na ama lunghangna khengkam shung ah reche boi a iliei, Pathien lunghangna ju kha, ama na`awm nek rangnih. Khan ravantir riethieng hai le Kengamte maton khan, miei le mieidi shung khan, ama kha shawmodoi rangnih.
66014011	Khan amani shawdoina mieikhu kha kumshawt a chung tieng ka rangnih. Khan tunita`awm ranring le ama rilim chubaibawk, khan ama riming phaitar aniei miring hai kha na shunlejan a shawmuchumna niei u mak.”
66014012	Pathien chawngpek hai le Jesu takashawn arung miriethieng hai doiratna kha hin awm.
66014013	Khan ravan ah put ah hesho `khat kurujet. Hitihin ruriei, “ ‘Tun ah put ah Pumi riming a athi ama kha rahvantha inih,’ tia miejiek roh.” Ratha na ieriei, “Idik, makha amani chon ah put ah shawmuchumna u rang a inih. Ajarla amani chonthaw hai kha na amani kha ijui inih.”
66014014	Khan kiei na kuruen a romiei angoi kurumuk. Romiei chung khan Miring Shapa a`ang miring `khat shuh a awm. Ama lu chung khan rangkachak renglukhum awm pe, khan ama khut khan kawite angaitak `khat awm.
66014015	Khan ravantir shik `khat hi riethiengmun ah put ah vak shok. Ama na romiei chung ah ashupa dieng khan he rashangtak a rura`ai, “Nang kawite kha jong tir tana jong rawkhawm rang roh, ajarla rawkhawmna rang a pha kha jong joi, ajarla rieliei a par hai kha minsho joi.”
66014016	Khan romiei chung ah ashupa kha na ama kawite kha rieliei chung a jong tet joi, khan rieliei kha rurawkhawm joi.
66014017	Khan ravantir shik `khat na ravan a awm riethiengmun ah put ah vak shok. Ama na`awm kawite angaitak runiei.
66014018	Khan maicham ah put ah ravantir shik `khat vak shok. Ama kha miei chung a cham runiei. Kawite angaitak `khat anieipa dieng khan he rashangtak a ruti, “Nang kawite angaitak kha jong tir tana rieliei drakha bawr hai hi jong rawkhawm rang roh, ajarla drakha ara hai kha minchit joi.”
66014019	Khan ravantir kha na ama kawite kha rieliei khan jong tet joi. Khan rieliei a drakha kha jong rawkhawm joi. Khan drakha hai kha Pathien phingna juepna lien khan apai joi.
66014020	Amani juepna kha khopui vai tieng khan eke le ruchiei uh. Juepna ah put ah thishen vak shok. Thishen kha shakawr jachan rashang dawrthep hi majin rajakhat shawmriet dawr hi rushe.
66015001	Khan kiei na ravan a alien le shindawngroi jetna shik `khat hi kurumuk. Ravantir shiri kha na railawn shiri runiei uh. Makha dawngkhit nih joi, ajarla amani dieng a Pathien lunghangna kha rupum joi.
66015002	Khan miei le rawpawr likli tuipui a`ang kiei na kurumuk. Khan ranring chung a, ama phaitar chung a, ama riming jat chung a, ramawtawr a, khan likli thampui chung ah Pathien sharangdar raklam a ruding u kha kurumuk.
66015003	Khan amani na Pathien shok Moses lah le Kengamte lah kha ruthaw ua, ruti uh, “Aw Chungchon a Ranakniei Pumi Pathien, nang chonthaw hai kha ielien, khan shindawngroi! Nang lam hai kha dikna le adik inih! Aw miriethieng hai Rengpa!
66015004	Tu na maw nang kha nichih boi a awm nih? Aw Pumi, nang riming kha mulur boi a awm nih maw? Ajarla nang ranga kha riethieng nangnih. Ajarla phung rikip na va ning, tia nang maikung a chubainabawk u rangnih, ajarla nang dikna chonthaw hai kha malar joi.”
66015005	Khan hihaihi shole, enro, kungachang thamber riethiengmun ravan a rawlawng kha kiei na kurumuk.
66015006	Khan railawn shiri aniei ravantir shiri hai kha na riethiengmun ah put ah vak shok uh. Amani na ponramasha cheklak rurieshiei uh, khan rangkachak kawngkhit hai kha amani awrawp thoi ah rukhit uh.
66015007	Khan aring juleva mili hai kar a `khat na ravantir shiri hai dieng rangkachak khengkam shiri, kumshawt a aring Pathien lunghangna shipmer kha rupek uh.
66015008	Khan Pathien lurna le ama ranak ah put ah mieikhu kha na riethiengmun kha rumiship, khan ravantir shiri railawn shiri kha mawtawr masheng, riethiengmun khan tute na rulut ngam u mak.
66016001	Khan riethiengmun ah put ah hesho lientak `khat hi kurujet. Ravantir shiri dieng khan ruti, “She tana Pathien lunghangna khengkam shiri kha rieliei a vak liei roh.”
66016002	Khan akhat changna ravantir kha na rushe a ama khengkam kha rieliei a vak liei joi. Khan ranring phaitar le ama rilim chubaibawk hai dieng khan ashie le chiroi panrai jong chuh pe u joi.
66016003	Khan adi changna ravantir kha na ama khengkam kha thampui chung ah ruliei. Makha athi miring thishen ruang, khan thampui shung ah aring ringphuk rikip kha ruthi joi.
66016004	Khan athum changnapa kha na ama khengkam kha tuidung le tuinar hai chung ah ruliei, khan amani kha thishen ruchang joi.
66016005	Khan tui hai ravantir kha na iruti kha kurujet: “Nang midik kha nangnih, Aw Pumi, nang anih, runih, khan anih rang a kha nangnih joi. Ajarla khatikhan nang na chawngnangrushat.
66016006	Ajarla amani na miriethieng hai le thiempulien hai thishen kha irumoshok u inih, khan amani kha nang na thishen kha nangmenek joi, amani kha, kha rangbak khan, rutuk u inih.”
66016007	Khan maicham ah put ah hesho `khat kurujet: “Awh, Chungchon a ranakniei Pumi Pathien, adik le dikna kha nang chawngshatna hai kha inih.”
66016008	Khan imili changna kha na ama khengkam kha ni chung a ruliei. Miring hai kha miei le hana rang, ni dieng khan cham kha irupek inih.
66016009	Khan miring hai kha mieisha lientak kha na rukang. Amani na hihai railawn chung a cham aniei Pathien riming kha rumieshiet uh. Pathien dieng lurna pekna rang, mulung lekna runiei u mak.
66016010	Khan arahnga changna kha na ranring rengmun khan ama khengkam kha ruliei. Khan ama rengchangna kha rujing pe. Ana pehai ua, miring hai kha na amani mieliei hai kha rureke uh.
66016011	Khan amani natna le panrai jarkhan, ravan Pathien kha rumieshiet uh. Khan amani chon hai ah put ah mulung rulek u mak.
66016012	Khan aruk changna kha na Euphrates tuidung alien chung khan ama khengkam kha ruliei. Ama tui hai kha rukang, makha nishokna tieng ah reng hai lam kha rashamna pe rang a inih.
66016013	Khan kiei na rorei bai ah put ah le ranring bai ah put ah, khan thiempulien nawk bai ah put ah uichawk hai a`ang raikho rono `thum vak shok kha kurumuk.
66016014	Ajarla amani kha jetna athaw raikho hai ratha kha inih. Amani na Chungchon a ranakniei Pathien Nikho lien ni a rathaw rang, lawp a rawkhawm rang, manmieshie rieliei pumpui reng hai dieng rushe uh.
66016015	“Enro, murushah ang a kiei ajong rang kanih joi. Tunita`awm mikkhu doi, khan ponledier rashamjer a awm ama kha rahvanmuh miring kha inih. Makha amani na ponledier boi a lawnna boi rang le ama ajak kha mi na mukna boi rang a inih.”
66016016	Khan Hebrew chawng a Armageddon iti mun `khat khan ama na lawp `khat a amani kha ruruchun joi.
66016017	Khan ishiri changna kha na ama khengkam kha rithi chung a ruliei. Khan ravan riethiengmun le rengmun ah put ah hesho alientak hi vak shok a ruriei, “Takchang joi!”
66016018	Khan khomelek hai, khomiri hai hesho hai kha ruawm. Khan nieinu lientak `khat rushok. Kha`ang a lien nieinu kha miring hai na rieliei shung ah ruawmret ah put ah rushok maklai.
66016019	Khan khopui alien kha tum `thum ah rureshen, khan phung khopui hai kha rupur. Ama lunghangna alientak ju hai kha pekna rang, Pathien na Babylon alien kha rumininghep joi.
66016020	Khan tuikawram rikip kha rutansho joi, khan mo hai kha ruawm u lai mak.
66016021	Khan talent `khat dawr arik, rie alientak `khat hi, ravan ah put ah miring hai chung ah jong cho a, makha rie railawn jarkhan, miring hai na Pathien kha rumieshiet uh, ajarla makha railawn kha ajeng a rulien inih.
66017001	Khan khengkam shiri aniei ravantir shiri hai kar a akhat na kiei dieng ava a ruti, “Hin va roh, tui tampui chung ah ashuh alien nawchijor chawngshatna kha nang dieng kiei na numumuk rang kanih.
66017002	Rieliei reng hai kha na ama kha le rejaichon thaw joi. Khan rieliei chung a awm hai kha ama rejaichon ju kha rumenek joi.”
66017003	Khan ravantir kha na Ratha a ramthim ah nuruchawi, khan kiei na nupang `khat hi ranring ashen chung ah ashuh a awm kurumuk. Ama na mieshietna riming shipmer, khan lu shiri le riki shawm ieniei.
66017004	Khan nupangnu kha na ponshendup le ashen rurieshiei, khan ama na rangkachak le manlu lung hai, khan kongkeplung hai kha le rurielien. Ama khut chung khan rejaichon, mitiroi le pawrche shipmer rangkachak hai `khat hi ruawm pe.
66017005	Khan ama macha khan: MURUKCHAWNG, BABYLON KHOPUI ALIEN, NAWCHIJOR HAI LE RIELIEI MITIROI HAI UNU, tia pekriming `khat rumiejiek.
66017006	Khan kiei na miriethieng hai thishen le khan Jesu jar a kungachang hai thishen kha le akhawp nupangnu kha kurumuk. Ama kha kumuk `le, shindawngna lientak le shindawngna kuruniei.
66017007	Khan ravantir kha na kiei dieng nuruti, “Ithaw shindawng maw nangnih? Kiei na nupangnu le khan, ama achawi, lu shiri le riki shawm aniei ranring murukchawng kha nieriei rang kanih.
66017008	Nangirumuk ranring kha pha `khat a runih, anih boi, khan hawng nih rang a inih. Khan dawngawmboi athuk ah put ah hawng shok ning, tia thangna khan she rangnih. Rieliei a awm, Ringna Behangjo ah amani riming hai miejiek boi hai kha na shindawngna runiei uh, ajarla ama kha runih, nilai mak, inia hawngret rangnih.
66017009	“Varna aniei mulungmining kha hin awm: lu shiri kha nupangnu shutna mo shiri kha inih.
66017010	Khan reng hai shiri ruawm, rahnga tu cho joi, akhat awmlai, khan shik `khat kha tu tunshe hawng maklai. Khan ama na hawng phakhan, phabawng `khat awm rangnih.
66017011	Khan runih, khan tuntu nih boi, ranring ama kha ariet changna reng kha inih. Ama kha shiri hai kar a akhat kha inih, khan ama na thangna tieng khan eshe.
66017012	“Khan nangirumuk riki shawm kha reng shawm kha inih. Amani kha rengchangna atum boilai hai kha inih, inia ranring kha le nidan `khat reng nitna rang khan cham kha man uh.
66017013	Hihaihi na mulung `khat runiei ua, ranring dieng amani ranak le cham hai kha pek rangnih.
66017014	Hihaihi na Kengamte kha le ra thaw u rangnih, khan Kengamte kha na amani kha adek rangnih, ajarla ama kha pumi hai chung a Pumi, khan reng hai chung a Reng kha inih. Khan ama le ruawm miring hai kha irukoi a irumadan khan takashawnthiei runih uh.”
66017015	Khan ravantir na kiei dieng nuruti, “Nangimuk nawchijor shutna tui hai kha miring hai le mipui hai, khan phung hai le chawng hai kha inih.
66017016	Khan ranring chung ah nangirumuk riki shawm kha na nawchijor kha mukmak u rangnih, khan ama kha mathangbieng a rekengver a atet u rangnih. Khan ataksha kha amani na shak pe u rangnih, khan ama kha miei le ha u rangnih.
66017017	Ajarla Pathien na ama chonmuchuk kha amani mulung a thawna rang, amani mulung kha iruchun a, Pathien chawng hai kha lawpsheng a hawng rupum masheng, amani rengchangna kha ranring dieng rupek jawt u rangnih.
66017018	Khan nangimuk nupangnu kha khopui alien, rieliei reng hai chung a reng achang kha inih.”
66018001	Hihaihi shole cham alientak `khat aniei, ravan ah put ah jong chum ravantir shik `khat hi kiei na kurumuk. Khan ama lurna kha na rieliei kha varpeng a rutet.
66018002	Khan ama na he ranakniei le rashangtak a rura`ai a ruti, “Cho joi, Babylon alien kha rucho joi, khan raikho hai awmna mun le ratha rono kholok, pawrche le mukmakroi va hai riekna kha ruchang joi!
66018003	Ajarla ama rejai ditrekhena ju kha phung rikip na runek joi, khan rieliei reng hai kha na ama le rejaichon ruthaw u joi. Khan rieliei a rievieithaw miring hai kha na ama hurna hai rekhe khan rurawchawng shishit uh.”
66018004	Khan ravan ah put ah shik `khat hesho kha kurujet a ruti, “Kimiring hai, nangni ama ah put ah vak shok u roh. Makha ama munu hai kha nangtum puina boi u rang le ama railawn hai kha ih kha nita`awm nangmukna boi u rang a inih.
66018005	Ajarla ama munu hai kha rietien a ravanshe phak joi, khan Pathien na ama dikna boi hai kha mininghep joi.
66018006	Ama na irupek kha ang a ama dieng peh u roh. Ama na ithaw dungjuia rothom a ama dieng peh u roh. Khan ama na irupawr hai khan ama rangbak khan rothom a peh u roh.
66018007	Ama na rekhe a ruhur a nining a rumulur nana kha ang a, rutukthep a ama kha shawmodoi tana mawshaw roh, ajarla umulung khan iti, ‘Kiei na rengnu `khat a kashuh inih, kiei mieirawng kha nimi`ing, khan kiei na mulungshaw kha muh mi`ing.’
66018008	“Khajarkhan nikho `khat shung a ama railawn kha jong rangnih, makhala thitna, mulungkurna le nekleshak tangna hai kha inih, khan ama kha miei le habieng rangnih. Ajarla ama chung a chawngashat Pumi Pathien kha ranakniei kha inih.
66018009	“Khan ama le rejaichon ruthaw, ama le hurna chon ruthaw rieliei reng hai kha na, ama kha miei na ikangna mieikhu kha rumuk u phakhan, chap u rangnih, khan ama chung a mulungkurna niei u rangnih.
66018010	Khan ama shawdoina kha chih a amani na ralaviei a ding a ruti u rangnih: ‘Echei, echei, Babylon khopui alien, ranakniei khopui! Ajarla nidan `khat shung a chawngshatna kha jong joi.’
66018011	“Rieliei a rievieithaw hai kha na chap a ama chung a mulung rumukur uh, ajarla tute na amani rievieithawna nieinak hai kha rawchawk pe u lai mak.
66018012	Amani rievieithawna nieinak hai khala: rangkachak, dangka, khan manlu lung hai le kongkeplung, manrawp ponramasha le ponshenrin, khan lungphurpon le ashen pon, manrawp thing kholok, shaipui ha ah put a kon nieinak rikip, khan manrawptatak thing ah put ah kon nieinak rikip, khan shumeng le thir le lungngoi
66018013	thingteinei le manam hoi berawh, khan manam hoi thao, libanos, ju, olive thao, chachaidi atha, gehu, insha, kengam, shakawr hai, shakawr gari hai, shok hai le miring hai ringphuk hai kha inih.
66018014	“Khan nang ringphuk na idit thieira amin kha nang ah put ah she joi, khan nieinak atha le alur kholok kha nang ah put ah thangsho joi, khan amani kha nang na manlai naw tinih.
66018015	Nupangnu jar a hawng rawchawng miring hai kha ama shawrieviei kha chih ua, ralaviei ah ding u rangnih. Amani na chap u rangnih, mulungkur pe u rangnih.
66018016	Amani na ti uh, ‘Awi e, awi e, khopui alien, ponramasha jielak, ponshendup le pon ashen, rangkachak, manlu lung hai, khan kongkeplung le rielien khopui khaw!
66018017	Ajarla nidan `khat a khadawr a rawchawng kha rokpet joi.’ Rokonglien rikip, rokonglien a rawlawn kholok, rokongtor hai, thampui chung ah rievieithaw rikip na arala a ruding uh.
66018018	Khan ama akang mieikhu kha rumuk u phakhan ruti uh, ‘Mahi khopui alien hi le ra`ang imaw awm?’
66018019	“Khan amani lu chung ah ruvut rubo uh, khan rura`ai ua, ruchap uh, khan mulungkurlam a rie`iek a ruti uh, ‘Awi e, awi e, khopui alien, ama niei jar a thampui chung ah rokonglien runiei kholok kha rurawchawngmashak! Ajarla nidan `khat shung a ama kha rokpet a atet joi.’
66018020	“Aw ravan, nangni miriethieng hai, tirtawn hai, thiempulien hai nangni ama chung a ningai u roh, ajarla Pathien na nang chawngshatna u kha ama chung a mocho joi!”
66018021	Khan ravantir arat `khat na lungshum lientak `khat a`ang lung kha loi a tuipui chung ah ruthong ah ruti, “Hitihin Babylon khopui alien kha ranak a vawr rangnih, khan muret, iti awmlai naw nih.
66018022	Khan nang dieng sharangdar at hai, lah thiei hai, thieikhang tum hai, khan tekawlawi tum hai tute na rangairet, iti awmlai naw nih. Khan nang dieng khutthiem hai khutshin thawret, iti awmlai naw nih. Khan nang dieng lungshum miri kha jetretlai naw tinih.
66018023	Khan nang dieng thaomiei avar kha varret, iti awmlai naw nih. Khan nang dieng moinu le moipa hesho rangairet, iti awmlai naw nih. Ajarla rievieithaw hai kha rieliei a milien runih uh, ajarla nang dawileai kha na phung kholok kha rumohong joi.
66018024	Khan thiempulien hai le miriethieng hai, khan rieliei chung a ithat miring kholok thishen kha ama dieng iruman inih.”
66019001	Hihai kholok shole hin ravan a hawipui hesho ang a hesho lientak `khat hi kurujet a ruti, “Hallelujah! Shandamna, ranak le lurna kha Pumi napathien u dieng awm!
66019002	Ajarla ama chawngshatna kha adik le dikna kha inih. Ajarla ama rejaichon kha na rieliei pumpui imathang nawchijor alien chung a chawngshat joi, Pumi na ama shok hai thishen kha ama chung a phuhen loi joi.”
66019003	Khan voidi changna amani na ruti uh, “Hallelujah. Khan kumshawtkumshawt rang khan ama mieikhu kha hawng joi!”
66019004	Khan lamkai shawm dilieimili kha le aring juleva mili kha na rubawklap uh, khan rengmun ah ashuh Pathien dieng khan chubairubawk ua, ruti uh, “Amen! Hallelujah!”
66019005	Khan rengmun ah put ah hesho `khat vak shok a, ruti, “Nangni ama shok hai, achih miring hai, ashinalien na napathien u kha mapak u roh!”
66019006	Khan kiei na mipui hesho a`ang, tui tampui hesho a`ang, khan khomiri lientak hesho a`ang `khat kurujet. Hitihin ruti, “Hallelujah! Ajarla Chungchon a ranakniei nupumi u Pathien kha na reng chang joi!
66019007	Kieini na ningai u rawi, khan rawshaw u rawi, khan ama dieng lurna kha mutung u rawi. Ajarla Kengamte innieina kha jong joi, khan unungak kha na nining a rasham joi.”
66019008	Khan ama rielienna rang, ashiei ponramasha thaning, achaining le retelang kha ama dieng rupek joi, ajarla ponramasha thaning kha miriethieng hai dikna kha inih.
66019009	Khan ravantir na kiei dieng nuruti, “ ‘Kengamte inniei bumichinna ah ikoi amani kha rahvanmuh miring hai kha inih!’ tia miejiek roh.” Khan kiei dieng nuruti, “Hihaihi Pathien chawng adik hai kha inih.”
66019010	Khan kiei na ama kha chubaibawk rang, ekekung a kurubawklap. Khan kiei dieng nururiei, “Nang na makha thaw naw roh! Kiei hi nang shok changpui kha kanih, khan Jesu kungchangna aniei nang uliennai hai shok changpui kha kanih. Pathien kha chubaibawk roh! Ajarla rophongchawng ratha hi Jesu kungchangna kha inih.”
66019011	Khan kiei na ravan imawlawng a shakawr angoi `khat kurumuk. Makha chung ah ashuh kha Takashawn rang a rutuk le Adik, tia rukoi. Ama na dikna a chawngishat a ra`ithaw inih.
66019012	Khan ama mik hai kha mieichon `ruang pe, khan ama lu khan renglukai tampui ruawm pe. Makhan tute na ijet boi miejiek riming `khat awm, inia ama ranga na makha ejet.
66019013	Khan thishen shung a inawm ponrosho `kha ama na rurieshiei, khan ama riming kha Pathien Chawng iti.
66019014	Khan ravan a ramiring hai kha na shakawr angoi hai chung ah, angoi le acheklak, khan ponramasha thaning le rielien a, ama kha rujui uh.
66019015	Khan ama bai ah put ah chemjam shirdi a angai vak shok pe, makha phung hai kha jemna rang a inih. Khan thir rawmaw le amani kha ihoi rang a inih. Khan Chungchon a Ranakniei Pathien lunghangna kha le juepna kha achiei a awm.
66019016	Khan ama ponledier le ama atawr chung ah riming kha “RENG HAI RENG, KHAN PUMI HAI PUMI,” tia miejiek.
66019017	Khashole kiei na ni shung a ading ravantir `khat kurumuk. Khan ama na he rashangtak a rura`ai a ravanlai ah avung va hai kholok dieng ruti, “Alien Pathien bumichinna khan va u tana vak ruchun u roh.
66019018	Makha reng hai taksha, rabawpkhat lamkai hai taksha, arat miring hai taksha, shakawr hai taksha le amani chung ah ashuh hai taksha, khan moshok hai taksha le shok hai taksha, khan ashinalien hai taksha shakna rang, vak ruchun u roh.”
66019019	Khan kiei na ranring le rieliei reng hai, khan amani ramiring hai na lawp `khat a ruchun a shakawr chung ah ashuh ama chung a le ama ramiring chung a rathawna rang, vak ruchun kha kurumuk.
66019020	Khan ranring kha ama maton ah erekhek chon athaw thiempulien jok kha le rushur joi. Khan jetna thaw makha na ranring phaitar aniei hai le ama rilim chubaibawk hai kha irumohon inih. Adinre kha mieidi le iha Mieidir khan rupai joi.
66019021	Khan aliemlim kha shakawr chung ah ashupa bai ah vak shok chemjam kha le ruthat a va hai kholok na amani taksha kha le vawn mishipna a ruthaw u joi.
66020001	Khan kiei na ravantir `khat hi ravan ah put ah jong chum a, dawngawmboi athuk chabi le ukhut ah thirakarui lientak `khat irak kha kurumuk.
66020002	Khan ama na matienglai a moro, nititu, diabol le Satan achang rorei kha rushur a, kum bawp `khat rang khan rukhop joi.
66020003	Ama kha dawngawmboi a athuk khan ruthong, khan rukhar a ama chung ah jetnam runam joi. Makha, kum bawp `khat kha mawtawr masheng, phung hai kha mohonnaret, iti awmna boi rang a inih. Makha shole ama kha pha bawng `khat moshok rangnih.
66020004	Khan kiei na rengmun hai kha kurumuk, khan makhan ah ashuh hai dieng khan chawngshatna rang, cham kha amani dieng rupek. Khan Jesu jar a kungchang le Pathien chawng jar a ring ituk pe hai ringphuk kha kurumuk. Amani kha ranring ninawkle ama rilim chubaibawk boi hai, khan amani macha ninawkle khut ah phaitar aniei boi hai kha runih uh. Khan amani na hawng ring ua, Christa le kum bawp `khat reng ruchang uh.
66020005	Aliemlim shik athi hai kha tu, kum bawp `khat hi mawtawr masheng, hawng ring u mak. Mahi akhat changna thoiretna kha inih.
66020006	Akhat changna thoiretna a ajaw miring kha rahvanmuh le miriethieng kha inih. Hihai chung hin adi changna a thitna kha na chamniei mak, inia amani kha Pathien le Christa thiempu hai kha chang u rangnih. Khan ama le kum bawp `khat reng chang u rangnih.
66020007	Khan kum bawp `khat kha mawtawr phakhan, Satan kha ama lungroko ah put ah moshok rangnih.
66020008	Khan ama na kiei mili ah awm phung hai, Gog le Magog, kha mohon a rathaw rang ruchunmashakna rang, vak shok rangnih. Amani kha tuipui ah nge kha ang a rawp uh.
66020009	Khan amani na rieliei akhang kha dechip a hawng rakan ua, amani na miriethieng hai awmna le numipok u khopui kha ruroko uh. Khan miei na Pathien le ravan ah put ah vak shok a amani kha kang u joi.
66020010	Khan amani mohon diabol kha ranring le thiempulien jok ngakmun Mieidir le mieidi akang shung khan ruthong joi. Khan shunlejan a le kumshawtkumshawt khan shawmodoi u rangnih.
66020011	Khashole kiei na alien rengmun angoi le makhan ah ashupa kha kurumuk. Ama awmna ah put ah rieliei le ravan kha tan u joi, khan amani rang mun awm pelai mak.
66020012	Khan kiei na ashinalien athi hai kha rengmun maton ah ading kha kurumuk, khan behangjo hai kha rurawlawng. Khan behangjo shik `khatawm rawlawng kha kurumuk, makha Ringna Behangjo kha inih. Khan athi hai kha amani ithaw le behangjo shung ah miejiek dungjuia, amani kha chawngrushat pe uh.
66020013	Tuipui kha na makhan ah ruawm athi hai kha rumathan joi. Thitna le Thikho kha na amani shung ah awm athi hai kha rupek joi. Mi rikip kha amani ithaw dungjuia chawngshat pe joi.
66020014	Khashole thitna le Thikho kha Mieidir khan ruthong joi. Mahi Mieidir hi adi changna Thitna kha inih.
66020015	Khan tu riming nitjoiawm, Ringna behangjo shung ah miejiek boi kha Mieidir khan ruvawr joi.
66021001	Khan kiei na ravan athar le rieliei athar kha kurumuk, ajarla akhat changna ravan le akhat changna rieliei kha thang joi, khan tuipui kha awmretlai mak.
66021002	Khan John kiei na khopui riethieng, Jerusalem `thar, i`inko rang a irielien, moi `thar kha ang a rasham, ravan a le Pathien ah put ah put ah jong chum kha kiei na kurumuk.
66021003	Khan kiei na ravan ah put ah hesho rashang `khat kurujet a, ruti, “Enro, Pathien thamber kha miring hai le awm joi. Ama na amani le awm rangnih. Amani kha ama miring chang u rangnih. Pathien amatak na amani le awm a, amani Pathien kha chang rangnih.
66021004	Khan amani mik hai ah put ah Pathien na imikrithi kholok kha no pe u rangnih, khan thitna, iti kha awmlai naw nih; mulungshaw, chapna ninawkle natna, iti awmretlai naw nih, ajarla matienglai a nieinak hai kha thangsho joi.”
66021005	Khan rengmun ah ashuh ama kha na ruti, “Enro, nieinak kholok kiei na kamathar joi.” Khan ama na kiei dieng nuruti, “Miejiek roh, ajarla hihai chawng hi adik le takashawn rang a rutuk inih.”
66021006	Khan ama na kiei dieng nuruti, “Tak chang joi! Kiei hi Alpha le Omega, Putna le Mutumna kha kanih. Ringna tui tuinar ah put ah tuira ama dieng khan man boi a kiei na nekna rang, pek rang kanih.
66021007	Ramawtawr ama kha na hihai kholok hi arawh rangnih, khan kiei na ama Pathien kha chang rang kanih, khan ama na kashapa kha chang rangnih.
66021008	Inia achirat hai, takashawn boi, khan mitiroi, mithat miring hai, rejaichon thaw hai, dawileai thaw hai, rilim chubaibawk hai, khan mielieishiei miring kholok mun kha tu, miei le mieidi achong thampui kha inih. Makha adi changna thitna kha inih.”
66021009	Khashole ravantir shiri kar a akhat, dawngkhit railawn shiri shipmer khengkam shiri hai runieipa kha na kiei dieng chawngruriei a ruti, “Va roh, kiei na Kengamte nungak, moinu kha numumuk rang kanih.”
66021010	Khan kiei hi Ratha a alientak le rashangtak mo khan nuruchawi a khopui alien, Jerusalem riethieng kha Pathien le ravan ah put ah jong chum kha nurumumuk.
66021011	Makha na Pathien lurna kha runiei. Ama mieivar kha manluving lung le, jasper lung ang a langlang a ruvar.
66021012	Makha na alien le rashang bang kha runiei. Makha na pakawt shawmlieidi runiei, khan makha pakawt hai khan ravantir shawmlieidi le amani riming hai kha imiejiek ruawm. Amani kha Israel nai hai phungte shawmlieidi kha nih uh.
66021013	Shim tieng khan pakawt `thum ruawm, khan shak tieng khan pakawt `thum ruawm, khan thang tieng khan pakawt `thum ruawm, khan mar tieng pakawt `thum ruawm.
66021014	Khan khopui bang kha na chawkhur shawmlieidi runiei, khan amani chung khan Kengamte tirtawn shawmlieidi riming hai kha ruawm.
66021015	Khan kiei le riebieh ravantir kha na makha khopui, ama pakawt hai le ama bang hai kha onna rang, rangkachak kairidik `khat runiei.
66021016	Khan khopui kha pukiei mili a awm, khan dung shieithep kha rajai. Khan kairidik kha le khopui kha ama na rute. Makha majin bawp `khat le rajarahnga rushiei. Khan khopui udungakhang le arashang kha ra`ang.
66021017	Khan makha bang hai kha cubit rajakhat shawmmililieimili dawr rumasha. Makha ravantir na irurotokna u miring onna dungjuia onna `khat kha inih.
66021018	Khan bang kha jasper le irashak inih. Khan khopui kha rangkachak jielak le ikon inih.
66021019	Khopui bang chawkhur kha manlu lung shikshik le irielien inih. Akhat changna jasper, adi changna shapphire; athum changna chalcedony, imili changna, emerald,
66021020	arahnga changna sardonyx, aruk changna sardius, ishiri changna chrysolite, ariet changna beryl, ako changna topaz, ashawm changna chrysoprase, shawmlieikhat changna jacinth, khan shawmlieidi changna kha amethyst inih.
66021021	Khan pakawt shawmlieidi kha kongkeplung shawmlieidi runih. Khan pakawt changkidip kha kongkeplung `khat iniei. Khan khopui lamlien kha amalang likli ang a rangkachak jielak runih.
66021022	Khan khopui shung khan riethiengmun muh mi`ing, ajarla Chungchon a Ranakniei Pumi Pathien le Kengamte hai kha ama riethiengmun kha inih.
66021023	Khan khopui kha na, amani rang a avar, ni le tha rangai mak, ajarla Pathien lurna kha na makha mavar joi, khan makhan a Kengamte kha mieivar kha inih.
66021024	Khan phung hai kha na ama avar jar a awlawn, khan rieliei reng hai kha na amani lurna le richit kha khopui shung khan vak chawi uh.
66021025	Khan pakawt hai kha nishun khan kharlai naw nih, ajarla makha mun khan nitak, iti kha awmlai naw nih.
66021026	Khan amani na phung hai lurna le richit kha khopui dieng vak chawi u rangnih.
66021027	Khan orono, iti le mitiroi ninawkle mielieishiei hai kha itikte nita`awm makhan lutlai naw nih. Inia Kengamte Ringna Behangjo shung ah imiejiek hai ranga kha makhan lut rangnih.
66022001	Khan langlang a var ringna tui jielak kha kiei dieng nurumumuk. Makha Pathien le Kengamte rengmun ah put ah jong long inih.
66022002	Makha khopui lamlien laitak khan tuidung shir dire khan ara shawmlieidi aniei ringna thingkung ruawm. Makha na tha rikip a ara rumoshok. Makha thingbo hai kha na phung hai kha ana ah put ah madamna rang a inih.
66022003	Makha mun khan pumbotna, iti awmlai naw nih. Pathien le Kengamte rengmun kha makha shung khan awm rangnih. Khan oshok hai kha na ama chon kha thaw pe rangnih.
66022004	Ama maisho kha amani na muk u rangnih, khan ama riming kha amani macha hai khan awm rangnih.
66022005	Khan jan, iti kha awmlai naw nih. Khan thaomiei mieivar le nivar kha rangailai naw nih, ajarla amani chung a Pumi Pathien na mieivar kha pek rangnih joi. Khan amani na kumshawtkumshawt khan reng chang u rangnih joi.
66022006	Khan ravantir na kiei dieng nuruti, “Hihai chawng hi takashawn rang a rutuk le adik kha inih.” Khan thiempulien riethieng hai Pumi Pathien na relen a ashokngir rang a chon hai kha ama shok hai dieng mumukna rang, ama ravantir kha jong tir joi.
66022007	“Enro, kiei ajongrelen rang kanih. Mahi behangjo rophongchawng arung ama kha rahvanmuh miring kha inih.”
66022008	Hihaihi rujet `le rumupa kha John kiei kanih. Kiei na hihaihi kurumuk le kurujet phakhan, kiei dieng a hihaihi nurumumuk ravantir kekung khan bawklap a chubaikurubawk.
66022009	Khan kiei dieng nururiei, “Nang na makha thaw naw roh, ajarla kiei hi nang shok changpui, nang uliennai thiempulien hai le mahi behangjo chawng hai arung miring hai kha le chonthawshom kanih keng. Pathien kha chubaibawk roh.”
66022010	Khan kiei dieng nuruti, “Mahi behangjo rophongchawng hai kha jetnam nam naw roh, ajarla apha kha nai joi.
66022011	Midik boi hai kha na midik boi khan awmdi rosho. Rono athaw ama kha na rono chon kha thawdi rosho. Midik kha na adik chon kha thawdi rosho, khan riethieng ama kha na riethieng a awmdi rosho.”
66022012	“Enro, kiei ajongrelen rang kanih joi. Khan kiei na mi rikip dieng amani ithaw dungjuia pekna rang, kawlawh kha kiei le awm.
66022013	Kiei hi Alpha le Omega, Akhat changna le Mutumna, khan Putna le Mawtawrna kha kanih.”
66022014	Amani na ringna thingkung khan vatna rang a cham kha nieina rang le pakawtpakawt ah lut a khopui lutnathiei rang, Pathien chawngpek ajui hai kha rahvanmuh miring hai kha nih uh.
66022015	Ajarla ui hai, dawileai thaw hai, rejaichon thaw hai, mithat hai, rilim chubaibawk hai, adik boi numapoh hai, kholok kha khopui vai tieng ah awm hai kha nih uh.
66022016	“Jesu kiei na karavantir kha biekrup hai le nang dieng kungchang rang, kojong tir joi. Kiei hi Rujung, David Chicha, Jingkar Arshi Avar kha kanih.”
66022017	Ratha le moinu kha na ruti, “Va roh!” Khan rangai miring rikip na “Va roh!” ti rosho. Khan tuira miring rikip kha na va rosho. Adit mi rikip kha na ringna apeh tui kha manboi a loi rosho.
66022018	Ajarla mahi behangjo rophongchawng hai hi rangai miring rikip dieng kungkachang inih: Tukhat na amani dieng hi obo joiatu, mahi behangjo shung ah imiejiek railawn hai hi Pathien na makha miring dieng bo pe rangnih.
66022019	Khan tukhat na mahi behangjo rophongchawng hai hi apai joiatu, Ringna Behangbuk ah put ah, khopui riethieng ah put ah, khan mahi behangjo a imiejiek nieinak hai ah put ah Pathien na ama tum kha apai pe rangnih.
66022020	Hihai kungachangpa kha na ieriei, “Diktak a kiei ajongrelen rang kanih joi.” Amen. Jong roh, Aw Pumi Jesu!
66022021	Pumi Jesu roihoina kha nang kholok le a`awm nih rosho. Amen.
